Hanya dengan tatapan mata, Bell bisa mengendalikan seseorang agar bunuh diri! Dan dia bertekad akan membalaskan dendamnya pada Rion?! Apa yang sebenarnya terjadi?

title: Castle

Sebagai sang dukun, dia berusaha untuk mengatasi nasib buruknya Kyunwoo, orang yang dia sukai!

title: Love Today

author: hazzi

title: Ending Again
genre: ROMANCE
author: TARI
synopsis:
Webdrama populer dari PlayList Indonesia
di Youtube sekarang kembali dengan sebuah webtoon!

"Apakah ending yang terbaik dari percintaan adalah pernikahan? atau perpisahan?"

Karya seru lain dari author "Favorite Part" :)

Temukan versi webdramanya di Youtube Channel "PlayList Indonesia"!
https://goo.gl/WzaY

title: Eleceed - Kisah Asli Animasi

author: ZHENA, Jeho Son

Siji salah satu anggota berandalan disekolahnya mendapati sifat pimpinannya yang berubah derastis. ketika sang ketua menyuruhnya datang ke sekolah saat tengah malam, Siji tidak tau bahwa kedatangannya akan merubah dunianya.

title: Just for Flat Jokes

title: Si Juki: Lika Liku Anak Kost

title: New Normal: Class 8
genre: COMEDY
author: Youngpaka
synopsis: Hari-hari biasa di sekolah yang tidak biasa! Yang justru membuat hidup menjadi seru dan berwarna. Ikuti petualangan anak-anak di sekolah unik ini!

title: My Kitty and Old Dog
genre: SLICE OF LIFE
author: cho
synopsis: Hewan-hewan lucu akan membuat hatimu terenyuh. Kisah anjing pudel tua dengan penglihatan kabur dan anak kucing lucu yang selalu menanti perhatian dan rasa sayang dari sang majikan. Hewan-hewan lucu ini akan membuat hatimu terenyuh serta mungkin menitikkan air mata.

title: Friday: Forbidden Tales

author: Jinsoo Bae
synopsis: Kisah kelam dan seram tiap hari Jumat... Setiap hari Jumat, kisah-kisah kelam, aneh, dan mengerikan akan terungkap....

title: Noblesse
genre: FANTASY
author: Jeho Son, Kwangsu Lee
synopsis: Rai, vampir termulia, bangun dari tidur panjangnya selama 820 tahun. Ia harus memulai hidup barunya sebagai pelajar di sekolah yang didirikan pelayan setianya. Namun hari-harinya terganggu dengan munculnya serangan-serangan misterius dari kelompok yang menyebut dirinya "Unions".

title: Smile Brush
genre: SLICE OF LIFE
author: WAROO
synopsis: Kisahnya akan menghangatkan hatimu. Cerita-cerita mengenai Waroo, anak laki-laki berambut panjang yang suka berpetualang.

title: Dice
genre: FANTASY
author: Hyunseok Yun
synopsis: Peruntungan hidup dalam guliran dadu. Bagaimana jika kamu dapat memulai kembali hidupmu seperti layaknya permainan? DONG TAE selalu diganggu oleh teman-teman sekelasnya, sedangkan TAE BIN, adalah teman sebangkunya yang tampan dan populer. Kemudian, TAE BIN menyaran agar DONG TAE memulai permainan dengan sebuah dadu misterius.

title: Tales of the Unusual
genre: HORROR
author: Seongdae Oh
synopsis: Aneh, menegangkan, misterius, tidak biasaâ¦ Kisah-kisah hanya untukmu yang berani membacanya.

title: For the Sake of Sita
genre: ROMANCE
author: Haga
synopsis: Seorang murid sekolah kedokteran yang berkunjung ke Nepal, jatuh cinta dengan sang dewi yang jatuh dari surga. Ia lalu berjuang keras melawan takdir untuk menyelamatkan kekasihnya tercinta.

title: 10Th Dimension Boys
genre: COMEDY
author: Cutbu
synopsis: Generasi muda dimensi ke-10 yang absurd. Cerita pendek generasi muda di Dimensi Ke-10 yang aneh.

title: Taut
genre: HORROR
author: Padhang Bulan
synopsis: Mita, gadis remaja yang pendiam, sering dijauhi teman-temannya. Orang-orang yang menyakitinyabaik fisik maupun emosional selalu mengalami kecelakaan atau kemalangan misterius. Siapa yang menyangka kalau sebenarnya hal tersebut disebabkan oleh hantu yang selalu mengikuti Mita!?

title: Messed up Match!
genre: SLICE_OF_LIFE
author: nisseven
synopsis: Waktu kecil, Lena Febryan sering dijodoh-jodohkan dengan Kai Febryan cuma karena nama mereka mirip. Setelah sempat terpisah lima tahun, Lena ternyata satu SMA lagi dengan Kai! Sayangnya, kali ini hubungan mereka cukup runyam karena masalah ledek-ledekan yang terbawa dari SD. Belum lagi, ada Adrian yang membuat duo ini semakin sibuk. Apa benarâ¦ mereka jodoh? Atau cocoklogi belaka?

title: Asa Untuk Ayah
genre: DRAMA
author: Romy Hernadi,Assyifa S. Arum
synopsis: Setelah ibunya meninggal, Asa terpaksa tinggal bersama ayah yang tidak pernah dikenalnya seumur hidup. Penolakan muncul di hati atas pertanyaan-pertanyaan Asa yang belum menemukan jawaban. Mengapa ayah absen dari hidupnya dan ibu selama ini?

title: Born to Be the Grand Duchess
genre: ROMANTIC_FANTASY
author: CHYAMI,LICO,LECHIMONA
synopsis: Setelah masuk ke dalam novel dan menjadi Annette Frace, aku berusaha mengubah jalan cerita karakter villainess ini agar tidak berakhir dijatuhi hukuman mati. Salah satu caranya adalah dengan menikahi Grand Duke Blenheim selama setahun lalu menghilang begitu saja. Tapi kenapa Grand Duke yang awalnya sangat dingin ini tiba-tiba jadi luluh dan menempel padaku?! Terlebih lagi, orang-orang memuji kemampuanku sebagai Grand Duchess! Apakah aku memang berbakat menjadi Grand Duchess?

title: Before the Grapes Ripen
genre: ROMANCE
author: samtae
synopsis:
Karena sebuah insiden di masa kecil, ayah Taeeun berutang budi pada keluarga Suyeong. Meski ia sudah memutus kontak dengan mereka, ia tetap mengirim 1 juta won setiap bulan sebagai bentuk tanggung jawab. Puluhan tahun berlalu, keduanya tumbuh dewasa dan takdir mempertemukan mereka kembali sebagai kepala tim baru dan karyawan termuda di divisi yang sama.

Suyeong pun semakin dibuat pusing, kenapa kepala timnya terkadang sangat dingin, tapi di lain waktu bisa sangat perhatian?
Dan kenapa pria itu terus-terusan membicarakan soal âutangâ?
Utang macam apa yang bisa membuat hubungan kerja mereka serumit iniâ¦?

title: My Desire Is Not a Sin
genre: ROMANCE
author: Sohwi,JINJA
synopsis: Di mata semua orang, Ian dan Muyeol terkenal sebagai pasangan suami istri yang serasi dan saling mencintai. Pada ulang tahun pernikahan mereka yang ke-9, Muyeol menghadiahkan bangunan kepada Ian untuk memperluas galerinya, namun malam itu jugaâ¦ Muyeol diam-diam pergi untuk bertemu selingkuhannya! Ian, yang memergoki suaminya berselingkuh, bertekad untuk mengumpulkan bukti demi memenangkan gugatan cerai. Namun di saat-saat genting, datanglah seorang pria misterius yang menyerupai cinta pertamanya!

title: In Your Own Home
genre: DRAMA
author: Hae Bada,Seokwoo
synopsis:
Seo Hwarin, perempuan yang hidup serba susah, mulai dari harus mengurus anak, biaya sewa rumah tak tahu kapan bisa terbayar, hingga telinganya yang berdenging karena tiap saat mendengar bentakan pelanggan.
Suatu hari ia diundang ke kediaman sahabatnya, Yoon Seul, yang kini menikah dengan pujaan hati Hwarin dulu, Minhyuk. Kunjungan itu membuat Hwarin iri setengah mati karena kehidupan Seul dipenuhi dengan hal yang diinginkannya; Kemewahan, pelayan, ditambah sang suami yang merupakan orang spesial baginya dulu.
Emosi memenuhi diri Hwarin, ia hilang kendali hingga memukul Seul dan membuatnya mati. Harus kabur dari situasi karena ada CCTV yang merekam semua kejadian, Hwarin berlari hingga tertabrak truk.
Siapa sangka, kecelakaan itu membuat Hwarin terbangun di tubuh Seul, yang membuatnya iri itu. Bagaimana hidup Hwarin dan Seul setelah kejadian ini?

title: When Pride Fell at My Feet
genre: ROMANTIC_FANTASY
author: milcorn,CHA,walrunoon
synopsis:
Di tengah hidupnya yang sengsara akibat perlakuan sang paman, Emilia Este, seorang balerina, dipertemukan dengan pria tampan nan misterius, Duke Enrico Michele. Dengan bisikan manis, sang duke mengajukan sebuah kesepakatan: Emilia harus menari untuknya seperti boneka hidup, sebagai imbalan atas potongan informasi tentang kematian kedua orang tuanya.

Demi mengungkap rahasia yang terkubur bertahun-tahun lamanya, Emilia menerima tawaran tersebut. Namun, semakin dalam ia terjerat, semakin kabur pula batas antara kebenaran dan perasaan. Akankah Emilia berhasil mengungkap masa lalu orang tuanyaâ¦?

title: Subscription Affair
genre: ROMANCE
author: Tom Wakuri,Arime Hotaru,Romi Otaki,Sayaka Suzuki,Izumi Funasaki,Shiori Ueno
synopsis:
Bagaimana jika ada layanan berlangganan yang memungkinkan seseorang memiliki âperselingkuhan yang amanââ¦?

Seorang ibu rumah tangga biasa, Michiru Toriyama, yang bahkan tak pernah terpikir untuk berselingkuh, tiba-tiba terseret ke dalam layanan langganan perselingkuhan itu hanya karena rasa penasaran kecil. Namun ternyata rasa penasaran itu berubah menjadi hasrat yang berbahaya, membuatnya semakin tenggelam hingga akhirnya jatuh semakin dalam ke jurang perselingkuhan.
Bagaimana ini?!

title: The Villain Demands I Love Him
genre: ROMANTIC_FANTASY
author: Shinmallang,Zestkyo,Omijacheong
synopsis:
Senia Sunsethill adalah seorang wanita yang ingin meninggalkan desa terpencil dan memulai hidup baru di kota dengan damai. Namun, tiba-tiba saja muncul seorang pria asing yang menangis dan berkata,

âAkhirnyaâ¦ kita bisa bertemu lagi. Kumohon, menikahlah denganku.â

Yang membuat Senia terkejut, pria itu ternyata Duke Thesar Nathan Ardiel, bangsawan berhati kejam yang bahkan menghabisi keluarganya sendiri demi mempertahankan gelarnya. Akan tetapi, kenapa Duke Ardiel tampak mengenal Seniaâ¦? Apa rahasia di balik tangisannya dan ajakan pernikahannya tersebut?

title: Goddess Kingmaker
genre: ROMANTIC_FANTASY
author: Jelwee,Jung A,Portofino
synopsis:
Siren, seorang dewi yang dimanipulasi oleh dewi lain, Arwen, untuk menghabiskan poinnya dan gagal naik ke dunia atas.
Sebagai hukuman, Siren malah terlahir kembali sebagai anak Targa, anak haram dari deretan penerus yang dijadikan taruhan oleh para dewa.
Karena jebakan yang membuatnya sial ini, Siren akan membalaskan dendamnya dengan cara menjadikan Targa penerus kekaisaran dengan tangannya sendiri.
Bagaimana perjalanan Siren dalam menjadikan "ayahnya" kaisar selanjutnya?

title: Reincarnation of the Fist King
genre: FANTASY
author: DONAX,S2,Yu jin sung
synopsis:
Dan Woosung, seorang petarung legendaris yang dijuluki Raja Kepalan Tangan, menghabiskan hidupnya menaklukkan murim hanya dengan kekuatan pukulannya. Namun, nasib berbalik ketika dia tewas di tangan Fraksi Iblis. Saat membuka mata, Woosung mendapati dirinya hidup kembali dalam tubuh Lee Jineon, putra agung dari serikat dagang terkaya. 

Sayangnya, Lee Jineon adalah pemuda bertubuh lemah, tidak berbakat bela diri, dan dikelilingi oleh orang bermuka dua. Meski begitu, mampukah dia membalaskan dendamnya dengan ilmu dari kehidupan lamanya?

title: How to Romance the Max-Level Ceo
genre: ROMANCE
author: Mana Akaishi
synopsis:
Miki Tanaka dulunya seorang penyendiri yang selalu dibandingkan dengan kakak perempuannya. Kini dia menjadi wanita cantik dan populer di kantor berkat kemampuan spesialnya yang membuatnya bisa melihat level percintaan setiap orang. Kemampuan itu juga membuatnya berusaha mengalahkan kakaknya yang memiliki level 95.

Merasa tak ada pria lagi yang bisa membantunya naik level, dia hampir putus asa. Namun, suatu hari Kou Houjou, pria level 99, dengan spesifikasi tertinggi muncul.

Bisakah Miki mengalahkan kakaknya dan mendapatkan afeksi dari hati pria level 99 tersebut?

title: Friends After Dark
genre: ROMANCE
author: MUTE,liveby
synopsis:
Berawal dari pertemuan singkat di bar, Kwon Seungah dan Kang Jaejoon menjadi teman malam yang menghangatkan malam satu sama lain.
Siapa sangka, ternyata Jaejoon adalah CEO penerus baru tempat Seungah bekerja kali ini. Hubungan mereka yang awalnya rumit karena tidak adanya identitas yang terbagi, kini jadi makin rumit dengan adanya status di perusahaan yang sama.
Bagaimana hubungan malam keduanya berlanjut?

title: Zombie Papa
genre: THRILLER
author: JAEYI PARK,KIM DAE HUN
synopsis:
Ryu Minseok, seorang ayah yang terbangun setelah mati bersama anak semata wayangnya, Ryu Dami, baru menyadari bahwa dirinya mendapat 99 kesempatan untuk menyelamatkan anak tersayangnya itu dari serangan zombie.
Semua cara dan variabel sudah ia hadapi dan pikirkan kembali, namun ternyata di percobaannya yang terakhir, saat ia pikir kesempatan terakhirnya akan menjadi pilihan terbaik, ia dihadapkan dengan variable tak terduga. Kini dirinya yang diserang oleh para zombie itu dan tidak ada jalan keluar.
Apa yang akan terjadi pada ayah dan anak ini setelah penyerangan di luar perkiraan itu?

title: My Numbered Days of Happiness
genre: ROMANTIC_FANTASY
author: DARAK,Dana
synopsis:
Bagiku yang sebelumnya menderita penyakit kanker dan bisa mati kapan saja, hidup sebagai Isabelle adalah sebuah berkat.

Tiba-tiba aku terbangun dalam tubuh Isabelle kecil dalam novel "After The Time-Limited Villainess Dies" yang sudah kubaca 17 kali di kehidupanku sebelumnya. Walau sama-sama berumur pendek, setidaknya aku bisa hidup sehat dan bahagia sebagai Isabelle sampai umur 21 tahun. Kini, misiku adalah membelokkan alur novel dan memperpanjang umurku di dunia ini! Langkah pertama: membuat ayah menyukaiku!

title: Just 2 Weeks
genre: ROMANCE
author: EUNHI
synopsis: Kim Kibum, seorang mahasiswa biasa, tiba-tiba menemukan seorang gadis berusia 19 tahun di depan rumahnya. Berpikir bahwa gadis itu telah kabur dari rumahnya, Kibum menyuruhnya untuk pulang, namun setelah menyadari bahwa Soohyun menyimpan luka masa lalu, Kibum tak tega dan membiarkannya tinggal di rumahnya. Tapi syaratnya, Soohyun hanya boleh menumpang selama 2 minggu!

title: Don'T Make It Personal
genre: ROMANCE
author: nuguri,heee-n
synopsis:
Mungkin orang-orang di perusahaan tak menyangka, Han Junghun, si kaku berselera fashion kuno yang perangainya bak robot itu pernah berkencan dengan Song Dabi yang selalu menjelek-jelekkannya. Yang lebih mencengangkan lagi, ternyata Junghun memegang kartu Dabi, yaitu fakta bahwa Dabi suka mengoleksi "mainan".
Di luar dugaan, Junghun meminta Dabi untuk melatihnya dalam berkencan agar bisa melakukan perannya dengan baik sebagai lelaki bagi perempuan incarannya.
Apakah pelatihan ini juga akan menciptakan hal mengejutkan lainnya dari mereka?

title: I Turned My Childhood Friend Into a Tyrant
genre: ROMANTIC_FANTASY
author: J.Sun,Rang Chae
synopsis:
"Aku tidak tertarik dengan takhta."

Siapa yang menyangka kalimat itu pernah diucapkan oleh Jade yang berubah menjadi tiran setelah melihat Biche, sahabatnya dihukum mati. Kukira peranku sebagai Biche di novel "Saintess Pembimbing Tiran" sudah selesai dengan kematianku, tapi ternyata aku kembali terbangun di tubuh Biche berusia 10 tahun?! Ditambah lagi, Jade kecil yang ada di hadapanku ini terlalu baik dan tenang, tidak seperti Jade yang dulu aku kenal! Sebenarnya apa alasan aku kembali ke tubuh ini?

title: Holding You Close
genre: ROMANTIC_FANTASY
author: LICO,dotory
synopsis:
Yuelina, penerus Suku Koho di Pulau Luhae, terpaksa harus dijual oleh sukunya karena pulau yang tidak pernah merasakan dingin itu kebingungan dengan datangnya cuaca dingin secara tiba-tiba.
Bak jalan keluar, muncul tawaran jika Yuelina mau menikah dengan Grand Duke Theo, batu sihir yang bisa menjaga suhu pulau tetap hangat akan diberikan.

Grand Duke sang suami yang terkenal suka "membunuh" sudah tiga kali menikah, dengan para istrinya yang kabur atau mati. Bagaimanakah akhir dari Yuelina yang kini menjadi istri barunya?!

title: Misfit Hobby Club
genre: SLICE_OF_LIFE
author: Dito Satrio
synopsis: Tara & Sagara, dua siswa dengan hobi âterlarangâ berjuang untuk menciptakan ruang agar bisa menjadi diri sendiri dengan membentuk klub ekskul samaran.

title: Rakshasa: Demon Rising
genre: ACTION
author: Kim Gureum,KIM SOONG NYUNG
synopsis:
Hong Dojin merupakan gangster yang memiliki julukan sebagai âRoh Jahatâ karena begitu ditakuti. Dibalik semua itu, keinginannya hanya ingin hidup normal. Dia ingin jauh dari perkelahian antarkelompok dan pertumpahan darah.

Namun, impian itu runtuh ketika api biru muncul dan berkata:

âReinkarnasi Jin Kangâ¦ Ini saatnya kau mematuhi kontrak kita.â

Saat Dojin membuka mata, dia bukan lagi manusia biasa. Kekuatan iblis dari kehidupan lampaunya telah bangkit dan menuntut tumbal yang dulu pernah dia janjikan. Tumbal yang hanya bisa dipenuhi dengan satu cara, yakni membunuh manusia!

title: Dark Moon: Two Moons
genre: DRAMA
author: HYBE
synopsis: Seorang gadis misterius bernama Selen, yang berpenampilan persis seperti Sooha, tiba-tiba muncul dan menggemparkan Akademi Decelis. Anehnya, gadis itu mengaku bahwa dialah yang âasliâ, sementara Sooha hanyalah yang âpalsuâ. Akankah kemunculannya menimbulkan keraguan dalam hati Heli dan teman-temannyaâ¦?!

title: Before the Real Heroine Steps in
genre: ROMANTIC_FANTASY
author: Kang Yoo,Lee Taesan,MUSO
synopsis: Saat terbangun sebagai permaisuri dalam novel favoritnya untuk kedua kalinya, Anastasia memutuskan untuk menyerahâmungkin ia memang tidak ditakdirkan untuk mendapatkan sang male lead. Kali ini, ia bertekad untuk menjodohkan suaminya, sang Kaisar, dengan tokoh utama wanita, yakin bahwa happy ending hanya bisa diraih jika ia mengikuti alur cerita asli. Namun terlepas dari upayanya untuk menjauhkan diri dari sang Kaisar, pria itu malah tak mau melepaskannya! Bisakah tokoh sampingan biasa melawan jalan cerita?

title: The Archvillain'S Dying Nanny
genre: ROMANTIC_FANTASY
author: Seongik,CHOKAM,Lee Seorae
synopsis:
Terlahir dalam keluarga Duke yang terkutuk, Claude Ambrosia ditakdirkan untuk tumbuh menjadi sosok penghancur kekaisaran dalam novel "Bunga Kegelapan". Demi mengubah takdir tersebut, Sarah Millen yang adalah penulis dari novel tersebut pun menjadi pengasuh Claude yang masih anak-anak.

Walau awalnya Claude bersikap dingin dan menolak keberadaan Sarah, perlahan dia mulai membuka hatinya. Tak hanya itu, Sarah juga berusaha memperbaiki hubungan Claude dengan ayahnya, yakni Duke Ethan Ambrosia.

Tapi ternyata, baik Claude maupun Ethan malah semakin menempel dengan Sarah! Bisakah Sarah menyelesaikan misinya sebelum waktunya habis? Atau jangan-jangan keadaannya malah mempercepat kehancuran tersebut?

title: Kaos Hitam
genre: COMEDY
author: Toragari
synopsis: Slamet Riyadi, seorang pemuda SMA yang merasa berwajah tampan memutuskan pindah sekolah ke kota demi mencari kisah romantis layaknya di film-film. Tapi ternyata... di kota dia baru menyadari bahwa wajahnya adalah musuh terbesar bagi diri sendiri. Beruntung Slamet menemukan sebuah kaos yang bisa mengubah hidupnya!

title: The Empress' Lipstick
genre: ROMANTIC_FANTASY
author: Coffeebean,JJG
synopsis: Jae-in yang gemar menggunakan make up karena wajahnya yang dia rasa kurang cantik, menemukan sebuah lipstik aneh. Namun lipstik itu justru membawanya ke dunia lain, dan kini dia menjadi tuan putri Jane?! Apalagi wajahnya jadi cantik!

title: She'S My Type
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Roseong
synopsis: After tomboy Haedam is thoroughly friend zoned by her first love, she's determined to glow up before college. But when she makes the wrong impression on her first day of school, she realizes she needs the help of her reluctant neighbor. In exchange, she promises to put up with their living circumstances and keep his secret. What could possibly go wrong?

title: Hooky
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Mystery
author: Yubune Toushiki
synopsis: Dani and Dorian have missed the bus of the school of magic. Now, they must find someone who teach them how to be a great and good witches Or maybe not.?

title: Juujika No Rokunin
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Harem, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
author: Shiryuu  Nakatake
synopsis:
Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."

title: Yuruyuri
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Namori
synopsis: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scampswho ignore repeated warningsin direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Councildecide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!

title: You Shou Yan
genre: Historical, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Xue Xia Mao Yao Zi
synopsis:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?

title: Ichigo Mashimaro
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Barasui
synopsis: "Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.

title: Hanninmae No Koibito
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Daichi Kawada
synopsis: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!

title: Mato Seihei No Slave
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, Monster Girls, Supernatural
author: Takahiro
synopsis:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave" and it's not him who has to pay it.

title: Chigau Miyahara Omae Janai!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Midori Obiya
synopsis:
The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. ([ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Young Jump!](https://ynjn.jp/title/7831)

title: The Legendary Hero Is an Academy Honors Student
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Manseongi
synopsis:
Back in the Age of Despair, Kyle defeated Erebos, the genesis of evil.  Then 5000 years later, he reincarnated as Leo with the memories of his past life intact.

His comrades  the Brave Arron, the Divine Blacksmitsh Dweno, the Poet of the Stars Luna, and the Wise King Lysinas  were all heralded as great heroes.

But the 'Hero Record', a gift from the heavens that records the achievements of heroes through the ages, had no record of Kyle whatsoever, and the people of the present treat him like a fictional character.

Angry about the reality he's found himself in, Leo enrolls at Lumene Academy, the hero academy which houses the Hero Record.

"Fine. I guess I'll become an honors student to figure out why I was written out of history."

title: Kimi Ni Furu Kotonoha Wa
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Delinquents
author: Haruka Izumi
synopsis:
One day, Komatsu Hinata, a book-loving high school student, meets a blond all-back-haired delinquent on the train on his way to school.
Hinata is so happy that someone is interested in his favorite novels and gets unintentionally excited, but the delinquent gives him a surprising response, and Hinata spits out terrible words at him.
Thinking that they would never meet again, he finds out that the delinquent is Igarashi Yukito, a student in the same class who has never been to school since the school started?
A hurtful youth and love story about two people who have never known love.

title: Mushoku Tensei ~Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu~ Shitsui No Majutsushi-Hen
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kazusa Yoneda
synopsis:
After separating from Eris, Rudeus falls into the depths of depression. He travels to Rozenberg, the second city of the Principality of Basherant, to search for his missing mother, Zenith. Desperate, Rudeus tries to accept a high-ranking quest alone in order to make a name for himself. However, by chance, he ends up working with a party of B-rank adventurers called the Counter Arrow. One of the party members is a girl named Sara, who reminds him of Eris...!

A complete manga adaptation of the seventh volume of the light novel series, depicting the aftermath of Rudeus' separation from Eris!

title: Grey Is...
genre: Psychological, Self-Published, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Yoshihisa Tagami
synopsis:
Two childhood friendsBlack, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer whos been absent for two yearsreunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood.
Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.

title: Rosen Garten Saga
genre: Genderswap, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Sakimori Fuji
synopsis:
Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert... I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat... ahem, heroes!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/rosen-garten-saga-manga/525/), [MangaPlaza](https://mangaplaza.com/title/0303005019/)

title: Nietzsche-Sensei - Konbini Ni, Satori Sedai No Shinjin Ga Maiorita
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Koma Matsu
synopsis: The comedy manga follows a male part-time late-night convenience store worker named Matsukoma, and the new part-time worker he trains named Tomoharu Nii, nicknamed Nietzsche-sensei. Tomoharu is a university student in the school's Buddhism department. When an angry customer screams at Tomoharu, "Customers are gods!," he replies, "God is dead." The manga follows the part-time worker life of Matsukoma and Tomoharu, the latter of whom continuously baffles his customers and co-workers at the convenience store with his odd ways.

title: Mahouka Koukou No Rettousei - Shizoku Kaigi-Hen
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Hasumi Takeda
synopsis:
At the Yotsuba New Year's gathering, Miyuki was names as the successor whilst Tatsuya was named her fiancé. Tatsuya and Miyuki's non-sibling relationship and engagement are now public knowledge. Among the shocked students the most shocked are those that knew the siblings.  
Meanwhile, the Ten Master Clans selection meeting, followed by magicians all over the world, is due to take place at a hotel in Hokone.  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 17-19.

title: Childcare Diary with the Villain
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Yeoreo
synopsis: Mary didnt know what to expect of the afterlife, but it certainly wasnt becoming the evil, murderous nanny of the novel she was reading. Her circumstances become secondary concerns when she realizes that no matter what, Briel must remain safe. Its the only way to keep his uncle, Count Kentryle Chalant, from the path of revenge. Can she keep her new charge safe and change the entire plot, or will the true villain get the best of them all? And is she going to find love on the way?

title: Mori De Seijo Wo Hirotta Saikyou No Kyuuketsu-Hime ~Musume No Tamenara Kuni De Moassari Horoboshimasu!~
genre: Action, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Vampires, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Ren Takigawa
synopsis:
The True Ancestor Angelica, feared by the world under the alias of "the Vampire Princess Who Burns Kingdoms," has once again burned an entire country with her magic today. The reason for this is... "M-Mama!" Was it for the sake of her unbearably cute daughter?! 
 
After picking up a human baby in the forest and raising her, Angelica was knocked out by her soft, pudgy skin and innocent purity, untouched by corruption. Gone was the cold-hearted killer who easily took lives, replaced by a doting mother enjoying a life of extreme affection. 
 
One day, the foolish king, aiming to kidnap her daughter, Pearl, who was actually a special "Saint," hatched a scheme. Naturally, this incited Angelica's wrath! The word "mercy" was forgotten by "Mama," who would destroy any enemy, using even the most cruel means! 
 
A cheat-level, overpowered vampire princess rampages in a dark fantasy driven by love and parental affection!
 
___
**Character Designer:** [Yoshimoto](https://mangadex.org/author/212b80e5-09a9-47ea-8da0-9064f16815fb)

title: Kyou No Kira-Kun
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Rin Mikimoto
synopsis:
In 360 days, there was bright days and disappointment while I was staring at you. Though they were neighbor, Nino and Kira never talk to each other  
  
But when Nino knows about Kira's secret, all of her life changes and her everyday becomes more interesting!  
Their link will lead them to love close to paradise.

title: Gal Yome No Himitsu
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Kudu
synopsis: Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...?

title: I Don'T Want to Be a Lady
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Jeom-Myeon
synopsis:
Before being sold as the Crown Princes concubine, I proposed a contract marriage to the Duke.

Will your father allow you to marry me?
Of course not. So there is only one way.

We have to make an accident.

It will taste better when I break that mol*sters head.
I could shoot a gun at the alley gangster. Even the prince of the neighboring empire was also knocked out by me.

The man snorted.

Youre so arrogant as the captive subject. I never knew that Count Bornes would be a jerk to his dog.

I said with a smile, Our mansion didnt have a dog. Because the owner of the mansion is already a dog.

This is the story of Arianne Bornes, who seemed to be a villainess but not a villainess.

title: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Hotokenoza
synopsis:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

Ill kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! Ill make you shed tears from both of your eyes!

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamels been dead for a long time, and the brothers who came one day

Purple eyes. Its not a color that anyone can have.
But I was like this from the beginning.
Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.
the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?

Of all people, Im the daughter of that Asinov? Its nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemys blood!

All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?

title: A Father Who Forgives Everything
genre: Oneshot, Comedy, Crossdressing, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: raku
synopsis: Not found

title: Negai No Astro
genre: Action, Crime, Mafia, Supernatural
author: Ken Wakui
synopsis:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!

title: Shin Lupin Iii
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Samurai, Mafia, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Drama, Police, Mystery
author: Monkey Punch
synopsis:
Lupin the Third and his motley crew return in Shin Lupin III! This time, several of the stories are either brand new or adapted from or to the Lupin anime, and the beginning story was even animated by itself several years later!  
  
Lupin the Third is the grandson of the famous literary thief Arsène Lupin, and his partners in crime include the sharpshooter Jigen Daisuke, the stoic samurai Goemon Ishikawa the Thirteenth, and the on-again-off-again lover/enemy Fujiko Mine. Their goal is to outwit enemies bigger than themselves while nabbing the world's rarest and most important items, while also outwitting the dogged Inspector Zenigata, who's made it his life's work to capture and secure Lupin. In the manga however, his relationship with the titular thief isn't as "respecting to the enemy" as you would expect, as he's attempted multiple times to kill him without shedding a tear!   
  
What kind of sexy exploits will Lupin and his crew get up to next inShin Lupin III!

title: Being Targeted by Hyena-Chan
genre: Romance, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Juugoya
synopsis: I found out that my long-distance girlfriend had gotten a new older boyfriend from the city and while I was in the grip of despair, a girl named Haibara Enako, more affectionately called "Hyena-chan" suddenly appeared before me and confessed, "I don't have a boyfriend and I'm free right now."

title: The 53 Year Old Online Gamer'S First Irl Meet-Up
genre: Video Games, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Masaya Ziki
synopsis:
Let's go to the offline meet-up with online gaming friends!

"MAKOTO" is a middle-aged man and newbie gamer who's excited for his offline meeting with "Ao", a veteran adventurer who has always been helping him out. However, the one who appeared for the meeting was... an elementary school boy!?

title: The Hunter Wants to Live Quietly
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Survival, Superhero, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Magma
synopsis: Hunter Cha Euijae, sent to seal a rift over the West Sea, was flung out after closing it. When he regain consciousness, he found himself in a garbage dumpeight years in the future. Starving, he stumbled into a hangover soup restaurant and realized the world had changed. Now, disaster alerts warn of rift openings, slime ASMR videos are trending, and hunters livestream A-rank sword unboxings. Instead of the looming apocalypse, the future is oddly peaceful, leaving Cha Euijae feeling empty. Deciding to leave his hunter days behind, he chooses to work part-time at the restaurant. But his quiet new life takes a turn when he meets a mysterious figure in a gas mask

title: Genesis of the Battle God
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Mikage
synopsis:
In an era where mythology and reality have fused together, the powers of gods and heroes from ancient myths like those of Greece, Rome, Judea, and Egypt have descended upon the modern world of the 21st century. 

Ken Yanagimoto, an Awakened One with physical abilities and senses far superior to those of ordinary people, has returned after five years of working as a mercenary overseas. Upon his return, he discovers that his parents have been killed and his sister has gone missing at the hands of the powerful organization Seven Star Society, which controls the political, financial, and media worlds. 

Enraged by the death of his parents and the disappearance of his sister, Ken vows revenge against the Seven Star Society and confronts various secret forces and injustices around the globe. 

Amid the grim reality of the dawn of a new era of human evolution, the story of one man who engages in mythical battles against the world begins.

title: The Ramparts of Ice
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Koucha Agasawa
synopsis:
Inept at dealing with people, Higawa Koyuki maintains a wall between herself and others. She spends her time in highschool away from others, all alone. At least until she encounters Amamiya Minato who keeps closing the distance between them for some reason?!

The aloof Koyuki, the popular Miki, the boundary-less Minato, and the easygoing and kind basketball team member, Youta. This is the story of these somewhat complicated four, and their tantalizing, bumbling youth!

title: Captain Tsubasa - Rising Sun - Finals
genre: Action, Sports, Drama, Web Comic
author: Youichi Takahashi
synopsis:
A web-comic continuation of Captain Tsubasa 9th arc: Rising Sun - The Final.

Rising Sun - FINALS is covering the 2nd half of the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain and beyond.

The web-comic came to be when on April 2024 mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, ending Rising Sun - The Final official published serialization half-way through the match opting to continue the story at his own pace with storyboard pencil sketches, publishing them on the official Captain Tsubasa World website.

title: The Genius Wants to Be Ordinary!
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Bidangaribi
synopsis:
The protagonist of a successful life recognized by the public, 'Son Jinhyuk.'
However, Jinhyuk just wanted to live a normal life with his beloved family, and he couldn't hide his lonely heart because he couldn't.
One day, I woke up in an accident and was back to the time I was 9 years old before I lost my parents, whom I wanted so much!
Will Jinhyuk be able to save his parents and live a normal life?

title: Captain Tsubasa - Road to 2002
genre: Thriller, Survival, Sports, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Youichi Takahashi
synopsis:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

title: The Lady'S Servant
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Hoshino Taguchi
synopsis: The story centers around a main character who was raised as a butler from his family's trade, and who one day meets a rich young lady who cannot even change her own clothes, let alone know what to do in the outside world.

title: Kiss Me in the Dark of Night
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Horror, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: She She
synopsis: Clark, an 800-year-old vampire, was dug up by young Taoist, Jiang Lai, who successfully formed a contract with her. In order to eventually kill the vampire, Jiang Lai lived with her and tried various methods, but gradually became Clark's prey. A chance encounter turns into reinventing their past and present lives. Love and hate are like the dark and light sides of the moon. "Clark, come to my side."

title: Class No Inkya Ojousama No Shitsuji Ni Narimashita
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic
author: Yayoi Hizuki
synopsis:
My family abandoned me in the night leaving me behind, so I became the butler of the gloomy young lady in my class...

---
Support the author by buying the manga in [Booth.pm](https://booth.pm/ja/items/4380401).

title: Fan Ni Gachikoi Suru Idol To, Idol Ni Shiotaiou Na Fan.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Music
author: Mare Mizue
synopsis: Ririka is an unpopular idol who is in love with a fan named Suzuki. She tries various ways to get his attention, but Suzuki's reactions are always cold. However, Ririka's love is so strong that she is determined to do whatever it takes to make him look her way.

title: Mad for Love
genre: Time Travel, Official Colored, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Lu Fang
synopsis: After traveling into a historical BL novel, the actor Lin Yan gains a special ability: fast-traveling through a skill called [Escape Death]. His first mission? To secretly orchestrate an attack on Prince Qi Zhen, which leads to the prince becoming the villain. Lin Yans first identity in this world is none other than Lin Shou Yan, the princes foolish fiancé. But as he plays his role, he accidentally captures the princes heart, and his fake death turns out to be the key reason Qi Zhen becomes a ruthless tyrant! A cold, overthinking tsundere prince and his scheming, perverted fiancéchaos ensues!

title: Legendary Me!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Wataru Yamasaki
synopsis:
Ozma, a former court magician, is executed for saving a girl, Felia. However, he is reincarnated in a world 300 years later. There, his previous life, in which he was supposed to have been executed, has left his mark on history with a series of feats of which he has no memory, and he has been praised as a god. Like a legendary hero!

Adapted to Novel.

title: Sakamoto Days
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Mafia, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Yuuto  Suzuki
synopsis: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one dayhe fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!

title: Tensei Kizoku No Isekai Boukenroku: Jichou O Shiranai Kamigami No Shito
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: nini
synopsis:
Shiina Kazuya, the protagonist of the story was killed by a stranger in front of a convenience store when he tried to protect two young girls escaping from the stranger who is trying to stab them. The girls fall and are too overcome with fear to get up and continue running away. When Shiina Kazuya awakens he realizes that he was reincarnated as the young noble Cain von Silford, the third son of an aristocrat (Margrave Garm Von Silford) and his second wife (Sarah) in a world filled with sword and sorcery.

Prior to the age of ten Cain grew up in the Gracia Territory surrounded by gods that don't know self-restraint, in the upper echelon of nobility, and a loving family (father Garm Von Silford, mother Sarah, and older sister Raine). At the age of ten Cain is given peerage (Title of Duke, own estate, and an engagement), which leads to him living in Esfort the Royal Capitol.

This is a classic isekai fantasy about an overpowered young man who just wants to be an average adventurer. He has received the maximum level of divine blessings from all seven gods, overcomes any obstacle that comes his way while hiding his unbelievable status and tends to build a harem of highly influential nobles.

title: Dai Kyochuu Rettou
genre: Monsters, Action, Animals, Survival, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Yasutaka Fujimi
synopsis: New enemies, new bugs and an even bigger island.

title: Kisekae Ningyou De Chu?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic
author: Choboraunyopomi
synopsis: The spin-off of "My Dress-Up Darling", [Kisekae Ningyou de Chu ?], has started serialization with a chaotic yet cute vibe

title: Monarch of Death
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ran Ju
synopsis:
"What can I do with a body that only has bones?"

Karnak had become the king of death using the forbidden secrets of "necromancy," but he began to reminisce the pleasures of the flesh, in sorrow of his bony body...

"I'll turn back time itself!"

After a long period of research, he succeeded in using the time regression spell and regressed to the past with his right hand, Baros.

"Uh... young master, I think the past has been changed."

This is the death king's project to straighten out his twisted(?) life!

title: My Husband Is Out of Control Again
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Gore, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Yi Ting
synopsis:
Lu Can looked down at Chu Jin and joked: "Recently, you've been following me everywhere. In the Special Police building, hospitals, restaurants, bathrooms and toilets..."

Chu Jin covered Lu Can's mouth shyly, wanting to forget the scenes: "Stop it! I just want some spiritual power! Don't make me seem so perverted!"

Lu Can raised his eyebrows and smiled: "Do you really just want spiritual strength? That'd be a little pity~"

Chu Bangmao: "We're just partners! You'll regret this!"

Everyone: "Haha, we believe you!"

title: Maxed Talent Player
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Hyomak
synopsis: In 2018, monsters swarmed Seoul, and heroic players saved the city. Fast forward a decade, Hyukjin Kim, stuck in a seven-year rut after failing to become a player himself, gets a do-over. Zapped back to 2018, Hyukjin seizes his chance to rewrite history. With knowledge from the future and his re-awakened player talents, Hyukjin battles beasts and conquers dungeons in a pulse-pounding quest for redemption and survival!

title: The Maxed-Out Player
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Nelpi
synopsis:
After 20 grueling years of hellish training, Juhyuk's stats are maxed-out, and he is ready to venture out into Olympus, a virtual reality game. 

His master's last dying wish is for Juhyuk to be the Ultimate Evil, the most powerful in Olympus. But when he steps out of the tutorial area, every player tries to kill him, and the game forces him to start over from Level 1! 

With these setbacks, Juhyuk will need all the help he can get to complete his SSS-rank quest and become the next Ultimate Evil.

title: Chun and Alice
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Cha Zi
synopsis: In order to make a living, the vagrant Eastern girl Bai Chun became the "living mannequin" of queen Alice. Planning to make a quick buck and then escape, Chun inadvertently became embroiled in a conspiracy of those vying for power while trying to leave. Can the temporary union of East and West avert disaster? Find out in Chun and Alice~

title: Fushigi No Kuni No Bird
genre: Historical, Adventure, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Taiga Sassa
synopsis:
Scottish adventuress Isabella Bird journeys to Japan in 1878, becoming the first Westerner traveling to many remote locations 
and heading northward to Hokkaido to study the aboriginal Ainu people.  
  
A true story based on her book "Unbeaten Tracks in Japan".

title: Kanchigai No Atelier Meister: Eiyuu Party No Moto Zatsuyougakari Ga, Jitsu Wa Sentou Igai Ga Sss Rank Datta to Iu Yoku Aru Hanashi
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Naharu Furukawa
synopsis:
Kuruto gets kicked out of the hero's party for being too useless in combat. However unknown to him, he's SSS Rank in skills like cooking, building, magic tool crafting, etc. 
  
WN Raw: <https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/292207951/264201950>

title: Kiichi!!
genre: Psychological, Drama
author: Hideki Arai
synopsis: Left to himself at an early age in the slummiest parts of todays Japan, Kiichi learns how to survive on his own. As a teenager, how can he adapt to a society whose rules he rejects? Unless he creates his own rules Kiichi, a raw icon of strength and integrity, stands alone against the worlds injustice and becomes an unforgettable character.

title: Ao Ashi
genre: Award Winning, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Naohiko Ueno
synopsis:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**

title: Dead Account
genre: Action, Ghosts, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Shizumu Watanabe
synopsis: Souji Enishiro, 15 years old (high school dropout), is a controversial streamer, "Aoringo," who makes a ton of money through his violent and outrageous video content. Although he is seen as a troublemaker, in reality, he is a kind older brother who loves his younger sister and sweets. Even his controversial videos are just a means to cover the huge medical expenses for his sickly younger sister. No matter if everyone in the world hates him, he is happy as long as his sister is doing well. That is until something happens to his beloved sister...

title: Daredemo Dakeru Kimi Ga Suki
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Gyaru
author: Takeda Super
synopsis:
Gotou, a virgin high school boy, has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate, Agawa. But one day after school, he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even?
___
**Note:** After the release of Chapter 35, author Takeda Super decided to take the story in a new, different direction, so Chapters 3135 were retconned and new chapters were drawn. However, for fans that enjoyed the original timeline, the old chapters were later compiled into [their own volume](https://mangadex.org/title/b782186f-60d9-4f6c-b050-7b21013040ff) that even included an additional chapter in that timeline.

**Alternative Official Raws:**
- [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361135826437)
- [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/4856001361243117705)

title: Metaphor: Refantazio
genre: Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Youichi Amano
synopsis:
The United Kingdom of Euchronia is thrown into chaos following the assassination of its king
Our Hero, the Traveler Will, and his Fairy Companion Gallica, race to Grand Trad to undertake a Special Mission.
Discover the bonds that form between eight races across three countries. (MangaPlus)

Based off [the award-winning game!](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2679460/Metaphor_ReFantazio/)

title: My Marriage to Saneka
genre: Romance, Comedy, Supernatural
author: Wataru Momose
synopsis: Tatsuhiko inherits his grandfather's home after his passing. It's been ages, so he heads to the old homestead for a visit. In a storage room there, he encounters a tanuki who claims to be a god. Tatsuhiko and the tanuki god repair the home together while sharing stories about his grandfather. Following this strange turn of events, the two decide to get married?!

title: Sami Plays the Game
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Full Color
author: Ryo Kotohira
synopsis: After her parents died, Sami gave up her life of fortune to live independently, doing odd jobs to make ends meet. When she starts to get involved with two of the most popular boys at her high school, Sami faces twists and turns -- Chan is her neighbor, and Pyojun makes her have conflicted feelings. Things get more complicated when she finds out that Chan has feelings for Pyojun as well! With her moms only keepsake in hand to keep her feet on the ground, Sami navigates obstacles that she wasnt prepared for -- and arent even in her budget!

title: Sparks
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Asumiko Nakamura
synopsis:
High school girl, Tomori, is dating an unstable boy named Inukai who is relentlessly violent toward Misato, a new transfer student. Refusing to listen to his friends or Tomori's pleas to stop, Inukai's obsession steadily escalates. Is this from hatred, or for some other reason?

Meeting, drifting apart, and inevitably drawn to each other again... Sparks fly when they cross.

title: Mitsudomoe
genre: Loli, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Norio Sakurai
synopsis: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

title: Amai Seikatsu
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Hikaru Yuzuki
synopsis:
The complicated story of a young man who goes to work for a lingerie company. 
One of the very first harem manga, done by a former shojo mangaka known for his peculiar tendencies 
(was known to cross dress among other things) and serialized in the now defunct Business Jump.

title: Even a Replica Falls in Love
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Momose Hanada
synopsis:
On days when she is sick, on days when she has a tedious day job, on days when she has regular tests.

On days when she is too lazy to go to school, I am called upon.
I am a convenient substitute for the body of a girl named Sonao Aikawa, and that is me.
I may look exactly the same, but my personality is a little different.
I can't go out freely, I can't even make plans for tomorrow,
I am a replica whose mission is to work for the original.
I was supposed to be a replica, but I fell in love.

A very pure and slightly mysterious "love story" that takes place in a town by the sea.

title: Cool Na Doukyuusei No ?? Nengo
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Kyutai X
synopsis: Not found

title: Drama Queen
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Crime, Aliens
author: Kuraku Ichikawa
synopsis: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable

title: Sono Hada No Atsusa Wo Oboeteru
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Josee
synopsis: What would you do if I told you your partner that day was me? Gen, a hairdresser, has long been in love with his older childhood friend, Koutarou, who likes his older brother, Kanade. One night, Gen spends the night at a hotel with a drunken Koutarou, bolstered by the thought that he might have a chance. However, Koutarou mistakenly thinks it was his older brother, Kanade, that he slept with. Gens used to being mistaken as Kanade, but they felt each others heat to think he was mistaken as him even at night. A devoted, younger, handsome hairdresser x a naturally airheaded, devilish, older, plain-faced boys one-sided, childhood love!

title: Legal Pirate Parfait
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Ppyeowapiwasal
synopsis: The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!

title: Yuuretsu No Ori
genre: Oneshot, Office Workers, Drama
author: Suika Amazaki
synopsis: Not found

title: Gacen Shoujo to Ibunka Kouryuu
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Hirokazu Yasuhara
synopsis: A Japanese arcade worker meets a young girl from England and strikes up a friend(?)ship.

title: Sasha-Chan to Classmate Otaku-Kun
genre: Loli, Romance, School Life, Shota, Slice of Life
author: Haguhagu
synopsis:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me Master!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)

title: Ao No Hana, Utsuwa No Mori
genre: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Yuki Kodama
synopsis:
Aoko is a ceramic painter at Hasami Wares Pottery, when suddenly an unfriendly and unapproachable man named Tatsuki arrives from overseas. Rejecting her way of life by telling her he isn't interested in painted ceramics, Aoko feels dejected, but can't help but be drawn to Tatsuki's ceramics  
  
This is a mature love story of a man and woman, both fascinated by ceramics.

title: What Makes Purple?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: raku
synopsis: A romance about two stubborn people that like each other.

title: Shota Oni
genre: Comedy, Boys' Love, Shota, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Miyuki Nakayama
synopsis: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.

title: Shitsurenshita Node Vtuber Hajimetara Toshiue No Onee-San Ni Motemashita
genre: Romance, Crossdressing, Harem, Shota, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Rie
synopsis:
Shocked after Yuki Himemura found out that the club senpai he was crushing on got a boyfriend, he decided to become a VTubersomething both he and his senpai have always likedand used his savings to assemble his equipment.

He gets his virtual character designed only to discover that its a 3D model of a cute girl and, in the process, unintentionally ends up portraying one!

Not only that but the person who designed and rigged his model and his favorite VTubers are starting to take a liking to him?

(Synopsis via Novel Updates)

title: Tada De Wa Dakaremasen
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Harem, School Life
author: Fuki Hinohara
synopsis: Miyako Kirishima, a university student and aspiring teacher, is a poor girl who enjoys being frugal. One day, she has a meal with Yui Nakano, her friend whom she occasionally tutors. On the way home, Yui invites her to a love hotel. Miyako is reluctant, unwilling to have sex with a friend. However, Yui cuts her off, offering her 30000 yen for sex! Subsequently, Miyako ends up in more "transactions" with her other friends at her women's university!? The curtain rises on a tale of yuri, friendship, money, and sex?.

title: Journey to Seek Past Reincarnations
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Weiwei Zhang
synopsis: The story is about a little Master, Gong Yao Ying, in order to accomplish the assigned tasks, she travels across the different periods. The stories are created after meeting with the famous historical figures.

title: Should I Make You a Nuclear Weapon?
genre: Reincarnation, Military, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Bang-Hun Kim
synopsis:
Director Kim Jun of the Defense Science Research Institute faces a tragic end while protecting the ADD chip, a military secret of South Korea, during a terrorist attack in 2024.

However, he suddenly finds himself with an unexpected opportunity: he is reborn in the body of his friend Jeon Hyun-seung, who died in 1998!

Revived as Kim Jun, he discovers that he can access future technologies using the ADD chip engraved in his body.

"If you give me the chance... Ill show you what I can create within three months."

Create the ultimate weapon to overcome the IMF crisis with future technology! Let me know if you need anything else!

title: Koisuru Kichikujima
genre: Romance, Comedy, Gore, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Ryuu Horie
synopsis: Love is absolutely forbidden! Kaworu, the "public disciplinary commissioner of justice," uses a chainsaw to purge all the men of their sins in order to protect the purity of the girls! Standing in Kaworu's way is the "boy with high femininity," Takahisa, and Kaworu's sister, Mari, the "demon public disciplinary commissioner." In this parallel world of "Freak Island" set in Santa Maria Academy, a storm of blood and love is about to... erupt!!?

title: Eiyuu to Majo No Tensei Lovecome
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: You Samori
synopsis: Choose the world or choose her. Ordinary high school student Shiraishi Godo harbored a "secret"  - he possessed memories of a past life. In a world different from this one, he was a "hero" who saved humanity. However, that was a story of his past life. In this life, he was supposed to lead an ordinary school lifeuntil the arrival of transfer student Mai Shiina turned everything upside down.

title: Tou No Kanri O Shite Miyou
genre: Reincarnation, Loli, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Rune
synopsis: Kosuke is killed by a truck, his soul is lost in a garden with two beautiful girls. The owner of the place will let him choose whether he will be reborn or summoned to another world, and he maintains the summons. In this new world, the main two girls who were created by the owner of the garden to help him find the mystery behind the world - a Dungeon tower. Will he be able to become the owner of this tower and manage it?

title: Twin Moon
genre: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Hun-Yeong Lee
synopsis:
A woman identical to me appears in my dreams, crying.  

"Who are you?"  

For three years, Shunaelle, the Demon King of the North, has been haunted by the same dream, growing curious about the woman and deciding to track her down.  

The truth? Shes a fragment of Shunaelles soul, cast away into the human realm.  

When Shunaelle tries to absorb the fragment back into herself, the woman resists.  

?I dont want to be absorbed!?  

Instead, she makes a plea:  
If you want me back, live my lifea life filled with regretand make it right.

title: Dark and Light Martial Emperor
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Jun Baek
synopsis:
Yeon Hojeong, the first to unite the dark factions as the leader of the Unorthodox Faction, collaborates with the Orthodox Faction to overcome the chaos of the Three Cults. However, he meets an untimely end, entangled in the schemes of the Murim Alliance Leader.

"This really is my home!"

When he opens his eyes, he finds himself in the prestigious and once-destroyed Yeon Clan, a place he never forgot.

"I wont make a mistake this time. Never again."

Determined to prevent the fall of his family and the future upheaval caused by the Three Cults, he embarks on a relentless journey! This is the struggle of Yeon Hojeong, the eldest son, to unite the martial world.

title: A Mother'S Love, a Daughter'S Prison
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Sato-kun
synopsis: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaekos life? This series, based on a true story, will explore Hikari Miyagawas experiences up to her greatest tragedyand what happened to her afterward.

title: Azumi
genre: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Ninja, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
author: Yuu Koyama
synopsis:
Azumi is a manga series that concerns a young woman brought up as part of a team of assassins, charged with killing three warlords that threaten Feudal Japan with an agenda of war and bloodshed.  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Website](http://www.yu-koyama.com)  
- [Live-Action Movie on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6166)  
- [Live-Action Movie (sequel) on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6167)

title: Gilded Seven
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Action, Police, Supernatural
author: Tasuku Karasuma
synopsis: Historical Action about a police officer hunting down the "La Llorona" mexican crime cartel. After catching a bunch of high-ranking members, suddenly a Yellowstone volcano errupts & the cop time-leaps to the 19th wild west a few days after Lincoln got assassinated. He steps into a gruesome scene of native americans getting slaughtered. But suddenly the supposedly dead Abrahalm Lincoln appears and kills the attackers.

title: Kyoukai Meikyuu to Ikai No Majutsushi
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Video Games, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Eiji Onosaki
synopsis: When Theodore was dropped into a waterway by his half-brother, he suddenly recalled the memory of his past life. He had been a Japanese citizen known as Kirishima Kagehisa, placed inside VRMMO character he had made in Break Force Online. "Theodore" is a Combat Mage that Kagehisa played within BFO, and he realized his skills were progressing well even in this other world. Theodore, who had lightly brushed off his half-brother to make his own place in the world, had ventured off to the large labyrinth existing at the Boundary City, Termuilles.

title: Himekishi Ga Classmate!
genre: Loli, Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: NO.Gomesu
synopsis:
After he and his entire class died on a field trip, Odamori accepts a job offer from a mysterious man to be reincarnated. 

However, his new job turns out to be that of a Slavemancer, with the power to dominate the minds of others and turn them into his toys. Soon, however his evil actions lead to a Princess Knight (who turns out to be one of his previous, more popular classmates) being dispatched to apprehend him. 

But Odamori, of course, has something different planned for their reunion...!

title: The New Gate
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Shinogi Kazanami
synopsis:
The New Gate  an online game transformed into a life-and-death struggle for its players.

Thanks to the valiant efforts of Shin, the most powerful of them all, an end to the game and freedom for everyone seemed within reach. But just moments after Shin defeats the games final boss, he finds himself bathed in an unknown light and transported some 500 years into the future of the in-game world!

Thrown from a simple game gone wrong into a strange new land, one young swordsman of unrivalled strength is about to embark on a legendary journey!

title: Koisuru Boukun
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Hinako Takanaga
synopsis: University student Tetsuhiro Morinaga has been in love with his homophobic, violent and tyrannical senpai Souichi Tatsumi for more than four years now. Even though in the previous series, Challengers, he told Souichi how he feels and even managed to get a kiss, he never expected anything more That is until the long-oppressed Morinaga gets his biggest chance ever. Will his unrequited love finally be returned?

title: Rebirth in the End Times: I Reached the Top by Opening Boxes
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Yi Ma
synopsis:
Jiang Xiaoyong was betrayed and killed by a green tea girl in the apocalypse, but was accidentally resurrected a year ago and obtained the blind box system. 

He was always one step ahead of others, collecting supplies and spending a fortune to build a safe house before the apocalypse. He became stronger through the system and avenged his enemies in his previous life. 

From then on, he embarked on the road to the king's counterattack.

title: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Sun-Gyu Gwon
synopsis:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his guide line, the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---

title: A Blank Slate Regression for the Idol That Lost His Original Mindset
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Yu Deul
synopsis:
I want to do real music now instead of these fxxking idol songs.

Yoon Eden, an idol in his 8th year, was tired of working with his shitty agency so he worked on the side as a composer.
He succeeded in music composition and bought a house in Cheongdam-dong, but has become an arrogant celebrity.

[Your 30,000th fan is disappointed in you.]
[Starting a project to help idols regain their lost, original intentions!]

But what the hell? He was sent to his debut days when his group was at its lowest to find his original intentions-

[The conditions have been met.]
[You have disappointed 30 thousand fans, now make 30 million fans happy!]

Theres even a mission that's only possible to complete for 1st tier idols?!

Fuck, my Cheongdam-dong house! My billion-dollar royalties! My Ferrari!

[Profanity detected.] [Original Intent -2]

[When Original Intent falls to 0, you start over again!]

Even in these harsh conditions that threaten infinite regression, will the project help this idol find his lost, original intentions?

title: Solo Leveling: Ragnarok
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Do Dang
synopsis:
The Earth's existence is under threat once more as Itarim, the gods of other universes, seek to fill the void left by the Absolute Being. 

Sung Jinwoo has no choice but to send Beru, the shadow ant king, to awaken his son's powers and start him on the journey he once took. 

Suho must conquer the shadow dungeon and earn his place in the world of hunters as he navigates through a new world against a new evil looking to swallow the world whole.

title: Fantasista
genre: Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Michiteru Kusaba
synopsis: Teppei Sakamoto is a boy living in the countryside. He loves soccer, and all his soccer skills were taught to him by his sister. Finally, his sister wants him to join the Mizumoto High School soccer team. Teppei's turn in life has come!! How will this soccer newbie fare in his new environment?

title: An Introvert'S Hookup Hiccups: This Gyaru Is Head Over Heels for Me!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru
author: Yuishi
synopsis:
When the gorgeous Nanami Barato confesses to Yoshin Misumai, it seems too good to be true! Only, it isand Yoshin knows it. Hows an introverted guy like him supposed to keep his cool when he knows this is all just a dare? Even more puzzling, despite her gaudy appearance, this supposed gyaru isnt actually all that good with guys! Perhaps this is the perfect chance for this shy guy to pluck up his own courage and say yes to the guy-shy girl. So begins their new cushy life of morning meet-ups and handmade lunches. The thing is, judging by the way shes acting, Nanami has fallen head over heels for him! From dares and dating to downright disasters, can these two first-timers figure out their feelings and maybe even fall in lovefor real, this time?!

---
