title: Erio and the Electric Doll
genre: Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Girls' Love, Fantasy
author: Mujirushi Shimazaki
synopsis: The story centers around Ange, an electric doll, and Erio, a human raised by her. In order for Erio to experience the outside world, the two set out on a journey.

title: Journey to the West
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Wuxia, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Weidong Chen
synopsis: The original journey to the west to retrieve the Sutra was a conspiracy plotted by the Heavens! Just after a few decades, the Sutra has vanished. The Heavens search for the Sutra with plans to use it with corrupted intentions. In order for the Sutra to not fall into the hands of Heaven, the journey to the west will begin once again.

title: Things I Learned After Death
genre: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess
author: Pepu
synopsis:
My mothers killer, the one who scarred my face forever, and even stole my fiancéKanna.  

This time, Ill take everything back.  

But the idea of rewriting the past was nothing more than my arrogance.  

No matter how hard you struggle, youll never beat me, Linette.  

A relentless battle begins between two sistersone who lost everything and another who took it all.

title: Number One Beast Master
genre: Long Strip, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hulianwang Xiaohuangdi
synopsis: A global anomaly has occurred, and monsters have invaded. Monster trainers now bear the burden of saving human civilization. After Xiao Xingyu crosses over, he awakens the God-tier Monster Training System. By opening the Eye of the Demonic God, he can see through all hidden evolution paths of monsters, activate their hidden bloodlines, and unlock infinite evolution A husky can evolve into the Hellhound! A fairy can mutate into the Twelve-Winged Blazing Angel! Hatching a dragon egg can summon the Nine-Spirited Candle Dragon!

title: Holiday Yasumi'S Twitter Shorts
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Genderswap, Loli, Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Ninja, Comedy, Mecha, Boys' Love, Incest, Zombies, Martial Arts, Magical Girls, Post-Apocalyptic, Crossdressing, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Shota, Web Comic, Aliens, Supernatural, Tragedy, Gyaru
author: santa
synopsis:
Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

title: Leveling up Fast with Divine Measurement Skills
genre: Official Colored, Action, Long Strip, Fantasy
author: TOON CRACKER
synopsis: In Japan, where explorers excel at dungeon conquering, Namiki Haruka, who remains weak even at level 100, is ridiculed by society as a premature weakling. However, after his own death triggers a transformation, he acquires the unique skill 'Divine Measurement' and begins to awaken.

title: Dungeon Kurashi No Moto Yuusha
genre: Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Ryuunosuke Minesaki
synopsis:
After killing the Demon Lord, Blum Dilmond was pursued by the kingdom and forced to leave the country. While spending days trying to avoid the assassins aiming at his neck, he suddenly came up with an idea. He could hide inside the dungeon that was once the Demon Lords hideout. If its there, then he could be safe.   
  
Without hesitating Blum went into the dungeon, but then he met someone unexpected in the lower levels, one of his former companions with whom he fought side by side against the Demon Lord. Moreover, a maid, called Irene, who once served the Demon Lord is also there. And so since their interests happened to match, the three of them decided to cooperate together to rebuild the worn-out dungeon, working earnestly in order to turn it into their own safe paradise.

title: Jintian Ni Louxianle Ma?!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Full Color
author: Beiyong Mao
synopsis: Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

title: Onii-Chan Is Done For!
genre: Genderswap, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Nekotofu
synopsis:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)

title: Futoku No Guild
genre: Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Taichi Kawazoe
synopsis:
Kikuru Madan, a monster hunter with excellent performance because of his particular job in the forest, decides to quit his job because he doesn't want to waste his youth. The reason he wants to quit was that one of his friends got married. One day there is a new recruit. Enome the Guild Receptionist asks him to accompany Hitamuki Kyan the Lolipai Martial Artist to watch her back and teach her how to work. He accepts the request, half because he was worried about her and half because he wanted her to become his successor before he retires completely. Sadly, his plan to retire is derailed by Hitamuki being useless and always attracting some monster. Can Kikuru Madan retire peacefully, despite being saddled with a useless newbie?  
  
Hunting erotic commentary enthusiastically!

title: Progolfer No Ore Ga Imouto No Putter Ni Tensei Shiteshimatta Ken
genre: Comedy, Sports
author: Daisuke Yui
synopsis:
On the green of the All Japan Open final, professional golfer Kazuma Yagami is killed by a lightning strike just before he is about to win! His soul, unable to leave his sister behind, resides in the putter he was carrying at the time, and his younger sister, Ryoko, who inherited the putter, decides to win the tour championship using only her brother's putter!


In order to become a professional golfer, Ryoko enrolls in the prestigious Seven Two Academy, where the elite golfers gather. The challenge of the two of them together is about to begin. ----!

title: Hajimete No Ojou-Sama
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Riri Touka
synopsis: Ojou Kotone is a first-year high school girl who was having trouble using the ticket machine at the station, Suguru Sewa, a first-year high school boy passing by helped her out, and he surprised as she transferred to Sewa's high school. It's her first time to taking the train, her first trying curry udon, Sewa being her first friend. This is a love comedy of firsts between a young lady and a caring high school boy!

title: There'S a Rat in Our House
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Full Color
author: @Karikari Ume
synopsis: Amidst the freezing winter, a solitary being huddled on the snow-covered pavement, bearing the burden of deep loneliness and faded scars. It had forsaken itself, fragile and vulnerable. The reason for welcoming this nameless creature into the home was straightforward. "What... does this mean?" "You helped me, and I wish to return the favor." In the complete darkness where no trace of light could penetrate, only two warm bodies occupied the space

title: Maou No Ore Ga Dorei Elf Wo Yome Ni Shitanda Ga, Dou Medereba Ii?
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Hako Itagaki
synopsis: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesnt understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that cant convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesnt understand how to bring it up, begins.

title: S Watari-San to M Mura-Kun
genre: Romance, School Life
author: Hideki
synopsis: Intelligent and beautiful female high schooler Reika Sawatari and handsome and astute male high schooler Subaru Emura, both of whom with a certain fetish that nobody knows, have started their relationship after a certain event.

title: Saint Seiya: Episode G Requiem
genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Megumu Okada
synopsis: The world is wrapped in flames and about to be destroyed by the actions of primordial gods intending to cleanse the planet. While the goddess Athena stands alone in a desperate attempt to contain the worst of the attack, it is up to Seiya, the last Saint standing, to battle the gods and join her to save the earth. The final battle of the Gold Saints is about to begin.

title: Ataerareta Skill Wo Tsukatte Kasei De Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha Shitai
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Rikako Inomoto
synopsis: That day, Ishida Yamada was working his part-time job as usual. After finishing his shift, he opened the back door and stepped into a vast, empty space, where he encountered a mysterious figure claiming to be God. By sheer chance, Ishida was chosen by this God to be transported to another world. Although confused and uncertain, he resolved to adapt and make a life for himself in this strange new place. Using the skills granted by God, he focused on surviving and thriving. As he explored different lands and encountered various races, he made it his mission to form close relationships with many beautiful women along the way.

title: Nue No Onmyouji
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, Harem, Supernatural
author: Kouta Kawae
synopsis: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.

title: Chiruran: Shinsengumi Requiem
genre: Thriller, Historical, Action, Survival, Samurai
author: Shinya Umemura
synopsis: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.

title: Mirai Nikki Redial
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Drama, Horror, Supernatural
author: Sakae Esuno
synopsis: A story that picks up after the first story ends. It tells the tale of the 3rd Universe's Gasai Yuno after her encounter with the Yukiteru and Yuno of the other universes. Her life seems normal, but something feels like it is missing. She can't help being fascinated with the boy in her grade, Amano Yukiteru, because he keeps appearing in her dreams

title: It'S Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Jiguang Dongman
synopsis: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! ?You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! ??This system can only be your slave! ??Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! ?

title: Tenkaichi - Nihon Saikyou Bugeisha Ketteisen
genre: Historical, Action, Ninja, Martial Arts, Samurai, Gore
author: Yousuke Nakamaru
synopsis:
Battle tournament manga set in the Sengoku Era. The year is 1600. Ten years have passed since Oda Nobunaga unified Japan. When Nobunaga realized that he was dying, he announced that he would hand over the country to the one who produced the strongest warriors. The warlords, whose dreams of unifying the country had been dashed, set up their own strongest warriors and set their sights on becoming the ruler of Japan.
___
**Alt Official Raws:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/3269754496359886083), [YanMaga Web](https://yanmaga.jp/comics/%E3%83%86%E3%83%B3%E3%82%AB%E3%82%A4%E3%83%81_%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E6%9C%80%E5%BC%B7%E6%AD%A6%E8%8A%B8%E8%80%85%E6%B1%BA%E5%AE%9A%E6%88%A6)
**Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10585/episode/356567) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, & Singapore only.

title: Renai No Jugyou
genre: Romance, Comedy, Philosophical, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Tsubasa Takahashi
synopsis: In 20XX, the Love Education Law was enacted. "Love" has become a mandatory subject in a response to the declining birthrate. Michitaka Sato, a high school student who has given up on romance and works hard on his studies, is on the verge of failing school. When he attends a supplementary class to avoid repeating a grade, Mai Aihara, a beautiful girl who is a problem child, appears as his partner...? Suddenly, he begins to study love alone with the beautiful girl in the three C's. Close contact, close quarters, and behind closed doors! Does Aihara-san have a secret...?

title: Osananajimi No Yuri
genre: Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: garun
synopsis: Not found

title: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka Wa Oekaki Skill De Isekai Musou Suru!
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Dal-Young Im
synopsis:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didnt care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?

title: The Devil Never Cries
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: MOKF
synopsis: Aang, the strongest human warrior on the verge of death, has inexplicably travelled 60 years into the past, with the double-edged sword of the strongest demon power hidden inside him. The only way to escape the fate of the pastis to evolve. Aang: Dont let yourself be a slave to your limits, break free and become a demon that reigns!

title: I Don'T Feel Like Doing Anything
genre: Long Strip, Philosophical, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jeong-Hyeon Ju
synopsis:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4998319)

title: Lock on
genre: Romance, Comedy, Police, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Cuvie
synopsis: Not found

title: Sekai Wo Teki Ni Mawashitemo Neko Wo Aishiteru
genre: Animals, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
author: Hiroaki Hori
synopsis: A comic essay about the author's love for cats and her daily life with her 3 cats.

title: Holy Knight
genre: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Maya Miyazaki
synopsis: Mizumura Shinta didnt know what to make of the situation when the sexiest girl in school, Kishimoto Ririsu, starts seducing him and things get extremely physical. Shinta isnt rich or the popular guy in school so it doesnt make sense that Ririsu would be so interested in him. But Ririsu is in fact a vampire, a secret that she will kill to keep hidden. As the relationship between Shinta and Ririsu grows, it gets harder for her to keep the secret hidden. And when those close to him, like his semi-romantic childhood friend Makimura Chizuru, are involuntarily thrown into the chaos, deep dark secrets get revealed.

title: My Gemini
genre: Historical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Yuu Morikawa
synopsis:
Who died at that time... Which one?

John is red-haired and freckled. His only pride is that he is a close friend of the school's popular twins, Jekyll and Hyde. The twins always pretended to be each other, but suddenly one of the twins died. Who was left... Which one!?

title: Noah'S Contract: I'M an Npc in Another World
genre: Action, Demons, Fantasy
author: Zhuan Yu
synopsis: Players, this is a continent overrun by monsters. Danger lurks everywhere, so please make full use of your talents and help us eliminate the monster army. What? You ask who I am? Im just an NPC.

title: I Have Revived the Chinese Gods!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy
author: Jing Shi
synopsis: Glaciers are melting, and the sea clans are invading. The Western gods rule over humanity, while the Huaxia people, without gods, become the target of everyone. Until a giant stone statue crosses the starry sky and crashes into the land of Jiuzhou, Zhao Feiyu comes through the void...

title: Seichou Cheat De Nandemo Dekiru You Ni Natta Ga, Mushoku Dake Wa Yamerarenai You Desu
genre: Loli, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Yousuke Tokino
synopsis:
I, Ichinosuke, failed to get a job 100 times in a row. In fact, my lifelong unemployment streak remains unbroken. On my way to yet another job interview, I was involved in an accident with a truck and tragically passed away. Suddenly, a goddess bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal... and another goddess, making a mistake, bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal, before sending me to a game-like other world.

Wait, 20 times 20... 400 times faster than normal?!

However, knowing that I would not become stronger even if I continued growing while being jobless, I aimed to get a job... but I discovered that remaining Jobless was a cheat in and of itself, provided you can stomach the slow leveling process... Which I do at 400 times faster than normal. As my Growth Cheat and Jobless Cheat existed side-by-side in this other world, the story of my adventure, no doubt certified by the job-placement agency as harmful material, begins here.

title: Bocchi the Rock!
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Music
author: Aki Hamaji
synopsis: Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.

title: A Hero Who Does Everything Perfectly
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hayandogsuli
synopsis:
In 2024, Na Gang-in wakes up in the heart of South Korea. He can't remember who he is or where he is, but through a combat support AI named Jeon Ji-in embedded in his body, he discovers he's affiliated with the Earth Alliance from 2082. 

To regain his memories and figure out why he ended up here, he needs to gather information. With nothing to his name but plenty of skills, this is Na Gang-in's clumsy journey of adapting to Earth!

title: Wicked Spot
genre: Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Sal Jiang
synopsis:
Sada is a modern-day witch who is tired of living quietly deep in the mountains. In fact, she wants more attention! Why can't witches be known by humans?!?

This is a story of modern witches who break the curse and live freely and uninhibitedly!

title: Marika-Chan No Koukando Wa Bukkowarete Iru
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Rin Komugi
synopsis:
Ive gained the ability to see the affection levels of the girl I like.??I dont have the courage to confess my feelings to my childhood friend, Marika-chan. One day, I made a strong wish upon a shooting star: "I wish I could understand the feelings of others, like in a dating game." Then, that wish came true...!?

Floating above the girls in my class are affection meters. While confused by this surreal sight, I decide to check Marika-chans meter, only to find it has broken past its limits, turning into a hellish meter...!?

Marika-chan, you dont like me, so why are you so kind to me...?
??What is Marika-chans hidden truth behind her cute façade? Does she really hate me!? Or is it something else...!?

title: The Gods World
genre: Genderswap, Official Colored, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Self-Published, Isekai
author: Aoi Akashiro
synopsis: My first ever manga and is a joke manga will not be taken seriously and will get updated at random

title: I Was Reincarnated as the Heroine on the Verge of a Bad Ending, and I'M Determined to Fall in Love!
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ikuto Nanase
synopsis: One day, office worker Suzune (Reine) is reborn as Raine, the heroine of a "work-based otome game" that is too far away from romance. She wants to fall in love with a handsome man in this life! However, she finds herself in a world where there is a magical caste system, and to her surprise, she is the lowest rank! Her family treats her coldly and she is on the verge of being expelled from school. ...... Even so, she is undeterred by the "strong mentality" she has developed in her previous life. Practising magic, studying, and increasing the likability of her targets, she runs hard to avoid a bad end and get a sparkling school life! As Rene pushes forward with such a bright and positive attitude, her high-spec brother Julius, with whom she was supposed to be on bad terms, somehow begins to dote on her - or does he? A school fantasy about a strong mental heroine who is loved by everyone!

title: Hajimete No Gal
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Meguru Ueno
synopsis: Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo, Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru, Yame Yukana. However, things do not go quite as he expected.

title: Ichi the Witch
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy
author: Osamu Nishi
synopsis: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!

title: Fujii on the Roadside
genre: Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Kurao Nabe
synopsis:
Is he an eccentric or a hermit? Does the seemingly unremarkable company employee, Fujii, redefine the definition of "happiness"?

In the workplace, he's a plain middle-aged man who doesn't stand out. While he does his job properly, he's not one to waste words. Come quitting time, he disappears like a ghost. He's not the type to be invited to after-work drinks in the first place. More like, he's the guy who's thought of as "I wouldn't want to end up like that..." by his juniors.

Yet, he piques the curiosity of others... "I wonder how he was raised?", "Does he have friends or a girlfriend?", "What does he do on weekends?". Suddenly, you realize you've become captivated by Fujii... 

This elusive emotion that's hard to put into words is vividly captured by the author of "Reborn no Kishi" in this bewitching life drama!

title: Kotonoba Drive
genre: Psychological, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Hitoshi Ashinano
synopsis:
The story centres on Suu-chan, a girl who works part-time at a pasta restaurant named "Lamp." She witnesses mysterious events while riding her moped in the night, such as the past of a person or place.   
She can only experience these visions five minutes at a time.   
  
A loose sequel to a PositioN chapter

title: Yorozuyama Juban Shobu
genre: Sports, Martial Arts
author: Kenji Okamura
synopsis:
Yorozuyama Goro, a hero known as the monster of the Heisei era, has appeared after winning five consecutive tournaments from the makushita stage!! A man with extraordinary strength who will never become a yokozuna or an ozeki...
What is his true intention?!?

title: Shy
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Ninja, Comedy, Superhero, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Bukimi Miki
synopsis: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"

title: Iken Senki Völundio
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy
author: Nanaki Nanao
synopsis:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!

title: Zannen Jokanbu Black General-San
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Martial Arts, Military, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Jin Mugenjin
synopsis: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.

title: Gundam Exa
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Romance, Mecha, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Military, Drama
author: Tomohiro Chiba
synopsis:
Gundam EXA (???? EXA) is a manga written by Tomohiro Chiba and illustrated by K?ichi Tokita, published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized in Gundam Ace magazine in 2011. Being Gundam Ace's 10th Anniversary Project, it is tied in with the arcade and PS3 Game Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme Vs. Full Boost.  
  
The story takes place in unnamed timeline, where humanity has highly advanced technology. However, the human population is decreasing and it seems that they're on their way to extinction.  
  
The protagonists are Leos Alloy, Sthesia Awar and their Haro. They work on a Jupiter base called "Jupiter X", using "General Answer" (or "GA") which contains a massive repository of data about the previous eras of humanity, Leos travels to the Earths' of the previous eras in an effort to collect data that might give them a hint for the evolution of mankind.

title: Gal Can'T Be Kind to Otaku!?
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Norishiro-chan
synopsis: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he hooks up with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...

title: Dungeon Porter
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Jin-Su Na
synopsis:
A world where only those with innate talent can become adventurers who conquer dungeons.
The world defined "Nagi" as a porter who cannot become an adventurer.

But if you clear a dungeon, doesn't that make you an adventurer?

Combat skills: 0! Survival abilities: Max level!
The dungeon conquest story of the all-purpose porter, Nagi, defying fate!

title: Kawaii No Wa Ore De Aru
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Yasuko
synopsis:
Yuki, the visual representative of a famous dance influencer group with one million subscribers, had a problem. He could never maintain a relationship for long! He was immediately labeled as frivolous, suspected of cheating (even though he wasnt), and dumpedover and over again. Even though he was dating them because he truly liked them!

One day, at a drinking party, Yuki became intrigued by a reserved and elegant girl, Yurino, who was trying to leave early. Curious, he followed her out of the venue. Little did he know, this was the beginning of a never-ending spiral of romantic misfortunes.

title: Galaxias
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Ao Hatezaka
synopsis:
It's been ten years since the assassination of the Dragon King, the land's most powerful ruler. Off in the corner of the kingdom where tailed dragonfolk dwell, Jio, a human girl, yearns for adventure and an escape from rural life. However, when she meets the mysterious, amnesiac young man Neraid, Jio's life turns upside-down! With courage and curiosity knocking on the door, the two of them find the ultimate adventure waiting for them!! A traditional battle fantasy from a rookie artist begins!! (K MANGA)
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/GALAXIAS_manga)
**Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10608/episode/352898) - United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, & Singapore only.

title: Tokiwa Kitareri!!
genre: Action, Comedy, Mecha, Martial Arts, Magic, School Life, Supernatural
author: Shun Matsuena
synopsis: Tokiwa Yasaka lives in an unusual time, and according to his dreams, it's about to become even stranger. He's been having a dream of a woman called Rein ever since the robot Deus Ex Machina III came to his home. He and Machina attend the same school, where their other classmates include a secret ninja (Kanata Kusanagi) and a sorcerer (Haruka Yata). When Tokiwa, the robot, the ninja, and the sorcerer rush to rescue the student council president from a demon, the boys find that they've all been having the same dream! What is going to happen to their world?

title: AsuraS Verdict
genre: Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Utsugi Unohana
synopsis: "Only do good deeds."Asura follows his late mother's teachings and always strives to do good in life. No matter how much he is bullied, he goes on with a smile, firmly believing that evildoers will receive divine punishment. Until one day, an ominous old man offers him a key that can open the doors to hell...

title: Reborn as a Demonic Cultivator: Starting with a Zombie Planet
genre: Thriller, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Hua Lao Mo
synopsis: Chu Xuan traveled through the Cangxuan world and became a demon cultivator of Wuji Sect. The so-called demon cultivation is to plunder the essence of heaven and earth and seize the essence of all things. After slaughtering thousands of people, he became the Great Demon Lord. However, killing is not tolerated by the heavenly way of the human race. Wuji Sect was also destroyed by the righteous sect. When he was helpless, Chu Xuan accidentally got the blood mirror, which could take him to a doomsday planet full of zombies! He suddenly discovered that this place is simply a paradise for demon cultivators!

title: Haike, Arashi Hini Saku Hana Tachie
genre: Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic
author: Kenshirou Sakamoto
synopsis: Not found

title: The Daily Life of a Middle-Aged Online Shopper in Another World
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Umiharu
synopsis:
Kenichi, a single man in his 40s, is transported into another world for no apparent reason. As he tries to escape a dangerous forest teaming with monsters, he realizes he has the power to access to a huge online store. By using this power to exchange goods he found in this new world for cash, and then buying modern ones off the internet, he was able to quickly create a very popular business. However, his goal is to have a slow and leisurely life. Instead of growing his business even more, he decides to settle down and live off of the power of Jeff Bezos.
___
[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2945eg/) (jp)

title: Ame to Kimi to
genre: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kou Nikaidou
synopsis: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.

title: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Gore, Drama, Supernatural
author: Aruma Arima
synopsis: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.

title: Shuumatsu Train Doko E Iku?
genre: Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Adaptation
author: Torimura
synopsis: Not found

title: Youkai Gakkou No Sensei Hajimemashita!
genre: Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural
author: Mai Tanaka
synopsis: Haruaki is a scaredy-cat with a fetish for girls' school uniforms, but he also wants to be a good teacher. However, his new school isnt exactly what he thought it would be: it's an academy for monsters, demons, ghosts and all sorts of supernatural creatures!

title: Zekkyou Daiyogen
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Comedy, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Yumeji Tanima
synopsis:
?'Lalala, the cute puppy will die in a while.'?  
  
?'And I feel that fella near waterfall will fall and drown, oh yes, he will.'?  
  
A karaoke prophet wanders around the town singing weird prophecies into his trusty handy karaoke. No matter how you look at it he's a risky guy, but his sinister prophecies are always right. A puppy that high schooler Yori got from her boyfriend dies. Later, a middle-aged man drowns after falling into a waterfall, a giant fire occurs in the city, and even more?! The scary, the grotesque, even the ridiculous: a collection of bizarre horror stories!

title: Domestic Na Kanojo
genre: Romance, Incest, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kei Sasuga
synopsis: Natsuo Fujii is in love with his teacher, Hina. Attempting to forget his feelings towards her, Natsuo goes to a mixer with his classmates where he meets an odd girl named Rui Tachibana. In a strange turn of events, Rui asks Natsuo to sneak out with her and do her a favor. To his surprise, their destination is Rui's houseand her request is for him to have sex with her. There's no love behind the act; she just wants to learn from the experience. Thinking that it might help him forget about Hina, Natsuo hesitantly agrees. After this unusual encounter Natsuo now faces a new problem. With his father remarrying, he ends up with a new pair of stepsisters; unfortunately, he knows these two girls all too well. He soon finds out his new siblings are none other than Hina and Rui! Now living with both the teacher he loves and the girl with whom he had his "first time," Natsuo finds himself in an unexpected love triangle as he climbs ever closer towards adulthood.

title: Makigama No Pandora
genre: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Kuzumochi Matsuri
synopsis: Eri Hourai, a second-year high school girl, takes over "Pandora" - a bakery specialising in wood fire cooked goods.

title: Lalalab? ~Gal to Kagaku to Seishun To!~
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Pipi Komagome
synopsis: Lala Mizusawa might look like a flashy gyaru and act high-energy, but dont be fooledshes a hardcore science geek and a third-year biology major with dreams of becoming a great scientist! While her lofty goal sometimes shakes her confidence, shes got her quirky labmates to keep her going: the refined and otaku-spirited Hanako Naito, and the lazy pajama-wearing Toki Busujima. Together, they celebrate the thrill of growing microbes, steam sweet potatoes in the autoclave, and dive headfirst into their delightfully chaotic campus life (if you can call it that)! ?

title: Smoke Blue No Ame Nochi Hare
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Kamome Hamada
synopsis: Sakutaro's former colleague and No. 1 sales rival, Shizuka Kuji, saved him from danger when he was out having a good time one night.When Kuji left the company a step earlier than Sakutaro, he looked at him with envy, thinking that he must have a brilliant second career now.But when Kuji reunites with Sakutaro for the first time in eight years, his sarcastic personality is still the same, but for some reason, he is now working as a translator, looking languid and with long hair...

title: Stigmata
genre: Action, Psychological, Boys' Love, Gore, Drama, Police, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Jong-Pil Gwak
synopsis: Asako Minami has a "unique constitution." He senses the lingering thoughts of murder victims, and experiences the circumstances under which they died with his own body in a reaction similar to stigmata. This proves useful in solving difficult cases with the Metropolitan Police Department's Special Investigations Unit Six. Asako's partner is the reserved Superintendent Kuroiwa Hiroto, rising through the MPD ranks despite doubting his own abilities.

title: Love Live! Sunshine!! Azalea Comic Anthology
genre: Comedy, Anthology, School Life, Music
author: Shinji Tanaka
synopsis:
Love Live! Sunshine!!: AZALEA Comic Anthology
Cover Illustration: Mezashi

1. Otome Chick ka nan ? (?????????) by Kou Kuzu
2. Onayami?! AZALEA (????! AZALEA) by Mezashi

title: Hanamaru Kindergarten
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yuuto
synopsis: Anzu goes to a preschool with her friends, the shy Koume and the eccentric Hiiragi. Together, they try to gain Anzu attention from their male caretaker Tsuchida, though he is clearly more interested in the pretty Yamamoto who supervises the class next door.

title: Shouwaru Tensai Osananajimi to No Shoubu Ni Makete Hatsutaiken O Zenbu Ubawareru Hanashi
genre: Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Adaptation
author: Anzu Inukai
synopsis:
A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.

Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.

This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed.

(Source: Young Ace Up)

title: Animal Maimai
genre: Animals, Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
author: Juugorou Isaka
synopsis: Not found

title: Isekai Shachuuhaku Monogatari - Outrunner Phev
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Guym Hama
synopsis:
One young salaryman, who adores his plug-in, hybrid car that uses both electricity and gasoline, had been using camping in it as an escape plan from everyday life. Suddenly, he finds himself transported to another world with his car!

He'll start his life anew in this different world!

title: Ningyou Pass
genre: Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Yutori Houjou
synopsis: A group of high school students visit the inside of a mountain on an agricultural trip. While staying at a farmer's home, they learn the rural life. However, the village doesn't exist? A shudder runs down everyone's spine as a lot of inexplicable events happen in the village, that now restricts entry. What are the high schoolers' fate?

title: Your Ultimate Love Rival
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Sajeok
synopsis: Naturally charming, Irene attracts women like a magnet, even when she doesn't mean to. Enter her best friend, Claudia, who refuses to marry any of her three suitors because of her affection for Irene. As a result, these powerful and mentally unstable men declare Irene as their rival in love and threaten her life. She knows none of them deserves to be with Claudia, but she doesn't want to die! To save both her friend and herself, Irene must prove she's their ultimate rival, but will she succeed?

title: Youkai Gakkou No Seito Hajimemashita!
genre: Comedy, School Life, Supernatural
author: Mai Tanaka
synopsis:
As the cherry blossoms fall, a new school year kicks off at Hyakki Academya school attracting youkai from all over Japan! Unfortunately, the first years are far from model students, especially the troublemaking idiot duo, Mamekichi Maizuka (a mame-danuki) and Tamao Akisame (a nekomata). Its time for the lovable but rambunctious animal youkai to steal the spotlight in this spinoff comedy, set a year before the events of "A Terrified Teacher at Ghoul School!"

(Source: Manga UP! Global)

Serialized on Pixiv Comic.

title: Beastmaster: I Can See the Complete Encyclopedia of Evolution
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Youdian Bi Ge Gongzuoshi
synopsis: An awakening in a desperate situation, Li Wenxuan, an ordinary college student, was pushed into the era of fantasy beast masters by fate. Starting from the lowest level fantasy beast, he groped forward in revenge and protection, pursuing his own power and beliefs. This is a golden age where fantasy beasts and humans coexist, and Li Wenxuan is destined to embark on a unique path of rise.

title: The Blood Princess and the Knight
genre: Genderswap, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: SF Qing Xiaoshuo
synopsis:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck

title: The End of the World: the Emperor Banner Invites All Female Disciples to Take Their Seats
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Survival, Horror, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Ye Kong
synopsis: Su Bai was about to ascend to heaven but was framed by his female apprentice. When he woke up again, he had traveled to a modern society where zombies were rampant and he had become an ordinary person. The only thing he could use was a low-level magic weapon, the Ten Thousand Souls Banner. With the awakening of the Ten Thousand Souls Banner system, Su Bai had hope of returning to the top. What made Su Bai even more excited was that the female apprentices who framed him also traveled to this world with the turbulence of time and space.

title: Yè De Mìng Míng Shù
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Zhihua Wenhua
synopsis: In the blue and purple neon, under the dense steel sky, the front end of the data torrent is the world after the technological revolution, and it is also the boundary between reality and illusion. Steel and body, past and future. Here, the outer world and the inner world coexist, and everything in front of you is like a wall of time. Darkness gradually shrouded. But you have to understand, my friend, that we cannot deal with darkness with tenderness, but with fire.

title: Dokyuu Hentai Hxeros
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Ryouma Kitada
synopsis:
In a world on the verge of a great disaster, heroes who, with the help of a device called HxEros, use the power of Ecchi (H) and erotic power (Ero) to save the planet from libido-devouring monsters!  
  
Five years ago, an unknown type of alien called "Censor Bugs" invaded the Earth. They plunder "H energy" in an attempt to evolve their own race and make mankind extinct. To save the Earth from this alien threat, high school boy Retto Enjo joins the "HxEros" team, partnering with four gorgeous high school girls; one of whom is his childhood friend Kirara Hoshino. However, it turns out that Kirara has changed her personality a lot which leads to an estrangement between the two childhood friends.

title: Kagurabachi
genre: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Crime, Samurai, Mafia, Magic, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Takeru Hokazono
synopsis: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge.

title: Imasara Desu Ga, Osananajimi Wo Suki Ni Natte Shimaimashita
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Fumiaki Maruto
synopsis:
A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

title: Noyu Girl
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Haro Aso
synopsis:
Hibari Otaka, whose hobby is to have a bath in such wild hot springs, travels alone around the country to visit them! You'll be fascinated by the unknown world of wild hot springs!

 (Source: Shogakukan, translated)

title: Unaware His Majesty Is a Girl
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Huan Le Ge Xi
synopsis:
The new emperor, Qi Nian, acceded to the throne many years ago. He kept refusing the requests by his officials to choose a consort, brushing them off by saying "the affairs of state are important, and I am busy with my work". But Qi Nian finally relented as rumors that "the emperor is impotent" spread ever more widely.

Yu Dingdang was a particularly dim-witted girl, but born to a prestigious family. This led many to say: "Madame Yu exchanged her brain for her looks". Who could have expected that Yu would be selected by the emperor to be his empress consort?

A happy and dramatic girl-girl romantic comedy set in the imperial palace. Yu couldn't have expected that this lofty emperor up on high was actually a girl?!

title: Yeonwoo'S Innocence
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Esol
synopsis:
Yeon Woo possesses such a delicate appearance that he could be mistaken as a female student. However, he has a secret crush on the school idol, Kang Haesol. But the shy and timid Yeon Woo has never said a word to her

---

title: Kimi to Nara Koi Wo Shite Mite Mo
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Maru Kubota
synopsis:
Thanks to a past trauma, Amane, a high school student, has given up on the idea of seriously loving anyone.

On the first day of his new life in Enoshima, he met Ryuuji, a boy his age. Ryuuji happened to be Amane's type and he'd also like to hang out with him more. But what started out with light feelings is now beginning to change into something unexpected...

title: Gakuen Idolm@Ster - Comic Anthology
genre: Comedy, Anthology, School Life, Adaptation
author: Homare
synopsis:
A comic anthology of the popular game "Gakuen iDOLM@STER Comic Anthology"! ! Contains 14 original manga overflowing with love for "Gakuen iDOLM@STER"!

Cover Illustration: Mana

title: Super No Ura De Yani Suu Futari
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Jinushi
synopsis:
Sasaki, an overworked salaryman, goes through an average stressful day just for a single light at the end of the tunnel: Yamada, the always-cheerful clerk at his favorite convenience store. 

One day, Sasaki takes an extra amount of time at a company meeting, and by the time he gets to the convenience store Yamada has already clocked out. However, as he leaves, he notices a young woman with piercings smoking behind the store?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/261)

title: Souei Sousho
genre: Historical, Comedy, Drama
author: Erika Funamoto
synopsis: Shou, a young boy living in the red light district is suddenly taken to live in the imperial palace. He was selected to become the prince's shadow and act as his shield. In the palace where conspiracies swirl will Shou be able to protect himself and the prince?

title: Isekai Yakkyoku
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Liz Takayama
synopsis:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.

title: Shinyuu No Musume Ni Semarare Komatteimasu
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Koyori Mimito
synopsis: Kiyoharu's predictable everyday life comes to an abrupt end when his best friend's daughter suddenly shows up, declares that she'll be living with him, and demands he make her his wife.

title: I Just Want to Mooch Off Your Luck
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Er Bao
synopsis: After being reborn, Zhao Mingxi had no choice but to mooch off of Fu group's young master's luck to avoid death by terminal illness. Although his ears would turn so red as if they're bleeding whenever he sees her, he still keeps up an act of prideful indifference: "Can you stop being so clingy?"  The next day, Zhao Mingxi really did leave to mooch off of someone else's luck. The small dog bowed his head down, and grumbled: "I'll let you cling to me, alright? Happy now?"

title: Sanda
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Police, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Paru Itagaki
synopsis:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.

title: Mujina Into the Deep
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Delinquents
author: Inio Asano
synopsis: Am I "necessary" in this world? What is the true nature of the person called "Mujina" who flies in the sky with a sword on her back in the midst of ordinary life? What is man, what is society, what are human rights, and what is happiness?

title: Mairimashita! Iruma-Kun
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy
author: Osamu Nishi
synopsis: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfathers support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. Hell just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that hes human Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?

title: Release That Witch
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yuewen Manhua
synopsis: A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore farming!

title: Witch'S Fantasy Cosmetics
genre: Fantasy, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: meeco
synopsis:
Welcome to the Fantasy Cosmetics shop where witches create a world full of dreams and magic.

Following a scent trail of flowers lies the Charme Dresser cosmetic shop. It is said that it grants wishes of those who visit with the use of Fantasy Cosmetic magic

Drawn by the big hit illustrator meeco, these charming and fantastical cosmetics will make your heart flutter just by looking at them! A full-colour comic and illustration collection featuring short and unique stories of those who visit this store.

Strawberry quartz, Princess Grape extract and love fortune flower buds adding these last touches to your own fantasy, its time to prepare your Fantasy Cosmetics.

title: Tsukiaitai Kareshi
genre: Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life
author: emuemuo
synopsis: Tobari, who has bad luck, finds himself in big trouble. It all starts when Saeki, the most popular guy in school, confesses his love to him in front of the whole school...!? Emuemuo's cute trouble love!!

title: Botsuko-Chan
genre: Web Comic, Full Color
author: Haguhagu
synopsis: "Botsu" as in "rejected/unused concept"

title: Kyou Mo Veranda De
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Issei Itokawa
synopsis: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.

title: Metsuki Warui Ko Kawaii Ko
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Hamita
synopsis:
This delinquent is stupid cute!

High schooler Tanaka-kun believes that scary girls are actually cute. Thus, sitting next to the delinquent Mizuno-san he strives to get closer to her. However, in addition to having a scary expression, she's the subject of many rumors and feared by her classmates!!

Although getting the cold shoulder at first, Tanaka's feverish offensive opens Mizuno's heart up bit by bit. But Tanaka's plan to help her fit in with their classmates during the school festival is threatened when disaster strikes!

(Translation of the Volume 1 synopsis on Amazon by KasketBox)

A twitter short by @hamita1220

title: Tenpuru -No One Can Live on Loneliness-
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kimitake Yoshioka
synopsis: That's right, I'll become a monk! Not knowing what to do with his worldly desires, Akagami Akemitsu aims to live a stoic life. However, the thick karmic blood flowing in him will not permit it!

title: Pen to Wappa to Jijitsu-Kon
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crime, Gore, Police, Mystery
author: Shinichi Sawaragi
synopsis: A middle-aged detective, Eiji Kirisame (40), meets a strange high school girl at the scene of a certain crime. She doesn't speak a word, but she helps solve the case using her drawings. However, suddenly this middle-aged detective is getting a marriage proposal from this girl!

title: Saikyou Onmyouji No Isekai Tenseiki: Geboku No Youkaidomo Ni Kurabete Monster Ga Yowai Sugirundaga
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Kosuzu Kiichi
synopsis:
Haruyoshi Kugas power as the strongest exorcist is all for naught when he is betrayed by his closest ally. With his dying breath, he casts the secret Spell of Reincarnation  when he next opens his eyes, he finds himself in a different world altogether, reincarnated as Seika Lamprogue, the son of a family of magic scholars!

He quickly learns that the magic in this new world is quite unlike the sorcery he learned in his past life and that he cant use it. Fortunately for him, with his mastery of curses and the hordes of youkai at his disposal, he doesnt need to. 

Haruyoshi (now Seika) is determined not to repeat his past mistakes in his second life by smartly laying low and avoiding flaunting his power. Yet accomplishing his goals and without drawing attention to himself proves to be easier said than done  will his powers be enough to live a happy life?! 

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-reincarnation-of-the-strongest-exorcist-in-another-world)

title: The Menhera Rabbit Is Adored by the Yandere Wolf
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama
author: Shiori Hayuu
synopsis: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?

title: Yakuza Ni Ofuro De Hatarakasaretemasu.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Slice of Life
author: Takashi ?
synopsis:
Miyako Yamazumei, who grew up in a single-parent household, returns to her hometown for the first time in 10 years after the death of her father. Her father left Miyako with the public bathhouse that he cherished, and a debt of 10 million yen that he owed to the yakuza. Miyako and the yakuza money-lender are determined to rebuild the bathhouse to make it profitable again.

(Source: Natalie.mu, translated)

title: Tyranno
genre: Action, Comedy, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Delinquents, Police
author: Katsunari Mano
synopsis:
Sexual violence tag is for chapter 1 only.

The setting is the year 202X, in Kamata, Ota Ward, Tokyo, which has become one of the world's leading entertainment districts due to the opening of the Kamata Line. The area attracts huge economic benefits and is surrounded by organized crime, foreign mafias, terrorists, smugglers, prostitution rings... and the hidden agendas of political, financial, and governmental power players. A newly assigned police officer, Nonogami, stationed at the station's front police box, feels despair over the corruption of power. However, with the overwhelming violence of "Tyranno," a massive female police officer, the cases begin to be solved.

title: Takamori-Kun O Damarasetai!!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kamiharu Haruno
synopsis: Minamikawa-san, a girl with the ability to read minds is curious about the boy sitting next to her, Takamori-kun. It's because Takamori-kun's mind is so damn loud...!!

title: Kimi to Warui Koto Ga Shitai
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Yutaka
synopsis: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.

title: Bakuon!!
genre: Comedy, Sports, School Life
author: Mimana Orimoto
synopsis:
Sakura Hane has to ride her bicycle up several steep hills just to get to her new high school. As she is desperately pedaling, she sees and hears a motorcycle zoom past her and instantly falls in love with it. It turns out that bike was driven by her new classmate Amano Onsa, one badass girl who decided to attend this school because of one reason, there is no policy against motorcycles. Not only that, there is apparently a motorcycle club on campus. Hane and Onsa instantly become friends and she is able to convince Hane to start riding a bike. Now the only thing Hane has to do is get a license...  

---
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/mimana_o)  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=17745)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=17959)

title: Red Blue
genre: Action, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, School Life
author: Atsushi Namikiri
synopsis: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.

title: My Intern Bullied Me Again!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: kalata
synopsis: Referred to as The Cobra by her employees, art director Lu Meihe appears to most as a strict and callous boss but she is actually rather innocent at heart. She has a secret crush on her intern Lin Wenjing, but because of her public image, she cannot express her feelings openly and instead pours them into the sketchbook she always carries with her. One day, she accidentally leaves the sketchbook behind only for it to be discovered by Lin Wenjing. Lu Meihe soon realizes that while Lin Wenjing may seem gentle and carefree, she may actually be hiding a secret persona of her own. Today my intern bullied me again, Im so happy I dont know what to do!

title: Chijou 100-Kai
genre: Action, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Mystery
author: Ransuke Kuroi
synopsis:
21st Century, Tokyo. People called challengers are gambling their life trying to escape from the state-owned 
100 Story Tower to win 10 billion yen. 
But what will happen when Tatsuki Kuroumi awakes at this tower without remembering anything about his prior life, 
including entering the tower as challenger?

title: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Saka Mikami
synopsis:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)

title: Death Note
genre: Thriller, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Crime, Survival, Office Workers, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Tsugumi Ooba
synopsis:
A shinigami, as a god of death, can kill any personprovided they see their victim's face and write their victim's name in a notebook called a Death Note. One day, Ryuk, bored by the shinigami lifestyle and interested in seeing how a human would use a Death Note, drops one into the human realm.  
  
High school student and prodigy Light Yagami stumbles upon the Death Note andsince he deplores the state of the worldtests the deadly notebook by writing a criminal's name in it. When the criminal dies immediately following his experiment with the Death Note, Light is greatly surprised and quickly recognizes how devastating the power that has fallen into his hands could be.  
  
With this divine capability, Light decides to extinguish all criminals in order to build a new world where crime does not exist and people worship him as a god. Police, however, quickly discover that a serial killer is targeting criminals and, consequently, try to apprehend the culprit. To do this, the Japanese investigators count on the assistance of the best detective in the world: a young and eccentric man known only by the name of L.

title: Kono Subarashii Sekai Ni Shukufuku Wo!
genre: Reincarnation, Loli, Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Zombies, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Natsume Akatsuki
synopsis: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazumas choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike

title: 12 Suicidal Children
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Tou Ubukata
synopsis: The story is a locked-room mystery where 12 kids go into an abandoned hospital to give up on life. In the room where they meet, a boy is already lying dead, and no one knows who he is.

title: Baili Jin Among Mortals
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Viva
synopsis:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majestys colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out.  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva???](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys???](https://weibo.com/julys0723)

title: Yume De Furarete Hajimaru Yuri
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Hijiki
synopsis:
For your very average high school girl, Tsukushi, there's her cool and beautiful childhood friend (with some very particular weaknesses) Hinoka. Tsukushi always thought they would be normal childhood friends forever That is until Tsukushi saw Hinoka rejected her confession in a dream.   The hypnagogic romantic comedy between a cheery maiden, and a cool girl which begins with a dream, starts right now!

 [Serialization of Popular Twitter manga by Hijiki](https://mangadex.org/title/088db207-6c42-4fa9-9e6f-1b831c21c1ac/a-yuri-manga-that-starts-with-getting-rejected-in-a-dream)

title: Modern Mogal
genre: Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Miu Kojima
synopsis:
The daily experiences of modern monster girls.   
  
Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821), uploaded to MangaDex with permission.

title: Keep Your Hands Off Eizouken!
genre: Comedy, Adventure, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Sumito Oowara
synopsis:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___
**Additional Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Anime Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)
- [Official Anime Website](http://eizouken-anime.com/)
- [Official Live-Action Website](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)

title: Ani No Yome to Kurashite Imasu.
genre: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Kuzushiro
synopsis:
Since the death of her brother, seventeen year-old Shino Kishibe has been living with her sister-in-law Nozomi. Nozomi wants to be a person Shino can lean on, while Shino is determined not to be a burden. Together the orphaned high-schooler and young widow try to support one another while carrying on with their everyday lives.  
  


---

title: Pest Ga Aketara Asobimashou! ~Chuusei Europa Sekai to Gendai Bunmei Slow Life~
genre: Time Travel, Comedy, Girls' Love, Isekai, Slice of Life
author: hoihoi
synopsis: In 14th Century Middle Age Europe, the spread of the Black Plague has led baker Rachel Becker to move from the city to a village. There, she meets Ema Müller, a "witch" who claims to come from "another world" 700 years into the future, bringing with her modern technology that feels like "magic" to the people of the middle ages...

title: Meme Girls
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Anthology, Self-Published, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Mizuki Nomura
synopsis: Memes, gaming consoles, and websites turned into anime girls! Please enjoy this compilation of meme comics, oneshots, and shorts from the team behind Merryweather Comics!

title: Winter Moon
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Rie Nakamura
synopsis: A gay sorceror and a seductive priestess cross paths in an Online RPG.

title: Link Click
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Shi Xin
synopsis: Sitting in a corner of the city is a seemingly normal shop called 'Time Photo Studio'. The shop owners, Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang, can dive back in time through photos. One day, an uprising star in the Chinese opera world  Lin Kai  visited the studio and tasked Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang to find a cassette tape from 10 years ago. They only have one photo, and one chance...

title: Tale of a Scribe Who Retires to the Countryside
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Barking Dog
synopsis:
A scholar who failed the national exams is picked up by a martial arts master and given the task to record his life into a book. Through their journey, Son Bin meets many great people and soon finds himself following the same path as the master, as the Martial Arts King.   

---

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/martial-arts/luoxiang/list?title_no=3657)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/luoxiangwenshizhuan/list?title_no=1567)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001425)

title: The Red Knight Seeks No Reward
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jae-Min Song
synopsis:
The Imperial Knight Judith was once a scumbag who would do anything for money. She lived as a slave to money as a dog of the imperial family and a tool of her commander. Under the guise of destitution, she abandoned her guilt. But what was at the end was betrayal and death.

However, when she opened her eyes, she went back to being a new knight after six years?

'I'm not going to be a swordsman for money anymore!'

In front of Judith, who is determined to live a different life than before, the commander of the Red Knights and scouts appears...

"I assure you that you will be treated fairly. Why don't you join the Red Knights?"

Judith decided not to pursue money blindly as a Red Knight, abandoning her past of being a Black Knight. Can she live this life without regret?

---
After dying at the hands of her backstabbing superior, money-grubbing Judith learned the hard way that bounty is never worth bloodshed. When she somehow finds herself alive and well, six years prior to her death, she decides to use her second chance at life to abandon her greed and become a genuine knight. She begins by accepting Captain Kaillou Lewalmeigh's offer to join the honorable Order of Red Knights. Will Judith be able to redeem herself by overcoming the wrongdoings of her past?

---
