title: A Rogue Guard in a Medieval Fantasy
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: U-Min Cha
synopsis: In a brutal, lawless medieval world where war and poverty reign, and twisted magic defies all reason, the captain of the guards grinds through another grueling day, pushing his battered body to the limit in a land where survival itself is a merciless test.

title: Hardcore Leveling Warrior: Earth Game
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Se-Hun Kim
synopsis:
"Im... back!"

After a comet collides on Earth, a gaming world filled with monsters and dungeons becomes a reality. Amidst the chaos, Gong Won-Ho wakes up as Hardcore Leveling Warrior, an almighty game character with exceptional luck and power.

Once again, he will embark on a journey to become the strongest... but this time, on Earth!

genre: Comedy, Sports, School Life
author: Iqura Sugimoto
synopsis:
As soon as he entered high school, Shiki Koshiyama was invited to the mysterious "Quiz Study Group" led by his senpai. What will Shiki run into when being dragged along by his classmate Mari into the dazzling world of competitive quizzes?! 

Get ready for a manga that features fierce quiz competitions!

title: A Sharp-Eyed Classmate
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Matgamjya
synopsis:
With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!

title: Chronicles of the Reincarnated Demon God
genre: Reincarnation, Official Colored, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Adaptation
author: GONE
synopsis:
The Junior Heavenly Demon, Yeon Woon-hwi, was born without a dantian.

However, through dark arts and his shitty personality er, preternatural ability, he became the junior lord of the Heavenly Demon Cult.

He was a man of many epithets:

Great Sorcerer of the Dark Arts

'King of the Wandering Lost Souls

But the peoples assessment of him was simple:

If he smiles, run as fast as you can. His smile is a death sentence.

Catch his eye, for he shall provide you with lifelong protection. That is, if you can.

He was living the good life, when suddenly, he was betrayed in a coup led by the vice-lord and elders of his cult.

You seem to have forgotten what kind of person I am, Uncle. So die. All of you."

Using the holy relic of the first Heavenly Demon, he self-destructed, taking the traitors with him. And then, he opened his eyes to the most unexpected of places...

"I'm in the Tang Clan? And a branch family at that?"

He awoke as Tang Woon-hwi, an illegitimate son of the Nine Dragon Branch Family, a subset of the Sichuan Tang Clan.

Will Woon-hwi be able to find his master, bring together his scattered followers, and rebuild the Heavenly Demon Cult?

title: Genkai Dokushin Joshi (26) Gohan
genre: Psychological, Comedy, Philosophical, Slice of Life
author: Ryou Matoba
synopsis: Hiiragi-san is a single woman who is exhausted from work and life. No matter how depressed she is, she always ends up hungry.

title: Wu Liu Qi: Heibai Shuanglong
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Yuanlian Li
synopsis: Mo Lang, a bad boy, and Bai Qi, his genius friend, lived a quiet life in a village in the distant country of Niuzhan. Until one day, a mysterious assassin from the country of Xuanwu appears, who completely subverts their lives, forcing the two youngsters to embark on an adventure that will change the world. The manhua is a prequel to the animated series Scissor Seven, chronicling events from before the original series.

title: Flower of Youth
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Music, Full Color
author: Yeni
synopsis: "Pob, Pob Panus," a renowned solo female artist with an impeccable reputation. However, deep in her heart, Pob has been longing for her first love that faded away many years ago. And that love is "Kan, Kan Thiwa," who once promised to become a singer alongside her. One day, Pob encounters Kan again... as a flower shop owner and a single mother?

title: Zig the Blacksmith
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Mon
synopsis: Having lost his ranked account to a hacker, Kang Yoohan wants to get even. Assuming his lost equipment was sold, hes hoping that as blacksmith Zig, it will come back to him through repairs and lead him to the hacker. After breaking many swords, however, he finds this is no walk in the park. Thankfully, hes able to see cracks in the equipment and enemies that show their vital points to make or break them! Armed with these skills, Zig is looking to get things shaking, or rather, smithing!

title: Bocchi Tenseiki
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Adaptation
author: Fast
synopsis:
I don't trust any human being.

An unemployed, virgin 29-years-old Loner man who has a very deep distrust toward humans was trying to save a woman who was almost raped. He is stabbed in the chest by the assaulter and left to die alone while cursing the humans. When he came to, he realized that he had reincarnated in another world as the second son of a lower noble family where magic and spirit exist as a human baby named Ash Hawkwood.

Without talent for [True Magic] or [Swordmanship] this the story about how he build his own empire from scratch by using his own power.

title: Vampire Princess Miyu: Saku
genre: School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural
author: Toshiki Hirano
synopsis: A half-human, half-vampire girl named Miyu is trapped in a body that will remain a teenager forever. As a vampire, it is her duty to hunt down demonic beings known as Shinma who have wandered into the human world and send them back to the Darkness. The new story begins with Miyu transferring to a certain middle school.

title: The Secret of the Partner Next to You
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Chae-Gun
synopsis: Yang Kiryong is an ordinary high school boy who has a classmate named Yoo Jae-Kyung, who is somewhat clumsy and clueless. Both have a very good friendship, but without any kind of love attraction. Until one day, by chance, Kiryong discovered the deepest secret of his friend and because of this his heart began to beat, will it be beats of fear or love?

title: Ennui
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Hye-Rin In
synopsis:
Is the terrible heartache caused by a distant lover? Or is it the ties and obsession that follow along, like love that won't come true...?
*From the same author of Missing Love: The Marrying Man

title: The Two-Faced Heroine Is Obsessed with Marking Me
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Duo Li Si
synopsis:
A scheming, manipulative alpha pretending to be an omega × an omega pretending to be a cool-but-cowardly alpha

Gu Yu, who was originally a top-designer at a high-end bespoke fashion boutique, happened to read an ABO novel without purchasing a subscription. Shortly after, she was inexplicably forced to transmigrate into the story. Worst of allshe became the novel's evil side character, a fake alpha who was actually an omega, left to the grim fate of being burned alive by the heroine for abusing her. As she stared at the blackened "two-faced" heroine Su Yue kneeling in the rain outside, Gu Yu felt completely devastated.

To save her life, Gu Yu decided to risk acting out of character and she secretlyyet while openly caring for the female leaddesigned the most beautiful and unique evening gown in the world for her, clung onto her tightly, provided her with resources, helped her dominate the entertainment industry, and reclaim everything that was rightfully hers. But Gu Yu never expected that the "innocent little princess" she had been caring for so preciously not only turned out to be a fake omega, but an alpha! This wasnt how the story was supposed to go! Believing her days were numbered, Gu Yu waited for her impending death in despair. However, Su Yue, exuding a strong red wine-scented pheromonepinned Gu Yu down and whispered, Are you prepared to be marked by me? That familiar voice rang in Gu Yus ears, completely disrupting her soft heart.

title: Komi-San Wa Komyushou Desu.
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Tomohito Oda
synopsis:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.

title: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Ting Yi
synopsis: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title: Isekai De Kekkon Soudansho Hajimemashita
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Kikuko Kikuya
synopsis: Mien Sotono, who works at a marriage counseling agency, is trying to protect a couple who have arranged a marriage and is hit by a car. And when she woke up, she found herself in a different world filled with values different from modern times!! Mien opens a marriage counseling agency in order to survive, but marriage hunting is extremely difficult in a world with different cultures and common sense. Is it in hard mode!?

title: N
genre: Psychological, Crime, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Mane Shinda
synopsis:
My vision and my heart were completely taken over by "N."

The case of five missing junior high school boys. The massacre of an entire elementary school class. A car crash resulting in the deaths of two people. The letter "N" was left at each of these crime scenes.

An urban legend circulates, suggesting the main culprit is "N," a religious group thought to have collapsed 2,000 years ago.

What exactly is "N"?

title: I'Ll Try to End the Male Lead
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Super Masara
synopsis:
I, Kwon Jinha, began feeling sick after reading a romance novel.

I became connected to all the emotions and sensations of the female lead, Elvi.

I even went to the hospital due to severe pain and sorrow but the result said theres nothing wrong with my body.

So, I ended up sending an email to the novels author, begging for the male lead to stop tormenting the female lead. But instead, all I got was a happy reply...

Do your job properly, Elvi.

I found myself possessing Elvis body in the novel.

I got slapped by the male lead as soon as I possessed Elvis body, upon that, I had only one thought.

The male lead? Its over if I kill him, right?

title: Uzaki-Chan Wa Asobitai!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Take
synopsis:
Annoying! Cute! But Annoying!  Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced, athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone,  but he is frequently teased by his cute, stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki, whom he has known since high school.     Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "impressively huge."
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raws: [KADOComi](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_004657_S?episodeType=first), [KADOKAWA](https://promo.kadokawa.co.jp/uzakichan/)
- [Official X](https://x.com/uzakichan_asobi)

title: Koi Yori Aoku
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Kon Fukaumi
synopsis:
Takamine, who can't find anything she likes, and Sakikura, who loves books. The two girls meet by chance and spend their after-school hours together. Are they friends? Or is it a nameless relationship spun between the two girls?

------------
Note: Serialization of the oneshot of same title by Fukaumi Kon in COMIC Ogyaaa!! published by Homesha.

title: Little Shark'S Outings
genre: Animals, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Penguin Box
synopsis:
The adventures of a baby shark in nostalgia-filled Yauo Town. 

Cider on a summer day, freeze pops, radio calisthenics, festival stalls, and hanging out with friends. The world sparkles when reflected in the eyes of the baby shark.

A little retro, a little wistful, and the warmest short comic!

title: Rewriting My Third Life
genre: Reincarnation, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Du-Yeon
synopsis: After being abused and killed by her family in two separate lifetimes, Blesse Lavian expects nothing from them in her third life. This time, despite knowing the horrible end that awaits House Lavian, Blesse decides to keep quiet and flee when the time is right. But the more time she spends with her cold-looking father and half-sister, the more she realizes that the Lavians aren't so bad after all. Will Blesse take a chance and rewrite her third life, or will she end up betrayed once again?

title: The Villainous Duke'S Daughter'S Special Method of Growing Rice
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Haengdu
synopsis: When you transmigrate into a novel as the villainess destined to die, there are different ways to survive: flirting with the male lead, learning to fight, or finding happiness elsewherebut not Erica! She has decided to become a successful rice farmer just like in her past life! What follows is an epic (and rather surreal) quest to find the last rice seeds in the world, tame a giant rabbit magic beast, recruit magicians to water the fields, andWait, did she just turn the Holy Sword into a hoe?!

title: Level One Dreamers
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Sports, Video Games, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: WAKANA KURAGUCHI
synopsis: Although Captain is handsome, kind, and good at sports, hes also an avid gamer. Thats the reason why Kiss decided to start learning how to play games in hopes of winning over the senior she has a crush on. However, this turned out to be the beginning of an unexpected online relationship between Kiss and Miguel, who is secretly the world's number one pro player!

title: Studio Cabana
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Music
author: Agri Uma
synopsis: Yukari Maki, a diligent high school girl. One day, she spots her classmate, Yusuke Kusaka, who was rumored to be a delinquent, singing a love song. Never having imagined such a sweet, yet sad, singing voice could come from him, Yukari was instantly captivatedwithout knowing that it would soon be the beginning of a sad, unrequited love.

title: Sensei to Seito Wa, Ai Wo Shiranai.
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life
author: Shijimi Kaibara
synopsis: The person I loved the most in the world turned out not to love me at all. I had no choice but to hate that person. This is a story about two people who don't know how to love and gradually become attracted to each other.

title: Deriwo No Oshigoto
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Kotora Aoshima
synopsis: "I wanted to understand my oshi's feelings." ? Sakurako, a shut-in otaku, called a call boy and tried to perform a sexual act for the first time in her life. However, just before the act, Sakurako became afraid, and in her rush, she accidentally revealed an eroge she was in the middle of playing, causing her to panic! Having her fetish revealed to the extroverted and handsome call boy Fuji-kun, she becomes embarrassed, but as she despairs, it's revealed that Fuji-kun was an otaku comrade as well...? This is a pure oshikatsu love story between an otaku girl and a call boy!

title: Yuki-Chan, Aishiteru!
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Aino Sennen
synopsis:
"Hold me a lot today too" "Yuki-chan...!!!!!"
Haru and Yuki are childhood friends and are currently lovingly living together.
Even though we've been closer than anyone since we were little and have been together for such a long time, our love for each other is bottomless.
I want to be tight, and I want to have sex!
However, there were many conflicts before they came here... We will deliver the precious daily life of these two in full emotional style.

title: Azur Lane 4-Koma: Slow Ahead!
genre: Comedy, Video Games, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
author: Hori
synopsis: Official 4-koma webcomic from the popular mobile game Azur Lane.

title: The Infinite Mage
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: kiraz
synopsis:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

title: My Dearest Self with Malice Aforethought
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Hajime Inoryu
synopsis: Urashima Eiji, a college student, goes to sleep after a fun drinking night with his friends. When he wakes up he discovers a beautiful girl next to him who treats him as if they are in a loving relationship. Later, Eiji finds out that 4 days have passed since he went out with his crew. What did he do during all that time and why does he have no memory of it? By confronting that reality, he will be caught in tragedy

title: The Story of My Village
genre: Historical, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Akira Oze
synopsis: A story based on real-life events in 1966. The Sanrizuka Struggle told from the perspective of the peasants fighting for their land.

title: Hilde Takes House Arpeggio
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yumin
synopsis:
"I was a noble this whole time?!"

Hilde, a commoner who works at a restaurant in the village, is suddenly notified by a handsome man named Logan that she is a family member of one of the empire's four duchies and hears that her mother 'Lucia Arpeggio' was a powerful mage in the past.

Duke Arpeggio offers to make her an official member of the family if she can prove that she has strong magical powers, and Hilde accepts in order to escape from her oppressed commoner livelihood and enjoy a comfortable life.

However, her excitement doesn't last long Culture, magic, history, literature, etc. The number of things nobles needed to learn were endless! In addition, forget about welcoming Hilde, her family members only sent her cold looks and even put her life in danger

"You've left me with no choice. I, a former commoner, will be taking over this duchy!"

title: I Raise Skeletons
genre: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Jeyeol Im
synopsis:
A necromancer is a profession considered the noble of nobles, with less than 1,000 in the population worldwide! I was born with a diamond spoon, no, a necromancer spoon in my mouth! 

... Or so I thought. 

"Im just a defective necromancer." 
*Using skill, [Summon Ordinary Skeleton (E-Rank)].*

You'd think a necromancer should be able to summon liches, Dullahans, or death knights. But nope, I can only summon skeletons. But then one day, suddenly 

[Hidden condition achieved!]
[Condition: The 10,000 Uses Rule]
[Your rank has upgraded to D-rank!] 

I achieved the hidden condition and gained the ability to raise my skeletons. From E-rank to S-rank! 

The story of Joo Donghoon unfolds, the world's only cursed necromancer, whos speeding toward becoming a ranker!

title: Ghost Story Club (Remake)
genre: Long Strip, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Aengmusae
synopsis:
Lee Joon was an ordinary high school student.

During the entrance ceremony, he was caught up in a strange phenomenon and died.

[You have died.] [Restarting from checkpoint.] [Loading]

But then, a message appeared before his eyes.

?Congratulations on your acceptance at Nakseong Highschool, the school of secrets and mysteries. Uncover the shady secrets hidden within the school, or fight against the legends and ghost stories of the campus in order to earn points to unlock special abilities. Additionally, you must gather comrades to prevent the resurrection of the Demon King before graduation. The world is in your hands.?

title: Blue Box
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kouji Miura
synopsis:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)

title: Guilty Circle
genre: Sexual Violence, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Tsukasa Monma
synopsis: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?

title: Grand Warlock Streamer
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: SADU
synopsis:
Jung Hyunwoo is just an unlucky gamer barely making ends meet in the VR game "God Wars." He even ends up losing access to his game account due to a horrible accident and is forced to create a new character. 

In the process, he discovers that he has an ability that allows him to see hidden information in the game, which leads him to become a Grand Warlock. 

Now equipped with a mind-blowing skill and a legendary class, all that's left is for him to level up and go from zero to hero...

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_7M4wH6g1eI)

title: Keikenzumi Na Kimi To, Keiken Zero Na Ore Ga, Otsukiai Suru Hanashi
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru
author: Carpaccio  Noyama
synopsis:
Ryuuto Kashima is a gloomy high school student. Because of a punishment game, he was forced to confess to Runa Shirakawa, a girl from the top of school caste and admired by everyone. They ended up going out for the unexpected reason of "Err, I'm free now so..." but, Ryuuto ends up following and eavesdropping Runa getting confessed by a handsome soccer club member, and Runa bringing Ryuuto, whom she just started dating, to her own room as a matter of course. 

They have different friends and ways to have fun, different in just about everything. And yet, surprised by their differences everyday, accepting it, they begin to relate with each other.
___
**Character Designer:** [magako](https://mangadex.org/author/fd30d521-18ba-4638-94c3-700858ce7c43)

title: Sousei No Onmyouji
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy, Gyaru
author: Yoshiaki Sukeno
synopsis:
Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)

title: Trinity of the Royal Palace
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Magic, Fantasy
author: Esora Amaichi
synopsis: In the Kingdom of Wardell Ceram, a realm rich in flowers and trees, the charming duo of Luca and Sylvain live outside the law. As the Wolf Claws, they are a chivalrous thieves who target those nobles who commit evil deeds. Their deeds bring them to the attention of the Kingdom's Princess, who wants to recruit them for a very special task. A romantic comedy about love that transcends class!

title: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Nakaba Suzuki
synopsis: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!

title: Demonic Emperor
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Bao Ke Ai
synopsis:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** ? can mean "magic" and "demon", while ?? can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)

title: Ryuroden
genre: Award Winning, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Yoshito Yamahara
synopsis:
Middle schoolers, Shiro and Masumi, encountered a mysterious dragon that brought them back to the time of the Three Kingdoms; situated in ancient China. As soon as they arrived, they were rescued by the Han Kingdom. Not long after these events, Masumi was kidnapped and Shiro barely escaped death Soon the story gets more complicated as they are stuck in the past.  
  
In 1997, Ryuurouden won the Kodansha Manga Award for sh?nen manga.

title: Isekai De Haishin Katsudou Wo Shitara Tairyou No Yandere Shinja Wo Umidashite Shimatta Ken
genre: Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Tsuku Iyomine
synopsis: Living in Ataraxia, a world of swords and magic, a reincarnated individual decided to make a living out of streaming. Living in a world where such a thing did not exist despite the many forms of entertainment, he quickly made a name for himself. This is not the tale of just a streamer... but of a boy who becomes a legend as a haishinsha.

title: Ghostblade
genre: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kazuhiro Fujita
synopsis:
Long, long ago in Neraland, the pious human built a great tower to show the respect to their Goddess Nera.  
Goddess Nera was deeply moved by human piety; to reward them, she opened a door at the top of the tower. This ethereal door connected to another world; it was known as *Heaven's Eye*.  
However

title: Bukuro Kicks
genre: Sports, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Ikka Matsuki
synopsis: The setting is Tokyo. Rumors are going around Tokyo of a prize of ten million for beating "Gyokutei Shinjuku" at blind soccer, and blind soccer experiences a sudden surge. Meanwhile, not far away in Ikebukuro, a South Korean girl named Ji-he recruits members for a blind soccer team. And one day, while working at a cabaret club, a blind young man named Oyamada comes in. Despite never playing blind soccer before, Oyamada is somewhat forcefully dragged into the team to fill out the numbers. However, this man actually is...

title: Void Man
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Geon-Hui Han
synopsis: Gods have descended upon the world, and Da-il's ready to drag them all to hell. After the lives of his loved ones were taken by the gods, Da-il offers his soul in exchange for the powers of the very killer of gods, the Void.

title: Konjiki No Word Master -Yuusha Yonin Ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat-
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Sui Tomoto
synopsis:
In an RPG-like fantasy world consumed by warring nations and racial discrimination, the human kingdom summons five high school students from 21st-century Japan for assistance in their conflict with the demonkin. Now those students, with their experience of MMORPGs at their disposal, will hone their skills to protect the human kingdom of Edea.  
  
However, this isn't their story.  
  
Out of the five students, four of them were given the title of Hero and the fifth one the title of Innocent Bystander. He had been summoned by accident since he sat near the other four students. His name is Hiiro Okamura, an aloof bookworm with traveling and reading as his raison d'etre. Hiiro sees no reason to help the human kingdom in their offensive war with the demonkin, seeing that he isn't a Hero and that he has no real obligation to help them, and decides to leave the kingdom to go on his own adventure.  
  
Soon, Hiiro finds out that he has the very unique skill of Word Magic: magic that can materialize the definition of a word. As he travels more and more, he finds many uses for his Word Magic and many opportunities to find books, level up, and gain some of his own companions. Even with the outbreak of war on the horizon, Hiiro stays true to his desire to travel the new world he's in.

title: The Suspicious Boy Is One of the World'S Top Ten Masters
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Rijin
synopsis:
In the aftermath of Madorim's decline following the World War, a captivating tale unfolds as the maternal grandson, son of Lord Daesannim's daughter, returns to the city. Despite initial feelings of abandonment, he emerges as a figure of unexpected beauty in a martial arts world marked by rugged aesthetics.

Unveiling his true identity as the King of the Mu-myeon Mountain, a teenage expert who conquered the Dragon King of the Yellow River, the series promises a gripping narrative. Driven by his mother's last words and a determination to restore Madorim to its former glory, Jin Murip, this unparalleled teenage expert, arrives in Madorim.

title: The Monster Male Lead Living Under My Bed
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Sudal
synopsis: Not found

title: The Reluctant Demon Cult Leader
genre: Official Colored, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Nabong
synopsis: The leader of the demonic cult is a formidable entity that everyone is afraid of. However, while the demonic cult members expect him to exude great violence, the new Demonic Cult Leader, Do Yu-gang, wishes to live a simple and peaceful life. Will his modest wish be granted in the end?

title: The ReturnerS Road to Retirement
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Seohee
synopsis:
After the first Gate opened in 2018, Lim Dae-In survived for 20 years on Earth while being connected to other dimensions. 

The day after his long-awaited retirement celebration, he regresses by 20 years, back to when he had nothing

title: Jojo'S Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - the Jojolands
genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Hirohiko Araki
synopsis:
The ninth story arc of Jojos Bizarre Adventure. 

Oahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.

title: Nano Machine
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Geobalhan
synopsis:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.  

---

title: Mane Mane Nichi Nichi
genre: Comedy, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Souichirou Yamamoto
synopsis: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!

title: Realist Maou Ni Yoru Seiiki Naki Isekai Kaikaku
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Manatsu Suzuki
synopsis:
In a dilapidated castle, Astaroth awoke as a Demon King. With his wisdom from his past life, he would rule over his lands as a thorough realist. Demon King, why are you attacking the level 1 Heroes? Defeat them before they become stronger. That is called strategy.  Demon King, why are you sending fake money to the enemy country? To bring chaos to their economy, so they will self-destruct. The werewolf troops have attacked. Should we use silver bullets? Not bullets, shoot them with cannons.  
  
And like that, Astaroth reformed the old tendencies. He became a lord who was loved by the people and his subordinates, and he would go on to be called the most powerful Demon King in history.

title: Nou Aru Ogre Ga Tsuno O Kakusu
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Yui Aoba
synopsis:
A hero who dies in a fight with the Demon King is cursed on the verge of death. The curse was to reincarnate the hero as Rama, the daughter of a half-ogre and a half-human. 

Sixteen years have passed since then. Rama, who was reincarnated in an ogre village, was tormented by discrimination and prejudice because of her origin, but she had grown beyond the confines of the ogre village, making use of her experience as a former hero. The village chief, who has taken notice of her, gives her an order. The order was to select Rama as the new "Demon King Candidate" from the Ogre village.

title: I Love Amy
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Eonni
synopsis:
"Is this how it feels to have a friend?" 

Bibi is obsessed with Peter, the prince of the school. When she spots Amy next to him, she starts to feel jealous. She invites Amy to her house to warn her, but instead takes a liking to the girl. They agree to be friends on the condition that Amy has to help Bibi confess.

title: Kuro No Shoukanshi
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Gin Amou
synopsis:
"If you truly want to get stronger, you have to challenge and defeat those stronger than yourself."

While being transmigrated to another world, Kelvin bartered away his memories for a collection of powerful new abilities. Setting out on the ultimate adventure as the worlds strongest Summoner  with his first Follower being the very goddess who brought him over!  he soon discovers his true nature as a battle junkie. Someone wants to pick a fight? Sure, bring it on!

Facing off against one formidable foe after another, Kelvin can hardly contain his delight as he revels in the absolute exhilaration of a good fight! The curtain rises on the start of an epic saga as this black-clad warrior and his allies carve their way into the annals of history! 
___
**Character Designer:** [Kurogin (DIGS)](https://mangadex.org/author/ad469135-32c7-4fcc-b490-d0ebc07eea16)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1222ci/)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/black-summoner)

title: Under Ninja
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Ninja, Comedy, Military, Gore, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Kengo Hanazawa
synopsis: The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality, the ninja still exist in secret, and their number is rumored to be as many as 200,000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand, the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja, Kuro Kumogakure, is living the life of a NEET.

title: Ohayou Toka Oyasumi Toka
genre: Drama, Slice of Life
author: Machita
synopsis:
"When you lose something, there is something that you remember."

Hinata Wahei, a 28-year-old professional house-building planner, with the sole ambition to start his new single lifestyle, was suddenly forced to live together with three sisters from his father's second marriage. The unforeseen co-existence is filled to the brim with trouble, as Wahei adheres to a self-sufficient, no-family-sentimentalisms personal code, having been raised as an only child in a family marred by divorce.

A story about a small family of four. It's a tale that goes from "I'm home" to "I'm off", and from "building a house" to "building a home".

title: The Demon King Who Lost His Job
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Ye Wu
synopsis: He is the Demon King who was impeached. She is the brave hero who was laid off because of a failed expedition. Bound by destiny, the two of them embark on an adventure to repay their debts.

title: My Wife Is a Heavenly Big Shot
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Tingdaluosi De Gou
synopsis: The opening scene mentions a wife who has reached her power ceiling, who still wants a bicycle, and demands to eat only soft rice?! But when Xiao Yifeng said I was really your husband, I was nearly strangled to death by this future wife somethings not right, I must have taken the wrong script!

title: Kono Kaisha Ni Suki Na Hito Ga Imasu
genre: Romance, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Akamaru Enomoto
synopsis:
_"Why don't the two of us date? In secret"_
 
Tateishi, who works in accounting at a snack-making company, has a secret. That secret is the existence of his cute lover that he's had since yesterday. Why keep it a secret, you ask? Because his lover is his unyielding colleague from the planning department of the same company Mitsuya!
 
A pure office romance story about a couple who started their relationship in secret, and want to keep it that way!

title: Marrying a Ceo
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Ake Wenhua
synopsis: To become my woman, He Qiaoyan, you must fulfill these three conditions: to like being pampered, to like being loved, and to like being taken good care of. You have fulfilled all the requirements, and all that's left is for you to be aware that you belong to me!

title: Infinite Devouring: From Zero to Hero
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Maiou Shi
synopsis: Yang Chen, who keeps failing his performance assessments in an immortal cultivation academy, accidentally discovers that he has the Ancient Dragon Soul. In a world where such souls are rare, he quickly becomes an almighty Heaven Master and is ready to venture into the unknown world with his newfound talent.

title: I Rely on My Invincibility to Deal Tons of Damage Passively!
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Isekai, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Baijiao Lu
synopsis: In his previous life, Cheng Qianmo attained the prestigious title of God across all professions in the game Genesis, poised to ascend to the pinnacle of the gaming world. However, just when he stood on the cusp of becoming the games top player, he suffered a regrettable defeat. Yet, fate granted Cheng Qianmo a second chance as he unexpectedly traversed into a world with a setting eerily identical to Genesis, a world where everyone could switch professions freely. Armed with the god-tier title across all professions, he resolves to rectify his past regrets, embarking on a path no one has ever tread before.

title: Hijiri-Kun Wa Kiyoku Ikitai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Iori Asaga
synopsis: Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!

title: I Contracted Myself
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Qiudaoyu
synopsis: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

title: Listening to the Stars
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Music, Full Color
author: Qu Bing Xiancao Dong
synopsis: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

title: Kono Subarashii Sekai Ni Bakuen Wo!
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kasumi Morino
synopsis: A spin-off of Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! that focuses on Megumin.

title: Myriad Realms Gatekeeper
genre: Action, Long Strip, Horror, Web Comic, Full Color
author: YMY
synopsis: Planets dying, gods falling. Anomalies and Calamities invade the human world. As a dark age descends, Shen Ye finds himself flung into this strange new reality. To his surprise, his power is to summon a door  a door leading to countless worlds, offering him a chance to adventure and train across the multiverse! Beyond the door, he encounters a mysterious skeleton with an unknown past

title: Arctic Cold War
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: KOE
synopsis: The Ice Age apocalypse is coming. After being betrayed and killed by my secret crush, I was reborn and gained a magical ability - the snacks I ate suddenly turned into plants? What's surprising is that this ability can be used in this way... Crisis is everywhere, I want to live for myself in this life!

title: Lord of the Mysteries
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: V
synopsis:
With the rising tide of steam power and machinery, who can come close to being a Beyonder? Shrouded in the fog of history and darkness, who or what is the lurking evil that murmurs into our ears?  
  
Waking up to be faced with a string of mysteries, Zhou Mingrui finds himself reincarnated as Klein Moretti in an alternate Victorian era world where he sees a world filled with machinery, cannons, dreadnoughts, airships, difference machines, as well as Potions, Divination, Hexes, Tarot Cards, Sealed Artifacts  
  
The Light continues to shine but mystery has never gone far. Follow Klein as he finds himself entangled with the Churches of the worldboth orthodox and unorthodoxwhile he slowly develops newfound powers thanks to the Beyonder potions.  
  
Like the corresponding tarot card, The Fool, which is numbered 0a number of unlimited potentialthis is the legend of "The Fool."

title: Inkya Datta Ore No Seishun Revenge: Tenshi Sugiru Ano Ko to Ayumu Re Life
genre: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Hashiba
synopsis:
This is the story of Niihama Shincirou, who collapsed after being ravaged by a black company and woke up to find that he had been sent back to his second year of high school. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a time leap to his second year of high school. His high school life... was gray and shady, but hes sure he can start over now.

The beautiful girl of his dreams, Haruka Shijouin, whom he met again over time, is even more innocent and cute than he remembered, and above all, she has been staring straight at Niihama.

*"I feel like you've changed a lot from the Niihama I knew yesterday. You're still kind, but youve grown up, and that's wonderful!"*

If I could change the future, I would definitely save her life after she took her own life after being severely bullied. With the adult mentality and corporate power that Ive acquired, Im going to take my revenge on my second youth with her!

title: Mahou Sensei Negima!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Ken Akamatsu
synopsis:
Ten-year-old prodigy Negi Springfield, has just graduated from magic academy, and in order to become a master mage he is sent to Japan to teach English at an all-girls middle school. But Negi has a bigger dream than just becoming a master mage. He wants to find his missing father, "The Thousand Master", the strongest mage that has ever lived. And he soon finds that searching for his father wont be as easy as he first hoped. In fact, it pushes him and his students into life-or-death battles that decides the fate of millions.

---

Alternate official English:
- [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/193)

title: Heisei Haizanhei ? Sumire-Chan
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: U Satomi
synopsis:
A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant, Sumire-chan (31). A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world, with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle, she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around, for the time being.  Her cousin Yuusei, a first-year highschooler, has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea.

You have a nice body, so let's release a doujin gravure photobook.

Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? Stay tuned!

title: Kuroiwa Medaka Ni Watashi No Kawaii Ga Tsuujinai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Ran Kuze
synopsis:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)

title: Sonic X Shadow Tokyo Mission -Episode 0-
genre: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Action, Adaptation
author: Yuuki Imada
synopsis: A specially drawn comic describing the prequel story not told in the movie!

title: Akujo Kyosei Keikaku
genre: Time Travel, Action, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy
author: Sakutarou
synopsis:
"Hey, Seraphina. Even when you grow up, dont end up killing me, okay?"

The wizard Arvel meets his end at the hands of his former fiancée, Seraphina, who later became the emperors mistress and a notorious villainess. However, when he comes to, he finds himself face-to-face with a young Seraphina! Astonishingly, he has returned to being his 13-year-old self. Seeing Seraphina before she became a villainess, Arvel makes a resolution: he will raise her to become a proper person and save his own life.

To start, he begins searching for a way to prevent the death of his brother, Sho, who was once engaged to Seraphina. However, the situation is far from simple, as he must contend with Seraphinas neglectful family, men vying for the beautiful Seraphinas attention, and a web of conflicting intentions.

In this journey through time, can Arvel alter Seraphinas fate and save her from becoming a villainess!?

title: Hiyoku No Tori
genre: Monsters, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy
author: Yayohi Monzen
synopsis:
The setting is ancient-China. Our main characters are poisonous (sometimes domesticated) harpy-like creatures, who get their poison and the ornate coloring that theyre so proud of, from the toxic plants which they eat.  
  
This is a yaoi focusing on the (somewhat fraught) relationship between two such harpies.  
  
If youre here for a human x harpy relationship Well, lets just say you wont be disappointed either.

title: Tensei Shitara Ken Deshita
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Yuu Tanaka
synopsis: When he realized it, the protagonist was in another world and had become a sword that was stabbed on an altar in a great plain, crowded with devil beast. The world he was in had a game like system; HP, MP, Strength, Vitality, Agility, Intelligence, Dexterity, Titles and Equipment. Following his instinct as a living sword, he traveled to find the one who could be his wielder, until he met with a cat girl that was about to be attacked by a bear type devil beast.

title: Happily Ever Afterwards
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jeong-Seo
synopsis:
I transmigrated inside the novel of my favorite character, the second male lead. A tsundere who listens to all the words of the female lead while grunting, with a straight forward personality, and a handsome face. Matching all my preferences, he was even single after the ending. Nice! Ill pick up the second male lead! However, I overlooked one thing The tsundere, who had been abandoned by the female lead blackened, and had become a terrifying man!

Get lost.

I-is it safe for me to pick up the second male lead?

---
What would you do if you were reborn as a character from your favorite romance novel? For Peony, an avid fan of *The Song of Askar*, the answer is simple: Marry her favorite character, of course! Reincarnated as the princess of the Kingdom of Garten, Peony is determined to marry Richt, the second male lead of *The Song of Askar* and former prince of the Fairspren Empire, who was banished to an inhospitable land after the novels happy ending (which didnt end so well for him). Amidst trials and tribulations, can Peony and Richt make the most of their second chance at life and love?

---
[Original Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=761498)

title: Dorei Wo Choukyoushite Harem Tsukuru
genre: Loli, Demons, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Aldehyde
synopsis: A man purchases three little slaves and begins to groom them into perfect girls for his harem. You will never have a gaggle of lolis with horns in your life. ;_;

title: Motokano Sensei Wa, Choppiri Ecchi Na Katei Houmon De Kimi to No Ai Wo Hagukumitai.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation
author: Kei Hazuki
synopsis: The new teachers at high school student Touma Nijino's school are his ex-girlfriends who dumped him in the past! Moreover, both Akamine Shuri and Shirasawa Kohaku are still in love with him. He is happy to see them again, but.... But he is not happy to see them again... "Hey, can I kiss you?" "Do you hate sleeping with me?" They start competing with each other at the same time, trying to make an already established fact with Tohru before graduation. Moreover, they live in the same apartment complex as Tohru and are trying to secretly nurture their love as a "commuter wife"...? This is a sweet love comedy with ex-girlfriend teachers who tempt you with everything they've got!

title: Good Morning Leon
genre: Animals, Slice of Life
author: Kai Kitago
synopsis: Jack (Siamese cat)  the cat who never fails to look after his owner so that the latter can be a good fella, a fella who will not be an embarrassment. So what if Jack causes a ton of trouble for his owner, Leon? Cant blame the dashing, handsome cat who performs his duty with all stoic elegance. Presenting to you, the story of Leon, the Gentleman, and Jack, the Dashing Cat, who live together in the grace and elegance of England.

title: Evolution Begins with a Big Tree
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Yan Xia
synopsis:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it divine power or curse?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)

title: Hana to Gin
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
author: Hidebu Takahashi
synopsis: Four years ago, Souda Gin and Hanai Kosuke worked a case together as two anti-organized crime police officers. Now theyve both quit the force, Gin to become a private detective and Hanai to become a yakuza! A heartwarming romantic comedy unfolds in a retro cityscape!

title: Garuru Girl
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Hara Satoshi
synopsis: Mochizuki's high school life suddenly took an interesting turn when he reunited with his childhood friend, Tsukimi Kawaru, whom he had a crush on since they were in elementary. Through a coincidence accident, he found out that Kawaru is actually a wolf girl, who couldn't control herself around him. Because Kawaru broke her promise of keeping herself in check, her sister, Utsuru, decided to pull her back home, but Mochizuki didn't like that idea and he came up with a solution to allow Kawaru to continue attending high school while keeping her identity a secret...

title: Giant Killing
genre: Award Winning, Comedy, Sports, Drama
author: Masaya Tsunamoto
synopsis:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing)
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

---
- In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.

title: Space Brothers
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Chuuya Koyama
synopsis:
One night in 2006, when they were young, the two brothers Mutta (born 1993) and Hibito (born 1996) saw what appeared to be a UFO heading for the moon. They decided that night to both become astronauts and travel out into space.  
  
In 2025, Hibito has become an astronaut, and he's going to go to the moon. Mutta ended up following a more traditional career path with an auto development company. However, Mutta just ruined his career through a violent altercation with his boss. Now, not only has he lost his job, he appears to be blacklisted in the entire industry. Maybe this is a rare opportunity for Mutta to once again chase his childhood dream and become an astronaut like his little brother!

title: Kasanegasane No Hatsukoi Desuga
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life
author: Arata Momori
synopsis: Hassaku Tamao came back to his hometown to teach and fulfill a promise he made when he was younger. However, he's not the only one who remembers a promise he made...

title: Enkan No Lapin
genre: Animals, Horror, Fantasy
author: Shiro Sanada
synopsis: The much-anticipated serialization of the popular SNS sensation "Rabbit × Miniature Garden × Dark Fantasy" begins!! With white ears, pale skin, and red eyes, Teddy the rabbit is shunned at the orphanage due to his unusual appearance. One day, he receives an invitation from someone claiming to be his father, leading him to a mysterious Western-style mansion. There, he meets Adele, someone who shares the same peculiar traits as him...

title: Sewayaki Kitsune No Senko-San
genre: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural
author: Rimukoro
synopsis:
Like many hardworking members of the workforce, Kuroto Nakano is perpetually stressed out by his job. Still, since he lives alone, he must carry on to sustain himself. Little do humans like Kuroto know, this stress takes the form of darkness residing within a person's body and will bring one's life to ruin.  
Fox deities can see this darkness and have the duty to save people before it is too late. To help rid Kuroto of his stress, Senko-san, an eight hundred-year-old foxgirl, volunteers to take care of him, and will do everything she can to ease the tension in his weary soul.

---

**Notes:**
- Despite initial serialization ending by November 2022, Comic Newtype announced on 9 February 2023 that the series would later resume publication.

title: The Male Leads Trapped in My House
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Post-Apocalyptic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Choba
synopsis:
I reincarnated as the heiress of a powerful conglomerate family in a novel.  
The problem is, this world is about to be destroyed by monstrous viruses.  

With nothing but money to spare, I quickly bought a mansion in the countryside to build a shelter to escape the monsters  
But the world ended far sooner than I had anticipated. Damn it!  

*  

On top of that, somehow, the male leads ended up trapped in my house with me.  
And these guys dont seem to have any intention of leaving.  
Why do they look like they have no plans to go to the female lead?  

Who exactly are you?  
You seem like someone who knew the world was going to end beforehand.  

They were full of questions about me, but I couldnt answer them. They wouldnt believe me anyway.  
Right now, all I see them as is a good source of labor.  

Alright, lets work. You need to earn your keep for what you eat!  

If I can find the cure for the virus causing the apocalypse, this hellish time will finally end.  
So, until then, Ill make use of the male leads and hang on!  

*  

But one problem has come up.  
It turns out that this old mansion I purchased is far more suspicious than I thought.  
What on earth is happening in my house?

title: Chilling Flame
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: In-Ho Kim
synopsis: "The world will become your enemy if you descend into Jianghu..." The young patriarch of a declining family, Baek Mujin, prepares for a journey into the outside world to restore his family's fortunes. Despite the foreseen future where the world will stand as his enemy, Mujin begins his lonely battle.

title: Kougekiryoku Zero Kara Hajimeru Kenseitan
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Misuho Kobota
synopsis: Although Eugene was blessed with an extraordinary talent for defensive magic, he had no talent for offensive magic. He is ridiculed as incompetent by those around him and enrolls in a magic academy to escape. However, his "useless" defensive magic came in handy there, and as expected, he was assigned to take care of the beautiful Demon King Erinyes, who once ruled the world...!?

title: 99 Boss
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Full Color
author: Jo-I Mun
synopsis: 99 Boss (meaning the best fighter among those born in 1999). The protagonist, Na Seon-wook, was born with the heart of a tiger. He was a troublemaker, but at the request of his parents, he hid his strength and transferred to Gukyang High School, a school located in a remote area that he thought would be quiet. However, it was a place where various old-fashioned cultures and dangerous people gathered. Seon-wook, who wanted to graduate quietly, eventually he couldnt help but feel his hot blood and began educating them!

title: Odette
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Haru Hiate
synopsis: A clumsy, but cheerful girl and her boyfriend (a cat?!)

title: Level 0 No Munou Tansakusha to Sagesumaretemo Jitsu Wa Sekai Saikyou Desu ~Tansaku Ranking 1-I Wa Nazo No Hito~
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ten
synopsis:
The weakest me, partying with two of the most powerful girls!?

After dungeons suddenly appeared on Earth, the concept of levels was inscribed on humanity. Levels were quantified, and as the law of the jungle became more and more prevalent, Level 0 Suzuki Hinata is the most discriminated against person in the world. Even though he's incompetent, he dreams of becoming a dungeon explorer, but for some reason Hinata suddenly becomes close to Kamui Hinata, a beautiful silver-haired girl with S-rank potential whom he meets at the high school he enrolls in?!

"Could the identity of the number one explorer be...?"

title: Arctic King
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Rong Yi
synopsis: The stars shift, the blizzard persists, the icy apocalypse is imminent, food! Temperature! Violence! Dependence! In this dilemma, under the distortion of human nature, has desire given birth to monsters? How to break out of adversity and find a way to survive!

title: Maou Gun Saikyou No Majutsushi Wa Ningen Datta
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ryousuke Hata
synopsis: Maou Armys strongest magician Im called. Ike, a demon capable of capturing a fort alone. Clearing away enemies with immense magic, he is without a doubt a monster held in awe by friend and foe. However he has a secret he cant tell other demons. I, actually am a human you know. Using modern knowledge to keep his secret, he became treated as a great commander and the driving force of the Maous army.

title: Ishuzoku Reviewers
genre: Monsters, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Amahara
synopsis:
In our world, the human race constantly debates about several important issues, such as: which girl is the best girl? How good is something as fapping material? 
Which fetish is the sexiest? And why your Waifu is the best while everyone else has shit taste... 

Accompany these great warriors as they present us with different girls, different opinions, different boners, showing us that their fantasy world may not be all that different from ours, 
as they analyze and meticulously review the most important thing of all: what they should put their **** in.

title: The Boy of Death
genre: Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Lyu
synopsis:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / ??](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)

title: May the Congressman Protect You
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Man-Dal
synopsis:
A fantastic duo of a political master and a complete novice!

Im Gu Yeongjin, a six-term congressman  the pinnacle of South Koreas political world, the nations hope!
One fateful day in 2008, betrayed by my closest aides, I faced a special investigation and chose to end my own life.
When I opened my eyes it was Seoul, 10 years in the past?!

Now a ghost, no one can see me or hear my voice.
No one... except one person, Cha Jaerim, a 25-year-old Level 9 civil servant.

No connections, no money, stuck in miserable circumstances...
But look at that ambition, that fire in his eyes... I like it! Fine. Ill make him my partner.

You need to go into politics.

And Ill get my revenge.

A political genius ghost, Gu Yeongjin, teams up with a clueless rookie, Cha Jaerim, for the ultimate combo in
<May the Congressman Protect You>

title: Demon King of the Royal Class
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Daon Studio
synopsis:
Upon dying, the author of "The Demon King is Dead" is given two choices: go to hell or be reborn in his novel and survive till the end.

The problem? He's reborn as Baalier Junior, a weak demon prince, after his realm was conquered! To make things worse, his attempt to escape somehow gets him enrolled as a student of the Royal Class in Gradias Temple, a prestigious human school.

In the midst of plotlines and political schemes, can this author keep his identity a secret and reach a happy ending?

title: The Youngest Is Preventing the End of the World
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: RED
synopsis:
"The stupid youngest one, the one who doesn't know how to do anything, but causes trouble with her cute face."

Exasperated, I looked in the mirror once again and exclaimed, "Why am I the 'stupid youngest one' Diana Cartier!"

In the novel *The Ending Can't Be the Destruction of the World*, Diana is an evil woman who repeatedly commits evil deeds and is brainwashed by the villain, contributing greatly to the destruction of the world! If something could go wrong for the villainess, it will. But when something went wrong for me, I recalled my past life instead? As an ordinary college student in my past life, I made up my mind when I realized that I had been reincarnated as Diana Cartier, the villainess in the novel.

"The world is going to end. But I'm not going to let it happen."

Yes, I will prevent the end of the world with my own hands! And save my brothers from the conspiracy at the same time! Wait a minute. What's that pitch black thing sprawled out on the floor over there? Wait. That face, where have I seen it before? 

'Is that Linus del Stein?!'

Why are you lying there, Mr. Protagonist of the novel who will destroy this world?

Diana and her brothers are trying their best to stop the end of the world! And cute animals and other stuff? Our sweet youngest is preventing the end of the world, get out of the way!

title: IM in Love with My Foe
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: AX
synopsis: Not found

title: Senpai Ga Uzai Kouhai No Hanashi
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Shiromanta
synopsis:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

---
