title: Noah'S Notes
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Mystery, Gyaru
author: Haruto Ikezawa
synopsis: Professor Noah Minami Umberbach is not your average archeologist! For one, he's prone to whipping out his gun and blowing up stuff to make dramatic entrances. But that's just his eccentric nature. He's actually a man on a mission. A mission that may very well be the most important mission of all time. And he's dragging history-hating student Kotobuki Mirai along for the ride!

title: Golden Light Gratia, the Child Loved by God
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Mystery
author: Hui-Jo
synopsis:
Gratia, a girl considered useless and despised by her family, has a revealing dream where a mysterious man predicts a great future for her. She soon discovers that she is the lost daughter of the influential Luciffero family. In a surprising event, after being attacked, a golden light erupts from Gratia, forcing everyone around her to close their eyes.

When the light dissipates, young Gratia disappears and in her place an adult version of herself appears, with distinct features of Luciffero. With an imposing stature and undeniable beauty, she comes across Nea, her mother, and realizes that the transformation expected for the future happened that day.

This was the moment when ten-year-old Gratia and twenty-year-old Gratia switched bodies for the first time.

title: Kono Oto Tomare!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Music
author: Amyuu Sakura
synopsis: Since the graduation of the senior members of the club, Takezou ends up being the sole member of the "Koto" (traditional Japanese string instrument) club. Now that the new school year has begun, Takezou will have to seek out new members for the club, or the club will be terminated. Out of nowhere, a new member barges into the near-abandoned club room, demanding to join the club. How will Takezou be able to keep his club alive and deal with this rascal of a new member?

title: The Male Leads Were Stolen by an Extra
genre: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Choelotte
synopsis:
A woman who has lost her male leads to an extra who did not appear in the original story... That's me.

Selonia fell into a coma on the way back from defeating the Demon King. After wandering through death for several months, she survived, but what? 

I want you to break off the engagement. I want to hurry up to marry Grace. 

I want you to pretend my knights oath to you didn't happen. 

Give me back my heart. Ill give it to Grace. 

The fiancé who was the male lead, the paladin and the dragon who were the sub-male leads, and the fellows all turned away. These reckless bastards! There was a lot of cursing, but what can I do to stop it? I was trying to start a new life in a cool way. By the way 

Do you know me? 

How is the dead demon king alive? 

What, I dont know

No, you know me. tell me Who am I? 

To make matters worse, the Demon King, who has no memory, sticks to my side and does not leave. Inevitably, I tried my best to prevent the return of the Demon King. 

How can I always hold your hand? 

Why is it not enough to spit out vulgar words? 

Are you going to kill all those who left you? Just speak. 

Hes even going to kill the male leads for me!

title: Game Master
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Dung-Chi
synopsis:
Amid a repetitive and boring everyday life, a game appeared as if it were fate - "Heroes Destiny". After spending ten years playing it, I finally completed the game, but all that remained was the emptiness of having to return to an ordinary life. At that moment, a message appeared on the screen:

"Do you desire a new adventure?"

[Yes/No]

Little did I know that I would wake up in an unfamiliar body and an unknown place.

"Remember, I am now Calix Shaekin."

And thus

"I will become the protagonist of this world!"

title: Urasekai Picnic
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Girls' Love, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Eita Mizuno
synopsis: The story is set in the modern world, but there exist doors that can take people to the "other side," where strange urban legends and internet stories prove to be true. College student Sorawo Kamikoshi finds herself exploring one of these doors, and almost dies on the other side, when she is rescued by another girl named Toriko Nishina. Toriko is a mysterious girl, but very skilled with a gun, and she seems to be searching for someone else on the other side. Together, both girls start to explore these doors to the other side.

title: Kirio Fanclub
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Chikyuno Osakana Ponchan
synopsis: Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani are two high school girls who often find themselves talking about a boy in their class, Kirio. This lighthearted romantic comedy follows the daily lives of these two friends and rivals on a journey that, for now, seems to be heading everywhere but love.

title: Yani Neko
genre: Psychological, Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Nyan Nyan Factory
synopsis: A chain-smoking catgirl struggles with her cigarette addiction.

title: Mitakihara Anti-Materials
genre: Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Myama
synopsis: Due to a slight misunderstanding, Homura begins her cohabitation with Mami. But in slice-of-life, everything turns out better than expected.

title: Chairman Kang, the New Employee
genre: Long Strip, Adventure, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Seung-i Seung
synopsis:
Im Kang Yong-ho, the Chairman of Choi Sung Group, one of South Koreas top 10 conglomerates.
Just when I was basking in the glory of my retirement declaration, out of the blue, a new employee fell from the sky and landed on my head. But hey, whered my body go, and now Ive turned into a new Employee?!

Whats this? Are you telling me to start with Excel or something?

title: Shuujin Tensei
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Itoman
synopsis: Chris, caught in a suicide bombing carried out by escaped death row inmates, finds himself reincarnated in a world of swords and magic. Determined not to lead another miserable life, he resolves to make the most of his innate special abilities. However, he soon discovers that the death row inmates have also been reincarnated into this world...!?

title: Akebi-Chan No Sailor Fuku
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Hiro
synopsis: The setting is Roubai Private Academy, a prestigious girls middle school in the country. For Akebi Komichi, donning this schools sailor uniform is a dream come true. Her middle school dream life is finally beginning! Verdant open countryside vistas. The slowly flowing time of youth. With a gentle touch, the genius artist Hiro brings you this simple school tale now enrolling!

title: Ninja to Koroshiya No Futarigurashi
genre: Ninja, Slice of Life
author: Hamburger
synopsis: Many fatalities?! A naive female ninja and a high school assassin live together in an unpredictable way! A naive female ninja who escapes from a ninja village meets a high school girl assassin!? Their life together, which begins by chance, is full of danger (and excitement)...!

title: Mission: Yozakura Family
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy
author: Hitsuji Gondaira
synopsis:
Taiyo Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyoichiro. What drastic steps will Taiyo have to take to save Mutsumi?!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Mission: Yozakura Family** (2023)
- [English volumes (Viz Media)](https://www.viz.com/mission-yozakura-family)

title: Kaminaki Sekai No Kamisama Katsudou
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Genderswap, Loli, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Gyaru
author: Aoi Akashiro
synopsis: Yukito, the son of a questionable cult leader, lost his life due to the cult's ridiculous training practices. Now to his surprise, he was reincarnated into another world! It was an ideal world for him without the concept of "God" or "religion" BUT...!

title: Hangyaku No Yuusha ~Skill Wo Tsukatte Haraguro Oujo No Kokoro to Karada Wo Shouakuseyo~
genre: Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Sora Mochi
synopsis:
When Sasahara Shinta was suddenly summoned to another world with the objective of subjugating the Demon Lord, he makes full use of his cheat skill that sees peoples status and tries taking a look at the Princess who summoned him, but when he did, it says that the Hero is arranged to be assassinated after the Demon Lords subjugation.

Thats right, this is a shitty otherworld where the Heros life is treated like dirt!

To avoid being assassinated, Shinta pretends to submit, but

title: Black Serpent
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Angyeongal
synopsis: In the final battle against the Demon Cult, the Black Serpent leader Jeonghwa was betrayed by the Murim Alliance, losing all her comrades. Barely surviving, she swears to eliminate both the Demon Cult and the Murim Alliance who drove her comrades to their deaths. Heavens! If justice truly exists grant me the opportunity to avenge my fallen comrades!

title: Beneath the Lady'S Mask
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Xingya Zhu
synopsis:
Mother always said to Qinran: "Your stepfather is from a famous family, your eldest brother is a genius, and your sister is a top student in her high school. You, a country bumpkin, don't embarrass them."

Everyone with status in the capital received a warning from Mr. Juan of the Cheng family: "Mr. Juan's wife is from the countryside and doesn't understand our current situation, and she has a bad temper. In short, everyone should be extra patient."

Until one day, when Master Juan was investigating a certain big boss, his men fell into a confused silence while looking at one of the waistcoats of his sister-in-law who claimed to know nothing

title: Astral Pet Store
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Bukun Zhou
synopsis:
In the era of astral pets, only the might of pets was essential! However, making the pets stronger has always been a slow and arduous process for pet warriors. That was until the appearance of a mysterious pet shop that changed everything!

The weakest skeleton could slay a great golden dragon with a single strike after training at this pet shop! Even the humble watchdog of the shop possessed ten legendary skills, and the female worker in the shop claimed to be a Goddess...

As for what the shopkeeper Su Ping thinks: I'm merely training these cute pets to become exceptional overlord beasts. What? Is it not normal?
- - -
In the era of beasts, pet strength determines everything! The battle pet master works hard and slowly to improve the strength of the pet. Until a mysterious pet store came out of nowhere!

In just a few days of cultivation, the lowly skeleton can kill the golden dragon with a single slash. Does the guard dog have ten secret skills of pet beats? The working girl even calls herself a god...

As for the owner, Su Ping: Isn't it a regular practice to breed cute pets into prehistoric king beasts?

title: Undead Unluck
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Zombies, Martial Arts, Drama, Supernatural
author: Yoshifumi Tozuka
synopsis:
As an UNLUCKY girl prepares to face her death, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Vicious, violent and buck naked! An unprecedented picaresque hero appears in Shonen Jump!  
  
- Winner of the 2020 Tsugimanga award.

title: Mashou No Otome No Yakumawari
genre: Girls' Love, School Life
author: Sasuke
synopsis: Kairan Girls' Academy. A boarding school rich with history and tradition, attended only by orphans. It has a special system in which students are given "roles" that align with their individual goals. Hanako Shimura, a kind-hearted girl filled with dreams and expectations, enrolls into the academy hoping to make friends with everyone at school. But will she be able to?

title: Torano Tantei Jimusho E Youkoso
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
author: Yodaka Kuroi
synopsis: Due to a string of bad luck, Yano Kaisei is without a home, a job, or money. He happens to stumble upon a job posting for a live-in position at a detective agency, but the employer is Torano Jiu, a mighty tiger beastman! After Yano Kaisei starts working at the detective agency, his day-to-day includes juggling work duties and taking care of Toranos niece, Yui A romantic comedy between a Beastman x Human!

title: A Tidal Wave of Glory
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: SMBRYMS
synopsis: Halo, the best musician of the time, suffers a traffic accident on the way to the Grammy ceremony. And when he regains consciousness, he finds himself in the body of a little Korean boy named No Hae-il. He finds himself in a completely different place and time. He confirms that No Hae-il's English name is Halo and feels a strong destiny. Halo, who entered Hae-il, proves to be a musical genius at this time as well.

title: Sometimes Even Reality Is a Lie!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Crossdressing, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Niichi
synopsis: Kaoru Terasaki is a gamer whos into MMORPGs, and hes finally meeting up with someone hes been friends with in-game for a long whilethis time, offline and in person. Hes worried that his friend will be disappointed to see Kaoru is a guy, unlike his female character in the game. But hes the one whos in for a surprise when, instead of another guy, his friend turns out to be a cute girl, Nanami Osaka. On top of that, Nanami told her parents that she would be bringing a friend overa female friend. Even worse, Nanamis dad is the super overprotective type who wont allow any guys near his daughter. Theres only one solution to this dilemma: Kaoru has to cross-dress as a girl! Will Kaorus efforts pay off in the end?! Will Kaoru and Nanami remain just friends, or will their time together IRL change everything? Follow their romantic-comedy adventures to find out!

title: Blue Giant Supreme
genre: Drama, Slice of Life, Music
author: Shinichi Ishizuka
synopsis:
After leaving his mark on Japan, Dai is taking on Europe!

Direct continuation of Blue Giant, a manga about the evolution of the young saxophonist Dai Miyamoto in the jazz world. Blue Giant Supreme sees our protagonist travel to Europe. Having just arrived in Munich, without being able to speak a word of German and with just average English, he manages to secure a roof over his head, food and drink, but struggles to get the most important thing: a place where he can have his music heard.
 
A whole new element added on top of the enthralling story that enchants every music lover: the discovery of a new culture. Dai will travel all over Europe, from Germany to France, accompanied by his instrument, growing as a musician and a person in the process of fulfilling his dream of becoming the best in the world.


[Official Site](https://bluegiant.jp/)

title: Daigaku Nyuugakuji Kara Uwasa Sareteita Bishoujo San Shimai, Ikiwakareteita Gimai Datta.
genre: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Kosuzume
synopsis: The three sisters, once clingy and needy as children, have now grown into beautiful young womenand for some reason, they've developed a strong possessive streak! This youth romance-comedy kicks off as they reunite, and the beautiful trio start competing for attention!

title: Kekkon Surutte, Hontou Desu Ka
genre: Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Tamiki Wakaki
synopsis: Takuya and Rika are co-workers for a travel agency and have barely ever interacted as they are both introverted, anti-social people. Both are doing their jobs as normal when an announcement from the higher-ups comes down: in one year, an overseas branch will be opening in Siberia, and an employee from their location will be sent to work there! While there's no telling who will be chosen to go, it is explained that people who are married and have families are far less likely to be sent! Neither Takuya nor Rika want to go to Siberia! Desperate to protect their solitary lives, they develop a plan: pretend that they are getting married to each other! Will they be able to keep up this charade for 365 days, and, maybe, even fall for one another in that time?

title: Mikadono Sanshimai Wa Angai, Choroi.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life
author: Aya Hirakawa
synopsis: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!

title: Dead Dead Demon'S Dededede Destruction
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Office Workers, Military, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Aliens, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Inio Asano
synopsis:
Large mysterious alien ships have been looming above Japanese towns for three years, filling the sky. Everything changed three years ago. And yet, nothing has changed. No weapon used against the invaders' ships had any success, beyond destroying part of Japan and leaving its economy in shambles. JSDF is fighting a guerrilla battle against the aliens all over Japan. America is joining the 'war' effort with more aggressive tactics, dividing Japan over the pacifist principle laid out in Article 9 of the Japanese constitution. But this may just be the mundane story of young high schoolers.

"No matter what happens, I won't back down. At least not until this world filled with lies and deceit crumbles away. The real threat to humankind is not invaders, but me."
___
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga** 
- **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2022**

title: God of Blackfield
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Crime, Martial Arts, Military, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Insung Shin
synopsis:
Who am I?!  
  
Leaving only black soot and dead bodies in his wake, Kang Chan, the God of Blackfield, struck fear into the hearts of his enemies.

But one day, in the chaos of battle, his life was abruptly snuffed out.

Ive been shot but the bullet came from behind me!

Revived three years later, this god is now a wimpy high schooler with major problems  savage bullies, shady business dealings, and even girls.

Revenge seemed like a straight shot, but high school is a battlefield all of its own!

title: Yamada-Kun to Lv999 No Koi Wo Suru
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Mashiro
synopsis:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?
___
The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.

title: Project Yuriforming!
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Aliens
author: Kaeru Ouchi
synopsis: Yuri addict and alien Lily runs out of stimulus and decides to get involved with humans to create "real yuri"

title: Dating to Survive
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Tae-Hyeon Park
synopsis:
The exorcist fell in love with me, a ghost...?!

A survival love story of a ghost who resorted to a false confession to survive from the exorcist.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: the Revival of Zeon - Remnant One
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Tragedy
author: Kazuhisa Kondo
synopsis: In U.C. 0092 the "Cerberus Squadron," of Newborn Neo Zeon a Newtype unit led by Brown and Meyer are ordered to capture Fifth Luna.

title: Ouji-Sama No Tomodachi
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Sukeroku
synopsis:
I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!

title: Omniscient Reader'S Viewpoint
genre: Award Winning, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: UMI
synopsis: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.

title: Heaven Official'S Blessing
genre: Historical, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Mo Xiang Tong Xiu
synopsis:
Eight hundred years ago, the pure-blooded and noble Crown Prince, Xie Lian, was a well-regarded child of heaven with unlimited boundaries. However, who knew that after ascending, achieving immortality and becoming a Martial God that thousands of people worshipped, that his life would only go downhill. He was demoted and fell down the ranks until he reached rock bottom.  
  
Eight hundred years later, Xie Lian has ascended once again, but this time he has neither the followers nor any incense burned in his name. One day, on his way back from collecting trash, he picks up a mysterious youth and takes him home. This particular youth however, actually turns out to be Hua Cheng, the infamous Ghost King known throughout the three realms who could change both his gender and appearance at the flip of a dime.  
  
NOTE: Heaven Official's Blessing has been re-released on bilibili from the prologue with some special extras due to the original release not being very coherent unless you've read its source material (novel). This is the new version.

title: Tonari No Seki No Yatsu Ga Souiu Me De Mitekuru
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: mmk
synopsis: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?

title: Utsuranain Desu
genre: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Ruka Konoshima
synopsis: A high school boy who sees things that shouldn't be there encounters an enthusiastic girl from the occult research club. (Manga Mogura)

title: Class No Daikirai Na Joshi to Kekkon Suru Koto Ni Natta
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Mosskonbu
synopsis:
High school student Hojo Saito married his classmate, Sakuramori Akane, the girl who's his worst enemy in school.

"If you tell the rest of the class were married, I'll kill you."
"I don't want them to know either. Theres no point in that."

Their newlywed life wasn't going so well, and they were constantly at odds. However, as they progress through their daily lives, the distance between them closes, they have more enjoyable moments together, and they gradually come to understand one another. Saito learns about Akane's cute side, which he never saw before, and Akane gradually began to recognize the feelings that shes been keeping inside...

title: Kameba Kamu Hodo Amaku Naru
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Nao Hinachi
synopsis: Akari is a high school girl full of curiosity that lives surrounded by her favorite people and things. She leads an exciting life, and thanks to a strange turn of events, she becomes interested in the Disinterested Prince (Kyoumi LESS Ouji), a boy that doesnt show any interest in people or things in general. And although he said "Isn't it just annoying to get involved with strangers? He sometimes looks lonely, making Hikaris desire to know more about his world grow

title: Houkago Play
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
author: Rendou Kurosaki
synopsis:
In the Houkago Play Series:  
  
V.1: 4-koma about a high-school gamer and his bossy but tsundere girlfriend.  
V.2: About a gamer and his mangaka girlfriend.  
V.3: About a boy and a girl who are both gamers, though they play with different styles.  
V.4: R  
V.5: High Heels  
V.6: Maniax  
V.7: High Heels 2  
V.8: High Heels 3

title: Salaryman Ga Isekai Ni Ittara Shitennou Ni Natta Hanashi
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls
author: Benigashira
synopsis:
Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman, who one day is run over by an elderly lady on a scooter and left in the street to die. When he regained consciousness he discovers he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. 

Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?

title: Tanaka-Kun Wa Itsumo Kedaruge
genre: Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Nozomi Uda
synopsis: Sighing, leaning on his elbows, sleepy eyes. Tanaka-kun is a boy that basically doesn't try but isn't disliked. This is a laid-back youth comedy about Tanaka-kun and the quiet Oota who can't leave him alone.

title: Burning Kabaddi
genre: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Hajime Musashino
synopsis:
The story centres on first-year high school student Tatsuya Yoigoshi, a former ace soccer player who dislikes sports. 
He gets invited to join the team for an Indian contact sport called Kabaddi. 
He scoffs at the idea at first but becomes interested after watching a kabaddi practice.

title: Miniamaru Kareshi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life
author: Mizuki Hoshino
synopsis: Iroha Aoyagi is a normal 16 year old girl, except, she's never fallen in love. She suspects there might be something wrong with her; until she meets her classmate Kusakabe-kun who seems well-versed and cynical about matters of love. Will Iroha be able to handle someone like Kusakabe-kun?

title: The Day of Salvation
genre: Psychological, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Horror, Tragedy
author: Nishioka Kyoudai
synopsis:
Nishioka Kyoudai's anti-war epic, told in their signature surrealist style.   
  
A man wakes up one morning to find the world outside of his house a wasteland. As he searches for signs of life, he finds a fetus in a ditch, which promptly latches onto his thumb and won't let go, and things only get stranger from there

title: Watashi Wo Koroshita Wankokei Kishi-Sama Ga, Yandere Ni Job Change Shite Kyou Mo Inochi Wo Nerattekuru
genre: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Yuzushiwo
synopsis:
Tiana's engagement was broken off by the prince of her own country, and she was sentenced to exile. However, the knight of a neighbouring country, who was an aide to that country's prince, suddenly proposed to her. Since he was her type, Tiana accepted the marriage proposal and traveled with him to his country, but what awaited her was an unjust death. However, although she should have died, Tiana finds herself back when her engagement was broken and she was proposed to by the knight!

"Now... Now it's too late... I'll have to kill her."

The last words the knight spoke before killing her lingered in her mind. But Tiana doesn't want to die again! Terrified, she tries to refuse the marriage proposal, but she can't escape from the knight who has gone completely crazy! A cat-and-mouse rom-com about Tiana, whose memories construe murderous intent, and a knight who refuses to let her escape and gets more and more yandere...

---
[Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7132gu/) (R18)

title: Ts Akuyaku Reijou Kamisama Tensei Zen'Nin Tsuihou Haishin Rta ~Kiraware Tsuihou End O Mezashiteru No Ni Saikyou Musou Road Kara Orirarenai~
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Sayuki
synopsis:
A man who lost his life in an accident is reincarnated into an otome game world with a mission given by gods who want entertainment. And the background story in the game is that she is incarnated as a villain princess character, which turns out to be a good person but she is instead exiled after that the game will be speedrun and streamed!? He was told the sooner he was exiled the more benefits he would get in the next life, along with the start of the game he invited all the characters to fight so he could be exiled quickly, but instead, he was invincible and became a popular person... !?

Respected by the original protagonist, a handsome aristocrat makes the main character his goal and he is trained by a cheat class, in the end, this otome game deviates from the original story too!! She's gradually getting ready to get the ending of being exiled, but the event of death always comes to her.. as the daughter of a marquis marianne biesround who is fighting for her next life, she will destroy all those who stand in her way (and blow them away) with magic. strongest, meteor! The manga adaptation of the violent webnovel otome game has begun!!!

title: Kage No Jitsuryokusha Ni Naritakute! Shadow Gaiden
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magic, Harem, Isekai, 4-Koma, Fantasy
author: Seta U
synopsis:
An official spin-off of the the super famous fantasy "The Eminence in Shadow".  
OP main character × isekai reincarnation × misunderstandings!? This is the beginning of a spin-off of the super-famous web novel isekai fantasy "The eminence in Shadow".  
Cid is a boy who reincarnated in another world, and decided to enjoy a scenario of being "the eminence in shadow, someone who meddles with the story from the shadows, and exhibits his true power in secrecy". Thus unfolds the story of him and the secret organization he leadsshadow gardenas well their their pleasant friends! An easy-going 4-koma manga starts right here and now!

title: Star-Crafter
genre: Anthology, Adventure, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Kenji Morita
synopsis: Consists of several short, poetic stories revolving around themes of love, childhood, and introspection. With her intricate, cut-out line drawings and sensitive style, Nakano immerses us in a world of hauntingly nostalgic beauty, blending everyday struggles with a touch of fantasy. The stories include that of a woman who applies makeup to conceal her beauty from the eyes of other men, reserving herself for her lover; an author who discovers an elf in his garden; and a little boy who encounters a fantastical being capable of controlling the stars. These are all small, captivating tales to be savored slowly. A carefully crafted collection of stories, where each word and illustration is infused with poetry.

title: Otogi Matsuri
genre: Action, Romance, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Junya Inoue
synopsis:
The manga starts off with a very odd killing. Then, it jumps to a few days later where Yousuke ends up breaking a small shrine. It later gives him the guardian Suzaku - just in time too, for he must face the murderer that opened the manga.

Note: Retail links are for the New Edition which has 8 volumes instead of 12.

title: Dorohedoro
genre: Action, Psychological, Comedy, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Q Hayashida
synopsis:
This is the story of Kaiman, a guy who does not remember who he was before he was transfigured by a Magic user. 
This transformation left him with a reptile's head, and a desire to find out the truth about who he really is. 
Accompanied by Nikaido, his female companion, he tracks down Magic Users in "The Hole" and unceremoniously 
chomps down on their head, hoping to find out who it was that put him in this state. 
One by one, they witness this "second man" inside the head of Kaiman, and after pulling them back out of his mouth 
he asks them all a question "What did the guy inside my head say?"  


---

title: Zatch Bell!!
genre: Award Winning, Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Makoto Raiku
synopsis:
Every 1000 years, 100 demon children are sent to Earth to compete in a battle to become king of the Demon World. Each demon is paired with a human partner who is given a spell book of a specific color. The human can cast the demon's spells through their book. If a demon's book is burned, they disappear and return to the Demon World. The last demon remaining becomes the king. The show is oriented around Gash Bell and his human partner, Takamine Kiyomaro.  
  
---
- **Won the 48th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen**

title: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-Go De Dereru Tonari No Alya-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Sunsunsun
synopsis:
"? ?? ???? ???? ?????? ????????..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever shes badmouthing me but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and thats why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!

title: Fushigi No Mayuri-San
genre: Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Pan
synopsis:
Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons.
The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl.
She's mysterious but is popular with everyone.  
This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.

title: Alice-San Chi No Iroribata
genre: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Bunta Kinami
synopsis:
After ten years, Alice returns to her hometown from Tokyo to live alone in a traditional Japanese house with a sunken hearth. Harumi, her childhood friend, nervously meets her again after such a long time, but the warmth of the hearth with Alice is just as warm as it was in the past...

Next to the hearth in Miss Alice's house, let's have a leisurely meal together.

title: Kami No Fune De Nemuru
genre: Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Tragedy
author: Teki Yatsuda
synopsis: Kitahara Kei is a screenwriter whose prodigious talent is taking the world by storm, but the people on whom he models his protagonists invariably end up dead. Dismayed by the misfortunes piling up in his wake, he abandons the pen and falls into dissipation, spending his days drinking in underground bars. One night when Kei is drunk and collapsed in the street, he is approached by a young amateur photographer named Youichi. Kei finds himself irresistibly drawn to Youichis ever-changing expressions, his radiantly pure smile, and sometimes sultry gaze Being with Youichi, Kei finds the words spilling out of him once more, and yet he knows that he will only bring misfortune to Youichi

title: Isekai Nonbiri Nouka
genre: Monsters, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kinosuke Naitou
synopsis: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.

title: Mayonaka Heart Tune
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Masakuni Igarashi
synopsis:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)

title: Hirayasumi
genre: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Keigo Shinzo
synopsis: 29-year-old freeter Ikuta Hiroto is a carefree young man without a love life, regular job, or any real worries about the future. He inherits an old house from the neighbourhood granny, where his 18-year-old cousin, Natsumi moves in with him to study art in Tokyo. This is a story about Hiroto and the people around him who struggle with life.

title: Whisper Me a Love Song
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music
author: Eku Takeshima
synopsis: Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and, to Himaris surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what love really means

title: Watashi Ga Shinde Manzoku Desu Ka?
genre: Psychological, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: abatamo
synopsis:
Countess Rorona Ryus died in an accident. 

The news came the day after her fiancé, Bellveut, called off their engagement. Rorona was accused of mistreating her sister, a crime she had no right to be accused of, but she accepted the blame without hesitation. 

She was found dead in an overturned carriage on a suburban street, her face smashed in.

When Rorona's sister learned of her death, she was delighted. "Bellveut is now mine," she said. Bellveut laughed. "I wish she had died sooner." 

But they did not know that Rorona's death would bring them more than just good fortune....

title: Musume No Shinshitsu
genre: Loli, Psychological, Incest, Sexual Violence, Drama, Mystery
author: Tearontaron
synopsis: He had sex with his own daughter-though, of course, only in a dream. Goto, a university lecturer, had seemingly built a happy family: a beautiful wife who is a painter and lovely, talented children... But that happiness was merely a facade. During the day, he suspected his wife of infidelity, and at night, he was tormented by nightmares, gradually wearing down his mental stability. One day, Goto returned home to find his room in chaos and his daughter in tears. Convinced that his wife was to blame, Goto vows to protect his beloved family...!?

title: Betrayal of Dignity
genre: Historical, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Bo-Gyeong Gong
synopsis:
Would you sacrifice your honor to marry a Duke?

In order to save her family from ruin, Chloe Verdier must find a groom for her sister, Alice. 

She soon runs into the handsome but arrogant Duke Thisse who makes a proposal that could save them.

When Alice flees with a mysterious man, Chloe must seek out the Duke in the biggest gamble of her life.

title: Rule Ihan Wa Iku Made H!?: Osananajimi to Doukyo Hajimemashita
genre: Romance, Office Workers
author: rera
synopsis:
Yuki decided to live alone when she got a job.  
  
However due to a mistake in the contract she has to live with Keita, her childhood friend!  
  
The two of them then established a set of rules for their cohabitation life together but there's a penalty if one break the rules!  
  
What's the penalty?!

title: 303-Goushitsu No Kami-Sama
genre: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Funi-Mu 9
synopsis:
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/24367326/series/236717)

title: Wistoria: Wand and Sword
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Gore, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Fujino Oomori
synopsis: The new, magical dungeon-adventure fantasy series from the author of Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Seeking to fulfill a promise to a childhood friend, Will Serfort enters Regarden Magical Academy with the goal of making it to the top of the magical world. Theres just one problem: he cant use magic! Will his sword skills be the key to unlocking his true potential?

title: Random Chat
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Eun-Hyeok Park
synopsis:
Joonwoo hates school and has trouble making friends. The only time he's happy is when he's talking to strangers on the Random Chatting phone app. That's how Joonwoo ends up befriending a girl on RanChat who turns out to be his classmate Sungah but she has no idea about it! Will Joonwoo be able to fight his social anxiety and become closer to her in real life?  

---

title: Samurai Akiyama
genre: Samurai, Web Comic
author: Ao Sakura
synopsis: Not found

title: Kyou, Eki De Mita Kawaii Onna No Ko.
genre: Comedy, Crossdressing, Slice of Life
author: Kouji Sakana
synopsis: Kameyama, a middle-aged man, can't help but notice what the pretty girl he sees at the train station is wearing. That Milbon scent is loved by all of mankind! This glittering case is from Sebon Star! That glowing skin... isn't a treatment, just a highlight! Which brand's cosmetics wear off, and which ones last? "I wanna know all about it!" he thinks to himself. Many of those "young lady things" he's become obsessed with now, appear before him!

title: Tate No Yuusha No Nariagari
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Kyu Aiya
synopsis:
Naofumi Iwatani, an uncharismatic Otaku who spends his days on games and manga, suddenly finds himself summoned to a parallel universe! He discovers he is one of four heroes equipped with legendary weapons and tasked with saving the world from its prophesied destruction.  
As the Shield Hero, the weakest of the heroes, all is not as it seems. Naofumi is soon alone, penniless, and betrayed. With no one to turn to, and nowhere to run, he is left with only his shield. Now, Naofumi must rise to become the legendary Shield Hero and save the world!

title: I Am a Hero
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Kengo Hanazawa
synopsis:
(from ebookjapan):

The series has sold over 8.3 million copies! The gold standard of zombie manga, "I Am a Hero," is now available in a "complete edition" with a new cover design, reprinted color pages from the serialization, and over 80 pages of new artwork in the final 22 volumes! Witness the new ending of the story. 

He is 35 year old who spends his time as an assistant to a mangaka, sometimes escaping into delusion in order to win over the agonizing reality. One day, however, a mysterious infection begins to spread without him noticing...and the real world begins to break down...? 

He wanders into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary, the mundane and the insane intersect. A personal survival panic horror story! 

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/25-142/I-Am-a-Hero-Omnibus-Volume-1-TPB)

title: Abandoned: the Hero Who'S so Strong He Breaks Every Weapon, and the Elf Weaponsmith
genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Nawoya Iwata
synopsis: An elf weaponsmith meets a hero who's so strong every weapon shatters in his hands after a single use.

title: Yomuin-San Wa Yuusha Ja Arimasen Node
genre: Monsters, Animals, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Jinpei  Tanaka
synopsis:
A certain girl genius with more power than knowledge accidentally summoned dozens of students and teachers into a dangerous world filled with beasts and magic, but the protagonist isnt a student or the homeroom teacher its the janitor.

At the time of their summoning, the students and teachers each gained a power formed from their soul, but not the janitor. As the janitor was about to be bestowed with a power that would protect him, his power was forcibly taken from him by an arrogant student. Having gone three years without a contract extension, he failed to get a job after having graduated from a third-rate university. Somehow he is still a contractor at 25 years old and was a janitor for 2 years, with a take-home monthly salary of less than ¥120,000. From a society that rejected him, he was thrust into a world that rejected him. And what janitor-san wished from the Goddess who took pity on him was

title: Long Live the King
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Xiaolin
synopsis:
An ordinary student accidentally traveled into another universe and became the king of a small kingdom.   
  
He had gotten a Cheating Code of life and was able to complete something extraordinary.   
  
This is the story about a king that was able to conquer continents and leave behind him an ultimate legend that will be recited between every generation to come.   
  
The MC also travels to the world of Diablo 2, but it seemed a bit too real to be just a video game. People in that world are living their life, death permeates. There are evil machinations at play here.  
  
To find out why he was sent to this world, look as he unravels the secrets in the story.

title: Fruits Basket
genre: Award Winning, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Natsuki Takaya
synopsis:
Tohru Honda, an orphaned high school girl, is taken in by the wealthy Shigure Sohma when he realizes she has nowhere else to go. However, the Sohma family shares a secret, and it isn't long before Tohru discovers that there's a reason why her classmates, Yuki and Kyo Sohma, never let girls get near them, and never talk about their lives before they lived with Shigure. And before she knows it, Tohru has become so tangled up in the lives of each member of the Sohma family that she couldn't leave even if she wanted to.  
  
As she learns more and more about the truth of the Sohma family and the nature of their secrets, she desperately searches for a way that she can save them. But what can one girl do, especially when it seems that she may have been part of someone's plan all along  
  
[Official English](https://yenpress.com/9780316360166/fruits-basket-collectors-edition-vol-1/)

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shojo in 2001**
- **Attained the Guinness World Record for Best-Selling Shojo Manga**

title: Yuzukawa-San Wa, Sasshite Hoshii.
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Shinta Sakayama
synopsis: Kushima-kun has just started going out with his classmate Yuzukawa Kururi. But Yuzukawa-san is not good at expressing her emotions, so she wants Kushima-kun to understand her feelings...?  This is a new kind of romantic comedy about two people who are "already dating" instead of "not together yet."

title: Mazin Saga
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Mecha, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Gou Nagai
synopsis:
MazinSaga is a manga written and produced by Go Nagai between 1990 and 1998; currently incomplete and up to the sixth volume, it's the summa of Nagai's works, for the complexity of the plot and the treated thematic content.  
Mazinsaga tells the story of the young Koji Kabuto, university student who finds himself having to collect the fruit of the researches of his father, physicist of world-wide reputation who died in mysterious circumstances.  
The boy is thus given a powerful artifact, Mazinger Z, the Armor of God.

title: Medalist
genre: Award Winning, Sports, Drama
author: Ikada Tsuruma
synopsis:
There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

---

title: Onee-Chan No Midori-Kun
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Amu Meguro
synopsis: The manga centers on Sui, a girl in her third year of junior high. She doesn't really get along with her older sister's boyfriend, Midori-kun, since he always treats her like a kid and makes fun of her. But Midori-kun is suddenly asked to be Sui's home tutor.

title: Kaijuu No Hanataba
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Shini Amahana
synopsis: New life love with a quirky guy she met at the share house she moved into, and the cohabitation romance begins....

title: Peep
genre: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, School Life
author: Meguru Ueno
synopsis: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.

title: Boys Over Flowers
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Drama, School Life
author: Yoko Kamio
synopsis:
Eitoku Academy is a school that caters to children and from rich, high-society families. Hence, Makino, who comes from a poor family, is considered by others as the "weed" of the school. The school is ruled by the "Flower Four" group, more commonly known as the F4. The F4 leader, and son of the wealthiest, most powerful family in Japan, Domyouji Tsukasa, takes an interest in Tsukushi because she is the only girl at Eitoku who does not fawn over him. However, his hot-headed nature and bullying ways are originally a major turn-off for Tsukushi, who has her sights set on Rui Hanazawa.  
  
Volume 37 is comprised of three short stories that happen after the ending

title: Himokuzu Hana-Kun Wa Shinitagari
genre: Psychological, Romance, Office Workers
author: Ameko
synopsis:
"I'll die with you, I promise."

Yoshino is a second-year working adult who is exhausted from her daily life and work. One of the worst days of her life, Yoshino gets drunk and wakes up the next morning to find a mysterious boy named Hana-kun sleeping next to her. Yoshino ends up living with Hana-kun for a limited time, and surprisingly begins to feel comfortable living with Hana-kun. Meanwhile, due to a certain incident, Hana-kun becomes obsessed with her for some reason... When a scummy man whose love is too heavy meets a deeply compassionate female office worker, a love resembling a potent drug begins!?

title: Stairs
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Ongoo
synopsis:
Become the strongest, at the World's End.  
  
At the end of the world there will be ' Stairs', and at the end there will be everything.  
Go beyond the limits and be born as the strongest person at the end of the world!

title: 7Th Time Loop: the Villainess Enjoys a Carefree Life Married to Her Worst Enemy!
genre: Time Travel, Romance, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Touko Amekawa
synopsis:
Rishe, the daughter of a duke, is stuck in a time loop that begins at the moment her engagement is annulled and ends with her early demise at the age of 20. She has now begun her seventh loop.  
  
In her past do-overs, Rishe experienced various occupations, including being a merchant, a pharmacist, and a knight. But this time around, she simply wishes to live a long and leisurely life!  
  
That *was* the plan, only for it to be derailed by an unprecedented marriage proposal from her killer in the previous loop, the neighbouring country's Crown Prince?!  


---

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1784ga/)

title: Merry Psycho
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Crime, Drama, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Bo-Gyeong Gong
synopsis: A sweet and happy two year marriage felt like a dream. One day, her husband disappeared without a trace. Han Seoryeong, an ordinary housewife and blind woman, desperately searches for him... Youll never find him. Her husband turned out to be the best secret agent with many faces. Our marriage was everything to me, but it was just work to him? In the midst of her world crumbling, Seoryeong mistakenly unleashes the madness she had been suppressing.

title: Yuri No Hajimari Wa Dorei Kara
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Gyaru
author: Hanako Desuyama
synopsis:
Chiyoko Hanamura, a self-proclaimed *gyaru* who failed her high school debut, was skipping class as usual on the rooftop when her junior, Sakine, approached her. It seemed like Sakine had a favor to ask, as she handed Chiyoko a love letter.

"Could you turn down this confession for me?" she asked. However, the sender was unknown.

For the sake of her adorable junior, and to maintain her *gyaru* dignity, Chiyoko resolved to take on the task and went to refuse the confession...

title: Kill the Hero
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Manhwa Insaeng
synopsis:
After hes killed by the righteous leader of his own guild, Woojin gets a chance to start over. This time hes not interested in saving the world from monsters  hes got his sights set on revenge! 

His high-level kills quickly garner him notoriety among the game plebs, while boosting his stats as he masterminds his way closer to the top. But there's something no one can figure out: whose side hes playing for. 

Now that he knows how to play to win, Woojin will stop at nothing to destroy the hero!

title: Mercenary Enrollment
genre: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Adventure, Military, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color
author: YC
synopsis:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?

title: The Mating of Elves
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Popuri
synopsis: Pania Elarona, an average elf with the special ability to see people's status windows, idolizes the infamous lone wolf Naos Shalia. When a new law forbids solo dungeon adventuring, she volunteers to pair up with him. Reluctantly, Naos agrees, but a hidden lust demon curse triggers in the dungeon, trapping him in a passionate haze! Pania checks his status window, and a mission appears saying... he needs to get off?! Can these elves conquer the curse, or will the lust be too strong to overcome?

title: Kanojo No Carrera
genre: Comedy, Sports, Tragedy
author: Kia Asamiya
synopsis: The main characters father passes away. The will states that each of the three siblings receive a portion of the fathers wealth. The main character receives a Porsche Carrera. She doesnt know what a Porsche Carrera looks like, didnt know the car company Porsche, cant drive a manual and had absolutely no interest in cars, at the time.

title: Isekai De Cheat Skill Wo Te Ni Shita Ore Wa, Genjitsu Sekai Wo Mo Musou Suru ~Level up Wa Jinsei Wo Kaeta~
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kazuomi Minatogawa
synopsis:
Since a young age, Tenjou Yuuya was continuously bullied.
He is staying in his beloved grandfather's home while he goes to school and, as usual, he receives a harsh bullying, and takes an extended absence from school in order to have some time to heal his wounds.
While on this long time of absence, he takes the opportunity to clean his grandfather's house and finds a room he never had seen before. Due to this being where his grandfather kept many different objects that he gathered from his travels around the world, it needed tidying! While Tenjou was arranging the objects, he found a door, yet it didn't seem to go anywhere since it was standing upright and not attached to any wall.
Out of curiosity, Tenjou opens this door, and what he found on the other side is

[Official English Light Novel](https://yenpress.com/series/i-got-a-cheat-skill-in-another-world-and-became-unrivaled-in-the-real-world-too-light-novel)

title: Idol Yamerukedo Kekkon Shitekuremasu Ka!?
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Shiomi Miyoshi
synopsis:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?

title: Akanabe-Sensei Wa Tereshirazu
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Naoya Tajimi
synopsis:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.

title: Gyaru to Kyouryuu
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Yuuki Fujinari
synopsis:
A story of a gyaru who picks up a dinosaur.  

---
**Links:**
  
- [Official Site](http://galkyo.com/)
- Alternative Official English - [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/my-roomie-is-a-dino/)

title: Sengoku Youko
genre: Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Satoshi Mizukami
synopsis: "Stop your evil deeds and take the right path!" That is the creed of Youko Tama and her younger step brother, Jinka Sendou. The two demon siblings travel the country to stop the deeds of all evil doers, along with a scaredy-cat swordsman they picked up along the way, Hyoudou Shinsuke. During their travels, they will come across a monk organization with more than suspicious methods and they'll soon be at war.

title: I Am Sukeban
genre: Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Incest, Crime, Sports, Martial Arts, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Harem, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Shota, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Gou Nagai
synopsis:
His family name is Suke and his given name is Banji, but he's known as Sukeban. Any town the Suke clan settles in just can't contain the violent nature of this family, forcing them to move time and time again. Because of his name, Banji ends up transferring to Amazon School as a female student! However, this situation coupled with Sukeban's rebellious nature undoubtedly will result in mayhem littered with maddening jokes and lewdity.

The manga has been adapted into two live-action films and an OVA.

title: Kinko No Naka No Naka No Naka
genre: Oneshot
author: Rei Shirokami
synopsis:
When Yuko, just a jack-of-all-trades handywoman, agrees to help her childhood friend Mika crack open an old safe at her family home, she finds herself enveloped in an unsettling atmosphere...

Source: MangaPlus

title: Tsumi to Batsu No Spica
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Gore, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Hajime Inoryu
synopsis: Hatori, a high school teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Spica Tsumugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tsumugi by chance. Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tsumugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." Teacher and student... two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.

title: Choujun! Choujou-Senpai
genre: Comedy, Harem, Police, Supernatural
author: Shun Numa
synopsis: In Chinjuku, the city that never sleeps, there is a psychic senior police officer who has powers beyond human comprehension! His name is Meguru Chojo! Along with his judo expert partner Nao Ippongi, this hilarious duo will keep the streets clean by any means necessary!

title: Hakutaku
genre: Video Games, School Life
author: Kouki Ishikawa
synopsis: Hikuma is a young man who seems to live in his own world. One day, he meets fellow high school oddball Noto and the two of them embark to create a video game that will impress their classmates. When the class finally plays the game that the two of them have put their blood, sweat, and tears into, their whole lives change! Can two high schoolers conquer the game industry in this new adventure from Shonen Jump?!

title: Kuroko'S Basketball
genre: Action, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Tadatoshi Fujimaki
synopsis:
Kuroko is a member from the legendary middle school basketball team known as -The Generation of Miracles-, and while nobody seems to know about him, the main 5 players of the team all admit that he is a better player. When he joins the high school basketball team, everyone is surprised to find out that he is small, weak, and easy to miss. What is the secret that makes him so strong, and how will he help his high school team?

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Kuroko's Basketball** (2013)

title: Hima-Ten!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem
author: Genki Ono
synopsis: High school home ec expert Tenichi earns extra money with a part-time job cleaning houses. But one day, Himari, the owner and model of the popular cosmetics brand Hima Riz, transfers into his class.

title: Exorcist No Kiyoshi-Kun
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, Supernatural
author: Shouichi Usui
synopsis: The most powerful exorcist in history--Kiyoshi! In order to protect that which is precious to him, Kiyoshi has attained ultimate strength. But he has a secret he can't tell anyone... Become a sword that slays evil! Become a shield that protects the weak!

title: Me & Roboco
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Cooking, Music
author: Shuuhei Miyazaki
synopsis: The year is 20XX A time when every household owns cute maid robots known as OrderMaids. Average grade-schooler Bondo dreams of having his very own robot. But what he got was Unable to compute!!! Life is gonna get a whole lot weirder when Roboco, the most powerful clumsy maid ever created, shows up at his door!

title: Shinobigoto
genre: Action, Ninja, Comedy, School Life
author: Nari Kusakawa
synopsis: Even in modern Japan, ninja still hide in the shadows. Young ninja Yodaka has received his mission--protect high school student Aoi at all cost. But can a ninja survive the wild world of high school while also fulfilling his mission?

title: One Piece
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Eiichirou Oda
synopsis:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**

title: Red Cat Ramen
genre: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Angyaman
synopsis: Tamako comes for an interview at a ramen shop run only by cats, with no humans. The cat manager asks her if she likes cats, and when Tamako honestly says she is a dog person, she is easily hired. However, her job is not to run a ramen shop, but to look after cats...?

title: Kill Blue
genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, School Life
author: Tadatoshi Fujimaki
synopsis: A graduate from the school of hard knocks, hit man Ogami faces his greatest challenge yet...middle school!

title: Akane-Banashi
genre: Award Winning, Comedy, Drama
author: Yuuki Suenaga
synopsis:
Rakugo--the ultimate form of storytelling, where everything in a story is expressed with just your body and words. 
Shinta and his daughter Akane have been seduced by this wonderful form of classical Japanese entertainment. 
Having observed her father strive to pass the shin'uchi rakugo test, Akane takes her own steps into this unique world!

title: Witch Watch
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Kenta Shinohara
synopsis: Morihito, a boy with the strength of an ogre, is about to start living together with his childhood friend Niko, who is training to be a witch. Niko's magic leads to all sorts of unpredictable trouble, and with two teens under one roof Let the fantastical antics begin! Magical comedy series by Kenta Shinohara creator of SKET DANCE and Astra Lost in Space.

title: The Elusive Samurai
genre: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Ninja, Survival, Samurai, Adventure, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Yuusei Matsui
synopsis: Yusei Matsui, creator of Assassination Classroom and Neuro: Supernatural Detective, is back! Set in feudal Japan in between the Kamakura and Muromachi periods, our hero Hojo Takatoki is a boy on the run that history all but forgot! When the Kamakura shogunate is overthrown by Ashikaga Takauji, Takatoki's family and standing are visciously taken away from him, and he must flee to the far reaches of the land to survive and seek out his revenge!

title: Spy×Family
genre: Award Winning, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, School Life, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Tatsuya Endou
synopsis:
The master spy codenamed <Twilight> has spent most of his life on undercover missions, all for the dream of a better world. Yet one day he receives a particularly difficult order from command. For his mission, he must form a temporary family and start a new life?! 

A Spy/Action/Comedy manga about a one-of-a-kind family!

title: Mitsuba Monogatari
genre: Magic, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Matari Nanasawa
synopsis:
This world revolves around me.

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.

Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is  enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

title: Kesa Mo Yuraretemasu
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Eiji Masuda
synopsis: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

title: Honkai Impact 3Rd
genre: Sci-Fi, Historical, Monsters, Action, Video Games, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: miHoYo
synopsis:
The definitive source of lore, background, and epic saga of Honkai Impact 3rd, a 3D anime-style ARPG game developed and published by miHoYo.

*History:*
- 1952: 1st Honkai Eruption in Berlin
- 2000: 2nd Honkai Eruption in Siberia
- 2014: Honkai Outbreak in Nagazora

---

Honkai is a corrupting force that manifests itself as supernatural disasters, monstrous creatures, plagues, and Herrschers who can bend physical laws on a whim. Human civilization has been at war with the Honkai since the very beginning. The Valkyries are the mightiest warriors of humanity. They are our only hope.

---

+++ Extraneous information
**Contributor note:** There currently is an ongoing cleanup with the goal of moving each book to it's own title. Help would be appreciated [[Link](https://forums.mangadex.org/threads/honkai-impact-3rd-data-fixing-cleanup.1071951)]

**Volume Guide (by chronological order):**
Volume | Status | Year/Era | Details
:- | :- | :- | :-
0.01 | Done | Ancient Era | !!Fu Hua's Empyrean tales!!
0.011 | New + Ongoing | Ancient Shenzhou | Blade of the Empyrean
0.1 | Done | 1476 AD. | Elan Palatinus. !!1470: After a disastrous Crusade, Schicksal attempted to seek power elsewhere while - Kallen Kaslana, the greatest Valkyrie of her time, began to question their actions.!!
0.2 | Done | 2000 CE. | Second Eruption. !!2000-FEB-01: The entire research staff of Schicksal Babylon Honkai research facility in Siberia disappeared in a single night. Overseer Otto Apocalypse dispatched his 2nd in command Theresa Apocalypse to investigate this mystery. Welt and Einstein of Anti-Entropy, a long-time enemy of Schicksal, prepare for the worst. They suspect the 2nd Eruption is about to happen.!!
0.21 | Done | 2012-2013 CE. | Gemini - Origin
0.3 | Done | 2012-2013 CE. | Azure Waters. !!2012: Bronya Zaychik, the Silver Wolf of the Urals, finds herself adopted by Cocolia in her orphanage. Bronya would later befriend Seele, unaware of the tragedy that lays in wait for them.!!
1 | Done | 2014 CE. | Escape from Nagazora
2 | Done | 2014 CE. | St. Freya High
3 | Done | 2014 CE. | Sakura Samsara. !!Theresa's innate eight-fold cherry blossom stigma malfunctioned and caused her to fall into a coma. To wake their principal, Mei entered the stigma data space to investigate the cause. Meanwhile, Theresa woke up in what appears to be medieval Japan and find herself embroiled in a never-ending Samsara.!!
4 | Done | 2014 CE. | Final Samsara. !!A vengeful entity dwells within Theresa's innate stigma, and she must do what she can to prevent Yae Sakura's will to become forever corrupted by this ancient terror. Can Theresa defeat this monster, or will she lose herself to the endless cycle?!!
5 | Done | 2014 CE. | AE Invasion. !!Anti-Entropy, a long-time enemy of Schicksal, made an attempt to kidnap the 3rd Herrscher - Mei Raiden. Will the Valkyries of St. Freya High defeat the invaders and save each other?!!
6 | Done | 2014 CE. | Moon Shadow. !!Fu Hua and Kiana goes to Singapore to recover a rogue scientist and a stolen gem, unaware of the terrible things that might happen.!!
.22 | ? | 2016(?) | Gemina Invasions (Comedy)
7.1 | Done | 2015 CE. | London Holiday. !!Durandal gets a holiday as a reward for her hardwork, while a mysterious force known as the World Serpent tries hard to defend a hidden Divine Key.!!
8 | Done | 2015 CE. | Second Key. !!Schicksal initiated tests on the Second Key they've acquired from the city of London. Durandal didn't expect to find him inside the key.!!
9 | Ongoing | 2005 / 2029 CE. | Alien Space. !!Young Himeko got into Caltech and met a surprisingly young substitute space engineering course lecturer who also happens to share her interest in space aliens.!!
