title: Uesugi-Kun Wa Onnanoko Wo Yametai
genre: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Yuu Yabuuchi
synopsis: Uesugi-kun is a boy who's as petite and cute as a girl. He has a crush on a girl he's known since childhood, but overheard her saying, "Wouldn't Uesugi be totally adorable if he was a girl?!" Uesugi-kun's not as tall as his other childhood friend, Eito, nor is he as good at studies, and now he's suffering from a broken heart. A depressed Uesugi-kun stops by a shrine while running an errand and makes a wish...

title: Tonari No Seki-Kun
genre: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Takuma Morishige
synopsis:
The boy who sits next to Yokoi in class, Seki-kun, is always up to something at his desk. He manages to somehow play very elaborate games without attracting the teacher's attention. From dominoes, to shogi, to go, to mecha models, to playing with cats and more, he always has something new to do. Yokoi often finds herself getting reluctantly interested in his games, even though they always seem to end up getting HER in trouble with the teacher!  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15587)  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the live action show.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2015-05-27/tonari-no-seki-kun-rumi-phenomenon-school-comedies-get-live-action-show/.88620)

title: Adachi to Shimamura
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Adaptation
author: Moke Yuzuhara
synopsis: In the middle of the school day, on the second floor of the gym. This is where the two came to skip class, and it's where their friendship began. A story of two high school girls, playing ping-pong and chatting as they spend the heydays of their youth.

title: Lili-Men
genre: Action, Gore, Drama, Supernatural
author: Takuma Tokashiki
synopsis: Succubi, a species that uses humans as seedbeds to reproduce, and humanity, which is set on the eradication of every single succubus. As the unrelenting war between these two incompatible groups wages on, a "king" who will bring about the end of the war is born. The one chosen for the role of king is...?!

title: Naka?Shi Shimai No Hen?I Kiroku
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Kazepana
synopsis: The story follows Niido Akiho, an 18-year-old college student leading a fulfilling life, except for her unemployed sister, Kana, who is staying with her. Akiho struggles to manage her sister's untidy habits. Their situation takes a turn when Chifusa, a busty woman identifying herself as a "debt collectors," visits them. She informs Akiho that Kana has accumulated a debt of 3 million yen. Unable to repay the debt, Chifusa offers them a "Problematic Part-Time Job" in exchange for a high pay. The job's details remain confidential, leading to a slightly erotic work comedy about two sisters entangled in a peculiar debt.

title: Emiya-San Chi No Kyou No Gohan
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Type-Moon
synopsis:
"Fulfilling meala familiar view.

In this story, Fate and food meet in a delicious and gentle world. Its nothing but an ordinary meal scene Delicious meals are served at the Emiyas dinner table every day, through spring, summer, fall and winter.  Let's see what's for dinner today?

title: Chiyu Mahou No Machigatta Tsukaikata: Senjou Wo Kakeru Kaifuku Youin
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Takane Aoto
synopsis:
Usato, an ordinary high schooler, happens to run into two fellow students after school one rainy day. Suddenly, all three of them are engulfed in a magic circle and transported to a fantasy world. Theres just one tiny problem  Usato is simply dragged along by accident!  On top of that, Usato learns that he is capable of using healing magic  an incredibly rare affinity in this new world.

Now Usato must spend his days with the rescue team thugs, struggling through their hellish training regimen  learning the wrong way to use healing magic.

Get ready for an eccentric otherworld fantasy filled with comedy and combat!

title: Misato-San Wa Amasugi Joushi Ni Chotto Kibishii
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Kurotama
synopsis:
Misato-san, a very beautiful office lady who is good at her job, and her bossKonishikawa-san, a middle-aged man who spoils his subordinates. Misato-san has a strict attitude toward Konishikawa-san, but what are the hidden feelings behind it?! The gap between the seriousness and cuteness will make you faint in anxiety, and this office love comedy with a difference in age begins! (MTL)

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw](https://shukanmanga.jp/work_list/detail/misatosan)

title: S-Rank Party Kara Kaikosareta [Jugushi] ~"Noroi No Item" Shika Tsukuremasen Ga, Sono Seinou Wa Artifact-Kyuu Nari......!~
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: LAgun
synopsis:
Gaile, a Cursificer, is left penniless when he's expelled from his party as soon as they reach S Rank. Apparently he wasn't contributing enough?! But they hadn't realized that his cursed items outperform even holy relics and legendary equipment!

Gaile decides to try to make a living on his own off of his cursed items.

title: Boku Wa Konyaku Haki Nante Shimasen Kara Ne
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Ootori
synopsis:
"Ah Ahhhhhhhhhhh!"  
  
The one who's become the Crown Prince's fiancée is the Duke's daughter Serea, but during their first meeting, she screamed and collapsed! Had she remembered something from her previous life? Are you an evil villainess? Am I going to break you if I fool around too much? A me that's programmed to be like that, is so horrible. Isn't that right~ An "event" and those "program settings" have no connection to me though. Let's go back to my place and I'll slowly and sweetly make you fall desperately in love with me!  
  
This otome game's villainess is going to follow a harsh path, and will fight to change her fate.
___
**Character Designer:** [Nardack](https://mangadex.org/author/f27853e1-c9b2-442a-a8f8-ca3962078222)

title: Kimi No Yokogao O Miteita
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life
author: Rumi Ichinohe
synopsis: Hikari's your typical freshmen in high school who's been recently daydreaming about Maris, her shy best friend, a love story. She decides to ship Mari with Ootani-kun, their classmate, after finding out about his crush on Mari when his friend, Asagiri-kun, tried getting the two to talk. The main character is Mari, the leading man is Ootani, and Hikari is the typical best friend in the story. Not bad right? A youthful story between four kids going through unrequited love.

title: Kimi to Koete Koi Ni Naru
genre: Sci-Fi, Animals, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Chihiro Yuzuki
synopsis:
Mari is a high school student living in a town where beastmen and humans coexist. When she is late for school, she meets Tsunagu, a beastman who has come to the school as a "special student" for the Beastman Education Program, at the front gate. Mari is bewildered by her first contact with a beastman, but as she gets to know him, she is drawn to his kind and pure side. However, some of her classmates don't seem to take kindly to beastmen, and suddenly the two of them are locked in a warehouse. Suddenly, they are locked in a warehouse and Tsunagu hugs her! He says, "You smell sweet..." His breathing becomes ragged.

A human and a beastman. What will happen to the love between two people who transcend race?
Pure and exciting interspecies youth love.

title: Gundam Exa Vs
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Romance, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Military, Drama, Tragedy
author: Tomohiro Chiba
synopsis:
Gundam EXA VS (???? EXA VS) is a manga written by Tomohiro Chiba and illustrated by K?ichi Tokita, published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized in Gundam Ace magazine in 2014 to be tied in with the arcade Game Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme Vs. Maxi Boost. It's the sequel to the previous manga series, Gundam EXA.

Some time after the events of Gundam EXA, Sthesia Awar informs Leos Alloy that she discovered a new GA data cluster from a computer outside of Jupiter X. The two dive into the new data and find themselves in the Universal Century, during the attack on Side 7. However, after entering the colony, they find that the inside was in ruins, and the RX-78-02 Gundam has been destroyed before it could be activated by Amuro Ray.

title: Sono Bisque Doll Wa Koi O Suru
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Shinichi Fukuda
synopsis: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.

title: Kawaisou Na Imouto-Chan
genre: Loli, Psychological, Romance, Incest, Drama, Web Comic, Tragedy
author: Haruki Sakata
synopsis: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan

title: Otokojuku Gaiden - Akashi Gouji
genre: Action, Martial Arts, Gore
author: Yuuji Takezoe
synopsis: A spin-off of Sakigake!! Otokojuku focusing on Akashi Gouji.

title: Cherry Yuusha to "Sei" Naru Tsurugi
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Yuzuki Uchiba
synopsis: In a world where heroes are always women chosen by the gods, the legend of a male hero seems to be just a myth. However, when a young boy named Cherio finds himself in the middle of a battle against monsters that threaten humanity, a goddess grants him the power of the male hero and the ability to unsheathe the mythical Holy Sword. Now, he must decide if he is willing to risk his life, not only to save the people he loves, but to fulfill a destiny that no one thought possible.

title: Drama Na Koi Wa Kihon Kara
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Akamaru Enomoto
synopsis: Shinji Yuuki is an ordinary businessman, 35 years old, single, no girlfriend, living at home. He is worried about his future as a single man, but he has little experience in love and is afraid of marriage activity. But when he meets a female  doctor, he falls in "love beyond his imagination," a love that turns his life upside down!

title: Kill My Love
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Xi Ni
synopsis: A decade ago, he was a beta at the pinnacle of his assassin career. But one day, while trying to save an Alpha child, he suffered severe injuries leading him to lose the sharpness and insight an assassin needs. Left with no choice, he retired and moved into a remote small town to start a new life under a new identity. Everything was going well until an unexpected visitor showed up at his house. The child he had saved years ago has now grown into the leader of an organization, and hes coming after the beta with a powerful intent

title: Yume Ka Utsutsu Ka
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Io Sakisaka
synopsis: The main character, Iroha, is a first-year high school student who finds it difficult to talk to others. Even though its been about two months since she started high school, she still hasnt had a proper conversation with any of her classmates. During every break, she quietly slips out of the classroom and heads to the courtyard by the old school building. She does this to meet and talk with a senior she met at the town library while studying for exams. This senior, who is a year older, has become a source of support for Iroha. However, the two of them share a secret...

title: Sentaku No Toki
genre: Sci-Fi, Drama, Aliens, Supernatural
author: Kiri Gunchi
synopsis: During summer break, a junior high school student Mitsuharu collides with an unusual creature while speeding on his bicycle. That unusual creature was a genderless alien called Toki who came to Earth for a "purpose". An unpredictable story about a lonely human and an alien starts!

title: Shimotsuki-San Wa Mobu Ga Suki ~Hitomishiri Na Kanojo Wa Ore Ni Dake Dere Amai~
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kigurumi
synopsis:
***Only you are special.***

After school, Koutarou Nakayama returns to school to pick up something he forgot and finds Shiho Shimotsuki asleep in an empty classroom. Shiho is rumored to be Ryouma Ryuuzaki's crush, a popular boy who has formed a harem in his class, but she is always expressionless and no one has ever seen her smile.

But now, her fair skin is holding Koutarou's hand...?! The "secret relationship" between the heroine and the mob begins!

title: Himitsu×Cross
genre: Oneshot, 4-Koma, Vampires
author: Gosaiji
synopsis: Not found

title: Reincarnation Coliseum: the Weakest Skill Conquers the Strongest Women and Creates a Harem
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Loli, Action, Psychological, Ninja, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Saizou Harawata
synopsis: His grades are average. His physical fitness is average. But when it comes to games, high school student Mikagami? Kouji is a battle-worn veteran. After being summoned to another world by a magic circle, he's given only the Copy skill, which is derided as useless trash in this world. Enslaved as a gladiator by his summoner, Head Priestess Zayd, Mikagami is forced to fight in the horrible Battle Coliseum. Losing means getting raped. In this moment, as despair turns to hope, this is Mikagami's chance to grow!!

title: Kanojo O Ubatta Ikemen Bishoujo Ga Naze Ka Ore Made Nerattekuru
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
author: Momiji Shika
synopsis:
"Hey, boyfriend, how you doing?"

Souta Sakuhara is a first-year high school boy. His first ever girlfriend has just been stolen away from him by a "girlfriend." That girlfriend is Shizuno Mizushima, a tomboy who's also the tallest girl he's ever met, who's now his hated rival in love, taunting him with it. But then

"Since nobody else wants to be your girlfriend, how about you go out with me?"

She suddenly pins him against the wall! She also started saying, "Give me a month, and I'll make you fall in love with me I'm not going to let you go so easily!"

A one-way romantic comedy in which a handsome and beautiful girl will tempt you every day!

title: Jashinkankin Harem De Isekai Seifuku!
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Full Color
author: YUYU
synopsis: A chaotic, different world ruled by evil gods. The main character, Yuya, wakes up to the sound of a girl's voice calling his name. It is a temple of desire ruled by the evil god Liv where numerous people were immersed in pleasure like crazy. Even in the midst of all this, Yuya still maintains his rationality. Liv shows her interest and ties him up with special chains. However, the chain was originally a weapon that deprived evil of their powers by imprisoning and subjugating them. Due to the revelation of the old god Agnes, who resides in the chains, Yuya uses his power to imprison dangerous evil gods one after another.

title: Honmono No Kanojo Ni Shitakunaru Made, Watashi De Tameshite Ii Yo.
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Romance, Harem, Adaptation
author: wano
synopsis:
In the reality dating show "Our Season," stunning high school students come together for what seems like the ultimate dreama perfect youth filled with romance and adventure. But behind the glamorous facade lies a more complicated reality: a false school life where they barter their youth for a chance at stardom in the entertainment world.

Aoishi thought hed follow the script for a picture-perfect experience. But when he meets Karen, eager to fulfill her first love, and Emma, his scripted girlfriend, everything shifts. Add to that his secret relationship with Asuka, and Aoishi finds himself tangled in a web of desire and deception.

As they go through their lives on camera, the lines between real feelings and fake romances start to blur, pulling them into a storm of complicated relationships and strong emotions. Can Aoishi find a way to untangle the mess before it takes over their lives? The most dangerous part of their youth is just about to begin!

Adapted from a popular light novel, now in manga form!

title: Isekai Tensei Slum Machi Kara No Nariagari
genre: Reincarnation, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Daikokudou Ikuya
synopsis: At the age of 6, Ed, a boy suddenly recalls that he is a reincarnated individual from modern Japan. However, his current life unfolds in the slums of another world! Struggling with a poverty-stricken existence in his daily life, he shares his living space with and eats with his childhood friend, a girl named Miinya. Their daily fare consists mainly of 'boiled beans.' Ed, drawing upon his knowledge from modern Japan, discovers edible wild plants and leaves suitable for making tea to improve their dietary situation. In pursuit of a slow life, Ed's life of gathering and hunting begins!

title: Kage No Jitsuryokusha Ni Naritakute! Master of Garden ~Shichikage Retsuden~
genre: Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: kanco
synopsis:
Cid Kagenou, a boy who was enjoying the eminence in shadow setting in another world, plays the role of the justice with the girls called the Seven Shadows (they are very serious), such that the darkness of the world will disappear (maybe).

The curtain rises on an overwhelmingly chuunibyou and misunderstanding-filled serious comedy about the strongest Seven Shadows (and the protagonist)!?

title: Me & the Devil Blues
genre: Historical, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Music, Tragedy
author: Akira Hiramoto
synopsis:
Legend has it that if you take your guitar and stand at a crossroads at the witching hour, the devil will appear. 
He'll grab your instrument, play a song, and hand it back to you. 
You'll walk away an expert bluesman, but you'll have to pay the price: your immortal soul.

title: Digimon Liberator
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Full Color
author: Kuniaki Totsuka
synopsis:
Shoto Kazama, a boy who has never been able to win at card games because of his habit of giving up on things easily, enters the immersive world of Digimon Liberator through the invitation of his childhood friend, Arisa Kinosaki.

The game allows players to engage in highly realistic card battles. At first, Shoto is hesitant towards it, but through his engrossing encounters with the Digimon there, he becomes a fan of the game.

Encounters with wild Digimon such as Pteromon and battles with NPCs who have gone rogue. These various happenings set the wheels of fate in motion for Shoto and his companions.

This is a story about Digimon, and the world.

title: The Siren
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yuuki Sasahara
synopsis:
Aria offered a contract marriage. To Grand Duke Valentine who was said to have sold his soul to the devil. So she could protect herself and him.

"Marry me."

Aria passed him a note which asked for his hand in marriage with her little maple leaf like hands.

"It's a contract marriage so we'll divorce 10 years later..."

The young master grabbed the note Aria was writing and ripped it to shreds.

"So where do I stamp it?"

"You told me you'll divorce me once we're older."

The young devil grew up and kissed her forehead.

"Since we have become adults, we have to instead make a contract for adults."

---
If there is a next life, I will save you.

Aria is the last remaining siren, a monster who bewitches humans with song. Shackled, she is forced to sing to nobles until she coughs blood. By the time the demonized Grand Duke Lloyd Valentine frees her, its too late. She has already breathed her last or so she thinks. When she awakens in the past, Aria dedicates her life to protecting the duke, but she wonders if thats really all her life is worth. Will she ever be free? Or is this siren destined to sing the same song forever?

---

title: Gantz: E
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Historical, Monsters, Action, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Hiroya Oku
synopsis: The manga's story begins when a peasant named Hanb? asks a girl named O-haru for her hand in marriage, but O-haru confesses that she is already thinking of another man named Masakichi from a neighboring village. When Hanb? seeks out Masakichi, he finds that Masakichi possesses a sword and the skills to use it, despite being a peasant.

title: Bishuu Gyakuten Sekai De Chiryoushi Yattemasu
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Nekohige
synopsis:
One day, Towa was suddenly transferred to a new world. This world resembles a world from a novel that Towa recently read. 

It's been half a year since he came to this world. Towa opened a clinic as a Healer using the ability he received from the Goddess. However, the only ones who come are well-groomed, servile beauties. This is because this was a world where the value of beauty and ugliness were reversed. 

He is kind to everyone, no matter how ugly (beautiful in Towa's eyes), and wins the hearts of the ugly beauties in the world.

title: Mahou No Tsukaikata
genre: Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Sakae Kusama
synopsis: I'm a sorcerer's apprentice. The sorcerer, Sentarou-san, kidnapped me from my mother and asked me to live with him. But Sentarou-san has probably killed someone before... Sakae Kusama's first full-length series, depicting the cool and gentle days of a useless adult and a lonely child, opens!

title: Girls Und Panzer - Little Army
genre: Action, Comedy, School Life
author: Tsuchii
synopsis:
In the world, the manipulation of tanks (Sensha-do) is one of the traditional martial arts especially for girls. Miho doesn't like Sensha-do and moves to Oarai Girl's High School. But the chairperson of the student council orders Miho to participate in the national Sensha-do championship.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2015)

title: Ichigo No Haitta Soda-Sui
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Cherry Arai
synopsis: Mannenrou Ladies' Academy is famous for its upper class and posh students. Despite knowing how out-of-place she'd be, the former yankee, Hanaizumi Luna, decides to enroll there. Moreover, according to her underling: "Girls' schools means yuri!! Add in school dormitories? Now that's a world of girl on girl action!!"

title: Your Eternal Lies
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Sexual Violence, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Kkomak
synopsis:
Rosenne Walker was imprisoned for killing her husband at the age of seventeen.  
Although she attempted to escape several times, she was eventually caught and arrested in Monte Island, the worst prison on earth.

And Ian Connor was responsible for transporting her. He never blinked an eye at Rosenne's shameless lies. 

However, Ian suddenly came into realisation that her lies might be the truth.

"Will you believe me no matter what I say?"

"It doesn't matter, so tell me anything, Rosenne."

Will her lies turn out to be the truth in a time that is unstoppable?

---
Infamous jailbreaker Rosen Walker is finally being transferred to the Isle of Monte, the most notorious maximum security prison in the world. Her guard? Its none other than the beloved war hero of the empire himself  Ian Connor. Now Ian must unravel the truth. Did Rosen really commit the murder? Or is there more to the story?

---

title: Escape the Original Male Lead!
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Mana Studio
synopsis:
She possessed the mistress of the male lead in an R19 novel. In the original novel, the male lead was trash who abandoned her after getting her pregnant, saying that he belatedly realized that he loved the heroine. Fortunately, it was still before the original work started. She decided to scrap that shit herself.

"No, I don't want to," she flatly rejected Killian's offer to have an affair with him.

When he asked her why, she smiled brightly and answered, "Young Master is not my taste. If I must say, your younger brother is much preferable.

"What? You prefer my younger brother?"

*Yeah. Not you, but your brother.*

Unlike the original, she firmly set up an iron wall, took care of Lexion, the younger brother who was abused by his elder brother, and protected the original female lead who had low-esteem from that shitty male lead.

And now that she'd already done what she had to do, she's off to go.

But a few years later

Lexion, who had pushed out his older brother and taken the ducal title, came back to her as a beast with a decadent beauty. On top of that, he was even holding the engagement document that she had signed as a joke during their childhood.

"I've never forgotten you for a moment. Please marry me, Noona."

*No, wasn't that just for playing house?*

Every time she refuses his marriage proposal, he gently hugs her around the waist, and asks in a cold voice, "Did your taste change while I was away?"

Lexion's eyes were full of life as he asked.

It was as if when he found out who her type was, he'd kill them right away.

---

title: Maryoku Zetsumu No Ryuuken Tsukai: Maryoku Zero No Ryuuou No Musuko, Bocchi Yueni, Tomodachi Wo Tsukuru Tameni Madou Gakuen De Musou Suru
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Rakku Yasahashi
synopsis: Not found

title: Shark
genre: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Adventure, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Un
synopsis: Sharks don't have lungs, but they do have to breathe oxygen to survive. Instead of breathing air, though, sharks get oxygen from the water that surrounds them. So they have to move around, if they stop moving for a while, they sink into the water and die, So Sharks have to move and move constantly from birth to death. The same goes for you. If you want to survive, keep moving, then you will be the best hunter like a shark.

title: Kusozako Boukou Oshii-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Tsuttsu
synopsis: Not found

title: Kuro Mahou Ryou No San Akunin
genre: Comedy, Magic, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Kimio Saitou
synopsis:
By the Reiwa era, delinquents have been completely eliminated even from schools of magic...or so everyone thought. Even the "Black Magic Dormitory", formerly a wild and out of control place where the dark magic ne'er-do-wells gathered, is now on the verge of being demolished due to no new students having been placed into it for ages. The dorm's poor environment, residents receiving scorn and distain from teachers, and resulting low prospects of employment after graduation made the dorm's popularity sharply drop starting with Gen Z...until this year, when three female students are placed into it! So each of them makes an oath to themselves that they'll escape from the dorm, no matter what happens to the other two! 

However, those girls do not yet know the dreadful prophecy, which will affect the entire magical world, that is descending upon them.

(Source: Shogakukan)

title: Juuou to Yakusou
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Drama, Medical, Fantasy
author: Tatsukazu Konda
synopsis: Dungeons are the stuff of dreamsdefeat the monsters, take their loot, and then venture into uncharted territory to discover hidden riches! Tina, an upstart adventurer with just such a dream, ends up mortally wounded while exploring a dungeon. Suddenly, the great demon known as the Beast King Garon, who was supposed to have been slain by a hero in the distant past, appears before her!  Dungeon fantasy meets medical drama!

title: Kuse 100
genre: Romance, Incest, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Mai
synopsis: 100 Short Manga about Types of and Behavior in Yuri Relationships

title: Revenge of the Baskerville Bloodhound
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: San-Chaek Lee
synopsis:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his fathers hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.

title: Yomi No Tsugai
genre: Monsters, Action, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Hiromu Arakawa
synopsis:
The manga centers on Yuru, a boy who lives in a remote mountain village, spending his time hunting birds and being one with nature. But one day, Yuru's younger twin sister Asa is called to serve in the jail at the heart of the village, her duty also confining her there. Yuru slowly unravels the unnatural mystery hidden beneath his quiet village.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Square Enix Manga & Books](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/daemons-of-the-shadow-realm)

title: Koibumi to 13-Sai No Actress
genre: Romance, Drama
author: Jaga
synopsis: Fumi Isshiki works as an accountant at an entertainment agency. One day, he is transferred to the management department, where Ayano Haga, a 13-year-old child actress, seems to take a liking to him...? She is just a child, yet she acts more mature than most adults.

title: Minasoko
genre: Sports, Martial Arts, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kotoyama
synopsis: Takasago Shin, a skilled high school kendo player, faces a turning point in his life. A chance encounter shakes his confidence and forces him to question his path. In the world of clashing swords and quiet rivalries, *Minasoko* explores the pursuit of strength, purpose, and self-discovery.

title: Parallel Paradise
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery
author: Lynn Okamoto
synopsis: One day at school, Youta sees someone strange entering his school. Out of nowhere this being appears next to him and makes him fall from the 3rd floor. He lands in a strange world, where beings like dragons exist! Youta meets a young paladin, and discovers that he is the only man inhabiting that planet, and that its inhabitants are extremely 'weak' to his presence. Could this be paradise?

title: Aitsu No Kanojo
genre: Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life
author: Nikumaru
synopsis: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...

title: Elf Tensei Kara No Cheat Kenkokuki
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Rui Tsukiyo
synopsis:
A genius magician, to fight against his fate to die a natural death from old age, grasped at the truth of magic to allow himself to reincarnate with a power he created himself. The cycle of reincarnation is repeated multiple times and in his 31st reincarnation, the magician became a boy named Syril who lives in a village of elves.   
  
However, that village is ruled by Humans, and the Elves are treated as cattle. After becoming 14 years old, Cyril, who regained his past knowledge and experience, stands up to help a girl, Lucie, who is his childhood friend. The story of the creation of an ideal country begins in that one village, a place where all races can coexist. Elves, Fox-girl, and various other Heroines.

title: Fuku Wo Kiru Nara Konna Fuu Ni
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Yae Shimano
synopsis: Yuusuke, an average office worker meets with his friend at a reunion, only to find out that the fashion world has left him behind. Now, with the help of his sister Tamaki, Yuusuke must take his step into the world of trends and charisma.

title: Tsuihousareta Renkinjutsushi Wa Mujikaku Ni Densetsu to Naru Yandere Imouto (Oukoku No Shugoryuu) to Issho Ni Henkyou De Shiawase Ni Kurashimasu!
genre: Monsters, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Koharunrun
synopsis:
One day, Mys, the eldest son of Duke Windsor, is sentenced by the king to be exiled to the border. The king claims that his secret visit to Valitra, the strongest dragon that protects the kingdom, is an attempt at treason against the kingdom. However, Valitra's guardian dragon is actually Mys' younger sister, Tinny, who was thought to have died four years ago! 

"Mys Nii-sama is the one who saved my life, the one who is worthy to rule everything in the world [Supreme Being]. Anyone who hurts Mys Nii-sama will be thrown into hell!" 

And the Kingdom is heading towards destruction, having incurred the wrath of its guardian dragon, Valitra... Meanwhile, on the border where Mys has become the ruler, his alchemy techniques are leading to unprecedented developments and making everyone happy - and once again, the kingdom is in danger of destruction.

title: Haruka Reset
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Takeshi Nogami
synopsis:
Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. 
Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public baths, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... 
even if she can't take a big vacation or travel too far, she's determined to still enjoy any little "vacation" she can by getting creative!

title: Hoshino Hibana Wa Mitsugareru
genre: Comedy
author: Nawowowowowowo
synopsis: Hoshino Hika (25 years old). Unemployed, but moderately enjoying life. What makes this possible is her overwhelming 'ability to be pampered.' She possesses a mysterious charm that captivates certain people, allowing her to sustain her lifestyle with the support of those around her. What is her everyday life like, living outside the framework of 'market logic'the exchange of money for goods?

title: You Like Me, Not My Daughter?!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Tesshin Azuma
synopsis:
I will take in and raise this child.

I'm Katsuragi Ayako, thirty-\*BEEP\* years old. It's been 10 years since I took in the daughter of my late sister and her husband. My daughter's now in high school and is getting on well with her childhood friend, Aterazawa Takumi. Maybe they'll start dating? Takumi's a really nice guy, so I'm all for it.

Eh? He has something to say to me? Is it something like Please give me your daughter.? No way, I'm getting ahead of myself.

Ayako-mama I've always loved you. Please go out with me.

You like me (mama), not my daughter!?

A super pure-love romcom where long-held feelings explode!
___
**Character Designer:** [Giuniu](https://mangadex.org/author/657f488c-ba3d-4910-8ec3-539871b99fcc)

**Alt Official Raw:** [Young Animal Web](https://younganimal.com/series/5d1e949cd0b52)

title: Yume to Koi Dewa Tsuriawanai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life
author: Torii Shizuku
synopsis: Kurata Hikaru has fallen in love with her classmate Kira Kairi at first sight. Now, she's too lovestruck to concentrate on her studies. Her plan? Get Kairi to reject her so she can focus again.

title: Shinigami No Hanayome: Yomei 7-Nichi Kara No Koufuku
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Hako Ichiiro
synopsis:
The reaper loves seeing the cries of humans before swinging down his scythe to reap their souls. He lives for the hunt of humans souls before their passing. Yet one night, he encounters a dying girl with flowers blooming in her room looking back at him with a smile.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Square Enix Manga & Books](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/bride-of-the-death-god)

title: Seitokai Ni Mo Ana Wa Aru!
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Muchimaro
synopsis: When it comes to the face of this student organization, it's a little weird, like a fool, scary, or moody. However, mysterious and futuristic days that seem strangely cute pass by.

title: Senkou Shoujo
genre: Slice of Life
author: Yukiko Asano
synopsis: Hamano was an aspiring photographer who has assumed the role of adviser of high school photo department. With is devotion, he brings other members around him, especially Hikari. Meanwhile, the road to professional photography starts to open in front of the Hamano again

title: Dao of the Bizarre Immortal
genre: Sci-Fi, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Xiaodao Zhang
synopsis:
High school student Li Huowang possesses an ability: whenever he closes his eyes, he enters a bizarre cultivation world. In that strange world, he is captured by someone who calls him Master and is made into a living medicinea human cauldron that could be turned into a pill at any moment.

In the real world, however, Li Huowang is a mentally ill patient living in a psychiatric hospital, unable to attend school. The doctors tell him that the bizarre cultivation world is nothing but a hallucination.

Now, caught between reality and illusion, truth and lies, Li Huowang breaks down, crying and shouting:
Mom, I really cant tell whats real anymore!

title: Watashi Wa Erabarenai
genre: Romance, Drama, Fantasy
author: Yuniko Suzumiya
synopsis:
Although her marriage was arranged by her parents, Chloe, the daughter of a count, had deeply loved her fiancé, Ernest, the eldest heir of the Ordrand Marquis family, since childhood. However, she is struck by the shocking reality when Ernest decides to break off their engagement and choose her younger sister, Emily, instead.
Amid the pain of betrayal and heartbreak, Lionel, a young duke from the renowned Cislay family, suddenly appears and proposes marriage to her without any warning.

title: Urban Legend Maker
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Kuang Cao Bu Zhi
synopsis: The protagonist Yuan Zhenji crossed to the parallel world of Jiangshi, and found that this world was full of various horror and weirdness, and ordinary humans were as fragile as paper in front of them. He used a notebook called "Urban Legend Records" to create urban legends that affect reality, punish criminals and contain weirdness, absorb the weird rule ability "use magic to defeat magic", and become a monitor who fights against weirdness, and fights with his partners against the coming doomsday-level weirdness...

title: Gendai Shakai De Otome Game No Akuyaku Reijou Wo Suru No Wa Chotto Taihen
genre: Reincarnation, Video Games, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Tofuro Futsukaichi
synopsis: In the tough times after the Japanese economic bubble burst, a career woman suffering through the aftermath reincarnates as Keikain Runa, the villainess of an otome game with a modern setting! However, not long after reincarnating, she realizes just how dire a situation her family is in due to the ongoing financial recession. Using knowledge from her previous life, Runa sets out to rescue her new family from crisis and stand against the tide of 'the times' that caused her past life to end in misery.

title: Last Boss Shoujo Akari - Watashi Yori Tsuyoi Yatsu Ni Ai Ni Gendai Ni Iku
genre: Genderswap, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kiraku Kishima
synopsis: Not found

title: Kuromaku Ikka Ni Tensei Shita Kedo Gensaku Mushishite Dokuritsu Suru
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Akito Akamura
synopsis: A voluntary banishment declaration from the family, known as a 'mastermind family'! In order to avoid destruction, Yuri decides to live an unconventional slow life in the frontier...!?

title: Okinawa De Suki Ni Natta Ko Ga Hougen Sugite Tsura Sugiru
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Egumi Sora
synopsis: I, Nakamura Teruaki, transferred to Okinawa and I'm in love with Kyan, but I don't understand her dialect. Higa is always helping me out by interpreting the dialect...

title: 100 Miles
genre: Long Strip, Sports, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Mone
synopsis: Not found

title: Eighty Eight Wo 2 Dewatte
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Music
author: Arima
synopsis:
Mitsuru Fujita is a girl who loves playing piano. When she moves into her high school dormitory, her roommate is Kanade Kobayashi, a former rival at piano competitions. She was hailed as a prodigy, but Kanade has given up the piano due to trauma she suffered while studying abroad. Until Mitsuru invites Kanade to play a duet with her

(Source: Manga Time Kirara, translated)

title: A Genius Writer'S Random Workplace
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Pengseu
synopsis: Jinwoo Kim had been slaving as an assistant writer for 6 years with nothing to show for it. He quits his workplace. Later, he abruptly has a notification pop up and now he has scenes popping into his head and system prompts telling him he must be at a location to write. Maybe this is how he will become a star writer??

title: Apocalyptic Chef Awakening
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Cooking, Full Color
author: West
synopsis: Shin Young-jun, a sergeant chef, was greeted by the apocalypse just days before vacation. The battalion turned into chaos in an instant, and the communication network was cut off. Then something appeared before his eyes! [Congratulations on your awakening!] [Job: Novice Chef Lv.1] If I had been a warrior or an assassin, I would have tried to stand alone... What was assigned to him was chef, which is obviously a support job. There's nothing to be done if it's like this. "From here on, I will feed you."

title: Brother, Am I Cute?
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Ji-An Lee
synopsis:
Si-hyuk finds himself thrust into sudden responsibility when his parents tragically pass away in a car accident, leaving behind his much younger brother, Si-ha, who is two decades his junior. At the funeral, amidst the hushed murmurs of relatives, discussions arise about the uncertain future of the two brothers.

"What's the plan for those two? Who's going to step up?"
"Goodness, now that he's in college, how will he manage to care for his little brother?"
"Wasn't there some insurance payout?"

Amidst the chaos and uncertain discussions, Si-ha utters his first clear words. "Brother. Brother." It's a heartfelt cry, not for Mom or Dad, but for his older brother. Si-hyuk moves slowly toward Si-ha, embracing him tightly. "I'll take care of you," he whispers.

title: Shashin
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Jae-Won Lim
synopsis: Jongli Chu, a warrior of the Death Heavenly Sect who killed Hwang Jung to avenge his older brother. In order to avoid the pursuit of Death Heavenly Sect, he looked to an assassin of the Death Soul Agency, Crimson Assassin, for help and got swept into a huge mess known as the Obliteration. In order to escape the shadow of the Obliteration, he had no choice but to become a legendary Death God! Can Jong Lichu become a Death God and find freedom in the stifling rules created by the orthodox sects?

title: Liu Sui Kaishi Chengwei Nvwang
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Full Color
author: Hei Dong Ni Ao
synopsis: I woke up to find myself transmigrated into a novel as the background character that's doomed to die. Now stuck in the body of a six-year-old, Ive got some serious challenges ahead of me. But Im not about to let fate have its way. Even if I have to become the villain, Ill do whatever it takes to survive!

title: Genius Hitter Hits Fastball
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Sports, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Ji-Seong Hwang
synopsis:
Even he, Kang Geon-woo, a genius major leaguer who gained wealth, fame, and everything, could not continue a happy married life with his wife. He, who felt regretful about his wife's absence, returned to the past with the power of a mysterious ring.

As a high school student in the midst of a fresh romance, will he be able to find love this time?

title: The Return of the Superhero
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Superhero, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: SF Qing Xiaoshuo
synopsis:
Zero was mankinds first real superhero. Under his watch, countless other superheros appeared and followed in his footsteps. However, after 5 years of war, Zero disappeared without a trace.


---

**Note:** this is not your usual Chinese manhua, please read them from right to left (similar to Japanese format).

**Links:**
- [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1002/)

title: Shin No Jitsuryoku Wa Girigiri Made Kakushite Iyou to Omou
genre: Action, Romance, Magic, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Sato Kamekoya
synopsis:
A world where you can form a pact with gods and gain skills. Born as the third son of a famous knight family, Yuno was so busy controlling his innate power that he was eventually called "incompetent.".
However, in the magical knight academy, where he was enrolled for some reason, he fulfilled his fateful encounter with an unnamed god who was despised as "incompetent" like himself..  
Yuno, who formed a pact with the goddess and named her [Athena], secretly decided to make her the highest god, and decided to get a little more serious.

title: Jesus Sajin Kouro
genre: Action, Crime, Mafia, Military, Drama, School Life, Police
author: Kyouichi Nanatsuki
synopsis:
Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!

title: Kimi No Love Woo Misetekure!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Rimukoro
synopsis:
Komichi Shijou, the most famous person at her school, was troubled.
Despite being a romantic comedy manga artist, she had no understanding of 'the feeling of love' was stuck in a creative slump.
One day, a certain boy and girl appear before her.
With their arrival, Komichi Shijou's investigation into 'genuine love' begins!?

title: Magan No Akuyaku Ni Tensei Shita No De Oshi Chara O Mimamoru Mob O Mezashimasu
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Rishin Zaima
synopsis: I was reincarnated as Luxe, the villain with the Evil Eye that appears in the game, but I didnt want to meet a miserable end after being reincarnated into my favorite game! I decided to find happiness, I started training in Dark Magic from that day on in order to fight off the forces that attacked me insearch of the Evil Eye. And eventually, Ill become a mob that watches over my favorite characters! This is the story of how I, who was reincarnated as the villain of my favorite game, and my efforts to change my fate.

title: I'M Really Not the Evil God'S Lackey
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Long Strip, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: MR.Zhen Zhan
synopsis: Lin Jie is an otherworlder who manages a bookstore. Hes kind and always recommends soul-healing books for his dejected customers. Sometimes hed even share his own works too. As time goes on, these customers start to respect him a lot. They bring simple local products every day to show their gratitude and ask for book recommendations. They even start telling tales of this ordinary shopkeeper. His respectful and cordial titles include Hyena of the Evil God, Herald of the Flesh Gospel, Author of Cultes des Goules and Shepherd of the Stars???

title: Boku Wo Shirita Sugiru Shimizu-San
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: saku
synopsis:
Atago Gato is a shy and reclusive high school boy. One day, while preparing for the school festival, a cute and cheerful classmate named Shimizu Roman finds out that he is aiming to become a manga artist. Isn't that amazing? The popular girl, who seems to live in a different world from him, takes an interest in him and asks him a lot of questions he never expected! When he confesses a traumatic experience after being criticized on SNS... Shimizu-san tries to help him overcome it in a slightly strange way...? A youthful romantic comedy in which a cheerful girl and a gloomy boy struggle to make manga!

(Source: AniList)

title: Kichiku Eiyuu
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls
author: Yonoki
synopsis:
It's been 10 years since Takamichi reincarnated in hell. His Incubus power becomes stronger by having sex with women, but his growth peaked. 

"I'll move to a new area, wait for me beautiful women of the new world!"

title: Madou Kensei -Densetsu No Kikan-
genre: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Raimu Yumekaze
synopsis: The hero who holds both the strongest title in magic, Mage, and the strongest title in swordsmanship, Sword Saint, returns to a world 1000 years after becoming a legendary figure!! Balua Westgarden, the Magic Sword Saint who once mastered both magic and swordsmanship and etched his name at the pinnacle of human history, challenged the absolute demon king Giranher in a decisive battle for the survival of humanity. However, due to the interference of mysterious forces, both Balua and Giranher lost their lives. For 1000 years, Baluas soul was bound to the world by regret for dying halfway through his journey. But when Direa Westgarden, a boy who admired the Magic Sword Saint, was attacked by monsters and left on the brink of death, Balua returned to the mortal world by borrowing his body.

title: Martial Arts Alone
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Studio Samyugo
synopsis: A place where you casually use blood or ma in your name, I lived in Murim for 7 years. I was miserable, and I did a lot of dirty things. But I had to do anything to survive. That's 'Nangin' Finally, I crossed the line and experienced death in a desire to become stronger. But when I opened my eyes, it was modern. The world has changed and we are connected to the fantasy world of Pangea?! And as a returner with the only class? Let's scratch the lottery tickets!

title: Otonari No Onee-San Wa Xxx Shitai
genre: Shota, Mystery
author: Terutama Potekora
synopsis:
A love suspense story between a psycho lady and a lonely boy!!
Naoto, who gets treated terribly by his parents, has Naruko, a beautiful lady, show up at his doorstep and starts living next to him as his neighbor. Naruko seems to be kindly accommodating Naoto, but her actions are somewhat "unnatural"... A love suspense story between Naruko (a psycho lady) and Naoto (a lonely boy) unfolds!!

title: Putting My Life on the Line, I Go All-In on Luck Enhancement
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Musimcheon Dragon
synopsis:
Amano Kyouhei was a man abandoned by luck, but after hitting rock bottom, his fate finally begins to change. After a video of him defeating a monster goes viral on the internet, he becomes famous overnight.
This sudden reversal of fortune leads Kyouhei on a lifechanging journey of unforetold adventures. Will this stroke of luck bring him to true fortune, or will he face new trials to overcome? The answer to that question will be found in his upcoming journey!

title: Tomehane!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Katsutoshi Kawai
synopsis:
Tales of a high-school calligraphy club.  
  
A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki, a promising female judoist, and Yukari, a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan, end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters, they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition.  
  
Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho.

Live action series adaptation (2010): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/742-tomehane)

title: Marriage Gray
genre: Romance, Slice of Life
author: Taira Wadachi
synopsis: My wife is suspicious!! Why did she marry a guy like me? Ordinary average guy Tsuchioka Naotsugu ended up with Yoshino, who's perfect in all angles of beauty, know-how, and sociability. It's not "marriage blue" it's everyday life questioning over things, so it's "marriage gray" newlywed life, go!

title: Mamono Kurai No Boukensha
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Adaptation
author: Akai Hako
synopsis: Rude is an adventurer who makes a living by collecting medicinal herbs in dungeons filled with miasma, relying on his unique skill of abnormal status nullification. Because of this, other adventurers avoid him because he smells like miasma, and he cannot form a party, so he is derided as a miasma diver. Then, a new labyrinth is discovered, and Rude is invited to join a party that needs him as a baggage carrier. In order to change the situation, he challenges the labyrinth. However, after encountering a powerful monster in the labyrinth, the adventurers who accompanied him betray Rude and are abandoned as a decoy After a life-or-death battle with the monster, he is injured, loses all his supplies, and is in a desperate situation. With the monsters corpse lying before him, Rude tries to survive by gambling on the forbidden monster food The more he eats, the stronger he becomes. This is the start of an exciting gourmet adventure fantasy!

title: Split Lover
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Ryou Sawamura
synopsis:
If my true heart leaks, I wonder what feelings I will convey In this world, if your dissatisfaction rate reaches a certain level, your "Split" will satisfy your desire for you; Fission Syndrome.  
  
Makoto, a first-year high school student who fears Splitting and confessing to his crush, was accustomed to keeping his feelings hidden Until, one day, in front of Makoto's eyes, his crush develops Fission Syndrome?! Moreover, it was a terrible Split that appeared  
  
Received a grand prize at the 3rd Manga Box Editorial Club. "I can't hide my thoughts in this world," the Split Love manga is finally published!

title: My Younger Sister Was a Genius
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Music, Full Color
author: Nasullae
synopsis: Yoon Hajoon, who struggled to pursue his musical career despite his iffy talents and ended up sacrificing his own family along the way, " If only I could turn back time...! " One day, after living with regrets and alcohol for a while, he woke up and found himself had returned to the past. Just then, it dawned on him. The fact that my younger sister is a musical genius...! Now is the time to turn my life around, that is by producing my younger sister into becoming the best singer!

title: Mesh
genre: Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Moto Hagio
synopsis:
The story follows the life of a teenage boy named "Mesh," so-called for his unique "mesh"-colored hair: blonde with silver strands on the sides. It begins with a scene where Mesh, after being beaten, escapes from a mob and encounters Milon, a forger and painter. Mesh ends up staying at Milons house, and the two form an unlikely bond as they navigate life together. Each chapter is a poetic blend of crime, peaceful everyday moments, or the vibrant nightlife of artists in a fictionalized Paris.

"Mesh" is regarded as one of Hagio Motos defining works, marking a pivotal shift in her artistic style. It was her first series to adopt a more realistic look while retaining the ethereal beauty characteristic of 1970s sh?jo art. The story ventures into more mature themes while continuing to explore Hagio's recurring motifs, such as parent-child relationships and adolescence.

title: Isshou Watashi No Joshu De Ite!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Hirune Hitotose
synopsis:
"The relationship between a detective and their assistant is not unlike romance!"

Due to his natural tendency to assist others (a "helper type" personality that makes him constantly want to lend a hand), Mitomo Tasuku had always lived in the shadows. To break out of this, he made it his life's mission to "become number one." However, at the high school he transfers to, he encounters three detective girls, who happen to be his rivals from elementary school with whom he formed a detective club together. Thus begins Tasuku's fierce battle for the top detective spot! However... these girls seem to harbor passionate feelings of a different kind...!?

title: Professor
genre: Long Strip, School Life, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Tsuyatsuya
synopsis: Not found

title: Countach
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Slice of Life
author: Haruto Umezawa
synopsis:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

title: Azure Radio
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Bogosipeosseoyo
synopsis: Not found

title: M Collection
genre: Monsters, Ghosts, Comedy, Anthology, Zombies, Gore, Horror, Supernatural
author: Hideshi Hino
synopsis: This tongue-in-cheek semi-autobiography follows the absurdly gruesome adventures of a lonely boy and his singularly crazed family. His escape from the madness that surrounds him is his collection of pickled animal and human body parts, to which he adds as one family member after another meet with a grotesque and sometimes terrifyingly funny death... (Source: AniList)

title: Sasada Wa Tomodachi
genre: School Life, Slice of Life
author: Poppy Pesuyama
synopsis:
Yuki Takahashi attends Chabatake High School. Life is a series of party chances and she loves to have fun. Emi Sasada, who also attends Chabatake High School. She is a 16 year old who loves canned snakes and praying mantis and is still uncertain of her own form. The two of them, who were at the farthest end of the class, meet by chance one day after school and...?

This is the kind of manga that makes you think, "maybe my memories of high school, which had been so dull, weren't so bad after all."

title: Slime Blossom: a Reincarnated Genius in a New World
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Tsukuyomi Studio
synopsis: Taiga Hiiragi, a delinquent, lived a life consumed by daily brawls. One day, Noel, a genius slime reincarnated from another world, appears before him. When Taiga finds himself in a pinch during a fight, Noel uses his intellect to help him out. Then Noel declares to Taiga, Slimes and Yankees(delinquents) should go to Tokyo University!! Noel claims hes here to help Taiga pass the Tokyo University entrance exam, but?

title: The Ember Knight
genre: Action, Long Strip, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Hwan-Daeng
synopsis:
When Nagyunns twin brother, Najin, is murdered before his very eyes, he vows to avenge his brothers death by assuming Najins identity. 

But although the two may look alike, when it comes to fighting, Nagyunn lacks the talent and skill his brother possessed. In order to successfully execute his plot for revenge, Nagyunn resolves to train himself to become the prodigious knight-in-training his brother once was. 

Will Nagyunn be able to keep his identity a secret before others begin to catch on to his act?

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SC46p8Zh2g4)
