- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001459)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/the-ember-knight/list?title_no=3062)

title: Albus Changes the World
genre: Time Travel, Action, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Maki Akihisa
synopsis:
The Demon King was defeated. The world is at peace. But it was too late.

Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where time is of the essence. 

Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesnt matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster. 

Hero Albus seeks to reclaim the future he desires from the past in this ultra-fast readventure (real-time attack) fantasy!

title: Pumpkin Night
genre: Action, Psychological, Gore, Drama, Horror, Tragedy
author: Masaya Hokazono
synopsis: After escaping from a mental institution, a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her, face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.

title: Ore Ni Trauma Wo Ataeta Joshi-Tachi Ga Chirachira Mitekuru Kedo, Zannen Desu Ga Teokure Desu
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Incest, Harem, Drama, School Life, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Ichitaka
synopsis: Kokonoe Yukito has always been unlucky when it comes to women. He was rejected by his childhood friend, which he thought they had mutual feelings for each other. His sister hates him. His mother neglected him. Due to all these trauma stacking with each other, his emotions were completely destroyed. When Yukito enters high school, the girls who inflicted these pain on him started to care for him...?!

title: Yumizuka Iroha Wa Tejun Ga Daiji!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, School Life
author: Daisuke Yui
synopsis: Yumizuka-san grew up as the daughter of one of Japan's leading families of archery. But she had a secret about her seemingly perfect life! A tempestuous romantic comedy about a captivating archer!

title: Bokura No Ai Wa Kimochi Warui
genre: Girls' Love, Drama
author: Shio Usui
synopsis:
Everyone is hiding a "secret."

Azuki Komugi is obsessed with ruminating on her memories of her high school girlfriend "Meguru," and creating a body model of hers out of clay.

One day, Azuki drops her homemade "Meguru" at the 100-yen shop where she works part-time, and sneaks into her workplace on her off-shift to get "her" back. However, what she sees there is a fellow co-worker, high school girl Yoyuki Remu, who is about to express her lust for "Meguru" in a way that is different from Azuki's...

title: Shigoto Kaeri, Dokushin No Bijin Doushi Ni Tanomarete
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kouta Nozomi
synopsis:
One day, a young clerk named Haruhiko was suddenly asked by his boss to do one thing: get her pregnant.

We have nothing to do with anything else We just have to do it, that is, you have to get me pregnant, and I have your baby.

The loveless relationship between the two had begun. Although the condition was not to fall in love with each other, the distance between the two gradually narrowed.

The romance story between a typical worker and a divorced female boss. It has officially begun.

title: Watashi Ga Motenai No Wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera Ga Warui!
genre: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Nico Tanigawa
synopsis:
Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! 

How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?! A new high-school heroine is born (maybe?)!

title: Shonan Pure Love Gang!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Tooru Fujisawa
synopsis: Eikichi Onizuka and Ryuji Danma are members of infamous biker gang, Oni Baku. When not out riding around, they can be found in school, trying to pick up young women. This is the story of the young Onizuka, who would later become the greatest teacher in Japan.

title: Kannou Sensei
genre: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Motoi Yoshida
synopsis:
Narumi Rokurou is still adrift in life in his forties, unmarried, and working as an editor at a publishing company while writing hardly lucrative literary fiction. His days enjoying life at his own pace are brought to an end one summer night, when a strange twist of fate brings Rokurou together with a mysterious beauty, beginning the story of their crazed love.   
As once was spoken by Zarathustra: Everything in a woman is a riddle..

title: Kuro Hitsuji No Ayumi
genre: Psychological, Drama, Horror, Supernatural
author: Sora Mizuo
synopsis: The protagonist, Asahi, returns to her hometown after seven years. On her first day at the new school, Asahi is happy to be reunited with her beloved childhood friend, Haruhiko, but she soon sees something terrifying outside the window. At that moment, the classroom is enveloped in a strange atmosphere...

title: Sounds Like
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Music, Full Color
author: So-Yeon
synopsis: A dazzling survival band audition, youth? Revenge? Well, the only thing for sure is As long as Im here, you wont debut gracefully. My brother, Ha Seong-woo, a famous singer-songwriter, was murdered. The killer was Baek Do-hyung, my brothers friend and colleague. The moment I found out, I, Ha Su-in, also died in an unexpected accident After a moment of excruciating pain, I opened my eyes to find myself back 5 years ago, when my brother died. This second chance, I wont just stand by and watch like before. Im going to enter <PICK BAND 2>, the follow-up season of the audition my brother won and the grand debut stage for the killer Baek Do-hyung, and ruin everything. Just me? No, Ill gather geniuses that no one can mess with. After all, Ive replayed this audition hundreds of times.

title: Minami No Teiou
genre: Action, Crime, Mafia, Video Games
author: Dai Tennouji
synopsis: Centers around Ginjirou Manda, a loan shark who charges toichi  10% more interest every 10 days, or 365% every year. Thanks to his unrelenting money-collecting tactics, he is feared as "Minami no Oni" or the "Demon" of Osaka's Minami business district.

title: Kimi No Tame No Eden
genre: Official Colored, Long Strip, Romance, Harem, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Yuuki Shasendou
synopsis:
"Please... Kiss Me"

The young man, Yuusei Hakozaki, carries the memory of being kidnapped and confined along with six girls during his childhood. One day, as an adult leading a peaceful life, a girl suddenly appears before him and demands a kiss...!?

Yuusei is told of a single "rule": He must kiss the girls once every 24 hours. If he fails to do so, their heads will explode and they will die.

To save the girls from their deadly fate, Yuusei starts a communal life with them where he must "kiss them every day." In this closed-off miniature Eden, the story begins to unfold. Can Yuusei discern their lies and truths and find his one destined partner?

title: Stuck in the Tower
genre: Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: San
synopsis: A world where gates open and monsters come out to play Hyunsoo longs to enter the tower and take on the role a sa hunter. But in reality, he works as a porter and meat shield of E Class Hunters who are worse than gangsters. Moreover, he was taken advantage by this hunters to the point where he was about to meet death. As soon as he thought that he was dead, he was summoned to the tower, was revived back from the dead, and began climbing up the tower to become a hunter that he had been longing to be. Depending on how much coins one has, the tower offers them the chance to challenge it. Hyunsoo looks at the number of coins he has. [You have an infinite number of coins!] Then Ill awaken myself in the 100th floor and go home!!! Hyunsoo, who is stucked in the tower, begins his conquer!

title: Tsuma Ga Kuchi Wo Kiitekuremasen
genre: Slice of Life
author: Hiroko Nohara
synopsis:
***Winner of the 25th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize for "Short Story!***

A highly discussed and polarizing work that delves into marital issues, sparking major media reactions!

*Why is my wife angry...?*

A husband who thought he was living a peaceful life with his wife, daughter, and son as a typical four-person family suddenly finds himself in an unspoken crisis. One day, his wife stops talking to him. Days turn into weeks, and eventually, this wordless existence stretches into six years. There's no memory of a major fight, and household chores and childcare continue as usual. The only difference? Beyond the bare minimum of necessary communication, his wife doesn't speak to him at all.

Originally serialized to great acclaim on the *Yomitai* website, this much-anticipated book includes the shocking final chapter written exclusively for this release.

title: Gakuen Idolm@Ster: Gold Rush
genre: School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music
author: Kotoba Inoya
synopsis: The story of girls who attend a school where dreams come true!

title: Revolutionary Princess Eve
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Su-Ri
synopsis:
After the fall of the empire due to the homunculi, Evienrose, the 7th Princess, dies after drinking poison given by her younger sister who has taken their side. When she opens her eyes again, she has returned 8 years to the past. To stop the fall of the imperial family, Eve decides to turn 'Mikhael', the leader of the homunculi and the 'Monster of the Floating Prison', into her appointed knight.

"Mikhael, I need you, very much."

---
Princess Evienrose, despite advocating fiercely for the rights of the homunculi rebels, now awaits death at their hands that is until she is poisoned by her own sister! Awakening eight years in the past, Eve now has one goal: become the Empress and liberate the homunculi to stop the rebellion from ever happening! To do this, she appoints the rebel king himself, Mikaelis Agnito, as her personal knight. But with Eves scheming sisters standing in the way, the fight for the crown is on, and the fate of the Hadelamid empire rests in her hands!

---
The seventh imperial princess, Evenrose, once died. Her last memory was of the royal family was destroyed by the Homunculus, the rebelling slaves, and of her sister who had sided with the rebels and urged her to escape her painful execution by swallowing poison. But when she opened her eyes again, "I...I'm not dead." She realizes that she had gone eight years back in time, back to a time before her cruel sister Bridgette was chosen as the next emperor. Given the opportunity to prevent the fall of the imperial family by being chosen as the next emperor herself, she decides to write her own article about Michael, the king of Homunculus and the monster of public prison, in order to win the emperor's heart. "I need you, Michael. Very badly." Will Evenrose be able to get him and protect the imperial family safely?

---
Other Official Translations:

* [Simplified Chinese / ??](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/The-Traitor-Conqueror-Princess/3471)
* [Japanese / ???](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66840)

title: Superstar From Age 0
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Jyanna
synopsis:
From elves, fairies, slimes, gift items, devils and more, countless and thousands of reincarnations have led to a new life. I, Lee Seo Jun, have been reborn as a human child!

In the library of my life, where memories of my previous lives remain like fairy tales, I happen to see a past life with the dream life I desperately wanted. On top of that, Ive been given abilities that grabs peoples attention!

With my hansome face doing all the hard work! My insane acting skills! This time, at long last, I will achieve my dream and become a superstar!

Wets dow it! (Baby Accent)

title: Global Examination
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Survival, Adaptation
author: Su Li Mu
synopsis: This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.

title: The Demon King Levels up
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Tya-nim
synopsis:
Now that the demonic realm and the heavenly realm have called a truce, the human world has returned to an era of peace.

Jeon Minchul lives the life of an ordinary college student until the day he comes across an artifact from the war and remembers  in his past life, he was the demon king who brought the world to its knees.

Upon recalling these memories, Minchul awakens his old powers, along with some new ones. But can this demon king harness the powers of both good and evil to protect the peace?

title: The Game That I Came From
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: MOKF
synopsis:
With the rise of a popular RPG called Tianyong Game, its max-level players called "awakeners" have come to dominate the real world in terms of wealth and power. 

Despite Ling Ce's natural talent for the game, it's nearly impossible for him to catch up to these players because he started playing the game a year after its release. But as luck would have it, a glitch in the game's teleportation system takes him back three years into the past with his memories intact.

Now, Ling Ce is determined to utilize his knowledge and experiences to become an awakener and turn his life around. No amount of carnivorous plant monsters or insanity level dungeons will stop the determined hero from reaching the peak!


---

**Links:**
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/88411)
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58409509)

title: How I Attended an All-Guy'S Mixer
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Slice of Life
author: Nana Aokawa
synopsis: Tokiwa, a university student, is invited to a three-on-three blind date by Suou, a fellow classmate. On the day of the mixer, he goes to the pub where they are supposed to meet, only to find a group of handsome men waiting for him...

title: The Saga of Tanya the Evil
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Historical, Action, Psychological, Survival, Magic, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Chika Toujou
synopsis:
A young girl fights on the frontlines in war. She has blonde hair, blue eyes, and nearly transparent white skin as she flies through the air and mercilessly strikes down her enemies. Her name is Tanya Degurechaff and speaks with a young girl's lisp while she commands the army.

Tanya used to be one of Japan's elite office workers, but because of a wrathful god was reborn as a little girl. Prioritizing optimization and career advancement above all, she will become the most dangerous entity among the Imperial Army's sorcerers.  

Adapted from Light Novel of same name.  

---

**Note:** Manga and Light Novel Licensed in English by Yen Press as "The Saga of Tanya the Evil".

title: Papa No Iukoto Wo Kikinasai!
genre: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Tomohiro Matsu
synopsis:
The story is about the daily life of a college freshman in the Literature Department of Tama University. He and his sister grew up on their own together after their parent's departure, but he decided to start living by himself when she got married to a man with two daughters from previous marriages. Shocked by their marriage, he attempted to distance himself from the family, leaving home before his sister gave birth to the man's third child. Approximately 3 years later he was asked by his sister to visit and babysit the girls  
While he was looking after the girls, the plane which their parents were on went missing. He decided to take with him his three nieces (aged 14, 10 and 3 years old), resulting in the four of them sharing his tiny apartment.

title: The Great
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Gwang-Jin
synopsis:
A girl who dreams one day, a woman who loves one day. Now I'm a wife and mother of two.

My dreams were crushed by reality, and the memories of love were too short to comfort her.

Her ordinary life, or her..."The Great"

title: Blue Lock
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Muneyuki Kaneshiro
synopsis:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)

title: Disease
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Hui Shi TONY
synopsis: Terminally ill lad, after losing his family in an incident, finds out that hidden behind the disease is an extraordinary power. While pursuing the truth behind his family's death, he himself gets dragged further down the mysterious, dark abyss

title: Sunyu of the Shadowless
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Gyeong-Chan No
synopsis: Some children are raised in the hands of Kwak No, After establishing a Disciple-Master relationship, the children dream of their own dreams by practicing martial arts and walking in that path to become masters. In order to make a living, Kwak No always had to leave his seat, and Seon-yu, the eldest of the children, has to take care of the Children, and Hell be the Great Master.

title: The Kingdoms of Ruin
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Yoruhashi
synopsis: Due to the Gear Expansion, witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans, who were afraid of unscientific power, begin a witch hunt And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the Wizard of vengeance.

title: The Heavenly Demon Became an Idol
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Isekai, Full Color
author: Ssae-U
synopsis:
One day, a handsome man dressed in martial arts attire appeared in front of Manager Jeom So-Eui of the martial arts idol group 'Noble Alliance'. Introducing himself as 'The Heavenly Demon, Wi Hwajin', the man abruptly declared his intention to become an idol. Jeom So-Eui tried to pass this problem to the martial arts fanatic CEO of K-tsch, the agency of 'Noble Alliance', but the suspiciously wealthy martial arts enthusiast decided to let the Heavenly Demon join 'Noble Alliance'.

The Heavenly Demon, who claimed to represent the righteous faction, entered 'Noble Alliance'! However, there is a hidden motive behind the Heavenly Demon joining 'Noble Alliance' that even Jeom So-Eui doesn't know about....

title: Mujikaku Na Tensai Shoujo Wa Kizukanai
genre: Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Yuu Ibuki
synopsis:
She is a genius in all fields of magic, swordsmanship, alchemy, domestic affairs, music, painting, and novels?! She was able to do anything. However, she always tried not to be selfish, and decided to run away from home...! She is now an adventurer in a new world due to a chance encounter. Liliane unknowingly demonstrates all her talents...?!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3032hc)

title: Slave B
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: In-Seu Im
synopsis:
This is a world whose peace was destroyed by the Shadow Lord, Secneum. Niro is a half-elf, half-human boy who lost his parents as a baby and was adopted by a slave couple. In this world, slaves are not treated as humans. Since Niros adoptive parents are slaves, they are mistreated and eventually lose their lives. Now Niro is alone once more, and must shoulder the burdens of his family and do whatever is takes to protect his two younger siblings. If Niro wants to escape this fate, there is only one thing he can do. He must graduate from the academy, Excanum just like the current Emperor, Muren who was once a slave!

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%B6%85%E5%A5%B4%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84/86)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74286)

- [Official French Translation](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/Slave-B)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/slave_B_%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AA/7)

title: Chihayafuru
genre: Award Winning, Traditional Games, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yuki Suetsugu
synopsis:
Chihaya is a girl in the sixth grade, still not old enough to even know the meaning of the word zeal. But one day, she meets Arata, a transfer student from rural Fukui prefecture. Though docile and quiet, he has an unexpected skill: his ability to play competitive karuta, a traditional Japanese card game. Chihaya is struck by his obsession with the game, along with his ability to pick out the right card and swipe it away before any of his opponents. However, Arata is transfixed by her as well, all because of her unbelievable natural talent for the game. Don't miss the first volume in this story of adolescent lives and emotions playing out in the most dramatic of ways.

---
  
- **Won the 2nd Manga Taisho Award in 2009** 
- **Won the 35th Kodansha Manga Award for Shoujo in 2011**
  


---

**Official Websites:**   
- [Live-Action Movies](http://chihayafuru-movie.com)  
- [Chihayafuru Charity Fund Info](https://chihayafund.com/)  
- [Chihayafuru Charity Fund Store](https://chihayafund.stores.jp/)

title: Ohitorisama Ni Wa Naremashita No De. Konyakusha Houchi-Chuu!
genre: Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Jun Hareta
synopsis: Countess Nicole's fiancé, Chaos, is always by his childhood friend, Princess Caroline's side. As a result of being constantly neglected by Chaos, Nicole has awakened to the idea of ??being alone, thinking, "If that's what he likes, then I should do what I like too!"...? While Nicole has discovered the ease of being alone, Chaos, on the other hand, doesn't seem to understand the seriousness of the situation...? The long-awaited comic adaptation of the slapstick love comedy of Chaos and Nicole, whose mutual unrequited love has become complicated!

title: Heavenly Demon Wants to Be a Chef
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Cooking, Full Color
author: Philnar
synopsis:
Due to a gate-related accident, Woojin regains the memories of his past life... a life as the Heavenly Demon, ruler of China! 

However, as the Heavenly Demon, there was a dream he never managed to achieve. Now, in this life, he'll do whatever it costs to fulfill his lifelong dream of becoming a chef! 

This is the legendary(?) story of Cheon Woojin, the former Heavenly Demon, chasing his dreams!

title: Foam of the Waves
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Latte
synopsis:
"Never forgive me."
Margret, who was brutally murdered by her lover, is reborn 7 years later as 'Meg'. Will 'Meg', who doesn't know anything about the world, be able to acclimate well into her new life...? A story uncovering the truth behind her death and the growing love between the characters!

title: The Beginning After the End
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Tomozo Nishioka
synopsis:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.

title: Bonnou?Saiyuuki
genre: Genderswap, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Crystal na Yousuke
synopsis: The manga is a re-imagining of the famous Chinese classic Journey to the West story, and centers on the Buddhist priest Genj? and his journey to India as he is accompanied by three beautiful and charming women: Son Gok?, Cho Hakkai, and Sha Gojyo.

title: The Heavenly Demon Will Give You a Massage
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Seok-Jun Lee
synopsis: Heaven-bound Heavenly Demon, once known as Kang Taehan, Returns to his original life after 60 years! "Ah, in such a blessed era, to be in this shape!" "Your body is screaming to be saved, haven't you heard?" The project to physically and mentally rejuvenate everyone, The journey of the Heavenly Demon Kang Taehan begins!! Weary office workers tired from alcohol and overtime, Athletes whose bodies are ruined and performance declined, Heads of families crushed by the weight of life, Modern people who have accumulated fat to withstand lifes burdens. All you modern people who are weary of their life, come and get a massage!

title: Tenshi No Saezuri
genre: Thriller, Horror, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Sakuzou Baku
synopsis:
Sanae Kitajima is a psychiatrist specializing in end-of-life care. Her boyfriend, Takanashi, who once struggled with a deep fear of death, returns from an Amazon expedition profoundly changed. What happened during the expedition? What is the true meaning behind his cryptic words, "I can hear the whispers of angels"?

A complete manga adaptation of Yusuke Kishi's original novel, known for producing numerous masterpiece horror novels such as The Black House and Lesson of the Evil.

title: The Life of a Returning Officer
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Police, Web Comic, Full Color
author: D&C Webtoon Biz
synopsis:
Choi Jong-hyuk, captain of the intellectual crime unit, loses his mother and his own life to a mysterious mastermind for digging too deeply into a case. In his last moments, Jong-hyuk catches a glimpse of the man who kills him before waking up as his 17-year-old self.

 To prevent his mother's death, Jong-hyuk swears to hunt down the one responsible. Luckily, he has knowledge about the future and his experience as an officer.

Will these tools be enough to catch the criminal that eluded him once?

title: Tensei Shitara Sainou Ga Atta Ken ~Isekai Itte Mo Doryoku Suru~
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ken
synopsis:
In a twist of fate, a diligent ronin student finds himself transported to an unfamiliar realm. This unexpected journey began when he valiantly attempted to stop a robbery alongside a female store clerk. Longing for a unique ability that he could hone through hard work, he sought the blessings of a deity. Consequently, he was endowed with two rare talents: "Innate Talent," allowing him to consistently surpass others, and "Clairvoyance," which grants him the insight to assess both individuals and objects. Yet, there's a catch; he requires thrice the standard experience to ascend in levels.

Reborn as Mars, the second son of a noble viscount lineage, he remains committed to refining his abilities. However, the town's periphery shows alarming indications of an imminent monster incursion. Thus, Mars' extraordinary journey of reincarnation in this fantastical world commences.

title: The Maknae Has to Be an Idol
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Janbi
synopsis:
"I will leave the debut group."
I can't make it in this group. I should leave and set up a chicken restaurant so that my brothers could at least make a name for themselves.
Destined to be a failed idol, I decided to leave the group for the betterment of the others.
However,
[A member dies if you leave the debut group.]
What?
"...This is making me crazy."
The struggles of Bong Tae-Yoon, the Maknae on top, whose hands hold the lives of his group members, begins now!

title: Sokushi Cheat Ga Saikyou Sugite, Isekai No Yatsura Ga Marude Aite Ni Naranai N Desu Ga
genre: Action, Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Tsuyoshi Fujitaka
synopsis:
Growth cheats? Infinite magic power? The ability to utilize all archetypes? Whats the point if instant death ends everything with a single attack? 
 
Awaking to absolute chaos and carnage while on a school trip, Yogiri Takatou discovers that everyone in his class has been transported to another world!

He had somehow managed to sleep through the entire ordeal himself, missing out on the Gift  powers bestowed upon the others by a mysterious Sage who appeared to transport them. Even worse, he and another classmate were ruthlessly abandoned by their friends, left as bait to distract a nearby dragon. Although not terribly bothered by the thought of dying, he reluctantly decides to protect his lone companion. After all, a lowly Level 1000 monster doesn't stand a chance against his secret power to invoke Instant Death with a single thought!

If he can stay awake long enough to bother using it, that is...

title: Prey
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Ghosts, Long Strip, Survival, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Oenunbagi
synopsis: Park Yun-yeong has a mysterious power which allows her to see ghastly creatures that seem to inhabit our world but not interact with it - unless they notice you acknowledge their existence. Thats when they stop being harmless.

title: The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn'T a Guy at All
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Music, Gyaru
author: Sumiko Arai
synopsis:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. Hes got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know  this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Ayas, she can't help but be extremely aware of the others crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question  but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldnt be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***

title: Madame Petite
genre: Thriller, Historical, Romance, Adventure, Drama
author: Shigeru Takao
synopsis:
It's the 1920s and Mariko, age 16, is married to a man 30 years her senior. She is honestly happy 
to be his wife and really excited to board the Orient express in Turkey on their honeymoon trip. 
But her life takes a rapid turn when her husband is discovered dead after the first night on board 
And that's only the start of Mariko's great adventure.

title: 2.5 Jigen No Ririsa
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yuu Hashimoto
synopsis:
From Seven Seas:
I have no interest in real girls! So claims Okumura, the president of the schools manga club. Hes your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographerand guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)

title: The Dentist Won'T Stop Teasing Me
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Medical, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Mizuki Ueshita
synopsis: After suffering from an unbearable pain caused by a wisdom tooth, Cai Tong'an visits the dentist, only to be greeted with a beautiful and gentle Dr. Xie Ruanqing. To her surprise, she turns out to be the senior she secretly admired during her university days...

title: Tougen Anki
genre: Action, Demons, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Supernatural
author: Yura Urushibara
synopsis: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!

title: Vagabond
genre: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Psychological, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
author: Takehiko Inoue
synopsis:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.

title: Kekkai Sensen Beat 3 Peat
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Adventure, Office Workers, Video Games, Vampires, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Yasuhiro Nightow
synopsis: Kekkai Sensen: Beat 3 Peat centers around the crime fighting organization "Libra" and their battles in Hellsalem's Lot, formerly known as New York City. Hellsalem's Lot was created in a single night when a portal to the "Beyond" opened, and now it is a paranormal melting pot of monsters, magic, and the everyday mundane city life. It's up to Libra to prevent the horrors of this city from spreading to the outside world.

title: Omiai Shitakunakatta Node, Murinandai Na Jouken Wo Tsuketara Doukyuusei Ga Kita Ken Ni Tsuite
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
author: Tsuguharu Miyuki
synopsis:
One day, Yuzuru Takasegawa  a first-year high school student  is urged by his grandfather to go on an arranged marriage meeting, insisting that he wants to see his great-grandson before he dies.

However, not wanting to bear the weight of a fiancee at the tender age of a freshman in high school, Yuzuru tries to avoid the arranged marriage meeting by imposing an irrational condition that, If she is Blonde Haired, Blue Eyed, Fair Skinned with big boobs, only then I will think about the marriage.

But somehow, he finds the girl who meets the conditions that Yuzuru has put out, and he reluctantly ends up going to matchmaking only once.

And on the day of matchmaking, it was Arisa Yukishiro, a beautiful girl with reputation at school, shows up on the scene. [adapted from Novel Updates]

title: Isekai Chikyuu Kan De Kojin Boueki Shite Mita
genre: Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Douraku Ebineko
synopsis: By chance, Wataru discovers a gate that allows him to travel between Japan and a different world, and makes a lot of money by bringing sugar and other goods into the new world.

title: Return of a Crazy Genius Composer
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Music, Full Color
author: Hae-Ro In
synopsis:
Success, fame, family In an instant, the genius composer, Min Hyunseung, lost it all. On the brink of death he wanted to live a different life, one where all those continuous misfortunes couldnt just be claimed as karma.

How did this happen?

He was given another chance to live.

title: Tatari
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Supernatural
author: Shigeru Mizuki
synopsis:
Tatari is a lone stray cat. He is taken care of by his siblings Takeru and Yuki. In a ramshackle apartment, they lived a poor but happy life. Until that day.

"Tatari" is the Japanese word for the curse of a vengeful ghost, by the way.

title: Hikaru Ga Shinda Natsu
genre: Award Winning, Boys' Love, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Mokmok Len
synopsis:
"So, Hikaru is no more... If that's true then..."

Yoshiki and Hikaru are two boys who live in a certain village. They're the same age and have always been together growing up. But one day, Yoshiki noticed that "something else" has taken Hikaru's place. Even after learning of this, Yoshiki still wants them to be together. And so, his life with the "something" that looks like his friend begins.

At the same time, strange incidents keep occurring in the village...

[Yen Press English Simulpub](https://yenpress.com/series/the-summer-hikaru-died-manga-serial)

title: Twinstar Cyclone Runaway
genre: Sci-Fi, Romance, Adventure, Girls' Love, Adaptation
author: Ahiru Tanaka
synopsis:
Six thousand years in the future, humanity has established a civilization in the atmosphere of a gas giant named Fat Beach Ball. There, inhabitants of the resource-starved planet catch Besshu, fish-like creatures that "swim" through the skies. Fishers (exclusively male-female pairs customarily seen as a married couple) use malleable aircraft to bring in their catch.

The story follows Terra Intercontinental Endeavor, a woman looking for a partner, and Diode, a mysterious girl with terrific piloting skills, as they work to establish their same-sex partnership and bring home a successful catch.

Manga adaptation of the cosmic yuri SF novel series written by Ogawa Issui. Ogawa's original "Twinstar Cyclone Runaway" short story was nominated for the Seiun Award in 2020.

title: 20Th Century Boys
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Mafia, Adventure, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Cooking, Mystery, Music, Tragedy
author: Naoki Urasawa
synopsis:
Humanity, having faced extinction at the end of the 20th century, would not have entered the new millennium if it weren't for them. In 1969, during their youth, they created a symbol. In 1997, as the coming disaster slowly starts to unfold, that symbol returns. This is the story of a group of boys who try to save the world.  

---  
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2001**  
- **Won the Seiun Award for Best Comic in 2008**  
  
Volume Titles:
- Tomodachi  
- Yogen-sha  
- Git? o motta eiy?  
- Aitoheiwa  
- Sai kai  
- Saigo no kib?  
- Shinjitsu  
- Kendji no uta  
- Rabbit Nabokov  
- Kao no nai sh?nen  
- Seibun hy?ji  
- Tomodachi no kao  
- Owarinohajimari  
- Sh?nen to yume  
- Ban paku ban zai  
- Kagami no mukou  
- Cross counter  
- Min'na no uta  
- Kaettekita otoko  
- Jinrui no sh?bu  
- Uch?bito genru  
- Seigi no hajimari

---
