title: Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Kyung-Min Lee
synopsis: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.

title: May I Ask for One Final Thing?
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Nana Ootori
synopsis:
The engagement between Scarlet, a noblewoman from a ducal family, and Second Prince Kyle was suddenly annulled during a ball. 
She had been falsely accused of harassing a girl called Terenezza, daughter to a baron, whom the Prince doted on heavily. 
Condemned by everyone around her and forced to burden all manner of crimes, she finally decided enough was enough.  
  
Before I leave here, may I please ask you just one last thing?  
  
As the crowd threw their boos and jeers, and that good looking guy flung his insults?? 
her palm spun like a drill and the ballroom floor was stained with blood. From her fists, their reckoning!

title: Osu!! Karate Club
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kouji Takahashi
synopsis:
The series began as a fairly humorous and lighthearted satire of Japan's teenage delinquent-gang subculture told from the perspective of Matsushita Tadashi (who also narrates these early Karate Bu stories), a 2nd year student at Kangokou High and a constant target of Kangokou's numerous bullies who beat him up routinely after school. He is almost always accompanied by his best friend Saitou Takaki, who is also constantly harassed.  
  
As the pair grow increasingly tired of being victimized they decide to join the titular Karate Club, which is notorious throughout Osaka's youth gangs for training and producing the city's most hardened and toughest teenage thugs while maintaining the facade of a legit school sports club. But when they join the club, they find themselves picked on just as much if not worse by the club's current members. But as the story progresses they grow to be increasingly capable fighters.  
  
Along with the manga's change in attitude and central character, the various teenage fighters throughout the series grew increasingly stronger and even began to tap into superhuman ki abilities, putting Osu!! Karate Bu in the company of other similar epic Sh?nen fighting manga such as Yu Yu Hakusho, Dragon Ball, and Fist of the North Star.  
  
Osu!! Karate Bu was wildly popular in its native Japan, but is otherwise almost completely unknown in most other countries. It spawned a four episode OVA mini-series released over a period of two years from 1990-1992, a 1990 live action movie, and a 1994 Super Famicom fighting game.

title: Tsumi to Kai
genre: Romance, Crime, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life

synopsis:

When he wakes up, he finds himself unharmed, lying on the ground, with a different version of Miyato beside him  she looks the same, but her clothes and hairstyle are different...?

Just before summer vacation in their third year of middle school, the class is suddenly transported to another world by the goddess Ashera. The 26 students are given statuses that allow them to use skills and cheat abilities to become heroes in the other world. However, the number of students transported is 25leaving behind Iori Shu, the boy who had just transferred and wasnt counted.

While his classmates train in the other world to prepare for their battles as heroes, Shu remains in peaceful Japan, devoting himself to studying the status he was given. Quietly experimenting with his skills, he occasionally uses them to help those around him. But before he realizes it, Shu has become a target of various organizations around the world!?

Kousuke Kurono was an Avenger. After being raped, his beloved little sister was left out in the cold and froze to death.  
From the time he was 13-years old, Kousuke made use of any possible means in order to exact his revenge. 5 years had passed, he achieved his revenge, but having lived solely for the sake of revenge, at the moment his revenge came to fruition, afterwards he couldnt muster up the willpower to live on. Thats why, with the same knife he used to kill the culprits, he slit his own throat. However, he then heard a voice; Is that not wasteful?. When he came to, he found not his home, his country, nor his worldIt was another world.

Should she: 1. kill him, or 2. raise him up and openly ask for treasures from him. However, since she wants to get all sorts of treasures from him, she chooses the second option. Master? Want treasure? Let's cultivate together, but alone, just us two, then.

synopsis:
Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church, and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus. However, as they grew up, some differences between them became plain. Yuno was a genius with magic, with amazing power and control, while Asta could not use magic at all, and tried to make up for his lack by training physically. When they received their Grimoires at age 15, Yuno got a spectacular book with a four-leaf clover (most people receive a three-leaf-clover), while Asta received nothing at all. However, when Yuno was threatened, the truth about Asta's power was revealed, he received a five-leaf clover Grimoire, a "black clover"! Now the two friends are heading out in the world, both seeking the same goal!

synopsis: The story focuses on the 16-year-old protagonist, Akira Kurusu, who got transferred to Shujin High School in Tokyo after he was sued by a man with political connection for a non-existent violence when Akira saved a woman from being molested by the man, leading to his probation. Arriving in Tokyo, he finds a mysterious app got installed into his phone that enables him to enter another world formed from corrupt hearts of adults where he awakens his power called Persona. During his times there, he is joined by two fellow students Ryuuji Sakamoto and Ann Takamaki, and a shape-shifting cat-like creature known as Morgana. Feeling suppressed by their environment, the four form a group known as the "Phantom Thieves of Heart" to steal corrupt hearts of adults and reform society.

Little did he know, the kindness he spread, based on the standards of his old world, was saving those around him more than he could imagine. He was unaware that this kindness was causing the women around him to develop intense feelings for him.

title: Master Villainess the Invincible!
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Bi-Nam Ga
synopsis:
Yeoju is a second-rate author living a mediocre existence in modern-day Korea. A tragic accident lands her in the plot of a bestselling martial arts novel and she wakes up as the infamous villainess Haewon Tang. Hoping to save herself from a gruesome death, Yeoju must figure out who to trust, harness Haewons inner chi, and learn martial arts as she fights to save the Sichuan Tang Clan. Can she change the outcome of the novel and prove shes the worthy hero?

---
Our main character was an unsuccessful romance fantasy novelist when she gets into a hit-and-run then wakes up as the villainess in a best-selling martial arts novel. She uses the information from the novel that she had analyzed in her original life, in order to avoid her death-ending and finding the truth behind what had really happened to her.

One day, in order to concentrate on his novel, he decides to move to the countryside to live in the atelier owned by his grandfather. Koichi is stunned by the empty countryside, but there he meets Ichika, a tan high school girl who is out of place in the countryside.

She's sexually uninhibited, promiscuous and she'll let anyone have sex with her right away, but she also has a strong desire to get married, and she's good at cooking and managing people. Koichi is attracted to Ichika, and before he knows it, he wants to make her the heroine of his own novel. For some reason, I ended up living with Ichika!!!?

And so begins the life of living together with a tan gal. When Ichika invites him to have sex with her in order to have a child, will Koichi be able to suppress his rationality and successfully complete his novel?

title: The Secret of House Francesa
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Crossdressing, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Hwa-Hyeon
synopsis:
The Duchy of Francesca rules the northern provinces on behalf of the fallen Imperial family. After the sudden death of the lord of their household, Duke Den, the twins Damian and Chloe become puppets at the hands of their relatives. Controlled by dark magic, Damian becomes the empty-shelled lord of the household while Chloe, who has a natural talent for swordsmanship, becomes an assassin repeatedly committing unwanted murders. Later deemed no longer useful, she falls to dark magic and kills Damian with her hands before meeting her own tragic ending afterward. However, when she opened her eyes once more, she returned to the past. To the past  the day of her beloved fathers, Duke Dens funeral. From then, Chloe made a decision. A decision to not allow her past life to repeat itself... and to punish her relatives and the vassals who dared turn their backs on her family.

---
So many things would have been different if you had become the family head

*My older twin brother died at my hands.*

Chloe, who was controlled by black magic and forced to murder endlessly against her will, ultimately ends up killing her older twin brother. With barely a moment to mourn, the tip of her sword was immediately pointed at Chloes heart. Chloe died a miserable death. But when she opened her eyes again, she realized that she had gone back in time.

*I wont repeat my past life. In order to protect my family and my beloved older brother, I will personally become the master by becoming my brother.*

Look forward to it. You are the ones who pushed me to this point.

---

title: I Became the Only Healer in This World

author: Ong-Gi
synopsis:
Healer who is addicted to gambling has been on a single path for years. Somehow, the world changed and I became the world's only healer. [There is a place that needs you, a unique healer.] [Will you respond to the summons?] What? 'You have a tank dealer but no healer?' No, what. Is there any balance for X network with tank damage but no healer? [The constellations watching you complain that this is not a game, but reality!] *** It has been several decades since the Gate appeared. I heard that a lot of strategies and data have been accumulated over the years. Why is everyone proceeding so inefficiently? 'Frustrating?' I was serious about my strategy, so I just tried my best to close the gate. It was you who saved me. I made it so that only you can see it. 1st place in the former rankings who were said to have been betrayed and went into hiding. I need you. my savior My life. Head of the world's top 10 guild unions. Dont abandon me. Because I cant breathe without you. Up to 1st place in the current ranking. I was too busy clearing the gate, but strange guys started to come by. 

[Plate/Constellation/Hunter/Himsumjin/Munchkin/Yeojuwon Tower/Salvation]

synopsis:
When Princess Fleta, who has been mistreated her entire life due to being born with a curse, summons the basilisk and destroys the palace, Princess Cezanne regrets that things could have turned out differently if someone had been by Fleta's side. So when she miraculously finds herself six years back in time, she is determined to take Fleta under her wing and fill her baby sister's life with nothing but joyful light. Will Cezanne be able to dispel the darkness inside Fleta and rewrite the ending?

---
The imperial family collapsed during one night by the basilisk, the summoned beast of darkness which was summoned by the cursed princess, Fleta. If there is a next life, then Can I really be your younger sister? If I had approached you a little earlier, would it have been different from now? The last time everyone regretted it, the time miraculously returned to 6 years earlier. If this is the second chance we've been given.

title: Winning Pass
genre: Comedy, Sports, School Life
author: Tatsuya Sakamoto
synopsis: Haruto Ichinose has an older brother, Shori Ichinose, who has excellent grades, is a basketball prodigy, and is very popular in school. Although he says he hates basketball, he trains alone and challenges his brother, only to be beaten back. On the other hand, his older brother Shori seems to recognize his "talent" more than anyone else, but who is he really...?

title: Unnamed Memory
genre: Romance, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Naoki Koshimizu
synopsis:
*As long as youre the master of that sword and Im a witch, someday youll have to kill me for real.*

As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.

title: Hitomi-Chan Is Shy with Strangers
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Cyorisuke Natsumi
synopsis: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl. This one shall be a happy, heartwarming slice-of-life comedy.

title: Kawaibara-Senpai Wa Kawaii (Saotome-Kun) Ga Suki!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Slice of Life
author: Ceramic
synopsis:
Saotome-kun is short and terrible at sports. He thought that studying was his only good point, but in his new high school, his grades are a far cry from stellar. As he was feeling down and thinking he had nothing, the academically brilliant, sporty, elegant, and beautiful "Perfect Student Council President" Kawaibara-senpai approached him.
Having maintained her position at the top of the grade since she enrolled, she offers to tutor Saotome on one condition: he must wear a sailor uniform while studying with her. Their secret study sessions after school begin...

title: Konna Ni Kawaii Otose-Kun Ga Onna No Ko No Hazu Ga Nai
genre: Comedy, Crossdressing, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
author: Nunu Tanaka
synopsis: Otose-kun, a male college student, loves being "cute" while crossdressing! But one day, his classmate Tachibana (?) finds out about his hobby. What does Tachibana want in exchange for keeping the secret? They connect with each other through "cuteness" ?

title: Kono Kankei Wa Gouhou Desu!
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Chihiro Aka
synopsis:
YES Sister, NO Touch!

Kouta, who is extremely siscon, decides to live alone in order to "escape from his little sister ". One day, however, he picks up a runaway girl named Ui, who is full of younger sisterly feelings. Although she looks and acts like a child, she is in fact a beautiful 19-year-old girl with big tits!

Protect his sister? or Crossing the line? The days of agony begin!

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D'S
genre: Sports, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Masahiro Hikokubo
synopsis: The Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's manga is a spin-off of its anime series. Like the Yu-Gi-Oh! GX manga, the events that take place, as well as the cards used by characters differ from those in the anime. It was published monthly in the V Jump magazine in Japanese, and has been released in English via the Shonen Jump magazine starting with the January 2011 issue. It began serialization on August 21, 2009, and ended on January 21, 2015, with a bonus chapter being announced to be included in the final volume. The author of the manga is Masahiro Hikokubo and the artist of the manga is Masashi Sat?. The manga is supervised by Kazuki Takahashi.

title: The Lady Knight and the Beast-Eared Child
genre: Monsters, Animals, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Slice of Life
author: Turbo Engine
synopsis: A different world where demons are rampant and murderous. Olivia, a female knight, lives with her apprentice Noah, an animal eared child. A tale of a master and apprentice growing up, adventuring and being healed by the strong bond between each other.

title: The Prince of Tennis Ii
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Tomozo Nishioka
synopsis: The exclusive Japanese U-17 training camp was previously only open to the top high school players in the country. All of this changes when 50 of the nation's best middle school players are selected to join the esteemed training facilityincluding 12-year-old tennis prodigy Echizen Ryoma. But what seems like an ordinary training camp quickly becomes something far greater than any of the middle schoolers are expecting. The climb to the top of the Japanese tennis world is perilous, but even that journey pales in comparison to the world stage that awaits beyond the summit.

title: Zennin Ossan, Umarekawattara Sss Rank Jinsei Ga Kakutei Shita
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Shiro Yuzuma
synopsis: The virtuous will definitely be rewarded! This world judges the deeds and good karma of your previous life, and grants you a rank when you are reborn. The benevolent man, even surprising the gods through this, decides to be reborn as the son Alexander of a noble family in the same world as his past life, and thus starts his SSS-Rank life! Follow Alec's journey as he lives his life as a SSS Rank!!

title: Yankee Jk Kuzuhana-Chan
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Delinquents, Gyaru
author: Toshinori Sogabe
synopsis: At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone. Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?

title: Harukanaru Ring
genre: Action, Survival, Sports, Drama
author: Keigo Nakamura
synopsis:
(from [wikipedia.ja](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%81%99%E3%81%8B%E3%81%AA%E3%82%8B%E3%83%AA%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0)):

Yu Takamine was fascinated by the female pro-wrestlers she saw as a child, and overcoming her parents' opposition, she auditioned for and passed the Tokyo Women's Pro Wrestling Association Match to become a pro-wrestler. 

However, this was only the first step to becoming a wrestler. 

This is the story of Yu, an amateur wrestler who is not particularly strong, and her growth as an apprentice, rookie, heel, idol, and senior wrestler as she explores various fighting styles.

title: Lanxi Zhen
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: MTJJ
synopsis: Lanxi Zhen tells the story of Laojun, Xuanli, and Qingning during the war. It shows a different world of demons and gods.

title: Yowamushi Pedal
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Wataru Watanabe
synopsis:
Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didnt have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.  
  
Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamacharia bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceriesto go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.  
  
Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he?


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Yowamushi Pedal, Go!**

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015, which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins**

title: Kodomo No Jikan: Houkago
genre: Genderswap, Loli, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kaworu Watashiya
synopsis: This is a side history of "Kodomo no Jikan" original story. It is a recopilation of some one-shots, 4-koma and side-stories, with a special, with the events after the last chapter (093) from the main story.

title: I'M the Only One with Genius Dna
genre: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: I-Do Im
synopsis:
A status window appeared in front of Ryu Young-jun, a researcher at a pharmaceutical company.  
Rosalin's status window, an artificial cell that knows everything about biology.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%98%BC%EC%9E%90-%EC%B2%9C%EC%9E%AC-DNA/2412)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/64743)

title: Kusunoki'S Flunking Her High School Glow-Up
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mitsuki Mii
synopsis: After his traumatic years in junior high school, the ultra-introvert Shizuki Keisuke decides to turn his life around, and gives himself a complete make-over for his high school "debut." His new high school life seems promising, as no one is aware of his hidden past...except for one person: Kusunoki Shizuka, who also changed herself in pursuit of a more successful high school life! As their fates intertwine, will Keisuke ultimately be able live a peaceful life in high school...?!

title: Gwijjal Romance
genre: Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Horror, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yeong-Won Lee
synopsis: Seonwoo Yoo, a senior in the photography department, is working as a photographer. One day, he receives a collaboration proposal from a famous overseas magazine.For a while, such a fluttering heartRecently, a jokjok ghost taking a picture is taken together'Seon-woo', who suffered from a psychic phenomenon, tries in various ways to solve it, but it is not easy.In the meantime, the psychic picture was not taken.They find the only subject... It is none other than the most famous playboy on campus, 'Choi Moo-young! "Model? Let me do it. Go out with me instead."Will 'Seonwoo' be able to take a picture of 'Mooyoung' and debut safely in a famous overseas magazine?!The dilemma of a horror romance with him, who never wants to be involved, begins!

title: Honto Wa Motto, Shitai Dake
genre: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Doujinshi
author: Eku Takeshima
synopsis: Not found

title: Patalliro!
genre: Action, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Military, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Mineo Maya
synopsis:
Patalliro is the story of the young boy king Patalliro and his many misadventures as he avoids being assassinated by various beautiful boys thanks to the skills of his bodyguard, Major Jack Bancoran from England's Information Bureau. 
Later they're joined by the hot-blooded Maraich, and a beautiful love-and-hate relationship blossoms between him and Bancoran.

title: Koi Toka Yume Toka Tententen
genre: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Minami Serata
synopsis:
Kai-chan is a 29-year-old part-time worker who moved to Tokyo 10 years ago with dreams in mind. She is busy making a living, and time just passes by. She even gave up drawing, something she loved, because it was painful when she didn't get any "likes" from anyone when she posted her pictures on social media. Meanwhile, Kai-chan falls in love and moves from Tokyo to Osaka! A story of love and dreams that keeps rolling in for Kai-chan, whose first unrequited love of her life is unstoppable.

2nd placer of the women's edition of "Kono Manga ga Sugoi! 2025", just behind the winner "Tamaki & Amane".

title: Saint Seiya: Rerise of Poseidon
genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy
author: Tunakan Suda
synopsis:
The sanctuary is exhausted after the battle against the Lord of Darkness Hades.
In the absence of Seiya and the others, the land was about to meet its end in the wrath of the goddess Nemesis!
At that moment, the Emperor of the Sea Poseidon awakens to Hades' call and, together with the Seven Marina Generals challenges Nemesis and their Heroic Souls who serve her in battle!

title: Captain Kid
genre: Historical, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic
author: Hiroshi Uno
synopsis: In the 19th century, there lived a young pirate king, feared enough to be called the Devil of the Sea. His name is Captain Kid! With his mysterious guardian sword, Black Lightning, he sails the seven seas aboard his vessel, the Golden Drake!! What awaits him? Is it hell, or the furious waves of the ocean?! The adventurous tale of Kid and his band of rogues begins here!!

title: Hanayamata
genre: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Sou Hamayumiba
synopsis:
Normal appearance, normal intelligence, normal in arts and sports just normal. This is the entirely normal 14-year-old, Naru Sekiya. While she admires "Heroines" she continues to live a normal life until one moonlit night she meets a fairy. This foreign girl then guides her into the extraordinary world of the yosakoi dance.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media

title: Saijaku Tamer Wa Gomi Hiroi No Tabi O Hajimemashita
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Honobonoru500
synopsis:
When Ivy was born into this world, she remembered her past life. Remembering her preincarnation, she strove to avoid strife. But fate curdled at the status check, when kids learn who they are. For she had only one skill  Taming  and not a single star. Ivy was weak from the start  at most, she could tame a slime. And in her world, most people did not give the weak their time. Only one woman in her village would treat her as her own. But after she died, Ivy got the hint and ran from home. While on the lam, she met a tiny slime and made Sora its name.  And such begins the heart-warming survival story of a small girl who can tame.

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9629ex/)

title: Disney Twisted Wonderland - the Comic - ~Episode of Savanaclaw~
genre: Action, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Suzuka Oda
synopsis: Hirasaka Yuuka, a high-school student who lived an average life, and a black carriage that suddenly appeared in front of her one day on her way home from club. After seeing it and losing consciousness, she awoke in another world called "Twisted Wonderland"...?

title: Mahou Shoujo Ikusei Keikaku: Restart
genre: Thriller, Action, Magical Girls, Magic, Fantasy
author: Asari Endou
synopsis: 16 Magical Girls have been chosen to participate in the Magical Girl Raising Project by an unknown person and this time, there's prize money involved. Every three days, their Magical Phones will pull them into an RPG-like simulation where they have to clear the game to get out!

title: Dark Castle
genre: Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Misaki Ishikawa
synopsis: A dark gloomy castle with endless stairways and an ancient library. Scary, mysterious creatures live here, hiding in the night. One day, a girl who lost her memory ends up there. Who is she and how can she get back? And, most importantly, how will the owner of the castle decide her fate?

title: I Can'T Fall in Love with Paperman
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Qi Miao Yu
synopsis: When a BL comic artist transmigrated into the princess of Liao, she resumed her career... but encountered her "dear son" who crawled out of the book and refused to be gay! Faced with a sword to her neck, will she surrender or resist? What's worse, the plot is no longer under her control; who's the mysterious person behind the scenes controlling everything?

title: Dangerous Lover
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Ryou Sakurai
synopsis:
I've long known about your ill intentions!

Huang Yun'er, a D-lister deliberately gets close to female CEO Ou Chenxi, intending to seduce her in order to gain access to the Ou family and investigate her cousin's death. Ou Chenxi sees through Huang Yun'er's scheming, but believing she can fully control the situation and finding Huang Yun'er aesthetically appealing, she doesn't reject this dangerous woman's advances. At the same time, she wants to investigate Huang Yun'er's motives.

One deliberately seduces but wavers due to love amidst her calculations, while the other is irresistibly attracted despite knowing the danger... These two cunning individuals sink together while fully aware, parrying each other's moves while desperately trying to suppress their growing feelings. As they struggle with their emotions, they gradually uncover secrets from the past.

title: Onna No Sono No Hoshi
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yama Wayama
synopsis:
The story starts when Kagawa, a student, delivers the class journal to Hoshi-sensei. As the students play word chain game "Shiritori" in the form of drawings in the remarks column of the journal, Hoshi-sensei becomes troubled...

---
- **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Social Impact Award for Manga in 2022**

title: Toilet-Bound Hanako-Kun
genre: Thriller, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: AidaIro
synopsis:
"Hanako-san, Hanako-san are you there?"  
At Kamome Academy, rumors abound about the school's Seven Mysteries, one of which is Hanako-san. Said to occupy the third stall of the third floor girls' bathroom in the old school building, Hanako-san grants any wish when summoned. Nene Yashiro, an occult-loving high school girl who dreams of romance, ventures into this haunted bathroom but the Hanako-san she meets there is nothing like she imagined! Kamome Academy's Hanako-san is a boy!  
  
**Note:** Volume 0 includes the original pilot version of Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun and the debut oneshot of Aida Iro - Dear My Living Dead.

title: Gan Manga ~Watashitachi Wa Daibyou Shiteiru~
genre: Comedy, Drama, Medical, Slice of Life
author: Shungiku Uchida
synopsis:
Manga artist Shungicu Uchida, whose numerous hit works include the revolutionary child-rearing manga "We are Reproducing," and "Minami's Lover," which has been dramatized for TV many times, was suddenly diagnosed with colorectal cancer in 2015...!

The slapstick events leading up to the discovery, hospitalization, and surgery, the mechanism and side effects of anticancer drugs, the physical and environmental changes that ensued, and the turbulent days with her four children before and after the surgery... The author's unique comic essay on the battle against cancer faces cancer head-on and describes it in her trademark frank style.

title: Silver Bullet Exorcist
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Tsubasa Aomine
synopsis: In a chaotic Joseon dynasty with vampires, ghosts, and shamans, Park Moon-soo, who calls himself a dark-speaker, destroys a corrupted official. In order to subdue the dark master Park Moon-soo, who is trying to revive the vampire king, the court dispatches Anson, a military officer who has just passed the exam, to find Hong Kil-dong, an outlaw who is good at swordsmanship and martial arts and dispatches him to Taebaek Mountain.

title: Yuurei to Tsukareta Kaishain
genre: Ghosts, Romance, Office Workers, 4-Koma, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Yuki Nakayama
synopsis:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.

title: Twst 4Koma
genre: Comedy, Video Games, Magic, 4-Koma, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Mochi
synopsis: A series of slice-of-life 4koma strips featuring the characters from the popular mobile game Twisted Wonderland.

title: Ten
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yuu Hirama
synopsis: "I didn't even know what had hurt me." Min Jiho, a former second-tier idol, ended his idol career, leaving only confusion in his heart. Planning to leave the entertainment industry entirely, Jiho unexpectedly encounters his idolized top actor, Kang Taeyeon, during a variety show as a substitute. This leads him to become embroiled in a light scandal...

title: Beyblade X
genre: Traditional Games, Action, Sports, Adventure
author: Homura Kawamoto
synopsis: What has not yet been seen, and what cannot be seen - "X". Beyblade, accelerated to the limit (extreme), blasts through a new era!

title: Urenokori No Dorei Elf O Hirotta No De, Musume Ni Suru Koto Ni Shita
genre: Monsters, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Touko Haruka
synopsis:
Weiss, a magician living in the scoundrel-filled Zenith, finds a high elf girl for sale, a higher level elf species that is said to be extinct.

He decides to buy her and raise her as his daughter. The high elf doesn't even know how to speak the language, but Weiss' hard work in raising her seems to be paying off...? 

A warm and fluffy fantasy featuring the rookie dad Weiss and his cute little elven daughter!

title: White Tiger and Black Tiger
genre: Animals, Comedy, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Sasami Nitori
synopsis:
White Tiger went into the woods to find a strong tiger called "Black Tiger" and met Black Tiger, the shrimp.

It's a web manga on Twitter by NITORI Sasami, the author of "Wonder Cat Kyuu-chan" (Fushigi Neko no Kyuu-chan).

title: Shuumatsu No Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper No Jikenbo
genre: Historical, Action, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Keita Iizuka
synopsis:
In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0212)

title: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Rikito Nakamura
synopsis: Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. Except, as things often go with gods, theres a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijos destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesnt return their feelings, theyll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!

title: Little Mushroom
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Jinze Yuchi
synopsis:
Until the day humanity falls.

In the year 2020, Earths magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and mercilessas soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhes mutation goes undetected by Lu Fengs eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.

title: Log Into the Future
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Lie Ren
synopsis: At the beginning of the martial dao, abnormal beasts invaded the world. Humanitys martials had to retreat in defeat time and time again. Lu Sheng transmigrates to that time, but in his dreams he enters a world 10 000 years later. The foundational body refining method from 10k years in the future is several thousand times more effective than the current one. Then theres the breathing method, body refining pill formula, and sacred martial law from 10k years later Despite developing martial arts for 10k years, humanity was annihilated! Their martial arts civilization reached the apex, and yet there was no one left to inherit it. Except Lu Sheng, hes exactly that last spark of hope!

title: Tenseisaki Ga Shoujo Manga No Shirobuta Reijou Datta Reboooot!
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Eda
synopsis:
I recalled memories of my past life after Grandfather told me my engagement was broken. At the same time, I realized this world was the same world as in my favorite shoujo manga. The villainess who exhausted every method possible to bully the heroine I reincarnated as that villainess chubby follower. I shook upon remembering the future lined up for her. When the villainess evil deeds came to light, she pinned all her crimes on Britney. I was a character that gets executed.

To reliably avoid this, I must not become the villainess follower. As this villainess only keeps those who are exceptionally uglier than her by her side, I may be able to do something if I slim up. For now, lets go on a diet!

---
* [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4774dz/)

title: My Dearest Nemesis
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Xian Jun
synopsis: The whole company knew that they they were polar opposites who fought like cats and dogs. Yet during the year-end party, the wall between them shattered after they got drunk! And so the two of them went from always being close to going off on each other to feeling very strange things following the accidental mishap...

title: Heart of Thorns
genre: Monsters, Demons, Long Strip, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hu Ni
synopsis: One day, Liu Hai happened upon a dilapidated magic book. When she imitated the wizard in the magic book to create a magic circle, she accidentally summoned a monster girl named Chi Liu. Chi Liu is the source of strength in the country of Chi. She had been imprisoned for a long time and finally managed to escape. While Liu Hai in the human world was experimenting with the magic circle, the two met...

title: Fate/Extra Ccc Foxtail
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Seijin Takenoko
synopsis:
Being flung from the world of Fate/Extra Kishinami Hakuno finds himself in a very strange predicament. Caster Route.  
  
Note: There are no missing chapters. Chapter #32-33 are missing due to a difference in the volume and magazine numbering. Some earlier small chapters were combined in the volumes causing the number difference. Chapter 34 directly follows Chapter 31.

title: Tsuki Ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Kei Azumi
synopsis:
High school student Misumi Makoto is called into a fantasy world by the god Tsukuyomi, in order to be a hero. However, powerful others in this world aren't as thrilled to have him there, and they kick him to the edge of the world just as Tsukuyomi declares that he must leave Makoto to find his own way. Now it's up to Makoto to find his own way!

[Official English Light Novel](https://hanashi.media/tsukimichi-moonlit-fantasy/)

title: Kowamote Koukousei to Jimiko-San
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Yae Kokonoe
synopsis:
Ive come back for you. The handsome boy who moved away ten years ago has returned with a super scary face?!  
  
Sachi, the 26 year-old manager of a little florist shop, was closing up when suddenly a high schooler with a terrifying face approached saying, I came as promised.   
  
The manly and earnest high schooler with a terrifying face X the super dull plain jane, in a heart bursting love story! ?   
 <Translated from comic.pixiv>

title: Koharu to Minato: Watashi No Partner Wa Onna No Ko
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Slice of Life
author: Daruma
synopsis:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!

title: Yuusha-Sama Wa Houshuu Ni Hitozuma Wo Go Kibou Desu
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, Fantasy
author: Burin Touyama
synopsis:
The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people. And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

**"If you want me to save the city, give me your most beautiful married woman!"**

 A unique erotic fantasy story created by a hero!

title: Confinement King
genre: Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Harem, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Yoika Ashimoto
synopsis:
A girl who calls herself a devil appeared before a timid student named Fumio Kijima. The girl claims to be a campaign girl from the demon world and she gives him the ability to "summon a room" from nothing but thin air. At first he doesn't abuse his power and uses it as a convenient ability in his every day life. But one day he is bullied by his classmates under an unfair pretext and is made to suffer. In the past, he would have wallowed in misery and cried himself to sleep, but now he had a power to call upon.

"I will make them regret it!"

Using his powers to summon his "room", he begins his era of confinement and brainwashing to achieve his goals.

title: Musuko Ga Kawaikute Shikataganai Mazoku No Hahaoya
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, 4-Koma, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Juugoya
synopsis:
Lorem, an infamous and fearsome demoness, has had to settle down for the sake of Gospel, her baby boy. Try as she might, she is a loving and doting mother, but she remains fearsome to both fellow demon and human onlookers because she retains the dire reputation of her wild and terrible youth years past.

For the sake of motherly love, she has to persevere, to learn and to thrive in a world where she's not alone. For the sake of Gospel and his future.

Feel the Love in it!

title: Skip Beat!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Yoshiki Nakamura
synopsis:
Kyouko Mogami lived solely for her childhood friend Shoutaro "Shou" Fuwa. She follows Shou to Tokyo so that he may realize his dream of becoming a famous singer. When his dream is realized, Kyouko overhears the truth behind his decision to bringing her with him: he was using her as a maid.  
  
Shocked and enraged, Kyouko swears to take revenge by outdoing him in show business. With a new look and a new attitude, she joins LME, the agency where Ren Tsuruga (Shou's rival and the #1 actor of LME) works, in the hopes of achieving her goal of destroying Shou's pride.  
  
Along the way, she discovers her true self, makes new friends (and enemies), and finds herself at the heart of some interesting situations that will change her life, and the lives of all others involved, forever.

title: A Nameless Flower
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Cho-Bom
synopsis: The young master, son of an earl, Luan, while wandering in the forest, met a boy his age. He fell in love with a sweet and kind boy, although he does not know his name. Gradually he began to neglect his training as a successor.

title: The Duke and the Tutor
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Web Comic, Full Color
author: MEPI
synopsis: Jace, an Academic Honours student, once had a very bright future! However, his life has gone downhill ever since he punched a noble classmate. When he finally manages to get a chance to work as a private tutor The duke is so handsome that he cannot concentrate!

title: Hellper 2 <Killberos>
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Sakk
synopsis: Indeed it is, indeed it does. A street action comic featuring the life of Jang Gwangnam leading up to the creation of the Killberos Tribe.

title: Shibou Yuugi De Meshi Wo Kuu.
genre: Action, Survival, Gore, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Banzai Kotobuki Dai Enkai
synopsis:
Player name, Yuuki. Seventeen. Place of residence: murder games.

Dressed up in a maid outfit attempting to find her way out of a death mansion, murdering other players clad in a bunny suit, and such to win money is how she makes a living. For some reason, she chose to stay "here" no matter what. 

Overcoming the border between life and death, she aims to attain an unprecedented ?99 Consecutive Wins?.

title: Absolute Dominion
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Si-Dae Park
synopsis:
"I shall devour this Jianghu!"

Says a mysterious son of the fruit merchant, holding the Monarch Sword in his left hand, and the Hell Blade on his right.

Possessing not only eloquence but even an overwhelming martial prowess, what could be his ultimate goal?

The delightful journey of the twenty year old youth, ' Jeok Leegeon', who dreams of dominating the martial world, begins!

title: Isekai Mokushiroku Mynoghra: Hametsu No Bunmei De Hajimeru Sekai Seifuku
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Yasaiko Midorihana
synopsis:
Bedridden and abandoned, Takuto Ira spent his days in the hospital trying to beat the illness that was slowly killing him. His only solace lay in the nation management strategy game Eternal Nations, where he had built a reputation as the greatest player to ever live. 

After succumbing to his disease, Takuto awoke within the game next to Atou  the Hero unit for his favorite civilization, Mynoghra. Now theyll set out to conquer the world together (again), one unit, settlement, and level at a time!

title: Cool Na Tsuma No Saa-Chan
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Kaeru Ouchi
synopsis: A romcom featuring 2 childhood friends who'll get married one day and the process that leads to that point.

title: Koibito Ijou No Koto Wo, Kanojo Janai Kimi to
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Ryou Komatsu
synopsis:
Having to deal with his abusive boss day after day while working an exploitative job, Yamase Fuyu has become tired of it all... Until one day he accidentally runs into Minase Ito, his ex-girlfriend from university. 

The sudden reunion lifts Fuyu's spirits, who wastes no time inviting Ito to chat over drinks. The two have a whale of a time sharing gripes and reminiscing about the past. But just as Fuyu begins to appreciate their new relationship as "just friends", they end up spending an intimate night together...

title: Goth Loli Jk Mujintou Hyouryuuki
genre: Comedy, Adventure, 4-Koma
author: Mei Aota
synopsis: On a school trip, two high school girls fell to the sea and washed up on a deserted island. What are they going to do about about food? And clothes? A cute survival 4koma on a deserted island, except for a mysterious creature.

title: Suterare Elf-San Wa Sekai De Ichiban Tsuyokute Kawaii!
genre: Reincarnation, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Rui Tsukiyo
synopsis:
"Dear top players, this game is a real parallel world. If you reincarnate and save the world, any wish you have will be granted."

Former popular voice actress Ayano responded to the proposal from the goddess. In order to shine as a voice actress once again. Reincarnated as the strongest species of high elf, she aims to "clear the game" in the parallel world with the strongest and cutest kemo-eared heroine using her gaming knowledge, but !?

title: Nonohana Katarazu
genre: Slice of Life
author: Iku Kamijima
synopsis:
A story of a girl named Nonoko and the flowers that bloom in the fields.

When she was young, she showed no interest in wild plants, but recently she has been looking intently at encyclopedias. Looking for a certain flower, when Nonoko goes out to the garden with a pictorial book...

(Source: Natalie, translated)

*Note: Switched from Futabasha's Web Action to Kobunsha's Comic Nettai in December 2024.*

title: Good Night, Stray Sheep
genre: Psychological, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Hachi Nanase
synopsis:
Japan is the country with the shortest sleep time in the world. Despite being born in such a sleep-deprived country, Shinya Moroboshi is an unemployed man who sleeps a lot and lives a self-indulgent life that has nothing to do with lack of sleep. One day, Moroboshi finds an unfamiliar "sleep selling app" on his phone. He uses it with some skepticism, but to his surprise, he is able to actually sell his sleep and make money...!? This is a story that will light up the tomorrow of a deep, never-ending night.

(Source: Comic Zenon, translated)

title: Tensei Shite High Elf Ni Narimashitaga, Slow Life Wa 120-Nen De Akimashita
genre: Reincarnation, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Rarutori
synopsis:
Life in the Great Pulha Woodlands is the very definition of stillness and tranquilityand Acers had enough of it! Thats right. Acer isnt quite like the other high elves of the forest. For starters, he remembers living a past life as a human in another world...meaning hes got a taste for meat, adventure, and plenty of other decidedly un-elven things! Hes also bored out of his skull after 120 years of the peace and quiet of their serene sylvan lifestyle. So with nothing more than his trusty bow, a bundle of life-giving fruit, and his close bond with the spirits of nature, Acer leaves the monotony of the forest behind to seek a new life, one thats more his pace. See what excitement awaits in the outside world full of humans, dwarves, and even other elves!

* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/enough-with-this-slow-life-i-was-reincarnated-as-a-high-elf-and-now-i-m-bored)

title: Maken Gishi Bacchus: Shinken O Mezasu Tenseisha Wa, Kutte Nonde Tsukutte Sugosu
genre: Action, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Yuuhi Kitano
synopsis:
A blacksmith reincarnated into another world sets out to forge the ultimate magic sword! Bacchus, a jack-of-all-trades craftsman with memories of his past life, steps into the world of magic and magic technology with the aim of making magic swords. Despite his diverse skills, Bacchuss magical prowess is expected to cause a lot of trouble, but he doesn't care. He spends his days eating, drinking, crafting magic swords, and occasionally helping others with their problems. While he faces a few complications involving women, Bacchus continues to live his life one day at a time.

---
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw -[Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/70493)

title: Catenaccio
genre: Psychological, Sports
author: Daisuke Morimoto
synopsis: Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer worlds loftiest peak: European football! Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!

title: Summer, Lemon, and Overlay
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Miyako Miyahara
synopsis: A struggling voice actress who goes by the name of Yunimaru is barely making ends meet. Constantly thinking about when she will escape her miserable life, she's contacted by Konno Sayakaa beautiful and successful woman working for a big companywith a job offer: to read a farewell letter at her own funeral. While grappling with whether or not to accept such an absurd job offer, Sayaka makes her a proposal that she can't refuse. Now with an opportunity to escape her situation, Yunimaru also finds herself aiding Sayaka in the completion of her letter.

title: Fukigen Na Mononokean
genre: Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kiri Wazawa
synopsis: Ashiya has spent his first seven days of high school stuck in the infirmary because of a youkai attaching itself to him. He ends up asking the owner of a small tea room called the 'Mononokean' for help. This is a tale involving the very morose owner of the Mononokean guiding mononoke that happened to wander into this world go to the next world.

title: Boku No Noroi No Kyuuketsukihime
genre: Action, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural
author: Kenshirou Sakamoto
synopsis:
In Japan, vampires have emerged and are rampaging throughout the country, eating and killing humans. In order to protect his friends, Isuzu, the leader of the anti-vampire security force, plans to kidnap the vampire slayer " Baroque," who is unofficially detained by the government. She is a legendary "vampire" that drives those who see her crazy with her sheer beauty.
___
[Official English Volumes (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/my-dear-curse-casting-vampiress)

title: Tasogare No Utsuwagami
genre: Historical, Action, Gore, Drama, Supernatural
author: Shin Yamamoto
synopsis: Hana, a samurai living a life of idleness in a huge underground prison city, and Josui Amanogawa, an ayakashi vessel god who has fallen from the heavenly city. Their encounter begins a journey of rebellion against the heavens.

title: Nimotsu Mochi No Nousuji Musou
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ginkaku Shimizu
synopsis:
The more he carries, the stronger he becomes! An unmatched fantasy by the weakest adventurer duo!

Ryuk, a boy with a unique skill Porter, which allows him to carry a massive amount of items, was being exploited as a chore boy for the S-rank party Black Lion of Foresight. One day, the party managed to acquire a storage item more convenient than Ryuks skill, thus no longer needed, Ryuk is banished inside a dangerous dungeon. Despairing in this hopeless situation, suddenly he meets a shrine maiden girl, Mio  and then?

title: Omiai Ni Sugoi Komyushou Ga Kita
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Toshitaka Yano
synopsis: Itami, a middle-aged businessman, registers with a marriage agency to find a marriage partner, but luck doesn't seem to be on his side when it comes to matchmaking. Unable to see him like this, his subordinate, Ms. Sonoda, introduces him to a friend.

title: Yuurei-San to Furyou a
genre: Ghosts, Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural
author: Rui Karasuzuki
synopsis:
Azuse Nagi transfers to the infamous Fukura High School, known for its bad reputation.
There, in an unused student guidance room, he meets a ghostly boy who introduces himself as "Yuurei-san."
No matter how much he ignores him, the persistent ghost keeps asking, "Let's play together".
Reluctantly, Azuse agrees to a game: if he wins, the ghost will leave, but if he loses, he'll have to follow one of his requests.
What starts as a trivial bet begins to significantly change Azuse's school life.
This is the beginning of a school fantasy that depicts the thrilling friendship between a ghost and a delinquent!

(Source: Comic Walker, edited)

title: Mii-Chan and Yamada-San
genre: Sexual Violence, Drama, Tragedy
author: Nene Azuki
synopsis:
Shinjuku, 2012. Yamada, who works as a hostess in a night club, meets Mii-chan, a new girl who is no good at anything she does. Mii-chan is energetic and motivated, but she can't read kanji or the atmosphere, so she is ridiculed by those around her and labeled as "pitiful." Nevertheless, Yamada is gradually drawn to Mii-chan as she works diligently.

(Translated from Magazine Pocket.)

(Originally serialised on X/Twitter under a pseudonym and released in collected volumes on Kindle. The original manga began with shorts, then ran "Mii-chan and Yamada-san" as a lengthier story. This is a reboot with the same basic premise. The author worked in a hostess club when she was in college, but has publicly stated in interviews and on social media that while there was a "Mii-chan" who served as the inspiration for the character, everything else about the story is fictional.)

title: Oyasumi Fumi-San
genre: Psychological, Romance, School Life, Web Comic
author: Shiraishi Kouhei
synopsis: Rinta, who moved to the city from the countryside and enrolled in a university in the heart of the city, meets "Fumi-san," rumored to be the most beautiful girl on campus, in the literature club he joined. After attending a drinking party together, he ends up walking her home. He safely escorts her to her house and is about to head back when suddenly... Fumi-san transforms and forcefully invites him to her bed!? "I wonder how long you can keep being a good person, Rinta-kun...?" Fumi-san pushes Rinta to his limits, testing his self-control until it shatters.

title: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World'S Strongest
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ryou Shirakome
synopsis:
Among the class transported to another world, Nagumo Hajime is an ordinary male student who didnt have ambition nor aspiration in life, and thus called Incompetent by his classmates.
The class was summoned to become heroes and save a country from destruction. Students of the class were blessed with cheat specifications and cool job class, however, it was not the case with Hajime, with his profession as a Synergist, and his very mediocre stats. Synergist, to put it in another word was just artisan class. Being the weakest, he then falls to the depth of the abyss when he and his classmates were exploring a dungeon. What did he find in the depth of the abyss, and can he survive?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)

title: Muhoutou
genre: Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror
author: Kouji Mori
synopsis: A prequel to Jisatsutou. The Japanese government exiles convicts facing execution to a remote lawless island to fend for themselves.

title: Shuumatsu No Valkyrie
genre: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Takumi Fukui
synopsis:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/), [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/e_R0002)

title: My Daddy Is a Cultivator
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Wuxia, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Xiao Min Man
synopsis:
The almighty Demon Cultivator Xie Tian gave birth to a child during the demon king selection and lost his place as the demon king! Now at the bottom of the pit, he decides to bring his son Duoduo and get his man back from the succession and marriage ceremony of the righteous sect! Who is the father?!   
  
Bai Jing: Since you're already, then you won't be going anywhere else. I want both the father and the child!  
Xie Tian: Marriage? Sure. But I'm on top!

title: Gate - Teikoku No Bara Kishidan - Pinya Co Lada 14-Sai
genre: Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Yukie Shiren
synopsis: A spin-off focusing on Princess Pinya's (from "Gate - Thus the JSDF Fought There!") life before the "Gate" opening to the other world event.

title: Isekai Izakaya "Nobu"
genre: Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Virginia Nitouhei
synopsis:
Imagine there is a bar with many weird kind of food and drink that might bring you to another world! The bar, so-called "Nobu" is located in a alley of the old city Aiteria. At the very first step, diners feels like falling into another completely country, with cold, super cool beer, so-called "Toriaezu Nama"! (from: MU)  
  
Adapted from [web novel (raw)](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n9773bj/) / light novel of same name.  

[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20594)

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%95%B0%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E5%B1%85%E9%85%92%E5%B1%8B%E3%80%8C%E3%81%AE%E3%81%B6%E3%80%8D)

title: The Evil Ring
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Ni San Sui
synopsis: 18 years ago, a prophecy emerged that a boy with a black ring, deemed inferior, would rewrite the survival rules of the world of the gifted. The only remaining descendant of the Divine-Tier status, Shannon, wears a black ring and lives as an inferior being in the filthy exile zone. However, his peaceful life is shattered when his identity is exposed, and the top-tier forces, seeing him as a threat, send out an assassination squad to kill Shannon. Five gifted individuals, who have existed since childhood to protect Shannon, are summoned at the same time. They rush to the exile zone to protect the last descendant of the Divine-Tier status, and a battle among the rings is about to ignite!

title: A Good-Natured Craftsman Leisurely Travels Through Another World
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Harai Midori
synopsis: Ryoichi Ishikawa, a young man who lost his father, who was his only relative, also decided to close the electrical shop that he and his father had been working on. From a strange matter, I choose to transfer to another world by my own will. It was supposed to be the second life of a leisurely trip, but I can not leave a person in need. We solve many worries by making full use of the cheat skills given by God and the skills of a craftsmen. Sometime around, friends with one or two habits gathered! ?The journey of a good-natured craftsman in another world begins here!

title: Gojuu, Rokujuu, Yorokonde
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: YMK
synopsis:
Aki-san (50), a divorced woman, has been getting along well with Rokujo-san (60).
People around them are worried about their pure relationship, but there is no need to worry. At a summer festival, the two quickly grow closer, and their feelings for each other continue to grow.
They envision a future together, and finally....
"I want to spend the rest of my life with the person I love."

title: Servamp
genre: Action, Animals, Comedy, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Strike Tanaka
synopsis: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahirus path, the high school freshmans life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahirus personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.

title: Isekai No Ochibi-Chan Wa Kyou Mo Nanika Wo Tsukuri Dasu
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ripo Day
synopsis: One day, Ochibi (5 years old) who lives in the slums suddenly remembers that she has been reincarnated from another world. Ochibi has the "Imagination Creation" skill, which allows her to create anything she imagines. She decides to start a business with the Japanese items she obtains with her "Imagination Creation" skill! A heartwarming story with a boy named "Onii" and a girl named "Nene" who aim to escape the slums!!

title: Astro Baby
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore
author: Shiro Moriya
synopsis: The remote town of North Hill has been quarantined to prevent the spread of the mysterious Couper disease that is turning people into cannibals. Young soldier Billy returns to his hometown for the first time in six years for the woman he loves, but what horrors will be awaiting him...?

title: My Hero Academia: Vigilantes
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Superhero, Drama, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Hideyuki Furuhashi
synopsis:
In the world of Kouhei Horikoshi's Boku no Hero Academia, nearly everyone in the world has powers known as "Quirks". Normally, the law enforces the rule that citizens cannot use their Quirks out in the open, and that privilege is reserved only for registered superheroes. However, a select few have chosen to reject this rule. They are known as vigilantes - people with the hearts of heroes, but the reputation of villains.   
  
This is their story.

title: Oversleeping Takahashi
genre: Action, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy
author: Aguro Kouki
synopsis: From the one-shot of the same name that amassed over 1,580,000 views! A classmate who is always nonchalantly late to school, but his true identity is...?! The new serialized story of battles and oversleeping begins!!

title: Machi and Oboro
genre: Ninja, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yuura Ishito
synopsis: From Miyagi to the bustling life of a Tokyo high school, Machi Nishina wanted anything but the ordinary. Her wish is granted in the most unexpected way when she encounters Oboro Kasumi, a classmate harboring a secret, who ends up following her home...?!

title: No Gyaru in This Class
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Shigure Tokita
synopsis:
Mirei, a diligent honor student, longs for the flashy, fashionable gyaru lifestyle she admires in manga. With newfound courage, she decides to give herself a makeover and reinvent her image upon entering high school. There, she meets Yushin, a rough-around-the-edges boy, and they hit it off?!

Shigure Tokita, the author of *Dont Blush, Sekime-san*, presents a classroom comedy that unfolds around this fateful encounter!

title: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Akira Amano
synopsis: Tsuna comes home one day, only to be greeted by a little baby mafioso who apparently is his new home tutor. His job is to guide Tsuna into his role as the 10th Boss of the Vongola mafia family. With the help of all his new friends and an array of special items such as the "Dying Will Bullet", he might just be able to do it.

title: Get Away, Matsumoto?-100 Days Escape-
genre: Thriller, Sports, Drama
author: Tsuneharu Okutsu
synopsis: Formerly a three time back-to-back winner of the All-Japan Intercollegiate Road Cycling Championships, Mastumoto now spends his days doing bike deliveries to pay the bills. Just as he contemplates giving up cycling for the sake of his future, Matsumoto suddenly finds himself at the center of an unbelievable incident...! Make way for this hard-hitting high-speed action!!

title: The Story About Time
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Norishiro-chan
synopsis: A young girl named Fu, travels into the past to make sure that her parents don't get together...

title: Mii-Chan Wa Kawaretai
genre: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Waka Takase
synopsis: Iori is a young man in his twenties who has been stressed at work, lost his cat that he had kept for many years, and is suffering from insomnia and loss of appetite. The next morning, he finds a beautiful, naked girl lying beside him...?

title: Sijila
genre: Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Full Color
author: Sajipen
synopsis:
Sijila was once the most adorable mythical creature in the world. Its overwhelming cuteness earned it the reverence of humanity, granting it a carefree life of plenty. However, as people became preoccupied with admiring Sijila's charm and stopped being productive, coupled with Sikila's ever-growing appetite, it soon consumed all the world's resources.

The gods could no longer tolerate its behavior. They stripped Sijila of all its "cuteness power," turning it into a ridiculed ball of flesh. They transformed a mere fraction of its "cuteness power" into a group of little Corgis, tasked with helping it atone for its sins.

title: Sousei Yuugi
genre: Action, Boys' Love, Incest, Crime, Mafia, Gore, Drama
author: Atsushi Okada
synopsis: The head of the largest yakuza organization in the Kansai region has decided to divide the organization into two groups, just for the sake of naming his successor in six monthsone of his two twin sons, Rin or Rui.

title: Soya Duck
genre: Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Takeshi Hinata
synopsis: Ge ge's name is You Tiao, Di di's name is Soya. A cute comedy series about their daily lives!

title: Top 1 Fighting Tutoring
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Tae-Kyeong Kim
synopsis:
The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!

title: Punch Rush Jk Tara-Chan
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, School Life, Delinquents
author: Jiburo
synopsis:
Nikaido Katsuo, AKA Fist King, is the most powerful and undefeated delinquent in Japan. However, no one knows that behind the stories of his legendary battles, there is a girl behind the scenes Her name is Tabara Nikaido. She is the fighter who took her brother's name and fought in secret, and defeated all the strong men in her way A slightly naughty story about a legendary fighter who happens to be a tsuyokawa JK!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550689798659821656)

title: Akame Ga Kill!
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Takahiro
synopsis:
Tatsumi is a fighter who, accompanied by his two childhood friends, sets off to the Capital in search of a way to make money to assist his poverty-stricken village. After being separated from his friends, Tatsumi not only fails to enlist in the army, but is swindled out of all his money. He is then taken in by a noble family who offer him help; after finding himself in a messy situation Tatsumi is rescued by a group of assassins known as Night Raid, and is invited to join their ranks. Composed of the swordswoman Akame, a young woman armed with a huge pair of scissors named Sheele, the string manipulator Lubbock, the armored warrior Bulat, the sniper Mine, the beast fighter Leone and their leader Najenda, Night Raid is also part of the revolutionary forces assembled to overthrow Prime Minister Honest, who manipulates the young emperor for his and his men's personal gain, leading the rest of the nation to poverty and strife.  


---

title: Bumpoor
genre: Thriller, Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama
author: Keisuke Seno
synopsis: His life hits rocks bottom, but he is the ultimate in assassinations. The legend of a hitman with absolute lethality begins. 333 yen in his pocket. Occupation: assassin. In a life of extreme poverty, all he has is hunger and his mission. Whenever his stomach rumbles, the poor but strong Nojima Ryou appears, shattering both reality and fiction! The start of a pitch-black assassination drama depicted with overwhelming realism!!

title: Jahy-Sama Wa Kujikenai!
genre: Loli, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Magical Girls, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Wakame Konbu
synopsis:
Jahy-sama (pronounced jah-hee) is an existence to be feared and respected throughout the Demon Realm. Well, was.

The (former) Demon Realm No. 2 is now busy with house chores and workin the human realm! Her dinner is just beansprouts, and she can't afford anything except water at cafes, but she won't get discouraged!

---
**Note:**
Jahy's shirt says '????', which seems to translate to 'Demon Realm Restoration'.

title: I Failed to Divorce My Husband
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: So-Tan
synopsis:
I've been reincarnated as the extra character who stalked her husband, the male lead, for 10 years and died. Of course, I tried to divorce him before the female lead appeared.

But, I found out that my young husband was secretly abused in the house. At that moment, I immediately became overwhelmed with the responsibility and sense of duty a modern adult would have. 

**

Aiden had his back turned away from her and suddenly grabbed her arm forcefully. The strength of his hands alone could have ripped her arms off. Erin timidly called his name and spoke. 

"I already reminded you yesterday. We're a married couple, so I'm always on your side." 

"..."

"So, everything is alright." 

She comforted him with these sweet words like it was a spell. And as if he was under her magic, Aiden stopped trembling. 

**

The adult Erin requested to divorce her husband Aiden before the female lead appeared. As soon as those words left her lips, Aiden's smile disappeared. 

"A divorce? Never."

Aiden tore the divorce papers into such thin sheets, the contents were no longer legible. Erin smiled at the sight. (Synopsis source: Gourmet Scans)

---
Ellen's plan is simple. Before turning into an obsessive villain who gets executed, she's going to get a divorce! But after she becomes Ellen Lianster, her plan gets complicated. Her new husband, Aiden, has developed a debilitating fear of being touched, and Ellen is determined to discover the cause and cure. As she finds ways to help him, an affection-deprived Aiden slowly begins to seek comfort from Ellen. With both hearts opening up to each other, can this marriage succeed... at failing?

title: Mad
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Horror, Aliens
author: Yuusuke Ootori
synopsis: Mysterious alien life-forms invade Earth! Most of humanity is wiped off the face of the planet. John, his sister, and the remaining survivors hope to find a new world to inhabit But one day, theyre targeted by aliens again! (MANGA Plus)

title: Sora Yori Takaku
genre: Thriller, Time Travel, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Office Workers, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Ryou Hanmaru
synopsis: When the Devil King announces his retirement, he calls forth his two sons, Yomi and Sora, to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father

title: Gates of Carnage
genre: Award Winning, Action, Sports, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama
author: Masatoshi Kawahara
synopsis:
The story follows a young Karate practitioner named Tsukumo Mutsu, 40th master of the deadly Mutsu Enmei Ryu style.

---
- **Won the 14th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 1990**
