synopsis: The tsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsundere girl getting less and less tsun day by day.

title: Sora Wo Matotte
genre: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Shinya Komi
synopsis:
Haro Ogawa, a high school student, is also a self-taught oil painter who is trying to paint the ultimate nude. 
After an unexpected encounter with an elusive "witch", he sets his sights on applying to art school... 
The mystery that resides in the human body, the ultimate "beauty", will be painted on canvas! 
A skin-colored coming-of-age drama!

title: Ashi-Girl
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life
author: Ryuuji Gotsubo
synopsis:
From the author of Gokusen and Koudaike no Hitobito comes the story of Yui Hayakawa:
an ordinary, uninspired high school girl who's only good at one thing - running! 
But because of her genius younger brother Takeru and his latest experiment, a time machine, 
she accidentally gets sent back to the Sengoku Era missing her beloved dinner steak! 
Will young Yui finally find that 'something' where her entire potential was hiding? 
And will she ever be able to eat that delicious steak her mother made for her?

title: House Mayton'S Youngest
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Geon-U Sin
synopsis:
As the author of "Swordmaster Sade," Cha Sungmin had no idea how dangerous his plot-hole-riddled novel could be until he's reborn as Rasen Mayton, a spoiled side character destined to die at 17. As if being stuck in the body of a rude scumbag despised by everyone wasn't enough, Sungmin also discovers that he was reborn at a point before his story began. 

With almost no knowledge about the current timeline, will Sungmin be able to survive in this unwritten world as House Mayton's youngest?

title: A Sleepless Maid'S Night
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Studio Jaemi
synopsis:
After the ruin of an aristocratic family in England, Eva Macy has been living a difficult life as a maid at an acquaintances house, where she happens to meet her ex-fiancé Prince Edward.

Despite being a strong and cold-hearted person, he is affectionate towards her. After he leaves, Eva realizes that hes her first love. However, she decides to give up on her current feelings, believing it to be in her best interest to do so.

After overcoming such a difficult time, Eva's feelings for Edward calmed down, but one day, Edward suddenly appeared before her as if to stir up Evas heart again.

Eva becomes a chambermaid for her ex-fiancé Edward, where he constantly tries to seduce Eva.

The relationship she thought had ended a long time ago continues again in his chambers...

title: Kurai Anoko to Shitai Koto
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Manatsu Ikari
synopsis: That gloomy girl is so beautiful! Let's aim for it!

title: High School Boy
genre: Action, Long Strip, Boys' Love, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Bakji
synopsis:
Hong Il-tak, the only red spot at Daemun Namgo. Despite his name and nickname, he's a boy, and his dwarfism and peculiar appearance have led to him being looked down upon by everyone from the nerds to the elders, and he's at the bottom of the school hierarchy. 

In the past, until his sophomore year, Iltak had been a famous member of the Iljin, but a problem of his own brought him to the bottom of the food chain... 

"His secondary sexuality. If only he'd come to me...!" 

After enduring daily teasing and bullying because his body stopped growing like his peers, Hong Il-taek thought of a way to move up in the ranks... 

"If I can befriend this guy, who's in the second grade at Dae-moon Boys' High School, I'll be able to move up again!" 

But for some reason, Lee Hyun-woo tries to keep his distance from Hong Il-taek... Can Hong Il-taek find his former glory again?

title: Painu Blue
genre: Oneshot, Sci-Fi
author: Kana Hoshino
synopsis: [Winner of the 2024 Summer Afternoon Kishi Prize] The story of Jui, the son of a soldier, and Maaya, a teenager from Painu Island. Different backgrounds have torn apart their friendship, but an attack by a demon named Moon that lurks on the island brings them together again!?

title: Mary-San
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Keita Yatera
synopsis:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

title: Fire Punch
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
synopsis:
In the not-too-distant past, the Ice Witch blanketed the world in snow, starvation and madness, leading the inhabitants to seek their salvation in fire. With that, an unusual destiny unfolds for two young orphans, Agni and Luna, blessed with the ability to regenerate. But will this ability prove to be more of a curse than a blessing?

Nominee for the 2017 Manga Taisho Award.

title: Lunatic Terrapop
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Aliens
author: Hisaya Hashida
synopsis: Seventeen year old Satsuki Moriyama is enjoying her life to the fullest with the boyfriend of her dreams! After 3 months of dating, they finally hold hands and Satsuki is over the moon! Sasaki-kun is the coolest and her reason for living, yet...

title: HellS Paradise: Jigokuraku
genre: Historical, Action, Romance, Adventure, Gore, Drama
author: Yuuji Kaku
synopsis:
Gabimaru the Empty, a former ninja assassin feared as a heartless husk of a man, spends his days on death row wondering when an executioner skilled enough to so much as harm him will arrive, as he thinks nothing of seeing an end to his meaningless existence Or so he thought. 
Then the lady executioner, Asaemon the Beheader, rekindles his hope with an astounding proposition. 
If he ever wishes to see his beloved wife again, he must embark under the auspices of the shogunate on a perilous voyage to the mysterious mystic island said to house the elixir of immortality. 
Should he be the one among many rival death-row fiends and scoundrels to find the elixir, he'll earn a full exoneration, and, more importantly, a chance at an ordinary married life with the light of his life: the woman who made the world seem not so ugly. 
What awaits them is a journey like no other!

title: Rugby Rumble
genre: Sports
author: Daisuke Miyata
synopsis: The Japan under-16 rugby teamnicknamed the Perfect Squadshattered the power balance of high school rugby after sweeping the world cup. With so many former Perfect Squad members in their home prefecture, Rikuzen Highs rugby team has given up all hope of victory and now takes a laid-back approach to training. Enter transfer student and rugby novice Kinzan Yamada. He may be new, but hes ready for the world of rugby. The question is whether theyre ready for him...

title: Taro Miyao Becomes a Cat Parent?!
genre: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Shou Yamazaki
synopsis: Taro Miyao is a renowned novelist and ardent admirer of Niccolò Machiavelli. Use whatever means necessary to achieve a goalTaro has modeled his life after his beloved Renaissance philosopher. One day, he is struck by an epiphany: having a cat around would cure his stiff shoulders! Lo and behold, Taro becomes a proud cat owner but its not all kittens and rainbows A warm and fluffy comedy about living with a cat by Sho Yamazaki, the creator of Excuse Me Dentist, Its Touching Me!

title: Smother Me
genre: Thriller, Crime, Drama
author: Hiroshi Shimomoto
synopsis: In the oppressive city of Detroit, Akio is sold by his dad and becomes an assassin known as Snake. Day after day, he simply follows orders. But suddenly, he meets a blind girl and finds new meaning in life!

title: Ochikobore Shiro Madoushi Cecil Wa Taishougai No Hazu Deshita
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kanon Sengoku
synopsis: During a party, Cecil, a clumsy white mage, spills on Oswald, the popular leader of the first squadron of holy knights, a homemade antidote. The reason is that he emitted a strong evil aura. An upset Oswald kidnaps her an takes her to his mansion, and she panics: "My chastity is in danger! Cecil grows impatient, but he rebuffs her, telling her: "You are not to my liking". It seems that Oswald is behind Cecil's potion, which was the first to take effect on a curse he had received in the past. Oswald formally asks Cecil to treat him, and she decides to take the opportunity to make a name for herself and accepts the request....

title: Maid in Japan
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Harem, School Life
author: Takahanada Pon
synopsis: In order to be bought by a rich family, Narumi Inoue, hiding the truth that he is a man, goes to a girls' school. As a trainee, Narumi was sent to serve a girl from a rich family who hates maids (only weekends). Keeping the 'heart of treating/serving people,' Japanese maid, Maid in Japan, Narumi's battle will start? If it is found out that Narumi is a man, he will be castrated.

title: Mizu Zokusei No Mahoutsukai
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Bokutengo
synopsis:
Upon being reincarnated into a fantasy world, Ryo wants to live out his days in peace with his newfound water magic. He can only conjure a cupful at a time, but its enough to eke out a comfortable existence  or so he thought.

The powers that be cast him into the wild outlands with nothing more than a humble shack, a single knife, some food... and abilities that are yet beyond his comprehension. The area is overrun by monsters and theres nary another human in sight. Ryo must now figure out how to survive above all else, but hes ready to take bulls, boars, and a whole host of other monsters by the horns if it means seizing the life he wants for himself.

Each new victory brings a new challenge, but what could a fateful encounter with a headless horseman, a dragon, and a castaway swordsman have in common? Theyre the first steps on a grand journey that will take Ryo beyond the borders of all he knows to become the greatest water magician the world has ever seen  one adventure at a time.

title: To Aru Kagaku No Railgun
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kazuma Kamachi
synopsis:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!

title: Ahiru No Sora
genre: Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Takeshi Hinata
synopsis: Hes short, weak, and has just transfered to a new school. Kurumatani Sora is the main character in this story who loves basketball. He has been shooting hoops ever since he was little and has been trying to grow tall just like his mother, who used to be a basketball player. What happened to her and what Sora will do at the new school is all up to you to find out!

title: Daily Life of Sa-Chan, a Drugstore Clerk
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Rei Izumi
synopsis: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.

title: Midnight
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Adventure, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Osamu Tezuka
synopsis:
Midnight is the story of a taxi driver named Shinya Mito (whose name is literally Japanese for "mid" and "night") and his various passengers, each of whom he helps in various ways. Shinya drives a taxi as a way to earn money for the treatment of a young woman named Mari, whose brain was injured sometime earlier as the result of an accident Shinya was responsible for causing. The taxi Shinya drives is equipped with a fifth wheel which makes the car more maneuverable under any kind of road conditions.

---
**Volumes 354-359 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**

title: Yagi-San Yuubin
genre: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Sakae Kusama
synopsis: University student Hirose Kiyotaka finds a love letter tucked into the pages of a borrowed book. While attempting to return the letter, he encounters the charismatic Hanashiro Seiji and quickly becomes involved with him. As their tentative relationship develops, however, he finds himself wondering how serious Hanashiro's feelings for him really are. Meanwhile, the letter falls into the hands of Hanashiro's colleague Sawa Jinichiro, who entraps its writer, Arihara Mineo. Sawa's actions are seemingly ruthless, but his true motives regarding Arihara are far from clear.

title: Gokusotsu Kraken
genre: Monsters, Action, Crime, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural
author: Takahiro
synopsis: Controlling the Queendom of Sebek's female prison with the Power of the Kraken!

title: Kekkon Shiyou. Rikon Zentei De.
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Azuma Sakiguchi
synopsis:
After turning 30 as a NEET, Kyousuke was kicked out of his parents' house. 
That's when Rui, his closest friend, proposes a solution: to get married, then divorce!


A guy and girl who've been 'just friends' for around a decade decide to enter a pretend marriage.
He's a romantic and she's just a pragmatic girl.  A pair unsuited for marriage.
What will they discover after 100 days together?

title: Heimin No Watashi Desu Ga Koushaku Reijou-Sama O Taburakashite Ikiteimasu
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, School Life, Fantasy
author: Taki Kitao
synopsis:
Lilah, a commoner, is cast out of the only home she's ever known, finding herself lost in the depths of a forest, on the brink of death. Fate, however, has other plans, as she miraculously reunites with Eva, a young lady of nobility she once played with as a child, narrowly escaping a dire end. Moreover, this encounter leads Lilah to an unexpected role as Eva's personal bodyguard. Now, she faces the ultimate challenge: can a commoner like her rise above and excel in the world of the nobility?

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Amazon Link (Individual Chapters)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0CBGWG5K2)

title: Medusa Dorei O Katta
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Tsuniya Kuga
synopsis: Im not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?

title: Captain Corinth: the Galactic Navy Officer Becomes an Adventurer
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Adaptation
author: Tomomasa Takuma
synopsis:
In order to protect the planet Ares from invasion by the Bugs, Alan Corinth has set his sights on nothing less than ruling the entire continent. The Kingdom of Belta, which borders the Great Demon Forest, is the ideal spot to start putting his plan in motion, so he and his party set off for the gathering place of the finest adventurers the kingdom has to offer: the citadel of Gantz.

Will Alan be able to keep the hostile aliens from overrunning this fantasy planet?  The sci-fi medieval fantasy story begins!

title: Nanjou-San Wa Boku Ni Dakaretai
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Gyaru
author: You2
synopsis: From their worst encounter comes a story about their ultimate happiness! This romantic comedy explores the ups and downs of a serious relationship.

title: Sayonara Demo Aishiteru
genre: Romance, School Life
author: Rina Yagami
synopsis:
From Midnight Scans:  
  
Story 1: Sayonara Demo Aishiteru - Yutaka's version  
Yutaka has decided to confess to Mariya, the girl who saved him during the entrance examination. Being an average girl, Mariya was bewildered by the confession of the charming Yutaka. Even though there are strains in their relationship, the distance between the two slowly shortens. However, Mariya has suddenly asked for a breakup!  
  
Story 2: Sayonara Demo Aishiteru - Mariya's version  
  
Story 3: 1% No Kiseki  
Nana falls for her rumored cold teacher.  
  
Story 4: Sumetaku, Amaku, Koi O Shite  
Rinka has always been perceived as a cold girl and is popular with the freshman boys, until that is they found out about her true personality. There is yet another freshman that proclaims that he fallen in love with her at first sight, but she gave him a blunt reply as she have given many others. However it seems that he has not been shaken by her reply, how will Rinka react?

title: Sound of a Racing Heart
genre: Long Strip, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: An He
synopsis:
On the first snowfall of that year, Dan Xianchun, who had been roped in to help as a photographer for a cosplay shoot, unexpectedly captures a picture of a girl in a long, green dress through her lens. The girls gazestaring at herfull of complexity and affection, seems to be locked on her, leaving Dan Xianchun as though her heart had been gently pricked.
Many years later, when she crosses paths again with the girl who once captivated her so, what kind of sparks will fly between them?

title: Idol Shikkaku
genre: Romance, Drama, Adaptation, Music
author: Sei Soragami
synopsis:
Keita, a boring university student, is a gachikoi (fan who's seriously in love) otaku of Mimika, the center of the idol group Tetra. Even though he's aware that it's a love that will never happen, he continues to push on with giving her his emotional support. 

On the other hand, as her group's popularity continues to rise, Mimika bears anxiety over the uncertainty of the future even while she's happy with the fervently cheering Keita's affection. 

One day, Mimika falls into despair after her mother gets into a traffic accident, and with the help of social media, she heads towards Keita's part-time workplace...

title: Worst Gaiden Mr. Zetton
genre: Action, Comedy, Mafia, School Life, Delinquents
author: Dai Suzuki
synopsis: After years of studying, Hanazawa Saburou, AKA Suzuran's legendary Zetton, has finally become a high school teacher. But on his first day at work, the principal tells him he was actually hired not to teach, but to make the students of his homeroom class drop out of school?!

title: Harem Yori Heion O! Isekai De Shizuka Ni Neet Hime Sasete Kure
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Loli, Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Haruki Sakata
synopsis:
An elite salaryman (aspiring NEET), gets reincarnated and genderswapped into a princess living an idle life of masturbation...!?

Kishibe is an elite office worker who dreams of becoming a NEET who has attained FIRE (Financial Independence, Retire Early). The fulfillment of his dream is now right before his very eyes!! ...or was, when he died saving a girl from getting hit by a car. A self-proclaimed god felt pity for such a man, so she reincarnated Kishibe into another world where he could live as a NEET. The next thing he knew, he had become Iris, the princess of a superpower kingdom!!

Blessed with incredible beauty and not having the need to work even once, Kishibe won the jackpot with a life full of indolence, freedom and masturbation!! ...is what he believed, but there was a catch. Princess Iris seemed like she possessed a trait that made others love her at the highest level (a skill?), and various girls just keep coming on to her (who was formerly a man)...!?

This is another world where one can experience endless love and eat meals that one didn't work for (does it taste good?), it's an envy-inducing, genderswap isekai story with a super NEET harem!

(Source: Nico Nico Seiga)

title: Subete No Jinrui O Hakai Suru. Sorera Wa Saisei Dekinai.
genre: Traditional Games, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Katsura Ise
synopsis: This youth graffiti manga centers on two people in the 1990s who play the Magic the Gathering trading card game.

title: Shiganbana
genre: Action, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Mystery
author: Yae Utsumi
synopsis:
In this seemingly peaceful country, there lives a hitman that hunts down others of his kind - an assassin of assassins. Before eliminating his targets, he always questions their motives for killing - this is his way of embracing his destiny.

 From the author of "Until Your Bones Rot" and "The Shadows of Who We Once Were," Utsumi Yae presents a thrilling drama about the lives of those existing on the edge between life and death.

title: Teisou Gyakuten Isekai De Sukebe Na Bijo-Tachi Ni Kakomare Nagara Boukensha Seikatsu
genre: Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Aachi
synopsis: Akira Kusaba is summoned to the other world of Rumisia by the beautiful silver-haired woman Lucia. Akira wasn't summoned to save the world... but to help her make money!? Feeling exhausted, Akira begins working part-time in the other world, but gradually he notices the strangeness of this world. There's a female adventurer who wants to have her breasts wiped by a man, a slime that tries to drain the vitality out of men, and even Lucia, who summoned him, forces him to sleep next to her and secretly enjoys solo play in the bed next to her... Yes, this other world is a world where the concepts of chastity between men and women are reversed!

title: Aisaretagari No Shironeko Miko-San
genre: Animals, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Usa Usamiya
synopsis: Miko is a white cat who used to be a stray but has since become the most pampered cat in the world! she doesn't care if her owner is working or on a call -- she demands affection at all times.

title: Saikyou Skill "Inochigoi" De Kuyashii Kedo Musou Shichau Moto Maou-Sama No Sekai Seifuku Katsudou
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls
author: Murata Shinya
synopsis:
Village girl Chelsea, who is beloved by everyone, is actually the reincarnated ex-Demon King. However, when she reincarnated, for some reason neither her magical powers nor skills were inherited, and she was forced to live as a normal human being.

Humiliating days continued until one day, the remnants of the Demon King's army appeared to loot the village. Hunted down by her former subordinate, who did not realize her true identity, Chelsea finds herself in a perilous situation. Then, a skill finally manifests! The name of that skill is "Begging for Mercy"!?

title: Kuchibiru Kara Ai
genre: Romance, Boys' Love
author: Shiramatsu
synopsis: Riku, a beloved handyman known throughout the town, struggles with crowds due to his sensitive ears.After failing his entrance exams for that very reason, the one who supported him was his high school friend, Sumiharu.Despite being busy running his own business, Riku found comfort in Sumiharu's companionship. However, oneway, during an ordinary phone call, Riku unexpectedly felt aroused just from hearing Sumiharu's voice.Confused by this sudden change in his feelings, Riku begins to notice that the physical closeness between him and Sumiharu is steadily increasing. What could this mean for their relationship?

title: Tsumugu Kon
genre: Animals, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy
author: Chihaya Kuroiwa
synopsis:
??From today onwards, this guy is my bride.

The third son of the prestigious nine-tailed fox family, MItsu
×
The fox caretaker, Tsumugi

One day, due to Mitsu's selfishness, the two, who were once master and servant are now husband and wife!?

title: 20-Nen De Iroiro Kawacchatta Hero to Shounen
genre: Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Hagan
synopsis: Bravely is the hero of justice. 20 years later, he wakes up and finds that he somehow has become a cute girl...?!

title: Lord El-Melloi Ii-Sei No Jikenbo
genre: Historical, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Makoto Sanda
synopsis:
When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestantsincluding Luviagelita Edelfeltmust compete in a game of wits to win the castle.  
  
Based on the light novel of the same name.

title: Miss Not-So Sidekick
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ellianyang
synopsis:
Hyejung loved to read to escape her daily stress. But that's before she woke up inside the bizarre world of her favorite novel! Instead of the main heroine who courts three eligible men, she is now Latte Ectrie - a minor villain that everyone hates?! One way or another, it's a chance to live out her most beloved storyline, with popcorn in hand to watch all the drama! Taking charge of the narrative takes on a whole new meaning!

---

**Contents:** 139 + 30 (epilogue) + 9 (side story) = 178 chapters
- **Vol. 1:** main story (ch. 1-139)
- **Vol. 2:** epilogue (ch. 140-169)
- **Vol. 3:** side story (ch. 170-178)

title: Boku No Kanojo Sensei
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Lin Meng
synopsis: Can sensei be the heroine? Please?    Due to a traumatic experience, I have a distrust of people called "sensei". I, Saigi Makoto, was called by after school by the most popular and beautiful teacher at my school, Fujiki Maka-sensei. "I... love you" Eh a confession out of the blue!? "Until you say you love me, I will continue to pursue you." Ever since then, I've been called by for "guidance counselling" after school, somehow watched AV together, being given excessive skin-ship, went on dates together. Over time, I gradually became conscious of Sensei...? But isn't it bad for Sensei to go out with her student? Lesson start!

title: Infection
genre: Loli, Action, Romance, Zombies, Harem, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror
author: Tooru Oikawa
synopsis: A new infection has spread around the planet, that turns people into undead. The story begins a few minutes before the first recorded case, and shows the struggle of six young to survive this new world.

title: Wonder Cat Kyuu-Chan
genre: Animals, Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Sasami Nitori
synopsis:
Theres more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

- **[Official English license announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/08/28/seven-seas-isnt-kitten-around-with-license-of-wondercat-kyuu-chan-manga-series/)**

title: I Really Don'T Want to Be Reborn
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Zhi Xiang Yu Yizhi Xia
synopsis:
Little had I known, I Chen Hansheng; the former elite of society and a Diamond Bachelor, was reborn. When I woke up, I was a senior graduate in high school? 
Later, Chen Hansheng was walking near the crosswalk, he seemed hesitant. A precious girl; Shen Youchu and two other girls; Bai Yueguang and Xiao Rongyu, who will he pick? All of them? One of them? Two of them? Read to find out. 

Side Note:  Diamond Bachelor is a slang word that means someone whos insanely rich and single.

title: Eleceed
genre: Action, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Jae-Ho Son
synopsis:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place  one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a um decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoos super powers and Kaydens uber-smarts, theyre out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/juexingbachanshiguan/list?title_no=1313)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/eleceed/list?title_no=3523)

title: Majo Wa Mangetsu Ni Saku
genre: Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Yui Hara
synopsis: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!

title: Maryoku Mugen No Manaporter
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Atoha
synopsis:
Thanks to his infinite mana, Ishua has been working as a mana porter to the hero party, doing a perfect task of supplying mana to the party members who consumed a lof of MP and earning the trust of his companions. However, Alan, the hero decides to banish him from the party in a fit of jealousy. 

"We don't need a mana porter!"

And chasing after Ishua through the forest Aria, the saint, appears wishing to continue adventuring with Ishua. The story of the banished strongest mana porter begins here!

title: Seto-San O Warawasetai Tsumugi-Chan
genre: Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: King Kurisaki
synopsis:
Seto-san is a beautiful and cool class president. Her smiling face must be absolutely wonderful. I want to see it! 

This is a short comic in which Tsumugi-chan, a ditzy girl with whom Seto-san has had a little bit of contact with since the entrance ceremony, boldly tries various strategies to make Seto-san laugh  but usually fails. However, there seems to be something quite interesting about Seto-san...

title: You, Aquarist
genre: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Delinquents
author: Yuuya Kurokami
synopsis: A delinquent boy was out at a festival when he finds a discarded goldfish. Recalling his childhood experience of buying a goldfish from a festival stall and bringing it home only to have it die, he tries to make up for it by releasing the goldfish into the river. However, a mysterious girl stops him and tells him that it is not allowed to let out goldfish into the wild, and he learns how to keep goldfish at home and becomes a proper "aquarist."

title: Sekai Saikyou No Kishi Wa, Kanarazu Shinu Heroine Wo Sukuu Tame Isekai Demo Saikyou No Kishi to Naru ~Ryoutei Ni Hana Wo, Ryoute Ni Ken Wo~
genre: Action, Romance, Mecha, Virtual Reality, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Adaptation
author: Kazuma Isobe
synopsis:
He who fell in love with the heroine overturned her destiny to save her from her timely demise.

Abandoned by his parents, bullied in high school, and left in solitudea young boy named Mikazuki Kenya.

At the brink of despair, he encounters a fateful meeting in his only hobby, VR gaming.

A meeting with Kaguya and Reina, the heroines from the immensely popular game Knight of Giant.

The time spent with the two heroines saved him, and he was head over heels for both of them.

However, in the story, one of them is destined to die

To change that fate, he dedicated his life to mastering the game and becoming the strongest in the world.

Suddenly, Kenya finds himself entering the world of Knight of Giant?!

The strongest gamer embarks on a heroic tale of becoming the strongest in another world, in order to save the heroines he fell deeply in love with. The story begins.

title: Misaki-Kun Wa Kouryaku Chara Janai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Video Games, Crossdressing, School Life
author: Natsuichi
synopsis: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun!

title: Unmei No Makimodoshi
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, School Life, Police, Mystery
author: Fuuta Kimura
synopsis: An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case!

title: Corridor of Mirs
genre: Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Magic, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: NOK
synopsis:
One day, a girl woke up from a near car accident, and her name was Baek Nabi. After her chance encounter with a beautiful man, who saved her from the accident, Nabi starts to see things she has never seen before. Creatures who live off from humans negative emotions are called parasites . Nabis once normal life has overturned and becomes intertwined with several men all at the same time Youre a special existence. You just havent remembered yet. A fantasy romance of Nabi and the mysterious beings around her.  


---

Official English translation by Comico's [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/208)

title: Kyou Mo Kitansu Ka, Yoda-Senpai.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Yuuya Kurokawa
synopsis: This woman makes herself at home in my parents' house. She is a senior in the same high school and a friend of my sister's. It seems to take her two hours to get to school each way, so she stays at my house almost every day. Yoda is defenseless and a bit out of the ordinary, and I'm always on the edge of my seat!

title: Blue Exorcist
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Gore, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Kazue Katou
synopsis:
Rin and his exorcist classmates are caught in a secret war against the forces of darkness.
Raised by Father Fujimoto, a famous exorcist, Rin Okumura never knew his real father. One day a fateful argument with Father Fujimoto forces Rin to face a terrible truththe blood of the demon lord Satan runs in Rins veins! Rin swears to defeat Satan, but doing that means entering the mysterious True Cross Academy and becoming an exorcist himself.

title: The Isekai Doctor?Any Sufficiently Advanced Medical Science Is Indistinguishable From Magic.
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Animals, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Medical, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Houkou Tsuda
synopsis:
Can modern medicine work in another world? No cheats, no modern equipment. One doctor stands up against a world where magic rules!

Tadato Amami, an active doctor, is transferred to another world where medical magic is monopolized. He is surprised by the slimes, chimera, beastmen, and other inhabitants he encounters for the first time! But with the little medical equipment he has and his own knowledge, he is able to fight diseases and injuries!

Will he be able to cure the inhabitants of the other world and save those who suffer?!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States/Canada/Australia/New Zealand/Singapore/Japan only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10576/episode/352607)

title: Yandere Cafe E Youkoso!
genre: Boys' Love
author: Hinomiya
synopsis:
Welcome to Yandere Cafe!

A story about a high school boy's first visit to the Yandere Cafe.

title: Kichikujima
genre: Action, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Masaya Hokazono
synopsis: University students shipwrecked and forced to board a deserted island with a serial killer.

title: Love Scribe!
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Crossdressing
author: Mayu Sakai
synopsis: "I like what I like!" An encounter between two trendy people and their friendship!

title: The Days of Diamond
genre: Sports, Drama
author: Oohashi Hirai
synopsis: Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...This is a baseball youth drama that explores the relationship between a genius and his peers.

title: Fake Saint of the Year: You Wanted the Perfect Saint? Too Bad!
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Daikou Kabedon
synopsis:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] is a game ill-suited of being known as a galge, as the main heroine would  regardless of the chosen route  meet her demise.

Fudou Niito, a resident of Japan, went to bed dissatisfied with the ending of the game. When he next awoke, he found himself in the body of the games hated fake saint, Elrise. Confused, but with an understanding that Elrises actions would spell disaster for many lives in the future, he took advantage of the situation and acted to change the course of history.

As a result, despite her rotten personality, Elrise was adored by those around her as a perfect saint. Furthermore, the game itself was intrinsically linked to his original world and changed accordingly to suit Elrises actions. Without any knowledge of what the hell was going on, the fake saint Elrise continued to alter her fate.

A saint on the outside, but a man on the inside.

The transmigrator was a piece of shit and the person he transmigrated into was also a piece of shit. A combination of shit and shit would cause an accident  to create the greatest fake saint shitshow of the year!

title: Kimitte Watashi No Koto Suki Nandesho?
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Enya Uraki
synopsis:
Hey Kuroya-kun, do you like me?
How did you know!?

Unrequited love. What a shame for Kuroya, a gloomy student in high school.
The other party is Kasumi Shiramori, a senior in the literature club and a transcendentally beautiful girl. While spending time alone in the club, I should have hidden this feeling for a long time!
Senior told Kuroya in desperation.

Then -? Want to try dating me first?

Theres no way a relationship exists in the minds of these two!? No, wait, it should be like this-
Both the feelings and the super-sweet romantic comedy of youth are full of faintness in the misery of a longing senior who is teased despite being in a relationship!
  
---

**Links:** 
- [Official LN (EN)](https://tentaibooks.com/en/books/you-like-me-dont-you-so-wanna-go-out-with-me-volume-1)

title: Majo Taisen - 32-Nin No Isai No Majo Wa Koroshiau
genre: Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Martial Arts, Samurai, Magical Girls, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Homura Kawamoto
synopsis:
Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as witches.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0171)
**Official English Volumes:** [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/the-war-of-greedy-witches)

title: Doku O Haku
genre: Oneshot, Psychological, Drama
author: Yoshihiko Hayashi
synopsis: Meet Masamichi Watanabe.

title: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother'S Girlfriend
genre: Genderswap, Loli, Romance, Incest, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Kousuke Tsukigi
synopsis:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---
**Link:**
- [Fantia 18+ Content](https://mangadex.org/title/7a23de9c-01b8-43bd-ac38-0bfe0bebcc3b)

title: Katakoi Strategy
genre: Romance, Boys' Love
author: Roji Akira
synopsis: My dear best friend likes someone else...?

title: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Sports, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Taiyou Kuzumi
synopsis: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.

title: Genshin Impact 4-Koma
genre: Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: miHoYo
synopsis:
Official 4-koma comic for the award-winning game, [Genshin Impact](https://genshin.mihoyo.com/). 
A relaxing trip in Teyvat ><, let's go together!

title: Legend
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Soo Jung Woo
synopsis: Reiji Saeki was living in a north-eastern countryside town and lost his life in an accident during summer vacation. But before he knew it, a mysterious ball of light appeared in front of his eyes in a world of whiteness. Being a magician from a parallel world, that ball of light is looking for someone qualified to inherit the magic they had created in order to prevent it from being lost. Reiji, who took on that suggestion, lives in the parallel world Elgin, with a new body and powerful magic.

title: Welcome to Japan, Ms. Elf!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Shimo Aono
synopsis:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!
___
- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)

title: Kitchen Soldier
genre: Action, Long Strip, Video Games, Military, Drama, Cooking, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: JRobin
synopsis: Korea's representative dirt spoon, Kang Sung-jae, an opportunity to become a legendary cook who has come like a ray of light in an uneasy military life!

title: Magabanashi: Ghost Stories Spreading on Social Media
genre: Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Carnakki
synopsis: Based on the popular horror radio show Magabanashi, this anthology captures supernatural stories that have taken on a life of their own across social media. Readers are cautioned that these tales come with risks, as they tap into deep-seated fears and blur the line between reality and the supernatural.

title: King Golf
genre: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Sports, Adventure
author: Ken Sasaki
synopsis:
In Teirin High School, you are either part of a gang or an elite sports player. Sousuke Youki, called 'the predator,' is an undefeated master at fighting. One morning, as he finishes up a fight, Kazumi, a prodigy amateur golf player, took a look at Sousuke, ignored him, and walked right by. Infuriated, Sousuke sets out to get revenge on Kazumi for dissing him but Sousuke's revenge takes a detour as he gets himself involved in playing golf by the thuggish golf coach. Will this delinquent break legends and become "the King of Golf"?  
  
King Golf also won the 56th Shogakukan Manga Award in January 2010 in the boys category.

title: Omae, Tanuki Ni Naranee Ka?
genre: Animals, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Tomo Nagawa
synopsis:
"Tired of life? Be a tanuki!"

A story of being scouted by a raccoon dog when trying to die.

title: Kinnikuman
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Sports, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Yudetamago
synopsis:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**

title: Be Blues ~Ao Ni Nare~
genre: Award Winning, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Motoyuki Tanaka
synopsis:
If you're born in Japan and you play football, you'll eventually want to wear the national team uniform! It's the same for everyone! Ichijou Ryuu is a boy whose dream is to become a Japan national team player. With his twin childhood friends, Yuuto and Yuki, their first goal is to win the Japan Under-12 Football Championship!  
The excitement of a one-on-one! The tension in front of goal! The elation from pulling off the perfect link up play! The essence of what makes football enjoyable is here.  
  
Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Best Shonen Manga in 2014.  


---

title: Hana Himeru Kimi No Meteor
genre: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires
author: Betty Tamamori
synopsis:
"On that night, I became the cursed monster's bride"

Stella, the eldest daughter of the Viscount Quinwitch, though she was adopted, lived happily with her kind family. However, one day, Stella's younger sister Lilinette was chosen as the "Monster's Bride". Once a century, a cursed monster confined to a castle requires a sacrifice, so Stella resolves to go there in place of Lilinette. And there, she meets the monster - a bloodstained vampire named Ravi.

title: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: yatoyato
synopsis: Ex-AV star Miyako unexpectedly runs into a former coworker at a marriage interview...?! The secretly connected pair are bursting with more pure energy than you can imagine! This cute adult love comedy hits different and will heal your soul.

title: Isekai Craft Gurashi ~Jiyuu Kimama Na Seisan Shoku No Honobono Slow Life~
genre: Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Aroe
synopsis:
Miyabi always had dreams of being an architect, creating buildings that would inspire awe in others. And in the MMORPG Yume Sekai, he was finally able to achieve that dream - even if his constructions were used entirely to house marriage proposals. 

One day, Miyabi received a message from the admins of the game - as his architecture was so good for couples, they are gifting him with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to go to a new world. Assuming they mean a private server, Miyabi accepts - and quickly gets transported to another world.

After confirming that he was spirited away, Miyabi discovers that all of his crafting skills from the game are intact here. No longer tethered to his job in the real world, Miyabi now has a real goal: to build his own house and family.
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/isekai-craftsman-a-relaxing-tale-of-chilling-and-building-from-scratch)

title: Bremen
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life, Music
author: Izumi Kawahara
synopsis: Reiji and Kasuga head out to Tokyo to become the "Gods of Rock," but they seem to always attract trouble. On their way, Hayama Ryo and Fujii Ran join them in their quest. Despite its rockstar type look, this manga really is about action.

title: Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: heeya
synopsis:
On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed, Clarisse, who naturally thought she would also die, heard something unexpected. 

We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead, I will kill you the day you turn eighteen. 

And so, Clarisse is given ten years to live. 
Clarisse then heads North as a prisoner. 
And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing 

Um, is it okay if I take this friend with me? Its my only friend. 

But what Clarisse holds out is a rock? 

Its a new life in the North! 
But this life as a prisoner keeps on getting better?

title: In This Life, the Greatest Star in the Universe
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Music, Full Color
author: D&C Webtoon Biz
synopsis: Sun Woo-joo, an aspiring idol with shining talent, dedication, and passion, had only one shortcoming: "dancing." Having to give up on his lifelong dream of becoming an idol due to this one flaw, he was preparing for a different path in life when a miracle suddenly appeared! "I'll become a superstar brighter than anyone." His once lacking dance skills were no longer a problem. The UV Starship. Five perfectly prepared idols are finally ready with everything they need. A monstrous rookie is about to debut in the entertainment industry! Presenting 'The New Black.' This life, he's destined to be a cosmic superstar!

title: Put It All in the Ring! 2
genre: Action, Sports, Martial Arts
author: Masami Kurumada
synopsis: At the end of Ring ni Kakero 1, Ryuuji Takane went up against Superstar Jun Kenzaki for the World Title. Now, 17 years later, Rindo Kenzaki, the son Jun Kenzaki and nephew of Ryuuji Takane, lives with Ishimatsu Katori, the "Kenka Champion" from Ryuuji and Jun's time. Rindo will meet up with a new generation of boxers to create a new Golden Japan Jr. to take on the world.

title: Immortal Maestro
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Story Arc
synopsis:
The person who is ranked No.1 in the world rankings of the AOS League of Infinity game and the strongest person who is nicknamed the devil on the battlefield.
However, a man wearing a golden mask appeared before the strongest person who had suffered a setback in a traffic accident and was abandoned by everyone and proposed.
If I come back, can I become a world championship winner?
The strongest person who goes back to the past becomes the maestro who leads the battlefield between earth and other worlds and shows the best game of all time.

title: Naze Ka Tsukaima No Usagi Wa Boku Wo Dekiai Shisugiteru
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy
author: Kazuki Tougo
synopsis: Aidan McGuire is a new magician in the Guardians of the Order. Every Guardian has a humanoid familiar, and summoning one is mandatory! But during the summoning ceremony, Aidan summons a cute rabbit! He was told deeper contact was necessary for the familiar to showcase its true power so when he tried kissing it, the rabbit disappeared and a young man named Jougasaki Hidetora appeared in its place! A cute (?!) fantasy BL story about a magician with a vague memory of some other life.

title: Ice Master
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Toru Fujieda
synopsis: Strength and power, thats all there is in this world. As someone living a poverty-stricken life, Yunfei, an orphan of the Donghua Clan, is considered the weakest in the world simply because he lacks power. To escape this wretched fate, he chooses the path of a eunuch. Yunfei receives the seed of the ultimate martial arts technique, the Extreme Yin Art of Bai Yihong, and becomes part of the emperors special forces as part of the [Great Murim Extermination Plan]. In this era of great upheaval, amidst constant intrigues and fierce power struggles, the story follows the escapades of Yunfei, a master of deceit and cruelty, as he navigates the world of martial arts with his ice arts!

title: Kyouryuu-Chan to Kaseki-Kun
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Jun Rokumoto
synopsis:
Rinko Shinobu may seem like a normal high school girl, but she is actually a hybrid between human and dinosaur. Although she usually stays in human form, sometimes her T-rex bits will pop out when she's distracted. The only person who knows her secret is the dinosaur nerd Kazuya Kobake, who tries his hardest to help hide her dinosaur form. But his distracting antics are drawing strange stares from their classmates and stressing him out

(Source: Natalie.mu, translated)

title: Pastel Love
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Full Color
author: Kyouko Hashimoto
synopsis: "Millie" (golden haired), the perfect little girl whose life is fully equipped with everything, but because of her timeless mother, Millie has become an indifferent day-to-day person until she meets "Zen" (black-headed), an ordinary little girl whose life focussed on only studying, without Zen knowing that she herself was stirring up Millie's heart to beat again.

title: Beloved
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Takashi Kanzaki
synopsis: Dr. Wei struggles after finding out that the girl she hooked up with was only sixteen years old, but somehow it's not as easy to avoid the girl as she had thought.

title: Kuse Ni Narisou ?
genre: Romance, Martial Arts, Crossdressing, School Life, Delinquents, Music
author: Yayoi Nakano
synopsis: ? I'm Shiratori Nagisa, an idol! Tossing people around is a hobby of mine. Is there a strong and cool boy out there somewhere? Finally, a super hilarious romantic comedy! Includes 2 other stories.

title: Double Helix Blossom
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Crime, Fantasy, Police, Supernatural
author: Asaura
synopsis: The manga is set in the near future, and begins with the awakening of police officer Kiku Shinonome, who was put into cryogenic stasis for 60 years to stave off what would have been a fatal wound. In a new world unfamiliar to her, she is forced to team up with Kyo Tsukisagari, a criminal with a big rap sheet but equipped with psychic powers. Together, they solve paranormal incidents, even while their personalities butt up against each other.

title: Hitoribocchi No Isekai Kouryaku
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Goji Shoji
synopsis:
The strongest doesnt need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own loner skill. Even though its a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loners otherworld strategy guide!

title: Apple
genre: Oneshot, Thriller, Monsters, Action, Crime, Mafia, Military, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Kaiu Shirai
synopsis: The mysterious assassin, Apple, has been caught by President Bruno. Seemingly unarmed and tied to the ceiling, Apple must make use of some unorthodox methods to escape. Just what does Apple have up his sleeve and how does this tie to a magical spring called Gods Fountain?

title: Witch Craft Works
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Ryuu Mizunagi
synopsis: Takamiya Honoka, a regular student, sits next to Kagari Ayaka, the idol of the school, and a perfect girl in every way. Her fans are hostile to the extent of harassing anyone who gets close to their princess, so Takamiya-kun is always in trouble. One day Takamiya is suddenly attacked by an unknown force, but he is rescued by a powerful sorceress of fire, who happens to be Kagari Ayaka herself!

title: Yama, Kaimashita ~Isekai Gurashi Mo Warukunai~
genre: Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Tatsuya Endou
synopsis:
When I bought a mountain, I never expected it to be from another world!
And while I was leisurely enjoying a countryside life suited to this strange realm, I unknowingly began making the mountain more powerful!?

(Source: Amazon JP, edited)

title: Yameru Hoshi Yori Ai Wo Komete
genre: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Magic, Drama, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Honda
synopsis: Suicide is a daily occurrence for people on this planet, where they coexist with "Fluffy," a special clinical creature provided by aliens with the ability to give super-powerful healing to its hosts. What is the drama for people living in this strange world?

title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: CLAMP
synopsis: It is spring, with cherry trees in full blossom, and Sakura is just entering middle school. Her beloved Syaoran has returned from Hong Kong, and life couldn't be better. But when she awakens from a strange dream to find her Sakura Cards powerless, how can she protect Tomoeda from disaster?! [Kodansha]

title: Kaijin Fugeki
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Ito Oogure
synopsis: Night, phenomena that were once known as natural disasters. Faced with the threat of inexplicable destruction, children offer their prayers in the form of dance in order to borrow the power of the gods, quell the Night's fury, and deliver the world from ruin. In a fateful encounter, a boy from a rural town in Japan, Jin, meets Gao, a British soldier who was forced to flee his homeland by the Night. The two spend their halcyon days with their friends in the quiet town surrounded by nature. Until one day, the Night suddenly falls on them once again!

title: Yaotome X 2
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Nikusoukyuu.
synopsis:
Yaotome Kai is a sixth grade elementary school student with a new neighbor living in the apartment next door. The slightly weird girl Yaotome Haruru. Eating school lunches, having likes and dislikes, and forgetting things as elementary school students do. Casually hanging out whilst their parents get along, as next-door neighbors do.

The latest work by "Seitokai Yakuindomo" author Ujiie Tozen.

A comedy of two elementary school neighbors.

(Source: Pocket Shounen Magazine, translated)

title: Zatch Bell! 2
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Makoto Raiku
synopsis:
The sequel to Konjiki no Gash!!, aka Zatch Bell.

Once the battle to decide the king of the demon world, in which 100 demon children fought against each other, had come to an end the king of the demon world was crowned, and the demon world lived out the rest of its days in peace.

Or at least, that was how it was supposed to be.

Now, a shocking fact about the current state of the demon world comes to light. And in the depths of their despair, three demon children decide to risk it all for one last chance at survival.

title: Rurouni Kenshin: Hokkaido-Hen
genre: Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Supernatural
author: Nobuhiro Watsuki
synopsis:
It is the 16th year of the Meiji era. Five years have passed since Kenshin Himura stopped the uprising of Makoto Shishio. Though the flames of his budding revolution were extinguished, the scars left in its wake are still felt across Japan. Remnants of his groupthough scatteredstill exist. Some have found peace while others continue to fight.  
  
After a remaining faction tried to revive the revolution, Shishio's old sword fell into the hands of Ashitarou Hasegawa, an orphan boy who has never known a home. The conflict also leaves both Aran Inoue, a 16-year-old half-Japanese, half-American boy, and a mercenary girl named Asahi Kubota with a hefty price to pay off, with nowhere else to go. But luckily for these individuals, the Kamiya dojo has always been a place to accept wanderers without prying into their pasts.  
  
The three are keen to start fresh, so when two members of Asahi's former clan show up demanding her return, Asahi refuses and things start to get ugly. In the midst of the chaos, the clan members drop a package containing a picture of dojo proprieter Kaoru Kamiya's presumably deceased father and his locationHakodate, Hokkaido. With only this information, the members of the Kamiya dojo embark on an adventure across the sea in the hopes of finding news about Kaoru's father and the reason he is being targeted.



---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Samurai X: Hokkaido Arc** (2022)

title: Bakidou
genre: Action, Psychological, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Supernatural
author: Keisuke Itagaki
synopsis: After more than 2,000 years, Nomi no Sukune's successor is born. This time, Baki will challenge the god of sumo.

title: The World Grew Spines
genre: Oneshot, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Shigeru Tamura
synopsis:
Where did the [Cactusmen](https://mangadex.org/chapter/a7a4df6c-5749-4d12-a12a-610e8f08cf20) come from?

---
Published in Bikkuri House August 1983.

title: Otokotachi
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Tetsuya Chiba
synopsis:
(from ebookjapan):

Shinichi, who has been transferred to Tokyo for work, asks his uncle, who lives in downtown Tokyo, for a place to live and visits an apartment named "Eastern". 

However, it turns out to be a devil's cave with many residents who have their own peculiarities! His uncle, nicknamed "Dharma," is the head of the apartment. What is the fate of Shinichi, who has been in deep trouble since the first day he moved in? 

A visceral work by the master storyteller, Tetsuya Chiba!

title: Ntrevenge
genre: Sexual Violence, Magic, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Masai
synopsis: An introverted high school student, Souichi Sakuraba, is being bullied severely by the Yokai classmates. The bullying escalates, and Souichis childhood friend, Azusa, who was the only one who trusted him, is defiled by them. In front of Souichi, who was in the depths of despair, the succubus, Asmode, appeared. Souichi makes a contract with a succubus who possesses a mysterious ability, and decides to make the bullys loved ones suffer the same pain as himself by cuckolding them. The obscene revenge by NTR begins.

title: I Created a Salvation Organization
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Superhero, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Xiao Dong Zai
synopsis: He got a doomsday salvation system. As long as he saves the world, he can have everything. He recruited top talents to build the Pan-Human Principle Guardian Association. He descended into the doomsday worlds as the guardian of human principles, allowing the whole world to admire him and worship him as a god. The ultimate natural disaster. The mutation frenzy. The whisper of the evil god. Thus, a huge organization spanning many worlds, taking the protection of human principles as its own responsibility and saving civilization from the fate of destruction, gradually appeared in the eyes of the world.

title: Asura
genre: Historical, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: George Akiyama
synopsis: There was someone who set out after receiving orders from the Absolute One who first unified the continent to learn the secret of immortality. He believed that he would definitely discover the secret of immortality even if he had to travel all over the world. He never returned until the Absolute died and the empire collapsed, leaving behind only numerous speculations and gradually being forgotten in people's memories. And after a long time...

title: Isekai Kenkokuki
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: KOIZUMI
synopsis:
A protagonist reborn in another world.  Apparently he had been reincarnated as an abandoned child.  Before his eyes were abandoned children like him.  In order to survive, he led them into farming.  Little by little, orphans gathered, and upon hearing rumors of a village, others began to migrate.

The group that had been nothing but children had become a village before anyone realized. Then various countries in the surroundings started to have an eye on it. This is the epic tale of the man who would later be known as the Divine Emperor.

title: Sins of the Gods
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy
author: Du Gua Jun
synopsis:
As a sinner, Ying Tian and his tribe were imprisoned in the City of Sinners with collars that restricted their supernatural powers. However, Ying Tian was told that he was the descendent of a god. Just when Ying Tian was confused, an unexpected disaster destroyed the entire City of Sinners, leaving no one alive. Ying Tian himself escaped from death and came to the outside world, carrying the blood feud of his entire tribe. In order to find out the truth of the world, Ying Tian and his partners embark on a journey, while he also reveals the true power of a god

---
**Link:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc36782)

title: Yuukoku No Moriarty: the Remains
genre: Historical, Psychological, Crime, Drama, Police, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Hikaru Miyoshi
synopsis: A manga adaptation of the Yuukoku no Moriarty light novels.

title: Kidnapped Bride
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Team Cappuccino
synopsis:
A once in a lifetime opportunity comes to Lucina, the illegitimate daughter of Lord Berek. Hakkan, the great conqueror who rules the dragon lands of Tayer, gives Lucina the opportunity to be his kidnapped bride. Desperate for any kind of freedom, Lucina agrees and steps into the unknown world.

---

**Note:** The novel originally serialized as R15, once its web serialization was completed, it released as R19 as an ebook (volumes). The webtoon will follow how it originally released, which is R15.

title: Ogami Tsumiki to Kinichijou
genre: Award Winning, Animals, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Miyu Morishita
synopsis:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind. When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

title: Gate - Jieitai Kanochi Nite, Kaku Tatakaeri
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Satoru Sao
synopsis:
A gate appears in Tokyo's Ginza district sometime in the 21st century. From the gate pours out monsters, knights from middle-age Europe, and other fantasy-like beings, and they kill many of the citizens of Tokyo. This event is known as the Ginza Incident.  
The government sends a small group of soldiers from the Japanese Self-Defense Forces to the alternate world beyond the gate. Led by otaku soldier Youji, they find that the villages in the world are being attacked by a dragon. An elf girl who is a survivor from the dragon's rampage joins the group in their travels across the dangerous new world.  
  
 [Official Thai](https://shopee.co.th/Gate-%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B4-%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%B0-1-10-i.30847586.4202197419)

title: Machigatta Ko Wo Mahou Shoujo Ni Shite Shimatta
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Superhero, Magical Girls, Magic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Souryu
synopsis: While searching for a brave candidate to become a magical girl and defend the world from evil, a mythical creature finds Kayo Majiba, a cute young lady who seems like the perfect fit. But when this newly turned magical girl proves to be a crude delinquent who goes berserk in a conflict, it becomes clear that this may have been a terrible mistake. Now eviland any innocent bystanderswill face the rage of a magical girl gone wrong!

title: Hokenshitsu Wa Futarikiri
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Rococo
synopsis: A collection of interconnected yuri stories in the nurse's office.

title: Maigo No Onnanoko O Ie Made Todoketara, Genkan Kara Detekita No Wa Gakunen Ichi No Bishoujo Deshita
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: China Ajara
synopsis:
One day, Kuroda Yusei, an introverted high school student with zero dating experience, returns a lost little girl to her house... when the most beautiful girl in his grade, Shirakawa Ayano, appears! 

"As thanks for saving my sister," she begins to approach him boldly for some reason, and every day is filled with mishaps!? On top of that, a busty otaku classmate and an attention-seeking junior girl also appear, and his daily life suddenly becomes more glamorous!? 

A school romance comedy where fate changes as you suddenly become close to "the girl of your dreams"!

title: Nine Peaks
genre: Time Travel, Action, Delinquents
author: Tetsuhiro Hirakawa
synopsis:
After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**

title: Mieruko-Chan
genre: Award Winning, Monsters, Psychological, Ghosts, Comedy, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Tomoki Izumi
synopsis:
All of a sudden, Miko is able to see grotesque monsters all around her; but no one else can. Rather than trying to run away or face them, she instead musters all of her courage and ignores them. Join in on her day-to-day life as she keeps up her best poker face despite the supernatural goings-on.
___
[Alt Raw (niconico Manga)](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/37662)

title: Liquor Gummies
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Choujin Kele
synopsis: Xiang Qihong, a college student who has been unwilling to go to school for a long time, was entrusted by a university professor and a friend one day to help take care of their nephew! So now all of a sudden there's an older student/neighbour who had an elusive personality. Can Xiang Qihong get along well with the other party if he is so used to living alone?

title: Ponkotsu-Chan Kenshouchuu
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Tsubasa Fukuchi
synopsis:
Mito is a boy with a big heart and the frightening face of a thug. He wants people to rely on him, but he scares people off at first sight. That is, until his schoolmate Yumesaki asks him to help her.  
  
Yumesaki has a problem. Every day she is given a new, random supernatural ability by an mysterious being called God, as she has to test them in order to stop a giant meteorite that will destroy the planet in a year.  
  
Sure, the goal is to save the planet, but when a boy and a girl spend time together, there are more tender things to discover too!

title: Okiku-San Wa Ichatsukitai
genre: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Chiri Yuino
synopsis: The centuries-old evil spirit Okiku has decided to return with one objective: flirting as much as possible with Hijiri Ryouyou - the most powerful and beautiful exorcist of modern times.

title: Yoku Wakaranai Keredo Isekai Ni Tensei Shiteita You Desu
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Keyaki Uchiuchi
synopsis:
Ren, a young orphan girl, has been sold off to a merchant with sinister plans for her. Suddenly, memories of her past life on a world called Earth come flooding back, and Ren remembers that she used to be a research scientist  and a grown man! As Ren escapes into the Dark Forest, magical powers awaken within her. In order to survive the harsh realities of this world, she must use her rekindled knowledge of Earth's science as well as her newfound powers! Will her magical cheat powers and past-life knowledge be enough to keep her freedom, or is she doomed to a life of servitude?
___

title: Rave
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: K2
synopsis:
The Continent of Song is in chaos. The sinister secret society known as Demon Card is using the power of Dark Bring to destroy everything in their path. The only things capable of stopping Dark Bring are the Rave stones. Unfortunately, the Rave Stones were scattered around the globe in an explosion 50 years ago, so now they must be collected by the Rave Master in order to stop Dark Bring once and for all. This new task has been given to Haru Glory; a sixteen-year-old boy from Garage Island. The World's fate now rests on the new, young Rave Master.

---
