title: Sensitive Boy
genre: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
synopsis: Kaede, a victim of past sexual abuse, is obsessed with becoming normal

title: Eiyuu Ni Akogareta Shoujo Wa Kyuuketsuki Ni Ochitemo Eiyuu O Mezasu
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Zombies, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Gore, Fantasy, Vampires
author: Naomichi Kokugi
synopsis:
"We'll kill all vampires. Sharing our own fallen ? blood ? as a weapon...!!"

Arbitration Knights travel around the world to protect peace. Rinslet, a girl who has just become a regular knight, meets Yuri, a vampire girl with cool silver hair and crimson eyes. 
Rinslet learns that she is an abomination who kills her own kind by manipulating the power of ? blood armor ?, which materializes blood into swords, bows and arrows. She becomes Yuri's kin in exchange for her life, and her goal is...?

A Yuri x Vampire x Dark Fantasy!

title: Oni Ure Idol Ga Kyou Mo Watashi Wo Oshitekuru
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama
author: Ookami
synopsis: Unpopular underground idol and actress, Enatsu Sayuki, faces her work diligently everyday to achieve her dreams of making it big in the world of acting. But, for some reason, the superstar idol Touma Sera  who should be her rival  becomes her biggest fan! Adorable enough to make Sayuki jealous, Sera takes every chance to passionately declare her love, throwing Sayukis life into chaos. Will Sayuki be able to achieve her dreams? And what will become of the one-sided love(?) between Sera and Sayuki...!?

title: Koibami Shoujo
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Mystery
author: Kawabatao
synopsis: High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women. Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again. However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five!

title: Moriarty the Patriot
genre: Historical, Psychological, Crime, Drama, Mystery
author: Ryousuke Takeuchi
synopsis: In the late 19th century, Great Britain rules over a quarter of the world. Nobles sit in their fancy homes in comfort and luxury, while the working class slaves away at their jobs. When young Albert James Moriartys upper-class family adopts two lower-class orphans, the cruelty the boys experience at his familys hands cements Alberts hatred of the nobility he was born into. He asks the older of the two boyswho has a genius mind and a killer instinctto help him rid the world of evil, starting with Alberts own family!

title: Minamoto-Kun Monogatari
genre: Romance, Comedy, Incest, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Minori Inaba
synopsis: Minamoto-kun has a face pretty enough to make people think he's a girl. Because of his face, he was bullied by the girls in middle school who were jealous of his face. He developed a fear of women due to the trauma and ended up attending a high school for boys. Just as he enters college and makes a promise to himself to overcome the trauma of his past, his father remarries and asks him to move out of the house. His father arranges him to live with his aunt (Minamoto-kun's father's younger sister) for the time being. She is an extremely beautiful woman who is also a non-tenured professor at his college. When he arrives at her apartment, she shows him her breasts and tells him that he will be her "guinea pig" in her reverse Hikaru Genji project.

title: Honzuki No Gekokujou ~Shisho Ni Naru Tame Ni Wa Shudan Wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 2-Bu ?Hon No Tamenara Miko Ni Naru!?
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Suzuka
synopsis:
After the discussions with the temple master and head priest ended, Myne won the right to be treated as a noble with the role of a blue-robed shrine maiden apprentice.   
Work in the temple began and Myne could read books in the long-awaited temple library.   
However, there were many problems in the temple, such as adapting to the class system and dealing with the problem children assigned to her as attendants.   
Overcome adversity to be able to read books in peace!   
A biblio-fantasy written for book lovers and bookworms! The second part begins!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)

title: Wheel of Reincarnation Rinne
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Touka Takauchi
synopsis: As a child, Mamiya Sakura mysteriously disappeared in the woods behind her grandma's home. She returned whole and healthy, but since then, she has had the power to see ghosts. Now a teenager, she just wishes the ghosts would leave her alone! At school, the desk next to Sakura's has been empty since the start of the school year. Then one day her always-absent classmate Rokudo Rinne shows up, and he's far more than what he seems! After school one day, Rinne helps Sakura deal with the ghost of a boy who has a crush on her. Rinne, it seems, knows just how to handle such ghosts, and has the skills and tools to properly dispatch them to the afterlife (for a small fee of course). Sakura starts to learn more about her mysterious classmate, and her curiosity about Rinne draws her deeper into the amazing world between life and death.

title: Riso No Otoko
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Chika
synopsis: The story begins when a man ten years younger, a man of the same age, and then a man ten years older appeared in front of our heroines, who had taken a break from love. A coworker, a husband, a colleague, a one night stand Do they truly understand their feelings, and are troubled by being together? You dont have to be with your soulmate Is it enough to be with a man who fits your ideals?

title: Death Preparation Hero
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Maki
synopsis:
Several decades have passed since the Hero defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the world, and the Hero has grown old enough to only vaguely remember his magic spells. When the remnants of the Demon King's army attack the Hero, he decides to set out on a journey again. This time, it's not a journey to save the world, but a "death preparation journey" to look back on his life.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/69537)

title: Onban Kikou
genre: Historical, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery, Music
author: Ryouichirou Kezuka
synopsis:
The secret of the record left by a grandfather, an underground record shop dealing with forbidden pop music, and an old jukebox in a future diner... 
A collection of short stories that traces the memories and feelings contained inside music records.

title: Gabai
genre: Historical, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Saburou Ishikawa
synopsis: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is

title: Boukyaku Battery
genre: Sports, Slice of Life
author: Eko Mikawa
synopsis:
Two geniuses who made a name for themselves in the middle school baseball world but had distanced themselves from baseball have serendipitously come together at an obsecure public high school in Tokyo.

Kiyomine Haruka, a pitcher with a flawless, powerful arm. His battery partner, the shrewd catcher known as the 'General', Kaname Kei (who's currently a complete amateur due to memory loss!). And then there are those who once fell in defeat to these two...

Their paths have crossed once more, and now their high school baseball story begins anew, springing into action!

title: Metro?Survive
genre: Survival, Drama, Tragedy
author: Yuuki Fujisawa
synopsis: Mishima is your average spineless pushover, working as a repairman for the Exopolis Tower, Tokyo's largest and hottest highrise business and entertainment building. He promised to come home in time to celebrate his son's birthday, but when he lets his pushy boss saddle him with overtime, the task takes him all night. On the morning subway train heading home, a massive earthquake strikes and collapses both Exopolis and its underground train lines. Now Mishima is trapped deep underground with the other passengers of the train, some of whom are less than cooperative. Will he be able to take the initiative for once and lead them all to freedom, or will they starve in their underground prison?

title: The Duke'S Daughter Is Going on Strike
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Potaufeu
synopsis:
Aeryl Frey Brixia had lived all her life hiding behind a mask.

She was shunned by everyone including the father she craved affection from because of the ugly mark on her face that branded her a monster.

At the end of her miserable life, she was falsely accused of selling military weapons to the enemy nation and sentenced to execution

The blade of the guillotine dropped and everything went black.

The next time she opened her eyes, she was in her room again as a young girl.

This time, she was determined things will be different. She will no longer be a puppet. She will no longer be manipulated.

And the first thing for her to do is to cooperate with the two officers leading the investigation against her father

title: Apparently, Disillusioned Adventurers Will Save the World
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Shinta Fuji
synopsis: Life isnt going well for veteran adventurer Nick. Despite his loyalty to his party, he was betrayed by a teammate who accused him of embezzlement, then kicked out by his mentor. On top of that, his girlfriend dumped him too! Tired, heartbroken, and looking for a drink, Nick chances upon a few kindred spirits who are as jaded as he is. Can these disillusioned heroes put their faith in each other long enough to save the world together?

title: Henkoi!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Mito Tsuruyama
synopsis: The main character finds his possessions "abused" by some unknown person until he finally caught the culprit masturbating to them?

title: Ore Dake Fuguu Skill No Isekai Shoukan Hangyakuki ~Saijaku Skill "Kyuushuu" Ga Subete O Nomikomu Made~
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls
author: Skyfarm
synopsis: Nakatani Yuto, a high school student, and his classmates are suddenly summoned to another world as "heroes". While his classmates are given powerful skills, Yuto is given the unfortunate skill of [Absorb]. Yuto, who has no use for it, is mortally wounded in a battle with a demon, but his classmates leave him to die. But at that moment, Yuto hears a voice out of nowhere...?

title: The Delivery Lady Came
genre: Shota, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Unpoco
synopsis: Not found

title: Double Play
genre: Romance, Sports, Harem, Drama, School Life
author: Koji Murata
synopsis: Having forgotten his keys, Tamao Hiroi a high-school student, returns home using the back entrance and is surprised to find a stranger in his bed Soon he realizes this is no stranger but Ran Homura, one year younger, softball ace and one of the most beautiful girls at school! Hiroi watches her masturbating on his bed and instinctively does the same peeking through the glass door.

title: The Anemone Feels the Heat
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life
author: Ren Sakuragi
synopsis: Nagisa Ootsuki shed her former self out of shame from failing her highschool entrance exams. On her first day in her new highschool, who does she meet but the girl who made her fail the exam! How does Nagisa deal with these complicated emotions?

title: Futago Matomete "Kanojo" Ni Shinai?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Miso Ameiro
synopsis:
Usami is a beautiful classmate with good morals and top grades. At school, she views Sakuto as her rival. But when he bumps into her after school, he sees a different side of her. She was playing at an arcade after classes, and she had this innocent smile that one couldn't imagine on her at school.

For the sake of getting along with her, he gets close to her at school and then plays together with her after school. They each have their places where they can deepen their bonds, and at last

This is the start of a heart-warming love triangle romcom!
___

- [Alternative Raw](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67850)

title: Gachiakuta
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Kei Urana
synopsis:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.
___
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alternative Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (US Only)

title: Tonari No Seki No Yankee Shimizu-San Ga Kami O Kuroku Sometekita
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Wakakaede Sanada
synopsis:
"I dyed my hair black for you... so notice me."

Shimizu-san, the delinquent highschool girl who sits next to Hondo with her newly-dyed hair, gradually lowered her voice, slightly blushed, and laid her face down on the desk. After that, when Daiki Hondo talked with his friend about how he wanted be with a girl who can cook, the next day Hondo ended up partnered with Shimizu-san in cooking class, even though she used to always skip class. 

When Hondo mentioned that he wished he could try a girl's hand-made cooking, for some reason she brought two bentos to lunch the next day and shared one with Hondo

This is a coming-of-age romantic comedy with Shimizu-san, a delinquent highschool girl who is clumsy in love.

---

- [Official Twitter (LN)](https://x.com/yanmizusan)

title: Osananajimi Kanojo No Morahara Ga Hidoin De Zetsuen Sengen Shite Yatta
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
author: Manimani Ononata
synopsis:
My childhood friend is also my girlfriend. A dream come true, right? Hell no. She insults me on a daily basis. She grinds my dignity into shreds and it takes a toll on my mental well-being. I cant take it anymore.

So Im left with no choice, Im going to break up with her. In order to maintain my sanity, its the only option.

And thus, the story of my break up begins

title: Peach Boy Riverside
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls
author: Cool-kyou Shinja
synopsis:
Sarutorine Aldike, or Sari, is a bright, cheerful princess who wants to go on an adventure because she is bored of her tiny little castle in the countryside. One day, a hoard of vicious demons known as "Oni" come knocking on her doorstep, threatening the lives of everyone in the Kingdom. Thankfully, they are saved by a lone traveler named Kibitsu Mikoto who slays these monsters with a mysterious "Peach Eye". Shocked by the dangers of the outside world, Sari decides to set off on a journey of her own. Little did she know that she will set in motion a chain of events that will come to determine the fate of this magical world.

Remake version of Cool Kyoushinshas popular webcomic of the same name.

title: Youchien Wars
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Samurai, Mafia, Gore, Drama, Police
author: You Chiba
synopsis:
Welcome to Kindergarten Noir, an exclusive school catering to children of the global elite!

Rita, one of the teachers, has been on the hunt for a boyfriend but has had absolutely zero luck so far. One day, an assassin comes after one of the children... and hes totally dreamy?!

Dive into this action-packed rom-com as it unfolds inside the worlds "safest" kindergarten!

title: Shiba Inu Rooms
genre: Animals, Comedy, Supernatural
author: Esu Oomori
synopsis: A newly built 1LDK apartment with rent of 4,800 yen! The reason is the "earthbound spirit of a Shiba Inu"...!?

title: Magokoro Scramble! What Lies in Your Heart?
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Satoshi Taninaka
synopsis: Is this love natural instinct or fate? Koharu is born to a bloodline who can read people's minds. Although he told himself he would never open up to anyone besides his family, those plans are thrown off when he meets an eccentric girl by the name of Yuki. With their encounter, Koharu begins to fall deeper and deeper... into the pit of romance!

title: Crossdressing
genre: Romance, Crossdressing, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Mikuzu Shinagawa

Update : 18-September-2023

synopsis:
The hilarious misadventures of the "Sket Dan"; a group of high-schoolers who help out people as part of their club activity. Himeko, the hot-headed ex-delinquent with a soft spot for cute things and a taste for strange food. Switch, the brainy otaku who only talks via a computerized speech-application. And Bossun, the atypical leader of this looney bunch, with the amazing power to concentrate very hard!

- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.

title: Mamono No Hanayome
genre: Monsters, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Vampires
author: Yamatomi
synopsis: Sumioka Hana has lived on her job without making her lover. One day when her overwork peaked, she fell off the platform of the station. When she noticed, she was transferred to the world of fairy tales she read when she was young. Hana, who was injured by herself, is saved by Flora, the main character of her picture book. She was, however, caught by her brother Nicholas, and she was sacrificed to a human-eating monster. When I thought she was sucked by a man who was a vampire, she suddenly got hot in her body ...?

title: Vinland Saga
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Makoto Yukimura
synopsis:
As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**

title: Shoukan Suru Sekai
genre: Monsters, Action, Magic, Drama, School Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Yuuki Kodama
synopsis:
A brand-new series from the creator of *Blood Lad!*

When creatures, items, and even space itself can be summoned from other worlds, no one should want for anythingright?
Tokoyo, a boy who was abandoned to live with the Summoned in the Fantasy District aims to become a summoner to help all his Summoned friends.
When he arrives in Tokyo to attend the Summoning Academy, hes told hell never make it by the first summoner he meets!
Tokoyo realizes he has a lot left to learnand finds a new dream: to become the bridge between humanity and the Summoned!

- [Official English by Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/the-world-of-summoning/)

title: Toaru Majutsu No Index
genre: Sci-Fi, Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Kazuma Kamachi
synopsis:
The story is set in a world where supernatural powers exist through science, and magic exists through religion.  
  
In the story, Touma Kamijou is an ordinary high school boy with terrible academic scores and a power called Imagine Breaker. Imagine Breaker can defeat any other power, but it also undermines Kamijou's own good luck. His Imagine Breaker's immense strength is literally immeasurable, so hapless Kamijou is listed at the supernatural level of 0. He happens to meet a girl in white hanging off his window balcony. The girl says she is being chased by sorcerers, and Kamijou learns that the girl is a Church of England nun whose memories have been forcibly replaced by Index-Librorum-Prohibitorum  the 103,000 forbidden texts of the Church.

title: Golden Man
genre: Action, Romance, Superhero, Mystery
author: Petosu
synopsis:
The city of freedom, Neo York, is targeted by villains day and night, but it's also home to the strongest hero, Golden Man!!! But one night, during a rescue operation at a fire at an abandoned factory, Golden Man suddenly disappears. Left in his place, a single amnesiac young man with the Golden Man suit in his hands... Who on Earth is he?
___
- **Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550668106005965940)

(from ebookjapan):

After 40 years, "Babel II" is miraculously back!

This time, the enemy is the world's most powerful military nation, the United States of America! 

A supernatural battle of modern warfare vs. Babel II breaks out...!

title: The Girl Who Never Wins
genre: Traditional Games, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color, Gyaru
author: Suzuma Tsugumi
synopsis: Two female classmates engage in a playful game challenge involving games such as poker, shogi etc... with the loser forced to fulfill embarrassing requests. Confident at first, one girl quickly loses each round, leading to increasingly awkward and funny situations.

author: Suimin

After the death of his father, Kuga Ichirou, a shoujo mangaka fresh out of high school, has to take care of his two little siblings, Machi and Fumio, all by himself. Struggling to meet a deadline after his previous assistants get their manga debuts, he hires a new assistant through his editor. However, his life takes an unexpected turn after this new assistant is revealed to be a beautiful and mysterious girl

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/a-galaxy-next-door/)

title: My Maid, Miss Kishi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Kano Kashiwagi
synopsis: Kiichiro Hayase has a reputation as the wealthiest, hottest, most eligible bachelor in town. But as they say...behind every successful man is the maid who keeps him from tripping over his own two feet! Enter Miss Kishi, the most competent, professional maid aroundand the only thing keeping from Kiichiro quite literally crashing and burning. He owes it all to her, but can he ever make it up to her? He's sworn to try... no matter how many things must get broken, scattered, or lost to do so!

title: Oda-Chan to Akechi-Kun
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Giyo Tokiwa
synopsis: Not found

title: Walking
genre: Slice of Life
author: Ma Zuo
synopsis: Through the ordinary small events of his professional and personal life, a forty-year-old man lets himself go on impromptu escapades at random along the paths that the big city offers. This vagrant impulse soon takes on the appearance of a sentimental journey, punctuated by images of the walker's youth.

title: The Nine Heavens Swordmaster
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kadok
synopsis:
He is the master of the Nine Heavens.

Yeon Jeokha was the child of a second wife. Viciously bullied by his fathers first wife and his siblings, he was later imprisoned in a warehouse after his father died of illness

It has been ten years since his escape after he had learned martial arts that were out of the world.

I regard the Yeon Family with great bitterness.

The unstoppable adventure of the sole successor of the Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Yeon Jeokha, begins now!

title: Crimson Grimoire

Within a hidden room, she meets the mysterious blue-eyed girl wrapped in crimson chains, Red Riding Hood. Together with the strongest beast, she comes to learn about the world of magic, witches and grimoires.

title: Detective Conan
genre: Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Police, Mystery
author: Gosho Aoyama
synopsis: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

title: 30 Minute Sisters Around!
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
author: Benishake

"30MS 4-panel comic begins!"

Official 4Koma posted on the 30 Minutes Sisters Twitter: https://x.com/30msisters

title: Dark Summoner to Dekiteiru
genre: Monsters, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls
author: Shaoh
synopsis: Amona, a dark summoner and demi-human who uses demonic powers, is the newest addition to the party of the uptight priest Roni. Everyone expected the two to dislike each other and to have nothing to do with each other. But to their surprise, on their first day together as an adventuring party, they had a one-night stand...!

title: I Am the Fated Villain
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Liu Mang
synopsis:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on Theres a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!

Follow the guy who is destined to die among the six heroines!

title: Gomi Yashiki No Kamakura-San
genre: Romance, Boys' Love

synopsis:
Exhausted by his job, Kamakura shut himself in a house overflowing with garbage.
But his time, which stopped on "that day", started moving forward once again when a neighbor he had never spoken to before stepped into his house.

A good-natured neighbor x a traumatised resident of a dirty room
Boys' love tale of rescue and rehabilitation drawn by a genius newcomer.

title: Splatoon

title: The Possesive Tyrant and His Sleepy Cat
genre: Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Saendo
synopsis:
I've found myself trapped in a mature-rated novel as a cursed cat, whose mere existence is believed to be harmful to the empire. This place has killed every cat in every alley all because of one prophecy...
The moment anyone finds me will be my last moment in this life.
"What's this?"
Before I could even think of escaping, the male lead, who's fated to become a mad tyrant, effortlessly snatches me up.

title: Marriage Toxin
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, Delinquents
author: Joumyaku
synopsis:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the worlds most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone whos never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have no prospects with women and marriage as something not for him.

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesnt marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but toforce his little sister into doing that. Driven to his wits end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to

------

title: IM the Max-Level Newbie
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Superhero, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: WAN.Z
synopsis:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the games popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower. 

"Its time to show everyone what a hardcore gamer can do!"

title: Sono Akuyaku Kizoku, Mama Heroine Ga Suki Sugiru ~Shinshi Na Doryoku De Saikyou to Nari Fuguu Na Oshi Chara Tasukemakuru~
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Video Games, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy

The mom characters that appear in the game are all unfortunate sub-heroines who always get bad ending routes. Why Why does such a cute mom have to die?! Even though the protagonist tried very hard to request a route where they get saved, all of his efforts were in vain, making him spend his days in frustration. Then, he suddenly gets reincarnated into the world of MamaFan on a certain day. However, he gets reincarnated as a villainous aristocrat whos got nothing but the worst routes. This guy, whos crazy about mom characters  his fulfilling days of saving his beloved mom characters and his journey to create his harem full of plump women are about to begin!

---

Day 1: Recently my eyes seem to be a bit off, always seeing strange things. Wait, the cabinet seems to be moving, I'll go check it out.
......
Day 13: I see them! Damn! Why is this world full of monsters!?
......
Day 101: There's nothing to be afraid of anymore! Donning a witch's gown, I've become a monster myself!

title: Okaeri, Papa
genre: Psychological, Romance, Incest, Web Comic, Slice of Life

Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!

author: Carnby Kim
synopsis: Do good or go to hell. The conditions of his new curse seem simple enough for once-hopeful hoodlum Jeonji Kim. Or so it seems when his perky guardian angel shows up on his doorstep one day and heals his limp. But will simply going through the motions of helping people be enough to appease a petty god with a grudge?

title: Cuddle: Juujin Omegaverse
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Hana Hasumi
synopsis:
For the sake of those we love, we take turns to lie

Beryl, an omega who lost his husband and was burdened with debt, decides to have an arranged marriage with an aristocratic Alpha in order to protect the house of his memories.
However, the beautiful beastman Shia appears and sets out conditions for him to take his turn. To enter the same school, to become a servant,
And - good physical compatibility. Shia is arrogant and throws Beryl around, but he also has to protect him.
There's a reason... Also includes twin brother Hugo x servant Theo!

title: Nakayoku Shiyou Ne Otonari-San
genre: Boys' Love
author: Ogi
synopsis:
A nightlife worker and a public server, two opposite poles living as neighbours. Before noticing it, they started spending time together and, unintentionally, they start caring for the other.

Mukojima, a police officer who has some suspicions towards his neighbour, lives alone in an apartment which reminds you of the Showa Era. One night, Mukojima faces a crisis inside his apartment and the one who came to his rescue was none other than Mikoshiba, his neighbour. By taking his invitation, Mukojima ends up in his neighbours apartment, where they share some drinks.

title: Papa X Papa - ? to ? De Sorezore Yattemasu
genre: Boys' Love
author: Asahi Kondou
synopsis:
Blue-collar omega Kosuke lives with his alpha author/homemaker husband, Haruka, and their two children, Marin and Yosuke. Between chores, child-rearing, and being an omega, Kosuke has his work cut out for him. But despite the difficulties and craziness of everyday life, each day is filled with joy, all thanks to Harukas overflowing love!




A lovingly crafted Omegaverse Family BL about married life.

title: Tonari No Kumazawa-Kun
genre: Oneshot, Drama, Web Comic
author: Tsukasa Fushimi
synopsis: What I want is not a place to fit (in), but a place to eat

title: Nobunaga No Chef
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Samurai, Drama, Cooking, Tragedy
author: Mitsuru Nishimura
synopsis: Ken is a modern-day chef who wakes up one morning in war-torn 16th century Japan. Faced with an impossible situation, he does what he does best  he cooks. Soon, word of his wonderful food reaches the capital, and the ears of warlord Oda Nobunaga, who immediately orders Ken to cook for him. What will happen to Ken as he finds himself stumbling around in an era he doesn't belong?

title: Sweet Home Mofumofu Tanuki Kyoudai to Kazoku Ni Narimasu
genre: Animals, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Takayuki Shidatsu
synopsis:
The corporate slave meets a pair of fluffy brothers?!
Hinata Chihiro is the so-called corporate slave who works for a black company. Today, after buying a convenience store box meal, as usual, he arrived home late at night just to find a lost kid wandering near his house?! Chihiro then welcomes the adorable small tanuki, Rio, and his tsundere older brother who hates humans, Itta. And thats how his life with the fluffy tanuki brothers, who were driven out of their natural habitat, begins!

title: Loving Summer Sky
genre: Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: So-Jang
synopsis: Baek Gihu, who loves the sky more than people, takes pictures of the sky with his camera. One summer day, a girl named "Haneul"her name means "Sky"transfers to his class and sits in the seat next to him.

title: Breaking Into the Body of the Emperor'S Daughter
genre: Genderswap, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yu Yan
synopsis:
After transmigrating to another world as a wealthy young master, Su Changqing only wanted to live a low-profile life as a rich second-generation heir and enjoy his days in comfort. However, his plans are suddenly disrupted when his family faces an unexpected crisis, and he accidentally discovers the Emperor's secret - that she is actually a woman.

While he initially feared the female Emperor would stop at nothing to silence him, to his surprise, she instead becomes interested in his mysterious ability to transform his appearance. She wants him to become her male body double. What Su Changqing never expected was that being the female Emperor's male substitute would mean he has to visit the imperial harem on his very first day. His peaceful life completely falls apart from that moment on...

title: Btooom!
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama
author: Junya Inoue
synopsis:
Sakamoto Ryouta is an unemployed 22-year-old who lives with his mother. In the real world, there may be nothing really special about him, but online, he's one of the world's top players of the combat game "BTOOOM"!  
  
One day, he awakes in what appears to be a tropical island, though he has no memory of how or why he has come to be there. While wandering around, Ryouta sees someone and calls out for help. The stranger responds by throwing a bomb at him! Now Ryouta realizes both that his life is in danger, and that he has somehow been trapped in a real-life version of his favorite game! Will Ryouta be able to survive long enough to figure out how and why he ended up here?  
  


---

title: Ankoku Delta
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Supernatural
author: Arupa
synopsis:
In the otherworldly city of Delta, its grotesque residents sustain themselves by consuming human energy...!

This gritty, action-packed tale marks the first full series from the up-and-coming talent who captivated audiences with the one-shots Death Salmon Hunter and Composter Funeral!

title: Tensei Akuma No Saikyou Yuusha Ikusei Keikaku
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ryuu Segawa
synopsis: Kakyu, a former Japanese who was reincarnated as a low-level devil in hell, has acquired unparalleled strength over two thousand years. However, unexpectedly, he is exiled to another different world, liberated from the harsh underworld. Kakyu, who was enjoying his dream slow life, witnesses the village he owes everything to being attacked. Despite rushing to the scene, the village is annihilated. Picking up the only surviving baby, Alus, Kakyu resolves to raise Alus to become the happiest person in the world to repay the debt!?

title: Tokyo ? Revengers: Baji Keisuke Kara No Tegami
genre: Action, Comedy, Drama, Delinquents, Tragedy
author: Yukinori Natsukawaguchi
synopsis:
Tokyo Revengers official spin-off!

The story of Keisuke Baji and Chifuyu Matsuno, from their first encounter to their separation. Chifuyu Matsuno, the First Division vice-captain, has not yet accepted the death of Keisuke Baji, the First Division captain, who died in the battle against Valhalla. At that time, a letter from Baji before his death arrives at his hand.

---

**Notes:**
- The original Japanese title contains the manji symbol, so it will not be removed from the title on MangaDex. See the [main story](https://mangadex.org/title/59b36734-f2d6-46d7-97c0-06cfd2380852) description for more details.

title: Major 2Nd
genre: Sports, Drama
author: Takuya Mitsuda
synopsis: A sequel to the successful baseball manga MAJOR by the same author. The series follows Gorou's son Daigo.

title: I Won'T Touch You Anymore
genre: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Riku Kageyama
synopsis: In their high school days Shiraishi would tease her classmate Arashi constantly always touching his shaved head. Now, many years later, Shiraishi finds herself enthralled with a rising celebrity that she sees on TV an in magazines. This celebrity being none other that Arashi, her former classmate, now with long grown out hair. She wanders the streets hoping that by some happenstance she might once again meet him and be able to tell him the things she's kept in her heart for so many years. A tale of lost opportunities and love separated by time...

title: Gap Couple
genre: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Miabi Shirakawa
synopsis: This is a story about a man and a woman who met each other under false pretenses.

title: Gun-Ota Ga Mahou Sekai Ni Tensei Shitara, Gendai Heiki De Guntai Harem Wo Tsukucchaimashita!?
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Takashi Yameta
synopsis: Hotta Youta is killed while returning home from work on a cold evening. He wakes up being carried by a bunny-eared woman.

title: Akuma De Kore Wa Koi Janai!
genre: Demons, Romance, Fantasy
author: Nana Nanano
synopsis: Aguri, is a young girl who is a demon apprentice. She comes to the human world after her teacher assigned her "to make a human fall in love with her". She thinks it will be easy since she is quite famous in the demons' world, but her target, Kyou-kun, is much better than her...

title: Oshi Ni Amagami
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Vampires
author: Julietta Suzuki
synopsis:
Hina is a reclusive otaku vampire. She wants to move to a sacred place for otaku life, but a boy who looks exactly like her favorite vampire lives next door! And this boy seems to have blood that attracts vampires from all over the world...? A bloody love comedy between an otaku vampire and a slightly tongue-tied handsome man!

Note: Adapted from the authors oneshot that was released in Hana to Yume 10-11/2022 combined issue.

title: Curves of Her and Me
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Jandi
synopsis: Not found

title: Home Plate'S Villain
genre: Long Strip, Sports, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Randomorder
synopsis: To meet his dead parents again, Hong Bin made a deal with the Baseball Fairy, who agreed to return him to the past if he achieved 3,000 career hits as a baseball player. And at the age of 40, Bin the baseball legend hits his last ball and goes back in time. After reuniting with his family, Bin decides to pursue his old dream of joining the major league. The only issue is that he's lost all his old skills as a pro! But will his past experiences be enough to help this legend fulfill his new goal?

title: I Became the Tyrant'S Chambermaid
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Penta
synopsis:
When Lee Chaerin kicks the bucket, she's whisked into a dark fantasy novel as Rose Estania, a chambermaid at the mercy of the tyrant crown prince, Kalix Forsman. Armed with nothing but her real-world hotelier skills and a diary from the real Rose full of cryptic hints but no escape route, she's forced to navigate a dangerous world teeming with Kalix's enemies. Can she keep his wrath in check, evade death, and find her way back to reality before it's too late?

---
Your Highness- That is absurd!!

"Your Highness, did you just cough-!!!"

I'm doomed! I've been transmigrated to another world! As an extra chambermaid from a 19+ impoverished novel from the early 2000s! For now, I'm trying my best not to upset the male lead's temper so I can survive and return home...

"Your Highness! Please have mercy!"

"Your Highness! That is such an absurd thing to say!"

"Could you please stop with that damn antiquated language?!"

Seems like the etiquette here is a bit different from what I know...

Anyway, after defeating an assassin and taking an arrow for him, I feel like I've become somewhat closer to the male lead.

The ominous journal that seems to understand my words, and the male lead, who orders me around, seems a bit fishy too. Can I survive here and return home?

title: Japanese History Detective Conan
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Comedy, Anthology, Crime, Adventure, Drama, Police, Mystery
author: Muneo Saitou
synopsis:
Conan and the Detective Boys are asked to help kids who have been send backwards in time. These "Time Drifters" explore different eras of Japanese history in search of the Time Stones that will help them return to the present day.  
  
[Official Website](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/pr/ntconan/)

title: Suguru-Kun Fight!
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life
author: Shiokaranigai
synopsis:
When Suguru, an ordinary high school student, comes home as usual, he bumps into his older sister's friend, Noriyuki! 

Deciding at first glance that the huge and rugged-looking Noriyuki is the type he doesn't like, Suguru leaves the house to escape from him, but for some reason Noriyuki starts to pester him persistently...!?

title: Hero Eden
genre: Action, Long Strip, Superhero, School Life, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Hiro Mashima
synopsis: Panthera, a totalitarian state where both brutal oppression and despair exist. Heroes who resisted the government were branded as traitors and executed. Now, the son of a fallen hero, Eden, must face the question: Can he survive in Panthera? In the near future, after a second nuclear war, the surviving humans continue to live in a small world called Panthera. However, the intense control and exploitation by the government has caused immense suffering, gradually turning various districts into slums. The heroes who once defied the regime and claimed to be superheroes were ruthlessly eliminated by cyborg killers under the governments command. The few surviving heroes now hide their identities, barely scraping by in the slums. Disillusioned and filled with grief and hatred, people who once had a glimmer of hope in these heroes have now lost faith and stopped waiting for any saviors. One day, a seemingly ordinary high school student named Eden, who is frequently bullied by his classmates, experiences a Soma Awakening, a unique trait of superheroes. However, haunted by the memory of his fathers gruesome death as a hero, Eden rejects the life of a hero, longing for a normal life with his mother. Yet, the increasing oppression of the government and the threats to his only family make this difficult. In such a world, will Eden choose to become a hero and stand against the forces oppressing society? The journey of Edena beautiful yet scorched, intense yet chilling talebegins.

title: Washi Jijii, Yowai Rokujuu Ni Shite Tenpu No Sai Ni Kizuku
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Tomozo Nishioka
synopsis: In a world where special abilities called "skills" manifest, sixty-year-old Diru suddenly gains power one day. Unfortunately, it's a combat-focused ability that he struggles to handle now that his physical strength has declined. "Im already an old man...," he says, but despite his age, hes filled with determination to make the most of his second chance. With his natural talent for charming people and his slightly overzealous sense of justice and kindness, he embarks on a new life, savoring it to the fullest. A man over sixty begins his second lifea life that's not fast but not too slow, gentle yet intense!

title: Golden Print
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: MU
synopsis:
I wanted to design!

A dream I have had since I was 12 years old and have nurtured since then. For thirty years I worked hard, not missing a single day, but the reality is that I'm a construction site manager constructing buildings for other people. If I hadn't made that choice back then... Would I have become an architectural designer? Thirty years after all that, a miracle happened to me.

I went back to my university school days 20 years ago, in 2010.
I'm 22 years old, but with 20 years of field experience, I'm going fulfil my dream of being an architectural designer and make world famous designs of my own!

title: Garbage Brave: Isekai Ni Shoukan Sare Suterareta Yuusha No Fukushuu Monogatari
genre: Monsters, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Haruka Kinashi
synopsis:
While on a regular school day, Tsukuru along with his classmates got transported to another world.  
  
However, at the other side of the summoning there was a hero's auction, where each nation would bid for the heroes to defeat the demon kings of each territories.  
  
While his classmates received cheat jobs and got auctioned quickly Tsukuru got the useless job "Chef," as no nation bid for him, he got thrown out through a transfer gate. At the other side of the gate was a territory dominated by strong monsters  
  
As he manages to survive the monster's attacks while nearly dying, Tsukuru goes forward on the path of becoming the strongest!  

(Series went on Hiatus starting in September 2024 due to artist's maternity leave)

---

[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2248el/)  


---

title: Komada-San Wo Komarasetai
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life
author: Suzuki Senpai
synopsis: Komada is a short high school girl who is constantly troubled with something. Her junior, Kagai, who is big in various ways, is always playing with her and annoying Komada! However, there is a reason why Kagai annoys her, and that is simply because... The more you love someone, the more you want to annoy them!

title: Maimaimaigoen
genre: Psychological, Survival, Fantasy, Mystery
author: Yakan Nabeya
synopsis:
### **Sanrio's first ever innocent suspense comic!**

New teacher Okada Yuu and his senior, Ms. Rumi are on a field trip with their 16 preschool students to Sanrio Puroland. But suddenly they wander into a mysterious and horrific theme park called "Yuropia"! Amid their confusion, ominous Frog Egg mascots announce that the only way for them to escape is to "conquer the attractions and gather 10 medals." Will they be able to get out of "Yuropia" in one piece?! This is a story for "those of you" who "carry pain in your heart"?.

©2021 SANRIO CO., LTD. TOKYO, JAPAN?

title: Azure Legacy
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: HeHe
synopsis: Meng Chuan witnessed his mother killed before his eyes, so he trained very hard hoping to one day avenge her death. But his peaceful days were broken as his wedding engagement being called off, an invasion by foreign forces, the sanctuary fallen into enemy hands In order to protect the people of Ning City, he picked up his sword and vowed to be the strongest. This is a heavy responsibility and a long journey

title: Administrator Kang Jin Lee
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Gyeong-Chan No
synopsis: Is he crazy? Or just the typical attention seeker? Lee Kwang-Jin, who doesn't understand the difference in people, and his Master Kwak No who's the one helping him to understand the differences of people. A warm human story of a student and his Master.

title: Aura of a Genius Actor
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Gi-Mae
synopsis: Shin Yoomyeong is an unknown actor who kept on chasing his dream despite playing minor roles for 15 years because of his weak presence. One day, he meets the Acting Spirit, Yeonghwi, who he signs a contract with, and begins to shine in his career. In fact, he was always an acting genius,  but he was overshadowed by his weak presence. He creates a perfect character for every work he takes and slowly raises to stardom. However, Yeonghwi, who he saw as his benefactor, starts to seem suspicious

title: Moto Kouzou Kaiseki Kenkyuusho No Isekai Boukentan
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Mamoru Inuya
synopsis: Kaoru Mochimizu, a 30-year-old female research scientist who studied the three-dimensional structure of everything. However, one day, she died in an earthquake and met a goddess. Having covered for her kouhai during the earthquake, she was allowed to reincarnate in another world with two skils. Kaoru Mochimizu is now Charlotte Elbaran, the eldest daughter of a duke in the Kingdom of Elida, on Planet Garland. With memories of her past life, and taking advantage of the skills "Structural Analysis" and "Structural Editing," she will live a good life.

title: Okiraku Ryoushu No Tanoshii Ryouchi Bouei
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Takashi Akaike
synopsis: A man was reincarnated as Van, a boy of noble birth, who grew up to become a child prodigy through hard work. But when it was discovered that he possessed "production magic," he was immediately relegated to a remote village. However, his magic, which was called useless, turned out to be truly extraordinary, capable of producing anything as long as he had the right ingredients! With the knowledge from his previous life and the overpowered magic, the small, poor village will grow to become into a great city.

title: The Dang ClanS Swordmaster Heir Just Wants a Normal Life
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: PSG
synopsis: The Dang clan of Sacheon, once renowned for its poison and hidden weapons, is now on the path to its demise. That is, until Yeonmyeung Dang, an outcast boy of the clan, awakens by recollecting the memories of his past life as the 'god of swords' who devoted his life to mastering the sword. Will the boy be able to protect his family and fulfill his dream of living a normal life?

title: Futari Solo Camp
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Yuudai Debata
synopsis:
Kinokura Gen loves camping solo. He enjoys the quiet solitude away from the hustle and bustle of the city, and being able to appreciate nature all by himself. But on one camping trip, his solitude is broken by the appearance of Kusano Shizuku, a young woman who wanted to go solo camping by herself, but is ill-prepared and completely out of her league. While he tries to to get her to go home so he can camp in peace, she refuses, and stubbornly insists on accompanying him on future camping trips until she's ready to camp solo. Thus Gen and Shizuku's days of solo camping together begin.

**Note**: "Part 1" concluded in February 2023 with 3 extra chapters due to start in April as the series is moving magazines from Kodansha Evening to Kodansha Morning.

The series resumed its publication in December 2023.

title: Fuguu Na Ossan No Kekkai Jutsu Musou
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy
author: Kazuki Kaburagi
synopsis:
The barrier mages job is done, right? Then, why not join the Kingdoms Royal Mage Corps?
For the last 30 years, a protective barrier shielded the kingdom from the Demon Kings forces. Initially maintained by a hundred barrier mages, their numbers dwindled until only one, Blake, was left to uphold it. At last, came the day when a hero defeated the Demon King. But, in this peaceful world, barrier mages were now considered useless a bottom-rung job with no real purpose.
Blake was at a loss on what to do until he received an unexpected invitation to the capital from said hero. Alice, the Hero who he once saved, encouraged him to join an elite squad reserved for only the best in the kingdom. She insisted that, if he could prove his worth, even those who doubted him would have to yield.
Barrier mages are useless!
Then, all he needs to do is show his strength, right?
The story unfolds as this underestimated middle-aged man, unaware of his unparalleled skills, wields and strengthens his barrier magic! The tale of a fantasy heros rise in another world begins here!

title: Hazure Waku No [Joutai Ijou Skill] De Saikyou Ni Natta Ore Ga Subete O Juurin Suru Made
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kaoru Shinozaki
synopsis:
Mimori Touka has always been something of a background character in his high school. So when he and his classmates are summoned to a fantasy land and gifted with incredible skills, it seems like the perfect opportunity to make a name for himself. The only problem? Mimoris skills are abysmal at best, and hes banished to a deadly dungeon. But as he begins to test these new abilities, he discovers just how powerful hes become. Can Mimori fight his way back to exact revenge?!
___
**Compositor:** [Uchiuchi Keyaki](https://mangadex.org/author/3b71274c-d84b-4505-bed0-1ee2adda188f)
**Character Designer:** [KWKM](https://mangadex.org/author/d7705978-2785-490d-8292-71738dc20ef3)

title: Ore Igai Dare Mo Saishu Dekinai Sozai Na No Ni "Sozai Saishuritsu Ga Hikui" to Pawahara Suru Osananajimi Renkinjutsushi to Zetsuen Shita Senzoku Madoushi, Henkyou No Machi De Slow Life Wo Okuritai.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kitsunegozen
synopsis: Lloyd, the assistant mage of the genius alchemist Ruby, has an abnormally low chance of gathering materials for alchemy use. Hence, he is treated as baggage and is made to be the bottom of the entire countrys joke. Everyday is a day he is scolded by Ruby. Its become too much of a despairing environment that hes come to hate it. And so, he finally decided to part ways with her. However, unbeknownst to everyone was that the materials Lloyd gathered were all high-grade materials no one else could gather. The mage, who was treated as "incompetent" and saw himself as such, now aims for an ideal easygoing life!

title: Gokudo Parasites
genre: Action, Psychological, Comedy, Mafia, Drama, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Ume Matsutake
synopsis: Mai Shintani, who works at the Kitakabane Police Station was suddenly assigned in the "Organized Crime Countermeasures Division", commonly known as the "Sotai". Immediately after that, she gained influence within her jurisdiction. The leader of expanding yakuza faction "Tatsygamigumi" Shogo Mikuro mysteriously disappeared. There's a tension in the conflict between cases of opposing Yakuza groups. And for some reason, Shintani is looking composed at the northern police station. Behind it is an absurd shocking truth?!

title: Full Clearing Another World Under a Goddess with Zero Believers
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hakuto Shiroi
synopsis: After his class gets buried alive on their way back from a school trip, 18 year old Makoto Takatsuki and class get transported to another world. Unlike the rest of his classmates who gained powerful abilities, Makoto barely gains any power. "This other world is unbalanced!". With the threat of a great Demon Lord rising again and a goddess with zero followers, can Makoto make his way through this new world and clear the isekai!?

title: Kakkou No Iinazuke
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Miki Yoshikawa
synopsis: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé!

title: YouRe so Sloppy, Hotta-Sensei
genre: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mao Nakada
synopsis: Makoto Kuribayashi is your typical high schooler with a not-so-typical after-school gig as a housekeeper. His latest client? None other than his schools most popular teacher, the gorgeous Rumiko Hotta. But Hotta-sensei is hiding a dirty little secret: she's a total slob, the polar opposite of her flawless public image! Now, Makoto's got the unenviable task of cleaning up after her mess. Will his admiration for Hotta-sensei survive a dose of harsh reality in this irreverent comedy?

title: Gunman
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Isekai, Web Comic, Full Color
author: U-Gi Kim
synopsis:
The No.1 Hitman, Kim Gun, finds himself plunged into the world of martial arts due to a mysterious accident. To return to his original world, he must complete a mission called 'Martial Arts Conquest.'

With a total of 2 guns, Kim Gun's adventure to subdue the unfamiliar martial arts world begins.

title: Onikirimaru
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Kei Kusunoki
synopsis:
There was once an oni mother who gave birth to a human-looking child. Instead of an oni's horn, this child was born with a sword in hand called the "Onigirimaru" or Oni Slayer. He has no name and is only referred to by the name of his sword. Though he appears human, he is pure oni.  
  
Believing that he will become human once all of his kind vanished from the world of humans, he sets out on his destiny to slay all of his kind. Even now, in the mother world of Japan, he is still out there slaying oni.

title: Ranma 1/2
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural
author: Rumiko Takahashi
synopsis:
(from ebookjapan):

Soun was disappointed to find that Ranma was a girl. However, when Ranma got out of the bath, he turned into a boy and the panda turned into Ranma's father, Genma. The two had fallen into a fountain during their training in China, a fountain that turned them into a woman and panda respectively when they touched the water. 

The Tendo family is initially in turmoil, including Akane, who has become a prospective bride, as they face the troublesome duo who go back and forth between man and woman, human and panda, although they can be restored to their original state if they are bathed in hot water. 

This is the first volume of a new edition of the popular manga.


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/ranma-1-2)
- Indonesian release by Elex Media

title: Lilia Pregnant the World End
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls
author: Shinta Sakayama
synopsis:
"The world will be destroyed if you have sex with the Demon King's daughter."

After defeating the Demon King and saving the other world, the hero Takahiro returns to the real world. One day, Lilia, the daughter of the Demon King, suddenly arrives at Takahiro's place, where he leads a peaceful life. Takahiro braces himself for revenge, but her goal is to bear the strong Takahiro's child...!?

title: Bakuten Shoot Beyblade
genre: Action, Comedy, Sports, Fantasy
author: Takao Aoki
synopsis:
Tyson's on a mission to be the best Beyblader ever! But his enemies, the Blade Sharks, are super tough and they'll do anything to win! Tyson just ight have what it takes to win when he busts out with a new Beyblade given to him by a mysterious stranger. Now the Blade Sharks want his new Beyblade and they're prepared to use any dirty trick to get it! 


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media

[Beyblade](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/manga.php?id=4062) (manga)

title: Kingdom
genre: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
author: Yasuhisa Hara
synopsis:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)

title: The Idaten Deities Know Only Peace
genre: Action, Demons, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Fantasy
author: Amahara
synopsis:
Hayato is a young deity with a foul mouth who has always heard legends about Demons that were sealed away about 800 years ago. Follow the epic saga of several young deities, who end up having to fight demons, humans and overcome several challanges.  
  
  
A remake of a web manga of the same name with new art by Cool-Kyou Shinja.

title: Mannen D-Rank No Chuunen Boukensha, Yotta Ikioi De Densetsu No Ken O Hikkonuku
genre: Action, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Shichio Kuzu
synopsis: Lucas has a hard life. In his mid-thirties, a mixture of failures has left him old and crippled, playing pack mule to a couple of young adventures. Then one day, he pulls a magic sword from a stone that tells him he has been chosen to become a hero. Given a youthful form, Lucas must use the power of the sword to vanquish evil and attain a massive harem.

title: Revenge of the Bloom Flower
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Tomozo Nishioka
synopsis:
The scripture that brought a bloodstorm to Jianghu was the "Wisdom of the Secret Master," a legendary book that is said to hold the power to seize all the world's authority and wealth. Because of it, Woonseon lost all his loved ones overnight. 
Now, he casts aside his bright and pure past and embarks on a desperate journey for revenge. The flower will wither in ten days. Nothing in this world will be eternal, whether it's wealth, power, or love.

title: Shoujo-Tachi No Kizuato Ni Kuchizuke Wo
genre: Girls' Love, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires
author: Aya Haruhana
synopsis: The girls spend their time at a school built in a deep forest. Their secret is that they are all vampires. In order to hunt without being noticed by humans, the girls are bonded by blood, and what does the "sisterhood" bring to them?

title: Aorikei Game Haishinsha (20-Sai), Haishin No Kiri Wasure Ni Yori Ii Hito Bare Suru.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Ruka
synopsis: Nakayama Haruto is a game commentator who streams provocative content under the name "Oni-chan." He attracts attention for his radical streams , but his true identity is that of a good older brother who streams to raise money for his younger sister's tuition and living expenses. However, he accidentally forgets to turn off the streams, and his true personality is revealed to the public. Just when it seems like he's going to cause a major uproar, the contrast with his usual self turns out to be a big hit with viewers...!?

title: Nigoru Hitomi De Nani O Negau - Highserk Senki
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Psychological, Survival, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Torutonen
synopsis:
One day, Raizou ??Takakura, an average salaryman, had a heart attack and his life ended that day. But, he got a second life in a different world.

Reincarnated with strong skills? wasn't what happened to him. Instead, he was reincarnated as a foot soldier in a small country, Highserk Empire, which is surrounded by large countries. With a new name, Walm, he was thrown into the frontlines of a war. Covered in blood and stench of death, along his comrades, he was slipping through the life-or-death situations.

An adventurer party with members who could use powerful magic, transferees with overwhelming power called the "heroes." In a deadly battle with them, Walm gradually developed his talent as a warrior which would've never awoken if he were to stay in times of peace. While his eyes becoming dark and muddy over time.
___
**Character Designer:** [So-taro](https://mangadex.org/author/c4ae5d7f-3399-4b1f-a509-d7388ad47826)

title: Kuitsume Youhei No Gensou Kitan
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Zombies, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Mine
synopsis:
After the soldiers mercenary group where he used to work had been utterly destroyed, Loren, who survived the disaster, decided to walk the adventurers path as a way to make a living. However, for Loren who had no acquaintances and empty pockets, receiving a single quest seemed like a faraway aim. So, as he was contemplating about what he should do next, another adventurer called out to him.
___
**Character Designer:** [peroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/18c02af4-21c4-4b2a-a75a-6f0c5ee3d172/peroshi)

title: The Wolf in Love and Mille-Feuille
genre: Monsters, Action, Magic, Girls' Love, Drama, Monster Girls, Supernatural
author: Matsuki Ugatsu
synopsis:
Maya Suou, A highschool girl who was called Wolf Girl in the past, was living her usual everyday life.  
I dont want to get involved in extraordinary events anymore Even though Maya decided that, she was suddenly dragged into a fight between a Little Red Riding Hood and a Wolf.  
Maya smirked unconsciously  
  
I have a plan. I also have the means.  
Ending everything here despite that would be such a waste and I wont allow it.  
  
And so began this dark fairy tale as the wolf fell in love.

title: Beast Complex
genre: Psychological, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Paru Itagaki
synopsis:
A collection of short stories that involve anthropomorphic animals and their troubles with coexisting with different species. Paru Itagaki's debut manga.  
  


---

title: Ragna Crimson
genre: Action, Comedy, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Daiki Kobayashi
synopsis: Ragna is a dragon hunter along with his partner, the strongest dragon hunter Leo. He didn't have much talent at hunting dragons but he had decided to entrust his whole life for her. However he was shown the feel of true despair by his future self on what would happen if he stays weak as he is now. With that, it seems that the reaper of the dragons had now appeared earlier than the original history, but will it be enough to change the future?

title: The Shiunji Family Children
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Reiji Miyajima
synopsis: The love between brother and sister. The love between man and woman. That which is most forbidden is most unyielding. The two sons and five daughters of the Shiunji family shine like brilliant gems, each with intelligence and beauty in equal measure. And with the pedigree of their wealthy father behind them, how could they not be the talk of the town? Eldest son Arata has spent his life being tossed around by the whims of his colorful sisters, yet a little teasing wont stop him from valuing his family over anything and anyone else. But when his youngest sister turns fifteen, their father reveals a long-hidden secret of the Shiunji "siblings" and knocks Aratas world off its axis...

title: We Are Young
genre: Official Colored, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: An-Si
synopsis:
Since the old days, mystical creatures have existed to help humans. However, now that the times have changed, they suddenly receive a warning from their god: "Prove that you are still needed".

While grappling with how they can assist humans in the modern era, these creatures decide to send their younglings to the human world to seek answers.

Meanwhile, university student Park Geuru, who lives his miserable days commuting for five hours to school due to a sudden move, accidentally ends up making a bet with the goblin Sihan... 

This is a story about the daily life of these young mystical creatures, exploring the human world in order to avoid their own extinction.

title: Isekai Meikyuu De Harem O
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Issei Hyouju
synopsis: A man was about to commit suicide and decides to search for a way to die in the internet, but then he found an odd site that asked a lot of questions and had a point based system that allows you to create skills and abilities for a character. He took interest in it and when he finished setting his character he was asked: "You will now be transported to a world with the settings you choose, coming back is not possible, do you still accept?" Without thinking much of it he pressed YES and found himself in another world with the skills and abilities he chose to have.

title: Charge
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Homare Mikokuno
synopsis: In a world like ours, where gods and mythical creatures walk among us and souls are a source of energy and power, academies were created to train soldiers and wise men. But over time they became centers of education and training became a job known as "Vormund". Jen Renaud, a 2nd Year student, tried to leave the world of "Vormund" for good, but his past and his new pupil, 1st Year Milena Torin, force him to return and face his monsters...

title: Senpai Is an Otokonoko
genre: Award Winning, Long Strip, Romance, Crossdressing, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Pom
synopsis:
The story of a crossdresser who receives a confession from a junior.

---
