title: Blood Rain 2
genre: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Martial Arts, Mafia, Drama, Tragedy
author: Meen
synopsis: Sequel to Blood Rain (Min)

title: Hotel Helheim
genre: Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Osamu Nishi
synopsis:
Tanaka-san is a legendary hotel man (concierge), and after his death, he became a legend in the underworld. In the underworld, Mei works at the dilapidated Hotel Helheim. It was once a glorious hotel, and one where Mei has many fond memories. One day, Tanaka-san appears, ready to restore the Hotel Helheim to its former success. Mei will become the famous Tanaka-san's assistant, as he works to make Hotel Helheim a top-class underworld hotel!  
  
*Originally published in Jump Square as a 3-volume series from November 2014 to September 2015, the series was later republished under the Shonen Champion Comics label from December 2019 to January 2020. The volume count reflects the republished version, as it is the only one currently available.*

title: Office Partner
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy
author: Du-Yeon
synopsis:
Cha Min-young, do you want to cross the line with me?

Min-young, who has been busy every day serving her male friend Tae-ha, whom she has known for over 20 years, is shocked by the betrayal from her boyfriend. In a moment of impulsiveness, she ends up committing an act with her friend Tae-ha.

Shall I make it a draw, Cha Min-young?

After that fateful night, Min-young realizes that the old feelings she has harbored for Tae-ha were not just jealousy.

Cha Min-young, do you want to cross the line with me? Exactly three months.

With that tempting and sweet offer made once again, Min-young willingly steps onto a path with a set end.

Lets do it. Lets jump into this fireworks.

title: Ganzi Monster
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Full Color
author: Samjun
synopsis: Eunho Cha is, without a doubt, the biggest outcast at school. He spends his days avoiding bullies and daydreaming about his crush. He'd give anything to be popular, so when he discovers a face editing app called Icing, he spies an opportunity. With Icing's help, Eunho now looks like a superstar... or at least Ganzi Monster (GM), his online alter ego, does. But just when GM and his dance videos are starting to get popular, someone discovers his secret, and Eunho's days of being invisible are about to come to an end...

title: The Beginner, Formerly Ranked Number One in the World
genre: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Shotou Shinkou
synopsis:
A beginner who was once ranked number one in the world.

?Prophecy Online? is what is known as a scam game. It was said that those who managed to clear it will be able to obtain unlimited wealth, and the protagonist, Endou Rei, believed in those words and risked his life to challenge the game.

However, what awaited him after clearing the game was its end of service, and a remaining balance of 3,584 yen. Rei wallowed in despair, thinking that it was all over, but just a week later, the world went through a great change!

Monsters started appearing in reality, and a message from the game ?Prophecy Online? appeared in front of his eyes. While everyone was shocked and frightened, Rei, who knew about every strategy and information in the game beforehand, realized, this is my chance!

I will turn this power into money! Fearless in the face of money, his exciting solo run and money-making adventure begins now!

title: Why Did Men Stop Wearing High Heels?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Jimmy Kim
synopsis: Kim Manseok is your average, everday guy but with one particular hobby: his love for high-end high heels. He owns his own personal blog and is known as a woman online but one day, his identity is exposed! Will he be able to continue his life as an ordinary salary man?

title: A Tactical Genius on the Field
genre: Long Strip, Sports, Drama
author: Pinball
synopsis: If there is one thing that Ma Jungwoo is good at, it's football. Although he is a genius strategist, others look down on him because of his lack of education and debt. But things seem to turn around when he finds out he has just inherited his late grandfather's British football team. He plans to sell the team and start fresh, only to find out the team has massive debt! Left with no other choice, Jungwoo must use his tactical genius to help this team rise from the ashes and be number one!

title: Isekai De Skill Wo Kaitai Shitara Cheat Na Yome Ga Zoushoku Shimashita: Gainen Kousa No Structure
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Sakaki Sengetsu
synopsis:
***A harem cheat fantasy with super-enhanced slaves!***  
  
When an entire bus of people was summoned to another world, Souma Nagi doesn't go along with the idea of being a Hero like the rest. Thus he leaves the palace and starts his life in another world with his ability to restructure skills. This is the first time I've ever been to a game where I've been able to do that & the first time I've ever seen a story about a girl who is a slave, a wife, and a cheat!

title: Kuro Gal-San Ga Kuru!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Tamagorou
synopsis:
A beleaguered office worker finds his way to a cafe where he decries the hardships of his routine. In there, a friendly gyaru high schooler notices his lamentations and after hearing him vent out, she cheers him up the "gyaru" way and they exchange contacts.  
  
What will become of this unlikely friendship?

title: Beethoven Reborn
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Music, Full Color
author: Yeong-I Ja
synopsis: Only music sustained me from the maddening pain. If only I could hear my music... with my own ears... Even as my soul was falling apart, I prayed to God... and prayed again. Ludwig van Beethoven is considered the greatest composer in human history. I closed my eyes like that. And 180 years later in Seoul. The saint of music, known as an immortal genius, has been reborn. <Beethoven Born Again> And then I began to hear the voice of an angel. "Dobin.. Dobin.." Only music sustained me from the maddening pain.

title: Wolf in SheepS Clothing
genre: Thriller, Comedy, Self-Published, Web Comic
author: Mito
synopsis: Even boys can be harassed.

title: Kaisha No Kouhai Ga Mahoutsukai Datta
genre: Romance, Magic, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Suzuki Yuuki
synopsis: Not found

title: Babysitting the Male Lead
genre: Reincarnation, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Wasabi
synopsis:
I somehow took over the body of a villainess in a novel. Originally, I was supposed to die after coveting the male lead, but instead, I decided to become a rich unemployed woman and enjoy a life full of pleasures.

"You said you wanted to raise a puppy, so this brother went to hunt one for you. How's your brother's hunting skills?"

Until my brother came back after hunting the male lead who had turned into a wolf

Having been forced to look after the male lead, I somehow succeeded in taming him after many twists and turns. Now all that's left is to look for this mysterious female lead and hand over the leash, then it will be all over. But

"Have you become tired of me?"

"No, not at all."

"Then why do you keep trying to send me to a strange person?"

Maybe it's because he has stayed with me for too long, but it seems he has lost his social skills and has also developed separation anxiety.

"That person is someone very important to Your Highness."

"The only person who is important to me is you."

"Are you sure?"

"Yes, because I've imprinted," he whispered and curved the corner of his eyes, "on you."

The half-bent, bright yellow eyes were brimming with obsession.

---
Rosetta Kazel is enjoying her life as the villainess of a novel, until she's given a silver wolf to be her new pet. Rosetta knows this is none other than the cursed male lead of the novel, Prince Sihael von Idris, who's become stuck in his wolf form! To follow the novel, all Rosetta has to do is look after the wolf prince until the female lead can show up. But what if events have changed so much from the novel that she never turns up? How long will Rosetta be stuck caring for this unruly pup?

---

[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55937153)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EB%A5%BC-%EC%9E%84%EC%8B%9C%EB%B3%B4%ED%98%B8-%EC%A4%91%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3091), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60651851)

title: The Purpose of Marriage
genre: Romance, Drama
author: Geum-Ji Lee
synopsis: Yoon Seol-young faces a harsh reality: a cheating boyfriend of three years, a forced blind date with a divorced man ten years her senior, and the burden of financially supporting her suffocating family. Just when she wishes to escape her stifling life, Ki Tae-hwan, the executive director of Shinhwa Group, rumored to be gay due to his excessively clean private life, approaches her with a proposal: "Let's get married. I'll take you to a higher place." Overnight, Seol-young goes from being the secretary in the executive director's office to becoming his daughter-in-law. But what is the true purpose behind Tae-hwan's marriage proposal?

title: Happy End No Kyuseishu
genre: Boys' Love, Fantasy
author: Haru Tsuchida
synopsis:
Nao is a college student who draws indie eromanga. The morning after a grueling deadline crunch, he finds a little snakey boi, which invites itself inside his room. During a nap, it starts sucking on Nao's willy and gulping down the seed... and of course Yasu, Nao's kouhai, walks in.
Dismayed as he is by Nao deciding to keep the tentacle as a drawing assistant and manga inspiration, Yasu lets Nao use his hand to jerk off every time it's time to feed the now-named 'Wiggle-michi' its semen. 

Truthfully, Yasu has always had a crush on Nao.
Could this sentient tentacle be their cupid?!

title: Pokémon Réburst
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Mitsuhisa Tamura
synopsis: The story begins with the protagonist leaving his town where people and Pokémon live in peace together in order to locate his father. The hero doesnt know much about his father besides the fact that he is a powerful swordsman. On his journey, the protagonist meets up with new friends and foes and discovers the power of Burst Heart Crystals, these crystals entrap a Pokémon inside and allow humans transform themselves partly into them in order to take advantage of their special abilities and attacks.

title: Love-Bullet
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, Supernatural
author: inee
synopsis:
Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!

title: Kokage-Kun Bewitched
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Youko Komori
synopsis: Yumeko dreams of being a pampered princess, but reality has her living in a shitty old apartment building. With a forest on the roof. And a witch in the forest. Tadaa! Maybe she can get this witch (who is a guy, weird) to magically grant all her wishes, up to and including making her destined prince (high school crush) fall in love with her.

title: Shippaisaku No Tsukaima to Majutsushi
genre: Monsters, Demons, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Kagiri Araido
synopsis: A mage adopts an abandoned familiar. After 80 years of raising her and trying to teach her magic and emotion, he passes away, and she embarks on a journey to help other abandoned familiars and tour the spots that remind her of her late master.

title: Million Times Attack Speed
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Mao San Yue
synopsis: After being reincarnated into the Tianwu Continent, Ye Yun activated the Multiverse Devouring System and received the reward of a million times attack speed in the beginner's gift package. From then on, he became an invincible powerhouse! As the saying goes, in the world of martial arts, speed is paramount. Do you think I was just picking my nose and cleaning my ears? In fact, I just executed thirty-five thousand people with a single sword strike and eighty-seven thousand people with a single sword swing, while also unleashing various boxing techniques and secret arts.

title: Hitori De Shinitai
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Kaoru Curryzawa
synopsis: A hardworking career woman who never married died alone, found in a miserable state. Her niece, Yamaguchi Narumi (35 and single), who was hit hard by the news shifted from looking for marriage to preparing for her death. She decided that the only way to die alone without bothering anyone and die better is to live the same way. This is the birth of a definitive beautiful human life story about facing love and death in earnest.

title: Bunny Sensei
genre: Official Colored, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Shota, Web Comic
author: Ichirou Imo
synopsis: Previously post as chapters (Ch 1-8) of **[Imo Ichirou's Twitter Shorts](https://mangadex.org/title/2242193d-8634-4a74-8bfa-45744e53866f/imo-ichirou-s-twitter-shorts)**

title: Bloodline
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Ai Ou
synopsis: Yeren, who dreams of being a vampire hunter, is unwittingly caught in the crossfire between a vampire girl and the Holy lands. As a temporary blood servant, he doesn't know what to do when the hatred and strife between them have been ongoing for thousands of years This is a story about Lilo·Ai, the last vampire.

title: Rikudou
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Sports, Martial Arts, Sexual Violence, Drama
author: Toshimitsu Matsubara
synopsis:
Riku experienced a lot of pain and tragedy in his early life. After his father's death, a former-boxer Yakuza man taught him how to do a basic punch, and that punch saved his life when he had to defend himself from his mom's drug dealer. He ended up taking the drug dealer's life, marking him as a killer. Criminals continued to come after him, leading to more tragedy for the people who attempted to care for him. All of this drove him to ask that same former boxer to teach him to become stronger, which led him to a rundown gym, his door to the world of pro boxing!  
  
**Officially published:**  
- In french by [Kazé](http://manga.kaze.fr/catalogue/ri_ku_la_rage_aux_poings) as "Riku-Do, La rage aux poings"  
- In italian by [J-Pop](https://www.j-pop.it/855-rikudo)

title: The Too-Perfect Saint: Tossed Aside by My Fiancé and Sold to Another Kingdom
genre: Demons, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kouki Fuyutsuki
synopsis:
Born into a family of saints, Philias childhood was filled with harsh education. Nevertheless, it formed her into a great saint and secured her engagement with the second Prince, Julius. But when she became too perfect and thus not cute in his eyes, Julius broke their engagement! That's why he decided to make her leave her homeland and make her a saint for a neighboring kingdom in exchange for money and resources. Philia was prepared to be treated miserably but what awaited her was an unexpected welcome!

Confused by her new circumstances, she began to use her powers to help solve the citizens' problems such as creating a barrier against monsters and creating a cure for the illness that wreaked havoc on the land. With her new found position, Philia recollected her memories of being in a novel and the future outbreak of monsters that was to come. She used her knowledge and with the help of the people, they quickly dealt with the problem! But at the same time, the very same country that sold her off was also in danger-?!

title: Gideon of the 3Rd
genre: Historical, Action, Drama
author: Tarou Nogizaka
synopsis: The stage is the eve of the French Revolution. There is the commoner Gideon, who wants to save the impoverished country side-by-side with the members of the Estates General. Then there is the aristocrat, Georges, who will use any means to achieve his purpose. A man who wants to change the country, and a man who wants to destroy it. Both begin their journey forward. Will their joint efforts of love and hatred, justice and evil lead them to a hell of bloodshed, or an ideal future?

title: Yonkoma 13 Kihei Bouei-Ken!! ~Kochira Sector X~
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
author: Tiger Hiragi
synopsis: A 4-Koma adaptation of the simulation adventure gem "13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim" created by Atulus & Vanillaware. 13 boys and girls overcoming the intertwined past, present and future... slapstick drama!? (Source: Amazon Kindle)

title: Montage
genre: Action, Psychological, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Kumiko Kikuchi
synopsis:
One day, 10-year-old Yamato and his friend Miku discover a man in a back alley who's suffering from vicious stab wounds. The man recognizes Yamato, and uses his last breath to share a secret with the children: Yamato's father was the perpetrator of a bank robbery that is known throughout the country as the most puzzling unsolved crime of the 20th century. He warns them to "never trust anyone."  
Miku makes Yamato swear to keep the man's final words a secret. A few days later, Yamato's father is found dead, and the boy is taken in by Miku's family. The death is ruled as an accident, but Yamato has his doubts. Six years later, Yamato still can't stop wondering about the incidents, and resolves to take action.

title: Runin
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Mecha, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Tragedy
author: Tetsuya Saruwatari
synopsis:
(from ebookjapan):

Manhattan, New York in a future where catastrophe has swept the world. Violence has replaced order, justice has collapsed, and emotions have faded. Two Japanese, Takeru and Gamon, live in such a time. 

What are the ideals that they are carving out for themselves? 

A near-future action adventure in a world in ruins!

title: Truth Weavers
genre: Award Winning, Action, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Sakura Satou
synopsis:
In the country of Lavarta, mages are oppressed and seen as filthy beings. Leon is a talented but rather weak mage. Zechs is an orphan boy with great innate magical talent. Their meeting will change their lives as well as the world around them.

Note: "Lineage of sorcery" is the literal translation of the Japanese title, but it's not the official translation.

title: Kanzen Kaihi Healer No Kiseki
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hina Yamato
synopsis: A college student, Sakurai Hiroki was summoned to another world to defeat the Demon Lord. And since he got Priest as a job, his starting Recovery Stat was more than enough to heal any wounds, so he dumped all of his Stat Points into Evasion. In other words, hes aiming for an Evasion Healer who will never get hit by enemy attacks. But unfortunately, people in that world couldnt understand his ideal! The King got angry against him and labelled him as useless almost immediately! And thus, the story of how Hiroki become an odd Healer who can even avoid Dungeon Boss attacks with ease has started!!

title: Cosmic Heavenly Demon 3077
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Ha San
synopsis: After countless years, the Heavenly Demon, sealed within Mount Tai, finally awakened, only to discover that humanity had long abandoned the radiation-soaked Earth and was now exploring the far reaches of the galaxy.

title: Sekai De Tada Hitori No Mamonotsukai: Tenshoku Shitara Maou Ni Machigawaremashita
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Norio Doujima
synopsis: After searching for a long time, Noah finally found the [Divine Job Tome]. With it, he just might be able to get away from his current Divine Job [Hero] and its responsibility! Or so he thought. Because the new job that had been granted to him, [Monster Tamer] was completely unheard of!?

title: The Knight in the Area
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life
author: Shin Kibayashi
synopsis:
Aizawa Kakeru is an energetic and dedicated eighth grader who serves as the manager for his schools football team. Though he was well known for being a talented player the previous year, an accident during one of his games caused Kakeru to vow never to play competitively again. Still passionate about the sport, Kakeru dreams of one day becoming a professional football trainer so that he can work alongside his older brother Suguru, the ace of the school team who has represented Japan in international competition.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=13559) (anime).

title: The Red Thread
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Tragedy
author: Sakura Tsukuba
synopsis:
When Dean, the captain of the swimming club, takes the podium during Pharms university orientation, something unusual happens. Though the two have never met before, theyre unable to hide the turmoil that suddenly wells up inside them as they cant help but feel that this isnt the first time theyve laid eyes on each other. Perhaps the red thread of fate links them together from their past lives...

**Note**:
This is the manga adaptation of the Thai novel "*The Red Thread*" and it's drama adaptation "*Until We Meet Again*".

title: Kowloon-Jou De Mou Ichido
genre: Romance, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Sanshi Fujita
synopsis: Kowloon Walled City: A lawless slum packed to the brim with high-rise buildings. In this confined city where various races and families live crowded together like sardines, Ryouma works as a landlord. But one day, he meets Méi Zh?, a spirit who had been inhabiting a tea pot...

title: The Holy Grail of Eris
genre: Historical, Ghosts, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Kujira Tokiwa
synopsis:
Constance, the daughter to a Viscount whose only value is her honesty, and Scarlet Castiel, the most reviled villainess of the era who was sentenced to death ten years ago. When the two people who were never supposed to meet encountered one another at a night party, the story that should have ended with Scarlet's death began anew.  
  
Although their relationship only began out of mutual interest, they soon became true partners in an effort to unravel the mysteries of a grand conspiracy borne out of the past, that still has a vicious grip on the present.

title: This Monster Wants to Eat Me
genre: Monsters, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Sai Naekawa
synopsis: High school girl Hinako is living a quiet life in a seaside town, but she feels somewhat detached from her friends during the summer months when she is reminded of when her family died years ago. One day, she meets Shiori, a mysterious girl who reminds her of the ocean, especially when it comes to her translucent blue eyes, but Shiori soon reveals that she is actually a mermaid who has been looking for Hinako for a long time.

title: Dragon Tofu
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Doujinshi, Web Comic
author: Byou
synopsis: Toshiki and Kazu Fujiwara are brothers who live an ordinary life in an ordinary world working as insurance salesmen. While Toshiki is content with this salaryman life, Kazu strives to be part of a Guild: a registered group of individuals who hunt artifacts and capture criminals. After finishing up a quest, they begin to unravel the truth: that everything is not as normal as it once seemed.

title: Ookiku Furikabutte
genre: Award Winning, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Asa Higuchi
synopsis:
*Ookiku Furikabutte* isn't just a baseball manga. It's the story of a timid young man who was made an ace pitcher in middle school because of family connections. Now he's in high school and it's his time to shine as an ace in his own right.

Reading this story will get your blood boiling, heart pumping, and tears flowing. It has been popular since it was serialized, a true Japanese high school baseball manga!

---  
* Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize for best creative work in 2006
* Won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga in 2007.

*Discrepancy in chapter numbering (mag vs. tank), there are no chapters missing inbetween 25.2 and 53.

title: Break Shot
genre: Comedy, Sports, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Takeshi Maekawa
synopsis:
A boy named Oda Nobusuke is very infatuated with billiards. Problems arise when a new student body president, Mako, suddenly decided to cut the funding for his billiards club. Unhappy with that, Oda wants to convince Mako that his billiards club is worthy of the funding. He decided to challenge a two-time former national billiards champion. Will Oda be able to defend his club?


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media

title: Kakeru
genre: Thriller, Crime, Sexual Violence, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Kenjirou Takeshita
synopsis: When high school student Kakeru Daiba runs for long enough, he enters into a runner's high state that heightens his senses. When his crush, Natsume, disappears mysteriously one day he's forced to use his ability in ways he never expected.

title: The Hero Is Standing in My Way
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: SION
synopsis:
I reincarnated into a novel that I think I read sometime in the past. In the not far future, I'm fated to become the fiancée of the villain, but that's well... Won't it change following the way that I live?

"My ideal type is a man who is 190 cm, handsome, rich, has a rank at least above a Count, and won't grow a gut even when they get old!"

But before I could even find a husband I saved the life of the young male lead? After that my plan for an easy life kept getting messed up!

"I'm sorry, but Ariel said that she can't take her eyes off me because I'm the prettiest and handsomest person in the world."

"What? I did?"

"P-pardon my rudeness. Please forget my marriage proposal!"

"Hold on! No! Wait!"

---
[Original Web Comic](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58561966)

**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / ???](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97402)

title: City of Darkness
genre: Action, Psychological, Martial Arts, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Yu Er
synopsis: Everyone in his Triad gang looked up to him. He was the boss's favorite pupil, but then in a single night, after he had won so many territorial fights for his gang, he lost everything! Why?

title: Burai Na Kaze Tetsu
genre: Sports, Drama
author: Nobuyuki Fukumoto
synopsis:
Jockey Tetsu is a man who lives by his own style. One day, he is charmed by a certain horse and follows it to the end. What Tetsu finds is a runaway horse on the verge of being killed by poison.

---
* Includes three-chapter story "Samba Never Learns" in the same volume.

title: Ryuusa No Ori
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Antique
synopsis:
The Solminati Academy is a prestigious school that harbors the dreams and hopes of ambitious students.

A young man named Nozomu Bountis entered the school for his lover's dream. As time went on, his powers deadlocked and could no longer advance, and his grades fell. Eventually, his lover was stolen by his at-the-time best friend. Heartbroken and lost on what to do next, he focused even harder on his training. 

Eventually, he meets an old woman, who triggers the catalyst to his growth. The future is uncertain but gradually, his world changes.  
  
---
  
[Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7408y/)

title: Bijutsubu Girl
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Hayato Koikawa
synopsis: Middle school life isnt all fun and games for an art club girl either! From club activities to studying, games to manga, hobbies, BL, and mufufu fantasiesor evenlove?! Uchida is a member of the art club. Shes got a lot of strange obsessions and shes not great at dealing with people. A short candid manga about the ups and downs of school life with the classmates surrounding her and the adolescent boy who sits next to her.

title: Yuusha Ni Zenbu Ubawareta Ore Wa Yuusha No Hahaoya to Party O Kumimashita!
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Makoto Kuon
synopsis: As a member of the hero's party Ceres, has set out to defeat the demon king. But one day, he was suddenly dismissed by the hero, and he had to leave the party. All alone, Ceres sought to find a domestic slave to take care of him. What he saw at the slave market was Shizuko, the hero's mother, being sold as a slave?!

title: Puniru Is a Cute Slime
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Maeda-kun
synopsis: The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!

title: Monogatari No Kuromaku Ni Tensei Shite
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hajime Segawa
synopsis:
There was a globally popular game called *The Legend of the Seven Heroes*. Ren cleared the sequel of that game at the fastest record in the world, and thus he obtained a bonus special data. However, no matter where he looked inside the game, he could not find the data. The moment where Ren was about to give up the search, he decided to start playing the second round of the game.

Suddenly, a notification message Do you want to start a special story?" appeared on the screen.

When Ren chose Yes without hesitation, he lost consciousness, and when he woke up, he was a baby. Could it be that he was reincarnated as one of the heroes in *The Legend of the Seven Heroes*? Ren, who thought such a thing was impossible, could not believe his ears when he heard his name from his mother's mouth. It was the name of a classmate who betrays the heroes in the middle of the story.

Of course, he wishes to live in peace. But he meets a saint whose life he's supposed to take, and doesn't. Furthermore, he ends up saving a character (the boss of a great noble family) who was supposed to die. All of these things creates a development that he doesn't know about coming to play

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700427572694145),  [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1862hs/)

title: Back Street Girls
genre: Genderswap, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Jasmine Gyuh
synopsis:
A group of 3 yakuza failed their boss for the last time. After messing up an important job, the boss gives them 2 choices: Honorably committing suicide, or go to Thailand to get a sex reassignment surgery in order to become "female" idols. After a gruesome year long training to become idols, they successfully debut, with overwhelming popularity, much to their dismay. This is where their tragedy truly begins.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20851) (anime)

title: Goze Hotaru
genre: Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Music
author: Kou Tosaya
synopsis: After losing her mother early on, Hotaru, a girl surrounded by warmth and tranquility, finds her life taking a dramatic turn. An unexpected event draws her into the world of Goze, setting her on a path through unknown lands with music as her guide. Armed with her talent and a heart full of questions, she embarks on a quest, seeking her missing father and her true calling!

title: Duel Masters
genre: Traditional Games, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Shigenobu Matsumoto
synopsis: The story centers around the card game Duel Masters, which revolves around five civilizations consisting of Fire, Water, Light, Darkness and Nature. The original storyline follows Shobu Kirifuda, a young boy who likes to play Duel Masters. He and a few duelists are known to bring the monsters on the cards to life in their duels. Shobu engages in this card game so that he can be the best duelist like his father was.

title: Doctor, Live Again
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Isekai, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Tae-Seon
synopsis:
A medical mission turns fatal as Dr. Jins life slips away. Miraculously, he wakes on a battlefield. Instinct takes over. He tends to patients before realizing that this is the martial arts world of The Reigning Heavenly Demon! Hes reincarnated as a child with mastery of modern medicine and soon his skills draw notice. From the renowned White-scaled Doctor to the infamous Gongson Family, everyone sees his potential. But how much is Dr. Jin willing to sacrifice before risking death again?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%98%EC%9B%90-%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%EC%82%B4%EB%8B%A4/2440)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66743)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%82%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%9E/458?tab=episode)

title: Ayame-Senpai Wa Boku to Himitsu No Keiyaku Wo
genre: Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Sentarou Dasoku
synopsis:
On his way home from school, Mitsuya Daiki - an ordinary high school student - finds a girl covered in wounds. Upon closer look, he finds that the girl has animal ears, but she licks Daiki's ears and leaves. Daiki begins to wonder if it was just a dream, when Sakuragami Ayame appears upon him? After telling her of the ability of Daiki's ears, Ayame feels responsible for dragging him into this, and proposes an oath of absolute servitude to protect him at all costs!   
- [Alternative Raw](http://www.takeshobo.co.jp/book_d/shohin/2820601)

title: Sekai Saikyou No Kouei: Meikyuukoku No Shinjin Tansakusha
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Rikizo
synopsis:
Workaholic assistant Atobe Arihito fell asleep in his company's bus that was traveling for a vacation. When he awoke he learned he had died due to the bus getting into an accident, and that he had reincarnated into a world of reincarnators - to the Labyrinth Country. To his surprise he was discovered by his slave driving manager, Igarashi Kyouka, who further explains their role in this world. 


In Labyrinth Country, Reincarnators are expected to choose a job and form parties to fight against monsters in Labyrinths. "Valkyrie" Kyouka had expected Arihito to work with her once again, but he declines due to his knowledge of her demanding nature. As they depart she vows to make him regret not choosing her. 

And thus starts Arihito's adventure as a "Rear Guard".

title: Kage No Eiyuu No Nichijou-Tan
genre: Action, Magic, Military, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Yuusaku Sakaishi
synopsis:
In the Great War of Heroes, the heroes and the Demon King fight for survival and power in each reincarnation. In the fourth war, the heroes defeated the Demon King... but that is only on the surface.

The true hero who defeated the Demon King was Tweight, a shadow agent who would destroy any enemy who asked him to.

After the Great War, Tweight, who wished to lead a peaceful life as an unsung hero, wished to enroll in the Normal Course of the Bildarz Royal Academy.

title: Nijiiro Photograph
genre: Slice of Life
author: Moroko Kurasaki
synopsis: Yamabuki Aoi is an exceedingly withdrawn first-year high school student who lives together with her older sister Satsuki, a popular novelist. What will happen to their daily lives when, due to certain circumstances, Sara Flory, a little foreign girl, begins to live together with them?

title: Kimi No Risou No Maid Ni Naru!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Hiro Karui
synopsis: A few months into his high school life, Renya Nijou has neither friends nor a girlfriend and spends his days living alone. But one day, he witnesses a group of mysterious men dressed in black attempting to kidnap Maya Kamishiro, the most beautiful girl in his class. Apparently, Maya's parents sold her off to pay their debts, so Renya decides to help her with the financial resources he obtained through investments. Maya can't help but want to return the favor, and declares that she will become Renya's maid...?

title: Ef - a Fairy Tale of the Two.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
author: Mikage
synopsis:
Hirono Hiro is a high school student, and secretly a shoujo mangaka, to all but his childhood friend and kouhai, Kei Shindo.  
  
One cold Christmas after meeting a mysterious woman in church, a strange girl steals his bike.  
Running after her, he finds her collapsed on the street.   
  
Learning her name is Miyamura Miyako and that her bag was stolen by a man on a motorbike, Hirono finds himself spending time with Miyako, much to the dismay of Kei

title: Isekai Shikkaku
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Hiroshi Noda
synopsis:
A second life in another world with cute girls by your side and video gamey powerssounds like a dream, right? Not so for a certain melancholy author, who would quite literally rather drop dead.

Honestly, all the fantastical adventure is just getting in the way of his poetic dream of finding the perfect place to die. But no matter how much he risks his hide, everything seems to keep turning out okay.

Will our terminally depressed hero find a new lease on life in this cheerfully bleak isekai comedy?

Inspired by the famous Osamu Dazai's book *Ningen Shikkaku* (*No Longer Human* / *Disqualified from Being Human*).

title: Tsukihime: a Piece of Blue Glass Moon - Moon Phase
genre: Anthology, Magic, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Nakatani
synopsis: An anthology featuring characters from Tsukihime: A Piece of Blue Glass Moon.

title: Major
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life
author: Takuya Mitsuda
synopsis:
Shigeharu Honda is a Japanese League batter on the rise. His son Goro is a Little League pitcher who one day hopes to follow in his father's footsteps. Momoko Hoshino, Goro's schoolteacher, is the first woman Shigeharu has been interested in since the death of Goro's mother. The destinies of these three individuals will become intertwined as father and son experience both heartbreak and triumph on the baseball diamond. But when an unspeakable tragedy visits the family, it will take everything they have to pick up the pieces and reclaim their dreams.  
  
Won the 41st Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.

title: Atsumare! Fushigi Kenkyu-Bu
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Masahiro Anbe
synopsis: Goryo Daisuke is still unsure about which club to join. When he meets the three girl members of Mysterious Research Club while looking for the school's warehouse, he gets hypnotized to sign the registration form. Suzu who is obsessed with scary curses, Chiaki who only relies on her monstrous strength to perform dangerous magic tricks, and Kotone who can control people by hypnosis.

title: Mukiryoku Neet Na Moto Shindou, Boukensha Ni Naru
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Pemopemo-san
synopsis:
Ilvis is a genius boy who has been called a prodigy from an early age.  However, his motto is "I don't want to work"!  

After graduating from school, he was living his long-cherished NEET life, but one day, his sister Arisa finally told him, "If you don't work, you will be kicked out of the house."  Ilvis aims to be an adventurer in search of a free way of working!?  

A misunderstanding warrior tale by an unconscious former cheat prodigy!

title: Watashi No Kareshi Wa Amaetagari Da.
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy
author: Takara Akegami

title: A Splendid Revenge Story of a Super-Dreadnought Cheat Villainess
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Kakashi Minobe
synopsis:
Lunaria il von Solfege. The protagonist, who was reincarnated as the villainess of her favourite game, was flooded with tragic memories of Lunaria. She was condemned, left alone and uncared for, and tried to commit suicide by stabbing herself with a dagger.
"Leave everything to me, Lunaria. Now that I'm Lunaria, I won't show them any mercy."

title: Cooking Papa
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking, Mystery
author: Tochi Ueyama
synopsis:
Araiwa Kazumi is your run-of-the-mill salaryman and father. Hes also secretly an amazing chef! While his coworkers at Kanemaru Industries all eat out for lunch, he pulls out his lunchbox Its time for this cooking papa to show off his pro-level cooking skills!

(from Manga Helpers):

Araiwa Kazumi is an energetic salaryman who is able to perfectly manage his responsibilities at work and at home. Kazumi is also a fantastic chef, though many of his coworkers are unaware of it.

His wife Nijiko, who works as a journalist, has a bit of trouble making time for her home life. However, she tries to always be a cheerful mother.

With their son Makoto, who is 7 at the beginning of the story, they have a very happy family. This is a story that follows the Araiwa household and their delight with delicious food. Cooking instructions are also often included throughout the story.

---
- **Won the 39th Kodansha Manga Award Special Prize in 2015**

title: Spunk
genre: Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama
author: Hideki Arai
synopsis:
I love you! I hate boring things! **I wont compromise on my fun**!!
??(??)**Kana** is a powerful girl who freely desires her loved ones.

"Because..." "But..." "When you're like this..." Men and women, the outside world, the world, and even self-reflection are "blockers".
??(???)**Fuyumi** is a literary girl who thinks, "The person I am is still **nowhere to be found**.''

Two contrasting girls meet in an unknown world... the **SM world**!?
**New queens Kana and Fuyumi are doing SM!**
Laugh! Live! Human beings, run with all your heart and soul!

A truly earnest and humorous hymn to humanity, by a genius who has produced many controversial works, opens with the simultaneous release of volumes 1 and 2!!

**[SPUNK]...Courage, energy, cheerfulness, liveliness.**

title: Kimetsu No Yaiba
genre: Historical, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Koyoharu Gotouge
synopsis:
Since ancient times, rumors have abounded of man-eating demons lurking in the woods. Because of this, the local townsfolk never venture outside at night. Legend has it that a demon slayer also roams the night, hunting down these bloodthirsty demons.  
Ever since the death of his father, Tanjirou has taken it upon himself to support his mother and five siblings. Although their lives may be hardened by tragedy, they've found happiness. But that ephemeral warmth is shattered one day when Tanjirou finds his family slaughtered and the lone survivor, his sister Nezuko, turned into a demon. Adding to this sorrow, a demon hunter named Tomioka Giyuu arrived and was about to finish Nezuko off, but to his surprise she and Tanjiro started to protect each other. Seeing this oddity and Tanjiro's promising fighting skills, Giyuu decides to send them to his old mentor to be trained.  
So begins Tanjiro's life as a demon hunter, bound on a quest to cure his sister and find the one who murdered his entire family.  
  
MangaPlus: <https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/100009>

title: Morning Glow Is Golden: the Idolm@Ster
genre: School Life, Slice of Life
author: Tatsuya Takahashi
synopsis: The spinoff manga centers on the character Kotori Otonashi, an office clerk at 765 Production, during her high school days.

title: Gemini Wa Otoshigoro
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Tokio Shima
synopsis: She was just my classmate until yesterday but now she's my cute girlfriend?! But everyday is nerve racking with her almost identical twin brother around. This is the popular three man fluff + meddling brother romantic comedy!

title: Maji De Tsukiau 15-Fun Mae
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Perico
synopsis: Growing up in the same apartment complex, Yuuki and Natsuha have known each other forever. Theyve been friends for so long that everyone just assumes theyre a couple! But as they both approach the final stretch of high school, they get a silly, totally-not-serious idea what if they actually started dating? What a ridiculous thing to say! Unless?

title: Tonari No Furi-San Ga Tonikaku Kowai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Seiichi Kinoue
synopsis: Ordinary High-schooler Taira Namito, who is ordinary inside, unknowingly becomes the target of the female delinquent-looking girl Furi Youko, a pure maiden at heart, who sits next to him.

title: Gal to Bocchi
genre: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Yoru Asahi
synopsis: Stone-faced Hina Kawai says she is not good with gyarus... but that's not an impediment for Hayashibara, her classroom's most noticeable gyaru.

title: Level up with the Gods
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: O-Hyeon
synopsis:
Maybe Inner Gods can never defeat Outer Gods so thought Yuwon Kim, a plucky, high-ranking warrior, after a bitter defeat.

But Yuwon is too tenacious to give up. His loss becomes the dawn of a new journey as a returnee. With renewed determination, Yuwon starts back from where he began, smashing monster after monster and relearning his skills before taking on the Tower once again.

But can he fight his way through the tutorials and level up once more, or will his conquest crumble before him?

title: Tensei Mae Wa Dragon Deshita
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Doujinshi, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Pekomaru Oosaki
synopsis: The hero and the dragon defeated the Demon King, saving the world, but they died. Then they were reincarnated in another world (Japan)... This is their story.

title: Gamer Ga Isekai Konten Shite Harem Jinsei E Continue Suru Sou Desu
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Incest, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Shota, Adaptation
author: etose
synopsis:
After opening the last route of a certain FPS game, the protagonist jumps for joy, slips and dies. However, due to God - a game lover - feeling sorry for him, he decides to continue his life in a different world as the boy Wayne (although he seems to have no memory of his previous life). 

Life at military school in a world where magic and adventure are commonplace, and meeting heroines who truly love him.

This is the second life of a gamer down the harem route!?

title: Happy Happia!
genre: Sci-Fi, Animals, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Ino
synopsis: Yuki Iwatsuki is a transfer student, today is her first day at her new school. There seems to be some kind of trauma, her classmates "Koneko," a high-tension girl, and "Akizora Hako," a box-head girl, are very interested in Yuki! Will she get along with everyone?

title: Iinchou Desu Ga Furyou Ni Naru Hodo Koi Shitemasu!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Jyouzu Himiya
synopsis:
Ryoko Masaki is a serious class president, yet she has decided to become a delinquent to catch the attention of her childhood friend, Masato Todoroki. The reason is that as a discipline committee president, Masato always goes out of his way to remind delinquents about their attire, yet he doesn't pay any mind to the serious Ryoko. That's why Ryoko decided to dye her hair and shorten her skirt, and when Masato saw her, he was devastated and concerned. Is this what Ryoko had hoped for...?

A ridiculous rom-com between a serious class president and a dense discipline committee member!

title: Monsters Convent
genre: Monsters, Comedy, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Yusura Someoka
synopsis: Gags of a Catholic Convent on a Fantasy World.

title: Our Field of Dreams
genre: Sports, Drama
author: Kenichi Muraeda
synopsis: A soccer loving boy Takasugi Kazuya dreams of playing soccer with his Japan League star father at the National Yoyogi Stadium. The story follows Kazuya's life as he travels to Argentina, plays for Yamaki, and goes to the 1998 World Cup in France.

title: Enchanter Enchanter
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Ghosts, Martial Arts, Self-Published, Gore, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Izumi Kawachi
synopsis: Enchanters possess special talents that set them apart from the average human. They are recognized by their ability to manipulate Chi. However, some use their abilities for personal gain. Some rise against Enchanters to uncover the secrets of the world. Others seek to become the highest power or simply wish to erase Enchanters from existence. Even if its destiny, karma, or nature, in the Enchanter world, one must understand the blur between life and death.

title: Jitsu Wa Imouto Deshita. ~Saikin Dekita Giri No Otouto No Kyorikan Ga Yatara Chikai Wake~
genre: Romance, Comedy, Incest, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Muku Shirai
synopsis:
Akira, my stepbrother, was brought into my life as a high school student after my parents remarried. He is a cute boy but shy because of the complicated family environment he grew up in. I had a crush on my brother, so I always spent time playing with Akira for his sake... He loves me... We hit it off, and the distance between us grew rapidly! I asked him, "......Brother, do you like me by any chance?" "Of course I do."

The misunderstanding between the two of us deepens. And finally, I realized that Akira was my "sister" and I was confused... "I like the distance between my brother and me as we have always been. I'd rather be with you more than I am now." Akira's approach to me, aiming to make us "lovers" instead of "siblings", has begun!
 ___

title: Noa-Senpai Wa Tomodachi.

synopsis:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

author: Yayu Murata

title: Yattara
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Demons, Drama, Horror, Supernatural
author: Ooyamada
synopsis: A gluttonous monster, Yattara, is drawn to a city of splendor and opulence. Its only pleasure in life: eating. It finds its favorite meal, children, and is ready to dig in as usual but thena flash of inspiration strikes?

title: Dragon Ball
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural
author: Akira Toriyama
synopsis:
Dragon Ball follows the adventures of Goku from his childhood through adulthood as he trains in martial arts and explores the world in search of the seven mystical orbs known as the Dragon Balls, which can summon a wish-granting dragon when gathered. Along his journey, Goku makes several friends and battles a wide variety of villains, many of whom also seek the Dragon Balls for their own desires. Along the way becoming the strongest warrior in the universe.

Part II (the post-time skip portion) of Dragon Ball is also known as 'Dragon Ball Z' in North America.

---

- **The 4th Best Selling Manga in History**

title: Be-Bop High School
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Bakji
synopsis:
The story revolves around the lives of two rough-and-tumble high school friends Kato Hiroshi and Nakama Toru, who seemed to make a habit of getting into trouble and starting up fights. In keeping with the spirit of the manga, Toru and Hiroshi sport slicked back 50's style ducktails and adopted exaggerated swaggers that made them comical and yet also oddly cool. The drama also features an assortment of outlandish characters who sport even weirder fashions and hairdos. To describe the action in this drama, think Fight Club meets The Breakfast Club.  
  
---
 - **Won the 12th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 1988, which it shared with Bonobono**

title: Tyranny
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Comedy, Superhero, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

title: Higawari Shippo No Ozaki-Chan
genre: Romance, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Yasumi Holiday
synopsis: A high school girl, Shiho Ozaki, whose tail grows back every day. Invited by her, a senior who visits the PE storage room almost daily finds himself at her mercy, with her tail, her ears, and whatever else she decides to do.

title: Owari No Seraph
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Takaya Kagami
synopsis: One day, a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time, vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou, a young boy, who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage, are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity, Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.

title: The Color of the End: Mission in the Apocalypse
genre: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Haruo Iwamune
synopsis:
A girl walks alone in a world without humans.
Her mission is to search for survivors and cleanse the land.
Will humans be found?
A story of loneliness and beautiful ruins.
___
[Alt Official Raw (KADOComi)](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_000736_S?episodeType=first)

title: Chronicles of Narnia: the Magician'S Nephew
genre: Award Winning, Time Travel, Animals, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Iori Tamaki
synopsis: On a daring quest to save a life, two friends are hurled into another world, where an evil sorceress seeks to enslave them. But then the lion Aslan's song weaves itself into the fabric of a new land, a land that will be known as Narnia. And in Narnia, all things are possible.

title: Ad Astra - Scipio and Hannibal
genre: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Animals, Survival, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
author: Mihachi Kagano
synopsis: This is the story of two of the greatest military commanders in history: the Roman Publius Cornelius Scipio and the Carthaginian Hannibal. The story follows the two of them from their early life on. Hannibal is initially shown as a strangely silent infant, who seemed like the gods forgot to put a soul in his little body. However, he soon begins to speak in a way that shows his remarkable abilities. Hannibal and Scipio are driven enemies, and their struggle shaped an era.

title: Monster Onna Kanbu Wa Osanaki Yuusha Wo Dekiaisuru
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota
author: Yu Hachimine
synopsis: When a young hero appears, Arachne is ordered to hunt him down, and is moved by the hero's attitude and falls in love with him. On the contrary, she wants to use the power of the young hero to become the strongest demon... A reversal story of Arachne and the young hero who were trying to entangle each other but were entangled in love!?

title: Akane Matsuri
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Miu Kojima
synopsis:
They are friends but not just friends.
This is a 4-koma manga about high school girls who just live their daily lives.

Akane: Short bob with black hair. She lives to enjoy life.
Matsuri: Cool blonde hair, serious at heart.
Azuki: Cute and petite dark girl.
Momiji: A sensible person who always quietly watches over everyone.

title: Followers of King
genre: Historical, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Hiroyuki Takei
synopsis: Gao Jing, you're a maniac. Almost exactly like Gao Sheng was. In your eyes, is the world truly so horrid, horrid enough that you'll go to such extremes to save it? Gao Jing, are these the rules you've laid down for every sect under the sun? You're so delusional your plans are something not even your great grandfather would've dreamed off. So be it then, go and execute your plan, I want to see, if all the sects in the world will be brought to their knees in front of you, or if the Jin dynasty will be destroyed by your very hands!

title: Yuusha-Sama, Yukagen Wa Ikaga Desu Ka?
genre: Loli, Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Marimo
synopsis: The story of the former hero Loki and his time working at an onsen with his monster co-workers!

title: Ushiro No Shoumen Kamui-San
genre: Ghosts, Comedy, Horror, Supernatural
author: EROKI
synopsis: Shizuka is a normal high school girl with the ability to see ghosts. Due to her peculiar tendency to attract ghosts, she works as an assistant to Kamui, a famous psychic. Kamui takes pride in his top-notch psychic abilities, but the way he exorcises ghosts is rather unusual!

title: 7-Nin No Nemuri Hime
genre: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Fantasy
author: Fiok Lee
synopsis: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?

title: Ogura-Sanchi No Kinako
genre: 4-Koma, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Shiawase no Katachi
synopsis: Not found

title: Shokuba No Onnanoko Ni Toushisuru Hanashi
genre: Romance, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Marika Tosu
synopsis:
Hatamoto Ikuto, the manager of the local bookstore "BOOK FOREST", is an otaku who can't resist spending money on his favorite characters in games.
Todoroki Miran, the part-time leader, looks up to him but can't understand his obsession with spending on in-game things.
When Ikuto claims, "For me, spending money is an investment", Miran teases, "If that's the case, how about you invest in me...?"
As the two navigate a cycle of investment and returns, the distance between their hearts begins to shrink.
A unique and charming investment-themed romantic comedy!

(Source: Melonbooks, edited)

title: ItS Time to Change the Genre
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ga-Rin
synopsis:
I woke up inside my favorite novel. 

Not as the protagonist, Luca Winterwald, but as Judith, his abusive aunt and the first character to die  time for a rewrite! 

Ill hand Luca off to his loving, long-lost uncle as scripted, and then live my own life far from danger. At least, that was the plan. When his uncle arrives, Luca suddenly calls out, Dont leave! 

Now, I must protect Luca from impending family tragedy, raise him to become the hero, and turn this villainesss ending upside down!

title: The DevilS Body Temperature
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Xuan Xuan
synopsis:
Bei Yao, a cheerful four-year-old, was reborn into 1996 and found herself living next door to a boy destined to become a formidable villain in the future. This boy, Pei Chuan, was only five at the time, confined to a wheelchair and deeply insecure.

Years later, when they were teenagers, Bei Yao had blossomed into the school's most admired beauty. Despite her popularity, Pei Chuan remained guarded and distant. When Bei Yao confessed her feelings for him, he reacted with a mixture of fear and longing.

Having known each other for two lifetimes, Bei Yao was determined to understand the complexities of Pei Chuan's character. As their bond deepened, she discovered a sensitive and vulnerable soul beneath his tough exterior. Their story is one of a healing love that blossoms between childhood sweethearts, as Bei Yao's warmth gradually melts away Pei Chuan's emotional barriers.

title: Madowasenaide Yamori-Kun
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Shinachaso
synopsis: Mori and Yamori, who sits behind him, decide to change their image for the summer vacation. They make their summer vacation debut without any problems, but for some reason Yamori starts cross-dressing. And he keeps saying and doing flirtatious things...!? A hot topic on social media!! A comedy about the mismatched love between a handsome guy and a beautiful girl!

title: Maydare Tensei Monogatari: Kono Sekai De Ichiban Warui Majo
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Nana Natsunishi
synopsis:
Makia is a noble lady descended from an infamous witch. Thor, a boy who was raised with her and came from another world, is chosen to be the knight of the "savior." The two are forced apart, and to see Thor once again, Makia aims to be the top student at Magic School!  


---

title: Ane No Tomodachi
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Momoko
synopsis:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother... or rather, pet?
___
**Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Serialization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).**

title: Candy & Cigarettes

author: Tomonori Inoue

**"You don't need math for murder" - Miharu S.**    

Raizou Hiraga is a retired officer from the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department. 
After learning that his grandson is stricken with a deadly illness requiring expensive treatment,
Raizou comes across a vacancy flier for the mysterious SS Agency and applies for the job. 
However, after taking his first job with 11-year-old Miharu Suzukaze as partner, he discovers 
that his new occupation is more than meets the eye

title: Atagoul Monogatari
genre: Animals, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Hiroshi Masumura
synopsis:
Atagoul Monogatari takes place in a fantasy world where humans and cats can talk to each other. 
The story revolves around the adventures of Hideyoshi, a big young cat, and his friends.

title: Anata-Tachi Soredemo Sensei Desu Ka!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Ryuudai Ishizaka
synopsis: One day, school teachers come as freeloaders to the inn run by his parents!? Kazami Hiro, a high school boy, decides to take care of the inn and his future!?

title: Ookii Onnanoko Wa Suki Desu Ka?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Incest, Sports, Crossdressing, Harem, School Life, Delinquents, Shota, Slice of Life
author: Goro Aizome
synopsis: Tachibana Souta is a bit of a multi-talented freeter who gets by from one part-time job to the next, his standout characteristic being that he's a bit short. One day he's roped by his older sister into 'serving' their college's volleyball team, of which she's a member. She also happens to be at least 6 and 1/2 ft. tall, as do the rest of the team's members who take quite the interest in Souta.

title: Mizuki-SenpaiS Love Fortune-Telling
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Shirosawa
synopsis:
A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him

A frustrating and strange romcom begins!

title: Naze Ka S-Kyuu Bijotachi No Wadai Ni Ore Ga Agaru Ken
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation
author: Jo N
synopsis:
High school girls Sara Himekawa, Rin Kohinata, and Yuna Takamori are called S-class beauties, admired by everyone for their unparalleled beauty. While the school is abuzz with questions about the mysterious guy that the girls are talking about, Haruya Akasaki, a quiet boy in the class, is feeling anxious. In fact, the subject of the girls' talk is Haruya! He definitely does not want to draw that much attention at school, so he tries to make the girls lose interest in him, but it all backfires and

This is a school harem comedy between a plain guy and S-class beauties."

title: Witches' Quarter

author: Ipa
synopsis: Not found

author: Yuuto

Due to a request, the genius Dr. Sumiko developed an "AI boyfriend".  
Sumiko is pleased with her success, but the AI boyfriend began to recognize her as "his girlfriend"!?  
Initially, Sumiko rejected the AI boyfriend.  
However, being subject to his constant love gradually leads her to acknowledge him  
  
A hot topic on Twitter and pixiv! A love comedy between a handsome AI and an unpopular woman begins ?

title: Tanbo De Hirotta Onna Kishi, Inaka De Ore No Yome Da to Omowareteiru
genre: Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Saori Otoha
synopsis:
Jin Mita, a farmer living in a small countryside town, discovers an unconscious female knight in his rice field one morning. She calls herself Seraphim, and she seems to have come from another world. She has no knowledge of this world and nowhere to go. Unable to bear seeing her like this, Jin offered to take her in, but apparently the people around him think that Seraphim is his wife...!?

(Source: Magazine Pocket)

title: Seitokai Fukukaichou Yagami Sayuri Wa Ganbatte Iru!
genre: Action, Comedy, Crossdressing, School Life
author: Shinji Inamitsu
synopsis:
Yagami Sayuri is the student council vice president, and her demanding president hates the fact that boys are in their school at all. 

There is a school legend that if a maiden offers her panties to the goddess statue in the courtyard, the goddess will help solve her problems. The actual problem-solving power, though, is with the student council, which monitors the statue's panty offerings. The president often insists Sayuri help solve the girls' problems in her secret identity of Mystic Heart, a scantily clad protector of the school's peace. Most of the students just think of Mystic Heart as a masochistic pervert. 

Sayuri usually ends up naked and humiliated in front of boys, and the shame helps her transform into her sadistic personality. In this form, she can beat up the boys and pee on them. 

The student council helps girls through many troubles, from misunderstandings between friends to peeping toms!

title: Midwood
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Kim Won
synopsis:
As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...

title: Tori Kissa!
genre: Award Winning, Comedy, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Nobuyoshi Samurai
synopsis:
Wilcome, wilcome!  
This is a 4-koma about a cafe run by two avian sisters. Originally a oneshot, before winning a newbie contest and being awarded a serialization.

**Wikipedia**
- [Chinese (Traditional)](https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%B3%A5%E5%A8%98%E5%92%96%E5%95%A1)
- [Japanese](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%A8%E3%82%8A%E3%81%8D%E3%81%A3%E3%81%95!)

title: Kawaii Kouhai Ni Iwasaretai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Taku Kawamura
synopsis: Yasu likes his kouhai, Moriyama, who is at the same time extremely assertive, deadpan, and extremely passive aggressive.

title: Fuun Kara No Saikyou Otoko
genre: Reincarnation, Martial Arts, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Fukufuku
synopsis:
After having lived a life full of misfortune, Siegbert has been reincarnated as a result of an accident. His new family is so warm. He can't believe he was unlucky in his previous life.  

He thought he would live a peaceful life this time, but unfortunately, his luck level is abnormally high and his luckiness attracts "chance" and can make whatever his wish come true if he can tackle these "chances". However, these "chances" comes with a price, Siegbert and those around him has to face formidable enemies and a life-or-death situation.  

Siegbert is determined to beat all of the odds with his abnormally high magic power and appraisal eye that he got after reincarnating to protect those around him.

title: You Are My Desire
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Gu Jiang
synopsis:
The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school directors office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.

title: Terror Night
genre: Action, Romance, Horror, Supernatural
author: Takashi Tsukimi
synopsis:
A certain town where rumors of the occult have suddenly been increasing.  
  
Sei, who lives in this town, encounters a strange girl. The girl wrongly thinks Sei is hitting on her and ends up tagging along with him. However, as it turns out, the strange girl is a certain legendary existence

title: Match Rate 99.99%
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Nanna
synopsis:
"Ill give you 1 billion won now, and 2 billion won after you give birth."

Did I hit the jackpot?! Wouldnt it be good to receive 3 billion won and then run away? Three times. We only have to sleep together three times.

That idea completely changed my life.

title: Bonkura Bonbon House
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Youko Nemu
synopsis:
A neet, building a house?!
From 3am Dangerous Zone and Third-Generation Chemist Kyubee author, Nemus Yokos latest work!

After dropping out of college without her parents consent, Kazuki returns to her hometown. Back in home, she manages to get her furious parents give her the remaining 2 million yen from her tuition and decides to live in her grandmothers renovated beauty parlor.

However, even with her unstoppable 2 million yen, it isnt enough for Kazuki to work on the house and fulfill all of her desires!!!
She ends up renting a part of the house to Seidai, a hairdresser, who was looking for a place to settle down his shop, but before that it must be renovated

With the help of Eikichi, a former interior designer, walls and ceilings will be teared down, restoring Kazukis house from top to bottom, and with that, Kazukis DIY life will officially begin!

Whats to come to the DIY life of this blockhead? Maybe love will come?

title: Kimi Dake Wa Shindemo Gomen
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Kina Azusa
synopsis: The admirable middle-school girl gifted with both beauty and intelligence, Yagami Mitsuko, has a secret. And that is, being an incredibly enthusiastic fan of her classmate Souichirou. From his "good morning" until "good night", she closely watches him wherever he goes. His favorite food, his body weight & height, his bedtime and school courses, even the TV shows he watches, she is undoubtedly a fan who knows everything about him... Or rather, she has become his stalker completely... However, a boy who likes her chases her with the same type of infatuation appeared!?

title: Akujo Ga Kishi No Kyouai Kara Nogareru Houhou
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess
author: Sangatsu Misaki
synopsis:
A fate where youre destined to be killed by an obsessive knight!!

The protagonist finds herself reincarnated as Victoria, the villainess in a romance novel.
Victorias inevitable fate is to be killed by her loyal knight, Cain.
Under the influence of a charm spell, Cain loves her blindly, and eventually, that love spirals out of control.
On top of that, if Cain discovers that the real Victorias soul has been replaced by someone else, things will definitely not end well!
To avoid this deadly future, Victoria decides to break the charm spell while pretending to be the villainess.
However, Cains gaze, which initially felt terrifying, gradually becomes sweeter and more affectionate!!

title: Orc No Shuhai Ni Shukufuku Wo
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy
author: Hajime Kanadome
synopsis: Half-Orc Elpis and Margit, the daughter of a corrupt nobleman, go on an adventure in search of WHISKEY, left behind by the teleporter Tanaka!

title: The Amazing Digital Circus
genre: Reincarnation, Psychological, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Sakura
synopsis:
Where is the exit?

The comic adaptation of the dark comedy begins!

Published monthly in print in Corocoro Ichiban! and online in Weekly Corocoro Comic.
___
**Cooperation:** InfoLens Inc.

title: Bungo Stray Dogs Gaiden - Ayatsuji Yukito Vs. Kyougoku Natsuhiko
genre: Action, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Oyoyo
synopsis: Known for his biting wit and rapid-fire brain cells, Yukito Ayatsuji is a detective and top-ranked skill user who possesses the ability to expose any crime. When a request to investigate a puzzling murder incident hits his desk, Ayatsuji must team up with Mizuki Tsujimura, a spunky agent sent from the Special Division, to tackle the case. Can the unlikely duo get to the bottom of this mystery?!

title: Celeb Lady
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic
author: Yoo Heun
synopsis: The Ugly Duckling Becomes the Empires Top Celebrity! Juliet Karenina, the eras hottest celebrity, wakes up in the body of noblewoman Louvetria Diorlos in another world. Faced with a clumsy body and a timid personality, Louvetria endures bullying from those around her: Twins who mock and ostracize her. Her unrequited love, Kedric, who scowls at her. Her step-grandmother, Molga, who torments her in secret. But with Juliets spirit inside her, Louvetria wont tolerate it anymore. I wont stand for this, no matter who it is. Louvetrias bold transformation begins!

title: Nito No Joreishi
genre: Monsters, Action, Samurai, Supernatural
author: Hiromi Ichikawa
synopsis: Gotsuji and Uruka, two exorcists, spend their days hunting down and banishing "evil spirits." Their mission is to track down and slay a specific malevolent spirit. At the heart of this quest lies Gotsuji's deep, unresolved grief and vengeance for a woman who died long ago. While Gotsuji is consumed by a thirst for revenge, Uruka, who struggles to understand this obsession, faithfully stays by his side. Together, these two exorcists are bound on a journey, but where will it lead?

title: Kanjuten
genre: Psychological, Ghosts, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Itsuma-chan
synopsis: An interconnected omnibus of stories that explores the subtle distortions of everyday life, delving into how ordinary experiences can take unsettling turns. Each narrative weaves together to examine the eerie sensations that arise when the familiar becomes uncanny.

title: Mairimashita! Iruma-Kun: If Episode of Mafia
genre: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Drama, Police
author: hiromono
synopsis: The beloved characters of Mairimashita! Iruma-kun star in this Mafia-based spinoff! Young Iruma saves an injured mob boss from death... and then becomes his grandson!?

title: Re Cervin
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Kousuke Hamada
synopsis: Once upon a time, an evil dragon lived in this world. To fight it, humans joined forces with the inhabitants of Paradise and, one day, were able to seal an ancient evil. But years passed and the seal was broken, and the dragon was freed to wreak havoc and destroy countries again. A king who has lost his kingdom and a girl who has lost her memory.

title: Tsukareta Ouji-Sama to Kyouikugakari No Goreijou No Hanashi
genre: Romance, Fantasy
author: Tanako
synopsis:
Steven, the first prince of the Kingdom of Fierte, used to be called the perfect prince, but now he just spends his days drinking alone in his remote palace from noon onwards in a lethargic mood.
One day, a woman of his age named Ada, the daughter of the Duchess of Raffine, suddenly arrives at his doorstep.
At first, Steven was not pleased with her, but gradually he begins to open up to her.
In the midst of his life, Stephen begins to remember memories of his childhood with Ada...?

title: I Have No Health
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ha-Ron Lee
synopsis:
Ive gone into the body of Ninaina, the weakest character, who was fated to die once winter came!

With such with weak stamina that its hard to even take walks, eat, or just stand, let alone exercise, I have such a tragic life that I even have to endure assassination attempts from my grandfather

I will definitely recover my health!

Kaiser who comes to Ninainas side with a cold gaze. Receiving the order that he has to keep Ninaina alive, he comes to her side and protects her.

You will not die. For now.

---
Ninenya Seiahs misfortunes began from birth, owing to her mothers traitorous reputation and subsequent death. Ninenya was thus banished from the noble Seiah family and forcibly separated from her father, Lord Rubenio Seiah. In extremely poor health, Ninenya has mere months to live. To save his daughter, Rubenio enlists the mysterious Count Adelman as her protector. Ninenya must now work with Adelman to improve her poor health and stop her from becoming the victim of a deadly family feud.

---
