title: Mankitsu Shitai Jouren-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Rin Shinmi
synopsis: Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?

title: Utsushicha Dame-Na Kao
genre: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama
author: FLOWERCHILD
synopsis: Misa is a cabaret girl who frequents a lesbian bar used for one night stands. She meets a shy girl by the name of "Ai" one night and finds herself attracted to her, and discovers later that she is actually a famous actress...

title: Devoro
genre: Monsters, Action, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Osamu Tezuka
synopsis: If the world fell apart and you could do nothing but survive, how would you do it? What purpose or peace can you find when all that remains is the ruins of the past?

title: Soloist in a Cage
genre: Action, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Drama, Police, Tragedy
author: Shiro Moriya
synopsis:
In a prison so big that it is called a city, all sorts of criminals have been amassed. Due to the inescapable walls, the population only continues to grow. Within are a pair of siblings - a young girl and a recently born boy. What will be their fate in this desolate, cold city? A story of hope and struggle begins.
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Seven Seas](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/soloist-in-a-cage/)

title: Amagami-San Chi No Enmusubi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Marcey Naitou
synopsis: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine.

title: My Harem Consists Entirely of Female Demon Villains
genre: Long Strip, Harem, Full Color
author: Kelan Jiyuan Tianqiao
synopsis: I, the earthling "hero" of this story, crossed over into another world based on a video game and suddenly appeared in a villainous female demon's bed when I arrived. If not for the fact that I had married all the villains in the game before crossing over, I'd have been killed pretty quickly. Now, the villains keep pestering me, asking me to help them rule the world, and vying for my hand in marriage. What am I supposed to do? I'll await your answers online! It's urgent!

title: Wakaranai Desu Yoshida-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Osamu Takahashi
synopsis:
Tsukumo Yamada is a simple and unremarkable college student. 

As he is getting ready to go home after finishing his university lecture as usual, a solitary beautiful woman, Mao Yoshida, who is rumored to be a "mermaid princess," passes by. While the boys are in an uproar, Yamada is secretly summoned by Yoshida. When they are alone, Yoshida presses against him. In fact, Yamada and Yoshida have an intimate relationship... 

However, he is unable to grasp the romantic distance between them because Yoshida is too expressionless, and he is having a sweet but bittersweet college life, unable to go from "friend" to "lover".

title: Maou to Ryuuou Ni Sodaterareta Shounen Wa Gakuen Seikatsu Wo Musou Suru You Desu
genre: Loli, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Genkotsu Kumano
synopsis: A boy named Ruisha is trapped in a distorted space created by the ancient hero. What he finds there is the Demon King and the Dragon King, who should have been defeated by the hero 300 years ago. Ruisha befriends the Demon King and the Dragon King, and is trained by them, going from a weak child to a legendary warrior with the power of both demons and dragons. Using his power, Ruisha escaped from the strange place and was accepted into the magic academy where the heros descendants live. And now he will have to face many challenges to free the Demon King and Dragon King.

title: Uchi No Deshi Ga Itsu No Manika Jinrui Saikyou Ni Natte-Ite, Nan No Sainou Monai Shishou No Ore Ga, Sore Wo Koeru Uchuu Saikyou Ni Go Nintei Sareteiru Kudan Ni Tsuite
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Akiraizun
synopsis: Takumi was banished from the party and lived alone in the mountains. Leia, who claims to be a disciple of Alice, a girl who once protected and cared for him, came to him. She has become a disciple of Takumi, who is rumored to be the strongest in the universe. Since then, a dragon, a great sage, and a goblin king have visited Takumi, who has no talent, and is suspected to be a demon king!?

title: Oshitai Shite Orimasu.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Shichimi
synopsis: On the day of a matchmaking interview between distinguished families... Riko wanted to call it off because she's in love with her Oshi, while her counterpart Taiyou was also aiming to call it off because of his fear of women! However, they're both able to value what the other "loves" and come to an understanding, so they decide to pretend to be dating in order to deceive their parents!? This is the start of your new favorite Handcraft Boy x Yumejoshi Girl Fake Love Lifestyle?

title: Isekai De Kojiin Wo Hiraita Kedo, Naze Ka Darehitori Sudatou to Shinai Ken
genre: Loli, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Tomosane Ariike
synopsis: Masatsugu was brought from another world in a hero summoning and ended up being part of the lowest possible caste. Awaiting this boy, who possess nothing but elementary skills, is managing an orphanage full of beautiful girls! But, his annoying days are just starting as he finds the building in ruins, and he also has to pay off the huge debt the former director left! And thats not all, he has no time to rest from all the scumbags threatening the orphanage! Will Masatsugu and the orphans be able to protect their precious home?

title: The House of Diana'S Choice
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Marubyeol
synopsis: After being orphaned at the tender age of 7, poor Diana had little choice but to slave away as a maid to survive. But her fortune takes a turn when she encounters a mysterious mage who introduces himself as her mother's friend. He gifts her better clothes, a beautiful house, and even her mother's inheritance. All that's left is for Diana to spend her days living happily... until another chance meeting with a certain individual reveals a family secret that will change her life forever.

title: Yamazaki-San
genre: Oneshot, Award Winning, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life
author: Mako Hatamachi
synopsis: Won a Semi-Grand Prize from the *Tonari no Young Jump* COMITIA 145 4-Hour Speed Manga Awards.

title: One Piece Party
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Ei Andou
synopsis: Spin-off of One Piece, which takes place post-timeskip, showing the cast in SD/chibi form and features their hilarious antics around various islands while out in the sea.

title: Kawaii Nante Kiitenai!!
genre: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Nakaba Harufuji
synopsis:
Madoka is obsessed with shoujo mangaspecifically manga that features younger, innocent guys who fall for their Senpai. So she should be thrilled when a gorgeous kohai comes to work at her fathers restaurantexcept hes rude and standoffish, and wants nothing to do with her. But when she protects him from some extra-pushy fans, he finds that maybe hes found someone letting his walls down for!

---
Madoka is a high school girl who loves cute younger boys. One day, Shikura arrives as a part-time worker at her parents' diner! Shikura is beautiful and handsome, but he's not super nice?! She thought she would never like him, but the way he sometimes looks is agonizingly cute! How can she not really like him?!

title: Laurels of Sand
genre: Sports
author: Puyo
synopsis: Nanashimas high school baseball team missed going to the Koshien by one heartbreaking game during his 2nd year in school. Now as a 3rd year and the team captain, he sees that the team is nothing compared to last year. The all star starters from last year have graduated and Nanashima is left with unskilled and, more importantly, unmotivated players that have no shot at making the Koshien. That is when Mr. Toku, an old man in the neighborhood who has watched every practice and every game the school has ever played for the past few decades, secretly entrusts Nanashima with 10.000.000 yen. Mr. Toku wants Nanashima to use the money however he wants to ensure the team makes it to the Koshien. But that large of an untraceable fund is too big of a responsibility for a high school teenager and even a goodhearted kid like Nanashima might fall into its temptation.

title: Ruridragon
genre: Award Winning, Monsters, Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Masaoki Shindou
synopsis:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!

title: Sirens Won'T Sing for You
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Police
author: Reiji Agasa
synopsis: Kanoha Takanashi is a descendent of Sirens and is infatuated with her classmate, Kei Shibuya. Torn between her feelings and the Siren's unique nature of yearning to eat the one they love, Kanoha musters up the courage to confess to himonly to get completely rejected on the spot! But what happens when she finds out Shibuya-kun's secret? (MANGA Plus)

title: Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Kazuki Kaburagi
synopsis:
Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
All over the world, Monsters suddenly began appearing. The only person who could save humanity from The Calamity was The Great Sage, Ichikami Atsumu.
But, despite being satisfied in his death, he was reincarnated into the body of a boy who was bullied into killing himself, Kusanagi Minato.
Atsumu, waking up in a Japan fifty years into the future, is shocked to see a peaceful world, and where magic has become far weaker compared to when he was alive.
For now, Atsumu decides to go back to Kamui Magic Academy as Minato, but learns that mages are nothing more than a relic of the past, and in their place exist a class of privileged nobles
.After blowing off his bragging, low-levelled bullies, Atsumu gains the interest of a noble magician girl, Mizuha Yuika, as well as his schoolmates and teachers.
Whats more, Atsumu finds a sign that the Calamity, which was supposed to have been subdued, will return
It looks like my power is still needed
Within the soul of student lies the Great Sage?!
The strongest Great Sage will change this world drunk on peace.
With his reincarnation in the future set, the curtain opens on a new Heros story!

title: Inukai-San Chi No Oshikake Jk
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Nagi Ookawa
synopsis: One day, the thirty-something salaryman Inukai met a high school girl Komugi who claimed to be the reincarnation of his childhood dog. Now she comes over every day looking to play with her owner, but her pet antics don't seem so innocent in human form! A semi-cohabitation comedy between a dog-girl and a single office worker!

title: Succubus Ga Yattekita Ohanashi
genre: Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Kichi
synopsis: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.

title: Akuyaku Reijoutachi Wa Yuruganai
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Nina Akabane
synopsis:
It has been half a year since Aini Mikkola, the saintess in training who hails from a barony in the countryside, arrived at the Royal Academy. 

The school is in turmoil. 

The boys, the sons of aristocrats, are at the mercy of Aini's innocent, natural cuteness, while the girls are angry at her disregard for the manners of the aristocracy. In the midst of all this, there were three daughters who were dubbed the villainesses, in reference to a popular story. Seraphina, the crown prince's fiancée and the daughter of an upright marquise. Sandra, the noble daughter of a viscount who made their wealth from commerce. Bernardetta, the brilliant daughter of the current Prime Minister's who is a marquise. 

When a sense of disquiet begins to grow in the school, these women finally stand up! To correct Aini's mistakes and to follow their own hearts.

This is a record of the battle between the three villainesses and the saintly apprentices, a battle for the way of life of women.

title: Toratsuki-Kaicho, Teawase Negaimasu!!
genre: Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Aki Yukura
synopsis: Saruta Torasuke, an idiot who loves to fight, senses the hidden strength of student council president Fujishiro Senju, and challenges him to a match. In the midst of their fight, something changes in Fujishiro...?

title: I Was Forced by the System to Become a Villain
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Youge Suotuosi
synopsis:
Lin Bei, who traveled through time and became the second senior brother of Lingxi Peak of the Qingyun Sect, determined to be a good person, but ended up getting entangled in a system that specialized in cultivating supervillains.

Lin Bei had no choice but to go against his original intention and turn into a big bad guy to compete with the countless children of destiny on the Kyushu Continent for luck and save his life.

title: Both the Same
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Mi-Ri Hwang
synopsis:
Ha Miro, a clumsy yet loveable rookie magazine editor, meets mosquito man Mo Ginam, who can become a normal [ilban] person (when together) when blood [pi] is cha.

Ha Miro, the rookie editor for a third-rate fashion magazine company receives an e-mail from rookie model Lee Jihyeons manager. With an excited heart, she excitedly sends a deposit over the phone

title: Toru Ni Taranai
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Zui Nieki
synopsis: Two university students struggling with money get inspired after watching a couple earn big money through adult content streaming. Despite not being in a relationship, they end up caught in the flow of making videos.

This series is adapted from a novel on the zhulang site. 

Lin Qinghans grandfather (her fathers father) is facing an imminent danger. His relatives disregarded the stability of Lin conglomerate and used various despicable means to inherit properties owned by him. President Qinghan was framed in the process. However, her husband, Zhang Xuan, who owns the title of Satan among the Lords of Dragon King Temple, is resolving everything one by one.

genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Kouhei Kaga
synopsis:
Bonsuke Hirano, an exceptionally ordinary high school boy, returns to his homeroom after school to pick something up, only to find the school's number-one serene beauty, Kokuru Goinda, fidgeting around in his desk...

"Huh? Does she...like me? Wait, maybe not?"

title: Seishun Buta Yarou Wa Yumemiru Shoujo No Yume Wo Minai
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Errant
synopsis: Just before summer vacation starts, Makinohara Shouko, a middle school second year student, met a high school student named Azusagawa Sakuta. Sakuta gave Shouko a desire to live, then...

title: The Exiled Heavy Knight Knows How to Game the System
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Lee Brocco
synopsis:
"You good-for-nothing bastard. You are the son of a Sword Saint, yet you dare pull such a defective Class?!"

During the?Divine Blessing Ceremony?of the 15-year-old Elma who came from a lineage of Sword Saints, he had manifested a commonly deemed defective class known as the Heavy Knight. He had been deprived of his position as the next head of the Edvan Household and was then exiled. The Heavy Knight class had an unbalanced status and useless skills, to top it off, it was even said to be a class cowardly and indolent people have.

But, Elma knew betterthat this world was the world of the game he had used to play beforeand that the Heavy Knight class was the strongest class to exist. Elma made full use of the knowledge he had in his previous life and began his efficient walkthrough of the world he was reincarnated into.

title: Tower Dungeon
genre: Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Fantasy
author: Tsutomu Nihei
synopsis:
The setting is a certain kingdom. In order to save the kidnapped princess of the kingdom, the Kingsguard squadron challenges the "Dragon Tower", a gigantic structure floating in the middle of the sky, but they are blocked by powerful demons. A provocation is made by a neighboring village to replenish the injured personnel, and when a young man is sent to the tower, the wheel of fate begins to turn.
___

title: Tacit
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Zombies, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Dazzi Kim
synopsis:
The world that fell due to pollutants that release the zombie virus and the people who adjusted to that place.
A village called 'Amina' that had great resources and was where professor 'Simon' lived.
However, the people of 'Amina' fall into despair after 'Simon' disappears.
And 'Ruby' who was born in 'Amina'.
Incidents that had been buried slowly start to reappear because of her...

title: Pokémon Special Scarlet & Violet
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Sports, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Hidenori Kusaka
synopsis: Violet, the prince of speed who drives Miraidon, runs through the Paldea region in search of the secret spice to regain the ability of Miraidon! A showdown with the Nushi Pokemon! Operation Stardust! And the other main character...!?

title: Zense Wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Aruto
synopsis:
He was called a Sword Emperor who lived for the sword and died by the sword. And his end was a tragedy. 

However, by strange coincidence, he was reincarnated as the third prince in a country. He was enjoying his lazy lifestyle away from swords and heroism. As a consequence, people began referring to him as Prince Trash.

He never cared about his derogatory name until one day, he encounters someone who gets the wheel of fate to move in motion.

title: The Villainess Doesn'T Need a New Husband!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Do-Gyeom Nam
synopsis:
What kind of dogs are there?

"The person who will be my groom is already dead!"

It's unfair that she died so absurdly, but she possessed the villain. And that, of course, while holding a 'soul wedding'! All he has is a sunfish body and a run-down mansion.

No, the dead groom isn't rich, but he even has debts? It's the original, it's Nabal, and I have to find my way of life first!

Meanwhile, the Duke of Fitzren came to visit her, claiming to be a close friend of her late husband. If this man touches the hearts of modern people by making warm bath water and iced americano, I think he can be a good shield to overcome this harsh world...

"Please be my fake mistress!"

title: I Ran Away and Got Married
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Studio Neulbom
synopsis:
Youre mine.

When Raphia met her demise after having been used and thrown away by her benefactor, Yuri, she went back nine years in the past.

Im not going to relive that hell!

Running away from her benefactor, she went to Kasein Soleia, Yuris archnemesis, and signed a new sponsorship contract with him.

I shall kill every single person you despise, Milord.

The necessary role happens to be open, and you might just be the right person for it.

Young Duke. This is a sponsorship contract, right? But why . . . why are we getting married?

===

Throughout the time I wont be by your side . . . I will think of nothing but your small, cute head.

That low voice sent shivers down her spine.

I cant believe youre leaving. Ill just . . .

Kasein looked at her sharply as if he was daring her to continue making up excuses.

You have to answer well, brat. Depending on what you say, all the wagon and shoe craftsmen of the Empire might lose their livelihood.

Despite his harsh words, Kaseins touch was gentle. He couldnt take his eyes off of Raphia, who strangely grew more beautiful by the day.

---

- Social Media: [@witch\_of\_tc](https://twitter.com/witch_of_tc)

title: Goblin Slayer Gaiden: Year One
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Kento Sakaeda
synopsis: A prequel series revealing Goblin Slayer's past and the events that led him to become an adventurer with the sole purpose of exterminating all goblins from the world.

title: Kare to Kanojo No Sentaku
genre: Genderswap, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Hiroki Ohara
synopsis:
A new relationship begins after a seven year reunion!  
  
After being separated for seven years between Hokkaido and Tokyo, a young man waits at the airport to reunite with his best friend. However, what arrives instead is a message from his best friend saying he will be late, and a mysterious beauty! The ever-spirited mangaka, Hiroki Ohara, makes his debut on Comic Newtype!

title: Yowamushi Pedal - Spare Bike
genre: Comedy, Sports, Drama
author: Wataru Watanabe
synopsis: These are the recollections of a group of men who bet everything on their bicycles. The central pillars of their respective teams, the 3rd years. New stories revealing their pasts is about to begin!!

title: A Trace of You
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Full Color, Tragedy
author: AG
synopsis: After a terrible fire all but consumes Sihoos home, his life has finally gone back to normal excepthe has no memories. An amnesiac, he cant remember much beyond his own name and the café he works at. Then, one day, his former classmate Yesung Min walks in and helps Sihoo remember everything that ever mattered: they were in love. From the ashes of his life, comes an old flame.

title: Nito No Taidana Isekai Shoukougun ~Saijaku Shoku "Healer" Nano Ni Saikyou Wa Cheat Desu Ka?~
genre: Action, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Romero Jouryuu
synopsis: Hidako Masamune is a high school student who suffers from continuous bullying by his classmates. Becoming tired of it all, he decides to commit suicide, but instead he is transported to another world along with all his classmates. When they arrive, they find that they now possess amazing abilities but he was only granted the status of a "healer," the weakest skill of all. The king decides to get rid of him by transporting him to another faraway place, but not before Hidako swears revenge against the king, the kingdom, and all of his classmates.

genre: Psychological, Comedy, Anthology, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

title: Kusuriya No Hitorigoto
genre: Award Winning, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Medical, Slice of Life, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Erika Ikeda
synopsis: Maomao, a young woman trained in the art of herbal medicine, is forced to work as a lowly servant in the inner palace. Though she yearns for life outside its perfumed halls, she isnt long for a life of drudgery! Using her wits to break a curse afflicting the imperial heirs, Maomao attracts the attentions of the handsome eunuch Jinshi and is promoted to attendant food taster. But Jinshi has other plans for the erstwhile apothecary, and soon Maomao is back to brewing potions andsolving mysteries?!

title: Touch
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Yamawomi
synopsis:
Tatsuya Uesugi, the older brother who has no relationship with the word "hard work," and Kazuya Uesugi, the younger brother who tries his hardest in everything he does. 

They are twin brothers. They have known Minami Asakura, the only daughter of the neighboring coffee shop "Minamikaze" since childhood. You can't take your eyes off the "youth" of these three...!


---

- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2008)

title: Rakujitsu No Pathos
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama
author: Tsuyatsuya
synopsis:
What happens when next door to upcoming mangaka Fujiwara moves Yuuki, who was his teacher back in high school and first crush?  
  
Yuuki, now a married woman, is starting a new life in the city, however her husband is always away on business trips. She finds comfort in the company of her former student, but what she doesn't realize is that Fujiwara can listen to everything happening in her apartment through the building's thin walls

title: Enoch
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: S
synopsis: Chimeras are people that have been infused with animal DNA in order to give them superpowers and abilities, however society doesnt favor them so they live in fear and rejection. Our main character, code name 01, works as a mercenary who happens upon an old acquaintance. Hes then given a job to protect and transport Enoch, a girl who is sought out to be the perfect material, to the borders of Canada.

title: White Cat Legend
genre: Historical, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Crime, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: RC
synopsis: This amusing and charming story happened in 7th century ,when the first and only female monarch of ancient China got the throne. We follow the daily life of Chen Shi, a kind young man who came to the capital city Luoyang to look for his brother. To find him, he went to the Dali Court (a government institute like nowadays High Court of Justice). One thing led to another, he eventually became a secretary for Li Bing, a senior official with the appearance of a white cat.

title: Fantasy Bishoujo Juniku Ojisan to
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Yuu Tsurusaki
synopsis:
Hinata Tachibana, a beleaguered 32-year-old office worker, and his handsome best friend Tsukasa Jinguuji were summoned to another world by a naked goddess. However, because of the goddess's mischief, Tachibana was turned into a peerless beautiful girl?! To get back his body, he has to go on a journey with his best friend to defeat the demon king!!   
  
However... will they be able to keep their hands off each other!?  
  
"An older man that became a beautiful girl" and "A handsome older man"! Let the madness-filled another world journey rom-com begin!!

title: Kao Dake Yoi Classmate Ga Yatara to Guigui Kuru Yuri No Hanashi

author: Ryou Noshiro
synopsis: Not found

title: Powerful Confession
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Cha-Yang Son
synopsis: Not found

title: Run Wild
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Zuo Er Cong Yue
synopsis:
I wish to have you by my left shoulder, with a smile by my right I wish to run freely in your eyes I wish for one look to last a lifetime.   
  
Jiang Cheng, an accomplished student, was "exiled" to the steel mill where his biological father worked. This strange, foreign environment, coupled with his rather vulgar biological father, caused Jiang Cheng to feel quite depressed that is, until one day, he met Gu Fei, the "Delinquent of the Steel Mill", by chance. Thus begins the story of Jiang Cheng and Gu Fei, a story of salvation and hope

(by Jupiter Scanlations)

title: Shinitagari No Fukushuusha
genre: Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Tragedy
author: Misaki Amane
synopsis:
A high school girl, Shizuku, who despairs of living after being bullied at school and sexually abused at home, attempts to commit suicide at a deserted shrine, where she is cursed with immortality by an eerie raven. 

Unable to even die, Shizuku decides to use her immortal body to inflict deathly retribution on her tormentors.

 A revenge drama about a high school girl with a different power in her hands!

title: Gachaman
genre: Action, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Supernatural
author: Yakiimo Handsome Saitou
synopsis: One day, high schooler Kaito Kuji lost his memory. When he came to, he found the word "Thank you" written on his chest above a dial for a capsule toy vending machine. It's a mysterious capsule toy vending machine, which contains his lost memories and also some special supernatural abilities. But in order for him to turn the dial, he has to have someone tell him, "Thank you"...?!! So he needs to gather people's gratitude and use the toy capsule machine to fight!!

title: Doku Doku Mori Mori
genre: Thriller, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Noboru Segawa
synopsis: In the deep, deep forest. a Tamagotake mushroom fairy who has been left alone in the world after her parents were killed is chasing after the culprit, a Tsukiyotake, to take revenge on him. In the Sea of Trees, where life and death intersect, can the young Tamago take revenge on the hated Tsukiyo? An unprecedented mushroom suspense begins.

title: Shitto Wa Ai Wo Kumoraseru
genre: Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Music
author: Eiji Nagisa
synopsis:
Falling in love, I didnt expect it would only take an instant. A gifted but burned out pianist x a late blooming genius. A progressive love story about being bound by an inferiority complex!

Kirino feels that his talent for piano is at its limit. On the other hand, his junior, Takase, who is naive and loved by everyone, is blossoming with talent. Kirino feels annoyed by Takases admiration for him and views him as a thorn in his side. However, Takase doesnt even hesitate when he tells Kirino, Senpai is my everything

Kirino doesnt trust Takase, and uses his longing for him to play with his feelings, wanting to make him feel troubled. Youre too shy to even look at me when Im by your side, its so cute how you look like a puppy when youre trembling with expectation.

Feeling complacent because of Takases affection, Kirino gradually starts to depend on him!?

title: Road to Kingdom
genre: Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation
author: Yumizu Kai
synopsis:
This is the story of a young slave gladiator in an underground arena. He doesnt know about his past or how he got to where he is, only that his name is Aegir, and that he is strong.  
  
One day he kills the boss and escapes the arena, joining a band of mercenaries as a new recruit. During one mission, they encounter the vampire, Lucy, who slaughters the band with her inhuman strength. After learning that Aegir only knows how to kill, Lucy lets him stay at her house, educating and taking care of him.  
  
Two years pass, and on the day of Aegirs departure, they both exchange a promise that if Aegir becomes a king and owns the land of Erg forest, he can come and take her as his woman. Making this his life goal, Aegir set out on a journey to become a hero, a king, and found his own kingdom.

title: Eighteen'S Bed
genre: Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Cheong-Dam
synopsis: Not found

title: Kamen Rider Amazon
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Survival, Superhero, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Horror, Adaptation
author: Shoutarou Ishinomori
synopsis:
Amazon, a wild youth in the jungle, is remodeled by the ancient Inca science. With the "Bracelet of Gigi," the key that opens the door to the hidden treasure, on his arm, he protects the treasured ordnance and weaponry, as well as the future of mankind! 

The enemy is Gorgoth, a ten-faced demon who plans to conquer the world with the "Bracelet of Gaga," an opposing key!

title: Tsubanakasu Haru
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Supernatural
author: Yagi Migino
synopsis: Chiaki has finally found something to look forward to in life-His regular visits to the flower vendor who opens shop once in a few months. When delivering mail to his house, he accidentally stumbles upon his biggest secret, which changes their relationship and gets Chiaki a chance to get closer to Mei.

title: Please Give Me Your Blood, I Will Serve You in Gratitude
genre: Romance, Comedy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Juugoya
synopsis:
A young man rescues a young vampire girl who has fallen ill; she tries to give her all to repay him for his blood, but she's too clumsy to do so. A vampire rom-com that depicts a warm life among different species where no one is left behind or abandoned!

A long-awaited new series by the author of "Demon Mother: My Son is so Cute, I Just Can't Help Myself!"

title: Book of Yaoguai: Tale of the Nine-Tailed Fox
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Tang Ren Jia
synopsis: The Yang Eye of this life is a young a literary genius and a high-ranking member of the Imperial court. Facing hardships, one day he meets a fox spirit, starting a wonderful journey. In this life, can the two achieve happiness?...

title: Is a Mother in Her 30S Like Me Alright?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Nekomattan
synopsis: A 32-year-old single mother is told by her neighbor, a university student around 20, that he likes her. Thing is he's not particularly *shy* about why he likes her.

title: The Basketball Girl
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Action, Crime, Sports, Mafia, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Meng Hua Ge
synopsis: The unknown interior designer, Hans Duan (22 years old), was involved in a criminal dispute as he designed the house for one of the members in that group. Unfortunately, he was persecuted as a murderer due to the case and sentenced to death. In the prison, he met a scientist from the government (Code name No.73) who asked him to take part in a human experiment. But the experiment failed and Hans died. His body was buried in a dump in the city. However, the experimental medicine left in his body leads to gene mutation. Hans is revived and changed into a female. What will happen on him (her)?

title: D.Gray-Man
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Katsura Hoshino
synopsis:
Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect thema weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence."  
  
After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Orderan organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earlto become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.

title: The Emperor Is a Pervert!
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Isekai, Drama, Full Color
author: Tie Tou Hua
synopsis:
I became a eunuch as soon as I transmigrated? Fine, a eunuch it is, I'll climb my way up to the top and find a way to wear modern clothes and become a normal man again. My mind is a tangled mess, and I'm going crazy....suddenly, someone interrupts my hopes and dreams: "Mister Xie, tonight the Emperor will sleep with you."

 "......Nani?!"

title: The Wolf'S Gratitude
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Slice of Life
author: Ji Xiang Cha
synopsis:
Lu Fei (ex-gangster) wants to free himself from his identity of housekeeper and maid but lawyer, Yang Xiyuan is determined to stop him..It was 1 years ago Yang saved Lu Fei from a dangerous situation related to gang turf war since then as a sigh of gratitude he has been working as his live-in maidbut what will happen when Lu Fei express to return back to his previous lifestyle..??  
  
This is a story about a famous underworld gangster who become an unconventional housekeeper of a lawyer.

title: Trinity Seven
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Kenji Saitou
synopsis: Everyday is a normal day in the small town where Kasuga Arata lives. However, everything changed on the day of the Black Sun, and following it, a magician appears before him. The Black Sun caused the Breakdown Phenomenon which destroyed the town where he lives. Because of this, his normal life was artificially reconstructed by a Grimoire that his childhood friend had left. Just what is the purpose of the magician coming to the town? What will he do with the Grimoire's keepsake?

title: Nibiiro No Chameleon
genre: Action, Crime, Mafia, Crossdressing, Mystery
author: Akira Kasugai
synopsis: During the Japanese Asset Price Bubble, everyone, men or women, young or old, lived in a world that was filled with frenzy. In the air where strength overruns weakness, there is a "woman" who tries to avenge her past. But, there's a twist with this "woman". One is that she was a cold killer. Second is that this "woman" is actually a man.

title: I Only Want to Beat You
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Amadoji
synopsis: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?

title: E, Shanai System Subete Wan'Ope Shiteiru Watashi Wo Kaiko Desu Ka?
genre: Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Io
synopsis: Satou Ai who has been handling the company's in-house system as a one-man show, has received a notice of dismissal upon a change in president. After the dismissal, Ai was alone in deep sorrows until she stumbled upon Suzuki Kenta. Kenta invites her to join his startup company. The company was something he started to get close to others with the name, "True programmer's cram school" with Ai's unconventional, daring and sometimes wild lectures, the student started to look forward to the lessons.

title: Shin Devilman
genre: Thriller, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Superhero, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Gou Nagai
synopsis:
The story of Shin Devilman is supposed to take place between the second and third volume of the original Devilman series. Here we have Akira and Ryo who mysteriously manage to travel in time. Where they discover the have been sent back to dispatch demons that are invading history to end humanity. They visit several time periods including pre-World War Vienna, ancient Greece, France during the Hundred Years' War, Rococo period France, and wild west America. The end of this series also includes a new epilogue for the Devilman series.

* *NOTE: The US official release of Devilman is based on a version that has both the main Devilman manga and Shin Devilman.*

title: Tonikaku Kawaii
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Kenjirou Hata
synopsis:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.

title: Moonlight Act
genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy
author: Kazuhiro Fujita
synopsis:
Gekko Iwasaki, a high-school student, is selected as executor of "Moonlight Ordinance" and fights against the residents. In this fairy tale, there is a world which is strangely affected by blue moonlight once in dozens of years. "Moonlight Ordinance" is a rule to restore the world to its former condition.   
  
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ufujitakazuhiro?lang=ja)

title: Kaisha to Shiseikatsu: on to Off
genre: Romance, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Shinnosuke Kanazawa
synopsis:
Working people have company (on) and private lives (off). 

Meet two office workers whose professional lives "on" the clock and private lives when theyre "off" couldn't be more different. He dresses like a lolita. She dresses like a punk. 

When their contrasting "on" and "off" modes collide, it inevitably leads to heart-pounding antics!

---

A serialization of the [Twitter series](https://mangadex.org/title/0fa5d834-fdab-4ac4-b3c9-821f1580f991/company-and-private-life) about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

title: Under the Oak Tree
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Namu
synopsis:
The daughter of a duke, the stuttering Maximilian, married a knight of lowly status at her fathers coercion. After their first night, her husband departed for an expedition without another word. He came back three years later, this time as a famous knight in the whole continent. How will Maximilian face him on his return?

"The more I think of you, the more lonely and lonely I become. I don't know why I can't quit even though it's so painful."

---
A flawless love story of the flawed. Stuttering lady Maximilian is forced into a marriage with Sir Riftan, but he leaves on a campaign after their wedding night. Three years later, he triumphantly returns, ready to cherish her. As life with her husband finally begins, she only has one question  does she deserve this love and happiness?

---
**Note:** Although the novel is R19, the webtoon is R15.

---
[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/4362000001)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://manta.net/series/1255)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / ??](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9790/)
