title: Hoshokusha Kei Mahou Shoujo
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Demons, Magical Girls, Sexual Violence, Magic, Gore, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Maru Tomoyuki
synopsis:
Humanity finds itself on the brink of extinction due to the emergence of the Incubi, otherworldly monsters that capture humans to use as breeding material, and the only ones that can stand against these enemies are the Witches, magical girls given powers by supernatural beings. High schooler Renka Azuma is one such girl; her alter ego is Silver Lotus, a magical girl controlling countless insects to fight the Incubi day after day.

On a certain day, Silver Lotus rescues a fellow Witch, a novice named Azure Nova, from an Incubi attack. This meeting with this self-proclaimed fan of hers is an encounter that introduces a change to Silver Lotuss otherwise solitary daily life?! Here begins a dark fantasy about an unorthodox magical girl who commands insects to devour monsters!

title: Onnamaou-Sama Wa Yuusha-Kun Wo Taosenai.
genre: Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Shota, Slice of Life
author: Shun Kasuga
synopsis:
Demon Queen Abyss is worried She's not able to defeat the Hero, considered the mortal enemy of the demons. This Hero is still an inexperienced young manhe should be easy to defeat!  However, the problem is that he, not knowing Abyss's true identity, considers her his Master and has become very fond of her!?
___
**Producer & Supervisor:** [studioHEADLINE](https://mangadex.org/author/657c3108-5817-4669-a957-a9c7ec5080ee/studio-headline)

title: Dinosaurs Sanctuary
genre: Sci-Fi, Animals, Slice of Life
author: Itaru Kinoshita
synopsis: In 1946, someone discovered an island where dinosaurs had survived into the present. Through breeding and genetic manipulation, humans managed to increase their population and supercharge their popularity! Until, well... the unfortunate accident, when people's attitudes soured on the idea of visiting dinosaurs. This story follows a rookie zookeeper who is newly hired at Enoshima Dinoland, a struggling dinosaur sanctuary, and the fascinating creatures who need specialized love and care!

title: Bones
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Crime, Adventure, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Geon Lee
synopsis:
Kang Jihyoung,wanted to become a hunter for his mother.

However, his bullies put his mother into a vegetative state. He tried to take revenge but was thoroughly crushed and trapped...

The boy who lost everything became a beast and began his hunt.

title: Yuusha-Kun Wa Tabidatenai
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy
author: Ochi R
synopsis: The Hero is expected by God and the People to defeat the Demon King!! And now its time to set out!! ...But before he can he is tempted by a thick sexy bunny girl! At the mercy of the Bunny girl's wiles he is unable to depart... Furthermore a Priest of the church charms him with her night skills... Will the Hero ever be able to set out on his journey?

title: World Teacher  Other World Style Education & Agent
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Neko Kouichi
synopsis:
A man who was once called the worlds strongest agent ended up becoming a teacher after his retirement, to train a new generation of agents. After many years of training his disciples, he was killed at the age of 60 by a secret organizations ruse and was reincarnated in another world with his memories intact. Though he was surprised by the existence of magic and the strange species in that world, he quickly adapted to his condition as a newborn and took advantage of it. He acquired special magic and gained a massive amount of strength thanks to his rigorous discipline, in order to reach his goal: Resume his career as a teacher which he left halfway through in his previous life.  
  
This is the story of a man, who, based on the memories and the experiences of his previous life, became a teacher who travels through the world with his students.  
  
Adaptation of a Light Novel.  
  


---

title: Ss
genre: Action, Sports
author: Jun Mayama
synopsis: The story revolves around Daibutsu, a middle aged former rally driver who lives with his wife Kumiko and their son. Daibutsu is a former rally driver, who used to participate in the All Japan Rally Championship. Daibutsu proceeded to go to his garage to rebuild his, Mitsubishi Starion 4WD, named Jackie, a Group B rally car which was banned at the end of the 1986 season. He then proceeds to sets his return to racing by challenging people on the street with his car.

title: Neko No Inai Isekai Ni Neko Ga Tensei Shichatta Ohanashi
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Ema Tooyama
synopsis: A story about a cat reincarnated in a different world where there are no cats.

title: Nejimaki Kagyu
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, Drama, School Life, Horror
author: Atsushi Nakayama
synopsis:
Negizawa Kamo and Kagyuu Jyuubee; two childhood friends who made a fated promise to each other are once again reunited as Kagyuu reaffirms her dedication to defending Kamo's dream, and her own, with the monstrous power of her martial arts. However, they soon discover that force alone is not enough, it's character, individuality, that rules this school and pits the students against each other in a brutal contest of dueling personalities vying for supremacy. Because in this school, those with the superior strength, the superior character, are king, and those whose individualities are overwhelmed are discarded. Join Kagyuu, Kamo, and their companions as they struggle to overcome the hidden evils lurking within this school, and discover the voice of each other's hearts and true desires.  
  
Do not edit genre to Shounen, series serialized in a seinen magazine (Weekly Young Jump)

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%AD%E3%81%98%E3%81%BE%E3%81%8D%E3%82%AB%E3%82%AE%E3%83%A5%E3%83%BC)

title: Blade of the Immortal
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ninja, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Military, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Police, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Hiroaki Samura
synopsis:
"To end his eternal suffering, he must slay one thousand enemies!" Manji, a ronin warrior of feudal Japan, has been cursed with immortality. To rid himself of this curse and end his life of misery, he must slay one thousand evil men! His quest begins when a young girl seeks his help in taking revenge on her parents' killers and his quest won't end until the blood of a thousand has spilled!  

[Official English](https://digital.darkhorse.com/series/373/blade-of-the-immortal)
 
--- 
- **Won the 1st Japan Media Arts Award Division Excellence Prize**

---
  
AnimeNewsNetwork Links:  
[Anime](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=9691)  
[Live-Action Movie](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18861)

title: Seventh
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Yomu Mishima
synopsis:
Lyle Walt is a young noble boy and heir looking forward to the day he can inherit his familys territory. Except around when he was 10 year old, his parents started neglecting him more and more in favour of his little sister, Ceres.

On his fifteenth birthday, he is challenged to a duel by his sister to see who will inherit the household and horribly loses, being cast out of his family. Afterwards, he gets treated by the family groundskeepers and receives the family heirloom Gem from him that Lyles grandfather had entrusted to him. From there, he begins an aimless journey with his childhood friend and former fiancée, Novem, and the Gem-turned-Jewel that houses the memories, personalities, and Skills of seven of his ancestors.

title: Centaurs
genre: Historical, Action, Drama, Fantasy
author: Ryou Sumiyoshi
synopsis:
A centaur race, known as Jimba, have lived in Japan since ancient times. However, humans regard them as tools of war and snatch away their dignity.   
  
During the Sengoku period, a samurai Jimba named Matsukaze, known as the redheaded rock tiger, is caught while protecting his son. He is traded to a feudal lord, and taken to a feudal lord. There he meets another centaur, named Kohibari, whose village was burnt down as a child. He is a tame centaur, and had his arms amputated when he was captured. With his help, Matsukaze escapes with Kohibari.
___
**Official English Volumes:** [ABLAZE](https://www.ablaze.net/products?c=83)

title: Chounin a Wa Akuyaku Reijou Wo Doushitemo Sukuitai
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kotaro Isshiki
synopsis:
Allen, an eight-year-old boy from a poor family in the royal capital, is living a poor but happy life together with his mother. One day, however, memories of his previous life suddenly come back to him and he remembers that he is in an dating sim game and that the capital will be destroyed by war if he doesnt do something about it. If this continues, both he and his mother will be killed! 

With a sense of urgency, he decides to rise to the occasion in order to save his precious mothers life and save his favorite character, the villainous young lady Anastasia, the only girl he liked in the game, from her all too tragic and ruinous end.

This is the story of a man who isnt even a character in the game, but who strives with his steely determination and uses all the knowledge he has to turn overcome fate!

title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel
genre: Time Travel, Action, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Military, Gore, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Takafumi Adachi
synopsis:
This story takes place in a world made up of floating islands of various sizes, where two types of races, "Caninu" and "Felineko" live.

Malt, a caninu boy, lives peacefully with his younger sister Mei on their grandparents' farm in the remote village of Petit Mona. One day, their village is suddenly attacked by the Berman Empire, and is burnt to the ground overnight. "How could something like this happen..." Malt and his friends were confused, then a mysterious voice called out from the radio...! ?

A group of children caught in the flames of war ride the mysterious giant tank ``Taranis'' and fight to save their families!

title: Nagisa No Shark Maid
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Teruya
synopsis:
Wataru is a lonely boy who lost his parents in an accident. For some reason, there is one maidher name is Kosame, and she has been by his side since he was little. Yes, she never changed... Set in a unique coastal fishing village with rows of houses called "boathouses," a love story of eternal love begins! (MTL)

---
**Links:**  
- Alternative Official Raw - [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM05203826010000_68) and [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62407)

title: R15+ Ja Dame Desuka?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Todoroki Kishitani
synopsis: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she's a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it's not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie...?

title: Shut Hell
genre: Award Winning, Time Travel, Genderswap, Traditional Games, Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Yuu Itou
synopsis:
Beginning of the 13th century, Western Xia state in Chinese mainland. 
In those days existed a woman warrior named Shut Hell, the Evil One, feared even by the Mongols, reputed the strongest army in history. 
At first she was just a normal Tangut soldier, but after coming close to death so many times she found a superhuman strength in herself. 
On the other side Yurul, a young Mongol prince, is fascinated by the Tangut, his enemies' writing script, and is worried for their future
Centuries later a Japanese high school student named Shudo is haunted by a vivid dream of a battlefield...
Is there some sort of bound between these completely different lives ? Will they manage to overcome the obstacles surrounding them ?


- **2012 Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize (New Creator) winner**

title: Blood-Crawling Princess of a Ruined Country
genre: Survival, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
author: Yuki Azuma
synopsis: I'll take back my life. A cruel and beautiful revenge story of a princess who became a prostitute. Princess Evita lived happily in a small country. However, she was attacked by a neighboring country, her land taken away, and her family was brutally killed. The surviving Evita was sold to a brothel and lived as a prostitute. In the middle off all this, a man from the royal family that she hates appears as a customer...

title: Akuyaku Reijou No Tsuihougo!
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Tsumuji Yoshimura
synopsis: Event planner Yuka Sawatanis life ended as the result of overwork. Reborn into an Otome game with her memory intact, she becomes the villainess Elizabeth. She tries to resist her fate, but at the ending of the game, she is promptly banished.

title: Sazanamimachi To, Hazama No Ko
genre: Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Narano
synopsis: A young woman visits a seaside town. Even though it's her first time there, everything seems strangely nostalgic. Somehow she ends up working at an empty little shop serving the local customers. But what will she discover in this strange town that carries the scent of the sea ?

title: Fashion Fade
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Tomoko Naka
synopsis: After growing up in Africa, Fade moves to France to live with her uncle, but her headstrong personality means they cannot get along. However, she soon becomes involved in the fashion industry, making various friends and enemies along the way to success!

title: Magnolia Waltz
genre: Historical, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Tragedy
author: Chiho Saitou
synopsis: The sequel to Waltz wa Shiroi Dress de. You will see how the lives of Koto, Sajit and Masaomi go on. (Source: MU)

title: Futsuu No Koitte Nani?
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Hana Ikuta
synopsis:
**Is my "red string of fate" connected to you?**

The high school first year "me" that fell in love at first sight at the school entrance ceremony. But that love was not normal...
A yuri story depicted from the point of view of three high school girls.

title: 7-Kakan Gentei Kanojo
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Gyaru
author: Suika Amazaki
synopsis:
A yuri romantic comedy centered on a temporary relationship between a gal and an honor student. 

The story begins when Manatsu, a gal who is on the verge of repeating a grade, starts receiving tutoring from Sumie, an honor student. Manatsu loves shoujo manga and romantic gossip but has the vague that having a boyfriend somehow doesn't fit her. 

When she casually brings this up, Sumie suggests, "Why not try starting with just the form?" and offers "How about dating me for just 7 days?"

title: Gal Nipa-Chan Wa Semararetai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Gyaru
author: KANALINA
synopsis: The popular teen model niPA, aka Asahino Futaba, is strong willed and independent, but the plain guy who is her seatmate refuses to budge before her... "Damn that four-eyed loser, how dare he tell me off!". However, at the same time, remembering that makes her feel somehow strange. Her fingers slip beneath her skirt as if by reflex and while thinking about getting assaulted by that disgusting man, she pleasures herself against her better judgment while she is brought to climax in her fantasies!?

title: Mix
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Jin Takemiya
synopsis:
Adachi's second serialization in Gessan Shounen Sunday, follows the story of three siblings, students of Meisei Middle School. Takes place 26 years after Adachi's biggest title, Touch.  
  
Because of the legend left by Tatsuya Uesugi, Meisei Academy High School was well-known for their strong baseball team. But 26 years after their glory, the team has not been able to keep their record and has since lost their fame.  
  
Two stepbrothers, Souichirou and Touma Tachibana, aim to revive of the once-strong Meisei Academy baseball team and enter the National High School Baseball Championship.  
  
(Source: MAL, edited)

title: The White Mage Who Was Banished From the Hero'S Party Is Picked up by an S Rank Adventurer: This White Mage Is Too Out of the Ordinary!
genre: Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Wasabi Mukuno
synopsis: One day, Lloyd, a white mage, is banished from the heros party. Lloyd, who has lost his job, happens to accompany an S-rank party on a quest by chance. At that time, no one knew that the heros party would collapse and Lloyd would gain fame - yet. This is the story of an extraordinary support magic-user who thinks he is normal, becomes an adventurer, while he is unaware of how he eventually becomes peerless.

title: Kanojo No Tomodachi
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life
author: Jyura
synopsis: He got a cute girlfriend who was the first in his life, but her friend tempted him with a body that was lewder than her... What would you do if your girlfriend's friend pressed you like this?

title: Shihai Shoujo Kubaru-Chan
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life
author: Sushi Kui Tarou
synopsis:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, Give me your life.

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.

title: No\Name
genre: Action, Mystery
author: Rafa? Jaki
synopsis: In a world where peoples' names grant them superhuman powers... Two agents from the Nordic Naming Bureau (NNB), an agency specialized in investigating crimes committed by "Namers", handle the case of a man and his missing wife and son. Things take a turn, however, when the duo come face to face with the man, who wishes to give his son the same name as himself...

title: Hatsukoi Losstime
genre: Sci-Fi, Romance, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Nanora
synopsis: Koji Aiba, who had been living a school life unrelated to girls, suddenly encounters a mysterious phenomenon called "Lost Time" where time stops for one hour a day. Takashi, who is trying to regain his youth in such a static world, meets Tokine Shinomiya, a girl with amber eyes who can also move in the stopped time. In a world where only the two of them can move, they gradually grow closer and closer, and eventually his feelings for Tokine turn into his first love. However, she seems to be harboring a big secret that blocks her feelings.

title: The Return of Elena the Knight
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Chen-Yong
synopsis:
Elena, who spent her entire life as a cold-blooded female knight to avenge her family, ended up dying without claiming her revenge. When she opened her eyes she found that she went back into the past. By day she was a lady in a dress, and at night she carried a sword to change history and prevent her family's destruction.  
  
"I want to marry you, Your Highness," she said to the crown prince. She would do this to save her family.

title: Sss-Class Revival Hunter
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Neida
synopsis:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others abilities at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, hes killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now hes copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?

title: If Her Flag Breaks
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Nagian
synopsis: Hatate Souta, a young man who can see the "flags" that stand at the crossroads of life, transferred to Hatagaya Academy, a prestigious school in the metropolitan area. Not only does he meet beautiful girls in his busy school life, he even goes as far as living with them under the same roof! Surrounded by these flags, this enviable romantic comedy begins!

title: Don'T Read This
genre: Horror, Web Comic
author: Da-Gang
synopsis: There is no story to read here. (Interactive) This series contains themes regarding mental health and anxiety that may not be suitable for all readers. Viewer discretion is advised. If you or someone you know is struggling or in crisis, please reach out for help at [Crisis Text Line](http://crisistextline.org/).

title: Wicked Cupid
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Magic, School Life, Supernatural
author: Yoshihiro Togashi
synopsis: The Koinobori yakuza family's souls are expensive commodoties, a source of great pride to those of the demon world's soul bank. But when the Koinobori heir, Ryuji, is born with a pure soul engrossed with fairies and angels, it's up to Maria to become his personal cupid and reform him so that he continues the Koinobori's lascivious family line!

title: Kokou No Hito
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Sports, Philosophical, Drama, Tragedy
author: Shinichi Sakamoto
synopsis: On his first day of transferring to a new high school, a loner named Mori Buntarou, is cajoled by a classmate into climbing the school building. Despite knowing that one misstep could send him spiraling to his death, he moves forward, and upon finally reaching the top, Mori experiences a sense of fulfillment. That feeling, which seems to be telling him, "You're alive!" gives birth to an adrenaline for rock-climbing.

title: Wolf Constellation
genre: Historical, Romance, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Military, Drama, Supernatural
author: Mitsuteru Yokoyama
synopsis: This manga is partly inspired by the real-life Japanese horse bandit, Hakuro Kohinata, and depicts the tumultuous life of Kensaku Ohinata, who moved to China at a young age, was kidnapped by a group of horse bandits, but rose to prominence among their ranks and eventually grew up to unite a number of them under the name of Xiao Dongyang. Kensaku's adventurous spirit and ambition, as well as his positive, brave personality, can sometimes lead to light-hearted mischief, but as he matures into a young man, he grows to experience bouts of delusion. Regarded as one of Mitsuteru Yokoyama's most realistic and human works, this manga draws inspiration from another real-life Japanese horse bandit: Date Junnosuke, thus vividly depicting the reality of Chinese horse bandits.

title: Tonari No Neko to Koi Shirazu
genre: Animals, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Akinoko
synopsis:
Minato Senos high school life had just begun when his homeroom teacher requested his help with Nekozane, the cat-like chronic napper who sits next to him in class. Timid and socially anxious, Minato has never talked to her or even seen her face. But when he finally musters up the courage to wake Nekozane, she unexpectedly hugs him on the spot! Thus begins a sweet tale of two teens awkwardly stumbling into a new friendship, unaware that their feelings are slowly turning into something more!

(Source: Manga UP! Global)

title: Creepy Cat
genre: Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Comedy, 4-Koma, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Cotton Valent
synopsis:
Flora moves into a mysterious mansion and finds it inhabited by a strange creatureCreepy Cat!
Thus begins her strange and sometimes dangerous life with a feline roommate.
This Gothic comedy brings the chucklesand the chills!

Source: Seven Seas Entertainment

title: Lumbini
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Drama, Horror, Mystery
author: Yaksu
synopsis: A newly emerging religion with a mysterious purpose, "Ilgakgyo," and its educational facility called "Lumbini". The children of Lumbini refer to it as paradise. In this unbelievable paradise where strange events unfold, and the shocking occult thriller experienced by the protagonist "Yeongdo," who finds himself there.

title: Pseudo Harem
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Yuu Saitou
synopsis: The story of Nanakura Rin of the Drama Club, who has indisputable talent as an actress, and her senpai in the same club, Kitahama Eiji. With the power of her acting, Rin teases Eiji with a variety of personas, giving him the harem he's always dreamed of!

title: My Crazy Boyfriend
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Crime, Mafia
author: Satou
synopsis:
Please be my friend. Suzu, a young man searching for his missing brother, gets tangled up with Yakuza, but ends up being saved by Hana, a mysterious and beautiful boy. Suzu works with Hana to find his younger brother, but he almost gets drawn to the innocent looking Hana
Is this friendship? Obsession? Or maybe love?
A pure and dangerous crime love story between a clumsy young man and a handsome yakuza boy!

title: Yuusha No Haha Desu Ga, Maou-Gun No Kanbu Ni Narimashita
genre: Demons, Isekai, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Tsuduru Touya
synopsis:
I lost my husband in an accident two years ago and became a single mother, and one day I was summoned to another world with my son. The humans who summoned us called my son a hero and wanted him to fight the resurrected Demon King. Its ridiculous to have my son, who is in still his first year of junior high, fight against monsters!

Strongly opposing this, I was treated as an obstacle and left alone in a monsters den. Though I was powerless and already resigned myself to death, it was the demons, who were supposed to be enemies of humans, who saved me. As I spent time together with them, my feelings for the demons grew, but peaceful days do not last long. The only weapons I had to resist against the numerous challenges that faced me were my cooking abilities and my quick wit. 

"I wont die until I meet my son!" Laboring away with this thought in mind, I had become one of the upper echelons of the demon king's army before I knew it.

title: Higanjima - Saigo No 47 Hiai
genre: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Kouji Matsumoto
synopsis:
This is a continuation of the story of Higanjima : featuring an isolated island, inhabited by warring vampires and humans, and surrounded by aquatic demons that foil any attempts at entry or escape that are not explicitly authorised by their vampiric overlord , Miyabi.   
  
Ryousuke, his girlfriend Kazumi, and his friend Yamaoka are shipwrecked by the demons, and wash up on the shore of Higanjima. They soon experience the monstrous cruelty of the island's vampires first-hand but, luckily, Ryousuke is able to join up with the human resistance.   
  
His only desire is to leave Higanjimahowever, mainland Japan may not be safe for long either. If the vampiric threat is not eradicated in 47 days, then Miyabi's machinations will transform it into yet another vampire island!

title: Tensai Majo No Maryoku Kare
genre: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Moto Tsujishima
synopsis: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!

title: Adekan
genre: Historical, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Police, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Tsukiji Nao
synopsis: Laid-back and somewhat absent-mindedly seductive umbrella craftsman Shiro, and hot-blooded officer Kojiro, who stands against all things undisciplined, become involved in a bloody and erotic thrill-ride in an off-kilter town. This action-packed jack-of-all-trades manga will have you swooning at its sexiness and leave you more addicted than opium!

title: The Witch and the Mercenary
genre: Monsters, Action, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Makoto Miyagi
synopsis:
Ziga tall, broad-shouldered mercenaryparticipates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. "I want you to protect me," she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent!
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/witch_mercenary)

title: The Last Human
genre: Thriller, Time Travel, Action, Comedy, Survival, Zombies, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Jingqi Gongchang
synopsis: Zuo Tianchen is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died, he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!

title: Iyahaya Atami-Kun
genre: Award Winning, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Asa Tanuma
synopsis: A handsome boy, the most handsome in his school, who is constantly receiving and rejecting girls' confessions. What they don't know is that he is in love with another boy.

title: Billy Bat
genre: Historical, Psychological, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Naoki Urasawa
synopsis:
Billy Bat is a comic-in-a-comic and the real protagonist is a Japanese-American artist named Kevin Yamagata who draws Billy Bat for "Marble Comics". Shortly after they transition to the artist in his studio with his assistant, two actual detectives, looking like Laurel and Hardy in Dick Tracy era suits and trench coats, knock on the door and appropriate Kevin's room for the purpose of conducting surveillance on a room in an adjacent building. 

One of the detectives, the skinny "Laurel", sees Kevin's work and it turns out he's a Billy Bat fan. The other chubby "Hardy" detective picks up a page saying that the characters look familiar and accuses Kevin of translating an old "Jap" comic.  
As Hardy remembers the comic he thinks Kevin is ripping off, we make another Urasawaesque time jump to 1949 Tokyo

title: Akuma Nisei
genre: Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural
author: Yuki Shiba
synopsis: "My mother's body had no heart." The story of a daughter with a deformed blood who is called a "child of the devil" by her relatives.

title: I Adopted a Villainous Dad
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yunsul
synopsis:
One day I woke up and I was six years old. I had transmigrated into the main character of a tragic novel, Saint Priscilla, who walks through all sorts of thorny paths! Since Im here, I need to avoid the scheduled special misfortune and live happily with my favorite character. The final boss of the story and the villain, Melchizedek, the tyrant of the Rehel Empire, who has no blood or tears! A happy life of adopting my father and becoming a princess, with my favorite character. I also saved the male protagonist, in order to remove my fathers death flag.

If you approach my daughter, you will die.

Why does my father keep putting up death flags?

Moreover If you tamed me, you have to take responsibility.

Why is the male lead so obsessed with me? Whats going on?

---
One day, a girl awakens as 6-year-old St. Priscilla, the heroine of her most cherished novel. The catch? She is destined to suffer with an abusive adoptive family! To avoid this, she adopts her ultimate bias, the ruthless Emperor Melkiades, as her father instead. Although spending her days fangirling and redeeming her bias's tarnished name seems like a dream come true, with so many foes still lurking in the shadows, can this young saint protect Melkiades and find happiness for them both?

title: The Villain'S Daughter-In-Law
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Daero Yejeong
synopsis: Luciel, a Crystal Fairy skilled in crafting jewels from her emotions, returns to the past after a life cut short by betrayal. Armed with the knowledge of a grim future, she proposes a contract marriage to the empires most villainous family. What begins as a desperate strategy to escape her fate soon becomes an adventure filled with unexpected warmth. Can Luciel rewrite her story, or will her past come back to haunt her?

title: Aishiteru Game Wo Owarasetai
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Yuuki Doumoto
synopsis: Childhood friends who have been together since they were little. They both realize their feelings for each other, but are too close to be honest. What connects them is the "I love you game" that they have been playing since they were little. The end of their love is decided in this simple game where the winner is the one who makes the other embarrassed!

title: Vivid Monsters Chronicle
genre: Comedy, Video Games, 4-Koma
author: Kiki
synopsis: In order to achieve her goal Yumeko Makino starts the game "Vivid Monsters Chronicle." This manga follows her and her friends who she meets along the way, in game and in real life.

title: Dungeon Ga Arawarete 5-Nen, 15-Sai De Dungeon Ni Idomu Koto Ni Shita.
genre: Action, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Keita Kanou
synopsis:
Dungeons appeared in the world five years ago. Police and military are unable to enter these enigmatic spaces, and entry is permitted solely by the free will of individuals aged 15 and above. Leveling up is possible, fantasy items can be acquired, and for some, the transformation can lead to becoming astonishingly beautiful.

Yuuta Rokujou has lived a life of being bullied since his kindergarten days. Due to this, he decided not to attend Dungeon High School that everyone else went to, rather, on his fifteenth birthday, he decided to challenge a dungeon alone.

This story is about how Yuuta, under such circumstances, became stronger than anyone else, becoming one of the twelve individuals capable of moving the world, known as the Twelve Heroes.

title: Now That We Draw
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Kyuu Takahata
synopsis: Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring. The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript, and a too-close pseudo-romance for the sake of their comics begins!?

title: Beyond Blood
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Self-Published, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Baku Yumizuki
synopsis: Nicholas Abott wanted to act forever. When the mysterious and beautiful Elise Morin pulls him aside from a filming event, she grants his wish with a blood-stained kiss. But as Nico embraces his new vampiric power, can he also embrace the girl who turned him?

title: Singing the Superstar.
genre: Drama, Slice of Life, Music
author: Reiga
synopsis:
"I don't know if I want to rap. I don't have anything I want to sing about...Or anything I want to say."

Oji Yukito is a 17-year-old drug dealer living in the desperate environment of the streets of Osaka, suppressing his emotions each and every day. He lost his drug-addicted mother and his beloved sister when he was a child, leaving him an orphan. Despite his loneliness, he has a best friend who believes in him. In the midst of continuing to sell drugs, enduring beatings from his boss, and bleeding...Just what is it that lies in his heart?

title: The Perfect Plan to Avoid the Death Ending
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Spercky
synopsis: Reincarnated as Sienna Winter, a minor villain with a terminal illness, her only goal is survival. However, she accidentally awakens a sealed demon and gets trapped in a lifelong contract. But... she's already dying?!

title: Batou Shoujo
genre: Psychological, School Life
author: mebae
synopsis: One day, she verbally abused me all of a sudden and it just doesn't stop there.

title: Sakuran Bocchi
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yuu Minamoto
synopsis: Sakura, a girl who has difficulty making friends. Kayo, a girl belonging to a literature club of which she is the only member. Yuri, a girl who seems to have a kind of one-sided rivalry with Sakura. Koyuki, a girl with a rather quiet character. These girls with totally different personalities unexpectedly cross paths when all four join their school's literature club!

title: Drunk Bullet
genre: Historical, Action, Crime, Cooking
author: Yanagi Takakuchi
synopsis: After surviving World War I, Gary, a liquor-loving ex-serviceman, finally makes his way home. To his shock, Prohibition has post-war America in a chokehold! The curtains open on Gary's action-packed quest for a sweet, shining glass of booze!

title: Asoko De Hataraku Musubu-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Taishi Mori
synopsis: Sagami Gorou works in sales at Shounan Rubber Industries Co., Ltd. He is secretly harboring feelings for Musubu, a girl working in the company's integrated development department. And what this lovely young scientist is researching day and night are actually

title: Kaze No Iro Made Oboeteru
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Kazari
synopsis: The first year of high school: Spring Mori, who has just entered school, learns of his classmate, Michioto, who is rumored to be the "treasure of the boys' school." Mori volunteered to ask for Michioto's contact information on behalf of a friend who was too scared to talk to him. Mori headed towards Michioto without really thinking about it, but the moment Mori sees him, it's love at first sight....

title: Demon Devourer
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yeong-Geun
synopsis:
The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragons trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

title: Tanuki Chanto Shippo
genre: Oneshot, Comedy, Monster Girls, Web Comic
author: Yasumi Holiday
synopsis: Not found

title: Classmate No Moto Idol Ga, Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin Nan Desu
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Korin-san
synopsis: Saegusa, who retired from idolry when she went to high school, is good-looking and intelligent. She is always cheerful and friendly, and is the most popular person at school. Takuya, however, knows a certain side of the highbrow Miss Saegusa. Today, too, a suspicious-looking woman in a dubious disguise appears at the convenience store where he works part-time. She is, in all likelihood, that Saegusa-san...?

title: Hanitora! Shoukan Yuusha Wo Hameru Honey Trap Hoi Mou
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Sousuke Miyashiro
synopsis: After defeating the evil god with his companions, Yuuri's adventure had come to a term. All that remained was for him to go back to the world he came from... or so he thought, but it seemed like he would have to stay here?! Now that he has to live in this world, Yuuri isn't sure what to do next and fears remaining a NEET. In the meantime, the princess Lunaria, who knows Yuuri has little interest in power or luxury, sets up a honey trap as part of her plan to make the hero never leave her country.

title: Her Hero
genre: Monsters, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Comedy, Superhero, Drama, School Life, Fantasy
author: Hwansangbaegsu
synopsis: Kang Tae-gwu is a monster, from the future, with the mission to eliminate Jung Eun-ji; the woman who grows up to be the famous Monster Slayer. In order to get close to her Tae-gwu has disguised himself as a hero named Sunbae. Will Tae-gwu be able to kill the Monster Slayer of the past and change the future?

title: The Dangers in My Heart
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Norio Sakurai
synopsis:
A fearsome psycho-thriller centering on the dark side of adolescence.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

**Awards:**
- Won the 2020 Next Manga Award in the Web category.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taishou Award.
- Won the top prize of the 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards.

title: Shoukoku No Altair Gaiden - Toukoku No Subaru
genre: Historical, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Hirokazu Kobayashi
synopsis: The curtain rises on an Oriental Reconquista spin-off of Kato Kotono's "Shoukoku no Altair", set far to the east of Rumeliana is the once peaceful and beautiful island nation of Kusanagi, which has been annexed by the larger country of Cinili and fallen into ruin.

title: Virtues of the Villainess
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Hee Jin Bae
synopsis:
Ginger Torte and Lerajie Atlanta, both noble daughters of marquesses, are lifelong enemies and rivals. When Ginger's fiancé, Kishon Mickelson, is stolen by Lerajie, Ginger decides she's had enough!

But one day, Ginger stumbles upon a strange novel - one where Lerajie is the main protagonist, and she is the villainess! She tries her best to ignore it, but when things start playing out just as written in the story, she has no choice but to rely on the novel to change her doomed future as the villainess.

"Exactly what did I do to deserve this fate?! Why did I have to become the villainess?"
 
Enter the mysterious Prince Izana, the male lead of the novel. Confined within the depths of the Templar Tower for years by King Astor, he finally sees the light of day when his father passes away. But according to the novel, he's destined to fall in love with Lerajie, leaving Ginger to wallow in her own misery!
  
"All I ever did was live life as best I could! But as if stealing my fiancé wasnt enough, now Lerajie is going to claim the male lead?! No way I'll let that happen!"

The "villainess" Ginger, who now knows Prince Izanas deepest secret (thanks to the novel), attempts to seduce him with -2% cautiousness and 200% cuteness!

---
For hopeless romantic Ginger Torte, getting engaged to the man of her dreams is a fairy tale come true. It isnt long before she realizes the gut-wrenching truth  her fiancé has been seduced by her rival! The heartbroken Ginger finds solace in a new book that recounts the tale of a young woman and a cursed prince But to her horror, the protagonist turns out to be none other than her beautiful nemesis, Lerazie! As reality unfolds according to the book, both ladies fall in love with the handsome prince at first sight. Ginger vows to steal both the spotlight and the princes heart! But, does this story harbor a sinister secret?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD%EC%9D%B4-%EB%B2%A0%ED%91%B8%EB%8A%94-%EB%AF%B8%EB%8D%95/2369), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54363470)

title: Kimi No Koto Tabeteii?
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Gore, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural
author: Nao Noshime
synopsis:
I eat the same things at the same time. Your protagonist Omi Sorasaki is a high school student who's a devotee to the ordinary. But one day, a mysterious and beautiful girl transfers over and says to him "I have something to say to you alone after school." Omi's in a panic wondering "am I getting a confession?" as the things she has to say are  
  
 and what happens after is only just the first wave of an assault on all that is ordinary! Thrust into an unusual world, a forbidden and "predacious" love comedy begins!

title: Ishigami Senki
genre: Historical, Action, Romance, Fantasy
author: Iroha Kohinata
synopsis: Mizuho territory in the northeastern part of the island nation of Hiwazu. On the wedding day of his elder brother, Lord Saku, Ukano Isaza, the younger brother of the lord, meets a woman of the "stone people" who is supposed to have been told in a fairy tale, and is forced to make a contract with her...?

title: Kodoku No Kochou Wa Donna Yume Wo Miru No Ka?
genre: Psychological, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Girls' Love, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Mimishiki
synopsis:
This world has been invaded by bugs.

With the appearance of the "Armored Bugs," mutating insect monsters that can overcome all modern weapons, humanity has been robbed of much of its living space. The only ones who can stand against such adversaries are the "Noble Butterflies," girls who harbor "Insects" that have gone through evolutions differing from the armored bugs.

One of the candidates to become a Noble Butterfly, Odamaki Ayumi, still suffers from the fact that she is unable to become one. Her best friend, who was supposed to be with her and was her object of admiration, has left her and no longer seeks her company.

Those days of despair came to an end when she was on the verge of death in a battle with armored bugs.
"Don't think that I... will die without doing anything!"

With the end near, the girl's body transformed into a butterfly one. And the flapping of her wings will bring about a revolution in the world...!

title: "Monban Yattero" to Iware Juugo Nen, Tsuttatetteru Aida Ni Ore No Maryoku Ga 9999 "Saikyou" Ni Sodattemashita
genre: Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Haritarou
synopsis:
Although Royle is blessed with a good physique, he was told that he had no talent for fighting, and was forced to work as a lonely gatekeeper for 15 years. While he is working, all he can do is fantasize about the adventure stories in which he is the main character, and his job as gatekeeper is replaced by an automatic surveillance interception magic tool and he is laid off.
Loyle is at a loss, but on the way to another town, he meets the saint Diz. After meeting her, he discovers that the strongest original magic that he always used in his delusions can in fact be used in reality
An exhilarating story about the strongest man with no communication skills and 9999 magic power who becomes an adventurer and becomes unrivaled!

title: Our Aimless Nights
genre: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mori Kou
synopsis: Cheerful, energetic high school girl Chika and shy, reserved boy Waya couldnt be more different. But they have a secret: every Wednesday after 9PM they meet outside the convenience store where Waya works. Bit by bit, under the light of the moon, a unique connection begins to blossom in this enchanting coming-of-age love story!

title: Mandarin Gypsy Cat No Roujou
genre: Sci-Fi, Drama
author: Akane Torikai
synopsis: Somewhere, in Asia, in the future... For several years now, men have hardly been born. The latter are often reduced to their role of reproductive partner. Society is built around a matriarchal system. Neither wars nor conflicts disturb the daily life and the balance. But some have decided to flee the city. They settled outside, in a slum. This is where Sanada resides. Sanada has a secret... a secret that could well stir up the lust of her fellows.

title: Girls Zombie Party
genre: Action, Psychological, Survival, Zombies, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Mystery
author: Takeshi Kojima
synopsis: An extreme survival story of girls in a world where half of humanity has turned into monstrous beings!  That day, Sayo Mitsurugi wasnt focused on her lessons, due to staying up late the previous night.  During the lunch break, she was talking on the phone with her hospitalized younger brother, and up until that moment, everything was part of her usual routine.  But then. Suddenly, the signal cut off, and the phone call ended. From that moment on, hell began!  Due to the influence of zombies that appeared in the school, the men began to transform into monstrous beings one after another.  By chance, Saya teams up with her classmates, the angelic Maria and Momo, to attempt an escape from this hell!

title: Watashi No Kouguchi-Sensei
genre: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Kenjirou Takeshita
synopsis:
Kouguchi Ruri, a skilled yet socially awkward male manga artist, has built a career creating niche "loli" manga. His carefully structured life takes a chaotic turn when Shiina Karen, an energetic young woman claiming to be a university student, joins him as his assistant.

 While Karen appears eager to learn, she harbors a mysterious secret and ulterior motives for working with Kouguchi. As they navigate the creative challenges of manga production, their quirky relationship evolves, blending humor, tension, and unexpected revelations.

 This workplace romantic comedy dives into the challenges of collaboration, personal growth, and the surprising connections that emerge in the unlikeliest of circumstances.

title: Hand Jumper
genre: Thriller, Action, Long Strip, Mafia, Villainess, Full Color
author: Norikazu Akira
synopsis: Sayeon Lee despises Aberrants. They wreak havoc on society with their strange, unthinkable powers. It's just too bad she happens to be an Aberrant herself! Forced to fend for her life in the deadly Aberrant Corps, she's determined to make it to the top, and her unusual ability should help her -- if she can figure out how to use it in time.

title: Akabane Honeko No Bodyguard
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Harem, School Life
author: Masamitsu Nigatsu
synopsis:
Honeko Akabane is an ordinary high school girl. The daughter of a lawyer, she seeks to just live a regular life - even if that means chiding her childhood friend, the ever-violent Ibuki Arakuni, whenever he gets into fights with random people. 

However, Ibuki holds a secret only he knows - Honeko was adopted by her current parents, and is actually the illegitimate daughter of a yakuza bigwig. As it turns out, the boss is retiring, and many people in his gang are looking to take his place; since Honeko is his heir, they want to kill her to clean up any loose ends. 

And so Ibuki must protect Honeko from a variety of criminals, without letting her know about her true lineage. Can he act as her bodyguard while simultaneously keeping her unaware of her situation?

title: The Band
genre: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Music
author: Harold Sakuishi
synopsis:
The series is a new band story following a young man who sets off on a music journey when his soul is set aflame after discovering a guitar


Source:ANN

title: Steel Covenant
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Mecha, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Kazamidori
synopsis:
Qiao An, a student from the Battle Armor Academys elite class, failed the battle armor qualification test and was downgraded to the outer department's logistics class. In the post-apocalyptic world, three centuries after the fall of humanity, Qiao An, burdened with massive debt, unexpectedly discovers that he has already formed contracts with not just one, but multiple top-tier battle armors.




"Black or white, which do you choose?"

"I want both!"




With the strongest battle armors, making money becomes a piece of cake.

"Save the world? Not interested, doesn't concern me."

"What? All my debts cleared? Hey, wait a minute!"

title: Bless
genre: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yukino Sonoyama
synopsis: Young Aya Udagawa has already managed to work as a model, but at one time he abandoned the dream of making a career as a makeup artist because of fears of being rejected by others. One day, he decides to help out the nondescript Sumizaki and does her make-up to participate in the school competition. Aya feels that Sumizaki has a hidden charm and charisma and needs only to help the girl prove herself.

title: Hanarete Mo, Suki Na Hito
author: Shin Mayama
synopsis: Not found

title: Mannatsu No Spica
genre: Oneshot, Girls' Love, School Life
author: Kon Fukaumi
synopsis: Not found

title: Quiz! Seigi No Sentaku
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Akiyuki Sugino
synopsis: New challengers will challenge the popular variety program Quiz! Choice of Justice presented by the video distribution service Justice tonight! Do you get "5 million yen for entrepreneurship" or lose your "left arm"? Each decision to be tested on unanswered questions.

title: Youjo Musou
genre: Reincarnation, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Hotaru Unno
synopsis: Lilith, the summoner who accompanied the hero party, was betrayed during the battle with the demons and suffered a serious injury because she refused the invitation of the hero. Helped by her demons, she cannot return to the country in a detour, so she decides to become a demon at the recommendation of Astaroth, the four demon kings who helped her. However, she made a slight mistake and she turned into a little girl. Even if she becomes a little girl, her magical power is not the same, but powers up! Summon the spirits and make an outstanding performance in battle and slow life!

title: Gyakkou Shita Akuyaku Reijou Wa, Naze Ka Maryoku Wo Ushinattanode Shinsou No Reijou Ni Narimasu
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Aoi
synopsis:
Rachel was chosen as the Crown Princes fiancée solely by virtue of the immense magical powers she possessed. Thus, when the Saint appeared, she feared that her most coveted position would get snatched away from her.

Spurred by jealousy, Rachel committed evil deeds against the Saint, resulting in her engagement getting broken. As further punishment, she was sent away to a monastery, but her carriage was attacked by bandits *en route*. Just when she thought that death was imminent, she woke up with a start only to find herself three years in the past  with almost all of her magic gone, and her body so frail and weak that she could barely even leave her bed!

Determined to prevent fate from repeating itself, Rachel resolved to take full advantage of this second chance and call off her engagement pronto. But for some reason, the Crown Prince keeps refusing to break things off with her?!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9460fv/)

title: Yane Urabeya No Koushaku Fujin
genre: Romance, Drama, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Mori
synopsis: The new life of Duchess Opal all started from a dusty attic. The house she resided in after a political marriage with the young Duke, Hubert, was full of hostility. There was also a woman named "Angel," who is treasured by the mansion's owner... Opal gained a bad reputation because of a disgraceful rumor and as a result, she was treated like a hindrance. However, the Duchess doesn't like losing, so it won't end like this! The woman is unrelated to the management of the territory. I will outwit those who let their guard down!

title: Shoujo Seikan Hyouryuuki
genre: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Adaptation
author: Yuiko Agarizaki
synopsis: A spaceship in the shape of a horse-drawn carriage travels across the galaxy. Riding in the carriage is Ridley, the scientist who built this eccentric spaceship, and her partner Watari, a shy girl. The two leave Earth, which has become uninhabitable due to environmental pollution, and set off in the carriage. Their goal is to find a safe planet to settle. However, all the planets they visit are very strange! A planet with a god who can bring all things back to life, another planet where the luckiest people are considered the greatest, and a planet with countless libraries The two girls are sometimes thrown for a loop by these strange worlds

title: Ojousama'S Forbidden Culinary Detours
genre: School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Kuko Okano
synopsis: Yuuki Saji is the daughter of one of Japan's leading zaibatsu families. Aoi Hashisugi, a former delinquent who was thrown into a rich school by his parents, finds classmate Yuuki in trouble on a street corner and decides to buy her a beef bowl, opening her eyes to a commoner's delicacy for the first time. A young lady with a deep window meets a commoner's delicacy.

title: Black Channel
genre: Demons, Comedy, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Satoshi Kisaichi
synopsis:
A dark comedy for the modern era, from CoroCoro Comic!

Enter Black, the "Demonic Yo-Tuber"! With his sidekick Camera-chan, and the aspiring 5th grade Yo-Tuber Satoshi, he makes all kinds of crazy videos using his demonic powers. Filming the "true natures" of anyone from top honor students, to class idols, to supernatural monsters, he makes crazy videos with his demonic powers! What will Black film next...?

title: Bl Drama No Shuen Ni Narimashita
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
author: Suzurimachi
synopsis: A popular BL manga is going to be adapted into a live-action drama. The double lead roles will be played by Aoyanagi Hajime, a talented actor who used to be a successful child actor but is not so successful anymore and Akafuji Yuuichirou, a popular and handsome actor. Aoyagi has a hard time with Akafuji who has an unfriendly attitude, but on the other hand Akafuji has too much love for Aoyagi... Will the two stars succeed in their BL drama?

title: Ambivalent ~Doutei Wo Sutetara Shinu Sekai~
genre: Comedy, Survival, Tragedy
author: Okushou
synopsis: A new type of sexually transmitted infection is spreading around the world. When infected, women's sexual desire increases by several dozen times, while 99% of men die. In a world where casual sex means death, Shindo Sadao, who is a virgin, vows not to have relations with anyone until a vaccine is developed, but the temptations of women overwhelm him!

title: Kiraide Isasete - Asanaga-Sensei to Yanagi-Sensei
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Hijiki
synopsis: The long-awaited spin-off of Kiraide Isasete, this new series focuses on the growing relationship between Asanaga and Yanagi.

title: Grand Metal Organs
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Superhero, Adventure, Gore, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Shiki Kouyuu
synopsis: A boy killed by his superhero idol, then he decided to become a Dark Walker. "Saving the world by destroying the world"

title: Gyges No Futari
genre: Psychological, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Takahiro Katou
synopsis:
Todo, a manga artist, and Hinata, an assistant, have a common problem - a bad deal with the editor in charge. 
When such two people return home from the interview, they awaken to each other's abilities

title: Tsuttsukumon!
genre: Oneshot, Comedy
author: Masaya Takamura
synopsis: A short story about a girl who is supposed to be a spirit medium, but her lack of self-discipline allows even the spirits of stray cats to take control of her body.

title: Otaku Ni Yasashii Gyaru
genre: Oneshot, Web Comic, Gyaru
author: Mameneko
synopsis: Not found

title: Tonari No Inuyama-Kun
genre: Oneshot, Action, Romance, School Life
author: Sakura Tsukuba
synopsis: Kokoro was involved in a traffic accident when she was small, and there was a hero who risked his life to save her. She cant remember anything about him, except for his back, which was scarred from saving her. Now a high school student, she still cant forget the guy from her memories. Suddenly, she was assigned to take care of the new transfer student, Inuyama Kei, whos always quiet and somewhat of a weirdo. He reminds her of her childhood hero, but she wishes her hero was Shun-senpai, the idol of all the girls in school, and whos been very nice to her lately

title: Kakuu No Sono
genre: Drama
author: Tooko Miyagi
synopsis:
After his mom's death, our protagonist strives for every bit of physical affection that his dad would show. Even as a toddler, his dad never held his hand or stroked his head.  
  
Also contains stories:  
- Flower of the Sky  
  
- Dark Eyes  
About a young woman and the man who appears in her life during dangerous times.

title: Rumic Theater
genre: Psychological, Animals, Comedy, Anthology, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Rumiko Takahashi
synopsis:
A sophisticated collection of tales, ranging from the macabre to heartwarming to wacky. The trials and tribulations of daily life.  
  
Volume 1: P no Higeki (released 1994)  
1. P no Higeki (The Tragedy of P)  
2. Roman no Akindo (The Merchant of Romance)  
3. Poi no Ie (The House of Trash)  
4. Hachi no Naka (Hidden in the Pottery)  
5. Hyakunen no Koi (One Hundred Years of Love)  
6. L-size no Shiawase (Extra-Large Sized Happiness)  
  
  
Volume 2: Senmu no Inu (released 1997)  
1. Semmu no Inu (The Director's Dog)  
2. Meisou Kazoku Fire (The Astray 'F' Family)  
3. Kimi ga Iru dake de (As Long as You Are Here)  
4. Chanoma no Love Song (Living Room Love Song)  
5. Oyaji Low Teen (Teen Papa)  
6. Orei ni Kaete (As Way of Thanks)  
  
Volume 3: Akai Hanataba (released 2005)

2. Graffiti Pop  
3. Dutiful Vacation / Giri no Vacance / Holiday-In-Law / A Compulsory Holiday (?????)

5. Red Bouquet  
6. Permanent Love  
  
Volume 4: Unmei no Tori (released 2011)  
  
Volume 5: The Witch and the Dinner (released 2019)

Volume 6: The Power of Money (released 2024)

title: Kuu-Chan Ga Iku!
genre: Oneshot, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Minami Shiina
synopsis: Cute short story about Kuuchan the cat and his adventures at the animal hospital.

title: Youheidan No Ryouriban
genre: Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Taisuke Umeki
synopsis: The story begins when Azuma Akari, a young man with an ambition to be a chef, trips into another world. Akari is picked up by Gangreve, the leader of a mercenary group. Akari joins the group as an odd job and gradually increases his own value by demonstrating his cooking skills. Each leader of the mercenary group is a quirky character, but Akari connects with them through his cooking. By improving the mercenary group's food situation and occasionally helping with inventions, Akari is gradually recognized by his fellow members of the mercenary group. However, Akari does not yet know that he will become a hero.

title: Tokimeke Mahou Youjo Kokopure
genre: Loli, Comedy, Magical Girls, Girls' Love, Slice of Life
author: Ryouta Yuzuki
synopsis: Spin-off of Onee-san wa Joshi Shougakusei ni Kyoumi ga arimasu. Same degeneracy, but with magical girls.

title: Kago No Naka No Ryuu Seijo
genre: Romance, Drama, Fantasy
author: Ryou Himuro
synopsis:
Even though I was supposed to have been rejected for marriage once?!
The Dragon Saintess, tasked with caring for the black dragon Gramvint, who protects the Kingdom of Elvasti, is the official fiancée of the kingdoms prince. The current Dragon Saintess, Ludia, has dedicated her life since childhood to taking care of the enormous dragon that resides in a giant cage. She was also engaged to the prince, Edik.

However, one day, Edik suddenly summoned Ludia and informed her of her dismissal as the Dragon Saintess and the annulment of their engagement. To her shock, the new Dragon Saintess was her stepsister, Leila. Whats more, Edik told her that her next destination would be marriage to the Black General, Wilfried. But Wilfried rejected the marriage, saying, You and I are not a good match?!

title: Seijo No Maryoku Wa Bannou Desu
genre: Monsters, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Azuki Fuji
synopsis:
Sei, a 20 year old office worker, is summoned to a different world after finishing some overtime work. But the person who had summoned her looks at her face and said, "This is not the Saint." Instead, the other summoned lady is lauded as the Saint, while Sei is ignored. Offended at being discarded without a second thought, Sei leaves the royal palace and looks for occupation, and she starts working at a laboratory where she makes potions and cosmetics. She uses her magic to grant peoples requests and slowly people begin suspecting that she is the actual Saint...

Can Sei enjoy her slow dreamy different-world life without her saint title being found out?!

title: Ddaddiction
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Bakanoko
synopsis: Asato, a high school student with a strong sense of justice, is investigating small pranks that frequently occur at school and comes across the newly appointed school nurse, Egou Nemu. Nemu is admired by everyone at school because of her beauty, but she has a curt attitude towards everyone. However, when Asato learns Nemu's secret, he is invited to Nemus home. Asato is at the mercy of Nemu, who has a sweet attitude that he doesn't show during the day, but there is an even more important secret?in that room.

title: Magika Swordsman and Summoner
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Mitsuki Mihara
synopsis:
15 years ago the world discovered magic as well as mythical beings (basically beings from various legends) in another dimension. Humankind learned to summon these dangerous mythical beings and use their power to great effect. 7 countries formed contracts with these "Diva" and gained their alligence as a result. Diva will chose their summoners on their 14th birthday and give them a stigma. Schools have been set up to train summoners and magical swordsman (basically bodyguards that give the summoners time to cast their spell) as a result.  
  
15 years later after the finding of magic Hayashizaki Kazuki is chosen as a summoner and given a stigma to indicate that. This is surprising since males aren't chosen as summoners due to their low amount of mana compared to females. As the first male to be a summoner Kazuki is under a lot of scrutiny by almost everyone.  
  
To complicate matters his sister (who's a magical swordsman) is against him going into summoner school to train there as a summoner. Because summoners and magical swordsman have a cat mouse thing going on where summoners look down on magical swordsman as inferior so his sister naturally is against him going there. She'll stop him even if it means going to war.  
  
Kazuki however is determined to thrive in summoner school and have already determined to give it his all. Even if he's the lowest ranked student (ranked E) and his fellow students intend to demean him he'll prove himself as the strongest summoner.  
  
Adaptation of the light novel written by Mihara Mitsuki and illustrated by CHuN.  
  
The manga is published in Monthly Comic Alive, a seinen manga magazine by Media Factory.  
  
  
  
**Chapters 54-74 already available by official release and they will therefore not be available here.**
