- [Japanese](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%AD%94%E6%8A%80%E7%A7%91%E3%81%AE%E5%89%A3%E5%A3%AB%E3%81%A8%E5%8F%AC%E5%96%9A%E9%AD%94%E7%8E%8B)
- [Spanish](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Magika_no_Kenshi_to_Sh%C5%8Dkan_Ma%C5%8D)

title: Pushoff
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: HP56
synopsis: Dahye was forced to grow up in a cult by her mother, cut off from the rest of the world. However, she meets a half-sister her age named Yunseo, who is her polar opposite, and meets new people.

title: When YouRe in Love
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Soy Media
synopsis:
"I didnt marry my wife because I loved her. I just signed a contract with her at her request."
I actually knew the truth, so its not his fault. I was the one who developed false expectations. I had spent three years as his wife. and I tried hard to be the right woman for him, but I couldnt get a piece of his heart.
"I didnt know it would last this long. Its annoying."
I was nothing to him to the extent that he all but forgot about me as soon as the heroine appeared. In the end, she was always going to be the main character and I was always going to be an extra. No matter how hard I try, my role isn't changing. So its only right for me to leave.
"Im sorry Ive been bothering you all this time. Please be happy with her."

title: Zettai Ni Yuuwaku Sarenai Otoko Vs Zettai Ni Yuuwaku Suru Onna
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Minami Izumi
synopsis: Reishi Kiyota, a ronin student, has a phobia of love due to a traumatic experience and has never been with a woman in his life. His neighbor, Aika Toyokawa, an office worker, likes Reishi and tries to seduce him with all her might..!

title: Ore No Choukyou Skill Ga Nanka Hen
genre: Action, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy
author: Akujikisai
synopsis:
Takashi, a beast tamer who can't use his training skill well, is constantly suffering rebellion by his beasts. However, on a particular occasion, his skill is activated! For some reason, the companion it worked on was a girl!? It's a beast taming x pitiful heroine erotic fantasy adventure!

(Source: Futabasha, translated)

title: Watashi No Kokoro Wa Oji-San De Aru
genre: Genderswap, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Utsugi
synopsis: "Haruka Yamagishi" is a guy who has no friends or family and just goes back and forth between work and home. One day, when he wakes up, he finds himself in a different world. And for some reason, he's turned into a beautiful dark elf! Now, Haruka has inexhaustible magic power, a sturdy body, and a new life where she can do anything... However, through the friends she met and her activities as an adventurer, changes slowly began to take place. The guy who gave up on life in this world begins to feel what it's like to live.

title: Watashi to Kanojo No Kawaii Koi No Hajime Kata
genre: Romance, Girls' Love
author: Guu
synopsis: Not found

title: Hangyaku No Nijigasaki
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Web Comic, Music
author: Choboraunyopomi
synopsis: Hangyaku no Nijigasaki (Nijigasaki of the Rebellion) is an official Love Live! manga by Choboraunyopomi featuring the cast of Love Live!'s Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.

title: Mr. Villain'S Day Off
genre: Demons, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Yuu Morikawa
synopsis:
There exists an evil organisation that intends to invade planet Earth.  
  
The man called "General" fights everyday against the Earth's Defence Force, the "Rangers!"  
  
However, today is his day off.

---

Additional Official English Release | [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/mr-villains-day-off-manga/231/)

title: I'M a Solo Guide
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Harem, Drama, Fantasy
author: Bonnet
synopsis: Ye Ji-an, the only S-class guide in Korea, was often called the useless guide due to her unique trait of having a 0% matching rate with all espers. After failing to match with an esper from Russia and on her way back home, she is suddenly swept away by a gate manifestation and wakes up alone in a strange temple-like place. The world she has traveled to through the gate is the continent of Wisrode, filled only with espers, and in this place, Ji-an is the only guide

title: Tensei Dai Majo No Isekai Kurashi ~Kodai Roman-Fuu Kokka De Hajimeru Mahou Kenkyuu~
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Roku Fujita
synopsis:
"I want to be the wizard of my dreams!"

Zenith, a young girl reincarnated in the ancient Roman-style country of Jupiter, goes to study in the capital with only her momentum. She spreads water magic and floods the classroom. She even falls unconscious after using herself as a test subject, and shoots hot air out of her buttocks in an experiment, and her outlandish behavior never stops. Despite the white eyes of the people around her, she sells shaved ice using ice magic to earn money for her research, and it accidentally becomes a big hit...?

"Amazing! I've made the discovery of the century again!"

Sometimes a catastrophe, sometimes a success(?), sometimes a laugh-out-loud moment!

title: Unlucky Young Men
genre: Thriller, Historical, Action, Crime, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, Police
author: Eiji Ootsuka
synopsis:
Tokyo, 1968: between political turmoil and student riots N, a man with a criminal past, 
casually meets T, a young comedian intent on making a career in the film industry. 
T wants to shoot "Unlucky Young Men", a chronicle of a disillusioned Japanese youth
ready to do anything to realize their dreams; to finance the film, 
the two begin to plan attacking a van carrying 300 million yen...

title: Cool Na Megami-Sama to Issho Ni Sundara, Amayakashi Sugite Ponkotsu Ni Shite Shimatta Ken Ni Tsuite
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: MARUMIKAN
synopsis: One day, Haruto Akihara, a high school student living alone, moves in with his classmate Rei Mikoto, an extremely beautiful girl! Rei, nicknamed the "Goddess of Ice", has a cold attitude towards Haruto, who is devoted to her, but gradually...?

title: Ijimeru Aitsu Ga Waruinoka, Ijimerareta Boku Ga Waruinoka?
genre: Psychological, Drama, School Life
author: Chikara Kimizuka
synopsis: Aizawa was bullied by Suzuki to the point of becoming truant. He picks himself back up and becomes a teacher. 20 years later, his bully's daughter is one of his students and she's being harassed in class, a secret she keeps from her father.

title: Quadrilateral
genre: Oneshot, Philosophical, Drama
author: Jong-Geon Kim
synopsis: A geometry project I made back in high school.

title: Nagareboshi
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life
author: Yagi Migino
synopsis:
Tensei is a college student whos a hobbyist photographer. One day while taking photos, he encounters and becomes captivated by a boy with burn scars on his face, Makito. 

Worn down by people staring at his scars from an accident, Makito escaped the flashy modelling industry and instead found work at a small-town library. 
Tensei, who knows nothing about this past, comes to talk to Makito whenever he borrows and returns books. He begins to fall in love with Makitos delicate and beautiful profile, and before he knows it, hes pointing his camera at him.

Hes hopelessly attracted to the way Makito looks in his photos. But, as he realizes his overwhelming feelings, a guy from Makitos modelling past shows up to take him back?

College kid with a photography hobby and a hidden possessive streak X Ex-model with large burn scars on his face

Even your scars are beautiful. I just want to mess you up

The story of a love affair, played out under a sky full of stars.

title: Assault Lily: League of Gardens -Full Bloom-
genre: Monsters, Action, Magical Girls, Post-Apocalyptic, Girls' Love, School Life, Adaptation
author: Sayaka  Sakuragi
synopsis:
When the enigmatic life-forms called the Huge appeared, they nearly brought the world to ruin. But humanity studied the energy called magie and created CHARMs, potent weapons against the Huge. 

Teenage girls, who proved to resonate the most with CHARMs, became the vanguard in the war with the Huge. There is a name for these girls who fight against humankind's end. They are known as elegant flowers of battleas Lilies.

A manga adaptation of the stage play "Assault Lily: League of Gardens."

title: Crook Clock
genre: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Chisato Nesumi
synopsis: Young master Hewlett is a famous work-a-holic watch-maker whose one dream is to make watches only for people who appreciate and love them. And exactly when he thought hed never meet such a person, his faithful butler Jill made him attend a tea-party where he met the new maid Mulara. And her first words were that her greatest treasure ever is one of master Hewletts old watches

title: Dogsred
genre: Sports
author: Satoru Noda
synopsis:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

title: Shisei
genre: Oneshot, Historical, Romance, Drama, Tragedy
author: Ryo Yokobaba
synopsis:
A love story between two souls separated by their stations in life, in the form of a tattoo.

"Even if we stopped seeing each other, my soul would always be with you."

A man visits a certain tatoo artist. A vivid love story of surreptitious, yet intense longing of two souls.

title: Kao No Nai Otoko
genre: Oneshot, Historical, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Ryo Yokobaba
synopsis: Separated by war, a pair of lovers seek to be united once more...

title: Babel No Tegami
genre: Oneshot, Historical, Romance, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Mimi Yamamoto
synopsis: Even after all these years, youre still the only one I think of Ill put all of my feelings into this letter for you.

title: The Red Shoes
genre: Oneshot, Historical, Comedy, Anthology, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Hideko Mizuno
synopsis:
A collection of some of the earliest one-shots done by Hideko Mizuno, with shared elements of dance and the fantastical.

- **The Red Shoes** (????, Akai Kutsu, story by Chiaki Saeki): The tale of Nais and Ruby, a brother and a sister who face turmoil when tragedy strikes close to home, and the titular pair of red shoes, said to give anyone who wears them flawless dancing ability.
- **Something for Misa** (????????, Misa ni Ageru Mono)
- **Night of the Blue Star** (?????, Aoi Hoshi no Yoru): Toshiko, a girl in poverty, has always longed for the pair of red shoes at her local store. On the day of her town's star festival, Toshiko encounters a puppy being harassed by some children. This puppy takes an unusual liking to her... Also collected in *[Starry Fantasy](https://mangadex.org/title/3f0d7f7a-06f1-442a-9326-52dbd6b2c740/starry-fantasy)*.

title: Nina the Starry Bride
genre: Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy
author: Rikachi
synopsis: Nina had a rough start to life, stealing to surviveand eventually being sold into slavery by her own brother. But to her surprise, her captor, Prince Azure, ordained that she would live the life of a princess...specifically, that of the recently deceased princess-priestess, Alisha. But despite her changing fortune, Nina won't give up her old life without a fight...and Azure might just be the one to finally match her wits. But how much can she trust Azure? And can she stop the feelings budding in her heart, knowing she must eventually marry another...? [Kodansha]

title: Dungeon Ni Deai O Motomeru No Wa Machigatteiru Darou Ka: Familia ChronicleEpisode Freya
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Hinase Momoyama
synopsis:
"UhFreya-sama left a letter and has left"  
  
The members of the Freya Familia all turned at once to look at the messenger. Leaving the shocked first class adventurers aside, the uninhibited Goddess of Beauty leaves on a journey to fulfill her desire!

title: Isekai Samurai
genre: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Samurai, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy
author: Keigo Saitou
synopsis:
The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period, transferred to another world.

At the end of the Warring States Period, Ginko, the greatest swordsman of the time, was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting, she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world, and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon!

title: Isekai De Itoshi No Kare? Ni Chouai Sarechau Bl Anthology
genre: Reincarnation, Demons, Romance, Anthology, Boys' Love, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Homerun Ken
synopsis:
A sweet overnight vigil with His Majesty S! A pet contract with an obsessed demon king, etc The other world life is full of doting? flags..!? Lovey-dovey in full bloom? The second anthology of Another World x Doting BL! 

Cover: TAKAYAMA Shinobu 

Included works: 
1. "I Was Already Married When I Woke Up"
Art: Homerun Ken
Story: as

2. "Please Forgive Me Demon King"
Art: Hakkomame
Story: Hinya

3. "I Was Drinking Myself To Death Because Of My Unrequited Love For A Quiet Childhood Friend, And I Was Doted On For A Night By An Adventurer Resembling My Crush"
Art:AOI Kurage
Story: Amagi

4. "The Beautiful Concubine Wants To Live Peacefully"
Art: CHASHIBU Tamu
Story: Ishin

5. "A Dream Of Twin Wings"
Art: TAKAYAMA Shinobu

title: Shuumatsu No Valkyrie Kinden - Kamigami No Apocalypse
genre: Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama
author: Otsuhiko Naruse
synopsis: Zeus, supreme chairman of the Council of Valhalla, announces to the gods twelve of the thirteen fighters set to participate in Ragnarok--and is met with the dissenting voices of those who were not chosen. However, Zeus has foreseen this, and immediately declares the holding of another tournament to decide the final spot on the Ragnarok lineup, one which will break the taboo on gods fighting one another. Thus begins the "Revelation" of the untold side of *Record of Ragnarok!*

title: Uzugami
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Masaya Hokazono
synopsis:
Satoru Takeichi, also known as Ichigo, works at a sawmill. 

While working, he got into a mechanical problem and ended up having the first joint of his right little finger amputated. He and other employees searched for the cut off part, but couldn't find it. 

Ichigo goes straight to the hospital and receives treatment. However, when he returned to his apartment after being hospitalized for a few days, he found another version of him... 

From there, a strange shared life with another [Himself] begins...

Adaptation of a web novel serialized on the platform peep.

title: Ore No Level up Ga Okashii! ~Dekiru Otoko No Isekai Tensei~
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Mitsuashi
synopsis:
Zarmen, an adventurer who can't level up decides to retire from the adventurer business. Furthermore, in order to graduate from virginity, he decided to splurge on all the assets that he had diligently saved up since his reincarnation at a high-class brothel.

The woman who appeared in front of him was the finest woman he would ever have known. Thanks to her hospitality, Zarmen fully enjoys his first time, but at that moment, his ears hear a mysterious announcement...

[Impregnation confirmed.]
[Level up!]

"Does this mean that the more 'seeding' I do, the stronger I get?"

An extraordinary implantable foreign world adventure fantasy created by a bottom adventurer who has been at level 1 for many years levels up through sex!

title: Kujibiki Tokushou: Musou Harem-Ken
genre: Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ryou Hasemi
synopsis: I drew a lottery at the Shopping District and won the privilege to go to another world. After drawing a lot of balls, unexpectedly I got a cheat-like skill. Silencing those who are noisy and getting hold of all the things that I want. I will satisfy all my desires.

title: Soul Anomaly
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Harem
author: Ame Moritsuki
synopsis: Yuichi Shiro is a foolish, narcissistic, and oblivious teenage boy. After a sudden incident his once ordinary life goes through great changes. How will the optimistic self proclaimed genius handle the life he will lead from now on? As well as handle the new acquaintances and enemies it brings with it. Let the story of action, life, romance and stupidity begin. (Original Web [Novel](https://www.fictionpress.com/s/3068594/1/Soul-Anomaly)).

title: It Is Impossible to Love and Be Wise.
genre: Romance, Slice of Life
author: Seigo Kishi
synopsis: I have someone I like. Far away. It was a long way away. The reason why otaku don't fall madly in love with their favorite is because of that "distance". Airi is an otaku who rejects live-action films and is a two-dimensional supremacist. In the "2.5 dimension," the space between fiction and reality, she encounters a real-life protagonist.

title: Stalker'S Game
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Horror, Web Comic
author: TAN
synopsis: Why did the stalker choose Hyunsung? It began with gifts. First, candies, milk cartons, confectionaries piling outside his small apartments door. Then, the meals. Dinner cooked and waiting for him, perfectly timed for when he arrived late from his mundane office job. Soon he began to accept it, the feeling of being watched, like it even. But why him? Who is the stalker? Can Hyunsung really let this continuetrust him? Or is it all just a game

title: Miyu-Chan Wa Zutto Tomodachi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Hideki
synopsis: In the summer of his second year of high school, Yuushin Tahara finds that his childhood friend, Miyu Fukagawa, who had moved away, has returned to the house next door. Although Miyu has grown up to be quite cute, there's something a little strange about her...

title: Hibiki - Shousetsuka Ni Naru Houhou
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mitsuharu Yanamoto
synopsis:
The literature industry is suffering from the publishing recession. 
While the literary magazine 'Mokuren' was grieving over the present state of affairs, 
a composition intended for their Newcomer's Award was sent to their editing department. 
However, it completely ignored the application rules. It could have been torn to shreds, 
but the work caught the eye of a sole editor. As a result, their world began to change.  
  
Winner of the 2017 Manga Taisho Award and the 2018 Shogakukan Manga Award.

Indonesian release by M&C Comics as **Hibiki: Kiat Menjadi Novelis**

title: Please Take Care
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: SAS
synopsis: Help! Why is my blind date my 'ex'-boyfriend?!

title: Whimsy Whimsy Witch
genre: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Kousuke Satake
synopsis: A prince has been cursed to turn into a frog by a witch. Things went wild from there.

title: Jashin-Chan Dropkick
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Gore, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Yukiwo
synopsis:
Jashin-chan Dropkick is a violent slapstic comedy about a delusional gothic lolita, Yurine, who summons a demon girl with the tail of a cobra, Jashin-chan.
They'll have to live together until Yurine finds a way to send Jashin-chan back to hell, or until Jashin-chan kills Yurine.

---

[Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20484)

title: Zubaban
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Ninja, Comedy, Samurai, Sexual Violence, Gore, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural
author: Gou Nagai
synopsis: It is the Sengoku period. ZubaBan is a wild child who is unbeatable in physical strength, he can easily swing around his giant sword and cut down hordes of enemies! Then, suddenly, Jeanne d'Arc, a knight clad in western armor appears, along with Kanchohi, who came from China (?), and the invincible warrior Golongo. This colorful punch joins forces in hopes of uniting Japan! Zubaban is unbeatable in hand-to-hand combat, but soon the gears of strange fate turn...!? A thrilling, super-period drama depicted on a grand scale!

title: The Swordmaster'S Son
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: COBY
synopsis:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!

title: Sousei Mahou No Saigensha
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Miwamoshi
synopsis:
Hermes, the son of a prestigious noble family, was born with enormous magical powers and was a child prodigy with a promising future. However, as a result of the evaluation, it was discovered that he was incompetent and had not inherited the "bloodline magic," a unique magic passed down from generation to generation in the family of nobles. Exiled from the royal capital, he was on the verge of death in the depths of despair, but Rose, a legendary witch who recognized his talent, saved him and made him her apprentice. After training, he mastered the strongest magicCreation Magic, which can reproduce all magic. Hermes, who has learned that the common sense of the kingdom, which determines the superiority of all values by the power of "bloodline magic," is wrong, returns to the royal capital to further his magical studies, bringing change to a kingdom filled with deception...! A tale of the most powerful magic by a boy with no talent overturns the common sense of the world, and the saga begins!

---

title: F-Rank University Journal
genre: School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Juugoya
synopsis: Not found

title: Martial Peak
genre: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: PIKAPI
synopsis:
The peak of martial arts is solitary and lonely. It is an endless pursuit for unattainable heights as well. In order to surpass the limits of martial arts, growth and the will to survive in adverse situations is necessary.
One day, Yang Kai, a disciple-on-trial (and floor sweeper) of the Lingxiao Martial Arts Sect discovered a Wordless Black Book. That marked the turn in his luck and the beginning of his martial arts journey.

title: Hotaru No Yomeiri
genre: Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
author: Oreco Tachibana
synopsis: A romance story set in the Meiji era. Born into a prestigious family and blessed with good looks, Satoko is said to have a short life expectancy. But suddenly, her life is targeted by a mysterious killer...?! In order to survive on the spot, Satoko makes a "proposal" for the killer...?! - A young lady and an assassin... A contract marriage love suspense between two people who should never meet!

title: Meguru Mirai
genre: Thriller, Time Travel, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Yamori Tsuji
synopsis:
Mirai, a man who does not show his emotions, lives happily with his innocent and cheerful wife Meguru, but he has a "cursed disease" that he keeps secret even from his wife.
Then one day, Mirai receives an important call from the police concerning his wife...!

title: Haite Kudasai, Takamine-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Yuuichi Hiiragi
synopsis:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

Become my closet!

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/please-put-them-on-takamine-san)

title: Botsuraku Yotei No Kizoku Dakedo, Hima Datta Kara Mahou Wo Kiwamete Mita
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Nazuna Miki
synopsis:
A man who was enjoying an evening drink got transferred to the body of Liam, the fifth son of a nobleman from another world. 

"I spent easy days practicing the magic I had longed for, and learned not only attribute magic, but also how to summon spirits, obtain powerful familiars, and ended up mastering even the most difficult magic!"

He became an adventurer aiming for independence from his parents' house, which was scheduled to fall, and before he knew it, he became a higher-ranking aristocrat rather than one of the best magicians in the world.

title: Ake No Tobari
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Momo Chidori
synopsis:
To create a paradise where humans and demons can coexist, a human and a demon strive in order to fulfill that dream. This is their story.

---

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/85)

title: Corseltel No Ryuujitsushi Monogatari
genre: Monsters, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Ayuma Isurugi
synopsis: Corseltel is a fantasy land where dragons and humans live together in harmony. Dragon Sorcerers, in return for borrowing power from the dragons to use magical spells, must take care of the dragon offspring. Mashel, said to be one of the best Dragon Sorcerers in all Corseltel, is able to use all 7 dragon types meaning that he must take care of 7 different dragon children. The dragon children, each representing the types (dark, light, fire, water, wind, earth, life) learn to harness their power through Mashel and also look up to him as a parent. The cuteness of the dragon kids and the life lessons they learn will capture many readers.

title: Lv2 Kara Cheat Datta Moto Yuusha Kouho No Mattari Isekai Life
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Akine Itomachi
synopsis: Banaza, who was summoned to the magic kingdom of Cryroad as a Hero candidate, was disqualified as a Hero because of his ordinary abilities. He was supposed to be returned to his original world, but due to the magical kingdom's mistake, he became unable to return to his original world. However, the moment he reached Level 2, he acquired every single possible skill and kind of magic, turning him into a super cheat with infinite skills! Despite this, he takes Fenris of the demons as his wife, and fully enjoys his newly-married life with an easygoing smile. He changes his name to Fulio and tries to lead his life quietly, but things are a bit chaotic with the likes of a pet saber, four freeloading female knights, a Majin, and even an ex-Demon Lord. However, even with all of this chaos, he still manages to enjoy his life peacefully.

title: Makyou Seikatsu: Gakeppuchi Boukensha Ga Hikikomoru Ni Wa Hirosugiru
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ito Toshinori
synopsis:
After being expelled from his family home, our main character tries his hand at becoming an adventurer, only to find out that things aren't quite as they seem. Determined to change his fate, and with the money he's saved up, he heads out to purchase a plot of land in the remote, unexplored wilderness, with the intent of forging his perfect new life. Little does he know, this expanse is infamous as the 'Demonic Realm,' a treacherous territory brimming with savage plants and creatures!

But navigating the daily trials of this life-threatening wilderness may prove be a challenge. In his journey of growth, an array of inhabitants, each driven by their motives, decide to follow him, bringing vibrancy back into his life. However, unseen powers resolute in preventing the Demonic Realm from being conquered begin to surface... Will he be able to endure, triumph, and make this land his new home?

title: Mezametara Saikyou Soubi to Uchuusenmochi Datta Node, Ikkodate Mezashite Youhei Toshite Jiyuu Ni Ikitai
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Adaptation
author: Ryuuto
synopsis:
Sato Takahiro was an ordinary office worker and hobbyist gamer until the day he woke up on a spaceshipone that strangely resembled a craft from a favorite space-shooter game. With a decked-out ship, a crew full of babes, and a fantastic universe to explore, hes going to make the most of his good luck and create the life hes always dreamed of!


---

title: Haremono Shinjuu
genre: Oneshot, Psychological, Drama
author: Niraku
synopsis: Kei, a diligent cook, must come to terms with personal loss as well as his feelings of alienation. While the people close to him may try to help, he has to reach the important conclusions himself...

title: Endou-Kun No Jikken Note
genre: Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Nojiko Hayakawa
synopsis: Tsuda and Endou have come to realize they can't stay the way they are forever. If asked about their relationship, they don't know how to answer. What do they need to stay together? It's not enough. They want more. They can't stop their feelings

title: Time'S Toll
genre: Romance, Self-Published, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Hitoshi Kino
synopsis: In a city where time is currency, Ayla fights to uncover the truth behind a mysterious thief stealing Life Spans. As the stakes rise, love, survival, and sacrifice intertwine in a story where every second counts.

title: To Your Eternity
genre: Award Winning, Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Yoshitoki Ooima
synopsis:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---

title: Mount Celeb Kaneda-San
genre: Comedy, School Life
author: Nyaromeron
synopsis: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!

title: Denki Soukou Raijin
genre: Action, Superhero
author: Wosamu Kine
synopsis:
A young man called Kanou Ryoto was once saved as a child by a mysterious hero named "Raijin".

Ten years later, Ryoto works in his sister's dog cafe. While walking the dogs one day, he happens to save a strange dog from drowning. Soon after a monster attacks his sister and suddenly the dog he had saved earlier starts to talk to him. Not only that, he also teaches him how to transform into a battle hero and protect his loved ones.

This is the fateful moment Ryoto changes into Raijin Model One!

title: Kokoro No Program
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Hinata Nakamura
synopsis: An elementary schooler, Usami Kyuu encounters Ichiko, a female robot trying to learn about [heart]. What awaits the two that start to live together... Boy X Robot Girl, Begin!

title: The Poisonous Healer
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Team POVE
synopsis:
In a world where monster hunters are hailed as heroes, Cheon Haesun has been treated like an outcast because of his abnormal looks. As if that wasn't bad enough, a pack of monsters attacks his neighborhood on the day he discovers he's dying from an unknown illness!

With his sister's sacrifice, Haesun survives and somehow awakens to become a Poisoner, a rare hunter with toxic healing abilities.

But will his poisonous powers cure Haesun's illness and guarantee a normal life he's always dreamed of?

title: Nigasanai Yo? Fukuroji-Kun
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life
author: Tatsuya Ikegami
synopsis: The story revolves around Fukuroji, a high school boy who tries to live in the shadows. However, his life takes an unexpected turn when, as part of a punishment game, he has to confess his love to the most popular girl in his class. Through a misunderstanding, he ends up confessing his feelings to Tsubaki Sakura, the most feared girl in school. As he tries to clear up the confusion, Tsubaki surprisingly attacks him, adding an unexpected and hilarious twist to the situation.

title: Fugue Across Worlds
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Wenzhi Lizi
synopsis: During troubled times, Weng Shaoying is one of the most famous singers in Dongping. Many people go to Song of Fairyland just to see her perform. However, under her glamorous facade, she has been controlled for more than 10 years. On the other side of Dongping is Bi Xing Tang, one of the most famous gangs there. After her fathers death, Yanchu became the young female leader of Bi Xing Tang, which caused a lot of rumors to spread. On one inevitably fortuitous night, the two happened to meet. At that time, neither of them knew that they would eventually become the most important person in the others life. Starting from that night onwards, the gears in Shaoying and Yanchus fate will forever be rotating together.

title: Slow Start
genre: Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yuiko Tokumi
synopsis: Following an unfortunately timed case of the mumps, Hana Ichinose misses all of her high school entrance exams and ends up having to spend a gap year as a ronin. Moving to a new location and starting high school a year late, Hana becomes friends with her classmates, Eiko, Tama, and Kamuri, while keeping it a secret that she is a year older than them.

title: Reunion
genre: Oneshot
author: Renri Suzudama
synopsis: It was published in Monthly Magazine Garo (??????) on November 1973

title: On My Way to Kill God
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Voidmap
synopsis:
Ill kill you Demon God!

Because of the demons, humanity was thrown into a battle they could not refuse. The people dragged into Helacion hunted monsters in a desperate struggle to survive.

To escape, and to take revenge against the Demon God, they must endlessly grow and become even stronger!

title: Burn the Witch
genre: Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Tite Kubo
synopsis:
The story centers on Noel Niihashi and Ninny Spangcole, who work as witches at the Wing Bird headquarters in Reverse London's Natural Dragon Management Agency. Those who live in Reverse London are able to see supernatural creatures such as dragons. Noel and Nini work to help promote coexistence between these creatures and humans, but sometimes must undergo missions to exterminate evil creatures.  
  
[Official anime site](https://burn-the-witch-anime.com/en/)

title: Mikane and the Sea Woman
genre: Romance, Drama, Monster Girls
author: Aoko Kizaki
synopsis: It's not like I dont belong here... One year ago, a young boy named Mikane moved back to a small island in Kyushu. The locals are warm, his father is brusque yet kind, and he has a good friend who worries for him. Despite having so much, Mikane feels dissatisfied and lonely. Then, one day, he saves a mysterious, beautiful woman from the sea. His meeting with this "onee-san" will drastically change his destiny!!

title: Show-Ha Shou-Ten!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Akinari Asakura
synopsis: The manga centers on a high school student who sends material to programs and a former child actor. The two team up to become an aspiring comedian duo.

title: The Urban Legend Files
genre: Comedy
author: Kazuki Hiraoka
synopsis: Mokume is a first-year college student and occult fanatic! She hunts down an older student, Kugutsu, who is rumored to attract urban legends of all kinds... What will happen when she joins the Occult Club? The long-awaited occult comedy from the creator of Janji, Kazuki Hiraoka!

title: The World of Skk Girls
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Taishou Akatsuka
synopsis:
In a mysterious world devoid of humans, Saya, Katana, and Kodachi are three inseparable friends. Their days are filled with laughter and games in the eerie quiet. But beneath this calm, an obscure presence lurks in the shadows?!

From the creator of Muto to Sato, Akatsuka-sensei, comes a new, uncharted adventureinnocence meets mystery in a world unknown!

title: Beat & Motion
genre: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Music
author: Naoki Fujita
synopsis: Tatsuhiko's love for drawing began at a young age, and his aspiration was to work in animation someday. But when the young boy is bullied for his art, Tatsuhiko swears to never draw in front of others ever again. Desperate to find something new to fill the void in his heart, he turns to music, but eventually becomes jaded by his mediocrity.While out drinking with his friends, Tatsuhiko's sob story earns the ire of a drunk woman, who intimidates the young man into reassessing his attitude toward life. He decides to give animation another chance, and in the process rediscovers his love for the medium, pushing himself to publish a short video. Tatsuhiko is stunned when the video goes viral, even more so when his favorite singer, Nico Kashiwagi, requests a collaboration on her next music video!Excited to finally meet the artist he has admired for so long, the young man is shocked to discover that Nico is the same bar patron that gave him an earful, though she has no recollection of that drunken night. While initially hesitant of their new partnership, Tatsuhiko slowly learns that there is more to Nico's brutish passion than he realizes.

title: Genius Cool Treasure: President'S Wife Is Too Powerful
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Zhang Yue Wen Hua
synopsis: "Genius Cool Treasure: The President's Wife Is Too Powerful" is a web comic serialized by a Japanese writer. The comic tells that five years ago, in a tent with black lights, the woman drove him drunk, and gave birth to twins and lost one. Five years later, the woman filmed him secretly, healed his hidden illness, stole his heart, and took a small bun to abduct his other son to play missing. Feng Yizhen swears that she must catch the woman's fierce affection and let her know that she has to pay the price.

title: Satsuki Complex
genre: Comedy, Crossdressing, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
author: Sugar
synopsis:
Satsuki looks totally like a girl but is actually a boy?!  
This story is about Satsuki, his little brother Kouta, and friends.  
Full of embarassing but funny moments.

title: Fuguushoku to Baka Ni Saremashita Ga, Jissai Wa Sorehodo Waruku Arimasen?
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Akimasa Nanjou
synopsis:
Shirosaki Reito was suddenly sucked in by a mysterious crack and got transferred in between dimensions. He got reincarnated as a baby in another world. He was born in the royal family and was the heir to the throne but he was driven/kicked of the palace. The reason was that he was born as a Support magician and had Alchemist as a job which was the lowest job that existed in the new world and people who had that were considered jobless. But there was a secret hidden in that job!!   
From jobless to the strongest job!!!

title: Akuyaku Reijou Desu Ga, Moto Geboku No Juujin Ni Flag Kaishuu Saretemasu!?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Villainess
author: Akari Yoruda
synopsis:
Anieska was once a member of a count's family called the "villainous daughter" because of her behavior. She instructed the beastman she had picked up to attack the fiancée of the prince she fell in love with but was betrayed and ultimately lost. After that, she changed her name to Anika and moved to live in a remote village.

One day, the lord summons her so he can welcome her as his wife. However, that lord was Ray, the beastman who once betrayed her. Anika, who was taken to Ray's mansion, who was once treated as a slave, decides to get rid of her long-standing grudge...

title: Nui!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Natsumi Mukai
synopsis: When Kaya runs into trouble one day, its not a knight in shining armor, but her stuffed animals that come to her rescue. It may sound crazy, but Kaya isnt pretending: she loves her stuffed animals so much, they come to life and turn into people! Stuffed animals come in all different shapes and sizes, and so do their heartswhereas some are nice, there are others who are not so kind.

title: Nee, Mou Isso Tsukiacchau? Osananajimi No Bishoujo Ni Tanomarete, Camo Kareshi Hajimemashita
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kanouda Kizu
synopsis:
Masaichi Mazono, an otaku boy, and Toiro Kurumi, the most beautiful girl in school, are childhood friends. Toiro, who was always in Masaichi's room, was supposed to be like family to him. But one day, Toiro, who was constantly getting annoyed by her romantic troubles, asks Masaichi to play the role of her boyfriend. They thought it would be simple to pretend to be a couple because theyd been together for so long, but their ideal childhood friend can't possibly end up as a false lover...

_"E-eh no, holding hands is embarrassing."_

A childhood friend who is more than a lover embarks on a more adventurous lover's life than she could have dreamed!

title: Remote Jugyou Ni Nattara Class 1 No Bishoujo to Doukyo Suru Koto Ni Natta
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: jaguchi
synopsis:
High school student Kanata Yoshino who was at his wit's end, meets Haruka Hoshikawa, the most beautiful girl of his class, who was waving her smartphone alone in a park in the middle of the night. She is bad with machines and doesn't know how to connect to the internet, and asks him to help. He ends up visiting her house, but little does he know, she has a secret purpose...!

---
**Link:**
- [Official Site](https://www.ganganonline.com/title/2013)

title: I Shall Survive Using Potions!
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hibiki Kokonoe
synopsis:
Kaoru Nagase got caught up in a mysterious phenomenon and died on her way home from work. She skillfully convinced the higher-being that caused the distortional accident into giving her "The ability to create any potion with any effect I can think of", and to be revived in the other world with her younger self's body! Kaoru, whos now a rather sharp-eyed 15-year-old girl, will work hard for a peaceful life in another world!

*Artist Kokonoe Hibiki got replaced by Onshin Futsuu after volume 9, leading to changes in the serialization. You can find the continuation [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a1fe0826-e93b-4fb8-a19e-f1ca95362588)*

title: Gyaru and Cthulhu
genre: Monsters, Demons, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color, Gyaru
author: Pon to Gotanda
synopsis: A trendy girl and aspiring idol thought she'd get a pet octopus to make it big as a pet idol, but she ended up getting Cthulhu! With the help of an elder god, aim for the top!

title: Ajin Sharehouse
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Norito Asazuki
synopsis:
The communicative, corporate animal Kei Sato applies to move into a share house in order to make friends with whom he can have casual conversations. The three people there were Chiyuki Himiiyama (Snow Woman), Meme Janome (Medusa) and Melodrama Incuria (Incubus). This was a share house exclusively for subhumans, who were supposed to be invisible to humans...

The share house life begins with a lot of difficulties ahead!

(Source: Mangaupdates)

title: Boku to Eve No Muikakan
genre: Historical, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Izuru Yanase
synopsis:
Leopold, a young boy, wakes up from a frightening dream to find himself alone with the maid Eve in a dark, spacious mansion.

He lives his life in the mansion, keeping the mysterious promise he made with Eve, but gradually mysterious events begin to take hold of Leopold.

title: Futarijime Romantic
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Chihiro Kanisawa
synopsis: Kumamori has always been in pursuit of the ideal romance. When she changes classes for her second year of high school, she is unexpectedly reunited with "Tajima," the partner of her first kiss. Unfortunately, he is dry and stoic when it comes to romance.... 200% heartwarming! A realistic but cute and romantic opposites-attract love story!

title: Sorry, I Like You
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Shiho Watanabe
synopsis: Rie and Yuri have been friends since childhood. Living together every day, Yuri thinks Rie needs a boyfriend. Does she even need one?

title: Clorets
genre: Oneshot, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Inio Asano
synopsis: One shot sponsored by Clorets for their 35th anniversary.

title: Slime Seijo
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Fantasy, Villainess, Monster Girls
author: Aira Yao
synopsis: The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!

title: Koushaku Reijou Ni Tensei Shiteshimatta Node, Mental Otome Na Ore Wa, Zenryoku De Onnanoko Wo Tanoshimimasu
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Shachi
synopsis: A humble man in his twenties suddenly dies and is reborn as the daughter of a duke in an 18th-century lookalike world where magic exists! He is now living a second life as the adorable "Miranda Mirandiehl," who looks like a doll. As he was always a "girl inside" with girlish interests, he accepted his reincarnation surprisingly easily. And so, after being reborn as Miranda, he will enjoy his new life to the fullest! What kind of encounters await him, and what lies ahead in his gender-swapped otherworldly reincarnation life?

title: My Rei of Light
genre: Official Colored, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Self-Published, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Saryuu
synopsis: Not found

title: Konokoiwa Kitto Amasugiru
genre: Boys' Love, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Natsumura Gesshi
synopsis: Kento, a tired office worker, meets Sora, a construction worker, at a candy store. Sora's friendly smile and comfort soothes Kento, so he starts to frequent the candy store and gradually begins to notice him. One day, when Sora helps him up after he nearly falls, his lower abdomen reacts to his strength and warmth...!? A super sweet love story between a cheerful muscular man and a tired office worker!

title: Nakimushi to Kokoa No Yuri
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Nayuru Kouji
synopsis: Not found

title: Koujo Denka No Kateikyoushi
genre: Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Riku Nanano
synopsis:
A magic revolutionization fantasy about a nonordinary home tutor guiding a little lady! Allen, a humble man who can use abnormal magic techniques, ended up becoming the tutor of lady Tina, who apparently "can't use magic." Thus begin Allen's lessons that crush the concepts of common sense!  
  
From the popular light novel series now comes in manga form!

title: Kouhai
genre: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Naotaka Taki
synopsis:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/100804060) (Chapter 1)

title: Happy End Wa Goisshoni
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
author: Chito Hanakawa
synopsis: Company-man Sakuraba makes himself cute lunches every day, reads girls' comics, and generally loves all things feminine. Sakuraba is speechless when he meets his favorite manga artist, Megumi Nono, at a book signing... because it turns out that his idol is actually his neighbor! He goes to visit him a few days later, only to have Megumi collapse, leaving Sakuraba to care for him. And that's how he becomes friends with his neighbor and idol.....! Feminine top Sakuraba sometimes shows remarkable tolerance towards his tough bottom, who suddenly comes over adorably shy. This heartwarming yaoi manga from noted new star Chito Hanakawa will ruffle your feathers with cuteness!!

title: Hajime No Ippo
genre: Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: George Morikawa
synopsis:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)

title: Nukoduke!
genre: Ghosts, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural
author: Iro Yugi
synopsis:
A heartwarming story about the daily lives of a freeter named Yuuya and his two little pets.  
  
Note: Chapters follow the Tankouban (book) order and numbering. The chapter number in (Ex Ch. No.) specifies the original chapter number (when first released on HanaLala Online & MangaPark) before the chapters were compiled into the book.

[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%AC%E3%81%93%E3%81%A5%E3%81%91!)

title: Kokan Musou ~Kiraware Yuusha Wa Mazoku Ni Aisareru~
genre: Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls
author: Jiburo
synopsis:
Kantarou, who has ascended to heaven because he is too sick, reincarnates in a different world. Kantarou, who is distorted in character and is a fatty, is disliked even after reincarnating, but notices that a cloudy potion that cures anything from his crotch appears. Moreover, it also has the effect of powering up the demons, and it will be loved by the demons!? A different world reincarnation fantasy that is unmatched in the crotch!!!
___

- [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/3269754496640214685)
- [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55354)

title: Noipa-Chan Wa Abunai!
genre: Demons, Romance
author: Akira Hizuki
synopsis: At school, no one seems to care what transfer student Noipa-chan wears. In fact, they don't even seem to notice her existence, except for one person. Yuu is the only one who wonders what's going on with that girl.

title: Elf to Bike to Teikoku Chiri Chousain to
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Tsuyoshi Isomoto
synopsis: Road-movie-like manga about the perky elf and her rugged sidekick, who explores and maps an area where the situation is unclear. -AMAZ

title: Sakura Taisen Part 2
genre: Action, Demons, Mecha, Military, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Ikku Masa
synopsis: With the Hive of Darkness and High Priest Tenkai defeated, peace has returned to the capital thanks to the Imperial Combat Troupe. But a new enemy has risen and threatens to disturb this new year of peace! The curtain is rising, the bells are ringing and a new battle is about to begin, for the Kouma have been resurrected by their new King: AOI SATAN

title: Little Red Riding Hood
genre: Oneshot, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Dozamura
synopsis: Not found

title: Maid-San Wa Kyuuketsuki
genre: Romance, Comedy, Vampires, Monster Girls
author: Yasushige
synopsis: 15-year-old Alfred Saionji, heir to the venerable Saionji family, spends his days striving to become a first-class gentleman while enduring strict family rules. His solace comes from his maid, Magly. Thanks to her, a cool and beautiful maid, Alfred's life has become colorful, but... In fact, her true identity is a vampire. Once she sees or sucks blood, her very naughty nature comes out, and Alfred immediately has his blood sucked at her command...

title: Coronica No Nou
genre: Monsters, Action, Military, Drama, Supernatural
author: Kou Minohashi
synopsis: Zero grew up in an orphanage. Contrary to the orphanage's philosophy of "If you want it, believe in and fight for it," Zero hates competition and conflict and prefers peaceful days. However, after discovering a certain secret, Zero finds himself caught up in the whirlpool of a cruel fate...!?

title: Houkago No Goumon Shoujo
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life
author: BOKU
synopsis:
After years of being unlucky with girls, Ishimaru Daito only wishes to enjoy his high school life with a normal, cute girlfriend. However, after losing a game to his two new seniors Sasahara Kiyoka and Tomochika Asami, he is forced to join the <Humanism Studies> club which is actually a torture studies club. Will Ishimaru get the normal high school life he always wanted?  
  


---

title: Despair Memory Gundam Sequel
genre: Sci-Fi, Mecha, Magic, Military, Gore, Supernatural
author: Toshiki Inoue
synopsis: It has been 700 years since a certain "war" in which more than half of the human race lost their lives. The Gundam, which had protected the Earth during the Great War, was no longer necessary for humankind. In such a peaceful world, there was a woman called "Bloody Kaoris". This is a story of betrayal over the lost "God" named "Gundam".

title: Seikoku No Dragonar
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Fantasy
author: RAN
synopsis:
Welcome to Ansullivan Dragonar Academy, a school with a difference: the students are dragon riders, each contracted with their own personal dragon. Ash Blake has the unique ability to ride anyone's dragon, but he's been waiting for what feels like forever for his own dragon to be born. He's thrilled when his dragon, Eco, finally appearsbut she inexplicably takes the form of a beautiful human girl.  
  
Eco's peculiar appearance is only the first unusual thing Ash faces. His life is about to become a whirlwind of spies, dragon races, and unexpected attention from both the proud Princess Sylvia and the beautiful president of the student council, Rebecca. All Ash wants is to acclimate Eco to the world, but someone out there wants his strange dragon on the dissecting table!

title: Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Uma Musumeshi
genre: Sports, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Tsukumo Asakusa
synopsis: "In their daily lives, as well as their special moments, Uma Musume enjoy eating "tasty dishes"?"?

title: Tokimori-San Ga Muboubi Desu!!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Tazawa
synopsis: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!

title: Neet Kunoichi to Nazeka Dousei Hajimemashita
genre: Monsters, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Kotatsu
synopsis:
Otaku Kunoichi ? Otaku NEET ? Girl with Zero Romantic Experience!

A normal salaryman, Tsukasa, is attacked by a Youma and is gallantly saved by the appearance of the genius kunoichi, Shizuri. However, when she is not working, she becomes an otaku NEET... Today, Tsukasa's househusband skills will continue to spoil Shizuri. A prescription delivered directly to you?

title: Kimi Ni Sasageru Otokomae
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Fuminosuke
synopsis: "I'm going to tell you I love you every day!" A younger handsome guy confesses his love on their first meeting! An uneven love story between a good looking boy and a manly girl begins.

title: Hajirau Kimi Ga Mitainda
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, School Life
author: Rakure Umagome
synopsis: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy.

title: Cotton
genre: Demons, Magical Girls, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kita Konno
synopsis: Manga adaptation of the video game Cotton: Fantastic Night Dreams that was serialized in Comic Gamest.

title: List Rouge
genre: Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Hoku Tomose
synopsis: In a world where humans are protected by the Chimera tribe as an endangered species. As he spends time with a human girl, a certain emotion begins to grow in the heart of a Chimera boy.....!

title: Fear: Reiwa Ghost Story
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Kawakami Juoku
synopsis: An omnibus of horror stories that explores relatable, everyday fears experienced in the contemporary Reiwa era. Each story in the series reflects modern anxieties, focusing on the fears lurking within daily life, which continue to escalate.

title: Tsui No Taimashi ?Ender Geister?
genre: Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Takashi Yomoyama
synopsis: Akira, a demonically strong S-class exorcist, is sent from Germany to investigate a paranormal event in a certain city in Japan. He destroys creatures from other worlds with his beautiful exorcist partner Chikage.

title: I Want to Live a Good Life
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Hyeon-Ju Heo
synopsis: The best in the world, excellent martial arts, overflowing money and pleasure----the center of the magical world, Black Astronomy. Kang Hee-ran, the granddaughter of the owner of Heukcheonmun, lives a life that has nothing to lack and nothing to be envied of, but dies at the hands of her stepmother. And for some reason, Heeran reverted to her younger self! In the life that started again, she goes down quietly and kindly with her warm nanny. The first step of revenge begins with making the third Confucius, Kang Lun, the king of the underworld who will soon rule Black Astronomy, into a man of Heiran...!!  I was trying to live...  Heeran's stepmother didn't like the way he looked and started to kill all of Heeran's people.  And Heeran went to the bottom of the Dark Astronomical Gate to the realm of the deep hell for revenge.

title: Hiding the Archduke'S Humiliating History
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: JEJE
synopsis: After being neglected in her past life, Izelle is ecstatic to be reborn as a rich character until her family suddenly goes bankrupt! While thinking about what to do, she's given the perfect chance to solve her financial crisis when she saves young Archduke Karl Byron from being bullied. Unfortunately, Karl doesn't remember her at all when they reunite as adults, and she has no choice but to coerce him into helping her. Can Izelle get what she wants, or will Karl be more trouble than he's worth?

title: Forget My Husband, I'Ll Go Make Money
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Mol-Ko
synopsis:
I became the wife of a husband who has a girlfriend.
Hmm, I shouldnt bother them, right?

Then, you sleep on the floor.
What?

It seems that he doesnt like the idea of it.
Well, the floor is hard after all.
I guess I dont have any other choice.

Well just sleep while holding hands then. You trust me, right?

But how did we end up breaking the bed on our first night?

I am Aristine, an exiled princess who has fallen out of favor with the Emperor.
The truth is, she has the <Monarchs Eyes>, an ability that allows you to see the past, future, and present.
Sacrificed for a contract marriage, she is bound together with a monstrous barbarian

I have to present my wife with the most precious things.

The future husband who is rumored to be a monster is incredibly normal.

But this cake belongs to someone else.

Ill just go and make money.

Its long been said that imagining gold as your own will help you manifest wealth.

<Forget My Husband, Ill Go Make Money>
Will she be able to achieve her dreams of living in freedom while sitting on her piles of money?
Or will she be able to catch both rabbits at the same time?

title: Isekai De Mizu No Dai Seirei Yattemasu
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Chihiro Aoki
synopsis: When the laid-back high school student Saejima Nagi wakes up from a nap, he finds himself in a lake in another world!? After learning that he is the "Great Water Spirit" whose essence is the lake, Nagi uses the power that resides within him to heal those suffering from injuries and illnesses. One day, Nagi is led by a voice calling for help and is summoned by a boy. This encounter will greatly change Nagi's fate...

title: Kaguya Hime
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Romance, Reverse Harem, Crossdressing, Drama, Horror, Mystery
author: Reiko Shimizu
synopsis:
On Kabuchi-jima, an island ruled by Princess Kaguya, ten children were raised as sacrificial victims. Several of the children thought they had escaped their fate when they escaped the island. But nearly a decade later, the kids are still dying in the order and at the time they would have as sacrifices Their only hope now is to reunite and return to the island to seek out and destroy the sourcethe legend, the blood-lusting Moon Princessbefore time runs out.  
  
In 2002 Kaguya Hime received the 47th annual Shogakukan Manga Award for shoujo.

title: Danzai Sareta Akuyaku Reijou Wa, Gyakkou Shite Kanpeki Na Akujo Wo Mezasu
genre: Romance, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Bakufu Narayama
synopsis:
An exhilarating romantic fantasy about a duke's daughter, a former prostitute, controlling the poison within evil!

The duke's daughter, Claudia, was supposed to be the fiancée of the crown prince, however her half-sister, Fermina's, schemes had her sold off to a brothel. She didn't want to end it like this, so she climbed to the top at the brothel, but ended up dying from an illness. Except, when she opened her eyes, the face of when she was a child looked back at her. Realizing she had gone back in time, Claudia wins over more and more supporters using the tactics she learnt during her days as a prostitute to prepare for her nearing conflict with Fermina.

"If Fermina is considered a villainess, I shall aim to become the ultimate villain!"

title: Rappa - Yankee Ninpuuchou
genre: Action, Ninja, Martial Arts, Delinquents, Supernatural
author: Eiji Hashimoto
synopsis: Kazama Endo is the ultimate delinquent, unbeaten in a fight. He goes to scope out a boy who beat up his henchmen, but it turns out this boy is anything but ordinary!

title: Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume Desu.
genre: Romance, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Okinosuke
synopsis: Some 20 years have passed since the protagonist was summoned to another world and retired from the army. He is still single in his 40s and lives as a low-ranking professor, until one day, an elite 'monster girl' transfers into his class.

title: Hungry Marie
genre: Genderswap, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Supernatural
author: Ryuuhei Tamura
synopsis:
From the author of Beelzebub.  
  
Taiga is the heir to a Buddhist temple, while Anna is the poster child of the neighboring church. Normally these two star-crossed lovers would be just that. However, one day, Taiga discovers that Anna's church has a plan to resurrect a certain French aristocrat

title: Yuusha No Mago to Maou No Musume
genre: Action, Adventure, Magic, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy
author: Ran Fudou
synopsis: After the great battle between the Demon King and the Hero, justice prevailed and the devils scattered. The Demon King was killed. A few years later, the Demon King's daughter went on a journey to find her father's heritage, and met the granddaughter of the Hero.

title: Birdy the Mighty Evolution
genre: Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Aliens
author: Masami Yuuki
synopsis: After two years of being dormant inside Tsutomu Senkawa, an accidental encounter with their old nemesis violently wakes Birdy up. With Birdy kicking evil's ass once again, the dark secrets of the experiments conducted by the "Agni" corporation are slowly revealed. They seem to be dabbling with human body enhancement, creating what they call "beast men," to combat the alien invasions related to Birdy.

title: Yume Miru Happa
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Hisaya Nakajo
synopsis:
The first collection of volumized short stories by the author of "For You in Full Blossom" / ??????????? ("Hanazakari no Kimitachi e").   
  
1) The Dreaming Leaf (Yume Miru Happa) -   
Futaba (=Two Leaves) departs for Tokyo to attend high school there. In order to relieve the financial burden slightly and achieve independence, she finds a live-in work situation at an old mansion. She becomes (fighting) friends with one of three good-looking fortune-telling employees there, Masato, who attends her same high school and is even in her same class. But then one day, Futaba discovers the secret of the old mansion which is!?   
  
2) 17 Romance (17 [Juunana] Romansu) -   
Natsume, now in high school, was raised like the son her father never had, and so she's determined never to lose out to any man. Homare Misono has been her guy friend for 17 years. Despite their closeness, Natsume always feels the disadvantage her gender places her at. Homare is stronger and better than her at a lot of things. And after saving her from a pervert on the streets, he kisses her!?  
  
3) The Law of Couples (Futari no Housoku) -   
The Law of Couples states that all things happen in pairs  including people. Sakiko seems to have found her missing half in Akio, a boy in her same class who always seems to say exactly what she's thinking. But who is she falling in love with? Akio, or the part of herself that she sees in him?   
  
4) Heart Fruit (Haato no Kajitsu) -   
Meron and her best friend, Chiho, both have a crush on Uchiyama! Meron finds out after she's already told Chiho that she has a crush, so she needs to lie about who she likes in order to protect Chiho's feelings. She chooses Ryou! The scariest, coldest guy in school, rumored to be an underground ring leader! If anyone will reject her love confession, it'll be him! It works, but then Chiho begins to cry for Meron's sake, and Meron turns to mush she tells Chiho that she'll try harder to win Ryou's love!? How deep is she going to dig her grave?? But for some reason, Ryou really doesn't seem that scary to Meron

title: The Curious Case of Chronicle
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Eojjeoda
synopsis:
"Who says revenge is vain? It's so fun!"

In a world where magic co-exists with the rule of nobles, Adrian Lawrence seemed to have gotten lucky in life as the second son of a viscount. Despite this, Adrian is an outcast in a home controlled by his scheming step-mother and half-brother, who are set on ousting him. 

Little do they know that Adrian plays the game Chronicle Online, where he possesses great powers that can also be used in reality! 

With heirship to the viscounty up for grabs, can Adrian use his powers to level up his real life?

title: Witch Hat Atelier
genre: Award Winning, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kamome Shirahama
synopsis:
In a world where everyone takes wonders like magic spells and dragons for granted, Coco is a girl with a simple dream: she wants to be a wizard. 
But everybody knows magicians are born, not made, and she was not born with a gift for magic. 
Resigned to her un-magical life, Coco is about to give up on her dream until the day she meets Qifrey, a mysterious traveling magician. After secretly watching him perform magic in a way shes never seen before, Coco soon learns what everybody knows might not be the truth and discovers that her magical dream may not be as far away as it seems
  
- Winner of the 2020 Eisner Award for Best U.S. Edition of International Material-Asia.  
- Winner of the Best Manga award at the 2020 Harvey Awards.  


---

title: Return of the Blossoming Blade
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: LICO
synopsis:
Chung Myung, The 13th Disciple of the Mount Hua Sect, One of the 3 Great Swordsmen, Plum Blossom Sword Saint, defeated Chun Ma, who has brought destruction and disarray onto the world. 

After the battle, he breathes his last breath on top of the headquarter mountain of the Heavenly Demon Sect. 

He is reborn after 100 years in the body of a child. What? The Mount Hua Sect has fallen? What kind of nonsense is that!?

---
