title: Flounders
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
author: Kusu Igumo
synopsis:
Just because hes physically big, hes expected to act like a tough guy Ooda Jun is an office worker whos fed up with living up to other peoples expectations of him. On his way home from work one day, he stops by an outdoor store where he meets a cheerful clerk named Itsuki Takeru. Unable to resist the sales talk, Ooda Jun goes camping for the first time with the man! At first he isnt keen on the idea, but slowly Ooda Jun learns about the joys of the outside world

A camping BL featuring a Free-Spirited Camper X a Businessman who struggles with the gap between them!

title: Ultimate Son-In-Law
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Xiaoqing
synopsis:
Shen Lang traveled to the past and became a matrilocal son-in-law of a wealthy family. And yet he was kicked out for being a good-for-nothing. So he swore that he would marry a more powerful and striking noblewoman.

I'm not going to practice martial arts in my whole life! I'll groom my wife to be the No.1 martial master in the world! She will kick the ass of anyone who dares to mess with me!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32611)

title: Nigate Na Koibito
genre: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Kiyo Ueda
synopsis: A straight-forward coming-out love story between a cool high school boy and a handsome classmate who fall in love!! Kasahara, a high school student , is outed as gay at school and then isolated from his class. The only person whose attitude doesn't change is his classmate, Katou. Irritated by Katou's kindness, Kasahara blurts out, "What would you do if I told you I like you?" However, upon hearing this, Kato makes a bold move, saying, "I like you too!!" And so they start dating!?

title: Confession
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yuu Kirihara
synopsis: The handsome and affectionate pilot Zhou Jingze x the gentle and firm doctor Xu Sui. Summer is always hot, and so is the boy I love. Watch "Infatuated Prodigal Son" Zhou Jingze perform this role.

title: Kawaii Koi Wa Kikazaranai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic
author: Masaya Ziki
synopsis: Amano Emi likes wearing cute clothes. One day, as she is arguing with a pick up artist who was harassing a girl, a drink is thrown at her. She is saved by a stranger...

title: Seinaru Kishi No Ankokudou
genre: Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Nitaka Ichifuji
synopsis:
Young Sain Forth has it made; as the famed Holy Knight, he has the people's love, the respect of kings, and the blessings of a literal goddess. His aspirations lie elsewhere, though. With his assistant Melia at his side, he leaves for an academy in a foreign kingdom, where he is treated as a deviant by his peers. It's his own fault, mind youhis stubborn insistence on wearing a custom, all-black uniform makes him stick out.

He isn't the only outcast in his class: Alicia, born into the Clan of Light but unable to use anything but fire magic, faces similar struggles, and the two quickly become allies. Alicia proposes that they enter the labyrinth below the school in search of a holy sword, but Sain has other plans in mind: a doom sword. And so, with his friends in tow, Sain ventures into the perilous unknown, driven by a wish to become the coolest, edgiest, most awesome thing in existence: a Dark Knight. There's just one problem. He can't use dark magic. Like, at all.
___
[Official English Translation of the Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/the-holy-knight-s-dark-road)

title: Motoyan Musume, Koi O Suru
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Mayumi Katou
synopsis: Spin-off/Spiritual Sequel of the authors other work "The Mentor and the New Employee Who are Getting More and More Into Each Other"; with this story focusing on the mask wearing former delinquent and her budding romance with the little brother of the Female MC of the previous work.

title: I'M the Male Lead'S Patron
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Go-Ra
synopsis:
Chae Yu-ra is an ordinary girl who likes to watch online game broadcasts. She becomes the sole sponsor of an unknown streamer, Choi Ji-hyuk, who plays a virtual reality game called Constellation. But one day, she wakes up inside the game and discovers that she is Choi Ji-hyuk's constellation, which means she can grant him wishes and powers.

Choi Ji-hyuk, on the other hand, is an elite hunter who is determined to take revenge on the constellation that abandoned him in the past. He is unaware that his constellation is actually Chae Yu-ra, the girl he despises for her lack of skill at the game. How will they relate to each other in this dangerous world full of mysteries?

title: Helmut: the Forsaken Child
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Nan-Sae Kim
synopsis:
Helmut was a child who had been abandoned in the Demonic Beast Forest at birth.
Raised by Demonic Beasts, the first human that he met was the Sword Saint Darien.
Little did Helmut know that the chance encounter would soon shake the foundation of his fate

Grow stronger If you want to get out of here.

The boy whod lived like a beast was thrown into the human world!
He possessed overwhelming swordsmanship, outstanding looks and sharp intelligence, but there was one thing he lacked: humanity.

I am no longer a prey. I am now a predator!

title: Duke Pendragon: Master of the White Dragon
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yuusuke Utsumi
synopsis:
Born as the successor of a low-ranking noble household, Raven Varte wears the sin of plotting a rebellion against the empire. To be granted amnesty, he was sent to fight demons alongside the worst corp of the empire, the Demon corp. Most say that it is a place where most wont survive for even a year, but Raven somehow managed to survive for ten. When his amnesty was in front of his eyes, on his last battlefield, he met the Successor of the Pendragon Duke Household, Eren Pendragon.

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRX266roHHM)

---
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58558135)

title: Yuusha Party Ni Kawaii Ko Ga Ita No De, Kokuhaku Shite Mita
genre: Reincarnation, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Kairi
synopsis: Youki was reincarnated in another world. However, instead of being reincarnated as the hero or the demon lord, he was instead reincarnated half-assedly as a minion of the Demon Lord. One day, the Hero's Party attacked the Demon Lord's castle with the intent of defeating the Demon Lord. Of course, Youki was able to repel their attempt with ease. In spite of this, he ended up falling for the cleric, Cecilia, at first sight...

title: Kaichou-San Chi No Koneko
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Kazuko Furumiya
synopsis:
Because of his much-too-strict character, the excellent and capable student council president Hayami Reiichirou is often isolated from his surroundings. But things change when, one day, he is forced to take care of a kitten he received from his workaholic mother who divorced his father and left the family long ago. Seeking help from the student council's resident cat-lover, Shiraishi Kotoko, the once stern and unapproachable Reiichirou begins to?!  
  
Also contains the story Gakuran Ouji:  
  
Kiyomi has secretly been using the prince of her school, Narumi-kun, as a model for her manga, "Gakuran Ouji."  
Why is this? Because of how elegant and perfect Gakuran looks on him, of course!! Even Narumi-kun is unaware of his use of image in Kiyomi's manga until one day, Kiyomi accidently falls and drops her drawn images infront of him..

title: 1Hp Club
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Tatsuya Shihira
synopsis: A comic about the daily life of dungeon boys. Slaying the city, saving the dragons... or something like that.

title: Tyra & Cera
genre: Animals, Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma
author: Hiro Ichikawa
synopsis: A herbivorous dinosaur cricket that has encountered a horrible carnivorous dinosaur.

title: Class No Gal Ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color, Gyaru
author: Bayreez
synopsis:
A boy named Ryuuji Aizawa is getting treated by his gyaru classmates like he wasn't there, like this girl named Nana Aino who sits on his seat. With him still in it.

---

Released as a free ebook compilation on Amazon under the title: *Aino Nana no Keikaku: Class no Gal ni Kuuki Atsukai Sareteimasu (??????? ??????????????????)* "Nana Aino's Plan: The Gals in My Class Treat Me Like Air"; Volume 1 contains chapters 1-24 including some new textless illustrations.

* Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Tranquillity650/status/1721818260436644142)

title: Dancing Baby Karin
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, School Life
author: Yuka Fujiwara
synopsis:
Karin is a student of an institute that's very strict, but then leaves class to be dedicated to street dance in a club called "Free Square," that is in fact, one of the best. One day while dancing with her friends a group of boys who play basketball arrive and Karin falls in love at first sight with their leader, Yuuma Seta. Some thugs want to be in the club and Yuuma challenges them to a game of basketball, but the thugs are cheating...
___
Included one-shots:
* Volume 1: Pop'n Eight Beat
* Volume 2:
  * Bokura no Kokoro
  * Hug!: Haruka has a dog... A dog she ABSOLUTELY loves! Every single day, she gives him hugs and kisses~! Upon entering high school, she suddenly meets a boy... with the same name as her dog... looks like her dog... and acts like her dog in every way possible! Can Haruka resist the temptation of wanting to hug and kiss him like she does to her dog?

title: Tokyo?Revengers
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Ken Wakui
synopsis:
Takemichi is a 26-year-old unemployed virgin who learns that the girl he dated in middle school, the only girl he ever dated, has died. Then, after an accident he finds himself in a time leap back to his middle school years. He vows to change the future and save the girl, and to do that he aims to rise to the top of the Kanto region's most brutal delinquent gang.

---

**Notes:**
- The original Japanese title contains the manji symbol, so it will not be removed from the title on MangaDex.
- Addendum on the "Manji" for those uninformed. From Seven Seas' Omnibus Edition:
  *"In East Asia the manji (?) is an ancient religious symbol of power and good fortune for many different countries and religions around the world, including Buddhism, Hinduism, Jainism, and a number of Indo-European and Native American religions as well."* 
*"The specific meaning of the symbol varies by nation and religion, and also by the position of the "arms" of the cross--whether they face left or right, or whether the cross is tilted or straight."* 
*"In the 1930s, the swastika symbol--a clockwise, tilted cross--was adopted by the Nazi Political Party in Germany, and gained a negative reputation as a symbol of hatred in the modern world."*
*"The manji used by the Tokyo Manji Gang as their emblem is intended to be the ancient Buddhist symbol, as evidenced by the appearance of its counterclockwise, straight arms..."*

---

**Links:**
- [Official English Translation (Seven Seas)](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/tokyo-revengers-omnibus)
- [Official English Translation (Kodansha USA)](https://kodansha.us/series/tokyo-revengers)

title: Uramiya Honpo
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Sexual Violence, Drama
author: Shoushou Kurihara
synopsis:
The world is filled with cruel scum, ranging from petty thieves to sociopath maniacs. When a vile low-life inflicts pain and suffering on innocent victims, sometimes their anger becomes overwhelming. Whether their damage stems from romance, finance, reputation or even a death, these victims feel trapped in their own skins and lives. 

Those victims who can't stand it anymore call for the mysterious woman Houjou Shiori, owner of Uramiya, the "Revenge Shop". 

The Uramiya specializes in executing revenge schemes. The vengeance their customers request on their bitterly resented enemies could range from financially destroying them, to smearing their social reputation, to even taking their lives. As long as you pay a fair price, the Uramiya will guarantee you get the revenge you deserve.

title: Kaijuu-Kun
genre: Award Winning, Monsters, Drama, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Ruu 1mm
synopsis:
Musashino Art University, Department of Visual Communication Design, 2021 graduation project.

When he was in elementary school, a boy who had been trying to save his childhood friend from being bullied by a bully turned violent.
Now, as a junior high school student, his classmates nickname him "Kaiju-kun" and distance themselves from him.
One day, a girl who is "half Kaiju" joins his class.
She seems to have come to school to make friends with many people......
A heartwarming monster coming-of-age story about the pain of school life and friendship!

title: Yesterday O Utatte
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kei Toume
synopsis: After college, Rikuo Uozumi, a boy without much ambition in life, takes on a job at a convenience store. The days pass by uneventfully for Rikuo until he meets his former love interest and classmate, but especially thanks to the unusual Haru Nonaka, and her pet crow

title: Fukushuu O Koinegau Saikyou Yuusha Wa, Yami No Chikara De Senmetsu Musou Suru
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Psychological, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Akira Sakamoto
synopsis:
Raoul, who had defeated the demon king as the strongest hero, should have become the savior of the world. Having his treasured companions and family killed by power-hungry aristocrats, he was executed with false charges brought against him by the princess. Just before his life collapsed, at last, his heart fell into darkness.

"I'll tear those traitors from limb to limb. Burn them at the stake. Sever them to pieces. Skewer them. I'll kill every one of those bastards without mercy and make them taste hell's suffering.....!!!"

Obtaining the power of darkness, Raoul was revived. Sneering, he vowed revenge. "Oh, I'm looking forward to it  from now on, I'll bask in their blood as I please." Several days after the hero's revival in the imperial capital where flowers bloomed in profusion, the parade that would advance towards tragedy began.

title: Shoukoku No Altair
genre: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Adventure, Military, Drama, Fantasy
author: Kotono Katou
synopsis:
For generations the Torqye Pashalu and the Balt-Rhein Empire have stood in stern opposition of each other. Then one night, when an Imperial minister is found assassinated, the two nations are plunged into a potentially explosive situation. As the generals of Torqye's council cry for war, Mahmut comes to discover the devious truth behind the assassination. Thus the young pasha's battle for his country and peace and trust in his fellow man begins  

---

title: Ijigen Seitai Cyborg 0-Ban
genre: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Aliens, Supernatural
author: Ryousuke Momota
synopsis: Not found

title: Guiding Him Patiently
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Wuxia, Web Comic, Full Color
author: fiya Zhao Youmao
synopsis: Fashion stylist Ji Xun, who travels through ancient times, expects to marry a rich and beautiful woman and reach the pinnacle of his life, but instead he is targeted by a man who stares him down! Is all this a bad debt in this life or an unresolved bond from his past life?

title: Hunter X Hunter
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Animals, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Yoshihiro Togashi
synopsis: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.

title: Me and My Beast Boss
genre: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Shiroinu
synopsis:
In a world where beastmen stand on top of humans, OL Saki continues to struggle to lose.

Saki endured the days of power harassment from her boss, but one day she was suddenly called by the company president, Atlas.

I'll do my best!

Mofumofu story with 100% power of healing ?

title: Hwa
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life
author: Jong-Eun Lee
synopsis: A collection of short stories.

title: Lost Universe
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Adaptation
author: Hajime Kanzaka
synopsis: Kane Blueriver and Canal, his AI companion, are trouble contractors who take jobs which require their special skills. This could go from armed escort, to patrol, to capturing dangerous criminals. Milly is a private eye who has to be the best at everything (uchuu ichi!!). When the three of them get together, they run into one mess after another, gradually uncovering more of a mystery that ties the legendary Lost Ships to all of their pasts, bringing them closer and closer to a discovery that something called Nightmare would rather not have them find

title: Rekishi Ni Nokoru Akujo Ni Naruzo: Akuyaku Reijou Ni Naru Hodo Ouji No Dekiai Wa Kasoku Suru You Desu!
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Izumi Ookido
synopsis:
"I don't want a world full of only pretty things! I'll become a villainess who will go down in history!!"

For someone who hates a typical "good girl" heroine, I was reincarnated as my favorite otome-game villainess! Since my wish has been granted, I'll be the number one villainess who will go down in history! For that to happen, I need to be strong and intelligent! Also, although I'm just... doing my best, the more of a villainess I become, the more I'm liked by the Prince?! Can I really go down in history??!

title: Kimi No Iru Machi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kouji Seo
synopsis:
Kirishima Haruto lives in a small town in Hiroshima and is just about to enter high school when Eba Yuzuki, a mysterious girl from Tokyo suddenly decided to go to high school in the countryside and despite his objections, she moves in to his home.  
  
Haruto must now put up and take care of this clumsy freeloading city girl and at the same time, make sure his long time crush Kanzaki Nanami doesn't get the wrong idea!  
  
This story takes place a few years after the popular sports romance Suzuka and is based on the author, Seo Koujis hometown.

title: The Hero Trained by the Worst Demon King Is Unrivaled in the School of Returnees From Another World
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
author: Iwaba
synopsis:
Without possessing the unique skill blessed by the goddess, Kujou Kyouya failed to save the world.

He was ridiculed as a failed hero at the interdimensional-level academy where returned heroes who had saved many worlds gathered. However, he became the strongest and most unique hero, having trained for 30,000 years in another world with the most evil demon king, Felice, who has destroyed 3,000 worlds! 

Now Kyouyas unique skill is so powerful that he cannot even be defeated by the strongest heroes!

---

- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58212),  [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1299578/vol_no/001)

title: Chi.: Chikyuu No Undou Ni Tsuite
genre: Award Winning, Historical, Psychological, Drama, Mystery
author: Uoto
synopsis: The setting is 15th century Poland. It was a time when heretical ideas lead those to who possessed such a mindset to being burned at the stake for their beliefs. Rafal, a child prodigy, is expected to major in theology, the most important subject at the time, at the university. One day, however, he comes across a mysterious man, and is now studying a possible "truth" in the midst of heretical thought!

title: Tsuruko Returns the Favor
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Hidari Yokoyama
synopsis:
Nekokado is an extremely straight-laced high school teacher who has lived alone since the death of his sister. But one day, he discovers a photo of her in a maid costume. He goes to a concept café in order to investigate his sister's secret, but there he meets a girl named Tsuruko?!

(Source:MANGA Plus)

title: Wild Strawberry
genre: Monsters, Action, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy
author: Tomoyuki Enoki
synopsis: Plants have evolved. They can now feed on humans and become terrible monsters known as Jinka. Kingo and Kayano do their best to survive in a Tokyo overrun by plants, but when Kayano becomes a Jinka, Kingo will do anything he can to get her back!

title: Nisekoi: False Love
genre: Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Naoshi Komi
synopsis:
When Raku Ichijou was young, he made a heartfelt promise to his childhood friend that if they were to meet again, they would marry each other. Ten years have passed since that fateful day, leaving Raku's memory of her faded. But he still holds a relic of their relationship togethera locked pendant, which his childhood friend holds the key to. He hopes to reunite with her one day, despite not remembering what she looks like.  
  
Now a first-year student at Bonyari High School, Raku attempts to live a normal life, dreaming of becoming a public servant and marrying his crush Kosaki Onodera. However, this isn't as easy as it seems, as he is the unwilling heir to a large yakuza family, and Raku can't escape from his duties when the American Bee Hive gang wages war on his family's turf. In order to forge peace between the two feuding families, Raku is forced into a fake romantic relationship with Chitoge Kirisaki, the beautiful daughter of the Bee Hive's leader. The two quickly come to hate each other, but have to learn to live together and pretend to be deeply in love in order to keep their families at bay.  
  
However, Raku's quest for the key to his pendant isn't becoming easier as more girlswho were all involved with his pendant in some wayenter his life. Join Raku as he juggles his false relationship, maintains the balance between warring families, and unravels the identity of the girl who will unlock his heart.

title: Tenshi to Akuto!!
genre: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Aya Hirakawa
synopsis:
Ikurumi Akuto is the top of his class in every subject, including sports, and he knows it. The son of a well-known politician, a degree of arrogance is to be expected. But Akuto takes it to a new extreme with his condescending and self-important attitude. It doesn't help matters that his effeminate voice makes him a target of constant ridicule by his "lower class" schoolmates.  
  
Then Harusaka Nari enters his life, and Akuto's controlling personality is thrown off kilter by the optimistic but manipulating young seiyuu. With his life on the line, he agrees to be a voice in her Anime Research Society's project for the upcoming Cultural Festival... as the female lead?!

title: Kemomimi Miko-San
genre: Monsters, Monster Girls, Web Comic
author: Yukari Higa
synopsis: Not found

title: Bi No Isu
genre: Action, Anthology, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Reibun Ike
synopsis:
1-3: Bi no Isu (The Coercion Chair)  
Kabu and Nirasawa have a troubled relationship, to say the least. Harsh yakuza lifestyle, torture, and violent sex are everyday occurrences for the volatile couple.  
  
4: Tokage to Choutsugai  
Emiri is impotent, thanks to his trauma of being molested by his childhood friend, Fuyu. Years later, Emiri is finally seeking treatment for his condition, but why is Fuyu wearing that white coat?! And why is the nurse's skirt so short?  
  
5: Seiritsu Shinai Asa (The Morning That Will Never Happen)  
What will happen years later when senpai and kouhai meet again? Is loving someone that frightening?

title: Exoskull Zero
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Takayuki Yamaguchi
synopsis:
At the end of the 21st century, humans have made great advancements in technology and were able to create a giant energy source to power that technology. However, this new source of energy overloaded and turned into a more devastating force than nuclear weapons. The catastrophe wiped out the majority of human civilization and those who survived lived in terror of the anarchy that took over.  
  
Hagakure Kakugo comes from a secret family that has protected people for generations from powerful organizations and evil from taking over. They are only awoken in time of need and it has been decades since Kakugo was conscious. His body had been heavily modified by fusing it with metals to enhance both his offense and defense. He uses an armor called the Exoskull that attaches to him to greatly boost his already superhuman power. Thus begins a story about a young man and his armors journey through hell.

title: Keiyaku Shimai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love
author: Hijiki
synopsis:
Kasane Hayafuji's secret joy in life is seeing Aoyama-san, a waitress at a family restaurant. One night, she saw Aoyama standing alone in the rain. When she tried to help, Aoyama suddenly made her an offer.

"Will you be my big sister?"

title: Chobits
genre: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: CLAMP
synopsis: Hideki's just like every other guy in the 22nd century. He just wants a good job, a good car, and a sexy robot girlfriend to call his own. Until he lands a job, he'll never be able to afford his own 'Persocom' companion. Hideki's luck changes when he discovers Chian adorable but seemingly stupid Persocomtied up in a pile of trash. His first robot companion turns out to be a lot more responsibility than he expected, and she gets him into quite a few embarrassing situations. It's 'boy-meets-girl' for the cyber age.

title: Shiotaiou No Sato-San Ga Ore Ni Dake Amai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kazami Sawatari
synopsis:
Satou-san is the unattainable flower of the class. She is always cold and curt with classmates, but only I know she's actually very cute when she smiles, even if she's not much of a photographer.  
Oshio-kun is friendly and lively, but only I know he works at his family's cafe after school. He does a great job with the cafe's SNS account, and his mischievous smile makes my heart skip a beat!  
Innocent and sweet, but sometimes frustrating, this is a 120%-pure fluffy story about two people falling in love for the first time.

title: A Cruel God Reigns
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Moto Hagio
synopsis:
A Savage God Reigns portrays the tale of two step-brothers  Jeremy and Ian  as they strive to discover their separate paths towards redemption.  
 
---
- **Won the 1st Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 1997**

title: The Legend of the Northern Blade
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Hae-Min
synopsis:
When the world was plunged into darkness by the Silent Night, Martial Artists from all over the place gathered to form the Northern Heavenly Sect. With overwhelming strength from the Northern Heavenly Sect, the Silent Night was pushed away and the people began to enjoy peace once more. However, as time passed the martial artists from the mainlands began to conspire against the Northern Heavenly Sect, and eventually caused the death of the Fourth Generation Sect Leader, Jin Kwan-Ho, destroying the sect with it. As everyone left the sect, Jin Kwan-Hos only son, Jin Mu-Won was left behind. Mu-Won has never learned anything about martial arts, but he eventually finds the Martial Techniques secretly left behind by his father and begins to acquire the martial arts of the Northern Heavenly Sect. Then one day, a mysterious girl appears before Mu-Won!!

title: Wakaba-Sanchi No Aoi Koi
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Akane Ogata
synopsis: Youth romcom about 4 sisters who are all experiencing their first love at the same time. While the eldest is having a crush on the guy at her part-time work, the other three are dealing with their first romantic experiences with boys in their classes and school clubs. Every night, the four have heart-to-heart girls talks as they navigate their respective first loves.

title: Teihen Ossan, Cheat Kokusei De Isekai Rakuraku Life
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Ai Sakai

title: Hug Shite! Kaeru-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yan Fei
synopsis:
A BL story about two polar opposites in their youth? Takanashi, the student council president, is good-looking, smart, and admired by all the students. Recently, he has been sneaking off to a frog-branded milk tea shop - for every cup he buys, he gets a hug from a frog mascot. It's a soothing hug that relieves the pressures of everyday life. Before he knows it, he's curious about the person inside...

A classmate who seems rugged but is always there for him x A student council president who seems like a perfect superhuman but is actually too cute!

title: Fairy Tail: 100 Years Quest
genre: Loli, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Hiro Mashima
synopsis:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---

- Indonesian release by Elex Media

title: Yofukashi No Uta
genre: Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Vampires, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kotoyama
synopsis:
Unable to sleep or find true satisfaction in his daily life, Yamori Kou begins wandering the night streets. He encounters a strange girl who offers to help soothe his insomnia by sleeping beside him, but it is not merely a one-way exchange

---

title: Black Bounds
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Yasumi Holiday
synopsis: Not found

title: Toaru Anbu No Item
genre: Sci-Fi, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kazuma Kamachi
synopsis:
In Academy City, where esper abilities have been recognized as a general science. Behind the peace, there is a dark side organization that undertakes missions that cannot be made public.

"Item" is an elite unit consisting of four girls. Takitsubo Rikou is able to read and track the weak power emitted by those with abilities. Frenda Seivelun, who excels in combat using explosives and traps. Kinuhata Saiai, who can manipulate nitrogen at will and plays a defensive role. And one of the 7 espers that Academy City is proud of: Mugino Shizuri. They live freely in the darkness of the Academy City, and quietly set their sights on their target...!

This is a story of encounter, friendship, and darkness that eventually leads to a 'terrible incident'!

title: Tensei Shitara Akari Dake Ga Slime Datta Ken
genre: Reincarnation, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Naya Minadori
synopsis: The Amusement Club gets transported to another world... and Akari turns into a slime. A new Yuru Yuri isekai spinoff.

title: Kara No Kioku
genre: Action, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Newo
synopsis:
Between a recent move to Tokyo and the first day of high school, Rei starts his day filled with anxiety and insecurity. His nervousness accompanies him to the classroom, where amidst the classroom chatter, Rei is suddenly struck with a strange dream, followed by an aching in his chest.  
  
Once he wakes up, Rei is greeted by a small creature standing on his desk. Passing it off as part of his dream, Rei heads home. However, to his surprise, numerous other strange creatures of all shapes and sizes roam the streets, seemingly invisible to everyone else.  
  
With countless questions and the small creature from before trailing behind him, Rei's life is changed forever when he encounters a tall one-eyed figure, dressed in all black, smiling at him.
___
**Note:** This manga is based on the song of the same name.

title: Neko Ni Wa Neko No Neko Gohan.
genre: Animals, Slice of Life
author: Kaworu Watashiya
synopsis:
A kitten lies dying in the snow. It seems that it had eaten poisoned cat food.

When our protagonist, Mano Taiyou, chanced upon the kitten, he panicked and hurriedly brought it to the vet.

After being rescued, the kitten was taken in by Taiyou and given the name Yuki. Unfortunately, Yuki has been traumatized by its near death experience from eating the poisoned cat food and is now unable to eat dry kibbles.

This a heartwarming story of Yuki the cat and his owner, Taiyou as he struggles as a beginner cook to make home made food for Yuki.

title: Watashi, Shachiku Yamete Douga De Tabeteikimasu
genre: Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic
author: Grande
synopsis:
Tired of her exhausting, thankless office work, Midorihara Mitsuha, a corporate slave, decided to quit and pursue her hobby: Making videos. She aims to bring happiness to everyone around the world with her ASMR contents, but it seems to have a different result than she'd imagined...

---

title: Asa Okitara Onnanoko Ni Natteta Manga
genre: Genderswap, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Crimson
synopsis: A man wakes up one morning to find out he is now a girl - and he also now has a sister.

title: Kaiki Ningyou-Kan
genre: Romance, Anthology, Survival, Magic, Gore, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Kanako Inuki
synopsis:

title: Just Chisataki Kissing
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Girls' Love, Doujinshi
author: Tensou
synopsis: Not found

title: Oyasumi Moratorium
genre: 4-Koma
author: Hinomaru
synopsis: Not found

title: Hunting in Another World with My Elf Wife
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kaltoma
synopsis:
In modern Hokkaido a brown bear has appeared near an elementary school, so a member of the local hunters' association is dispatched to exterminate it. However he gets killed by the bear and wakes up in a fantasy world, armed with only the Remington M870 shotgun he had when he died.
___
**Character Designer:** [Yuunagi](https://mangadex.org/author/58f536f6-3ede-40cc-8b41-82efb77d1919)

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/48586)

title: Jigoku Kurayami Hana Mo Naki
genre: Thriller, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Crime, Magic, Philosophical, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Ruka Toudou
synopsis:
A beautiful boy detective and his NEET assistant's "hell-bound" case file!

Toono Seiji, who sees criminals as monsters, meets a handsome boy, Saijou Shiroshi, who runs a consultation office in a weathered Western-style house. For some reason, he ends up working as an assistant for Shiroshi, who has excellent insight and bewitchingly good looks...

title: Babanbabanban Vampire
genre: Comedy, Boys' Love, Vampires
author: Hiromasa Okujima
synopsis: A BL (Bloody Love comedy) set in a long established bathhouse between a skilled vampire and a super pure virgin high school boy.

title: Tensei Saki Ga Zannen Ouji Datta Ken ~Ima Wa Fukkin 1-Kai Mo Dekinai Kedo Yasete Isekai Sukuimasu~
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kaifukushi
synopsis: A young man who gets into a plane crash while returning from a business trip overseas is reincarnated into another world after being asked by the goddess to defeat the evil god. However, he was reincarnated as a stupid prince who is known among the aristocrats as the "Pig Prince (Orc Prince)" because of his fat and ugly appearance. If you can't even do one sit-up, how are you going to defeat the evil god?

title: Shirokuro Sekai
genre: Philosophical, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Rio Nanamomo
synopsis: A series of stories between a girl with black hair and a girl with white hair

title: Ryouko No Shinrei Jikenbo
genre: Romance, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Chie Shinohara
synopsis: Ryouko Midorikawa is a girl in her first year of high school. One day the cat she had raised and loved for 15 years suddenly dies. Although Pow hated water, he died drowning. Ryouko is lost in questions about the cause of his death. But from that night on, terrible things start happening everywhere around her!

title: Immortal, Invincible
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dikeurisi
synopsis:
From a thieving child to one who would shake the world. Rising to the title of Immortal Master, one of the Godly Twelve Stars, but ultimately betrayed. Now, he has been given a chance to change that, and create a better future- for both him, and the world. Based on the popular novel of the same name.

---

title: Champignon No Majo
genre: Romance, Magic, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Tachibana Higuchi
synopsis: Luna, a black witch who lives quietly in a poisonous mushroom house, deep in the Black Forest. She lives in the city making high-efficiency medicine, but it is rumored that one will die if touched by her, and thus she is avoided The life of a witch who doesn't know the warmth of people is carefully and momentarily drawn.

title: Tsuraneko
genre: Monsters, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Takatoshi Kumakura
synopsis:
Chibi-chan, a middle school girl, can go no further than 2km from the sacred tree that servers as her town's symbol. That is her "disability".
Then one day, a mysterious figure arrives in town to help the girl's wish to leave, her name is Rokushaku-sensei.
Guided by Rokushaku, Chibi attempts to bypass her "disability" by going to "Nedoko", backroads that can transport her to another location.
However, those places are part of a mysterious world, filled with mysterious creatures.
In her desire to see the world, Chibi-chan will have to triumph over these "Nedoko".

title: Senyuu.
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Robinson Haruhara
synopsis:
Once upon a time, a Demon King named Rchimedes caused havoc and destruction in the Human World. He was sealed away by the great hero Creasion, and peace returned to the world.  
  
1000 years later, Rchimedes has returned, a hole has opened up in the Human World, and countless monsters have sprung up. To prevent any further destruction, the King calls upon all 75 (probable) descendants of Creasion.  
  
This story focuses on the adventures of descendant number 45, Alba, and the royal soldier appointed to assist him, Ross.  
  
[Senyuu Season 1](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu)    
[Senyuu Season 2](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu2)  
[Senyuu Season 3](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu3)  
[Senyuu Season 4](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu4)  
[Senyuu+](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyuplus)  
[Senyuu F5 Reload](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39515)

title: Henai Café
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life
author: Meika Arisaki
synopsis: Somewhere there is a strange café called "Statice" where all sorts of even stranger people meet, each with a very special and different fetish. The owner, Mr. Sennichi, welcomes these special customers every day, and tries to help them solve their fetish related problems.

title: Jichou Shinai Moto Yuusha No Tsuyokute Tanoshii New Game
genre: Reincarnation, Loli, Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Teiyan
synopsis:
Orion is a former hero who has been reborn in a different world he once saved as a "hero". Taking advantage of his second round of heroic heroism, he takes on the world's strongest and wisest maid who was once in the same party with him, picks up a slave girl, and trains her with "heroic-style power leveling"! Even if you are attacked by a thief monster girl, you can easily convert her and get her a friend!

The former hero who never takes responsibility for his own actions, who has acquired a luxurious mansion, the most powerful equipment, beautiful women, fame, and everything else he needs to live his life the way he wants to, has started a new game of strength and fun!

title: Kantai Collection -Kancolle- 4-Koma Comic: Fubuki, Ganbarimasu!
genre: Historical, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Ryouta Momoi
synopsis: Serialized in Famitsu Comic Clear. Based on the Kantai Collection browser game. Enjoy the heartwarming antics of the World War II-Era Japanese Imperial Navy in the form of cute girls training at the ship girl school.

title: Inkya Gyaru Demo Ikigaritai!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Gyaru
author: Tsukiko Kashiwagi
synopsis: Ichiko and Kuran are members of the subculture research club. They like various subcultures and they like cute stuff. Read along as these two asocial gyaru spend their days in their new kind of "youthful moratorium."

title: Saint Seiya: the Lost Canvas
genre: Action, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Masami Kurumada
synopsis:
This manga tells the story of the previous Holy War, taking place in the 18th century, 250 years before the original series, in the Saint Seiya universe. The story centers on the relation between Tenma, the Pegasus Saint and his beloved friend, Alone, who would eventually become his greatest enemy, Hades.  
  
The story takes place in the same time period as Saint Seiya Next Dimension.

title: Ninja Slayer: Kyoto, Hell on Earth
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Ninja, Comedy, Zombies, Superhero, Martial Arts, Samurai, Mafia, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Wuxia, Isekai, Gore, Adaptation
author: Yoshiaki Tabata
synopsis: The man who annihilated the Soukaiya, the enemy of his wife and child, and buried Neo-Saitama in flames has appeared in Gaion City, Kyoto Republic! Ninja Slayer's new battle begins to eradicate his other enemy, the Zaibatsu!

title: Ore No Isekai Shimai Ga Jichou Shinai!
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Tanpopopopoko
synopsis:
*"Live free and be happy."*

These were the last words of Amemiya Yuya's sister, who was seriously ill. Despite her wishes, however, Yuya, who was suffering from the same disease as his sister, was supposed to end his short life without fulfilling his promise. But for unknown reasons, Yuya was suddenly reborn in another world. 

Confused by his new life, Yuya begins his life as the second son of a count. One day, Yuya thinks about the possibility that his younger sister has been reincarnated in this other world just like him. 

In this world, there is a sister, a young fiancée, a slave, a maid, etc. - but one of them is his own sister!

---

- ![Syosetsu](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4696dd)

title: Hazure Hantei Kara Hajimatta Cheat Majutsushi Seikatsu
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Shota, Adaptation
author: Chira Shinoura
synopsis:
One day, all the eighth grade students were transferred to another world.

The princess of the other world summoned them to make up for their lack of strength. The students are threatened and decide to follow the princess, and they are made to take a magical power test to determine their abilities. While everyone is sorted according to their results, Kokubun Kento's result is a flop.

Judged as useless, he is expelled. However, there is actually a tremendous ability lurking within Kento... 

The life-size eighth grader Kento, together with his fellow skeletons, aims to rescue his classmates!

---

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5782dy/) (jp)

title: Romance of Darkness
genre: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Chie Shinohara
synopsis: It happened in the blink of an eye. Rikka's world turned upside down when her school field trip bus flipped and plummeted into a lake. Everyone inside that bus drowned except for Rikka, but she wasn't saved by anything as simple as luck. When she was released from the hospital, Rikka was then attacked repeatedly in a series of bizarre incidents all involving water and a sadistic aquatic beauty whose name is  Rikka!? What does our heroine have that the sadistic Rikka wants back? What was it that saved her from drowning, and who gave it to her and why?

title: Getbackers
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural
author: Shin Kibayashi
synopsis:
Blond, hip, pragmatic, and cool, Ginji Amano has the power to generate currents with his body like an electric eel. Brunette, equally hip, bespectacled, and rambunctious, Ban Mido has the mystically mysterious "Evil Eye," the power to create illusions in the minds of his foes. Together, they are the GetBackers, the best retrieval team in the world. They can get back anything taken from clients, and their success rate is (almost) 100%!  
  
However, first they have to get some clientsand soonor this spry detective duo will starve on the streets!

title: Chii-Chan
genre: Thriller, Sexual Violence, School Life, Mystery
author: Shuuzou Oshimi
synopsis:
It was the day Chiichan, who never comes to middle school at all, suddenly showed up in her tattered sweats with dead insects, causing a commotion in the class. Yuua has been with her since kindergarten and cares about her, and her classmate Koudai asks if he can help Chiichan out...
A new series born from a unique collaboration, in which Oshimi Shuuzou depicts the prequel to Chiichan, the aberrant heroine of Naitou Eisuke's film *Poison Girl*, as an original manga *Chiichan*!

title: A Swallow Falling Into the Sea
genre: Psychological, Anthology, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Chie Shinohara
synopsis:
Collection of mysterious stories by Chie Shinohara, a great artist of suspense manga.  
  
Story 01 Part 01 & 02: Umi ni Ochiru Tsubame - Swallow Falling into the Sea  
Masako Minase, a scriptwriter, was murdered by Shiki Morimura, her rival in the same profession. Shiki was sure that she had destroyed evidence completely. However, someone who knew the truth appeared, and tried to get Shiki in his power. Is it a mysterious spot or unhappy desire that lurks in her mind?  
  
Story 02: Kioku no Ashioto - The Footsteps of Memory)  
This is the story about Shouko and the almost tragic moment that changed her life and emotions   
  
Story 03: Shikeidai no 72-jikan - 72 hours of death stand  
Five young people receives a letter saying that they murdered someone and they must go to the address in the letter if they don't want other people to found out. They all find themselves in a old European house, where a crazy lady tells them that one of them is a murderer and if that murderer don't confess in 72 hours, they will all die.

title: Iemeguri
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Daisuki Neruno
synopsis: Not found

title: New Grappler Baki
genre: Action, Psychological, Sports, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama
author: Keisuke Itagaki
synopsis:
Baki Hanma is a generally happy student with a rather odd hobby; he likes fighting. Specifically, he likes fighting in a secret martial arts tournament that gathers the greatest fighters of the world and pits them against each other in really nasty combat. Whether you're a sumo wrestler, a karate expert, or a guy who specializes in ripping out your opponent's nerves, you're welcome to participate (as long as you can keep quiet about it, of course). Anyway, Baki may be the youngest fighter the tournament has ever seen, but he's also the best, and he really enjoys what he does.  
   
AnimeNewsNetwork Links:  
[Season 1](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=2035)  
[Season 2](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=2036)

title: Doku Mushi - the Ruins Hotel
genre: Action, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror
author: Miscio Yazu
synopsis: Six members of the occult circle will spend a few days at a ruined love hotel during their summer vacation. Upon arrival they meet two additional people who join them, but in the morning of the second day, a female member was found tied & naked. In addition, the exit was locked by someone and the building became a completely enclosed cage. Will this be a repeat of the 'kodoku' that happened 3 years ago?

title: Amano Megumi Wa Suki Darake!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Nekoguchi
synopsis: Shindo Manabu is a student at a very prestigious high school whose goal is to get into Tokyo University. He studies constantly and tries to never lose sight of that goal. That is until his childhood friend, Amano Megumi, who goes to the same school starts to distract him. He originally only remembered her as the tomboy she was as a kid, until he notices how "developed" she has become. As these two get closer to each other, hilarity often ensues and subsequently, Manabu becomes more and more distracted from his goal of getting into Tokyo U.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Ocg Structures
genre: Monsters, Action, Drama
author: Masashi Satou
synopsis:
Shoma Yusa, a new kid who moved to Tokyo with his sister, learns how to make friends through Dueling and creating Structure Decks.  
  
*This series is based on the real life Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG (Official Card Game, known in the west as TCG) and how to build the best deck, based on the latest rule- and banlist.*

title: The Bride Who Raises the Villainous Dragon
genre: Historical, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Su Xin
synopsis:
"It seems a magnificent dragon has fallen head over heels for me?"

Pearl, the cursed daughter of a noble, was on her way to being sold off to a neighboring lord when she was suddenly kidnapped. But the one who kidnapped her is none other than Erik a descendant of the Great Dragons. This enchanting yet fierce dragon confronted Pearl with a single demand, to say the words "I like you."...

title: Hataraku Saibou Neko
genre: Sci-Fi, Animals, Comedy, Medical, Slice of Life
author: Meku Kaire
synopsis: Vomiting, poisoning, constipation, vaccines, etc., what is going on inside a cat's body at that time! A must-read manga for cat people to live a healthy life with cats!

title: Gto: Great Teacher Onizuka
genre: Award Winning, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life
author: Tooru Fujisawa
synopsis:
Meet Eikichi Onizuka, a 22-year-old ex-biker. He's crude, foul-mouthed, and has a split-second temper. His unlikely goal: to be the Greatest High School Teacher in the World! Of course, the only reason he wants to be a teacher is so he can try to score with the hot students  
Before he can become a full instructor, he's got to work as a student teacher to earn his credentials. Onizuka may think he's the toughest guy on campus, but when he meets his class full of bullies, blackmailers, and scheming sadists, he'll have to prove it.  
  
---
- **Won the 22nd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen**

title: Touhou Suichouka ~ Lotus Eater-Tachi No Suisei
genre: Thriller, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: ZUN
synopsis: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.

title: Convenient Semi-Friend
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life
author: Minori Chigusa
synopsis: Kuruma Suuna, a gloomy and socially awkward girl, begins her high school dorm life only to discover her new roommate, Hamanasu Ruka, flirting with another girl!

title: Endan Yobanashi
genre: Ghosts, Anthology, Horror, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Kensei Hokamoto
synopsis: This horror anthology presents a collection of eerie ghost stories based on real-life accounts gathered over two decades by the renowned storyteller Yama Yuu. Adapted by Hokamoto Kensei, the manga explores the unsettling facets of human nature and madness, as a mysterious young girl narrates the tales within a secluded room. The stories promise a dark, chilling atmosphere that immerses readers in an eerie journey into the supernatural.

title: The Modern Witch'S Employment Prospects
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Sako Aizawa
synopsis: Tamashiro Neko is a young witch in training, sent off by her parents to finish her studies. In her search for a place to stay, she arrives in a quiet town in the countryside, but then her first trial begins.

title: Ouji-Sama No Dakimakura
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Mitsu Hashimoto
synopsis:
Mahiro, the head of the disciplinary committee, is assigned to take care of Asuma, the most tardy student in school. Rumor has it that Asuma will never wake up once he falls asleep, no matter what you do. This makes Mahiro worried, but eventually, they become roommates...

One morning, when Mahiro tries to wake up Asuma, who is fast asleep, he is suddenly pulled into his bed! Asuma, who was not supposed to fast asleep, wakes up with a start and says, It looks like I can wake up when I hug Mahiro-kun!!

Since then, Asuma has become very attached to Mahiro, and the distance between them is gradually growing closer...!

title: Dimension Wave
genre: Genderswap, Action, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy
author: Aneko Yusagi
synopsis:
Dimension Wavea super popular VRMMO game where players can experience several years of fantasy in just twenty-four hours of real time. Enticed by the entry ticket his sisters won, a young man takes part in the projects Second Wave. However, as soon as he enters the world of the game, he finds that his sisters have played a trick: hes been transformed into a girl with the cringy name KizunaExceed. But instead of letting it get to him, he decides to chill and take this new life as it comes. Without sparing a fraction of a second deciding, Kizuna immediately chooses to fish rather than fight on the front lines in this fantasy world. Alongside his sisters, Kanade and Tsumugi, a Japanese-style beauty named Shouko, Yamikage the fake ninja, and other quirky comrades, he works to enjoy his second life to the fullest.

NOTE: Many characters that appear in Dimension Wave also appear in The Rising of the Shield Hero. However, despite the many similarities, the characters in both series are not related to each other. Dimension Wave is not a spin-off of The Rising of the Shield Hero, but a separate story in a different universe that shares many similarities.

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/dimension-wave)

title: Kaika Apartment
genre: Historical, Romance, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Ameishi
synopsis:
*Everyone who lives there has a reason for doing so.* 

Towards the end of the Taisho era (1912 - 1926), Fuji, a translator, moves into the so-called Kaika Apartmenta luxurious housing complex overflowing with elegance. Little does he know that all the residents there harbor secretsbut what are they? And, does Fuji have a secret of his own...?

---

Peculiar tales of an apartment complex filled to bursting with bewitching, intertwining, and twisted human relationships.

title: Mahou Shoujo 201
genre: Loli, Comedy, Superhero, Magical Girls, Slice of Life
author: Mucha
synopsis: Fujiyama Shinobu aka Sexy Fujiyama, is a general working for the evil Flower Bud Gang who are trying to take over the city. Standing in her way is the masked magical girl, Princess Mamu, who wouldn't you know it, has just moved in next door to Fujiyama's place...

title: There Is No True Peace in This World -Shin Kamen Rider Shocker Side-
genre: Action, Psychological, Mecha, Superhero, Drama
author: Kyuuri Yamada
synopsis: A completely original manga project spun-off from *Shin Kamen Rider* directed by Anno Hideaki! A dark hero rising story by a superb production team depicting the biggest enemy in *Shin Kamen Rider* and *SHOCKER*!

title: The Story of Our Corpse Hunt
genre: Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Housui Yamazaki
synopsis:
A boy x a summer x an adventure = "Boy Meets Crime"!

Shocking juvenile suspense!

One day during the summer vacation, a young boy called Isshin, Kazuma Inui, leaves with his friends who attend the same junior high school to meet again with "that girl" who disappeared several years ago.
And all the truths lead to child kidnapping cases that are rampant in the land. Depicting the darkness of society!

title: Kobayashi-San Chi No Maid Dragon: Elma Ol Nikki
genre: Comedy, Office Workers, Magic, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural
author: Ayami Kazama
synopsis: A spin-off of [Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon](https://mangadex.org/manga/15514) focusing on the daily life of Elma.

title: Ramia-Yana
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Self-Published, Sexual Violence, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic
author: Nakamura Gentlemen
synopsis:
Each time a Demon Lord has appeared, a human hero has slain it, pushing back the demons in the dark lands. 
As the cycle starts over again, a mysterious ancient hero called Ramia reappears. Meanwhile, an abnormal Demon army suddenly strikes the kingdom

title: Kumo Desu Ga, Nani Ka?
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Asahiro Kakashi
synopsis:
When a mysterious explosion killed an entire class full of high school students, the souls of everyone in class were transported into a fantasy world and reincarnated. While some students were reincarnated as princes or prodigies, others were not as blessed.  
Our heroine, who was the lowest in the class, discovered that she was reincarnated as a spider! Now at the bottom of the food chain, she needs to adapt to the current situation with willpower in order to live. Stuck in a dangerous labyrinth filled with monsters, it's eat or be eaten!  
This is the story of a spider doing whatever she can in order to survive!

title: Once Married
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dok-Cha
synopsis:
The East. The cursed land where the sun never rises, always engulfed in dreary weather, swarmed with criminals, and where depression is the norm. And the monster who governs over this land is the Duke of Eckard. Hedel, who was on the verge of marrying her cousin, receives a marriage proposal from this monster Duke. Although everyone opposes her, Hedel had no choice but to accept the Duke's proposal...

"I've never had this kind of food before!"

"Ever since Madam's arrival, the sun seems to always set here...!"

"The East can never live without Madam anymore."

It seems Hedel has done very well in taming the people from the East. This is the story of Hedel occupying the East, which starts with a marriage.

title: Vampire Princess Yui
genre: Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural
author: Narumi Kakinouchi
synopsis: A mysterious girl arrives at the door of a church covered in blood. She utters out the name "Nagi" before collapsing. She's taken in by the priest of the church. She starts out with no memories of her past, but slowly has strange dreams about her mother, and from that she discovers her name, Yui.

title: A Guest Carried by the Waves
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Anthology, Drama, Full Color
author: Baek-Jak
synopsis:
Andrew, a charming servant in a grand Irish estate, is known for his playful charisma and flirtations. When Nora Greenwood, a quiet and enigmatic guest, arrives, she becomes the subject of a wager among the servants: can Andrew seduce her?
What starts as a game quickly unravels when Andrew discovers that Nora is far from the timid woman he expected. Beneath her reserved demeanor lies a sharp wit and a surprising strength that turns his lighthearted challenge into something far more complicated.

As their encounters spark a clash of minds and hearts, Andrew must confront the unexpected: has he finally met his match, or is he the one being played?

title: Alice No Gomi Yashiki
genre: Oneshot, Historical, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Mitsu Izumi
synopsis:
Izumi Mitsu's oneshot published in GOOD!Afternoon issue 40/2014. 
Alice hoardes newspapers and furniture in her house for her father, who has gone to war with a neighbouring country and does not know if he will return.
When Carona visits the house, she decides to make her clean up this dump...?

title: Kyousou Silent
genre: Oneshot, Historical, Romance
author: Hiro Fujiwara
synopsis: A romance set in 1920s Hollywood, during the era of silent films, the main character faces a unique challenge: she must resist the temptation to fall in love with a leading actor if she wants to achieve stardom herself.

title: Onna Chara De Isekai Teni Shite Cheatppoi Kedo Zako Chara Na No De Medatazu Heiwa Na Shomin Wo Mezashimasu!
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Nobi Kanida
synopsis: A little weary salaryman. One day, after waking up he found himself in another world in the body of a female character, Susie, from the MMORPG he liked to play. Confused, he tried an attack and made all the monsters flee to the place people live, afraid of his destructive power thats able to smash a mountain. Having dealt with them, he ended up saving Howard, a local tribune who invited his savior to the village, but

title: Jii-San to Baa-San Wakagaeru
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kagiri Araido
synopsis: This story is about Ine and Shouzou, two pensioners well into their 80s who are mysteriously returned to their 20s one night.

title: Mazinger Z 2022
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Sexual Violence, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural
author: Gou Nagai
synopsis: A remake of the original Mazinger Z manga in celebration of its 50th anniversary. Most of this story was first published in Gekiman! - Mazinger Z Chapter. So this manga can be thought of as the in-universe version of the story that Gekiman creates in the autobiography manga [Gekiman! - Mazinger Z Chapter](https://mangadex.org/title/a6d69815-f5f9-4ab8-9d53-5b4d1ee6601e/gekiman-mazinger-z-chapter)

title: The Earth Lord'S School Life
genre: Action, Long Strip, School Life, Fantasy
author: Tae-On Ki
synopsis:
The Earth's Most Powerful Being is always longing for a fight that would excite him.

Driven mad by his love for battle, he possesses the body of a high school student and once again experiences the thrill of combat.

Meanwhile, the Earth's Guardian, sealed away by other gods, seeks to grow stronger in his new body and challenge them.

Will he overcome the gods with his new body and continue to enjoy the thrill of battle?

title: Kiraware Majo to Karada Ga Irekawatta Keredo, Watashi Wa Kyou Mo Genki Ni Kurashiteimasu!
genre: Animals, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Juyu
synopsis: A happy slow life begins with a switch! Marietta, princess of the snow country of Snewe, is trapped in a magic tower because she can't use magic. 8 years later, on her wedding day with the prince of the silver country, she thought she had succeeded in summoning a holy beast, but then... What appeared was...?

title: Mitsuboshi Colors
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Slice of Life
author: Katsuwo
synopsis: Hark! The city is in peril! Who you gonna call? Colors! Sacchan, Yui and Kotoha are here to protect the city, solving mysteries and battling enemies with help from their friends. But their quest isn't an easy one as their arch-nemesis Saitou, the violent police officer of Ueno, meets them at every turn.

title: Fall Into Your Trap
genre: Historical, Demons, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Jing Sheng
synopsis: The solo priest Mo Chuan accidentally summoned and created a pact with a beast that has been sealed for a few hundred years. Mo Chuan, who wants to seal back the beast, and the beast, who wants to get rid of Mo Chuan soon engages in a push and pull fight. But in the process, changes occur and feelings quietly starting to arise.

title: Goth Girl & the Jock
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Self-Published, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Atage
synopsis: An unlikely relationship blossoms. Do opposites attract? Or will their differences tear them apart? Follow the story of the goth girl Ophelia and the popular footballer Tyler, as they go through their high school life, sitting next to each other in class!

title: Takou No Koori Hime Wo Tasuketara, Otomodachi Kara Hajimeru Koto Ni Narimashita
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Wanda Kuro
synopsis:
Nagi Shinonome, known as the "Ice Princess," is a beautiful girl with a cold attitude who does not allow others to get close to her. 

One day, Souta Minori, who saw her being molested on the train, saved her with all his courage, but the next day she appeared again and said, "I want you to stay by my side." 

Can Souta continue as friends with the Ice Princess, who only sweetly melts for one person in the world, that is, himself?

title: Netorare Manga No Kuzu Otoko Ni Tensei Shita Hazu Ga Heroine Ga Yottekuru Ken
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Delinquents, Adaptation
author: Haru Sumikawa
synopsis: I suddenly remembered. This world is the world of an erotic manga, and that I was reincarnated as the scumbag who is supposed to steal the heroine in this world. Well, I don't have such a hobby, so I thought the heroine should get along with the protagonist. But why are you paying attention to me, heroine?

title: Baki Rahen
genre: Action, Sports, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama
author: Keisuke Itagaki
synopsis: Following his battle with Nomi no Sukune the 2nd, Baki's half-brother, Jack Hanma challenges the warriors of the underground arena to take on his original fighting style of "Goudou": The way of Biting! Fascinated by Jack's relentless pursuit of more strength, the warriors clash against Jack and his fearsome style. Just what will be the outcome of this blood-ridden contest of purity?

title: A Story About Getting a Haircut After Hearing Your Crush Prefers Short Hair
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic
author: Komikan Matsumoto
synopsis:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/114158543)

title: Higurashi No Naku Koro Ni Oni
genre: Historical, Demons, Mystery
author: Asahi
synopsis:
Taisho, year 12 (1923). A tragedy in Hinamizawa village changes the fate of a girl and her friends. The turbulent early life of Oryou, head of the Sonozaki family, one of the Three Great Families, who would later be feared and known as Empress Sonozaki.
The missing link to the original *Higurashi no Naku Koro ni* is now revealed.

title: Occhoko Doji Onee-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Chihiro Kurachi
synopsis: She may seem like a beautiful, sophisticated woman! But on the inside, she is just a XXX lady. The more she tries to act like an mature adult in front of younger boys, the more twisted and perverted she gets!

title: Ojou-Sama, Kekkai Sunzen!
genre: Oneshot, Comedy
author: Aroi Umino
synopsis: A young lady handles a personal problem on her commute to school.

title: Mob Kara Hajimaru Tansaku Eiyuutan
genre: Action, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Terio Teri
synopsis:
Takagi Kaito, a low status high schooler, your typical mob character so to say, was just a normal everyday explorer who hunted slimes every day in the dungeons that appeared in Japan, earning pocket money while admiring his childhood friend, the class queen, from afar. 

One day, a golden slime he had never seen appears before him. After he defeats it, he obtains an extremely rare item worth hundreds of millions as a drop, a servant card that can summon mythical beings!! After he makes up his mind and summons it, a warrior maiden with unparalleled beauty appears. 

Rise above being just a mob explorer Kaito! A modern battle fantasy story has begun!

---

title: Ore Wa Kage No Eiyuu Ja Arimasen!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: S.Kosugi
synopsis:
--"Hero of Shadows."

A man who appears in crises and battlefields around the world, rescuing people with outstanding magic and then disappearing in the blink of an eye. His true identity is supposed to be shrouded in complete darkness... or so it was thought. 

"My identity has been exposeeeeed!!"

Phil Salmabart, a young noble with a notorious reputation in the streets. Despite secretly acting as the "Hero of Shadows" for a certain reason, one day, his true identity is revealed to the public. Despite his attempts to deceive, girls ranging from a noblemans daughter, a lovely saint, and even a princess of the kingdom approach the "Hero of Shadows," feeling indebted to him?!

title: Henkyou Gurashi No Maou, Tensei Shite Saikyou No Majutsushi Ni Naru
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Muraichi
synopsis:
There was once a mage called The Lone Demon King on the frontier. He was just a creature that never grew old, but was also loved by the villagers as something of a guardian deity. However, he was destroyed by a magic organization that sees his existence as dangerous. 200 years later, he is reincarnated as the second son of an aristocrat and obtains the strongest magic power.

"Let's pretend to be a human this time."

However, being a human lover, he didn't particularly think of revenge and has decided to pretend to be human in this life. In his past life, he was the guardian deity of a region, and in this life, he's a local aristocrat who lacks common sense. He doesn't know how to take it easy. As the second son of an aristocrat, he is loved by his family and friends, and while he is regarded as a master of magic in the magic guild, he becomes an 'Immortal Mage' behind the scenes.

title: Aisare Tenshi Na Classmate Ga, Ore Ni Dake Itazura Ni Hohoemu
genre: Romance, School Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Takafumi Mizuguchi
synopsis:
Girls and sweets are full of secrets!? 

Ichise Souma is a high school student who dreams of becoming a pastry chef and devotes himself to making sweets. He meets Satomi Chika, a female classmate, after receiving some sweets. 

Chika is a beautiful girl with a soothing personality, known at school as the Angel of Peace. Souma thought she was a good girl who would kindly listen to his worries about making sweets, but... 

"Ichise-san, your embarrassed face is really cute." 

Chika shows an unexpected side of herself only when they are alone, and Soumas heart is on the verge of exploding! A sweet and stimulating boy-meets-girl story with a mischievous angel connected by sweets begins!

title: Shiitagerare No Majutsushi Reijou Wa, "Koori Ookami Saishou-Sama" Ni Dekiaisareru
genre: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy
author: Wani Kurokoda
synopsis: Not found

title: Fuwa Fuwa Therapist
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Murayayou
synopsis: Not found

title: 100-Man No Inochi No Ue Ni Ore Wa Tatteiru
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Magic, Military, Isekai, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy
author: Naoki Yamakawa
synopsis:
Yotsuya Yuusuke along with his classmates Shindou Iu and Hakozaki Kusue have been transported to a strange and unknown world inhabited by mythological creatures. As soon as they arrive, they meet somebody calling himself the Game Master who then grants them a time-limited quest. To aid them in this quest, he also bestows Shindou and Hakozaki with the roles of a Magician and a Warrior while Yotsuya is randomly granted the role of a Farmer?!  
This is how a hectic life of adventuring began for three students who now have no choice, but to complete random quests for several phases in the fantasy world if they want to stay alive and protect the real world from the demons and monsters they encounter.

---

**Note: All chapters are now available with official English simulpub from K-Manga!**

title: Overlord: <Shin> Sekai-Hen
genre: Thriller, Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Zombies, Adventure, Harem, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Tou Matsuki
synopsis: After winning the battle of Katze Plains and founding the Sorcerer Kingdom of Ainz, they aim for a utopia of perpetual continuity and prosperity, a world where many races kneel before Ainz. As the first step toward achieving this goal, Ainz heads to the Empire to strengthen the Adventurers Guild and incorporate it into the state. Behind the scenes, the nations of the world are beginning to stir with their own agendas for the Sorcerer Kingdom...! Ainz's high road, once again!

title: Jitaku De Natural Ni Josou Suru Danshi
genre: Crossdressing, School Life, Shota, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Kei Takano
synopsis:
A boy who naturally crossdresses.  

---

title: Make Heroine Ga Oosugiru!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Takibi Amamori
synopsis:
***"Huh? Who are you calling losing?"***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girlAnna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_"Even though he said we'll get married. Don't you think he's pretty mean?"
"When did he say that?"
"When we were 4 or 5 years old."_

That doesn't count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_"Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats."
"I see. Well, that's a bold statement."_

There's a fortune for those who shine only after losing.
___
**Character Designer:** [Imigimuru](https://mangadex.org/author/341a08ca-acbf-49a3-998a-d3451249ec43)
