title: Maou Ni Natta Node, Dungeon Tsukutte Jingai Musume to Honobono Suru
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Ryuuyuu
synopsis:
Before I realized, I had become the guardian of a dungeon, a Demon Lord. I was suddenly in a dangerous world with giant monsters loitering around, fighting for their existence. So I thought to go about developing the dungeon in order to not die, but for some reason I was having quite the good time. How did it turn out like this?  
  
The protagonist, Yuki, having to live in that world now, uses his bold and sharp senses and spends time with a supreme dragon girl and a vampire girl, sometimes laughing, sometimes being angry, passing days doing what he likes.

title: Since When Do Guys Find Divorcees Attractive?
genre: Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Yuu Kamena
synopsis: "I'm going to enjoy my second time being single!". Ono Kazuha has divorced her husband at 35 over an affair. She stood tall and announced "I'm officially divorced" to the fashion magazine's editorial department where she works. To add insult to injury, a handsome new hire happened to overhear. She expected it to be awkward, but for some reason it made him attracted to her?

title: Monster Devourer
genre: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Sung-Nyung Kim
synopsis: Meok Gwi-Sa is a Monster Hunter who eats monsters to protect the human world. After the release of the Hell demon, he lost his power. He managed to survive and met Goyoung. Goyoung, is a young individual with a petite build, who has endured a lifetime of torment due to his physical stature. His childhood friend, Kang Jong-bo, suddenly transforms into a bully during high school. However, their lives take an unexpected turn when Goyoung acquired a mysterious power which is the ability to devour monsters. Goyoung embarks on a perilous journey to protect humanity from the impending threat of the Gate to Hell. Will he be able to control his new powers and save the world from its impending doom?

title: Osananajimi Ga Mamasugite Tsurai
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Sae Kumanami
synopsis: Hina has one-sided feelings for her childhood friend, Yakumo. However, Yakumo is actually like a helicopter parent, an overprotective mama! "I'm happy about being doted on by the person I like, but being treated like a daughter is the worst!" Wanting to become lovers with Yakumo, Hina tries her hardest to make him look at her as a woman, but?! The romcom between a determined maiden in love and an overly-protective boy starts now!

title: Joukamachi No Dandelion
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Fantasy
author: Ayumu Kasuga
synopsis:
In the manga's story, the everyday lives of the nine super-powered siblings of the royal family are monitored by more than 200 surveillance cameras and broadcast nationwide. The people of the nation who are watching the broadcast will have the ability to elect the next monarch. The story focuses on Akane, the third-oldest sister who can manipulate gravity. She is shy and desperately does not want to be caught on camera.

**NOTE:** Initially released as a 4-koma manga, Joukamachi no Dandelion has transitioned back to traditional format as of Vol.5 Chapter 49.

title: Guard Pass
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Osondoson
synopsis:
Lim Sejun, who likes to eat, is fat and has a large physique. He has high self-esteem and a firm personality that doesn't even care about being teased for being fat. He has only one friend, 'Seo Hajin'. She has always been learning Jiujitsu to protect Sejun since childhood. 

One day, Sejun has trouble with a delinquent in the same class, and Hajin sees it and destroys that delinquent. But one night, Hajin is found severely beaten and suffers from a badly injured knee and more serious psychological trauma. Sejun tries to tell the police, but when the investigation doesn't make much progress, he can't control his anger and goes to find the culprit himself, but he's defeated by the delinquent who learned Jiujitsu and finds nothing. Then he learns Jiujitsu from a man named 'Jason' who saved him. 

Three months later, Sejun, who learned Jiujitsu and lost weight, finds out that a veiled group is involved, and wants to destroy it. A school action drama depicting individual revenge.

title: Tales of Greed Deep
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Team Kkulppal
synopsis: "Tales of Greed" is back with an even deeper story! What if the desires that every human can have become a reality? Will the outcome ultimately lead to happiness or bring about destruction?

title: Isekai De Tochi O Katte Noujou O Tsukurou
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Jun Sasameyuki
synopsis:
Corporate drone Itonami Norio is summoned to another world and granted a powerful skill, [Supreme Wielder], which is invisible to those who summoned him. Theyre dismayed to see hes useless to them, so he asks only for a little plot of land to work for himself.

His skill allows him to use any tool to its greatest abilities, including fishing poles, cooking utensils, and construction tools. When he fishes up a mermaid who wants him for her bridegroom, charms a young dragon with his cooking, and excites an undead king with his rare skill, how long can his quiet country life last?!

title: Kawaikereba Hentai Demo Suki Ni Natte Kuremasu Ka?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: CHuN
synopsis:
After cleaning the Calligraphy Club room one afternoon, Kiryuu Keiki found a love letter addressed to him on the club's desk. Eager at the possibility of finally getting a girlfriend, he opens the envelope only to find the words, "I like you" along with a pair of the sender's panties.   
  
With only these panties as evidence, Keiki narrows down the identity to the four girls who helped him clean the club room that day: Tokihara Sayuki, the lazy third-year president of Calligraphy Club; Koga Yuika, a library committee member of foreign descent; Nanjou Mao, Keiki's slightly tsundere fellow classmate; and most awkwardly, Kiryuu Mizuha, Keiki's clean freak of a younger sister. Among at least three of these girls, Keiki believes is the one who left him the letter and their panties so with determination in his heart, he sets out to uncover which of these seemingly unorthodox ladies will become his girlfriend!

title: Blue Archive - Problem Solver 68 Business Diary
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Drama, Adaptation
author: Kaede Nogiwa
synopsis: From the smash hit smartphone game "Blue Archive" comes the debut of Problem Solver 68 as our protagonist in this spin-off comic!! Please enjoy the comedic story of our four Problem Solvers in Kivotos - The Academic City!

title: Itoko No Ko
genre: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Incest, Slice of Life
author: Inuchiku
synopsis:
His more-than-friends, less-than-lovers cousin is so cute that he could die!!!!? 

Nozomu is a boy staying at his uncle's house over summer vacation. In the countryside, where there are no convenience stores, or any busses even, the boy has a problem. That problem is his younger cousin, Sou! Hes being led around by this tanned, energetic girl day after day and cant show her the dignity befitting his older age! On top of that, whether intentional or not, hes getting flustered by Sous inviting demeanor. Eventually, Nozomu couldnt take his eyes off Sou and is falling more and more under her spell...!!? With a cousin like this, his reason is having a hard time hanging on!

title: Lockdown Zone: Level X
genre: Action, Horror, Mystery
author: Remy Oishi
synopsis:
Ryoka is awakened by flurry of text messages from her mother! Panicked and rushed, Mom is clearly concerned for Ryoka's safety, but she is not to keen on letting her daughter know why. Her reasoning being that nothing could really properly describe what is happening!  
  
The world might be ending! And there might be a massive new life-form on the roof of their apartment building!  
  
(Denpa)

title: Kyatapi Land
genre: Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma
author: Kyata
synopsis: Violence!!!! Shootouts!!!! Zombies!!!! Electricity!!!! An office life comedy with no straight man begins.

title: Ousama No Propose
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Nemo Kurio
synopsis:
The boy's strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians' school.

"...I entrust you, my world..."

And then... the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki. Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth... He's feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!

title: The End in Common Ruin
genre: Oneshot, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Mitsukazu Mihara
synopsis:
A story about two twins  
  
-  
Uploader's note: Published in Gothic Lolita Bible which doesn't focus on manga, so it has no target demographics.

title: The Dress
genre: Oneshot, Psychological, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Ju-Hui Jo
synopsis: A temptation from which you can't escape

title: Le Théâtre De a
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy
author: Asumiko Nakamura
synopsis:
1: Oeufs D'ange (Tenshi no Tamago)  
A man is asked by a young painter to be her model.  
  
2: Velvet Going Underground  
A doll becomes a super idol. Hijinks ensue.  
  
3: Childhood's End  
Alastair runs away and meets the Rabbit.  
  
4: Bite Me Something  
Allistaire followed Mr. Rabbit all the way to Wonderland. Will he be able to find him among the crowd?  
  
5: Long Along Alonging  
A girl asks a vampire to be his apprentice. But what is her motive?  
  
6: Till Dawn  
In a dark tower, a caged voice is singing until a hunted man enters the darkness.  
  
7: Leçon Un  
Sequel to Long Along Alonging.  
  
8: My Skin On My Back  
  
9: Highland Walker  
Sequel to Leçon un.  
  
10: Perfect World  
The story of a young wife whose husband is infected with a fatal disease called Flower-Blossomitis.  
  
11: Perfect Lady  
Sequel to Perfect World and drawn especially for this book.  
  
12-13: Looks Like A Teaspoon  
A boy named Allistaire is often teased at his all-boys school. One night he dresses like a girl and stumbles upon the boy who often bullies him, Simon. Allistaire runs off into a tower and as Simon runs after him, we see the sign "Welcome to Wonderland" hanging by the tower's door.  
  
14: The Pearl Blue Story  
Do you believe in mermaids? Coggy, a young boy finds a mysterious lady laying down near the shore of the beach. He brings her home to help her.  
  
15: I Am A Piano  
A piano tells the story of her life and the people she encounters.  
  
16: Parade

title: Mookhyang: Dark Lady
genre: Genderswap, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jae-Heon Lee
synopsis:
The exceptional martial artist and proud hierarch of the Demonic Sect, Mookhyang, winds up in a strange new fantasy realm after falling victim to a curse cast by his enemies, the Blood Sect. But when Mookhyangs incredible control over qi, or mana, becomes known, its only a matter of time before he gets cursed again and turned into a young lady?! 

In this world of elves, mages, knights, and dragons, will a mastery of Chinese martial arts be enough for one man (or woman) to fight his way back home? Or will this humbled warrior finally concede defeat?

title: Slice of Black Chocolate
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Fantasy
author: Mitsukazu Mihara
synopsis:
Generally a story about really cute guy trying to hook up with this really egotistic girl although it's not really like that.  
  
  
Uploader's note: Published in Gothic Lolita Bible which doesn't focus on manga, so it has no target demographics.

title: Cosmos
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Slice of Life
author: Tsutome Tsukimiya
synopsis: A very short story in full color about the memories of walking along the path with blossoming cosmos.

title: School Back
genre: Psychological, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kokoro Onodera
synopsis:
Fushimi-san, the janitor at a certain high school, cuts quite a figure. She's tall, cheerful, hard-working, and loves canned coffee. When the students at the school are going through times of trouble, pain, or confusion, she's there to lend a helping hand or a shoulder to cry on. When you feel like the adults in your life don't have your back... Fushimi-san probably will!

This wonderful slice of life by Onodera Kokoro follows various poignant stories of adolescence and the desire of young people to be seen and heard, especially when times are hard.

title: Isekai Kaeri No Yuusha Wa, Dungeon Ga Shutsugen Shita Genjitsu Sekai De, Influencer Natte Kane Wo Kasegimasu!
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Pekomaru Oosaki
synopsis: One day, an ordinary high school student is transferred to another world. He raises his level in the other world, successfully defeats the Demon King, and saves the world! With his strongest status, he decided to return to his own world; however, in the world to which he returns, a new "dungeon" has appeared.

title: The Witch and Me
genre: Oneshot, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Aiji Yamakawa
synopsis: A boy receives an apple from a fellow student. 8 pages.

title: Suteishi Yuusha, Maou No Shita De Restart
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Mika Shiroie
synopsis:
Asato Kanami who was summoned as a hero to another world Istalia. 

 To stop the war between the demons and humans, it is said that he was summoned by Anna, the saint of the Kingdom of Elshnon.  

After a year of war, Asato finally challenges the Demon King Lione. Just when he thought the battle was over, his summoner Anna attacked him and the Demon King.  

Asato who survived the attack and was protected by the Demon King. What is the future path for the hero betrayed by humans!?

title: The Vampire and I
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural
author: Mitsukazu Mihara
synopsis: A dark european ambient and the story of a vampire  just before dinner time.

title: Hitomi Kara Destiny
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Fantasy
author: Sakura Tsukuba
synopsis: Umi used to be a very sickly girl when she was young. One time, she was on the verge of death after contracting a high fever, but then her fever magically disappeared, leaving behind a star-shape mark on her forehead with the color of the ocean. Now a sixteen-year-old girl, Umi dreams of finding love and having a boyfriend like many other girls her age. Theres one guy at school whom shes really interested in, but things dont really go the way she wants them to with another guy showing up out of nowhere Not to mention, that guy isnt just your average guy

title: Rai Rai Rai
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural
author: Satoshi  Yoshiaki
synopsis: Fifty years after the war with the aliens... danger emerges... from within a young girl! Ichigaya Sumire, age 18, works at a "space pest" extermination company to pay off the debts her father left behind. But one day, her life is turned upside down when she's abducted by a UFO!

title: Dear My Rude Darling with Multiple Personality
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jeoneo
synopsis: The beautiful port city of La Spezia. After leaving the orphanage, Monica, who served as a nurse on the battlefield for three years, He is hired as a tutor for the Mollet family. On her first day in an unfamiliar city, Monica encounters a familiar face on the street.  Sol? Im sorry, but Im not Sol. I thought it was Sol, a soldier who took care of me on the battlefield Im mistaken for the attitude of seeing it for the first time, even thinking about it for a while! How come this man Every time we meet, the name and personality change, too! The only thing is a picture-like appearance and a slight scar around the right eye. liar? identical twins Or maybe its a multi-personality?

title: The Aquatope on White Sand
genre: Animals, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Ren Sakuragi
synopsis: Gama Gama Aquarium, a small aquarium in Okinawa, is an hour's bus ride from Naha. Kukuru Misakino is an 18-year-old high school student who works there, and she knows about the "secret" of the aquarium: sometimes you can see mysterious things. One day Kukuru meets Fuuka, standing in front of a water tank with flowing hair and a tear rolling down her cheek. Fuuka has given up on her dream of becoming an idol and she has run away from Tokyo to Okinawa. Wanting to find a place to belong, Fuuka earnestly asks to work at the aquarium. The manga follows Kukuru and Fuuka as they deal with the issues of the secret of the aquarium and a looming crisis of its possible closure.

title: Apocalyptic Survival: I Can See Hidden Clues
genre: Action, Long Strip, Zombies, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Meng You Jun
synopsis: Upon awakening from slumber, it was discovered that billions of people had been transported to an apocalyptic era! Survival had become a shared goal of everyone, yet Zhang Chen could perceive concealed clues! While all were cautiously venturing into this unknown apocalyptic realm, Zhang Chen was already forging ahead

title: Hachi? Ichi?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life
author: Kaori Saki
synopsis:
Shinichirou would rather spend his life playing games on the internet, but sadly he's an heir to a company. His grandfather deems his current life-style unfit for an heir, so he throws him into a house with eight young and beautiful girls. What's more, within one year he'll have to choose one of them as his bride. What will happen to him now?  
Manga Published in a Seinen magazine. Please do not edit Demographic to Shounen.

title: Tonari No Kuderella O Amayakashitara, Uchi No Aikagi O Watasu Koto Ni Natta
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kanae Aoshima
synopsis:
A sweet cross-cultural romantic comedy tale about a beautiful exchange student from a foreign country, and the young man who takes care of her dinner. Katagiri Naomi, a high school student who lived alone for two years, meets a beautiful girl with black hair and blue eyes, who moves into the apartment next door. The girl's name is Yui. It seemed that she really was a noblewoman, and her nickname was Quderella because of her nonchalant attitude at school. Naomi knows that Yui doesn't want to depend on others, but she's actually quite naive, so Naomi decides to help her.

"Today what are we having at night... Karaage chicken, huh?"
"That's right because the price of chicken is discounted today"
I love your fried chicken so I'm really looking forward to it

title: Human Weapon Katsuo!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Takashi Hamori
synopsis: The protagonist Hamada Katsuo, is your everyday pervert/loser character. He's starting a new semester in school, so he wants to escape from his loser days, the only problem is the new change in look/lifestyle he got is that of a gang member. He beats a strong guy that was bullying a friend of his by mistake and now, because of it he's the target for all the gangs in the region, even though he's still only a weakling and a pervert. Will Katsuo escape alive? Find out.

title: Undead
genre: Action, Long Strip, Horror
author: Masashi Terashima
synopsis: "I can't get caught not until I become human again!"

title: Wagatsuma-San Wa Ore No Yome
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Yuu Kuraishi
synopsis: Aoshima is a second year student in high school, who wishes he had a girlfriend. One day he wakes up for an unknown reason 10 years in the future, and he is married to the prettiest girl in school, Wagatsuma Ai! How has their relationship grown from mere acquaintances to husband and wife?!

title: Mushoku No Eiyuu: Betsu Ni Skill Nanka Iranakattan Daga
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Nanae Akio
synopsis: "Classes" are given at the age of 10, and the presence or absence of "skills" greatly affect life. Arel, the son of "Sword Princess" Fara and "Magic King" Leon, has been branded as "Classless" But even without a job or skills, Arel believes he can persevere through effort.

title: Ino-Head Gargoyle
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama
author: Tooru Fujisawa
synopsis: Known as the gargoyle of Inogashira Park police station because of his scary face, Saejima Toshiyuki was a loser. He's pretty much a virgin for all intent and purposes, aside from the companions that he pays for. He wasnt always a loser though. During his high school days, he was feared as a badass, but now he is just a person people feel sorry for. He then meets Arimori Shizuka, a beautiful girl that seems comfortable in her sexuality. Toshiyuki learns that she was a high class escort that has been with over 1000 men. She was doing it out of love for her abusive boyfriend but, realizing her mistake, quits. Shizuka is now being harassed and Toshiyuki reverts back to his aggressive personality to protect the love of his life.

title: Glass-Goshi No Koibito
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Drama
author: Keito Yano
synopsis:
Shoko, who's searching for a partner, hits it off with Ukai, whom she meets on a dating app.
However, hes from a parallel world, and the only way they can connect is through her smartphone screen...
As she spends her days with a boyfriend she can neither meet nor touch, Shoko uncovers a certain truth about him...

Source: MangaPlus

title: I Won'T Let Mistress Suck My Blood
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Vampires
author: Norio Paderapollo
synopsis: Matilda is looking for a job and a place to stay, and ends up in a large mansion known as the "Haunted House." The owner of the house, August, is a beautiful, soft-spoken woman, and Matilda is attracted to her and decides to work for her as a maid. However, that night, Matilda finds that her master has transformed.

title: Ore, Maou Dakedo Baretenai Yo Ne?
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Supernatural
author: Goyou Yashio
synopsis: From a lineage of elite demon lords, the current demon lord Eugene Satania - Vidorick has one secret way of relaxing from the stress he accumulates in the demon world. Which is to go to the human world under the guise as the human named Satano Yuuji, mixing into common everyday folk to enjoy himself! Now a rookie-low-class demon suddenly appeared in front of him, named Mist. With a good-for-nothing low-class demon at his side, Yuuji now has to hide his identity at all costs! Let's start this suspicious rom-com!

title: Golem Hearts
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy
author: Gen Oosuka
synopsis:
In the world of Golem Hearts, creatures known as golems have become integrated with society, performing all sorts of tasks. These golems are created by the widely-respected "sorcery scholars," and obey the commands of their human masters without question. Noah is a sorcery scholar who strives to become the second best of his kind.  
  
To that end, he travels far and wide to study unique golems around the world. This journey leads him to a certain island, where he encounters a girl named Mary and her golem Murray. As the two get acquainted, we begin to discover that there may be more to Noah than meets the eye.  

---
  
As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Golem Hearts were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.  
  
Prior to its serialization two "Golem Hearts"-oneshots were published, one of which can be found [here (RAW)](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/10833497643049550104).

title: Full Drive
genre: Sports
author: Genki Ono
synopsis:
9-year-old Tamashiro Dan is teased relentlessly by others for being weak and small until his grandfather teaches him table tennis and gives him an old worn-out racket. Four years, later he's left Germany with his family to Japan, to prove himself on a bigger stage.

**Included Oneshots:**

Volume 2:  
- Koi ni Sake Mikoto (???????) - Previously unpublished; 52nd Jump Treasure Rookie Award, Honorable Mention (2011)
- Kokoro no Naka no Juusetsuken (???????) - *Jump Live*

Volume 3:  
- Dov no Kyuuki (?????) - *Jump Next 2014 Winter*
- Akage no Acho!! (???????!!) - *Shounen Jump 2015 #16*
___
As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Full Drive were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.

title: Top Tier Providence
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Shui Bu Xing De Nengneng
synopsis:
Being reincarnated in a cultivation world, Han Jue realizes that he can live his life like a video game. He can reroll his cultivation potential and connate providence.

So, he spends 11 years rerolling for a good one

[Unparalleled: Immortal beauty, top-notch charm]

[Destined Sword fanatic: Top-notch Sword Dao aptitude, top-notch Sword Dao comprehension]

[Unparalleled Movement Technique: Top-notch movement technique aptitude]

[Descendant of the Immortal Emperor: You will receive an unparalleled cultivation technique and 1,000 superior-grade spirit stones]

In pursuit of longevity, Han Jue decides to cultivate in a low-profile manner.
A thousand years later, generations of cultivators have become history.

That is when beings of the fairyland start cleansing the mortal world. Han Jue can no longer hide and has no choice but to take action.

Then he realizes, that deities and gods arent that powerful after all!

title: White Album
genre: Romance, Harem, Drama
author: AQUAPLUS
synopsis: Touya now has a new girlfriend, Yuki Morikawabut before they enter college she is going to debut as an idol. How will this new development affect their relationship? What about the current idol, Rina Ogata, who seems to have set her sights on Touya?

title: Demon'S Plan
genre: Action, Adventure, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Yoshimichi Okamoto
synopsis:
What is it that you desire? Money? Love? Walk again? Be stronger?  
  
Whatever it is you wish for, you can get by asking the legendary and awe-inspiring "Demon's Plan"; a sacred object capable of granting anything to "the chosen ones."

title: Cross Account
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life
author: Tsunehiro Date
synopsis:
Say hello to Daichi, a.k.a. Mr. Harmless. Because of his compulsive need to be liked, he never makes waves and maintains an easy going attitude. So easy going, everyone thinks he's a dud. But online he's a stud! His angry otaku online persona has garnered him thousands of followers! But real life and online life are two very different things. A lesson he's going to learn the hard way!  
  
Included one-shots:  
- Volume 2: [Haru yo, Koi!: Fuyu-hen, Haru-hen](https://mangadex.org/manga/20481)  
- Volume 3: [Gachipin.](https://mangadex.org/manga/18897)  
- Volume 4: Gesu no Ongaeshi

title: Demon King'S Rules X Witch'S Covenant
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy
author: Zhuozi Xiansheng
synopsis: Warning! An association of valiant individuals formed by the villainous demon lord and the rebellious witches has surfaced! Through casual methods of operation, they will turn the definition of justice upside down! By committing crimes across dimensions, they will ultimately snatch the halo of the main characters away from the hands of pesky humans!

title: War Angels
genre: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Zhang Jing mei
synopsis: Tae, Sir Ross, and Nikki are Archangels who are tasked with rescuing a woman known as The Lady. With extraordinary abilities, these angels battle against the Beastarians and their leader Tyron. In a post-apocalyptic future where humankind slowly grows extinct, hope depends on the War Angels

title: Sidekicks
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Supernatural
author: Ui-Cheol Sin
synopsis: Even if people are born with super powers, they must serve as sidekicks of superheroes in order to become superheroes themselves. Lamia a.k.a Dream Girl has the power to make people fall asleep. She is the sidekick of Darkslug, who is not a great hero compared to his reputation. One day, Dream Girl and Theo work together to get rid of villains and save the world.

title: Gakuen Dragon Slayer
genre: Oneshot, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Fantasy
author: Mikoto Yamaguchi
synopsis: A school is transported into a fantasy world that is at war with dragons, and everyone in the school is given a powerful dragon slaying sword, and told the only way to get home is to help win the war. But there is a catch, to use the swords power you must bea virgin!

title: High Spec Lovers
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, School Life
author: Tadahiro Miura
synopsis:
A romance about an unlikely couple.  
  
Asakura Rin and Hasegawa Kengo are a perfect couple that everyone admires. They are attractive, have perfect conduct, and excel both in sports and academics. They are the embodiment of a perfect boyfriend and girlfriend. However, for Hasegawa, things are not what they seem

title: Kamen Rider Spirits
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Monster Girls, Police, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Kenichi Muraeda
synopsis: After Japanese-American FBI agent Taki Kazuya and Kamen Rider 1 defeat a bat monster, they decide to contact the former riders including Stronger to investigate the appearance of monsters attacking them and civilians. Their investigation reveals the coming of an alien empire out to destroy the Earth, finishing the work that Shocker and other terrorist organizations have failed due to their defeat at the Rider's hands.

title: Shindou Yuusha to Maid Onee-San
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Adaptation
author: Kouta Nozomi
synopsis: After defeating the Demon King and saving the world, Shion was exiled to the border. Here, the strongest Hero enjoyed his slow life with 4 capable onee-san maids.

title: The Weakest Occupation "Blacksmith," but It'S Actually the Strongest
genre: Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Hideaki Yoshimura
synopsis:
The people of this world are given occupations and weapons called Divine Treasures by God. It was said that the treasure was very strong and couldnt be compared to the Human-made weapons. Thats why, occupations which were called Blacksmith, who can make and modify weapons are called the weakest.  
  
The main protagonist Relius who has acquired such a weakest job. He gave up on becoming an adventurer and worked in an inn, but he realized that he could make Anything. While making things he liked, he found himself in relationships with famous aristocrats and beautiful girls.

title: Lya Da to Itte Moratorium
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
author: Hi Calorie
synopsis: When Mitsu was in high school, he had a physical relationship with his childhood friend Nana, whom he had a crush on. However, when Nana suddenly asked him, "Do you want to stop doing this kind of thing?" Mitsu was unable to tell him that he didn't like it, and ended up heartbroken. Mitsu has not been in contact with Nana since then, but his feeling for him still remained. When Mitsu became a university student, he runs into him again while working part-time. He is relieved to find that he doesn't seem to notice him, but short after, he is ambushed at the end of his shift and they end up going to Mitsu's house together. There, Nana shows his obsession with Mitsu for some reason. While the memory of his hurt returns to him, Mitsu's feelings for him still remain

title: "Koko Wa Makasete Sakini Ike!" Wo Shitai Shinitagari No Nozomanu Uchuu Gekokujou
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adaptation
author: Katatewaza
synopsis:
Nao is suffering. The university student watched as his girlfriend dumped him to run off with another man, and now he has nothing to live for anymore. As he contemplates suicide, he sees an advertisement for the Space Force - a military power dedicated to protecting the planet from all sorts of extraterrestrial enemies. 

An idea hatches in his head - he heard of the cliche where the hero tells his comrades "I'll take it from here. You go on without me." It's a perfect way for him to die while looking like the suave hero he always wanted to be seen as! There's only one issue: he's a little *too* competent to die on his own...

title: Resident Evil: the Marhawa Desire
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Military, Drama, Horror, Adaptation
author: Capcom
synopsis: Chris Redfield is sent by the Bioterrorism Security Assessment Alliance (BSAA) to investigate a series of biohazard incidents occurring in Marhawa School, Asia's largest elite school in a certain country in the Far East.

title: The Villainous Tyrant Has Returned
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Gwakaen
synopsis:
"If you wish, I dont mind dying."

The tyrant Ludwig Magenta has met his end at the hands of Empress Olive Charlotte. The moment he accepted death, he opened his eyes in the garden where he first met her at the age of twelve. 

If he starts again from the beginning, can he change his tragic life? 

Only time will tell if Ludwigs quest for Olives love will succeed.

title: Shiro No Keiyaku
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Sakura Tsukuba
synopsis:
From Aerandria:  
  
Shiro is a white crow. Because of his unusual color, hes often bullied by the other black crows. One day, hes hurt badly because the others ganged up on him, and he was saved by a girl. Moved by the girls gentle heart, Shiro asked a devil to let him turn into a human. However, theres one condition: Shiro will have to do at least one bad deed a day, otherwise, his body will crumble. Can Shiro really fulfill this contract?

title: Zingnize
genre: Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Martial Arts, Samurai, Gore, Drama, Supernatural
author: Warainaku
synopsis:
The story of the "Three Jinnai from Edo" (Kosaka, Tobisawa, Shoji)  
Eight year of the Keicho era, 3 years after the Battle of Sekigahara (1603 AD) Okubo Nagayasu calls on Kosaka Jinnai, who is known as the best thief in Japan, to eliminate the bandit gang led by Fuma Kotaro.  
A fierce battle between the Jinnais and the Fuma clan opens its curtain !!

title: Karakida-Ke No Kosho Gurashi
genre: Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Kei Toume
synopsis:
The world's largest collection of used bookstores, Kanda-Jinb?ch?. There begins the story of the unforgettable days the three Karakida sisters spend surrounded by the scent of used books when they inherit the used bookstore their grandfather left behind.

**Note:** Has been on hiatus since October 2024 due to author Toume Kei's health. ([Announcement](https://x.com/gj_karakida/status/1846204960293507390))
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://twitter.com/gj_karakida)

title: High School Family: Kokosei Kazoku
genre: Traditional Games, Animals, Comedy, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Ryou Nakama
synopsis: Spring is in the air, and Kotaro is about to begin his first year of high school. He's full of hope and anticipation of a wonderful life at his new school, only to have his dreams crushed byhis family?! Isobe Isobee Monogatari ~ Ukiyo wa Tsuraiyo creator Ryo Nakama's latest series combines family and school life gags, making it feel familiar but also fresh and new. This new genre of comedy will be sure to make the grade!

title: Lovesick
genre: Romance, Drama
author: KEPPI
synopsis:
Lovesick  
Yue lives alone with her 27 year-old step-father, Kouki. She's dating a boy her age but she can't stop thinking about Kouki. Could it be more than the feelings of relatives?  
  
  
Includes the following oneshots:  
  
Koukando Equals (extra story in Volume 1)  
Kouno has always thought that she was the only one who got hurt deeply when she was bullied. She just might be able to see from the bully's eyes.  
  
Diamond (extra story in Volume 2)  
Urara, a poor college student, has always been told she is ugly, but that's all about to change when she meets three unexpectedly diverse people, who work together to 'polish' a person into their full capability.

title: Aki/Momo
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic
author: Akiko Morishima
synopsis: Mutually unrequited love yuri.

title: Shugo Chara! Jewel Joker
genre: Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: PEACH?PIT
synopsis:
The long-awaited comeback! A new story of Amu and her guardian characters begins...!

The cool and spicy Amu Hinamori has graduated from Seiyo Academy's elementary school and is finally a junior high school student! She thought she would have carefree days with her precious friends in junior high... until she is asked to take on a mission related to guardian characters and has to transfer to a new school...!

title: Our Villainess Has Changed
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hoeun
synopsis:
She grew up an orphan, working herself to death in part-time jobs, and eventually died from exhaustion. 

Right before her death, she was reading an R-rated romance fantasy novel and found herself reincarnated as Annette Ethelred, the twisted villainess who was adopted into a duke's family and was bent on killing the novel's heroine. Annette was also the last princess of a fallen kingdom. Her happiness over the lavish lifestyle of the dukes family didnt last long, as she was quickly thrown out with nothing to her name, punished for the evil deeds of the original Annette. 

But giving up wasnt an option. With the survival skills honed from all her part-time jobs, she managed to get hired as a maid at the temple. 

"This time around, Ill make lots of money and date a handsome man! ...But seriously, are there no normal guys around here?!"

title: Empress'S Harem
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Morel
synopsis: Super sweet and super-sand sculptured female statue against the harem! I often hear: "Three princes and three princesses! Your puppets are fighting again!" The overbearing female CEO traversed to the world of female honors and woke up with seven husbands.

title: Initial D
genre: Action, Sports, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Shuuichi Shigeno
synopsis: Only the fearless survive in the white-hot world of street racing, as teams take on dangerous roads in the shadow of Mt. Akina. Behind the wheel of the mysterious "Ghost of Akina" is Takumi, on his way to becoming the greatest racer ever.

title: Jukai: Shounin Yokkyuu No Mori
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Survival, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Nyorai Kajiwara
synopsis:
Freelance writer Shunsuke Koshiji went to the Sea of Trees at the foot of Mount Fuji in response to a video streamer's message for help. Upon arrival, he found dozens of other streamers gathered there, their goal being to find a secret cult known as "Jofuku Divine Teaching," who are said to operate in the forest. But that night, something happens...

The Sea of Trees and a dark cult... both will bring out the streamers' ugly true desire of wanting to go viral...

(Source: Nihon Bungeisha)

title: Snow in the Dark
genre: Action, Comedy, Anthology, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Yasuhiro Kanou
synopsis:
Collection of 4 oneshots:  
  
1) MP0   
The oneshot that will lead to Mx0. The names are different but the contents are the same.  
  
2) She Monkey  
A boy has come to a deserted island to meet his scientist father who is working on a top-secret experiment. There he meets a beautiful girl who knows him, but he doesn't know her.  
  
3) Snow in the Dark  
A one-shot fairy tale which shares many elements of the traditional story of Snow White but is certainly unique and complex enough that it is more than just a reinterpretation.  
  
4) Kirino Sako to Nakamatachi (story: Nikohara Daisuke)

title: Empress of Hell'S Mission Guide
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Sexual Violence, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Fan Fan
synopsis: Qin NianNian, the SSSSS-level Queen of Mercenaries, became the ruler of the underworld after her death The Empress of Hell! She is highly intelligent, callous, and cruel in her methods. With her adorable pet, TangYuan, she transmigrates into thousands upon thousands of worlds and switches on her punishing scums mode!

title: A Harem for My Empress
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Sexual Violence, Harem, Wuxia, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Zhi Zhen
synopsis: The tyrant Xi Wuji always thought that his pampered queen treated him affectionately, like a delicate little lotus flower. He thought she loved him, but on the day of his death, he opened his eyes. As a result of his death, she took charge of the government and had many lovers, and lived in debauchery. But he became her favourite lover again in this new life?

title: Kuuzoku Huck to Jouki No Hime
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Tomonori Inoue
synopsis:
1901 - The Mist Industrial Revolution ushered in the "Age of the Air."

As people move their lives from the ground to the skies, "air pirates" appear, forming cliques and roaming the skies. 
Among them there was a pirate who disliked herds and roamed the skies freely, and his name was Huck.

---
**Link:**

* [Mag-Garden](https://www.mag-garden.co.jp/comics/13202/)

title: Radiant
genre: Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Niiro Ikuhana
synopsis:
Seth is an apprentice sorcerer from the Pompo Hills. Like all sorcerers, he's an "infected", one of the few people having survived an encounter with a Nemesis, those creatures falling from the sky and destroying everything around them. Being immune to them, Seth wants to become a Hunter and fight the Nemesis. But what Seth really wants is to find the source of all Nemesis, the Radiant. Helped by his fellow sorcerers, he will seek the Radiant, under the harsh scrutiny of the Inquisition


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2021)

title: Jimoto No Ijimekko-Tachi Ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu No Tatakai Ga Hajimatta.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life
author: Kengo Matsumoto
synopsis: Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games. Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them. As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...! But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected...

title: Kaiju No. 8: Relax
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Kizuku Watanabe
synopsis:
A spin-off gag manga of "Kaiju No. 8"!

The defense force members risk their lives to protect people from approaching monsters. But even these members have "off-duty" days to relieve their daily fatigue! Don't miss the hilarious vacations the members of the force have to offer!

title: Tanikamen
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Yokusaru Shibata
synopsis: The story is of a masked boy, Tani, a strong young man, who has a crush on a girl named Shima Rihoko, the school volleyball star. He gets into trouble trying to get her attention, besides facing the thugs of the school. Hes a very jealous guy, and will not let anyone get close to Shima-san.

title: I'M an Evil God
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Shidai Man Wang
synopsis: Among the various realms, is the manliest and most handsome evil god in history! The peerless and handsome Xie Yan crosses over and falls into the vixen's lair. In order not to be drained of his entire life-force, he travels between various realms, cuts down a son of god, and repels an invading union hailing from across the ocean This is the story of how he eventually becomes an evil god.

title: Bu Tian Gang
genre: Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Da E E
synopsis: Cute, smart, and introverted disciple X cold, strict, and beautiful master. In order to pursue the cold male god from the train, Dong Zhi worked hard to get admitted into the department of public service  the ministry of exorcism. Not only is he working day in and day out, he constantly puts his life on the line and has to dodge all kinds of dangers, isnt chasing this male god too strenuous?

title: Banquet with Deer Crying
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Ke Ran Bing
synopsis: Inside a certain luxurious building, human desire runs wild, and justice is almost nonexistent. Courtesan Su You receives a visitor, who offers a large sum to buy her freedom, and even claims that she knows the future, hoping that Su You will lend her a hand and save the world.

title: 100-Year-Old Top Chef
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Cooking
author: Studio Jaemi
synopsis:
The worlds greatest chef. First, second, third and sixth life. The combined time Ive spent on cooking is over 100 years.

I cant do this anymore. There is only one way to stop this endless reincarnation and regression. This time, I will definitely succeed.

<100-Year-Old Top Chef>

title: My Dog Becomes a Human
genre: Animals, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Kenji Hamada
synopsis:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where pet dogs have become humans!
Feelings that couldnt be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly!?

title: Hiota No Kanojo Ga Ore No Motteru Eroge Ni Kyoumi Shinshin Nanda Ga......
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation
author: Kei Takizawa
synopsis: Kazuma, a highschool student who loves eroge, has been confessed to by the honour student and beautiful girl, Misaki Honoka, who's the school's prodigy. What's more, Honoka had declared that she would try her best to become a "heroine" that Kazuma likes?! "Can you train me?" What kind of eroge is this?

title: The Bugle Call: Song of War
genre: Action, Psychological, Military, Fantasy, Mystery, Music, Tragedy
author: Mozuku Sora
synopsis:
In Arboral Year 1294, the world is dominated by nine massive towers known as the Spires, remnants of an ancient civilization. Filled with lost secrets and powerful knowledge, nations struggle to possess them. Luca is a bugler in a mercenary company who wants nothing more than to leave the battlefield behind and become a true musician, a maestro. But marked as one of the enigmatic Branch-hexed, and gifted with the strange ability to see the sound of his instrument, Luca finds himself drawn reluctantly into a war of epic proportions!

Left for dead after a battle, Luca is saved by the mysterious Pontiff and learns he is not the only person with unusual powers. The Pontiff has formed a special team of Branch-hexed individuals he plans to use to help him defeat rival empires, and Luca learns that his powers, rather than being an escape from the battlefield, now force him to be a muse of massacre.

title: Ailes Grises
genre: Doujinshi, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Yoshitoshi ABe
synopsis:
The series follows a young girl named Rakka, a newly arrived haibane (an angelic-looking being), and other characters in the city of Glie (guri), a walled city with one entrance where no one is allowed to leave.  
Also contains a side story written after the end of the anime. It shows the relation between Reki and Nemu (and Hyouko) after the departure of Kuramori. The colour illustrations are those supposedly by Reki. One is a scenery in her dream and the other is the portrait of Kuramori.  
  
Artbook: Haibane Renmei - Guri no Machi, Haibane no Niwade.

title: Jirai Nandesuka? Chihara-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Ryon
synopsis: The girl sitting next to me at the start of the new semester is the rumored "landmine" girl... but... is Chihara-san really the "landmine" that everyone says she is?

title: DarlingS Vanishing Act
genre: Action, Romance, Crime, Mafia
author: Yazu
synopsis: Darling is a carefree, cheerful, romantic, and flirtatious gentleman. The moment he appears, the fate of the underworld is set into rapid motion...! A fact its residents know, fear, and dread! Get captivated by this brilliant action-drama starring the underworld's top escape artist!

title: Mobile Suit Gundam: the Nameless Battlefield
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Military, Drama, Adaptation
author: Kazuhisa Kondo
synopsis: Master Kazuhisa Kondo comicalizes the world of the popular online game "Gundam Online". Prominent MS fight freely on the ground and in space with Kondo's hands!

title: Fever
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Karin Misugi
synopsis:
'Yeah, well done. Don't let other people touch you.'

"Myungha is a young man abandoned by his family and lives alone in the mountains to protect the tombs of his ancestors. One day, his father tells him that he will recognize him as his legitimate son in exchange for fulfilling a simple errand. However, that errand is to marry Prince Howon and live in his house. Thank goodness the prince treats him kindly, but at night, he behaves like someone else. What will this strange marriage bring him."

---

- [Original Webtoon <R15>](https://ridibooks.com/books/297043635)

title: Outaishi-Sama, Watashi Kondo Koso Anata Ni Korosaretakunain Desu!
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Ema Okadachi
synopsis: The poverty-stricken noblewoman, Liesel, was murdered by her lover, the crown prince, in an elaborate ruse set up by the evil saintess. However, she receives a second chance to live as she suddenly wakes up as her childhood self. She takes this event as a chance to change her life, and live without ties to both the crown prince and the saintess, but by a strange twist of fate, she becomes entangled with the saintess's childhood friend! A woman with a strong will to live who has been ensnared by fate?Liesel's success story begins here!

title: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
genre: Action, Adventure, Video Games, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Akira Himekawa
synopsis:
A manga adaption of the original video game.

Link, a shepherd from Ordon Village, sees village children, including with his childhood friend Ilia, being kidnapped by monsters. He chases after them only to find his world covered in twilight. Thereupon Link suddenly transforms into a wolf and finds a mysterious character named Midna. His journey to bring back light into the world begins.

title: Urareta Henkyou Haku Reijou Wa Ringoku No Outaishi Ni Dekiai Sareru
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy
author: An Ogura
synopsis:
"What a boring world this is."

A noble society where it is common sense for women to marry a nobleman from a good family and dote on their husband for the rest of their lives. Anna, the young daughter of the Harmich family, has grown tired of such a world. Rather than having fantasies of marriage, Anna, who is obsessed with the art of war, dreamt of appearing on the battlefield alongside her father. However, after being invaded by their neighbouring country, Albion, Anna's father departed for the battlefield for his last and final time. On top of that, the eldest son was taken as a war prisoner. In dire straits, the Harmich family decides to offer their second daughter, Anna, to the neighbouring country!

title: Shinmai Necromancer, Maou Wo Sosei Suru
genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Shizuku Namie
synopsis:
"O spirit destined to be mine, rise once more from the realm of the dead!"

In the depths of an extravagant tomb, Alice, a novice necromancer, channeled her mana into an ancient coffin as she cast her spell. Dust scattered through the air, and a wave of overwhelming mana surged, leaving her breathless. But what emerged was not the mindless undead she had expectedit was a handsome young man, casually perched atop the coffin, his piercing gaze meeting hers.

With a bright, disarming smile, he introduced himselfbut Alice soon realized the truth: this was no ordinary man. He was the legendary figure who, centuries ago, had plunged the world into chaos and terror... the Demon King himself.

title: Long-Awaited Feelings
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Qu Bing Xiancao Dong
synopsis:
During the wedding of the famous actress, Jing Xiu, Weibo was flooded instead by the shocking headline "New Hit Actress Ji Youyan Dies of Alcohol Poisoning". The headlines were soon changed when the wedding was called off... for reasons unknown.

Ji Youyan suddenly wakes up three years back in time, two years after she broke up with Jing Xiu. This time, she swears to never lose her again...

title: Super Ninja Dan
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Police, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Tetsu Kariya
synopsis: The Kyosha and Jinma clans are ninja organizations living in the modern age. They were called "super ninja," or "super shinobi." However, these two clans have been fighting a fierce battle to exterminate each other. Why? The unique tag team of Tetsu Kariya and Kazuhiko Shimamoto unleash a painful work!

title: Saint Seiya: Saint Mariya
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magical Girls, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural
author: Seira Shimotsuki
synopsis: Mariya enters Graad Academy and looks forward to her school life. However, something strange occurs in the auditorium due to a mysterious evil action... A new galactic myth is now born in a girl's manga! The Cosmos burns in flames! The war for the Sacred Cloth begins!

title: Tonari No Wakazo
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life
author: Machiko Sawa
synopsis: Araki is a serious and proper type gay guy. Honest, older men are his type. Even then, the guy who moved in next door is Araki's most hated type, a flashy guy called Higata. That Higata told Araki, "I feel good when I'm with you," and suddenly kissed him. Although he doesn't like him, Araki gets excited--!

title: Kuroneko No Ohanashi
genre: Animals, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Marusen
synopsis:
This is a story about a black cat who became a cat girl.

---

Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/M_terU116/status/1816775907320955112)

title: Digimon Tamers
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Yuen Wong Yu
synopsis:
When three Digimon fans  Rika, Henry, and our lead Takato  suddenly find themselves with "real" Digimon, they discover a living creature under your care is far harder to deal with than a few pixels on your TV screen. The kids try to be Digimon 'Tamers,' aka Digimon caretakers, but they all seem to have different opinions on what that should entail. Rika thinks Digimon should fight, Henry thinks they should never fight, and Takato  seems to be somewhere in the middle.  
  
Being a Tamer isn't just about believing one thing or another. It's about learning and adjusting for the good of everyone else. But they have a long way to go, and their problems are just beginning.

(The English translation is based off the script from the FoxKids version of the anime.)

title: Kikaijikake No Marie
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Aki Akimoto
synopsis:
Marie gets hired to be a maid. But not just any maid A robot maid!? How will she get through her new life pretending to be an emotionless mechanical maid? A manga full of comedy and romance!  
  
Starts with a one-shot, and has been officially serialized in LaLa magazine.

title: The Great Wizard Transcendent
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Chang-Ju Hong
synopsis:
Mikhail Walpurgis, the worlds only 9th-circle Archmage, fell in battle due to a damned hero, and managed to cast one final advanced magic spell, <TIME REVERSAL>. As time rewound, he regressed to 20 years ago.

Fine. Ill just become the hero instead.

---

title: Nabakari Bitch to Incubus
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kanna
synopsis: Yumeshi, an introverted incubus, is unexpectedly ordered by his succubus mother to "lose his virginity." In a state of confusion, he decides to approach a girl in his class who has a reputation for being a troublemaker. However, he soon discovers that this girl has a surprisingly troubled and innocent past of her own...!?

title: After-School Secret Club
genre: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Teppei Fukushima
synopsis: Yuichi Nekota enters the giant school city "Private Eucalyptus Leaf Academy". Excited about his new life, he meets Chitose Arikasaki, a girl who investigates the mysteries of the school! The two form the 'After School Secret Club', and today they continue their search for the truth!

title: Deserted Place
genre: Oneshot, Fantasy
author: Mitsukazu Mihara
synopsis:
The story follows the journey of a mysterious boy who brings peace to deserted places and things  
  
-  
Uploader's note: Published in Gothic Lolita Bible which doesn't focus on manga, so it has no target demographics.

title: Natsukashi Machi No Rozione
genre: Romance, Drama, Fantasy
author: Sumomo Yumeka
synopsis: Intent on being an independent young woman, high schooler Himeyuka lives on her own in an unremarkable apartment complex in a corner of the city. But one day, she discovers her ordinary building has turned into something extraordinary! Her beloved castle is covered in childish scribbles - both inside and out! And waiting for her at the end of this rainbow-colored messis the perpetrator of the crime: a little boy named Rozione, who seems to know quite a bit about Himeyuka, though she has no idea who he is. Is he really just someone's lost child, or is there a greater mystery behind his appearance?

title: Not All Girls Are Stupid
genre: Anthology, Reverse Harem, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life
author: Q-ta Minami
synopsis:
Collection of short stories.   
  
"Fun After School" is a two-part one-shot that tells about the relationship between Iwata Megumi, the idol of Chofu High School, and Midorikawa Mayuko, also known as Miss Chofu High School. When another student takes a picture of the two of them in an intimate moment, what lengths will Megumi go to to get the picture and negative?  
  
"School Days" centers around a girl named Misaki who hates the co-ed school she was forced to transfer to and desperately misses her best friend from the girls' school she used to attend.

title: Majo No Hanaya-San
genre: Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Sou Hamayumiba
synopsis:
Allie Abel, a girl who came from the countryside wishing to become a witch who can make people happy with magic, meets Yoshino-York, an unusual witch who sells ordinary flowers and believes that "people can be happy without relying on magic". Allie, who has been assigned to work at Yoshino's florist as an apprentice witch, is now making "happiness" that was supposed to come true through magic come true with her own hands...??

A heroine fantasy of flowers and magic that will bring a little smile to your face!

title: Oresama Teacher
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Martial Arts, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life, Delinquents
author: Izumi Tsubaki
synopsis:
Kurosaki Mafuyu was a juvenile delinquent and head of her gang before her subsequent arrest got her expelled from high school. Now that she's transferred to a new high school, she's determined to become an "ultra-shiny, super feminine high school student." But with a new friend like Hayasaka-kun and a homeroom teacher like Saeki Takaomi (who may be more than he seems), will Mafuyu really be able to live a girly-girl high school life?  
  
**Official Oresama Teacher PV:**  
  
<https://youtu.be/3kzHDkGI_Y8>

title: My Long Distance Girlfriend Came to Visit Me.
genre: Romance, Doujinshi, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Niichi
synopsis: A short story by Niichi for Comiket 101.

title: I Got a Girlfriend From a Shooting Star
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Jinteng Yue Official
synopsis: What do I do if I like girls? I wished upon a shooting star, not expecting it to be granted straight away so why did a spirit suddenly appear before me?

title: Uchuujin No Kakushigoto
genre: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama, School Life, Aliens, Tragedy
author: Hamita
synopsis:
The girl I fell in love with is an alien!? I, the class president, happened to fall in love with my classmate, the eccentric Haru. I confessed my feelings, but her true identity was an alien who came to Earth to survey it.

I still like you!

I started going out with Haru, but now I have a further secret to keep

title: Watashi Ga Koibito Ni Nareru Wake Naijan, Muri Muri! (Muri Janakatta!?)
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Harem, School Life, Adaptation
author: Teren Mikami
synopsis:
Longing to be a normie, I, Renako Amaori, am finally making my high school debut after working so hard for it. However due to my communication impairment, I have a gloomy aura. And after being in the normie group day in day out, I got so exhausted and said I can't do this anymore, and reached my limit!

During that time, I accidentally met the top student of our school. Perfect in face and figure, unrivaled in sword and pen, our school's best high school girl: Mai Odzuka.
We found in each other someone who we could open to and talk about our own troubles. What a nice friend I made, now I can surely get back on my own feetis what I thought!

"It seems that you, even as a girl, have made me fall in love with you."
What!? Mai suddenly confessed to me. Wait! What about our friendship?

And so, we now have different feelings we cant tell each other: friendship or a romantic relationship. Were now presenting each other its benefits and put them into practice to see what kind of relationship works best for us. Will I succeed with a successful high school life?

title: Pandora'S Cube
genre: Oneshot, School Life, Fantasy
author: Yuu Watase
synopsis:
Story about friendship and truth, with of course, a supernatural box.  
Begins in a middle school where a mysterious box appears before some boys.  
  
Italian/Italiano:  
Kazuya Ooshiba è uno studente delle medie gentile e disponibile. Di questo si approfitta Ryouji, suo "amico" sin dall'infanzia, che da un pò di tempo aveva iniziato a comportarsi in maniera sgarbata nei suoi confronti. A sostenere moralmente il nostro Kazuya, però, c'è un altro suo caro amico d'infanzia:Kou.  
Un giorno Ryouji scopre che nella stanza di arte vi è uno strano cubo e per fare un dispetto a Kazuya, lo rinchiude lì dentro. Quando, però, Kou lo farà uscire di lì nel tardo pomeriggio, il cubo richiamerà Ryouji chiudendolo all'interno e minacciando la sua morte. Inizia così il disperato tentativo di Kazuya di salvare non solo il suo compagno, ma anche il valore dell'amicizia che li legava

title: Natsume Arata No Kekkon
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Gore, Drama, Mystery
author: Tarou Nogizaka
synopsis:
Arata Natsume works at a child guidance center, is in his thirties and single with no plans for marriage. But one day, he receives a request from the child he was in charge of, Takuto, to "meet the criminal who killed his father". That serial killer is Shinagawa Shinju, also known as The Shinagawa Pierrot.

Won the 70th Shougakukan Manga Award.

title: Gto Paradise Lost
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Delinquents
author: Tooru Fujisawa
synopsis:
The next stage for Great Teacher Onizuka Eikichi is a prison!

Arrested due to an incident caused in his class, one that he was made assistant teacher of only six months ago! A newly established performing arts class at Kissho Academy High School, created for students who work in various media industries! Onizuka, who says he has no regrets whatsoever, quietly begins to tell the truth of the incident in prison.

At last the decades-spanning story of Eikichi Onizuka comes to a dramatic conclusion!

*Due to a change in publishers this series ended at chapter 178.5 and continued on as "GTO: Paradise Lost Kai" (listed under the "Related" tab), picking up where the story left off.

title: The Story of the Gatekeeper
genre: Oneshot, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Tae-Yeon Kim
synopsis:
"I am a gatekeeper. I guard a very old castle"  
  
A lone gatekeeper stands watch outside of the Lost Castle. All who enter the castle he never sees again but he cannot warn them for he is cursed. Then one day a beautiful girl wants to enter! What will the gatekeeper do? What is the secret of the castle?

title: Terror
genre: Oneshot, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Kazuo Umezu
synopsis: Every day, without fail, on the stroke of midnight, she comes

title: Dark Gathering
genre: Action, Ghosts, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Kenichi Kondou
synopsis: Keitarou, who's always had a disposition for attracting spirits, gets hired as a tutor for a little girl named Yayoi who can see spirits and is searching for the spirit that took away her mother.

title: Lies of the Sheriff Evans: Dead or Love
genre: Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Police, Slice of Life
author: Mizuki Kuriyama
synopsis: The story follows lawman Elmore Evans, who despite being one of the most amazing gunslingers in the West can't get rid of his bad luck in his romantic life.

title: Ts Siblings
genre: Genderswap, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, School Life

synopsis:
Meet the Suehiro siblings: older brother Kazuki and little sister Mio. One day, their father created a potion that causes them to swap sexes. 

Now theyre big sister Kazuki and little brother Mio. What antics will they get into next?

title: I'M Stuck on the Same Day for a Thousand Years
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Odakaki
synopsis:
Wu Chen transmigrated to a new world, Got trapped on the day of July 7, 2020, Constantly reincarnating! He used to indulge himself doing all sorts of evil things while running wild in despair, but every new day, everything would start all over again. In this way, he has been reincarnated for a thousand years, and on a new day, the sun rose as usual.
The time is: July 8, 2020

title: Buttobase! Magical Reading?
genre: Magic, Fantasy
author: Ricca Kise
synopsis: This is a story about the apprentice witch Koko and her partner the beastman wizard Gracia, both working hard to learn the power of magic.

title: Love Lab
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Itoyoko
synopsis:
Love Lab is set in Fujisaki Girls Academy, which is known for their school body being composed of very prim and proper middle school students. The most prominent one of them is Natsuo Maki, the student council president who is admired by her classmates for her calm and polite demeanor, and her profound beauty. On the other hand, Riko Kurahashi is also admired, but due to her having a very forward and boyish personality.   
  
One day, Riko accidentally walks into Maki when she is kissing a body pillow with a picture of a guy for practice, and learns that she is not as collected as everyone thinks she is. Riko is forced into keeping Maki's secret and joins her in practicing romance activities such as holding hands and more, and in the middle of all that mess, somehow smoothly running a student council regardless!

title: Hyouka
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Honobu Yonezawa
synopsis:
Oreki Houtarou is an "energy-saver" kind of guy, who expends as little energy as possible to do only things he has to. When he starts high school, his older sister sends him a letter asking him to join the Classics Club. The club meant a lot to her, and its number of members has been reduced to zero.  
  
Houtarou reluctantly signs up for the club, only to find that someone else has joined, too! She's Chitanda Eru, a cute, big-eyed girl with an overwhelming sense of curiosity. A mystery crops up that catches Eru's interest, and also draws in Houtarou's friend, Fukube Satoshi. They continue solving mundane mysteries together, and soon they draw in Satoshi and Houtarou's friend, Ibara Mayaka, as well. Mayaka has had a blatant crush on Satoshi since middle school, but he always fends off her advances. Together, they search for the truth in a mystery that involves the history of the Classics Club.

title: 2 Saisa No Osananajimi
genre: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Itonoko

Feelings that have remain unchanged from back then...

Please be aware of me soon!

When did he become so cool! No, no, there's no way!

I thought he was just a normal cute "little brother"-like childhood friend, but
6 years later he

title: Otaku-Kun No Seiheki Wo Isshou Yugamete Iku Ishuzoku Musume-Tachi
genre: Genderswap, Romance, Harem, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Gyuutei
synopsis: The main character, Otaku-kun, is awakened to his special sexual proclivities through a series of happening interactions with girls of different races! Can you keep your reason?

author: Suzuki Senpai

Miyaji Miyuki (16) moved away when she was little, not long after going on a spree of proposing to several different girls in kindergarten.

Years later, she returns to her hometown and transfers to a new high school, where she is forced to reckon with her past...

title: Shokei Sareta Kenja Wa Lich Ni Tensei Shite Shinryaku Sensou Wo Hajimaru
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Zombies, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Karaku Yuuki
synopsis: The Sage Dwight, he along with the Hero defeated the Demon Lord who sank the world into darkness. However, they were falsely accused of becoming the next Demon Lords because of his power, and were thrown to The Valley of the Dead to die... But though his flesh has rotten away, he lives on as a skeleton because of his grudge against the world. Dwight has vowed to deny that wrong world, and with a power that surpasses even the Demon King of the past, and also leading countless Skeletons he's going to start an all out war...!

title: Fire Emblem Engage
genre: Video Games, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kazuro Kyou
synopsis: Ryuuru, a divine dragon in human form, wakes up from a long sleep with no memory. People say that Ryuuru is a hero who fought against an evil dragon that threatened the world 1000 years ago, but... He is confused by the people's reverence and expectations, and the shadows of battle and deception once again loom over him.

title: The Scholar'S Reincarnation
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

synopsis:
A martial artist, claiming himself to be a "murderer" is defeated by a suicide attack in battle and is reborn as a first born child to a local lord. Having a fresh start, a warm family and a little sister to protect - he decides to become a better person in his new life.

title: I Want to Kill the Yandere Prince Everyday
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

After an unexpected accident, the once cold and aloof young lord has transformed into a dainty, fragile ["Little Sister Lin"](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lin_Daiyu), even using his good looks to win the affections of the other party!! However, as their relationship deepens, Jiang Jiao Jiao begins to uncover Ming Yus dark, obsessive tendencies and a massive family secret spanning two generations...

title: Akuyaku Reijou Level 99: Watashi Wa Uraboss Desu Ga Maou De Wa Arimasen
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Nokomi
synopsis:
I reincarnated as the "Villainess Eumiella" from an RPG Otome game. In the main story, Eumiella is merely a side character, but after the ending, she re-enters the story as the Hidden Boss, a character boasting high stats on par with the heroes! 

Lighting a fire in my gamer's soul, and taking advantage of being left on my own in my parent's territory, I trained, trained, and trained! As a result of my training by the time I enrolled in the academy, I managed to reach level 99. 

Though I had planned to live out my days as inconspicuously and peacefully as possible, soon after entering the school, I'm suspected by the Heroine and Love Interests of being the "Demon Lord"?  
  
Based on a popular web novel of seeking a peaceful life, a fantasy story of the strongest villainess!

genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

synopsis:
A young man set forth to avenge his master, a once powerful martial artist who was betrayed by his own men and barely escaped with his life. Armed with his master's supreme martial art techniques, he is ready to bring terror and wreak havoc among the murim. But before he even got started, he learns that the ones who had betrayed his master are already dead Erm, so what happens now?

title: The Window of Orpheus
genre: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Crossdressing, Drama, Tragedy
author: Riyoko Ikeda
synopsis:
The story begins in Europe, during the first years of the XX century. On a background of intrigues, machinations and a Europe that is going strait toward World War I, three kids meet at a strict conservatory in Germany. Julius met Isaac at the famous Orpheus' Window and later in another event met Klaus there. The legend told that two lovers met at Orpheus' Window would end in unhappiness. But Julius met two different persons, and they didn't know Julius' secret. In fact, Julius is a woman who's forced to dress up and pretend to be a guy. But she isn't the only one who has secrets. Klaus, for example, is Russian. Is he a communist spy? Then the whirlwind of fate began.

Note: Has a gaiden known as Collage. Additional gaiden were written by Ikeda, but illustrated by her longtime assistant Erika Miyamoto.

title: Itoko No Onee-Chan Ni Amaechau?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Incest
author: Kyouhei Igarashi
synopsis: Masato Ooizumi just entered high school and he finds himself staying with a relative. Living there is his "big sister cousin" who's being way too close with him!?

title: Shinmai Ossan Boukensha, Saikyou Party Ni Shinu Hodo Kitaerarete Muteki Ni Naru.
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kiraku Kishima
synopsis:
It is common knowledge that it is best to become an adventurer when you are as young as possible, because the magical power that is the basis of an adventurer's strength will hardly grow if you don't train it while you are young. But this man, Rick Gladiator, who became an adventurer when he was over thirty years old, had the combat power of an S-rank adventurer, the highest rank in the world. In fact, Rick has lived an unimaginable life with the members of the legendary Orihalcon Fist, a party of the continent's strongest adventurers. From dragons to vampires, Rick's fighting prowess, trained by his literally "monster" mentors, allows him to defeat elite adventurers one after another who try to underestimate him.
___
**Character Designer:** [Tea](https://mangadex.org/author/71d4c549-2476-4803-a9c2-c48a15cc0fd4)

title: Gokufuri Kyohi Shite Tesaguri Start! Tokka Shinai Healer, Nakama to Wakarete Tabi Ni Deru
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kokuichi
synopsis:
Many people suddenly find themselves in a white, empty space, where a God-like figure tells them that they are to be reincarnated and sent to an isekai known as Tesla. They are given a limited number of points to spend in various attributes, such as their race and abilities, which will determine their reincarnation into Tesla.

The story follows a young boy sent there along with his clanmates from an MMORPG, and they plan to stick together and specialize into different skills, just like they did in-game. Although his clanmates and everyone else sent there are strangely accepting of the situation, he finds it too suspicious and decides to go his own separate way, balancing his points out to be an all-rounder instead of a healer.

He leisurely goes about life in Tesla as an adventurer, but it slowly starts to seem like there was a reason behind them being sent there

title: I'M No Heroine!
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Hong-Hye
synopsis:
A girl obsessed with a novel suddenly finds herself transported into the thick of the plot. The problem is, she has taken on the role of the villain in the story. And she knows how this ends it's off with her head! Maybe she'll just let this play out and wake up back in reality But after a few too many deaths to no avail, it's finally time to go off-script. She's going to have a little fun with this tale. She's made up her mind to live!

author: Nui Konoito
synopsis: Aftersomethingchanged his life four years ago, Sunny has not left his house once, living in his own reclusive bubble. Hoping for a fresh start for her son, his mother decides to move their family out of town. However, when his childhood friend Kel re-enters his life, Sunny finds himself thrust back into a world he once knew. With only three days before the move, the duo come across familiar faces as they go through townreawakening a dark past that Sunny has tried so hard to forget.
