title: Looking for a New Husband
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Mokma
synopsis:
Riat, caught up in her husband's treason, faces death.

After repeatedly returning to the past at the cost of half her lifespan, she finally breaks the cycle by offering her husbands head to the emperor.

With only 1 year and 3 months left to live, her one wish is

"Im going to fall in love."

At last, an announcement spreads across the entire empire: a competition to find Riats new husband, with a grand prize of 1 billion gold.

Candidates begin to flood in, but suspicious figures also start gathering around her

title: Mousou Shoujo
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Ryouta Azuma
synopsis: At first sight Jun seems like a hot vamp, however her sexy look is a complete lie. In reality she is a very shy wallflower. But what's even worse: She is still a virgin! In desperation, she seeks refuge in her erotic daydreams which always turn into some odd situations. And if that wasn't enough, she also finds out that the man of her dreams lives nearby.

title: Toudou-Kun Chi No Maid Shota
genre: Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Shota, Slice of Life
author: Bimita
synopsis:
Rennosuke, a scion of the influential Toudou Group, has a terrible relationship with his family. He spends his days getting told off by his father and older sister, who say things like "Did you get into a fight again?" "Having a delinquent for a son of the Toudou family is an embarrassment". 
One day, Rennosuke chances upon a hungry child. The sight of that child hungrily devouring a piece of bread reminds Rennosuke of the dog he once owned, and he asks half-jokingly "If you don't have anywhere to go, why don't you come to my place?".  The child then comes to the Toudou house and starts working as a maid.

title: Ayakashi Triangle
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Martial Arts, Crossdressing, Magic, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Kentarou Yabuki
synopsis:
Ever since he was a boy, Matsuri Kazamaki has worked as an exorcist. Because his childhood friend Suzu Kanade attracts malicious spirits called ayakashi like moths to a flame, Matsuri is tasked with slaying any with ill intentions.   
  
One day, an ayakashi named Shirogane notices the budding romance between these two childhood friends. Eager to both devour Suzu and foil Matsuris chance at love, he performs a forbidden spell  
  
The newest series by Kentaro Yabuki, creator of Black Cat and artist behind To Love Ru and Darling in the Franxx.
Visit the official [website](https://www.shonenjump.com/j/rensai/ayakashi.html) for latest news! English Volume release [licensed](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/ayakashi-triangle/) by Seven Seas.

title: Aekanaru
genre: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Ayato Sasakura
synopsis: Sadai, looking for a place to die, headed deep into the mountains. There he encountered a mysterious and gentle girl who had lived alone in an abandoned village for 150 years, continuing to serve an intangible god. A man that had failed to die and a widow with a graceful aura  from the remains of their wasted lives, the two of them begin a new chapter of their story.

title: Study Group
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hyeong-Uk Sin
synopsis:
Gamin Yoon, a 17 year old student, goes to a school known to harbor future criminals. Stuck in a carnivorous environment where only the strongest survive, he struggles to get good grades to enter a 4 year university. But, will he be able to study well enough to enter university, or will he get involved in the unending fights around the school?  


---

[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/CAMPUS/pizixueba/list?title_no=1467)

title: When the Full Moon Rises
genre: Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Mop-Si
synopsis: We just broke up but we live together? Coming Soon April 27th.

title: Juunenme, Kikan Wo Akirameta Tenisha Wa Imasara Shujinkou Ni Naru
genre: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hisumi
synopsis:
Ten years after being transported to another world.

It was more than enough time to awaken from what at first, felt like an exciting fantasy dream world. And on this 10th year Wasa Tooru gives up searching for a way to return to Japan, after being unsuccessful for so long. It was then that a job offer found its way to him  it was to be the bodyguard of twins who have knowledge of Earth.

title: Shimatsuya Soji
genre: Sci-Fi, Action
author: Nariaki Narita
synopsis: Not found

title: Mayoi Neko Overrun!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kentarou Yabuki
synopsis: The story revolves around Takumi Tsuzuki, a boy who lives with his older "sister" Otome, although the two have no blood ties between them. Otome manages a run-down confectionery store called Stray Cats. One day, Otome picks up a mysterious beautiful girl off the streets.

title: Densha Ni Nottekita Tondemonai Onna
genre: Oneshot, Web Comic
author: Yone
synopsis:
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/gggrande/status/1666736118233174016)

title: The Demon King'S Daughter Is Way Too Easy
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Fantasy
author: Tarou Chiaki
synopsis: In the final showdown between the Demon King and the Hero, the latter used all his power to seal away the former. To exact her revenge on her father's nemesis, the Demon King's daughter, Hel, resurrected the Hero and planned to use him as her personal servant. However, the resurrected Hero is unexpectedly dazzling and dashing, and Hel's composure begins to waver. Will she ever be able to torment her new servant?

title: Net Keijiban Hyaku Monogatari Series
genre: Monsters, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Aki Shimizu
synopsis: Featuring eerie urban legends that became popular on the internet, faithfully adapted into comics by skilled authors. A true horror anthology for urban legends!

title: Yume No Shizuku, Kin No Torikago
genre: Historical, Romance, Drama
author: Chie Shinohara
synopsis:
Beginning of 16th century  Alexandra was captured by slave traders from Ukraine during one of their many raids. When the traders arrived in Greece to sell the female slaves, a young handsome man named Mateus bought her and promised to give her true freedom. He hired countless teachers, scholars, and palace ladies to train her into the most perfect woman of her time. Mateus's kindness has caused Alexandra to deeply fall in love with him, and she secretly wishes to be his concubine. But Mateus has already promised her to his best friend... Suleiman the Great, Emperor of the Ottoman Empire! What does freedom mean when you are in another man's harem and can only look at the one you love from afar?

Not willing to endure agony, Alexandra promises herself that one day she will free both of them from their bird cages... but Mateus is the Grand Vizier, power only second to the Emperor himself. So Alexandra must become the most influential concubine in order to have any hope which also means, bearing Suleiman's son. However, Suleiman already has a son by another concubine, and this woman is determined to keep her son as the only prince.

title: Bakuon Rettou
genre: Psychological, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Tsutomu Takahashi
synopsis: In the 80s, Kaze Takashi's parents moved to a quiet area in Tokyo to protect their son from the bad influence of his friends. In class, Takashi doesn't wait to make new friends. Passionate for motorcycle rallies, they invite Takashi to join the next event. It became a revelation for the young man and he decides to join a biker gang! Now all that's left is to find a motorbike

title: Inari No Kekkon
genre: Loli, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Hachi Itou
synopsis: Not found

title: Osanajimi Senpai Wa Kizukanai
genre: Web Comic
author: Giba-chan
synopsis: Not found

title: Blue Giant
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music
author: Shinichi Ishizuka
synopsis:
A high school 3rd year student, Miyamoto Dai, whose heart was touched by Jazz, continued to play the Saxophone alone in Kawahara, rain or shine, day or night, for many years. "I want to become the world's best Saxophone player!!" Effort, talent, faith, environment, luckwhich are necessary? A tale of reaching towards his goal recklessly and sincerely begins in Hirosegawa, Sendai.  

[Official Site](https://bluegiant.jp/) 

---
- English release by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/blue-giant/)  
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics (2018)

- **Won the 20th Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize for Manga**

title: Obsessed with Shuelina
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dan-Mi Im
synopsis:
Shuelina has only ever wanted to be loved as she grew up in an orphanage.
But after her birth father rejected her in a previous life, she tries to find a family who will accept her in this one.
Luckily, Archduke Bylot and his sons fall for her indomitable spirit, and they shower her with the love she has longed for.
But once they find out she's the long-lost imperial princess, can she be a part of their family?
Or will she have to go back to the people who sent her away in the first place?

(Source: Tapas)

___
Alternative Raw: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/-/4185)
Official JP translation: [Piccoma](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/173647)

title: Funsou Deshitara Hatta Made
genre: Action, Crime, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Den Motohiro
synopsis: When ethnicities, languages and thoughts mingle together, there's no way of avoiding conflicts. Now of course, if you change your place of residence, the nature of conflicts that occur will also change! Therefore, Hatta Yuri a geopolitical risk consultant tries to solve the ethnic problems in Southeast Asia, the terrible incidents that occur in Africa, and the corporate problems that occur in Europe!?

title: The Chest
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, Horror, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Kazuyuki Yamagata
synopsis: Think you know how it ends? Think again. Jump into this psychological thriller anthology packed with unexpected twists.

title: Lady Devil
genre: Historical, Demons, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Hanheun
synopsis:
"Devil, I don't want to marry him."

In hopes to escape a forced marriage, Giovinetta makes a wish to the devil to save her, but what she doesn't know are the consequences of her actions.

---
The lady trapped in the tower is being forced into a marriage. Her husband has killed or exiled his previous wives several times. The frightened princess eventually wakes up the sarcophagus in the basement and calls out the devil....

"I don't want to marry him, Raven."

---
Notice: This story is ***not*** incest.

title: Mata Korosarete Shimatta No Desu Ne, Tantei-Sama
genre: Thriller, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Teniwoha
synopsis: High school student Sakuya Otsuki, whose father is a legendary detective, works as a half-baked detective alongside his beautiful and talented assistant Lilithea. However, due to Sakuya's "special constitution" and a request that comes in one day, they become embroiled in a major incident, and their fates change dramatically.

title: Trigun Maximum
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural
author: Yasuhiro Nightow
synopsis:
Vash the Stampede rises again! It's been two years since the mysterious and super-nice gunman went into hiding, and the people of his desert planet are suffering. It takes a friend in peril to bring him out, and when he does, his enemies come chasing as well as those crazy insurance girls, Millie and Meryl. And Wolfwood the wandering priest? Well, that's who found him in the first place! The gang's all back, and the trouble is coming in Trigun Maximum.

Notes:
 - Nightow changed publishers to Shonen Gahosha and the series continued to be serialized in Young King Ours magazine. Due to the original publisher retaining the name Trigun, Nightow had to change the title to Trigun Maximum, which isn´t a sequel but a new name for the rest of the series. 
- The first 3 volumes were published under the title 'Trigun' and the entire series compiled into 14 books as 'Trigun Maximum' (the numbering was also restarted when the title changed).
 - Won the Seiun Award at the 48th Japan Science Fiction Conventionwere for the best comic of the year.

title: U19
genre: Action, Romance, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Yuuji Kimura
synopsis:
Year 2036, Japan is under the adult party power and make children's life miserable. But for "rebelious-edgy-teenager-with-funny-scar" Kudo Eiji, It doesn't matter because he has his childhood friend Akari to cheer his everyday life. For Eiji, Akari is his emontional mainstay. Someone that can make him calm.  
  
But then, one day adult party decide took Akari and transfer her to another school. It emotionaly stress Eiji out. Little did Eiji know, this awaken some power inside him.

title: Risou No Kanojo
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Neromashin
synopsis: Saeki is an ordinary high school boy with a girlfriend, Sara, who is the heiress of the Saionji Group, and whose beauty and intelligence are the envy of everyone. Sara seems like a prim and proper young lady to other people, but the two share a secret! Because of the secret, Saeki can't fully commit, but Sara prepares lunch for him, she hugs him to deepen their relationship, and she acts like she's trying to seduce Saeki to corrupt him!!!? What is the secret of their relationship and what is Sara's true purpose...!!?

title: Head Start at Birth
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Reku Hayase
synopsis:
This is a tale of Lilia with her new game cheat as she becomes known as the marquess' daughter who is a genius at both magic and territorial management. Having been born with memories of her past life intact and after learning that the world that she has been reborn in has magic, Lilia's past life's gamer spirit can't help but go on full blast!

She started leveling up even from when she was only a 0 year old baby who could only babble! Thanks to that, by the time she was 5 years old, not only could she already use high-grade magic, she also had high ranking spirits serving her. She even exhibited great capability in managing the marquess' territory!

No matter if this world were an RPG or a farming game, this cheat is surely unbeatable! And that was what Lilia was thinking until she had suddenly caught the attention of the royal family and was even invited to the royal capital to celebrate her birthday. Who would have thought she would actually raise a political marriage flag with the princes, just like in an otome game?! Just please let me at least not be a villainous noble lady!!!

---

title: The Beastly Count After Dark
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Lemon Soda
synopsis: Violetta, striving to support her sister after losing their parents, encounters Theobald, an enigmatic aristocrat who irrevocably alters her life. Taking on the role as Theobald's maid, Violetta navigates treacherous waters filled with political intrigue and forbidden desires. As Violetta and Theobald's relationship deepens amidst a backdrop of betrayal and manipulation, Violetta grapples with her conflicting loyalties and the moral ambiguity of her role as both confidante and pawn in a dangerous game.

title: Kenkyuu Dai-Meikyuu: Laborinth
genre: Oneshot
author: Kuurodakousei
synopsis:
When Hitsuji Hitsuji finally gets into her dream art school, she discovers "Laborinth," a bizarre club building on campus.
Legend has it that those who enter this cursed labyrinth never return...
Get ready for an extraordinary tale of the mysterious club building, brought to you by the brilliant mind of Kuurodakosei!

Source: MangaPlus

title: The Superhuman Era
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Superhero, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Seobi
synopsis:
When the xenoterran invasion began, the only ones who stood between us and the monstrous creatures were the superhumans. But while some chose to use this power for good, others had more sinister intentions. Kang Lim is a high school student with a secret -- hes the vigilante superhero known as the White Cap, fighting back the mysterious monsters whenever he can. But the world he protects isnt what it seems -- there is more to the emergence of the xenoterran than meets the eye, and strange forces are at play in the shadows...

---

**Links:**
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/chaorendeshidai/list?title_no=1604)
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/theeraofoverman/list?title_no=2877)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/overman/list?title_no=1743)

title: Goblin'S Night
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Mun-Sik
synopsis:
The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.

title: Midareta Futari No Mitasare Gohan
genre: Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, School Life, Cooking
author: Sui Hokuto
synopsis: Not found

title: After School! Iruma-Kun
genre: Demons, Comedy, Anthology, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Rio
synopsis:
An official *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun* anthology series, featuring stories of Iruma Suzuki and friends's adventures as students of Babyls Demon School.  

*Chapter numbering is in order of release.*

---

**TABLE OF CONTENTS** (VOLUME 1)**:**

**CHAPTER 1** - *Iruma-sama Caught On Camera!*  
**Mangaka:**  *Hachi ([The Witch's Bloody Paintings](https://mangadex.org/title/22705/majo-no-kaigashuu))*  
Eiko and Asmodeus meet in private to share with each other some photos that they've secretly taken of Iruma.   
  
**CHAPTER 2** - *I Just Haven't Given It My Best Yet*  
**Mangaka:** *Saori Muronaga ([All Alone in Hyakki Demon Village](https://mangadex.org/title/41110/all-alone-in-hyakki-demon-village))*  
Opera laments their inability to get a good photo of Iruma, so they decide to train with Iruma in order to do so.  
  
**CHAPTER 3** - *Detective Iruma Case File: The Missing Fluff*  
**Mangaka:** *Nango Kouta ([Kojirase Hyakki Dominor](https://mangadex.org/title/33201/kojirase-hyakki-dominor))*  
After playing a mystery game, Iruma and Lied get bitten by the detective bug. But when Elizabetta discovers that her tail scrunchie is missing, can Iruma Holmes and Lied Watson figure out the culprit?
  
**CHAPTER 4** - *As Expected From Kirio-senpai!*  
**Mangaka:** *Shinobi ([Yandere Kanojo](https://mangadex.org/title/489/yandere-kanojo))*  
A day in the life of Kirio, Irumas senpai who secretly has an obsession with seeing people in despair. 
  
**CHAPTER 5** - *I Can't Wake Up! Iruma-kun*  
**Mangaka:** *Rio ([Despair Boy and China Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/19968/zetsubou-danshi-to-chuugoku-musume))*  
Asmodeus and Clara come across Iruma sleeping, and compete against each other to see who will wake him up first. 
  
**CHAPTER 6** - *Claras Seduction Challenge*  
**Mangaka:** *Sako Misaki ([Doki Doki Yokai Love Battle! ~ Great Yokai War!](https://mangadex.org/title/56047/doki-doki-yokai-love-battle-great-yokai-war))* 
When Claras succubus mentor teaches her about enchanted chocolate that will make the consumer fall in love with its creator, Clara naturally tries to see if she can make chocolate that will make Iruma act lovey-dovey towards her. 
  
**CHAPTER 7** - *Azz-kun's Devilum*  
**Mangaka:** *Shimotsuki Seira*  (*Sewaga Yakemasu Hades-sama*)
Iruma and Clara ask Asmodeus what he normally does during Devilum balls. 
  
**CHAPTER 8** - *Once Again... Please, Opera-san!*  
**Mangaka:** *Nagi Mayuko* ([*My Student Won't Go Back Home*](https://mangadex.org/title/0cad2d89-a02d-455f-a027-74f52f81eb7f/my-student-won-t-go-back-home-one-punch-man-doujinshi))
Amelie asks Opera to help her improve her cooking skills.  
  
**CHAPTER 9** - *That's a Mythical Creature, Iruma-kun!*  
**Mangaka:** *Yoshimatsumetsu*  (*Akuyaku Reijo no Ani ni Tensei Shimashita* artist)
Irumas class discusses their efforts as children to find the delicacy known as humans - while the human Iruma tries to change the subject. 
  
**CHAPTER 10** - *Evade Them All! Iruma-kun!*  
**Mangaka:** *Kakemaru Kakeru ([Shonen Racquet](https://mangadex.org/title/52114/shounen-racquet))* 
Clara decides to put Irumas danger avoidance skills to the test with a massive gauntlet of traps. 

**CHAPTER 12** - *The Irumi in Our Hearts*  
**Mangaka:** *Fukui Takumi ([Shuumatsu no Valkyrie](https://mangadex.org/title/b5b21ca1-bba5-4b9a-8cd1-6248f731650b/shuumatsu-no-valkyrie) writer)*
Irumas classmates discuss the mysterious new idol Irumi who suddenly appeared at a concert beforehand.   

  
**CHAPTER 13** - *Amelie's Heart-Pounding Grand Campaign*  
**Mangaka:** *Sakurai Norio ([Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu](https://mangadex.org/title/3df1a9a3-a1be-47a3-9e90-9b3e55b1d0ac/boku-no-kokoro-no-yabai-yatsu))*
After reading shoujo manga, Amelie seeks to replicate romantic moments from them with Iruma. 

  
**CHAPTER 14** - *Iruma-kun and the Cherry Blossom Viewing Party*  
**Mangaka:** *Itagaki Paru ([BEASTARS](https://mangadex.org/title/f5e3baad-3cd4-427c-a2ec-ad7d776b370d/beastars))*
Iruma, Asmodeus, and Clara set up a cherry blossom viewing party.  

  
**CHAPTER 15** - *???*  
**Mangaka:** *Heriyama ([Governess Nazuna-san](https://mangadex.org/title/8aad25a7-0775-40cd-b531-bd11cec05fa0/governess-nazuna-san))*

---
**TABLE OF CONTENTS** (NO VOLUME)**:**

**CHAPTER 11** - *Break them Bones! Bablys Staff*  
**Mangaka:** *Kawasaki Chuu ([Shuumatsu Busou Pancake](https://mangadex.org/title/e8e52924-178f-4749-8ce7-54b54b7f7476/shuumatsu-busou-pancake) writer)*
The Babyls teachers participate in an arm-breaking (arm-wrestling) contest. 

**CHAPTER 16** - *???*  
**Mangaka:** *Abekawa Kineko* ([*Touken Ranbu Anthology ~ Preparations For Departure!*](https://mangadex.org/title/71640f11-6781-4d71-945e-c120a65a2dd4/touken-ranbu-anthology-preparations-for-departure))

**CHAPTER 17** - *???*  
**Mangaka:** *Kobayashi Moriwo ([Melancholy Melancholic Melancholinist](https://mangadex.org/title/7beff426-75cf-485e-a1d5-f88399cf5223/melancholy-melancholic-melancholinist))*

**CHAPTER 18** - *???*

**CHAPTER 20** - *???*  
**Mangaka:** *Utagawa Utako ([Jitsuwa: Fukakaidan Kissa](https://mangadex.org/title/27d3c604-7b2b-46ad-a6bc-734d28829496/jitsuwa-fukakaidan-kissa))*

**CHAPTER 21** - *???*  
**Mangaka:** *Tatsubon ([Tadokoro-san](https://mangadex.org/title/8ffbfa2f-23fa-4490-848e-942581a4d873/tadokoro-san-web-comic))*

**Chapter 22** - *???*

title: Kiss Before Sleep
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Chae-Eun Lee
synopsis: Jiho gains psychic powers from a childhood accident! However, she can't control them! Enduring pain for 18 years with this troublesome ability, Jiho discovers that physical contact with the guy next door, Yechan, can temporarily free her from her psychic woes... To engage in legal physical contact, Jiho must seduce Yechan in this spontaneous and hilarious romantic fantasy hero action with a touch of superpower chaos!

title: Kanojo Wa Otou-San
genre: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Supernatural
author: Daichi Kawada
synopsis:
Two miracles are happening in the high-schooler Naoyuki Ono's life.  
The first is him going out with a beauty of his school, Shiori Sakura.  
The second is that she turns into her thick-headed father if Ono touches her.  
  
The cute girlfriend and her terrifying father are stuck in one body. Even if he wants to touch her, he can't.  
  
And so, the curtain rises on this Father-Daughter Fusion Love Comedy!

title: Amasaya
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Tatsurou Karma
synopsis: The cool, black-haired Amamiya Aoi and the blonde-haired gyaru Shiina Saya.

title: How to Grill Our Love
genre: Romance, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Shiori Hanatsuka
synopsis: After their fateful encounter through a dating app, Kenta and Chihiro decided to get married with zero days of dating in light of Kentas transfer. As a couple who got married without knowing much about each other, they deepen their relationship through their regular weekend BBQs.

title: Birthday Presents
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Sakura Tsukuba
synopsis: Kotoko finds a strange wounded boy, collapsed on the ground. She saves him and asks in return that he spend her birthday with her. She lives alone because her father had passed away How can she still smile? And what is so unnatural in this boy she saved? It appears he can see more than human beings What will happen to him? Will he be saved? And will he agree to spend the day with her or stay a stray and be lonely as he's been from the day he was born?

title: Ashita Mo Kimi Ni Ai Ni Iku
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life
author: Furu Kumayuki
synopsis:
University student Saku longs to have a fairytale romance, but even though he has no trouble getting with girls, they all break up with him for the same reason: he doesn't make their heart flutter at all!

And then there's Misumi, the university's resident heartthrob who's wildly popular with the girls, and who's taken a sudden interest in Saku. He doesn't laugh at Saku's fantasies and listens to them sincerely, and if Saku is nearby, he'll go to him without fail. Misumi seems to always say or do the right things that make his own heart start to flutter a little, so Saku starts to look to him for tips and techniques on how to make his fairytale romance come true.

But before he knows it, he's suddenly falling in love with Misumi instead...?!

title: Love Vibes
genre: Girls' Love, Drama, Tragedy
author: Erica Sakurazawa
synopsis: Shouji has a girlfriend but is seeing Mako on the side. Unable to continue pretending she feels less for him than she does, she breaks it off with him. Shortly before that happens, Mako is hit on by Mika, who tells Mako that she's interested in both men and women. Mika wants to pursue a relationship with Mako, but is Mako's relationship with Shouji really over?

title: Spice & Wolf: Spring Log
genre: Monsters, Animals, Romance, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Ku ga Futatsu
synopsis:
It has been more than ten years since Holo and Lawrence, who became a happily married couple after completing their long journey to send the wise wolf back home, opened the bathhouse Spice and Wolf bathouse in the hot spring resort of Nyohhira. 

This is a story of continued happiness spun in the bathhouse, which is said to bring happiness and laughter.

---

**Note:** This series starts from light novel volume 18. Heavy spoilers ahead!

title: Murciélago Araña
genre: Action, Comedy, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Kana Yoshimura
synopsis: A spinoff of the series Murciélago featuring the character Reiko Kuchiba.

title: The Plain Girl Sitting Next to Me
genre: Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Inuto
synopsis:
Kawase Sonoe ain't much to look at. Plain, serious and uninteresting, sure, but for some reason, her next-seat neighbor Mori Ichika can't stop staring at her.

Mori follows her and discovers that Kawase has an awful lot to show her, and that she'll receive from Kawase an education that she can't admit she needed.

title: Gyaru to Ojousama
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic
author: Hajime Asano
synopsis: Not found

title: Shuumatsu No Hanayome-Sama ~Sweet HomeMelty Life~
genre: Psychological, Romance, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Fantasy, Shota, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Bakanoko
synopsis:
Michiru, born under his extremely religious mother, believes that one day an angel would come down and save him from his suffering and pain. 

After getting severely bruised and beaten up from the kids at his school, his nextdoor neighbor, Hikari, comes to his aide and carries him to her home. While Michiru is asleep, she rampages the world, destroying everything. 

When he awakes, it is revealed to him that Hikari is an angel. Michiru asks Hikari to marry him, which she gladly accepts. 

Will their sudden post-apocalypse and newlywed life give Michiru what he always wanted? Or is there more to it under the surface?

title: The Mercenary Bomber Explode All Cheaters.
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Tsushima Urashima
synopsis:
Jack Aaron is the strongest mercenary known by the nickname The Bomber. After completing a heavy mission, what awaited him was a summons to another world!

In this summoning, everyone is granted a special ability. However, the ability Jack was given was quite limited: [Bomb Making]. The people who summoned him from the other world dismissed Jacks ability as useless, and the other summoned individuals began to mock him as a useless foreigner.

To return to his original world, he forms a partnership with Alice, an alchemist derisively called "The Witch." During this process, Jack learns that the other summoned individuals, who he thought he had killed in an explosion, are still alive.

In order to return to his original world, and to hunt down the surviving summoned individuals, Jack and Alices worst journey is about to begin...!

title: Akuyaku Ouji No Eiyuutan
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hirosaki
synopsis: Alfred, the third prince of the royal family who was born with black hair and black eyes, was hated. One day, he comes across his older brother, the first prince, Leolu, announcing to his fiancée, Charlotte, that she has broken off their engagement. In order to save Charlotte, who was falsely accused, Alfred took her place and thought the situation was settled...!?

title: Kamikakushi No Eden
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Koume Yoshida
synopsis:
The protagonist, Hinata Kuroto, is searching for his sister, who is supposed to have "once existed" but is now forgotten by everyone around him. He receives a letter from the beautiful transfer student, Shirai Shimotsuki, stating, "If you want to know about the whereabouts of your sister, come to the library after school." When Kuroto goes to the library, he finds Shirai inexplicably half-naked and waiting for him. This is a sex and meta-fantasy manga created by Gensei Sahara, the artist behind 'Sex & Dungeon!!

(Source: niconico Manga, translated)
___
[Alt Official Raw (niconico Manga)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/65209)

title: Takara Shimai
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Haru Hisakawa
synopsis: Not found

title: Updater
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: 89line
synopsis:
The blacksmith NPC Aiden.

One day, his village gets deleted by the hands of the system moderator and as he and his little sister Elise perished, he swore to himself.

Ill destroy this system with my very hands.

It was then!

You have unlocked moderator perms, Moderator Lv. 1

Aiden wakes up with a new power,

Marking the beginning of his journey as a moderator!

What will become of Aiden?!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)

title: Moments of Loneliness
genre: Oneshot, Romance
author: Moto Hagio
synopsis: An eight-page full-color one-shot by Moto Hagio about loving somebody.

title: My Girlfriend Is a Zombie
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Zombies, Post-Apocalyptic, Harem, Horror, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yuewen Manhua
synopsis: Faced with doomsday, the special power inside Ling Mo was woken up. He found out that he could control zombies. Therefore he could walk through the zombie crowd safe and sound using his power, and eventually, he met his beloved girlfriend - Ye Lian, but only to find out that she had already been transformed into a zombie. To help Ye retrieve her memories, Ling Mo started his survival in doomsday.

title: Toki-Sensei Wa Kigaetai
genre: School Life, Slice of Life
author: Toshinori Takayama
synopsis:
Meet Shisoya Toki, a quiet female teacher with a thing for clothes. Often seen as cold and unfriendly, her students call her the unfortunate beautiful teacher. 

But one day, while organizing supplies in the old school building, she finds a brand new pair of bloomers. Suddenly, her kinky curiosity about clothes goes wild!! 

Sometimes SEXY! Sometimes CUTE! Get ready for a wild ride full of seductive cosplay!!

title: Little Sweet Delusion
genre: Oneshot, Gore, Horror, Fantasy
author: Shunsuke Hasegawa
synopsis: A four-page fairytale cross between Red Riding Hood and Snow White, with a surprisingly dark twist.

title: Komen Fuufu
genre: Romance, Supernatural
author: Neko Iwatobi
synopsis:
In a world where the supernatural blends in with regular life, there is an old Japanese house. Living there is a newlywed couple, a human man and a kitsune woman. What can disturb their happy life together except for a man-eating sparrow?

The daily life between human and youkai is dangerous by day, but sweet by night!?

title: Ajin: Demi-Human
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Military, Drama, Horror, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Gamon Sakurai
synopsis: The story follows a high school student named Kei Nagai, who is caught in a traffic accident, dies, but immediately revives and learns he is not human, but an Ajin, a mysterious creature that cannot die. Scared, he runs away from humans but is helped by his friend Kai, who joins him in his flee from civilization. He then becomes involved in a conflict between human and Ajin and must choose a side.

title: Hibi Chouchou X Hirunaka No Ryuusei
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mika Yamamori
synopsis:
Hibi Chouchou + Hirunaka no Ryuusei crossover in the May 5th issue of Margaret in 2014.  
  
Hirunaka no Chouchou - a Shocking Day for New Discoveries  
A shopping mall date with Suiren and Kawasumi. But Suiren gets lost?! She and a small girl find themselves at the Lost Child centre where suddenly Suzume and Mamura come along!  
Released as chapter 75.4 in volume 12 of Hibi Chouchou.  
  
Hibi Ryuusei - Suzumes Parallel School Diary  
The Suzume who steals everybodys attention at the high school entrance ceremony. Though she's no great beauty, she does things at her own pace and is a hot topic amongst everyone. In the middle of this, the only person who doesnt notice her, Kawasumi  will he become interested?!

title: My Sister Is the Main Character
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Solfi
synopsis: Reincarnated into a novel, she tries to protect her sister from being imprisoned by taking her place. However, the obsessive duke fixates on her instead, flirting and even threatening to confine her. Strangely, she finds herself drawn to him despite her protests.

title: Hibi Chouchou
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Suu Morishita
synopsis:
Shibazeki Suiren is a stunningly beautiful girl. Her classmates are astonished by her beauty, but after noticing her quiet manners and lack of contact except with her friends, she receives the nickname "Takane no Hana", a beautiful flower but impossible to reach. However, after a fellow freshman called Kawasumi Kouha saves her from a persistent suitor, she finds herself mesmerized by him as he's the only boy who won't look at her no matter what.  
  
Chapter 75.4 is part of the Hibi Chouchou x Hirunaka no Ryuusei crossovers and is included in that entry.

title: You Got Me, Sempai!
genre: Romance, School Life
author: Azusa Mase
synopsis: Two months after entering high school, Serina realizes that the lyrics of a love song have been written in her desk, and the writing seems to be the one of a boy. After writing down an answer, she gets approached by a senior, Mizukawa.

title: With Vengeance, Sincerely, Your Broken Saintess
genre: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic
author: Aminohada
synopsis: Lua, a candidate saint with healing powers. However, her abilities were flawed, and she would be pained and painful to herself in order to transfer the symptoms to herself and heal them. The saintly candidates treated her as a flaw, but only her best friend Ariane was always there. One day, Garrot, the Knight Commander whom Lua cares about, is dying. After completely healing his wounds, Lua wanders between life and death at the limit of her abilities. However, when he awoke, all the credit belonged to Ariane, and Garrot and Arian's engagement had been decided. Seeing Arian's true nature, he is coldly beaten by Garrot. In despair, Lua vowed not to heal anyone anymore. Then the Second Prince Swen asks, "Why don't you take revenge on those who have demeaned you?" She uses another ability she has been hiding  the atrocious ability to inflict healing symptoms on others  and joins forces with Swen to start a new life as an "evil woman" instead of a "saint."

title: Golden Kamuy
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Action, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Samurai, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Tragedy
author: Satoru Noda
synopsis:
In the early twentieth century, Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi Immortal Sugimoto scratches out a meager existence during the postwar gold rush in the wilderness of Hokkaido. When he stumbles across a map to a fortune in hidden Ainu gold, he sets off on a treacherous quest to find it. But Sugimoto is not the only interested party, and everyone who knows about the gold will kill to possess it! Faced with the harsh conditions of the northern wilderness, ruthless criminals and rogue Japanese soldiers, Sugimoto will need all his skills and luckand the help of an Ainu girl named Asirpa - to survive.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.

title: The Devil Raises a Lady
genre: Time Travel, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: CHT
synopsis:
The downfall of a noble family. And a girl who risks her life seeking revenge.

Lady Ayana.

There was a knight who had been by her side for thirteen years. The person who came to her mind before her own family was going to be annihilated. He risked his life for her, suffered wounds, hunger, and gave her everything. Now, he is looking at her while shes waiting for her execution with a joyful smile.

Please show me another enjoyable story this time, my lady.

The devil smiled and extended his hand, and the girl took it.

I hope you get the ending you desire in the next story, my lady.

(Source: Kakao, translated)

title: Corrupting the Heroine'S First Love
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Mogwa
synopsis:
I am a knight of Latem. Were not destined to stand under the same sky.

She had become Karina Apocalita, the personification of evil and a member of the heterogeneous race that ruled the world with malevolence. The plot began to twist and turn when Karina unknowingly saved the life of Reneiger, a justful knight and the heroines first love.

Reneiger became doubtful of his faith, eventually losing his glow and radiant platinum blond. Soon the sacred knight fell from grace and aligned himself to Karinas fate.

Theres no turning back now. Dear God, please forgive me.

He knew he would never be able to escape from her hands.

---
"I am a knight of Latem, and that means I cannot coexist under the same sky as you."

After entering the book *A Trapped Bird Cannot Escape*, I realized that I had taken over the body of Karina Apocalypta, a member of a species that reigns as the evil of the world. However, the novel's plot begins to twist after I saved the life of Reneiger, the first love of the female protagonist, who happens to be a holy knight. Reneiger begins to doubt his faith, ultimately losing his brilliant platinum hair. Thus, the once sacred holy knight turns corrupt and eventually sympathizes with Karina's fate...

"Now we have each other's desires," Karina said while caressing his cheek. It was a feeling of being pulled in by each fascinating tendril of thorny vines.

Reneiger couldn't bear it, "It can't be undone."

---
In a land overshadowed by darkness, Karina Apocalita rises as a formidable figure, her being a tapestry of power from a diverse race. Her destiny intertwines with Reneiger, a knight from the virtuous Latem order, known for justice and as the former love of a legendary heroine. Their paths take an unforeseen turn when Karina, unaware of her impact, saves Reneiger's life. This act, challenging his convictions, triggers a crisis within him, tarnishing his once radiant aura and precipitating a fall from grace.

Faced with his altered fate, Reneiger prays for forgiveness, realizing his escape from Karina's shadow is but a dream. This pivotal moment raises a haunting question: will Reneiger rediscover the light, or be consumed by the darkness emanating from Karina?

title: Uruwashi No Yoi No Tsuki
genre: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mika Yamamori
synopsis:
Yoi is a girl who is called "prince" by those around her and treated like a hero in a girls' manga.
Then she meets Ichimura, who is also called "prince." He calls her "beautiful" and saves her from getting tangled up with a drunk at a convenience store, and the two quickly get close!
Is this encounter fate? Or is it bad luck?!
The story of a man and a woman, both called "princes," begins now!

title: Waves, Listen to Me!
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Music
author: Hiroaki Samura
synopsis:
On a night out drinking to get over being duped and ditched by her last boyfriend,  Minare Koda ends up 
providing a massive drunken rant for Matou, the director of a radio station. 
The next day, she is shocked to hear her own voice being broadcast on the radio! She rushes to the studio,
leaving her job at a curry soup and bread restaurant in jeopardy. However, her drunken rant and the next day's 
impromptu damage-control live broadcast end up earning her an invitation to try working at the radio station!

title: The Summer You Were There
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Medical, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Yuama
synopsis:
Shizuku Hoshikawa, a high school girl who lives avoiding contact with people, writes a novel which is accidentally read by her classmate Kaori Asaka.  
She loves it but finds out Hoshikawa wasn't planning to write anymore due to lack of ideas, to which she ends up saying:  
"Let's start going out, you and me You can write a story about our own love."

title: The Pension Life Vampire
genre: Comedy, Vampires, Slice of Life
author: Shouichi Taguchi
synopsis: Vampires and werewolves... One day, Eri, a "revision officer" who hunts down things that are said to resent mankind, wanders into a pension run by a mysterious girl. The encounter between a girl whose existence was denied and a legendary vampire. She won't change the world, but she can become kind. A heartwarming house administration comedy begins now!

title: Beloved by the Male Lead'S Nephew
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Soy Media
synopsis:
One day, my life suddenly come to an end, but I reincarnated as a the villainess of a romantic novel who is obsessed with and stalks the male lead, ultimately getting sentenced to death for trying to kill the female lead. I decided to try to avoid that by leaving the capital and living peacefully in the countryside, however, my dad requested that I come back to the capital because there was a huge mess going: it was reported that the royal heir who was believed to have died 7 years ago is actually alive! The little prince also just so happens to be the nephew of the male lead, who is now looking for him!! I didnt want to get involved with that but unfortunately on my way to the capital, I rescued a little beggar child who turned out to be the lost royal heir and who is now extremely attached to me. In the original story, the female lead was supposed to find him so she could have the opportunity to meet the male lead, but what will happen to my peaceful life now that the original flow of the story seems to be changing?!!

---
After being reborn as a stalker villainess destined to die for trying to kill Archduke Calix Elluiden's lover, Charlize Lienta fled from the capital to stay away from the archduke at all costs. But her plan goes awry when she returns a year later and rescues a poor boy on the streets... because he turns out to be Sasha, Calix's long-lost nephew! Given her infamous reputation as Calix's stalker, will Charlize succeed in returning Sasha without raising the archduke's suspicions?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/58448925)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%98-%EC%A1%B0%EC%B9%B4%EA%B0%80-%EB%82%98%EB%A5%BC-%EB%84%88%EB%AC%B4-%EC%A2%8B%EC%95%84%ED%95%9C%EB%8B%A4/3548), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/62000958)

title: Ushimitsu Gao
genre: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural
author: Paru Itagaki
synopsis:
"If you encounter a ghost, think of something naughty."
Megumi Sano (33 years old) is a housewife trying to conceive. She also has a fairly strong spiritual sensitivity.
One night, during sex with her husband, a ghost suddenly appears in their bedroom.
However, the humiliation of being seen having boring sex outweighs the fear...
From that day on, the ghost frequently appears in their bedroom, but what is his purpose...?
A sexual horror story drawn by Paru Itagaki, the creator of "BEASTARS" and "SANDA".

title: Osamu
genre: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Military, Aliens
author: Chiki Sengi
synopsis:
When Tokyo is attacked by evil monsters, who better to save the day than the Super-Ultra-Mega-Level-Anti-Monster-Specialized-human-Final-Boss-Weapon OSAMU!!! 

Golden Future Cup Oneshot #3 2024

title: Enkan No Emotions
genre: Action, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Sora Karin
synopsis: Arakura Arato is a high school student who is always alert to danger and lives a low-key life. One day, his life changes drastically when he is suddenly attacked by a superpower user named Koki Rara. The power of EMOan ability formed from strong emotions.

title: Devil May Cry 5  Visions of V 
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Tomio Ogata
synopsis: The spin-off of the latest title, *Devil May Cry 5,* has begun with a bang! The main character is "V," a mysterious man who uses three demons. In addition to the secret of his birth, his encounter with the demons, and the prequel to the main story leading up to the contract, the tale is told from the perspective of V that is exclusive to the spin-off!

title: Batsu Ichi Jk
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Yurie Ono
synopsis:
Amane Anzu, a high school student, is actively looking for a boyfriend. However, most candidates tend to quickly lose interest when they find out she's actually a real divorcee. And if that's still not enough to drive guys away, the fact she has a daughter usually does the trick.

Note: each "volume" is much shorter (50-60 pages) than a usual tankoubon.

title: I Became the Tutor of the Royal Twins
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Hebinz
synopsis:
An elementary school teacher in her past life, and a private tutor in the present.

Sarah Popo uses all her past life experiences in her second life.

She worked as a highly sought out tutor for aristocratic children.

Her goal is to be the owner of her own school!

Then, one day, the Emperor of the Empire sought her out.

I want Miss Popo to be my siblings tutor.

Water bombs, flour bombs, bug attacks.

What kind of offer did he make? To make her the tutor of a pair of notorious twins with all kinds of vicious pranks!

A very sweet one, of course.

The devils temptation shook Sarahs life.

title: "Yukue Fumei."
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Philosophical, Drama, Mystery
author: kanipan
synopsis: Kanade is an honest working janitor and Ryo is a gigolo living a self-indulgent lifestyle. The two are childhood friends and share a secret they cant tell anyone. They have a dependent relationship where theyll dirty their hands for the other, but what happens when they both end up as murderers?

title: Yumenashi-Sensei No Shinroshidou
genre: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kasahara Masaki
synopsis: A former career consultant, Takanashi now works for a school as a Guidance Counselor. During career guidance meetings, he gives headstrong students data and tells them the realities of the world around them, hoping that they rethink their dreams. Because of that, students call him "Yumenashi-sensei" ("Dreamless-sensei"/"Dream Crushersensei").

title: Saekkaman Sunjongniljji
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Jeong-Hyeon Kim
synopsis:
"I'm going to live a normal life!"

Cho-eun, the heir to the underworld organization, Red Arrow Group, has finally entered university. She just wants to make lots of friends, but finds herself surrounded by four suspicious men.

"Are you an enemy? Or a friend? Or... do you like me?"

With a whirlwind of emotionsjoy, anger, sorrow, and pleasureengulfing her twenties as a freshman, will Cho-eun's dream of a normal campus life come true?

---

A new life begins for Kitahara Iori as he begins his college career near the ocean in Izu city, full of excitement for his new life. 
He will be moving into his uncle's diving store "Grand Blue." There he finds the ocean, beautiful women, and men that love diving and alcohol.

There's plenty of action as these trainers explore forests, jungles, cities and caves in search of Pokémon and adventure sometimes working together, sometimes on their own! title: Gomi Shuushuuin: Saionji No Ryuugi
genre: Thriller, Action, Crime, Mafia, Gore, Drama
author: Kei Satou
synopsis:
The "garbage" that pollutes the town must be disposed of.

Saionji works as a general waste collector - commonly known as a "garbage collector" in Yao'ouji, the town with the least amount of garbage in Japan. But he has a secret side to him. In addition to his work as a collector, Saionji also works hard to purify the town. However, in Yao'ouji, the shadow of an even greater evil is about to begin to move...

A hard-boiled, violent action drama by an up-and-coming artist!!

title: The Predator'S Fiancée
genre: Historical, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Julie
synopsis:
My quivering body and the sturdy arms embracing it. My mind is growing faint. Without realizing, I was burning with desire, then I let out a sweet sigh. 'Right now... This situation... How did this happen...?' In order to avoid the future where she dies a horrible death, Elisha decides to become the possession of a maniac. She offered up her body as guarantee and became a contracted fiancée of his. Where will this contract lead to...?!

---
Orphaned and living in a monastery, Elisha de Lauer was content and happy. That was until the De Cartiers, known for having magical abilities, came to find her. This snake-filled family forces Elisha into a slave contract with their eyes on inheriting her many assets. After years of servitude to the De Cartiers, Elisha meets a gruesome end at the hands of her captors. That wouldve been the end of her tale, but as she closed her eyes to die, she awoke again in her own past as if nothing had ever happened. With this second chance, she vows revenge on the De Cartiers and finds the perfect accomplice in rumored maniac, Lucerne des Kayas. Lucerne, an outcast member of the De Cartier family, has also sworn revenge on them. But, his unwavering distrust of everyone stirs him to form a contract with Elisha only under one condition. She must agree to marry him. Flung into a fake marriage, these two align to uncover the secrets of the De Cartiers and bring each member down. Theres just one secret they each cant seem to figure out. Why does it seem like they have met before?

---

title: Marronnier Oukoku No Shichinin No Kishi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Mystery
author: Nao Iwamoto
synopsis: The Marronnier Kingdom lies landlocked by seven other nations. General Baribara sends her seven children, from the sleepless Nemukunai to the eternally hungry Harapeko, out to these kingdoms in the interests of diplomacy.  Yet Baribara herself is not from Marronnier, and questions swirl internally and externally about her power and those of her children; and it seems there may be more going on in the other kingdoms linked to her family than is first apparent.  Winner of "Kono Manga ga Sugoi!" in 2018 in the female category (the second year in the row for manga-ka Nao Iwamoto), this josei fantasy series is full of humour, romance, and mystery.

title: Thiendavis - for the Perfect Salvation
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Sam-Gong
synopsis: Ivy Ariate is a beautiful future saint who one day receives a curse. The curse made him have to answer the truth to any question. Because of the curse, a promising future becomes bleak, and the position of a saint becomes increasingly distant. Even so, Ivy wants to be pure at all costs. To do this, he must find out the secrets of the worlds of Tienda and Bis, where dragons, demons and other fantastic creatures live.

title: Today'S an ?!
genre: Oneshot, Award Winning, Animals, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Sorajirou
synopsis:
Little Nyano doesn't know what she got wrong about a test question she should've gotten right! Can she figure out the problem and fix it?  ??

synopsis: The story revolves around four teenagers; Akina, Hime, Ao, and Kotoha; each of them having their own unique abilities. They run an office called Hiizumi Life Counseling Office, where their job is to help and protect the townspeople of Sakurashin, a town where humans and youkai co-exist with one another. The town is protected by a barrier created by the spiritual sakura known as The Seven Pillars. The Seven Pillars exist in both the human world and the youkai world and is the only thing that keeps both worlds connected to each other. However, recent bizarre incidents have occurred in their town and someone has threatened the safety of their town. It is up to the four of them to protect the town they love.

When he happens across a beautiful fairy who's being held captive and made a public spectacle, he knows he has to take her with him. He names the creature Sti and orders her to call him his master, but her heart remains closed to him. But as time goes on, she sees a different side of him?a side that's both caring and awkward. The distance between the eccentric wizard and strong-willed fairy grows shorter day by day!

genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yeon-Jin Jeong
synopsis:
Frey Raon Starlight was the hero who killed his family and comrades and destroyed the world. His goal was to return to the past, unlock a "hidden route" to truly save the world, and achieve peace.

As planned, he successfully returns to the past and gains access to the hidden route. However, his relief is short-lived as he is confronted with an unexpected truth: the five heroines he killed in his previous life have retained their memories and are now trying to kill him...!

Can Frey, under such extreme circumstances, save the world this time?

2: Convenience Store Honey  
A boy worries about his quiet boyfriend.  
  
3: Adult Uniform  
A girl wonders why her childhood friend does not speak to her anymore.  
  
4: Refrigerator Chocolate  
Satoru is going to have heart surgery with a 50/50 chance of survival. One day, he comes across a girl in a refrigerator

title: Onna Tomodachi Wa Tanomeba Igaito Yarasete Kureru
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Yuu Kagami
synopsis: Hisaya Minato, a normal high school student, has a female friend who is a bit peculiar. She is Aoi Hatsuki, the most beautiful girl in the high school. For some reason, they get along very well, and since they happen to live on the same floor, they gradually become good friends, coming and going from each other's houses. One day, Minato suddenly asks her to show him her panties. At first, Hatsuki is reluctant, but then she starts to roll up her skirt?

title: Here Stands Gokumon Nadeshiko
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Hajime Isayama
synopsis:
The Gokumon House, a bloodline originating from hell. Within the mystery-filled ancient city of Kyoto stands their citadel; they are feared not only by the seedy underworld of sorcery, but by monsters too.

Gokumon Nadeshiko, a descendant of this cursed family, is fated to devour monsters. A most beautiful girl, born from the flames of cremation; her very being brings about bad omens.

However... "Nadeshiko. I see. You are as lovely as your name." Ichijiku Amana, a most peculiar, mysterious, yet gorgeous woman. Their encounter changed Nadeshiko as Amana faced her with a fearless smile.

An creature lurks in the painted ceiling. Boxes packed with human sacrifice. A twisted curse upon a school. A beast who deceives humans. Haunted by a formless ghost. As the two are faced with one mystery after another, they are ultimately confronted by what they tried to leave behind.

"If it weren't for you, I would've remained an Oni."

An Oni with the heart of a human, and a human burdened with a corrupt soul. The bond that they form will cut the seal on this blood-soaked tale.

title: Fanservice Paradox
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Bai Yu
synopsis: The two members with the worst relationship in the group are now trending all because of a fan-taken video that suddenly dominated the social media! Young and cute husky X Cool and cold Gege who has great self-restraint?! The shippers are going feral over this pairing! They had clearly never gotten along since their debut, yet they were now forced to embark on an endless path of selling their fake ship together~

title: My Alternate Ending
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Tong-Sik Bang
synopsis:
[Let's get rid of this psychopath before that]

Yes, I possessed someone.

But who I was in my previous life.
I can't remember at all.

All I remember is,
just this guy's face that filled my eyes.

The day I woke up for the first time as a wizard's experiment,
we were together.

Strangely enough, about my previous life,
this guy seems to know better about it than I do.

In a dead-end novel,
you are the only one you can trust and rely on...

In order to live,
I have to run away from this guy.

In the future, he will kill the female lead's entire family.
It's because he's a psychopath whose view on the world is final darkness.

After a while...

Finally, out of his grasp,
I thought I could live a peaceful life?

"You cruelly abandoned me."

This guy, he finally found me.

"Did you enjoy playing with me?"

Now, he can't even be compared to his past self.
He went completely mad.

title: Winter Flower
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, Fantasy
author: Sumomo Yumeka
synopsis: The flower in Itadori will bloom in the summer, taking his life as it took his sister's but giving others longer lives, but how can he leave his childhood friend Rakka behind?

title: Human Clock
genre: Oneshot, Thriller, Monsters, Psychological, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Seiichirou Tokunan
synopsis:
MangaZombie:  
  
"When I talk about warped manga from a warped mind, I always think of this incoherent story.   
  
The Human Clock is a lot simpler to summarize than to understand. The hero is Yubi Chizuo again; hes a student like before, but this time round hes also a dropout. He stays in his house, which is a family shop selling watches and clocks. He gazes and gazes at them, and little by little, turns into one himself. That is the entire story. It reminds me of Franz Kafkas Metamorphosis."  
  
Also contains the story, The Cat's Mourning Suit (Chapter 6).

title: I Am the World'S Strongest, Because I Can Read Manga
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Wataame
synopsis:
The other world I reincarnated to, was a world that will enable you to use magic after reading a Grimoire.
And the Grimoires contents are??You wouldnt believe it, its?Manga?.
This worlds people would take around one year to read one Grimoire(Manga) But for me, it is a?Manga?, thats why it would not take an hour.
Interpreting and understanding all kinds of Grimoires and the 6 year old me who became the Worlds Strongest Master Mage,
Welcomed brides that were also 6 years old, and started living a carefree life!!

title: Kokoro Kikai
genre: Boys' Love, School Life
author: Sumomo Yumeka
synopsis: "Are we all really alive?" Shinobu, a high school student, questions as he spends each day just passing the time away.

title: Dorei Kara No Kitai to Hyouka No Sei De Sakushu Dekinai No Daga
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Sachi Nishioka
synopsis:
A reincarnated boy, Allen, gets granted by a goddess the cheat skill, [Restoration]. Even though he can heal all and any injuries and illnesses, there aren't a lot of places where he can use that skill to the fullest, so he planned to "regenerate" the slaves he bought and lead a slow-paced life. But the healed slaves' cheats turned out so out of the ordinary that the crops they tend to and their living conditions turned for the better in a blink of an eye.

The protagonist, Allen, who slowly but surely is robbed of opportunities to shine, tried to counter that with his modern knowledge, and yet, those talented slaves absorbed it all and brought success to any and all businesses. 

The protagonist is becoming irrelevant with each passing day?!

title: Tensei Ni Hakobijin No Isekai Kouryakuhou
genre: Reincarnation, Loli, Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Adaptation
author: Hayashi
synopsis: A man who yearns for freedom is reincarnated and he chooses the undesirable job "Carrier"--The fastest way to conquer both women and other world with wisdom and courage!

title: The Invincible Summoner Who Crawled up From Level 1
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Rio Nanamomo
synopsis:
After losing his father in a tragic accident, Shinobu Iijima and his younger sister Megumi are taken in by their fathers old friend, Ayumu.

Shinobu works hard in the hopes of starting a new life for himself. Megumi, and a mobile game called La Vita Online, are the only things keeping him afloat.

One day, Ayumu reveals his true intentions of tearing Shinobu down and getting his hands on Megumi. But just after Shinobu learns that Ayumu deleted all of his game data in La Vita, their high-rise apartment catches on fire and Shinobu falls to his death, Megumi in tow. He wakes up in a strange new world... and realizes hes been reincarnated into the world of La Vita Online.

An announcement from the devs tells him that Ayumu is already there, and a countdown to Megumis arrival is ticking. Shinobu vows to protect Megumi after she arrives at any cost, even if it means he has to crawl his way up from level 1 to fend off all the other reincarnated players.

title: Travel to the Cats' Territory
genre: Oneshot, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Xiao Jing Cen
synopsis: Yue Cheng is collecting cats for her homework report, and what she did is captured by the cats' "watcher". And after following a cat that she wants to catch, Yue Cheng and her friend found themselves in the cat spirit's territory. What will happen?

title: Listener Ni Damasarete Dungeon No Sai Kasou Kara Dasshutsu Rta Suru Koto Ni Natta
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Azusa Tsuzuki
synopsis:
A dungeon explorer, or dungeon tuber, is a person who explores dungeons while streaming. On his first day of broadcasting, a rookie dungeon tuber, Sekai Kotoba, is accidentally transported to the lowest level of the dungeon, which he has not yet explored. The bottom level is a sea of lava, and he is suddenly doomed!

He is level 2, his skills are non-combat related, and he has no knowledge of dungeons. The only people he can rely on are the listeners on the feed! Aim for the upper levels by relying on the comments!

title: Phalene
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Kyung Jin
synopsis: One day a young woman sees the man of her dreams.

title: The Violinist of Hamelin
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Music, Tragedy
author: Michiaki Watanabe
synopsis:
Pandora's Box led a cursed existence. Through the curiosity of a woman, evil was unleashed and very nearly covered the world in darkness. Miraculously, humanity managed to seal Maou Kestra back into the box, but only with immense sacrifices. Even without their lord, the demons are still a formidable force that has only grown stronger with time, locked in the abandoned capital of the North, Hameln. Fifteen years have passed since that fateful battle  
  
Enter Hamel, a travelling minstrel who is so self-centered that he'd sooner cook his guardian crow (and family friend), Oboe, than go hungry for even a minute. Welcome to the world of music and hilarious insanity that is the Violinist of Hameln. Watch as Hamel takes cheap shots at his opponents and bashes pigeons with his giant violin and turns them into dinner.  
  
How WILL the world be saved from Maou Kestra (it's a pun for orchestra, if you haven't noticed) with a hero such as this?

title: Herami Shimai Wa Docchi Mo Yanderu
genre: Comedy, Incest, Girls' Love, Drama
author: Aru Kaneko
synopsis: Sera, (Real Name: Herami Sera) is an approval-seeking girl (26 years old) who works at a maid cafe. Her younger sister, Kira, is an idol (19 years old) who is rapidly gaining popularity with her cool, and mature character. However, the real Kira only ever thinks of her sister and tries to cheer her up in every possible way to help her sister with her mental health and anxiety.

title: Shoujo Fujuubun
genre: Psychological, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Mitsuru Hattori
synopsis:
An aspiring author. A mysterious little girl.  
Two completely unrelated people.  
What will happen when they meet?

title: Fitness Juushoku
genre: Oneshot
author: Nezukuma
synopsis:
My shoulder feels heavy, and my body feels like something is weighing me down? The chief priest at the temple preached about the importance of training and eating habits?! You will see the true form of muscle training!

Source: MangaPlus

title: The High School Bento Blues
genre: Oneshot, School Life, Cooking
author: Kouichirou Iwaya
synopsis: Tachibana seems like your typical high schooler, except for one thing - he's got a serious bento situation. One day, he happens to meet Takahashi, another student with his own bento troubles...

title: Two Cups of Coffee
genre: Oneshot, Romance
author: Young-Eu Nam
synopsis: "Beside a view like this, who would you want to share the aroma of coffee with?"

title: Shishunki Renaissance David-Kun
genre: Historical, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yuushin Kuroki
synopsis:
The statue of David is one of Michelangelo's greatest masterpieces and one of the most recognizable works of art of all time, right up there with the Mona Lisa. It's a celebration of the male form and also served as a warning to Rome to not infringe upon the freedoms of the city-state of Florence. But did you also know he's a panty-obsessed pervert? And a braggart? Dio bono!  
  
[Authors Twitter](https://twitter.com/megapann?s=20)

title: Secretary to the Managing President, General Time Industries, Seiji Tanaka
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy
author: Keiji Amatsuka
synopsis:
The new Tanaka Seiji manga follows the titular character, who is a private secretary. With Tanaka's support, a company can become invincible and can achieve any future it desires.  


---

title: To Love Ru Darkness
genre: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Aliens, Supernatural
author: Saki Hasemi
synopsis:
Rito Yuuki continues to be caught in over-the-top perverted scenarios, now uncensored. The alien Deviluke sisters - Lala, Momo, and Nana - still use their unique abilities in an attempt to grab Rito's love confession. Momo, in particular, has a vision: a harem of women all in love with Rito, with Momo herself in the center. After all, if everyone has an equal share of Rito, everyone wins - at least, she thinks.  
  
As she enacts this plan, the former alien mercenary Yami, aka Golden Darkness, struggles between her former life as a killer and her current life on Earth. Things get complicated when Mea, a girl with powers similar to Yami's, becomes interested in Rito. Just who is this new enemy?

title: Unparalleled Path - Reincarnated as the Ai for a Space Battleship
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Mecha, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Isekai, Drama, Adaptation
author: Juu Ishiguchi
synopsis: Asagaya Shin, an ordinary high school student who was supposed to be in Mitaka, Tokyo just a few days ago, somehow found himself as an AI of a space battleship. The battleship is surrounded by a large enemy fleet, and with only a few consort ships left, it is in a desperate situation. Moreover, the captain of the battleship is a young girl, a decorated member of the royal family, who was ceremoniously on board. Shin, now an AI, takes advantage of his "human" characteristics and attempts to fight a withdrawal battle using novel tactics to survive...

title: Suki Ni Naru Made Matte
genre: Romance, School Life, Supernatural
author: Ako Shimaki
synopsis:
Compilation of short stories.  
  
- Suki ni Naru Made Matte  
Whenever it was break time, Hikami-kun sat at my desk and talked with his friends. I was concerned about it, but since he is a popular guy I couldnt say anything about it. On that fateful day, I dropped Hikami-kuns cell in the fish tank, and now I have to be his slave?!  
  
- Uso to Koi no Hajimari  
Akane does a favor for her friend, Tomoko, by agreeing to show her childhood friend, Ken-kun, around Tokyo while pretending to be Tomoko! Will she be found out?   
(Also published in "Koibana" anthology, Ch.4)  
  
- 1/3 no Kareshi  
Kogure Yuuya takes an embarrassing picture of Fukada Rei, but he says he will only delete it if they meet again at the same place later. What will Rei do?  
  
- Deatta Toki ni Boku wa Mou Inai  
High school student Yuu finds herself pursued by a hot guy rather spiritedly.

title: The One Within the Villainess
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Nazuna Shiraume
synopsis:
In order to clear the name of Emi, a girl who had reincarnated as Remilia, the villainess of an otome game, the real Remilia who had been watching all along inside awakens.

Now it's time for the true villainess's revenge to begin!

title: Candy Apple
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Slice of Life
author: Ruka Konoshima
synopsis: Not found

title: Night Light Hounds
genre: Monsters, Crime, Gore, Drama, Horror, Vampires
author: Haruhisa Nakata
synopsis: Jimmy is a gang member in one of the world's few underground cities, Silent Bay City. One day, he meets a girl and gets embroiled in a fight between the creatures of the night. Brought to you by the author of "Levius", Haruhisa Nakata, Night Light Hounds is a thrilling dark fantasy!

title: Caught by the Villain
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Crossdressing, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: CHARA
synopsis:
Although she had been a promising practitioner of kendo in the past, due to an accident she was forced to lead a plain life. After Seo Yuri gets into a car accident during a trip back home, she reincarnates into the novel, *The Song of the Moon*, and becomes the elder twin sister of a side character who meets a destructive ending Selena. Selena hopes to prevent the destruction of her family, however, she is forced to take the place of her runaway brother, Celestine, in the knights squadron! Will she be able to avoid the villainous Crown Prince, Ignis, and survive?!

---
A lifetime as a fencing prodigy prepared Eunha for her new role as Selena Evan, novel side character and daughter of a renowned swordsman. Life isn't actually so bad after being sucked into a fictional world, but shes doomed to meet an untimely death if she can't escape the clutches of the villainous Prince Ignus. When Selena's twin brother, Celestine, runs away before his military conscription, she has no choice but to enlist under his name to avoid getting her entire family executed. But hiding her identity wont be so easy once Ignus takes note of her impressive sword skills and sets his sights on turning "Sir Celestine" into his top henchman. With the threat of execution looming over her head, can Selena avoid getting caught by the villain?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD%EC%97%90%EA%B2%8C-%EC%A0%95%EC%B2%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EB%93%A4%EC%BC%9C%EB%B2%84%EB%A0%B8%EB%8B%A4/2812), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=55402347)
