title: Heaven'S Son in the Land of the Rising Sun
genre: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Romance, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Ryouko Yamagishi
synopsis:
It is the eve of the Asuka Period, and Emishi, the heir to the powerful Soga clan, is 14 years old. His father takes him to the Imperial Court, where he meets a 10-year-old boy, Prince Umayado.

The turbulent story of Emishi and Umayado begins now. 

Many rare color manuscripts, chapter covers, preview cuts, etc. are fully reproduced. This is the "complete version" of Ryoko Yamagishi's masterpiece, a representative of the Japanese manga world!

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shojo in 1983**

title: Kimi Shi Ni Tamafu Koto Nakare
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural
author: Tarou Yokoo
synopsis: In the future, supernatural powers not only exist but have become science fact. The Special Abilities Private High School is established in order to utilize students powers for the military. Students are roped onto the battlefield without knowing the meaning of the fight, whether it will save their livesor spell their demise.

title: Mayaka-Neesan Wa Uso Ga Tsukenai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Yuji Onda
synopsis:
Junya is a third-year junior high school student. He's good at sports, but when it comes to studying... well, let's just say he's really bad at it. 

Lately, he's been troubled by something. His childhood friend, Mayaka-nee, has been messing with him in all sorts of ways! Could it be that she actually likes him...? 

Thus begins the romantic comedy where our hero is at the mercy of a deceptive, ever-changing heroine!

title: Why Naitou
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma
author: Kinoko Akano
synopsis: "I love you! Let's get married!" That is how Itou's first encounter with Naitou went on their first day of school. Since then, Naitou has been relentless; proposing to Itou at every opportunity and singing his love for her. But Itou is no obedient goodie-goodie to just sit back and let Naitou do as he pleases. Firing back with her own diatribes, she is determined to fight this out till the end. A comedic tale of two twisted idiots and a boy's neverending pursuit to get his girl even if that girl absolutely hates him.

title: Royal Marriage
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Hui-Ya
synopsis:
The symbol of beauty and money, Tatiana Cartien, the most eligible bachelorette of the Freya Empire. The despair of being betrayed by her trusted fiancé lasted only a moment, as who could've known a bigger shock would happen.

"I'll only endure for a few days, getting discovered in an idiotic manners of all ways."

To think that her family, who she believed was on her side, knew her fiancé's nature. Tatiana threatened to never get married, and her mother, who once coddled her, abandoned her.

"If you say you don't want to then I guess you should leave this house."

"..."

"Of course, you should leave behind everything I've given to you."

The time she has left is one week. If she can't find someone worth marrying, she'll be kicked out onto the streets with nothing.

Just when she thought, "Is this the end?" one person came to mind! Kainel Towncent, an illegitimate child who had once been treated with contempt, who then rose from mercenary to the hailed war hero of Freya in 3 years.

A road with a dead end, there's nothing left to lose. In order to survive in this grim world, grabbing the hand of the devil is enough.

"Tatiana Cartien. No matter what anyone says from now on, you're the lady of Towncent. If you come to me with an offer of marriage first, then you need to take responsibility until the end."

---
As the beloved daughter of a viscountess and the fiancée of a duke, Tatiana Cartienne was the belle of high society. But when she refuses to marry after discovering the duke's infidelity, she begins to see that she was simply a pawn in her family's power play. In her attempt to break free, she turns to Kynell Townsend, a war hero who was once humiliated by the viscountess for his attempt to woo Tatiana. With title and fortune out of the picture, will they be able to reset their love story?

title: Nee, Boku Ga Inai to Shinutte Itte Yo
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama
author: Kotoko
synopsis:
"Will this love lead to happiness or despair?"
Toruka is in a relationship with Iori, an ideal high-spec boyfriend who is the envy of everyone, and she is enjoying smooth sailing in both her private and public life.
One year into their relationship, she receives a marriage proposal from Iori, who asks her to stay by his side for the rest of their lives.
She is elated, but then she discovers that someone is stalking her.
She enlists the help of her childhood friend Jin to find the culprit, but ......?
24-hour surveillance, eavesdropping, tailing...the yandere boy's warped love and obsession run amok never ceases in this dicey romance...!

title: Tenkousaki Ni Oshi No Maid Ga Ita
genre: Crossdressing, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Levin Aoi
synopsis: Not found

title: Only Love
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Chuan Qin
synopsis: Bully × The first love of many, an interpretation of the deepest love. Reborn as a high school sophomore, it was the best year in Meng Ting's short life. She wants to live it to the fullest, she wants to dance again, and never mess with the demonic boy who later raises his butcher knife - Jiang Ren. This summer, around the corner of the school building, Meng Ting heard Jiang Ren, the bad boy, laughing wildly: "What kind of girls do I like? Girls like Meng Ting."

title: Adabana
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Sexual Violence, Drama, Tragedy
author: Mikoto Asou
synopsis: A girl with a rough life circumstances makes a life altering decision for the worst. In this tainted world, I shall live with the Original Sin of Purity

title: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Clayman Revenge
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Survival, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Delinquents, Monster Girls
author: Fuse
synopsis: Walpurgis ended with echoes of a public condemnation. It seems as if a clown's dream has already ran its course. But as if fate was pranking, or the world has other plans, the  supposedly dead Clayman has been resurrected from the dead. Is it the beginning of his dark era once more...?

title: Ookami Heika No Hanayome
genre: Historical, Romance, Comedy
author: Mato Kauta
synopsis:
Yuurin, the daughter of a low ranking government officer, comes to the royal palace after hearing of a job with higher wages. However, that job is to act as the bride of Haku Reishou, who is feared as being the cruel and ruthless "Wolf King." In the royal palace where conspiracies swirl, after learning His Majesty's secret, Yuurin ends up stuck being his temporary bride?!  


---

title: Mienai Hito-Tachi
genre: Oneshot, Monsters, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Mystery
author: Nagabe
synopsis:
The blind girl lives with a mysterious creature that somehow protects her. But the girl was aware. The creature is "a horrible monster"  
  
Note this is a oneshot that was published in two parts.

title: Hyakkakyu No Osoujigakari
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: shoyu
synopsis:
"You, that's His Majesty the Emperor, you know?!"

"Is that more important than a steamed bun?"

Yui Mei has two secrets. First, she retained the memories of her past life. Second, it is highly probable that she is a daughter of the Sai Kingdoms Emperor.
As a certified die-hard fan of Chinese dramas in her past life, she willingly participated in the court lady selection just for the sake of seeing the imperial harem in the flesh.

---

[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4104ev/)

title: Itsuki to Haru
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yue Satomi
synopsis: Itsuki and Haru are childhood friends. But Haru is secretly in love with Itsuki. And when he proposed to him, the latter didnt take it seriously. Just being by his side will be enough so Haru thought. Until one day Itsuki came to stay at Harus place for a week. Will all Haru's suppressed desires finally come out?!

title: My Life as Inukai-San'S Dog
genre: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Supernatural
author: Itsutsuse
synopsis:
A little ecchi comedy where you are being kept by a cool, beautiful girl! When you woke up, you found yourself as the pet dog of a girl named Inukai-san! At school, Inukai-san has no expression on her face, but she's a dog lover who loves her dog to pieces! She loves dogs so much that she's going to turn you into a real dog, body and soul! An erotic comedy that makes you stop being human!  
 
- [Manga Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/inuninattara)

title: Tensei Shitara Suterareta Ga, Hirowarete Tanoshiku Ikiteimasu
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Miyako Mitsunari
synopsis:
Millie is reincarnated as a baby with memories of her previous life.However, at the age of five months, she is abandoned in the cold...! She was picked up by Joe and Marissa who happened to be passing by, and her life was saved, but the life of the common people in another world that awaits her is quite severe.... She finds herself in a dirty room full of dust and stains, without the delicious food she had in her previous life! The couple's restaurant and inn, "Cat's Pavilion in the Shade of the Trees," is in financial trouble! In order to return the favor she was given, she changes the store with her cheat magic and knowledge from her previous life...the long-awaited comic book version of the popular web novel!
[web novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816452221433349411) (jp)

title: Kissing Lilies
genre: Oneshot, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Takao Demise
synopsis: Not found

title: Anata Wa Watashi No Geboku Desu ~Neko to Geboku No Himitsu No Kankei~
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yuuichi Oota
synopsis:
Doujinshi "Neko to Geboku" has been adapted into a manga! Would you like to become a servant of a cat-eared kuudere lady and give her naughty services?

High school boy Akito Mayabi is a secretive boy who cannot talk to girls other than his childhood friends. Then he found a girl he was interested in. The girl's name is Nao Tamanomiya. She was a cool and downer type of young lady...and she had cat ears!? She was one of only a few people in the world who had cat ears!

Akito had been taking photos of Nao without her permission, but one day, Nao herself found out that he had been taking pictures of her!? Akito thought his life was over, but on top of being ordered by his girlfriend to perform naughty services, Unbelievable things are said to me.

"Be my servant."

This is how the servant life of a secretive man begins. Akito gradually becomes unable to resist the service orders given to him by the cat-eared lady??!!?

title: Muchi Muchi Osananajimi
genre: Romance, School Life, Web Comic
author: Fujoujoshi
synopsis: Not found

title: Mahouka Koukou No Rettousei - Nankai Soujou-Hen
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Aonagi Nobu
synopsis:
Spring is here, and the graduating seniors of First High are planning a getaway to sunny Okinawa. At the same time, Tatsuya and Miyuki will be on the island as the Yotsuba familys representatives at a memorial service for the victims of the invasion there several years earlier. Of course, this is just a cover for their true purpose: foiling a terrorist plot hatched by some deserters and Australian operatives. Their primary target is a party that Shizuku and Honoka will be attendingWhat are the chances? Romance is in the air, and danger is on the horizon, making this a vacation theyll never forget!

Manga adaption of the 'Southern Sea Riot Arc' from the 20th light novel.

title: Milk-Shibori Hunter No Isekai Sakunyuuki ~Nouka No Saenai Otoko Ga Arayuru Shuzoku No Chiku-B O Moteasobi-Toriko Ni Suru~
genre: Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Daichi Sorayomi
synopsis: Squeeze the monster girls' breasts and save the other world with gushing milk!!!!!!

title: Corpse Knight Gunther
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Zombies, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Mayo Neoguri
synopsis: The war between humans and vampires will come to an end with the victory of the vampires, as expected by all. In the yet-to-be-invaded Holy Land of Bahal, after a concerted effort to counterattack mankind, he succeeds in creating a "corpse knight" who never dies and a "power source" that can move him, thus reviving the gladiatorial "Gunther" as a "corpse knight."

title: Yopparai Touzoku, Dorei No Shoujo Wo Kau
genre: Loli, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Nagomi Ikuya
synopsis:
A hangover leads to a shared life between a thief and a slave girl.
 
Harris is an adventurer who works as a thief and scout, a job that is often shunned due to poor reputation.
 
One day he gets drunk and buys a slave girl, Tiana. Tiana, who had been treated badly and not given enough food until then, comes to adore Harris, who treats her kindly, as her master. Harris, who had been hoping that Tiana would grow up to be a beautiful woman, is gradually drawn to her because of her innocence.
 
Harris' life changes drastically when he begins living with Tiana: warm meals, freshly washed clothes, and interaction with the townspeople who had never come close to him before. On the other hand, he finds himself in more and more troublesome situations, will he manages to escape from them with his skill and tact...?
 
This is the story of the "rebirth" of a shabby thief, which begins with an encounter with a slave girl.

title: Bushinden - Ikenie Ni Sasagerareta Ore Wa, Kami Ni Hirowaretakeshi Wo Kiwameru
genre: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Miku
synopsis: Toma Godo is considered incompetent because he has not been able to use magic since he was a child. He was sacrificed to the [Extreme Demon Island], where ferocious demons were raging, and there he met a [Demigod] who had mastered the art of combat! After being accepted by the [Demigod] as a disciple, Touma awakened his extraordinary talent, practiced martial arts day and night, destroyed all kinds of demons on the island, and finally evolved into an invincible person in the world.  One day, a mysterious girl drifts to the island, completely changing Touma's fate. Touma left [Extreme Demon Island] with a beautiful girl calling herself Lise, but... Touma vowed to "protect" Lise, who holds a secret that affects the survival of humanity, and will now be freed.  the whole world knows!

title: Youth Diary
genre: Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Ssorim
synopsis: After overcoming a miserable life, she entered the university with an excitement. Dabom, who have million of dreams and desires for university, encountered a villain from her very first day... And it's somewhat awkward/unfitting from the start! "Would my campus life be okay this way?!"

title: My Dear Fluffy Boy
genre: Romance, Boys' Love
author: Nyannya
synopsis:
A good-natured guy who aspires to be an egoist x A natural furry boy
Long-awaited spin-off of the popular "Sweetheart Trigger"!

Brad, who has been suffering from insomnia due to a broken heart, happens to meet Noah, a young runaway.
Brad's whim brings him to live with Noah, but Noah's "Furry" (a hobby that loves anthropomorphic animal characters), combined with Brad's own pace, tends to make him do things that Brad doesn't like.

In order to put the past behind him, Brad decides to try "self-centered love" and plans to take advantage of Noah, but then a mysterious man appears before him...?

title: Shadow Moon
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Full Color
author: RUHA
synopsis:
Seo Cheongjin, a genius potter in the 21st century, is possessing the body of a girl name Lee Yeong-Hwa in the Joseon Dynasty 500 years ago. Huh?!
The ImJin War* is happening soon?! In order to go back to the present, Lee Yeong-Hwa will need to use her knowledge of history and make connections in order to survive.
But why are historical figures coming closer and closer the further Yeong-Hwa is deviating from history?!
*Japanese Invasion (1592)

title: Aitte Yatsu O Oshiete Kure Yo
genre: Boys' Love, Drama
author: Chil Shiomi
synopsis: A man who lost love and a penniless kept man. An encounter of the direst kind, a disaster in its own right.

title: The Saintess Has a Showdown
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Girls' Love
author: Yu Tuo
synopsis:
The Saintess of the Sea Concubine Palace, in her summoning ceremony, summoned the lowest ranked companion as her soul pet - the water elemental.   
  
"But how could a Saintess only summon a water spirit? It must be something better, like the powerful water emperor!"  
  
"I'm really just a normal rookie! Why'd you pick pick me to be your Saint?"

title: Saint Cecilia and Pastor Lawrence
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Hazano Kazutake
synopsis:
Whats a priest to do when the Saint hes tasked to take care of isa  klutz? One things for sureevery day is bound to be lively!

Saint Cecilia is beloved by the townspeople  not only is she elegant and composed, she benevolently shares her wisdom with all who seek it. That is, until the last person has left  at which point she becomes totally hopeless!

Only Pastor Lawrence is keeping the Saint put together enough to do her duties and though she may test him, its all in a days work!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10178/episode/324516) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/2256-saint-cecilia-and-pastor-lawrence-1-4)

title: Modern Wizard Hunting Project
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Magic, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Lu Ma
synopsis:
As a witch (male), our protagonist has lived for 168 years and has chosen to remain far away from the humans, living on his own until now. Of course, he has never been in any romantic relationships, but one day, a super handsome golden-haired manager came to his workplace and spontaneously started to court him! How should this gloomy little wizard react?

---

Official English translation on Comico's [Pocket Comics app](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)

title: Dungeon No Osananajimi
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Yasuhisa Kuma
synopsis: At the bottom of an impregnable underground dungeon awaits the final boss, the mighty black dragon Obsidian. The one who dared to challenge Obsidian is Van, an experienced adventurer who has fought many battles with the dragon over the years.

title: Mobile War History Gundam Burai
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama
author: Kazuma Isobe
synopsis:
A new Gundam war picture scroll, where giant "Tetsuki" scatter the sparks of conflict, is born!

"Sankin Koutai" a large battle tournament where fierce fighters selected from all over the country board giant armored warriors known as Tetsuki to determine the strongest. In order to fulfill his wish, Kotetsu Kisaragi with his "Gundam" Burai, throws himself into the harsh battle...!

title: Doumo, Suki Na Hito Ni Horegusuri Wo Iraisareta Majo Desu
genre: Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Misato Kamada
synopsis:
"I want you to make me a love potion."

The Witch of the Lake had her heart broken when the object of her one-sided affection requested that she make him a love potion.

If thats the case, then I wish to spend more time with him, even if its just up until the preparations for the love potion are complete. That was what I had told myself, and yet

The romantic tale of a reclusive witch and a solemn knight that begins from unrequited love.

---

[Official English Light Novel](http://www.crossinfworld.com/news-articles/New-Release-Hello-I-am-a-Witch-and-my-Crush-Wants-me-to-Make-a-Love-Potion.html)

title: Happy Birthday to a
genre: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Psychological, Long Strip, Virtual Reality, Philosophical, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Aiji Yamakawa
synopsis: Chapter 17 in Naver's 2023 Rookie Short Story Collection (2023 ?? ???).

title: Electroid Arrow
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Animals, Drama
author: Daiji Kazumine
synopsis: A young boy named Toshio and his friends, while exploring an abandoned factory, are taken captive by gangsters. Toshi unwittingly discovers a signal device that will summon the cyborg superhero Electric Man Arrow. Arrow comes to the rescue, and, after vanquishing the gangsters' giant robot, entrusts Toshio with the signal device. However, the gangsters' mysterious leader X Fighter learns of this and uses Toshio in his plot to frame Arrow for a string of deadly sabotages. When Arrow finally confronts X Fighter for an explosive showdown, the shadowy link between the two superhumans is finally revealed. In the final chapter of this volume, Arrow faces an entirely different sort of problem, what to do with a gigantic dinosaur that scientists have discovered deep below the earth.

title: Fate/Extra Ccc
genre: Action, Comedy, Adaptation
author: Type-Moon
synopsis: The Holy Grail War in the digital world, once again... The protagonist, Hakuno Kishinami, trapped on the dark side of the moon, together with the White Saber in a wedding dress, faces the mystery hidden in the depths of the Sakura labyrinth!

title: Tsundere Na Watakushi Ga Kawaii Nante Shouki Desu Ka?
genre: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Jun Konno
synopsis:
Rose, a prideful and spoiled princess, is known for her arrogance and lack of charm, making her widely disliked. After a life-changing event, she decides to turn her life around and make amends for her past behavior. Her first step? Breaking off her engagement with her kind and supportive fiancé, Rein, to free him from being tied to someone like her.

However, to Rose's surprise, Rein doesn't react as she expects. Instead, he openly declares: "I can't help but find you irresistibly cute." Confused and flustered, Rose struggles to understand his feelings while grappling with her own emotions.

This romantic comedy explores themes of personal growth, self-worth, and unexpected love, all wrapped in the quirky charm of a tsundere protagonist.

title: Horimiya
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: HERO
synopsis:
Kyoko Hori is your average teenage girl who has a side she wants no one else to ever discover. Then there's her classmate Izumi Miyamura, your average glasses-wearing boy  who's also a totally different person outside of school. When the two unexpectedly meet, they discover each other's secrets, and a friendship is born.

Read the official English release on [MangaUp](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/122).

title: Rikei Ga Koi Ni Ochita No De Shoumei Shitemita
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Arihred Yamamoto
synopsis: Yukimura Shinya and Himuro Ayame are two scientists that want to find out if love can be solved by a scientific theory. These two scientists also have feelings for each other and want to be able to solve their true feelings through similar theoretical facts. With this perfect opportunity, these scientists will attempt to solve the theory of the love they express for each other.

title: Informer
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Military, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Toshiaki Yamada
synopsis:
'Sejong's secret weapon, Shadow Unit informer.'
Gwiyoung, called the Ghost's Shadow, has been wandering around the battlefield since childhood.
Vowing to get revenge, he decided to become a member of the nation's best special forces as an informer.

title: Dog Matic
genre: Oneshot, Thriller, Psychological, Animals, Drama, Monster Girls, Web Comic
author: Tsunamasa
synopsis: Do you have any "fangs"???

title: K
genre: Adventure, Drama
author: Joe Shitsuki
synopsis:
K is the name of a mysterious mountaineer who routinely exposes himself to mortal danger in order to complete miraculous one-man mountain search and rescue missions for lost expeditions. Although he conquers the worlds tallest mountains, he himself is of unknown originhearsay has it that he is of Japanese descendance.
His extraordinary skillset as a rock and ice climber have singlehandedly turned him not only into a legend among local tribes of the Himalaya mountain range but also a highly sought-after lifesavereven when it comes to the most desperate of situations where other ascensionists have already given up all hope. Regardless, K is not in it for the money. He perceives of mountains as both an opportunity for personal growth and a way of strengthening his bond with mother nature herself, utilizing the lessons learned from regional mountain folk and by observing animal behaviour to solve the increasingly more difficult challenges thrown at him by the eight-thousanders.
Equipped with this adventure-packed drama as your mountain guide, your spirit shall be elevated to the height of mangaand beyond.

title: Wakeari Senpai No Kanojo Ni Narimashita
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Hanada
synopsis:
"Ah, I want to die."

Sagami, who works part time at a convenience store, is a target of bullying - one of the reasons is her grades being not the best. Meanwhile, Onizuka, an ex-studious turned delinquent, gets tangled with her. With their fates now intertwined, how will they grow out of their pasts?

title: A Wonderful Boyfriend
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kazune Kawahara
synopsis:
[from lost-translations]  
  
I want a boyfriend!  
  
Kozakura Nonoka always fancied having a boyfriend. Upon entering high school, she was certain that she was finally going to get one, but fast-forwarding eight months to December, she was still single as ever. Desperate, she attended a goukon (a group blind date) where she met Kiriyama Naoya, whose first words to her was Youll never get a boyfriend.  
  
Now, what would this strange meet-up lead to?

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shojo in 2018**

title: Lord Magear No Deshi
genre: Action, Drama, Fantasy
author: FLIPFLOPs
synopsis:
Gull, a mercenary boy whose life was saved by the highly ranked magician Kuon when he was young, now accepts a job to serve with a group of knights to subjugate a magician and retrieve a stolen magear. However, as the knights are on the way they are discovered by the magician and a battle ensues.
Faced with an opponent with overwhelming power, Gull is...!!
After that, Gull somehow becomes Kuon's apprentice...?!
A swords and magic fantasy adventure, where a mercenary boy who has no interest in magic becomes a disciple(?) of one of the world's most powerful magicians!!

title: Jingai-San No Yome
genre: Monsters, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Yuu Aikawa
synopsis:
Hinowa Tomari is a normal high schooler, until one day he's told that he has to become the wife of a mysterious creature called Kanenogi.  
  
This is the start of their newly married life.

title: Gurren Lagann
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Military, Drama, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Aliens, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Kazuki Nakashima
synopsis: In their closed-off underground village, Kamina and Shimon chafe at the limits imposed by the village elder. Yet all this will change, when Shimon stumbles across a fantastic device - just as the village's peace is broken by a violent intrusion.

title: Crepuscule
genre: Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Long Strip, Comedy, Zombies, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Mirchi
synopsis:
Lark is different from the rest of the kids. He has red eyes, just like Vampires do, and he is bullied by the other kids for it. One day he meets Setz, a kid who also has red eyes and is the only one that doesn't call him a monster or bully him. Eventually they become friends, but when Lark finds out he may have to return to the orphanage, Setz decides he does not want to lose his friend and invites him to his home The world of the Vampires.  
  
Note: This project began as an amateur manhwa on Naver, but became popular enough that Naver chose to turn it into a professional work. The author and artist changed their pen names and restarted the series from the beginning, redesigning the artwork and part of the storyline in the process.

title: Sleeping Dead
genre: Psychological, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Tragedy
author: Nemui Asada
synopsis: Earnest and well put together, Sada is a teacher that's popular among both his colleagues and students alike. One day after school, while he was on patrol, he saw a suspicious figure attacking a female student with a knife. Unable to escape in time, Sada ended up losing his life. However, Sada woke up on a cold slab... (Previously serialized with the title 'Living Dead')

title: Dragon Ball Super Divers
genre: Oneshot, Action, Martial Arts, Adventure
author: Toyotarou
synopsis: Dragon Ball Super Divers is a One-Shot title authored and illustrated by Toyotarou to coincide with the release of the game with the same name.

title: Angel Heart - 2Nd Season
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Tsukasa Houjou
synopsis:
A young Taiwanese assassin codenamed "Glass Heart" committed suicide by jumping off a building, and her heart was pierced by a metal fence. Miraculously, her life was saved by heart transplantation. During her recovery she began to experience strange dreams, which led her to Japan looking for the donor of her heart, who happens to be Kaori Makimura, former partner of City Hunter.

Note: direct continuation of Angel Heart, renewed in Monthly Comic Zenon after the cancellation of Bunch.

title: Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Big Bang Mission!!!
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Yoshitaka Nagayama
synopsis: Spin-off manga and the sequel to both Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Dark Demon Realm Mission! and Super Dragon Ball Heroes: Universe Mission.

title: Umarekawatta Kensei, Kenshi Ga Reiguu Sareru Majutsu Shijou Shugi No Gakuen De Musou Suru
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Shizuya Someno
synopsis: Lyus, once hailed as the Sword Saint, was reborn through some twist of fate with all his memories intact. Seeking to reach even greater heights, he enrolled in the Royal Capital's First Academythe largest in the land. However, in a world where magic reigned supreme, swordsmen were relegated to the sidelines and treated with disdain. But such common perceptions meant nothing to Lyus, who retained all the power he possessed in his previous life. Wielding only his sword, he effortlessly overwhelmed the magic users, and in time, he became the beacon of hope for all swordsmen.

title: Jaa, Kimi No Kawari Ni Korosou Ka?
genre: Psychological, Crime, Sexual Violence, Drama, Horror, Mystery
author: Yukiaki  Kurando
synopsis: The manga centers on Y?ma Fujikura, a constantly bullied first year high school student. When a classmate named Ry? Amezato, nicknamed "Amelie," helps him out one day, Y?ma tells him not to get any more involved, or else the bullies will target Amelie too. In response to this, Amelie only tells Y?ma that he would commit murder for him if Y?ma wanted.

title: Keikenchi Chochiku De Nonbiri Shoushin Ryokou ~Yuusha to Koibito Ni Tsuihou Sareta Senshi No Mujikaku Zama~
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Yoshiki Kanata
synopsis:
After losing his girlfriend to a brave hero, Toru is expelled from his S-Rank party. With a feeling of sadness and pain in his heart, he defeats a demon he meets outside the city, and his ability [to save experience] is broken! Toru becomes level 300 in the blink of an eye! With this power that far surpasses that of heroes, there is nothing that can stop him. Kaede, a slave he met on his journey, forms a group called the "Manyu Brigade", and easily completes dungeons, acquires the legendary sacred weapons, and thanks to his skills, his friends level up easily! He rescued a countess who was attacked by bandits on the road, and befriended a legendary beast. Oru's journey continues at a leisurely pace, as he repeatedly encounters various people along the way, while his former party of heroes are deprived of opportunities to play an active role and fall into decline. This is the beginning of the life of a 300 level warrior!  


---

[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9483ge/)

title: The Mountain of Remains on Planet Triangle
genre: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Philosophical
author: Harutarou Togawa
synopsis:
On a planet existing remote from other planets in space, there extends a land of white ashes.

Organisms that resemble a triangular rice ball inhabited the land. The planet was once a place where humanity built a civilization.

One day, something that looks like a human wakes up...

title: Isekai De Cheat Skill Wo Te Ni Shita Ore Wa, Genjitsu Sekai Wo Mo Musou Suru: Girls Side ~Kareinaru Otome-Tachi No Bouken Wa Sekai Wo Kaeta~
genre: Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Miinosuke Seo
synopsis:
Another world: Lexia, the first princess of the Kingdom of Arcelia. When it comes to decisiveness and the ability to take action, no one can match her; in some ways, she is the "strongest" princess. As a result of being extremely bored with life in the royal castle, the words she uttered were...

"I've made up my mind! I'm going to set out on a journey to save people who are in trouble!"

So, forcibly bringing along Lunaa girl who is her bodyguard and has a background as a top-notch assassinLexia sets off on an adventure around the world.

title: Mazoku No Pet Ni Narimashite
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, School Life, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kisetsu Morita
synopsis: One day, Takafumi Ayanokoji, an ordinary high school boy, is warned by a suspicious fortune teller that he is in trouble with women. Immediately after that, along with heavy rain and lightning, a beautiful girl with blonde hair and red eyes appeared. The girl follows Takafumi to his house and says she wants to keep him as a pet, but...!?

title: Kekkaishi E No Tensei
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Souichi
synopsis:
By the time he opened his eyes, Kubota Tamotsu (34 years old) has been reincarnated into another world. Moreover, as a 6 years old slave with Level 1 Barrier skill. To surpass his limitations and become a powerful Barrier master Kubota begins a hellish training, full of obstacles and struggles.  From Lets Become a Novelist, a new other world fantasy starts!  
  
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3631do/)  
[Light Novel](https://bookwalker.jp/series/130407/)

title: White Angels Have No Wings
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, School Life, Full Color
author: Gado
synopsis: A Catholic school where everything seems tranquil and fine. But for Ayeon, a day doesn't pass without getting bullied until one day, Yeonhwa steps in against the bullies. Ayeon is grateful for Yeonhwa but what she doesn't realize is that there seems to be something more than just good intentions behind that beautiful smile.

title: Gokurakugai
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Delinquents, Supernatural
author: Yuto Sano
synopsis:
Gokurakugai, a bright and bustling working class district with a hidden dark side. In this area without order, Tao and Alma work as troubleshooters for hire. Their missions involve helping a young boy find his lost friend, a person who disappears without a trace, and disfigured animal corpses.

All the while, the evil spirits who live in the shadows bring out a different side to these troubleshooters!

title: Snow White with the Red Hair
genre: Historical, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Military, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Sorata Akizuki
synopsis:
Shirayuki, a young girl born with unique apple-red hair, happens to meet a famous but foolish young man, Prince Raji. He falls in love with Shirayuki at first sight, and orders her to become his concubine.  
  
Determined to do whatever it takes to resist his advances, but with nowhere else to go, Shirayuki cuts her hair and escapes to a neighboring country. While traversing through the forests, she meets an injured boy, Zen. After she boldly heals his wounds, he in return helps her. Meanwhile, Prince Raji sends out his henchmen to search for her.  
  
What will become of Shirayuki? What is Zens true character? A refreshing fantasy story between an optimistic heroine and a prince who constantly stays on her watch.  
  
**Extra stories:**  
v01 - Hachigatsu no Shikisa (Four-season Colour of August)  
v02 - Bokura o Tsunaide. (Bind Us)  
v14 - Natsu Yasumi Zero Zero Nichime (00 Day of Summer Holiday)

title: Dragon Ball Gt
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Naho Ooishi
synopsis:
Unofficial Dragon Ball GT adaptation by the chinese Xinjiang Youth Publishing House.  
  
Age 789: Five years have passed since the 28th Tenkaichi Budokai, and all is peaceful around the world as Goku and Oob finish their training in Kami-samas palace. However, this peace soon ends as Pilaf makes a terrifying wish, transforming Goku into a child. The rush is on to retrieve all seven Ultimate Dragon Balls from around the Universe before the Earth and its inhabitants are destroyed

title: Hikagemono Demo Yarinaoshite Ii Desu Ka?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mikumi Yuuchi
synopsis:
***I want a do over for the me who had no courage to speak of, and be born again as a new me.***

Koharu Kanba, who spent her gloomy high school days as a "social outcast", will now restart her life!!

(Source: CyComi)

title: Ore Wa Seikan Kokka No Akutoku Ryoshu
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Yomu Mishima
synopsis:
In his past life, Liam was hardworking and honest. This got him nothing but debt and betrayal. Now hes been reborn as the ruling noble of a planet.

Time for some payback.

This life hell grind the world under his heel! Hes only looking out for himself. All his underlings will suffer! But try as he might, his tyranny only seems to make his subjects happier.

title: Senran Kagura - Spark!
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, School Life
author: Kenichirou Takaki
synopsis: The Hanzo Academy is not just a regular school. It holds a top secret class for ninja training reserved just for the elite. Only two girls made the cut this year, Ikaruga, a quiet but gifted brunette, and Katsuragi, a passionate and skilled blonde. Their personalities could not be more polar opposite and sparks fly even on the first day of class. Ikaruga, being a little bit ahead of the curve, outscores Katsuragi on every assignment. With tensions running high, how will these two ninja students work together when the time comes?

title: Snow Thaw & Love Letter
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life
author: Nauchi
synopsis:
Natsuki, the prince of an all-girls school meets an innocent (girl) transfer student, Shun, who doesn't treat Natsuki like a prince, but instead treats her as a "friend."

Natsuki excels in everything she does and even has a fan club at school.
Even though she was looked at with admiration, her days were somehow unfulfilled...

Although Natsuki feels uncomfortable with her first "friend", Shun's innocent smile and bright personality make Natsuki's heart flutter...?

title: Demon Knight
genre: Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Demons, Magic, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Gou Nagai
synopsis: The beginning of a saga. The story of a "time of yonder" about the birth of Devilman.

title: Yuru Camp?
genre: Comedy, Adventure, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Afro
synopsis:
Rin, a girl camping by herself at the base of Mt. Fuji. Nadeshiko, a girl who came to see Mt. Fuji on her bicycle. The scenery the two witness over a supper of cup ramen marks the start of a new friendship and many adventures to come, camping in the great outdoors!  

  ---

title: Goar
genre: Monsters, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: ASK Dongman
synopsis:
In a world where, due to a supernatural event called THE SHINING, all male genetics of both people and animals have disappeared, leaving no trace, leaving only women alive to rule, but which would result in the destruction and anarchy of order and control, making it a state of extreme survival WILD OF THE STRONGEST, full of conflict, territorial disputes and murders.

Here we will follow the story of Goar, the last "Human" man, on his path of revenge, for a group of women who destroyed and traumatized his life forever, but this journey will not be easy for him, since he will encounter several obstacles and dangers on his path of revenge, but he will not be alone, but will also be accompanied by his traveling companion, Farah.

title: Strongest Level 1
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yu Deul
synopsis:
The raid failed. 

In a desperate situation due to the impending suicide bombing of the dungeon boss, Lee Gon-woo was betrayed by his teammates, and abandoned in the bosss room. Just when he thought it was all over, a dagger suddenly fell into his hands. And from that moment his life changed dramatically.

His life was saved, but all the levels he gained with such difficulty have reset, making him level 1.

[You have caught a "mosquito". Your level has increased.]

"My level should have gone up, but why is nothing happening?!"

title: Imprisoned with the Horror Game'S Male Lead
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Eongmanjangnyeo
synopsis:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male leads play ends.

When I get out, Ill lock you up exactly the same way.

The male lead is so noisy. 
If its going to be like this, Ill just help him escape faster. 

Lets eat, Dietrich.
This is a potion, itll help you recover faster if you take it.
The hint to escape is over there

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

Youll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

I dont really know the answer.

Whats the meaning of this? Arent you supposed to be smart?

The male lead doesnt think about leaving the mansion at all. 

If you wont get out, I will.

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I dont want to keep seeing. 

Is it possible for you to get out of here?

His eyes sank bitterly. 

Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.
What?
And you have no way of getting out, either.

What the hell is going on?

title: Tsugumomo
genre: Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, School Life, Shota, Supernatural
author: Yoshikazu Hamada
synopsis: Kazuya Kagami, an ordinary boy, finds his life turned upside down when his late mother's obi transforms into a girl wearing a kimono named Kiriha. She happens to be a Tsukumogami called a "tsugumomo," objects that have gained a soul through long years of harmony with their owners. Kazuya has no recollection of meeting Kiriha when she exclaims "Long time no see" to him. He nearly loses his life from an attacking "amasogi" that are premature spirits born only to fulfill impure wishes of certain people, and Kiriha defends him. With Kiriha's arrival, Kazuya enters a reality with gods and other Tsukumogami and slowly discovers his dark past.

title: Aono-Kun Ni Sawaritai Kara Shinitai
genre: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Umi Shiina
synopsis: "I would die if it would allow me to touch you. That is my love." Airhead Yuri and her boyfriend Aono had a perfectly normal relationship until one day Aono suddenly passed away  They will never be bound together, and they cannot even touch. This is their difficult and almost too sincere love story.

title: World End Solte
genre: Magical Girls, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Satoshi Mizukami
synopsis: Though magic has been forbidden for many long years, the effects of spells woven in bygone wars still remain in pockets of corruption blighting the world today. To uncover the secrets in the hidden reaches of this world and become the wise-woman of her dreams, "Lucky" Solte sets out for adventure!

title: Cocoon
genre: Action, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Hamaguri
synopsis:
A manga adaptation of the popular TRUMP series by playwright Kenichi Suemitsu.

Angelico and Raphael, childhood friends, reunite in the clan during their Cocoon period. They also meet Diego, Emile, and Julio, who are upperclassmen, and develop a friendly relationship, but their friendship is shattered by an incident. The story of boys guided together by blood, their short-lived friendships, and tales of profound sorrow-!!

title: Lolita Meshi
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Kuko Okano
synopsis: Not found

title: Goddess of Jealousy
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Girls' Love, Drama, Full Color
author: Liangdianshui
synopsis:
The bubbly and innocent little idol, Xiao Fengyu, encountered the calm and collected award-winning actress, He Yunhan. Soon after, they met once again as trainee and mentor in a reality show. This seemed like a great opportunity to get close to the goddess, but why could she constantly feel potential rivalry no matter where she went?

ShaDiaoDan arranged the little star XiaoFengYu to accidently meet HeYunHan, an ascetic actress, and the two are in a variety show as an instructor and trainee, It seems like a good opportunity to get intimate with goddess, but how can it seem to be full of crisis everywhere?

title: No Love Lost Lady
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Full Color
author: Mi-Nam Park
synopsis: Not found

title: Heika, Kokoro No Koe Ga Dadamore Desu!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Mimasaka
synopsis: Sietsye, a princess hailing from a small country, traveled a long way to the powerful northern Kingdom of Verscia so as to wed its ruler, the haughty and overbearing Emperor Gaizel. The lonely Gaizel was a man known as the Ice Emperor, and is as frightening as he is revered. But, when faced with him, his inner thoughts - a sharp contrast to his icy demeanor - drift over to Sietsye, going far beyond her wildest imaginations?!

title: Shin Kamen Rider Spirits
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Monster Girls, Aliens
author: Kenichi Muraeda
synopsis: Kamen Rider, the righteous warrior who shouts out "Henshin!" and continues to fight evil. The heroes created by the genius Shotaro Ishinomori are brought back to life by the hard-working Muraeda Kenichi!?In this epic hero battle story, the 10th rider "ZX" fights alongside the previous riders against the mysterious organization "BADAN" that is invading the world!

title: Game of Familia: Kazoku Senki
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Zombies, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Monster Girls
author: Mikoto Yamaguchi
synopsis:
High schooler Sasae Hatsushima has been summoned to a world of dark fantasy to defeat an undead army. That shouldnt be hard when he has the help of his hyper-competent stepmom and her two younger daughters, a high school karate champion and a girl genius!

But to gain the powers needed for their quest, a great and painful price must be paid And who better to pay it than Sasae, who seems utterly ordinary compared to his brilliant stepfamily?

title: Atarashii Kimi E
genre: Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Shinji Mito
synopsis: Sakuma, a teacher at an all-girls school, sees his wife in the red-light district cheating on him one day. In response, he runs away and decides to tour Japan, going wherever his heart may lead him. He finally reaches Odawara and meets a young girl, that looks like the one he always sees in his dreams. He barely manages to stop himself from crossing the line with the girl, and he eventually returns to his normal life, having discovered that his wife's alleged cheating was all a misunderstanding. But then...

title: A Married Life That Crosses the Line
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Maeng
synopsis:
Jiwan agrees to become the legal spouse of a complete stranger for three years to cover her fathers medical expenses. Tempted by the promise of 1 billion won in exchange for maintaining the marriage, she quickly signs the marriage certificate.  

Three years later, just two weeks before the contract ends and her payday arrives, her legal husband unexpectedly appears in her life.  

Will Jiwan be able to part ways with him peacefully, or will her plans take an unforeseen turn?

title: Munou Na Mamahaha Desu Ga, Kazoku No Dekiai Ga Tomarimasen!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Tsuruko.
synopsis:
Elsa grew up in a family devoid of love and warmth, leaving her neglected and uneducated, branded as useless by those around her. However, destiny has a surprising twist in store. She receives a decree from the Emperor, commanding her to marry the formidable Duke Rolf Eiberg, a man renowned for his prowess on the battlefield and whispered about in the shadows for his cruelty, earning him the ominous title of war maniac.

Contrary to the expectations of those around her, Elsa views this marriage as a chance to change her life and find happiness. But upon arriving at the Duke's grand residence, she is shocked to find that her groom is absent. Instead, she encounters his two sons: the fiery Wilbert and the enigmatic Hugh, both unaware of their fathers impending marriage.

What follows is Elsa's arduous journey into a family cloaked in secrets, where every heart is ensnared by the barbed wire of detachment and mistrust. Can she uncover the truths hidden within these walls and cultivate love in a place overshadowed by the past?

title: Batsu-Hare
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Minori Inaba
synopsis: The story begins with the protagonist, Wakou Ichiro, who decides to return home early from work to celebrate his second anniversary with his wife. But, when he opens the door of his house... He finds his wife cheating on him! Although the marriage was short-lived, his life changes again when suddenly, a certain woman appears in front of him?

title: Angels of Death
genre: Action, Psychological, Survival, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Makoto Sanada
synopsis: 13-year old Rachel awakens to find herself trapped in the basement of an abandoned building. Without any memories, or even a clue as to where she could be, she wanders the building, lost and dizzy. In her search, she comes across a man covered in bandages. He introduces himself as Zack and he wields a grim-reaper like sickle. A strange bond is struck between them, strengthened by strange, crazy promises These two, trapped in this strange building, don't know why fate has placed them there. But they will work together desperately to find a way out

title: Tiger Coming in
genre: Historical, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Se-Hyeok Bae
synopsis: The fun and marvelous daily life of a young couple after meeting mysterious children who found their way to them.

title: Love Is an Illusion
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Fargo
synopsis:
"There's no way that I'm an omega!"

Hyesung lived his whole life believing that he was an alpha. Then, he met dojin, a dominant alpha who knew right away that he was an omega. Hyesung, who couldn't accept that he was an omega, was willing to do anything so he could turn into an alpha

An omega who wants to be an alpha, and an alpha who hates omegas this is a drama, set in Omegaverse, about two incompatible characters who get entangled with each other's lives.

title: Taming the Shrew
genre: Long Strip, Romance
author: Sil-Bi
synopsis: A marriage that started unintentionally. But my useless husband demands a divorce on a whim. Leah, thinking she cant just quietly get divorced like this, rushes off to a friends vacation home, where she encounters a leopard that saves her in a moment of danger. It turns out that the leopard is actually Yanok, the imperial prince and a shapeshifter. But this guy, despite looking all good on the outside, has a somewhat 'cat-kid' vibe...? Leah, will you be my mate? As this 'cat-kid' keeps pushing his way in, Leah starts to gradually tame him...

title: The Planets Stories
genre: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Masayuki Mori
synopsis: Saturday night. A child from the Moon came to visit.

title: Only Sense Online
genre: Genderswap, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Aloha Zachou
synopsis: Utilizing a system called "Sense," each player aims to create their unique character in the VRMMORPG "Only Sense Online." Joining this realm is Yun, an absolute beginner in the world of gaming, equipped with some of the worst customized "Sense" ever. While his two sisters, both veterans in this world, criticize his choices of equipment, he continues to delve into the skill sets he has acquired. Along his way, he meets the art of "production" and people that have mastered this art. Watch as a total novice creates a revolution in the gaming world and create the "ultimate" support class.

title: Monmusugo! ~Honnyaku Skill De Saikyou Monmusume to Isekai Seikatsu~
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls
author: kimimaro
synopsis: Amakawa Keisuke, a hapless corporate slave who suddenly dies, wakes up in a different world! He tries his best to enjoy life in another world, but he has only been given the bottom-tier skill "Translation" and on top of that, the most powerful monster was in front of him...!

title: Too Cute to Handle
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Syaki
synopsis:
Forget "saving face," this is "saved by face!"
Roseny has been masquerading as a boy for years at the orphanage. But when the duke chooses her to be a playmate for his son, it isn't long before her secret is revealed. Instead of being sent back, her adorable complexion results in Roseny being adopted! What will this new future hold for her?

title: Isekai Ni Otosareta Jouka Wa Kihon!
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Honobonoru500
synopsis:
One day, a dull young man from Japan gets caught up in a heroic summoning and goes to another world. The next time he wakes up, he's not in a castle with a king, but in a deep forest since the summoning failed! You'd think he'd be at a loss, but he starts living a life of survival with a positive attitude that doesn't involve deep thought!   
Then, before he knows it, he saves the cursed forest and magical beasts one after another with his magical powers, and is befriended by wolves and dogs in a healing paradise! However, he doesn't realize that they are actually legendary demonic beasts and spirits at all. What's more, that they are adored! A positive young man unknowingly plays with the legendary magical beasts, a heartwarming and misunderstood fantasy begins!  
  


---

[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0223eu/) (Japanese)

title: Jinruishoku
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Ghosts, Zombies, Aliens, Mystery
author: Mitsuchiyomaru
synopsis: You just die one day and turn into a mummy! Mysterious mummified corpses that people have nicknamed Mummily-sans keep being found one after another, causing a lot of fuss. One day, a boy named Seita notices that his friend is acting strangely?! Dont miss this thrilling suspense story about an invasion by the unknown!

title: Imitation Play 2 -Dawn-
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Ann Homare
synopsis:
Haruma and Nagisa have overcome their strained relationship due to their "sex friends contract" and have confirmed their feelings for each other. Now that Haruma is his boyfriend, he grows sweeter with each passing day, and Nagisa is constantly at his mercy with his straightforward expressions of affection...! They
are so happy that it's almost scary, and they are enjoying a fulfilling life together as lovers, both physically and mentally. However, at work they are just senior and junior, and their relationship is still a secret.
Even when female customers who are after Haruma ask if he has a girlfriend, he can't bring himself to say that it's "me"... Then, a certain person who is looking for Nagisa appears--!?

What lies beyond the unrequited love that was thought to be impossible to fulfill.
[A younger bartender who is at the mercy of Nagisa x A strong-willed and devoted beautiful bar owner] The long-awaited lovers edition restarts!

title: Imitation Play
genre: Romance, Boys' Love
author: Ann Homare
synopsis:
Nagisa, who is the bar owner, has unrequited feelings for his junior at work, Yuuma. To him, Im nothing more than an admired senior. Nagisa hides his feelings by sleeping around with strangers. However, while he was meeting up with his partner, he was caught by Yuuma. If he is going to end his one-sided feeling, he wanted to make Yuuma feel disillusioned.

Ill be your sex partner from now on

They come to an agreement with each other and Nagisa is stuck in a predicament that leaves him tattered and torn deep down

A charming younger bartender and a strong, beautiful shopkeeper who is clumsy in love.

A mild, sweet and emotional love story that will keep you twisting and turning the love that youve been keeping deep down in your heart.

title: Knight Run
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Mecha, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Aliens, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Sung Min Kim
synopsis: During the era of space exploration, mankind is at war against monsters of unknown origin. The battle is grim, and the future looks bleak. Amidst the chaos, mankind plays their last hand. It's time for the Knights to step into the fray and turn the tide of this war.

title: Moto Dorei Desu Ga, Oni No Dorei Wo Katte Mitara Seiryoku Ga Tsuyosugiru Node Sutetai...
genre: Demons, Romance, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Nico Amaharu
synopsis: It has been seven years since Sora Ono was sent to another world, where she was enslaved. Because of a clerical error, her slave status was revoked, and Sora walked away a free woman. Then one day, she purchases a slave...

title: Kanojo to Kare No Kankei ~Heibon Na Hayakawa-San to Heibon Na Miura-Kun No Hibon Na Kankei~
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Eiko Mutsuhana
synopsis:
"I wish I had a girlfriend, I don't even care who"
"Really? Anybody? Even me?"

Kaho, who has never had a boyfriend before, wanted to have a male-female relationship.
Takumi, who wanted a girlfriend, just happened to be talking about it in front of her.

---
Alternate Raws: [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8556)

title: I Want to Love You Till Your Dying Day
genre: Award Winning, Action, Romance, Magic, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Nachi Aono
synopsis:
At the mysterious orphanage where Sheena lives, death is nothing new to its residentsgirls who no longer have families of their own, who are raised as weapons of war, taught to kill and take the lives of others without batting an eye. Everyone, that is, except Sheena, who wishes for nothing more than the growing conflict around her to end.

On the night of her roommates death, Sheena meets a strange girl covered in blood, who smiles despite the turmoil surrounding them. The next day, the girl appears as a new student in Sheena's class and introduces herself as Mimi. Initially thought to be a school myth, there are now whispers in the orphanages halls that Mimi is their secret weaponan immortal who cannot die. 

When Mimi is later assigned as Sheenas new roommate, Sheenas world grows even more complicated when she begins living with someone who loves and welcomes death, when all Sheena wants to do is stop it 

A story of two girls' innocent wishes, found in a world next to death.

title: Ouji-Sama No Otawamure
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Bachi
synopsis: In a world where a gate leading to another world has appeared on Earth, Aoi is an office worker working as an entry control bureau employee. One day, while dealing with ordinary people who have mistakenly entered another world, she meets Erhardt, a prince of the demon tribe who has come from another world. For some reason, he becomes enamored with Aoi and she becomes his caretaker during his stay on Earth. Even though Aoi dreamt of an ordinary marriage with modest happiness.

title: Make-Upper
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Mafia, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Keisuke Itagaki
synopsis: (from ebookjapan):Miake Kousei, a man who brings out the "beauty" and "love" hidden in everyone, arrives at the grand stage! This is the rumored debut work by the genius Keisuke Itagaki!

title: Itsudemo Jitaku Ni Kaereru Ore Wa, Isekai De Gyoushounin O Hajimemashita
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Shizuku Akechi
synopsis:
"Won't I be able to get filthy rich if I use this skill?"  
  
Continually exploited at work, Amata Shirou quits his job and moves to his grandma's house. When he finds out that it's connected to another world, he comes up with a plan to set up a business selling Japanese goods.   
  
The story of a man getting rich using his skill that converts the currency of the other world to Japanese yen and so forth.

title: Rejoice in Your Enemies
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Ji Jing Jun
synopsis: His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

title: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity Iii: the Stage of Carnage, Shimousa - Seven Duels of Swordmasters
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Genderswap, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, Survival, Zombies, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Rei Wataru
synopsis:
Fans of Fate/Grand Orderrejoice! A new side story appears...with all the twists and turns you might expect! Epic of Remnant is here!

---

Note: The chapters in this title follow magazine release numbering.

title: Takou No Boyish Kanojo
genre: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Eiichi Ichisugi
synopsis: Daichi and Akira have been childhood friends forever but have only started dating recently. While Akira is very much a tomboy, there are some parts of her that are surprisingly girly?

title: Hinomoto Sanshimai Wa Kamatte Hoshii
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yasumi Holiday
synopsis:
A slightly erotic home love comedy that unfolds under the roof of the Yoshita family!  
  
The eldest daughter, Juri, wears a swimsuit at home. The second daughter, Minori, has big natural breasts. The third daughter, Anri, loves reptiles. An adolescent boy who is an idol otaku becomes a sibling with these three girls. Under the roof of the Yoshita family, another naughty incident occurs today! [Translated by DeepL]

title: Ri-Chan
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Music
author: Koudai Yamamoto
synopsis:
Due to work, Tatsu moves back into his parents' house; soon after that, he encounters a young woman who turns out to be Ri-chan, the little girl he used to play together with in his childhood. However, this girl he reunited with has somehow become very different from the cheerful childhood friend in his memories...

---
