title: The Fable
genre: Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Katsuhisa Minami
synopsis:
A fabled genius at killing resides somewhere hidden in Tokyo. Taught since childhood to obey the orders of his boss, he is ordered to live in Osaka as a normal person for one year in order for the boss to lay low.    ---- **Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2017**
___
[Alt Official English (US ONLY)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10055/episode/323851)

title: The Legend of Dororo and Hyakkimaru
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Satoshi Shiki
synopsis:
During Japans tumultuous Sengoku period, one man sells his son to a pack of devils in exchange for the power to rule. Forty-eight devils take forty-eight pieces of young Hyakkimaru, and the boy is left for dead. But through the assistance of a sage and a series of inventive prosthetics, Hyakkimaru survives. Together with the young thief Dororo, the now-grown Hyakkimaru embarks upon a quest to slay all the demons and retrieve the stolen pieces of his body.   
  
This classic story from Osamu Tezuka, the father of modern manga, is now reimagined in this gorgeous new adaptation by Satoshi Shiki.

title: Otoko Girai Na Bijin Shimai O Namae Mo Tsugezu Ni Tasuketara Ittai Dounaru?
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
author: Junko Shiba
synopsis:
Arisa and Aina are beautiful sisters who are famous for their dislike of men. Hayato, a classmate who happened to be involved with the two, will receive special treatment from the girls who are supposed to hate men??! 

I want to be a slave to Hayato-sama
I want to fall in love and conceive his child.
___
**Character Designer:** [Giuniu](https://mangadex.org/author/657f488c-ba3d-4910-8ec3-539871b99fcc)

genre: Oneshot, Historical, Psychological, Survival, Philosophical, Drama, Web Comic, Tragedy
author: Kiyoro
synopsis: Not found

title: Zaijian No Yoake Made
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Moca Amai
synopsis: Akio Fujisawa was a quiet lonerobviously the total opposite of the sociable and confident Tingyu, a Chinese exchange student who joined his class. But when Tingyu revealed the insecurities behind that confident exterior, a friendship started to blossom. Fast-forward to years after graduation, and that friendship is still going strong. Tingyus frequent visits to Japan keep their connection alive, all while Akio harbours some more-than-friendly feelings...

title: Harebare Biyori
genre: Comedy, Office Workers, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yoshi Yoshimura
synopsis: One day at a funeral, after Chiharu's mother remarried, Chiharu met the child from her new stepfather's previous marriage, Rui. Rui decided to live on her own after the death of the grandfather who raised her, and Chiharu decided to live with her. A tale of togetherness of two stepsisters.

title: Noroi No Ningyou
genre: Oneshot, Horror, Supernatural
author: Eiko Komuro
synopsis:
A special one-shot published in Weekly Shounen Magazine No. 9, 2024

Based on the story of the Okiku doll

title: Fox Love Story
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Dogwang Lee
synopsis: Gumiho Yeon, who despises humans, accidentally avoids an accident with the help of human Dong-i. In essence, a nine-tailed fox is a being that has to repay the favor it receives. Yeon visits Dong-i without skipping a day for Bo-eun, and Dong-i is only burdened with such a kite. The two, who seemed never to be able to get closer, know each other's wounds and shortcomings, fill them in, and develop good feelings... The two are different in their environment, race, and way of loving. Can a nine-tailed fox and human love have a happy ending?

title: Uzumaki
genre: Monsters, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Junji Itou
synopsis:
On her way to the station to pick up Shuichi Saito, a high school student from a neighboring town, she finds Shuichi's father sitting in an alley, staring at a wall. 

He seemed oblivious to Kirie's greeting and continued to stare at the snail shell stuck to the wall... 

An out-of-this-world horror depicted by Junji Ito, the genius of new-sensation horror!

title: Hoshizora No Karasu
genre: Traditional Games, Romance, Drama, School Life
author: Satoshi Morie
synopsis: Waka is a 13 year-old Go-lover! Learning from her grandfather, a pro go player, she comes to enjoy connecting with the people around her, regardless of age or gender. One day, she meets the young genius go player, Sagisaka Souji, in a match that tore at both body and soul, and so she decides to become a pro go player herself!

title: Kamakura Bakeneko Club
genre: Animals, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Daisuke Igarashi
synopsis: There exists an old rumor relating to cats within the ancient capital of Kamakura... that if you go to the "Bakeneko Club", located somewhere in Kamakura, you can meet cats that have gone missing. Even today, people wander into "Kamakura Neko Club", where Maya and Gakuto work, relying on this rumor.

title: Legal Scandal
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy
author: Dynamite moca
synopsis: "Prince Flynn of Albion is adored for his charm and good looks-but the endless dating rumors? Not so much. Tired of the gossip, he proposes a bold idea to his secretary, Drew: pretend to date him to control the narrative. Its all for showuntil Drew starts seeing Flynn in a different light. Can a staged romance turn into something real?"

title: Josou Shite Off-Kai Ni Sanka Shite Mita.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Web Comic
author: Kurano
synopsis: Cocoa" has made three best friends in her monthly meetup group, where girls get together every month by meeting up at the cutest and trendiest new dessert cafes. Cocoa is in it for the sweetsreally!but she's also harboring a few secrets: Not only does Cocoa have a crush on another one of the girls in the group, Opera, but she's actually a guy named Satoshi who's been cross-dressing! During one meetup, things come to a head when Opera discovers that Cocoa is cross-dressingand to Cocoa's surprise, Opera confesses that she is too! [Kodansha]

title: Gunjin Shoujo, Seiritsu Mahou Gakuen Ni Senyuu Suru Koto Ni Narimashita
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Reverse Harem, Isekai, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: syuri22
synopsis:
Razé was a cheat soldier at the age of 15, thanks to the memories of her previous life. One day, she was summoned by her superior  the devil Prime Minister and was ordered to go on a long-term solo mission. She was expecting a harsh mission, but

I knew you are the right person for this, Lieutenant Colonel Razé Orphan. I want you to attend the Centrior Imperial Magic Academy starting from this spring.

..what?

Well, it seems that she has been appointed as the bodyguard for the prince and other nobles kids. And so, she was enrolled to the school where the aristocratic-sama gathered.

Although she was puzzled by the glittering school life, she was trying to live a life so as not to be bullied in the future. But it seems there was a secret that she didnt know hidden in this world.

Hey!!!!!! No one told me that this is an otome game!!!!!

As a bodyguard, her life would be over if any of the noble kids got hurt. But then a young lady who claimed to be the ill-fated villainess came by. If the girl died, wont she be dead too?

Today, Razé will continue to watch over her school life (with her own life on the line).

title: Hell Dogs
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Mafia, Gore, Delinquents, Police, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Keita Iizuka
synopsis:
Can I kill a person as a police officer!? It's been three and a half years since I became a yakuza, and the infiltration never ends.  
  
Kanetaka of the Higashi-Sheath Association is a gangster with a strong arm who has climbed up to assistant young head.  
He landed in Okinawa at the command of the organization and killed his target, Kino.  
That night, Kanetaka vomits violently.  
He was an undercover investigator at the Metropolitan Police Department!  
What is the purpose of Kanetaka's actions!?

title: Suki X Suki
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Supernatural
author: Shunsuke Hibaru
synopsis:
Touka Aizuki is a girl who can turn invisible, and no one can see her except for one person, Ryoutarou Mimori.  
  
Even though she is physically invisible, her love is completely visible!

title: Isekai De Seijo Ni Natta No De Kokumin-Teki Idol Wo Mezashimasu
genre: Harem, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Atsumi Enokiya
synopsis: Not found

title: Daybreak
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Toui Hasumi
synopsis: Marcus has a crush, and Cog is completely unprepared for the hijinks that follow. Hopefully in their efforts to grow closer, they can brighten each other's day.

title: The Ice Princess Wants to Be Melted by a Small Patch of Sunlight
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Akatsuki Kitamura
synopsis: Aoba is a first-year high school student who takes care of his younger siblings in place of his busy parents, and ends up at a sibling playdate in the home of his classmate Mizudori, a cool beauty known as the "Ice Princess".

title: Taisango No Maid-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Momo Gokugetsu
synopsis: My maid, Hayaoka-san, She is serious, good at her job and perfect. But it seems like I'm a little relaxed after work... The gap between on and off keeps me excited! ?

title: The Magic in This Other World Is Too Far Behind!
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Gamei Hitsuji
synopsis:
Suimei and two of his best friends find themselves mysteriously summoned to another world. Theres a cute princess, magic galore, a Demon Lord that needs to be defeated, and a world that needs to be saved  the works! Too bad Suimei isnt interested.

His friends are all too ready to play the parts of heroes, but Suimei just wants to get home. He has an advantage as a magician... but hes in for a rude awakening when he finds out what actually passes for magic in these parts.

title: Jigoku Sensei Nuubee
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural
author: Shou Makura
synopsis:
Nueno Meisuke, better known as Nuubee, is an exorcist who also happens to be the teacher for a 5th grade class at Doumori Elementary. While he uses many various exorcism techniques, his main weapon is his left hand, the Demon's Hand, which has the power of a chaotic demon sealed within it.

The series follows Nuubee and Doumori Class 5-3 though the many weird, insane, and downright silly supernatural encounters they face.
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/nube_off)

title: Baki Gaiden: Gaia to Sikorsky
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Military, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Takaaki Hayashi
synopsis: After approaching Gaia for a revenge match, Sikorsky is instead greeted with his new home...?!

title: Armed Girl'S Machiavellism
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, School Life
author: Yuuya Kurokami
synopsis: The Private Aichi Symbiosis Academy was originally a high school for high-class girls. When it became co-ed, the girls, out of fear, asked to be permitted to bring weapons to school. When that was enforced, a five-member vigilante corps-like organization called the "Supreme Five Swords" was also formed. After many generations, the five swords eventually became a group which corrected problematic students, so the academy started proactively accepting such students in order to correct them. Nomura Fudou was sent to that school after being part of a huge brawl. What will he do when the only options he has after enrolling are being expelled from that school as well, or being corrected the way the rest of the male students there were by being forced to dress and act like girls!

title: The Villainess and Miss Demon Lord
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Morel
synopsis:
Two girls, hand-in-hand, cross over to another world, into a magical academy set in a melodramatic Western fantasy novel. They transform into two people completely unrecognizable to each other: One is a rich villainess who is incapable of using any kind of magic, while the other is a young girl extremely talented in the field of magic, who's said to be the reincarnation of the Demon Lord. Originally set to save the world, the two of them unexpectedly fall in love.

"Male lead, female lead, may you two live a long and happy life together, forever. I, the villainess, am going to elope with Miss Demon Lord!"

title: Watashi No Kazoku Shiiku Nikki
genre: Psychological, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Yuu Nomiya
synopsis:
When he woke up, he was in a room he didn't recognize. A little girl, Lulu, called him "Big Brother."

"We're all here, I'll go get Dad!" Then Lulu left the room with a bright smile. He didn't know where he was. And he didn't have a sister. In an instant, the door opened. Something came with a rattling sound.

Something called "Dad" entered the living room.

A high concentration of mystery and fear is chained together in this crazy situational thriller. If you read this, you will be part of our "family" from today.

title: Yuuyami Tokkoutai
genre: Action, Comedy, Horror, Supernatural
author: Rensuke Oshikiri
synopsis: Tsuji, a high school student whose sister was killed by a spirit several years before the beginning of the story, joins his school's Paranormal Research Club after hearing rumours of its president being a brilliant exorcist, hoping to gain the skills necessary to avenge his deceased sister.

title: Mako-San Wa Shindemo Jiritsu Shinai
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
author: Daisuke Chida
synopsis: It's been one year since Rin moved to Tokyo for high school. He was told by the landlord of his apartment that he didn't have to pay rent if he takes care of the landlord's granddaughter, which he immediately accepted. However, that granddaughter, Mako, ended up being a 20 year old college student who is completely incapable of taking care of herself. Even so, it was love at first sight for Rin, and he's been taking care of her ever since.

title: Ennead
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Incest, Sexual Violence, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Mojito
synopsis: The once peaceful land of Egypt has been stained with blood under the tyrannical rule of Seth, the god of war. Horus, son of the god Isis but not yet one himself, rises to challenge the throne and put an end to the chaos and destruction. Although the confrontation between Seth and Horus began with hatred, in time it becomes blurred by obsession and desire... The ancient mythology of Egypt comes to life as you've never seen it before in this compelling fantasy BL.

title: The Legendary Assassin Reincarnated as the Beloved Youngest Daughter of a Royal Family
genre: Action, Long Strip, Magical Girls, Magic, Fantasy
author: Shiroi Gohan
synopsis: Not found

title: Life at Standstill
genre: Oneshot, Philosophical
author: Marimo Enda
synopsis:
[Submission for Yaoqi Village] [Submission for China Academy of Art]
Have you ever felt like this before? Like you're stuck, frozen in time, not sinking, but still exhausting yourself every day.
An old short story drawn in 2021. It's hard to recreate how I felt then. There's no words because I didn't know what and how to say it. Lacking self-control, I could only draw this to comfort myself the best that I could.
This is for our disjointed, disassociated, average lives. Dedicated to every ordinary person.

title: I'M the Most Beautiful Count
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Super Masara
synopsis: Not found

title: X (Clamp)
genre: Thriller, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: CLAMP
synopsis:
From Viz:  
Kamui Shiro is a young man who was born with the power to decide the fate of the Earth itselfa destiny he can barely bring himself to believe. But as other players in the prophecy begin to gather around himthe "Seven Seals," with the power to protect the Earth, and the "Seven Harbingers," who are fated to destroy ithe has no choice but to come to terms with his fate.

title: Azelda: Spirit Master'S Contract Marriage
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Jeong-Un
synopsis: Not found

title: I'D Rather Be the King
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Willow Wood
synopsis:
Astarote is a young woman who is transported into a romance game that she loved. She takes on the role of the villain, who is married to Prince Cedric, her favorite character. However, she discovers that the end of the game is tragic for her, as she is accused of being an impostor and is executed by the king.

She tries to change her husband's destiny, making him become the new king, but in every route she ends up dying. Desperate, she decides to take radical action: she will become the queen and change the course of history. But to do so, she will have to face many obstacles, intrigues, enemies and secrets.

title: Yumeiro Patissiere
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Cooking
author: Natsumi Matsumoto
synopsis:
Amano Ichigo is a clumsy 14-year-old girl whose only "outstanding" trait is an incomparable love of sweets. Constantly overshadowed by her near genius-pianist little sister, Ichigo looked forward to a Sweets Festival to lift her spirits a bit; and lo and behold, a taste takes her by the tongue, leading her to Henri Lucas- a world-famous master patissier. She's not the only one enthralled; Henri is sure she's someone amazing, and gives her a recommendation to St. Marie Academy, a school famous for turning out master patissieres!  
  
No sooner than she transfers, Ichigo finds herself amongst the biggest big-shots of the entire middle school, and faced with more troubles than her klutzy self is quite ready to handle. But with the help of her "Sweets Spirit" Vanilla who knows what'll be possible?

title: Kotoura-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Enokids
synopsis:
Kotoura Haruka is a 15-year-old girl who can read people's minds. She has been suffering from troubles caused by her mind-reading ability, and her parents got divorced as a result. She moves to a new high school but tries to keep away from her classmates. Manabe Yoshihisa, one of her classmates, accepts and appreciates her ability and she begins to interact with her friends with his help. Together, they join their school's ESP Research Club.  
  
Kotoura-san is a 4-koma manga series written by Enogizu. The series began serialization in Micro Magazine's Manga Goccha magazine from October 14, 2010. A television anime adaptation by AIC Classic began airing in January 2013.

title: Baoh
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Crime, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Police, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Hirohiko Araki
synopsis:
From the same creator of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, teenager Ikuro Hashizawa can transform into the parasitical bio-weapon, Baoh, gaining superhuman strength and other abilities such as firing a corrosive substance. He escapes from the Secret Organization Dress along with a young psychic girl, Sumire, and the two must face various assassins sent by the organization to kill him.  
  
Link:  
[JoJo's Bizarre Encyclopedia](https://jojowiki.com/Baoh_the_Visitor) (Manga)  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=259) (OVA)

title: Hello Doc
genre: Historical, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Medical, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Hideko Mizuno
synopsis:
(from ebookjapan):

This slapstick romantic comedy depicts the commotion caused by Annie, a rich young lady who comes to a country town holdup, and Holiday, a handsome young doctor who lives there. 

Annie, a young lady who came to Holdup under her father's will, calls herself Jane and visits the home of Holiday, the town's doctor. 

There, Jane meets a young doctor, Holiday, and is miffed by Holiday's rude attitude...?

title: Daisuki!
genre: Romance
author: Megumi Mizusawa
synopsis:
After getting drunk in a middle-school class reunion, Ookawa Hiromi wakes up at home finding his former classmate Segawa Maki tucked in his bed. The two found out they actually slept together, though not able to recall any moments of the experience. Acting normally as if nothing happened, the two happened to meet together after a while and again got drunk and slept together.
Hiromi had to move out from his apartment as it was going to be demolished while Maki is looking for a housemate after the previous one decided to move out. Will this be the trigger for them to start living together with a possible new romance?

title: Mahou Shiba Inu?Hanamaru
genre: Animals, Comedy, Magical Girls, 4-Koma
author: Marueri
synopsis: Magical-girl loving Airi one day wakes up to a talking plushie? But just as she thinks this is her time to become a magical girl, her pet dog Hanamaru(?) ends up making a contract instead...

title: Caution! Love Around the Corner
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Police, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Gun Zi
synopsis:
After her life took a U-turn, she buried her past and became a tough policewoman. However, years into her career in uniform, she reencounters the man from her bitter-sweet memory.   
  
Now a sharp-tongued detective, he meets the girl that he used to share cherished moments with. Together, they will seek justice and rekindle what was once between them.  
  
A story of crime investigation, also about how they become each others salvation.  
  
[Official English 2 (Toomics)](https://toomics.com/en/webtoon/episode/toon/7394/)  
[Official English 3 (Webcomics)](http://webcomicsapp.com/comic/5ecb8e438c252b2ea94f5623)

title: The Shop with No Name
genre: Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Hamong
synopsis: In a deserted alley travelled by few, is an antique shop. It has no sign, no name. It sells the usual items, but if you believe the rumors, this particular shop also sells undisclosed wish-granting itemsfor a price, of course. And buyers who fail to follow an item's directions for use will pay an especially high price.

title: Shi Ni Modori Oujo Wa Ikinobiru Tameni Yuri Harem Wo Tsukuru Koto Ni Shita
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Harem, Fantasy, Villainess
author: Moromi Kouji
synopsis: Marie, a domineering and selfish princess, faced her end under the guillotine's blade after her subjects had enough of her. But instead of staying dead, Marie finds herself back a year in the past, though no matter what she does she can never escape the fate that awaits her in a year. Eventually, after Marie learns that the only way to escape her own execution is to conquer a large swathe of 'romantically troubled' women, she decides to use her own 'royal charisma' to build a yuri harem!

title: Spider-Man: Octopus-Girl
genre: Genderswap, Action, Superhero, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
author: Hideyuki Furuhashi
synopsis: Doctor Octopus falls into a coma; when he awakens, he finds himself inhabiting the body of Japanese middle schooler Otoha Okutamiya.

title: Tsukushitagari Na Uchi No Yome Ni Tsuite Derete Mo Ii Ka
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Manimani Ononata
synopsis: There's the flower of Takamine High, Hanae Riko, whom every boy admires. Then, there's the plain boy, Niiyama Minato, who got proposed to by that most beautiful girl in school. Without knowing what's happening, the curtain on their newlywed life rises! For some reason, my bride, who's too cute and happily follows me around everywhere, refuses to leave my side...

title: Sefure
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Pochi Yahiro
synopsis:
Leo-chan is a professional radio DJ who talks about sex and listen to the sexual worries of her audience in order to give them proper advice.   


---

**Links:**  
- [Series Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/leo_amazume)  
- [Amazume Ryuta's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ArOgiso)

title: The World God Only Knows
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Arisawa Mamizu
synopsis:
Keima Katsuragi is a high school student better known online as the "God of Conquest," the man who can obtain the heart of any dating sim girl. In his opinion, real life is an awful game; three-dimensional girls are annoying and false representations of how a real girl should be.  
  
One afternoon, while taking a break from cleaning duty, he stumbles across a strange message that goads him to conquer a girl. On a whim, he accepts, and his consent summons a girl named Elucia "Elsie" de Lute Ima, a denizen of hell tasked with capturing runaway spirits that have festered in girls' hearts. Keima is shocked and tries to escape, but Elsie tells him that failure in fulfilling the newly-formed contract will result in the termination of his life!   
  
Tasked with capturing the runaway spirits, Keima uses his expertise and knowledge of dating sims to obtain the hearts of girls in real life.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **The World God Only Knows** (2012)

title: Rebuild World
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Nafuse
synopsis:
At the risk of his own life, a young man sets foot in the ruins of a devastated old world. His name is Akira, and in order to claw his way out of the hellhole that is his birthplace of Slumtown, the boy became a hunter. In the wastelands he happens upon a strange woman, standing perfectly still, stark naked.   
She is beautiful, but it seems that only he can see her. She exists incorporeal, tantalizingly beyond any touch, and she tells him her name is Alpha.  
Alpha wont show even a sliver of her real intentions, but with a wide smile, she brings Akira his first commission as a hunter. Akira takes the task, if only to become a stronger hunter, and having entered a contract, their dramatic lives in the hunting profession was set to begin.  
  
From Stories of the Boy Hunter as recorded by the Eastern Hunters association.  
Written post-collapse of scientific civilization.

title: Saitei Chara Ni Tensei Shita Ore Wa Ikinokoritai
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Umashi
synopsis: Jin reincarnates into the most hated and worst character in the game he played before he died. If the same scenario is followed, he will fall into darkness after three years... In an attempt to avoid such a fate, Jin begins a life as an adventurer?

title: The Invincible Man
genre: Psychological, Sports, Drama
author: Gyeong-Chan No
synopsis: It is said that there is no such thing as an "undefeated" player in mahjong due to the large element of luck. However, an undefeated player suddenly appears on Japan's largest online mahjong site, Jansen! His name is "M," and in order to find out if M is cheating, Sonokawa Junpei, a poor part-time worker, approaches him under the guise of a fake friendship. However, when he discovers the secret of M's strength, he begins to develop a passionate friendship with him... The tale of mahjong friendship that challenges the wall of undefeatedness begins!

title: The Magical Revolution of the Reincarnated Princess and the Genius Young Lady
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Harutsugu Nadaka
synopsis:
Despite her supposed ineptitude with regular magic, Princess Anisphia defies the aristocracy's expectations by developing "magicology," a unique magical theory based on memories from her past commoner life. One day, she witnesses the brilliant noblewoman Euphyllia unjustly stripped of her title as the kingdom's next monarch. Thus Anisphia concocts a plan to help Euphyllia regain her good name  somehow involving them living together and researching magic! Little do these two ladies know, however, that their chance encounter will alter not only their own futures, but those of the kingdom... and the entire world!

---
- [Official Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8558fh/)

title: Violence Jack
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Animals, Ninja, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Gou Nagai
synopsis:
September 11, 197x, In the whole Kanto region a magnitude 8-9 violent earthquake occurred. Scholars called it the great destruction of the Showa Era, but the people called it the earthquake from hell! Volcanoes erupted, buildings crumbled, Tokyo became decimated in a single day. The government, after failing to recover the city, abandons Tokyo and moves the capital. The survivors form a society with no laws. In this harsh lawless world emerges Jack, a 10 foot giant who annihilates anyone and anything in his path. The manga details his journey.  
  
The numbering is from the Complete Edition, with around 20 Chapters per volume.

title: Koukousei Web Sakka No Mote Seikatsu "Anta Ga Kami Sakka Na Wake Nai Deshou" to Boku O Futta Osanajimi Ga Koukai Shiteru Kedo Mou Osoi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation
author: Yuu Satou
synopsis:
Yuta Uematsu is a aspiring novel writer who has long had feelings for his childhood friend Michiru Okuwa, who had always supported his creative work. He finally decided to confess his love to her, even though he didn't feel like he was a match for Michiru, the most popular girl at school. When Michiru brushed him off with the words, "It's impossible!" and stormed out, Yuta was left stunned in disbelief. Michiru went back to reading "Digital Masters," a very popular web novel. However, "Digital Masters" was actually Yuta's work.......

(Source: Natalie.mu, translated)

title: Gin No Kutsu
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life
author: Shino Shinomiya
synopsis: This is the story of Jun, a (nearly) six-year-old boy. Life from the point of view of a little rascal with two loving dads and a pair of adorable friends.

title: My Succubus Girlfriend
genre: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Neji Maccha
synopsis:
Izumo is a scary-looking top student. Everyone is afraid of him, but in reality, he just wants friends and a fun school life. One day he is targeted by a succubus named Anastasia who attempts to steal his virgin soul.

A reboot with improved art but similar story of the old version.

title: Koneko-Chan, Kocchi Ni Oide
genre: Romance, Slice of Life
author: Mihou Watabe
synopsis: After Yuuko graduated from junior college, she ended up managing a clothing shop. Though her career is going well, she hasnt had time to work on her love life. One day, shes out drinking with her best friend, Mikan, bemoaning her lack of a boyfriend for a Christmas date. When she trips and hurts her leg, Mikan asks her little brother Leo (an 18-year-old) to see Yuuko home safely. When they arrive at her apartment, though, Yuuko makes a move on him and they end up sleeping together. The next morning, she realizes that she not only slept with her best friends little brother, she actually took his virginity! Leo isnt satisfied with it being a one-night stand, and they start having a completely sexual relationship. Will she be able to keep this from Mikan, and is it possible their relationship may grow to something more?

title: The Promise
genre: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Xi Ni
synopsis: Anno, a lower rank power user, made an escape plan from an underground research institute, but he encountered Jing Ye, a high rank power user who could cancel out his powers. He tried to avoid Jing Ye at all costs but their fates seemed to be intertwined.  Jing Ye destroyed all of his plans, stripped him of all his choices and even corrupted his rationality. With Jing Ye being so secretive and suspicious, will Anno choose to believe in him? Or will Anno choose freedom, and escape from that hellish place instead?

title: Hokenshitsu No Kagishimete
genre: Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life
author: Moji Fukiya
synopsis: Not found

title: Issho Ni Ken No Shugyou O Shita Osananajimi Ga Dorei Ni Natteita No De, S-Rank Boukensha No Boku Wa Kanojo O Katte Mamoru Koto Ni Shita
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Yoshihiro Minato
synopsis: S-Rank adventurer and second-generation sword saint, Ryunoa Styler, is reunited with his childhood friend, Aine, who has been reduced to slavery. Ryunoa purchases Aine in order to save her, however, she's been given a cursed collar that causes the wearer to go into 'heat' once a day...

title: Tenmaku No Jaadugar
genre: Award Winning, Historical, Military, Drama, Web Comic
author: Tomato Soup
synopsis: In the 13th century, Fatima, a captive of the Mongol Empire, the most powerful empire on earth, was taken prisoner and assigned to serve in the imperial palace. With knowledge from Iran, the era's foremost experts on medicine and science, Fatima seeks a world in which she can display her talents. She meets Töregene, the sixth wife of the second emperor, Ögedei, who has mixed feelings about the Mongol Empire....

title: This Man'S a Complete Dog
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yingmu Wenhua
synopsis: The love story between Song Hao Hao, a woman who sees lying men transform into dogs in her eyes, and a CEO who can transform into a Doberman.

title: Habatake Majutsu Sekai No Shitei Tachi!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Owari Heisei
synopsis:
For over a thousand years, humanity has been protected from the relentless invasions of monsters by the strongest grand mage, Ishtar, and her exceptional direct disciples.

However, among these disciples, only Gilberto led a self-indulgent, lazy lifestyle.

One day, Ishtar suddenly announces her retirement, and a young girl named Lapis appears, aspiring to become a disciple.

As one problem after another arises, Gilberto's peaceful days are turned upside down!

A heartwarming fantasy of mentorship and growth, filled with laughter and tears!

title: Only My Psycho
genre: Action, Psychological, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence
author: Wakaru Kiyoyasu
synopsis:
This is District A, somewhere in Asia, where skyscrapers and slums coexist in a chaotic mix.

Sakaki Takeru, who grew up in such a place, is scouted by an underworld organization's assassin squad and, under the guise of recruit training, becomes partners with Atonashi Isagi.

Upon their first meeting, Takeru fell for Isagi's looks, gentle personality, and the fact that he's still a virgin.

As a perfect match both professionally and physically, they seemed to be off to a smooth start.

Until "something" happened that provoked Isagi's wrath...

title: Denonbu
genre: Slice of Life, Music
author: Masamune Kuji
synopsis:
This is a story of girls who risk their youth!

Reina is a transfer student who came to Tokyo from Hokkaido.
Her reason coming to Tokyo is... ?EDM Club?, a club based on DJ activities!
But, the EDM Club that Reina dreamt about everyday is somehow not popular in her new school...?

In the near-future Tokyo, the girls' DJ battles are about to unfold!
A story driven by music, will now begin?

title: Haru Wa Megurite
genre: Adventure, Philosophical, Slice of Life
author: Takehito Moriizumi
synopsis: Haru is a middle schooler, travelling solo around the world. Join her on her travels, and experience all sorts of surprises and fresh sights.

title: To Quit Being a Demon
genre: Oneshot, Demons, Office Workers, Web Comic
author: Sang-Hyeok Lee
synopsis: Not found

title: Strand
genre: Drama
author: Yoshiharu Kataoka
synopsis: Four high school classmates, not exactly close friends, share moments that are both fun and irreplaceable, yet tinged with a quiet heartache they dont even realize. 'It feels like time has stopped.' Youth is both vibrant and muted. These are the daily lives of high schoolersand the strange twists in between. A story that explores the meaning of a small act of courage in an unconventional coming-of-age drama (Anti-Electric Parade) begins!

title: A Mark Against Thee
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, Mystery, Full Color
author: Tae-Ho Go
synopsis:
Innocent man framed for murder and sentenced to death. Released 17 years later after his name was cleared. The times have changed. Yeop has changed. His friends and family have changed. Nothing is the same anymore. The harsh reality surrounding him turned Yeop from a grateful young man to a stoic, skeptical person. And now, he wants to exact revenge on everything that worked together to ruin his life.

(Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: The Duke'S Everything
genre: Historical, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy
author: Yuta Umibara
synopsis: Tired of high society life in the capital, Ellia Green leaves for the port city of Charlestone at the request of her childhood friend, Tobias. There, she must find Tobias' reclusive older brother Dan, the Duke of Winselton, but he is nowhere to be seen. Instead, she finds a curious young boy, Eddy, an elaborate disguise the duke uses with his magic powers. Ellia soon ends up doting on cute little Eddy, but as the duke's feelings for Ellia grow, he wonders if he can ever reveal his true identity.

title: Watashi No Waltz
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life
author: Eke Shimamizu
synopsis:
One day a girl submissively becomes another's pet dog...
Just so you know it's not the lewd kind!

---

A oneshot submitted for the August 2018 issue of Gangan Joker but didn't make it to serialisation.

*Additional Retail:*
> [Rakuten Books](https://books.rakuten.co.jp/rb/15552828/)

title: Isshou Hatarakitakunai Ore Ga, Classmate No Daininki Idol Ni Natsukaretara
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation
author: Yumi Misaki
synopsis: Rintaro Shido, a high school student who aspires to become a full-time househusband, is in the class with a very popular idol, Rei Otosaki. The two have no connection other than being classmates, but their relationship changes drastically when Rintaro serves Rei a home-cooked meal after she nearly collapses from hunger! The food was so delicious that Rei said, "Can I come here every day to eat?"...?!

title: Vampire
genre: Romance, School Life, Vampires, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music, Gyaru
author: Se-Hyeong O
synopsis:
I am a hungry Vampire. I longed to suck the blood of my destined one, which is said to be the finest, but somehow I satisfied my hunger on social media as an internet influencer. But one day, I got a hateful comment--.

Based on the song Vampire by DECO*27

title: Yo Nimo Kahogo Na Maou-Sama
genre: Reincarnation, Demons, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Miko Senri
synopsis:
Sena Yamada is a second-year in high school. For various reasons, she lives alone. She manages to get by by holding down a part-time job. One day, when she was about to be cheated out of her money, she was rescued by a demon king! He told her that she is a reincarnation of a saint and even asked her to move in with him...??

The exciting life together of a hardworking JK and a pushy demon king is about to begin!

title: Akuma Wa Rozario Ni Kiss O Suru
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Supernatural
author: Akari Hino
synopsis:
Since his childhood, Yoshihiro Yoshinaga has faced countless challenges, distancing himself from the company of others and the possibility of forging friendships due to a persistent problem: being harassed by spirits from an early age.

This constant spectral presence has cast shadows over his life, weaving a web of misfortunes. However, the course of his life takes a drastic turn when a giant demon unexpectedly emerges intent on taking his life. In the midst of this crisis, a chance encounter with Alicia Baal, a beautiful nun residing within a church, becomes the catalyst for a radical transformation to his destiny.

title: City
genre: Thriller, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Office Workers, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Keiichi Arawi
synopsis: A new slapstick comedy series by Arawi Keiichi, author of Nichijou.    The manga centers on Nagumo, a penniless college student who moves to a town filled with bizarre people.  The original run was 13 volumes, ending with chapter 186 in Feb 2021.  Serialization was resumed in Dec 2024 for the upcoming anime..  [Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/city/)

title: Standard Heroes
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: O-Sot
synopsis: Let the standard adventure story of extremely normal(?) people begin!

title: Nightmare Maker
genre: Sci-Fi, Romance, Sexual Violence
author: Cuvie
synopsis: Uchida is a high school student genius who created a device that is supposed to make people have good dreams but he always had bad dreams when he tried it on himself. One day, he caught the school doctor sleeping at the clinic and decided to try the device on her. It turned out that it works surprisingly well on her and that she wanted to buy the device from him. He then tries it on his classmates and it became quite popular with the rest of the class as people start lining up to borrow it. Meanwhile, there is growing concern that users of the device are starting to have difficulties differentiating dreams from reality

title: Eroge Tensei: Unmei Ni Aragau Kane Buta Kizoku No Funtouki
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Nana Komado
synopsis:
I went to bed after completing the blockbuster eroge game that had become a trending topic in the past few days. When I woke up, I noticed something was different. Somehow, and for some reason, I got reincarnated in the initial stage of the same game that I was playing before.

The most concerning part was my character. I was playing the role of a character who challenges the hero and gets defeated. In addition, all the routes of this particular character have been confirmed death.

I got reincarnated as an underdog, and the situation is even worse, because someone has already defeated me in a duel. I cant escape death anymore. But I wont give up. I have the knowledge of the eroge game that I had cleared in my previous life. I will make full use of it and try to survive.

This is a story about our hero who got reincarnated as an eroge underdog character, and is trying his hardest to survive.

title: Nise Seiken Monogatari - Osananajimi No Seijo O Uttara Michizure Ni Sareta
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Nanakichi Kanimitsu
synopsis:
My childhood friend, Magary, was chosen to be the saint. From here on out, she'll have to maintain a smile at all times while at the royal capital and take lessons in etiquette and dance. She'll be living in an excruciatingly stifling world. Having been together since birth, there was naturally one thought in my mind.

While feeling a little bit of loneliness... I pushed my childhood friend (who was trying to escape with all her might with her arms still bound) towards the knight that came to pick her up.

"Alistaaaaaaaaaaaaar!!"
  
I feel as if there was some deep resentment in her voice, but that's probably just my imagination. As her last act of futile resistance, she had me see her off to the royal capital but, that ended without any problems.

"Now that that's over with, I'll be heading home. Good luck ^^"

I turned my back towards my childhood friend who looked me with deep resentment in her eyes. While I was making my way home... I had to turn around as I was chased by goblins.

"Noooooooo!! Someone, helpppppppp!!"

title: Sugar Meets Girl!
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Akihiro Shirano
synopsis:
A Sweet and Juicy Girls' Comedy~

Featuring:

Sato Kanna, daughter of a yakuza boss, she's known for being loyal to her friends and her slightly delinquent appearance.

And Mochizuki Mito, class president and the school's most envied upon young lady.

Just what unexpected secrets did these two girls found out about each other!?

title: Kimi Meku Yoru Ni Kogarete
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life
author: Rey
synopsis: At Saint Ruri Girl's Academy, there are two opposing factions: the "Ruri Class," consisting of refined, well-bred ladies, and the "Ai Class," made up of delinquents with poor behavior. Nanase Mitsuki, among the students of the Ai Class, is the most feared by the Ruri Class due to her intimidating appearance, though Mitsuki harbors a complex about her looks. One night, she meets Hosho Yuka, a young lady wandering alone at night...

title: Karma Karma
genre: Comedy, Supernatural
author: Mai Tanaka
synopsis:
The ten kings of the underworld judge the souls of the dead based on their deeds in life, but due to an incident, the leader of the ten kings, King Enma, accidentally let the souls of 108 violent criminals escape! King Shinkou comes to the human world to recapture the escaped souls, and runs into a young man named Onomura being chased by one...?

A non-stop hell comedy by Tanaka Mai, author and artist of "A Terrified Teacher at Ghoul School!"

title: Uragirareta S Rank Boukensha No Ore Wa, Aisuru Dorei No Kanojora to Tomoni Dorei Dake No Harem Guild O Tsukuru
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Akio Kawada
synopsis:
Egil, an S-rank adventurer who has lived hateful of "slave," falls in love with one slave at a slave auction he was forced to bring. She was Eleanor, the former third princess of the Kingdom of Cornelia. Eleanor, a slave to Egil, begs Egil to "kill my childhood friend who sold me to a slave trader!"  
Keep an eye on the estrus slaves if there is a chance! Can Egil rescue the body and mind of beautiful girl slaves and bring peace to this world!

title: Gokusen
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Mafia, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Kozueko Morimoto
synopsis:
Fresh out of college, Kumiko "Yankumi" Yamaguchi becomes a math teacher at an all-boys high school. 
Unfortunately for her, she's assigned by the school board as the homeroom teacher for 3-D, a class of delinquent students. 
When the class attempts to make a living hell out of Yankumi's career, they fail as her persistence and aggression gain her respect. 
However, little does anyone in the school know that Yankumi is actually heir to the Kuroda Ikkaone of Tokyo's most powerful yakuza clans.  
  
(Source: ANN)  
  


---

title: Zange
genre: Thriller, Crime, Gore, Horror
author: Santa Inoue
synopsis:
Normality can crumble in an instant.
Revisit Inoue Santa's wonderful DID killer No.13 in this beautifully illustrated killing spree.
**SEASON 1**:
Yamada Kiyoshi, a struggling family man with a strong sense of justice oversteps his bounds and attempts to stop a public disturbance. Unfortunately for him, he's caught himself in the crosshairs of a violent personality...

title: Soil
genre: Psychological, Crime, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Atsushi Kaneko
synopsis: Something strange is going on in "Soil New Town." The sudden disappearance of a seemingly normal family leads the two detectives Yokoi and Onoda to the idyllic town in the middle of nowhere. What looks like a routine case at first quickly turns into a complex and deadly riddle where nothing is what it seems to be. Will the two desperate investigators manage to solve the mystery before it's too late?

title: Character
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Police
author: Takashi Nagasaki
synopsis:
Cartoonization of topical movies. A parallel ending? What if an unsuccessful cartoonist sees the face of a murderer?
Moreover, what if he turns that face into a character and draws a manga that sells?
A beautiful pervert met by an inexperienced manga artist. When two people who shouldn't be able to see each other meet, it develops into a horrifying serial murder case. The topical movie starring Masaki Suda and Fukase (SEKAI NO OWARI) is chemicalized. Be sure to see the original ending of the manga version, which is different from the movie.

title: Scatter - Wish You Were Here
genre: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Drama, Supernatural
author: Hideki Arai
synopsis:
From the author of [The World is Mine](https://mangadex.org/manga/6002/).  
  
A young, unemployed, seemingly unmotivated young man is moving through his life. As a teenager, he and some of his friends formed a "Boyz 4 Men" club, which was based on a hatred of sex and women. As arguably the most opinionated member, his view of sexuality as an adult is far from normal. After a highly sexual encounter in a park at night, he has decided to attempt to draw perverted fetish manga. This brings him once again to the presence of a woman from the park, Sawada Kazumi. She's a manga editor and single mother with a perverted and intense personality of her own. What will happen when their worlds collide?

title: The Little Lady Behind the Villain
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: So-Eun
synopsis:
I possessed a character in a novel I had never finished writing when I was in high school. And then now I have the body of a supporting character instead of the main character. It was a seven-year-old orphan girl with no name Having to suffer the abuse of others, until I got really tired and ran away from that place. But I was captured and sold as a slave. I thought my life was over But the person who saved me was the novel's most prominent villain, Henriette.

He treats the emperor like a puppet. A person who has a reputation for being extremely cruel in the original and has a hobby of cutting the throat of aristocrats. Is he my biological father? But other than that terrible reputation, living with him wasnt bad either.

"Okay, my daughter. You can do whatever you want. If you want something, everyone in the family will do what you want."

Wait I didn't write a novel like that in the first place?

---

* [Japanese / ???](https://piccoma.com/web/product/131595)

title: Kuroi Santa Yori
genre: Oneshot, Crime, Drama
author: 2 Miya
synopsis: Note: Won an honorable mention for Shonen Magazine's 111th upcoming mangaka awards.

title: Buta No Fukushuu
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Survival, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Sau Nitou
synopsis:
After rampant bullying, high school boy Takeshi Hirota kills himself and is transported to another another world, where he is accepted by the orcs due to his appearance.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot Web](https://web.mangahot.jp/works/detail.php?work_code=z_R0185)
**Alt Official English:** [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/revenge-of-the-pig-manga/803/)

title: Ice Blade
genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Police, Mystery
author: Tsutomu Takahashi
synopsis: Kyoya Ida is a hard-nosed detective from the Shinjuku Police precinct. He is known in the force as an unreasonable type who would use lethal force to solve cases, making him unpopular with the enlisted and high-ranking officers in the National Police Agency. Despite this fact, there are some in the force that admire Ida for his bravery and cleverness in using lethal force to solve criminal cases whenever legal means are met in a dead end.

title: Huvahh
genre: Oneshot, Horror
author: Q Hayashida
synopsis: Oneshot that appeared in the Shadows of the Damned artbook (which Hayashida contributed designs to), starring George Reed.

title: Trinity Seven: Liese Chronicle
genre: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Kenji Saitou
synopsis: The story centers on Lieselotte Sherlock, an evil mage from the original manga

title: Bad Police
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Police, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Tetsuya Saruwatari
synopsis:
This is a no-holds-barred story about an ex-biker gang leader turned cop, Kenji Date. 
Operating under the nickname Hyena, Date rubs pretty much everybody within the police force 
the wrong way as he goes about his business ridding the city of all its scum.  
  
Bad Police also contains two separate short stories at the end of the volume:  
  
**Bomber**  
The Chinese leader, Deng Xiaoping, had promised to rid Hong Kong of its criminal organizations. One of the places they migrated to was Japan. Kamon Shou is a delinquent who just got released from Youth Detention after spending two years there and is about to feel first-hand the effect the Hong Kong mob has on Japan.  
  
**Artemis**  
Ginko is a detective working for the famed Holmes Detective Agency, an agency that takes on the most dangerous of jobs: ones that even the police wouldn't even think about doing. She gets hired by Ms. Nancy to retrieve her seven year-old son, Tom. Tom was taken away by her father-in-law's mafia organization in hopes of cultivating Tom to become the next leader.

title: Kiss Wood
genre: Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy
author: Sung-Ho Ahn
synopsis: After losing his job as a city gardener, the main character only seems to care about one thing, his home garden full of rare plants. But when a mysterious man burns down his garden and home, the protagonist barely manages to escape alive. When he wakes up in the hospital, he learns he has lost his eyesight. With nothing left, the man just lies in the hospital bed with seemingly no hope left, until the sudden regaining of his eyesight causes him to realise he has been transported to a strange new world covered in a mystical forest.

title: Imouto No Tomodachi Ga Nani Kangaeteru No Ka Wakaranai
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Rei.
synopsis: My sister's friend Tsuyu-chan is a quiet girl who and I can't figure out what she is thinking. However, it doesn't seem that I'm much disliked Acclaimed as "cute" on SNS! Daily popular short love comedy with a total of 1.1 million likes.

title: Three Years Apart
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mujirushi Shimazaki
synopsis:
Mizuki and Kazuya, childhood friends, are 3 years apart.  
It's not really a so-called "Age Gap" but that makes some distance between them during their youth.  
From their childhood to the present, the story will be told about these two who are 3 years apart.  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Artists Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=596062)  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Artists Twitter](https://twitter.com/shimazakikazumi)

title: Akairo Crossroads
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Natsumi Hino
synopsis:
Is being unable to see the red string of fate better?!  
Since the encounter on the day of the high school entrance ceremony, dog-like boy, Makita Keita and cat-like girl, Ohara Tamaki have had the worst relationship.  
The story starts to progress when the both of them are put in the same class.  
A little mysterious heart racing school youth graffiti begins!

title: Robo Maid
genre: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Kazuki Shiina
synopsis:
The daily life of a man and his robo maid.
___
Last updated in April 2023 with Chapter 11 (what's currently wrongly numbered as Chapter 10).

title: Tsurenai Kanojo No Hitorijime
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Sugar Amazato
synopsis: A story of youth and sensuality. A thrilling real high school love story! High schooler Nachi Shinohara is a social butterfly. He can get along with anyone. On the other hand, there's the lone wolf, Takizawa Yuuri. A chance exchange of words leads to a relationship that no one knows about.

title: Boku Wa Tomodachi Ga Sukunai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Itachi
synopsis:
**The Geeks shall Inherit the Earth!**
  
Recent high school transfer student Hasegawa Kodaka is pathetically inept at making friends. When he comes across the brash loner Mikazuki Yozora, who typically chats with her imaginary friend, the two outsiders become the unlikeliest of allies. Realizing that they have no hope of a normal social life, the two outcasts decide to form a group called The Neighbors Club in order to make friends and maybe even learn a thing or two about social skills.

title: Lady in the Bad School
genre: Action, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents
author: Numa Egaki
synopsis: A sweet young lady transfers to a highly notorious high school for delinquents!? In pursuit of her ideal delinquent, the young lady, who aims to be at the top, beats up the scums one after the other in this fresh and exhilarating action story!

title: Psycho Party
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Supernatural
author: Hiro Nagasawa
synopsis:
Welcome to the world of psychics.

A certain incident has led to a world where psychics are considered dangerous. In the midst of this, a girl named Hibana unexpectedly blossoms a powerful psychic ability. Some try to protect her, some try to use her, and others try to get rid of her... Unaware of her true power, right or left, various thoughts and feelings become entangled around her.

title: Tokyo Innocent
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Naru Narumi
synopsis: With the destiny of searching for a bride, the youkai teenage boy came to Tokyo from a small island: Hanzou. A maiden who develops a youkai-atracting constitution at 16: Ichijouji Mei. With the youkai's heaven "Tokyo" as its stage, Girl-Meets-Monster love comedy.

title: Osoto Gohan Wo Goisshoni
genre: Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Hazuki
synopsis:
Fuuka, a college student who enjoys cooking but is confined by her apartment's small kitchen, meets Yomogi, a wild outdoor girl who isn't particularly good at cooking. Their outdoorsy meal that started by chance is somehow very delicious and heartwarming....

This is the start of a gourmet outdoor manga about two women helping each other out!

title: Toy Doll
genre: Romance, Drama
author: Yumi Tada
synopsis: We are in the States - Michelle is a prostitute with a child picks clients every day on the streets, while Chris, her teenager husband and the father of the baby, babysits. This is the story of their aimless days. A masterpiece about the joys and sorrows of love.

title: Love After World Domination
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero
author: Hiroshi Noda
synopsis:
In the eyes of the public, Fudou Aikawa and Desumi Magahara are sworn enemies who have nothing in common. Fudou, also known as Red Gelato, is the leader of the hero squadron Gelato 5, whose mission is to bring about world peace. On the other hand, Desumi is the minion leader of Gecko, a villainous organization seeking world domination. However, despite these differences, their relationship is not quite what it seems. When they are not making a show of being at each others throats, Desumi and Fudou continue to pursue a forbidden love.

Going on dates, baking sweets for one another, and meeting up as often as they can despite their hectic schedules, the two inexperienced lovebirds pave the way for their own unique relationship. Though their public lives are worlds apart, Fudou and Desumi will stop at nothing to make their seemingly impossible romance work.

title: Moto Maou-Sama No Nangoku Slow Life - Buka Ni Uragirareta No De, Mofumofu-Tachi to Tanoshiku Slow Life Suru No Ja
genre: Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Tsubasa Takabane
synopsis: Ragurindo Jenerufu Korasoda, the overworked Demon Queen, had enough. After an assassination attempt and a betrayal by her underlings, she faked her death and escaped to a tropical paradise. There, among palm trees and beaches, she found a herd of adorable, fluffy slime creatures. Life as an ex-Demon Queen had never been so sweet.

title: Shaman King Flowers
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Hiroyuki Takei
synopsis:
Takes place 10 years after the end of Shaman King Kang Zeng Bang and focuses on the life of Hana in his teenage years.  
Hana's Epoch (Oneshot), was originally released in the Mentalite fanbook. It is not considered canon at this time in the Shaman King universe.

title: Shaman King - Remix Track
genre: Comedy, Supernatural
author: Hiroyuki Takei
synopsis: "A collection of short manga (ranging from 3 to 7 pages) found at the end of the Shaman King Remix volumes. They take a much more light-hearted look at the lives of the Shaman King characters after KZB chapter 299." (Mankin-trad)

title: Mietemasu Yo! Aizawa-San
genre: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Horror, Supernatural
author: Doroshii Odoroo
synopsis:
Michi, plagued forever by her ability to see ghosts, pretends like she can't in order to avoid them at all costs. But recently she found a ghost she just can't ignore: Aizawa Honami, ex-classmate and ex-member of the famous idol group De:LPhinus, hanging around school from some lingering attachment.

Still, no matter what ghost it is, Michi's not getting involved. Though while she steels her heart, her eyes keep coming back to Honami's bizarre antics and passionate fanservice...(?)

title: Delivery Cinderella
genre: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: NON
synopsis: Yamada Masami is just an ordinary college student; however, she has a secret. At night, just like magic, she transforms into the beautiful Deriheru Miyabi. A modern Cinderella story now begins.

title: Shin Tokyo
genre: Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Kenji Sakaki
synopsis: According to urban legend, the guilty are sentenced to fall to the Tokyo Underworld. There, they are given no mercy and are mercilessly judged for their crimes in the cruelest ways imaginable!

title: Onegai, Nugashite.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural
author: Yasushi Kawanaka
synopsis:
There is a curse on this school. It prevents the person who commits "impure acts" from taking off his or her panties. Only the right hand of the protagonist can break the curse and remove the panties, his name is Kamite.

Kamite tells the girls that they have been cursed and that he can take off their panties, but... obviously it is almost unacceptable for them to have any man take them off...!

This is how the girls end up in a lot of trouble. But if the panties are not removed, they can get into even more trouble...

title: 17-Sai Kara Yarinaosu Propose
genre: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life
author: Hiroshi Itaba
synopsis:
*I wish I had liked you when I was a high school student *
Osamus girlfriend refused his proposal with these mysterious words. After that, in an accident, he time-leaps back to his high school days. 
He was trying to find her and make her fall in love with him again, but when he met her she had a twin sister! ??

title: Mainichi Ie Ni Kuru Gal Ga Kyorikan Zero Demo Yasashiku Nai
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru
author: Kuronyan
synopsis: Class queen Manami Fuwa has been gaining weight lately. To make matters worse, a rival girl is taunting her in class, calling her a "kin-nikuman" (golden meat bun). When Taichi Utsuki can't contain his thoughts about her weight, he's forced to accompany Fuwa on her diet!

title: The Fallen Saint Dances in Vortex of War
genre: Action, Demons, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Atoha
synopsis:
Alicia has been fighting against the demon king's army and protecting the kingdom as a saint.
One day, she is falsely accused of having an affair with her fiancé, the prince, and is publicly executed.
Abused by the people of the kingdom and despairing of the malice of the people, Alicia makes a final wish.


"I'll kill you all"
"And destroy this country"
She wishes for the death of everyone.

Alicia was supposed to have died in this way, but when she realized it, she was brought back to life by the demon king.
"Haha, now I can kill them all."

The curtain rises on the vengeance of the saintly woman who has been revived from execution...!

Web Novel Raw Link - https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1179he/

title: Ghost Hunt
genre: Psychological, Ghosts, Comedy, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Shiho Inada
synopsis:
The decrepit building was condemned long ago, but every time the owners try to tear it down, "accidents" start to happen-people get hurt, sometimes even killed. Mai Taniyama and her classmates have heard the rumors that the creepy old high school is haunted-possibly by ghosts from the Second World War. So one rainy day they gather at the old school to tell ghost stories, hoping to attract one of the suspected spirits.  
  
No ghosts materialize, but Mai and her friends do meet Kazuya Shibuya, the handsome young owner of Shibuya Psychic Research, who's been hired to investigate paranormal activity at the school. Also at the scene are an exorcist, a Buddhist monk, a woman who can speak with the dead, and an outspoken Shinto priestess. Surely one of them will have the talents to solve this mystery!

title: Furetai Wa Koi No Hajimari
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life
author: Kumoko
synopsis:
Kaede Minato, the cool literature girl, is admired by her classmates for her elegant appearance. Momoko Hattori, a cute girl with an adorable face, quickly became an idol among her peers shortly after she entered high school.

Despite having little connection, they quickly grow closer after Momoko finds Kaede in a particular situation...

A story of two girls experiencing a love that is not quite love yet.

title: Akuyaku Reijou No Shitsuji-Sama
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Shoubu
synopsis:
Regaining the memories of his previous life, Cyril realised he was reincarnated as the butler of Sophia, an otome game villain. At the rate things were going, Sophia would eventually have the prince stolen away from her by the heroine, fall into darkness, and be executed.

Wanting to save the villainous daughter he was so fond of, Cyril moved to eliminate all the factors that would cause her to fall into darkness, raising her up to be a talented and beautiful girl who could win the princes love. However...

title: Maid Wa Koisuru Hachiya-Kun
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing
author: Chihiro Komori
synopsis: After confessing to my beloved Hanazono-san, I was rejected with the reason, 'I already have an engagement arranged by my parents.' That person is the wealthy and handsome Ikegai-kun, who also happens to have a good personality. Thinking that I had no chance in a straightforward competition, I, Hachiya, decided to cross-dress as a maid and work at the Ikegai house. My plan is to make Ikegai-kun fall for me and break their engagement... Thus begins a slightly silly, cross-dressing maid's comedy that leads to a chaotic love triangle (?)

title: Chronicle of the Searing Winds of Tianzhu
genre: Historical, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Adaptation
author: Yoshiki Tanaka
synopsis: The manga tells a fictional version of the story of historical Tang China diplomat Wang Xuance, centering on his diplomatic journey from Tang Dynasty China to the Empire of Harsha in India in the 7th century CE. When he comes upon a crumbling empire that is now hostile to him he escapes to Tibet and raises a confederation of Tang, Nepalese, and Tibetan soldiers to mount a raid on the Empire of Harsha.

title: I'M a Villain, but I'M Favored
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dau
synopsis:
"Damn this world, let it burn!"

A single exasperated cry while succumbing to overwork. But instead of dying, I woke up inside the game Id been playing. As compensation for the hellish life I endured, I gained a unique ability to view information about people and objects. Determined to use this skill to lead a peaceful, carefree life, my resolve was interrupted by an unexpected *system message*:

[To a player who has suffered immensely and wishes for the world's downfall,  
the system grants the chance to fulfill that desire.]

<MAIN QUEST>
Destroy the world.

What?! I didnt mean it literally! Fine. If this is how its going to be, Im not backing down. Lets see who gives up first!

title: I Am in the Same Class as the Crazy Male Leads
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Hae-Min
synopsis:
"On an Unbelievably Unlucky Day, I Got Hit by a Truck and Woke Up to Find Myself in the Crazy Novel I Wrote Back in High School.

And its filled with nothing but utterly unhinged male leads!

Theres Kang Seonwoo, the top student with impeccable manners but secretly a psychopath.  
Cha Ihan, the rough-looking delinquent with puppy-like charm, yet an obsessive clingy maniaconly for the heroine.  
And Kim Chanseung, a promising national swimmer... who also happens to be a stalker!

What was I even thinking when I wrote this back in high school?!

I just need to stay far away from these lunatics and live quietly!  

But life never goes the way you want it to, does it...?

"Let me know if theres something you dont like. I want to get closer to you."  
A friend request from the psychopath.  
"Arent you too close to those boys? Isnt that a bit much for someone so conservative?"  
Jealousy from the misdirected obsessive.  
"Here, take this."  
And protein-flirting from the national swimmer-stalker.

What is wrong with all of them?! Why are they like this with me?!

Can I... actually survive here...?"

title: Only Show Yourself to Me
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life
author: Nekohariko22
synopsis: Not found

title: Over Rev!
genre: Action, Sports
author: Katsumi Yamaguchi
synopsis:
Over Rev! is a manga about a senior graduate named Ryouko. A while back, she injured her ankle in a track meet. Since then, she didn't know what to do with her life, until she finds out about street racing

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Over Rev** (2008)

title: Loss of Lines
genre: Adventure, Self-Published, Philosophical, Fantasy
author: utu
synopsis: Not found

title: Love Your Love Enemy
genre: Romance, Boys' Love
author: Wataru Nanatsuno
synopsis: I hate him, but I want this face all to myself! Yousuke and Daichi, students at the same university, are romantic rivals for Mitsuru. However, as a result of a stratagem of Mitsurus, they get locked in a room and cant leave until they have sex! The two love rivals. Yosuke kisses Daichi in an attempt to tease him, but to his surprise, Daichi has such a sexy reaction!?

title: Koukyuu Wo Tsuihousareta Kitai No Akujo Wa Rikyuu De Aiken Wo Mofumofu Shitetai
genre: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Machibari
synopsis: Jelun (Jie Lun) is the emperor of Yauzu (Yang Zi), an abundant country blessed by the protection of a divine beast. As a result of her father's' military achievements, Li Lanlei (Li Lan Ling) is appointed as one of the emperor's consorts. However, owing to her naturally sour countenance that easily gets her misunderstood, she has yet to see the emperor even once in the year that she has been living in the palace. One day, she is falsely accused of poisoning Meihi, another one of the emperor's consorts, and ends up being banished to the cold palace. Though she is banished on false charges, a surprisingly fun lifestyle was waiting before her?!

title: Lost Man
genre: Romance, Sports, Drama
author: Michiteru Kusaba
synopsis: There lives a man who has lost his memory and cant remember where hes from, and who he is, including his name. He just goes by the name Matsumoto and the one and only thing he remembers is how to play soccer. However, the one thing he does remember, he does exceptionally well, even better than the professionals. He sells his ridiculous soccer skills to teams and guarantees them goals and, even more important, wins. As he travels from city to city, country to country playing for money, he hopes that he regains his memory.

title: Mahouka Koukou No Rettousei - Escape-Hen
genre: Action, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Yuzuki N'
synopsis: Adaption of Light Novel 24-25.

title: Armor Amour
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Tokio Shima
synopsis: Yuji's girlfriend Misaki may seem hard and cold on the outside, but inside she's actually soft and loving. As they prepare for their high school entrance exams, Misaki decides that they should temporarily cut off all their dating activities. Will they be able to study hard enough through this period to get into the same high school?

title: Maou Tsukai No Saikyou Shihai
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kazuki Sorano
synopsis: For incompetence, Lewin, a Demon-Tamer adventurer, was banished from the hero's party. Without being acknowledged for his achievements as a commanding officer... However, the moment he comes into contact with Sasha, the Demon King of Death, one of the sealed Seven Demon Kings, he awakens to become a Demon King with the ability to subjugate Demon Kings! Moreover, by shattering the seal, he tames the Demon King, Sasha Lewin, backed by Sasha, succeeds in drawing out the Demon King's power and works to subdue all Demon Kings, the root of the strife between the humans and the demons.

title: If the Villainess and Villain Met and Fell in Love
genre: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Don Haruna
synopsis:
Despite being from a prestigious noble family, Bridget, a failed daughter who made a contract with the weakest spirit, one day had her engagement broken off by the third prince, Joseph.

However, no one sympathized with her, who was acting as a proud daughter at the behest of Joseph... At that time, Bridget meets the Duke's son Yuri, who is feared by those around him because of his overwhelming ability and cold personality.

Two people who hate each other and repel each other. However, the encounter gradually changes their destinies. This is the story of a villainess who is despised for being incompetent and a villain who is shunned for being a genius who eventually fall in love.

---
Despite her noble status, Brigitte contracts with the weakest type of spiritand on that very same day, the prince publicly breaks off their engagement. No one shows much sympathy towards the once haughty young ladyexcept for the duke's son, Yuri, who attends the same magic academy. Yuri is feared for his incredible abilities and icy personality, but with him on her side, her fortunes might have changed

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426830814673), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9923hb/)

title: Salt and Pepper
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Full Color
author: Soi
synopsis: Min Hu Chu, a guy who lives to eat and So Geum Ji, a girl who eats to live. Theyre both childhood friends but with complete different opinions on the purpose of food. Focusing on these two characters, introducing a story that includes recipes to make alone(?) and their campus life(!) The author of Second Lead Complex, Sois beginning of a new series!

title: Sekai O Sukutta Saikyou Yuusha Ni Stalker Sareru Mura Musume No Hanashi
genre: Monsters, Psychological, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Horror, Fantasy
author: Jun Shiosato
synopsis: Not found

title: Haru No Regista
genre: Sports, Girls' Love, School Life
author: Tsuchii
synopsis:
Once hailed as a soccer prodigy, high school girl Arai Haru transferred to a school far from her hometown, hoping to start a new life away from soccer. However, a new student, Osanai Satsuki, who admired Haru's past glory, appeared before her and declared her intention to join the Soccer Club, which is on the verge of disbandment. This is a girls' soccer story about a girl who gave up her dream and a girl who chases after it!
___
**What is a regista?**
The regista is a creative player who operates in front of the defense, almost always in a central position, and looks to get on the ball as often as possible. They are responsible for providing the link between defense and offense, and controlling the tempo of the game through their passing. The regista is also known as the deep-lying playmaker: they retain their deep position and dictate their team's play with their distribution. ([Coaches' Voice](https://www.coachesvoice.com/cv/what-is-a-regista-explained-jorginho-andrea-pirlo/))

title: Bombergirl
genre: Genderswap, Loli, Comedy, Monster Girls, Web Comic
author: Makoto Niwano
synopsis: Sporadically posted comic pages on the official twitter of the Bombergirl arcade game.

title: My Daddy Hides His Power
genre: Reincarnation, Official Colored, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Meongi
synopsis:
Q: Describe your feelings upon discovering your trusted dad isnt just an extra.
A: W-what the heck... Give me back my Random Imperial Citizen #1 life...

Living in a world of constant war365 days of chaosa simple, extra's existence was a blessing.
At least, that's what I thought.

In a small village, I enjoyed a humble life with my loving, ordinary father, James Brown, 27, the epitome of an unremarkable single dad.

Or so I believed.

Ladies and gentlemen, presenting my father! The quintessential symbol of extras everywhere! Brown hair, brown eyes, plain and simple!
...
This man screams background character, living a quiet life chopping wood in a mountain village with his adorable daughter. Right? ...RIGHT?

The knight commander merely stared at me in silence.

And then, the unthinkable happened.

Behind me, my fathers worn staff began to glow with a strange, blue aura.

...Dad?

Before I could process what was happening, his unassuming brown hair and eyes shifted. Slowly but surely, they transformed into...

Shimmering silver locks and piercing blue eyespractically shouting Im the protagonist!

WHAT?!

My simple, extra life shattered into a million pieces as my dadno, this mysterious powerhousegripped his weapon and snarled:
Give me back my daughter, you bastard.

title: Kaminagashijima ~Rinne No Miko~
genre: Monsters, Action, Survival, Gore, Horror, Mystery
author: Takashi Sougetsu
