synopsis: Survive, Girls---!! High-school student Amane Miko is a famous miko in her hometown. One day, she gets involved in a strange traffic accident and finds herself waking up in a world filled with grotesque looking monsters roaming around...!! The constant fear of those monsters attacking!! However, to solve the mysteries of this world, Miko advances through this world of despair. Cooperating with the other surviving girls to escape this solitary island in the distant sea in this Panic Horror Action!

title: 3-Gumi No Osananajimi
genre: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Itonoko
synopsis: Depicts the journey of three sets of childhood friends - 'childhood friends with a physical difference,' 'childhood friends who are conscious of height differences,' and 'childhood friends with an age gap' - until they start dating.

title: Black Lagoon
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Office Workers, Military, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
author: Rei Hiroe
synopsis: The story follows a team of mercenaries known as Lagoon Company, who smuggle goods in and around the seas of Southeast Asia. Their base of operations is located in the fictional city of Roanapur in Thailand, and they transport goods in the PT boat Black Lagoon. Lagoon Company does business with various clients, but has a particularly friendly relationship with the Russian crime syndicate Hotel Moscow. The team takes on a variety of missions - which may involve violent firefights, hand-to-hand combat, and nautical battles - in various Southeast Asian locations.

title: Gangsta
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Mafia, Military, Gore, Drama, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Kohske
synopsis: In the city of Ergastulum, a shady ville filled with made men and petty thieves, whores on the make and cops on the take, there are some deeds too dirty for even its jaded inhabitants to touch. Enter the Handymen, Nic and Worick, who take care of the jobs no one else will handle. Until the day when a cop they know on the force requests their help in taking down a new gang muscling in on the territory of a top Mafia family. It seems like business (and mayhem) as usual, but the Handymen are about to find that this job is a lot more than they bargained for.

title: Xxxholic
genre: Psychological, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: CLAMP
synopsis: Watanuki Kimihiro is haunted by visions of ghosts and spirits. Seemingly by chance, he encounters a mysterious witch named Yuuko, who claims she can help. In desperation, he accepts, but realizes that he's just been tricked into working for Yuuko in order to pay off the cost of her services. Soon he's employed in her little shop- a job which turns out to be nothing like his previous work experience!

title: Sketchbook
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Totan Kobako
synopsis: Sketchbook revolves around a group of high school students who are members of the art club at their school. The plot follows a slice of life style via the students' experiences at school through the club. The main character is a young shy, and quiet girl named Sora Kajiwara who goes through life at her own pace. She tends to look at the little things in life, and is often at awe of the more simpler things. Sora knows several stray cats around her town and has given them names.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam Seed Destiny - the Edge: Desire
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Mecha, Drama
author: Chimaki Kuori
synopsis: The world of *The Edge* that could not be depicted only from Athrun's point of view is presented in this fascinating omnibus work!

title: Ijimete Aishite
genre: Romance, Boys' Love
author: Noriko Kihara
synopsis: What I'm looking for is not stability but "stimulation". "The bite mark you put on me, it's gone, hasn't it?"Hina, who runs a detective agency, meets Seishi, a clerk at a coffee shop near his new office.Hina is intrigued by his rebellious attitude and charming demeanor and frequents the coffee shop.Kiyoshi, who runs the store by himself, gradually begins to open up to Hina, who has become a regular customer.One night, Hina notices this and, as a thank-you, begins to touch Kiyoshi in a lewd manner...

title: Shin Kirari
genre: Drama, Slice of Life
author: Murasaki Yamada
synopsis:
A celebrated masterwork shimmering with vulnerability from one of alt-manga's most important female artists.

"Now that we've woken from the dream, what are we going to do?" Chiharu thinks to herself, rubbing her husband's head affectionately.

Set in an apartment complex on the outskirts of Tokyo, Murasaki Yamada's Talk to My Back (1981-84) explores the fraying of Japan's suburban middle-class dreams through a woman's relationship with her two daughters as they mature and assert their independence, and with her husband, who works late and sees his wife as little more than a domestic servant.

(Source: Drawn & Quarterly)

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Martial Arts, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Gege Akutami
synopsis:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, he soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...

title: Moto Azadarake No Kanojo Ga Shinpai De
genre: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Tsuniya Kuga
synopsis: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

title: Gokigenyou, Ikkyoku Ikaga?
genre: Traditional Games, Comedy, Video Games, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Tsukasa Unohana
synopsis: At a prestigious girls' school, Sae, a shy high schooler didn't fit in with her classmates. Her daily routine during lunch break consists of playing her Mahjong game on her phone. Due to her hobby being maybe too old-fashioned, she kept it a secret, until she was found out by her class' charismatic rich lady, Chise! Will they with their diametrically different personalities get along through playing Mahjong...?

title: Hakoiri Ojou-Sama to Shoumin Na Ore No Yaritai 100 No Koto
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Monika Kaname
synopsis:
Sanada Yuki, meets Tenkoin Junna, a young lady who ran away from home because she hates her life without freedom. He gives her a notebook and advises her to write down what she wants to do and together they will make it happen, but then she gets picked up by the police. Yuki wants to be by Junna's side even if they live in different worlds!

*"I want a friend" 
"I want to hold your hand" 
"I want to be your lover."*

title: Me-Teru No Kimochi
genre: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Hiroya Oku
synopsis: Koizumi Shintarou is 30 years old, a virgin, and has isolated himself in his room for 15 years. He has become a burden on his father, Koizumi Yasujirou. One day, Shintarou makes a proposition that if Yasujirou gets a girlfriend, Shintarou will come out of his room. It turns out that Yasujirou has already got a girlfriend, a young beautiful woman, Yoshinaga Haruka, who is with Yasujirou for her own personal reasons. Yasujirou and Haruka decide to get married, but Yasujirou dies on their honeymoon. Now Haruka decides to take care of Shintarou, and so this weird "mother and son" duo are now living together.

title: Mairimashita! Iruma-Kun: Kalego Gaiden
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy
author: Osamu Nishi
synopsis: A special, two-part side story manga set in the world of *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun*, focusing on Naberius Kalego during his days as a student of Babyls Demon School.

title: Tripeace
genre: Action, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, Tragedy
author: Maru Tomoyuki
synopsis:
Nana, handsome amnesiac youth who has long fair hair and a strong sense of justice, attempts to bring peace to the world. To do so, he attained a Tri-peace operative number (102078) in an organisation of people who stop wars and encourage peace.  
Faced with danger and perpetual doubt in whether or not he can truly get the world to be at peace using his good disguise (crossdressing as Nanako), he strives to stop all wars.

title: Kindaichi Case Files
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Shin Kibayashi
synopsis:
Kindaichi (frequently with best-bud, Miyuki) travels to various places where a murder has taken place, typically involving ghosts, curses, myths and folklore of significant events from the distant past, and solves the mystery using ingenious deductions of curious clues and his cool magic.  
  
Serialized in Kodansha's Weekly Shounen Magazine from 1992-1997.  
  
Case List:   
1. Opera House Murder Case.  
2. Ijinkan Village Murder Case.  
3. Snow Yaksha Legend Murder Case.  
4. School's Seven Mysteries Murder Case.  
5. Isle of Hidden Treasure Murder Case.  
6. Legend of Broken Heart Lake Murder Case.  
7. Ijinkan Hotel Murder Case.  
8. Head Hanging School Murder Case.  
9. Headless Samurai Murder Case.  
10. Kindaichi the Killer.  
11. Tarot Mountain Hut Murder Case.  
12. Castle of Wax Murder Case.  
13. Gentleman Thief the Killer.  
14. Graveyard Island Murder Case.  
15. Magical Express Murder Case.  
16. The Black Butterfly of Death Murder Case.  
17. French Silver Coin Murder Case.  
18. Demon God Site Murder Case.  
19. Reika Hayami Kidnapping Murder Case.  
  
Note: In the newer reprints of the Kindaichi series, the File, Case and Shin cases were merged and printed as full cases instead of the original tankobon. The volumes which correspond to the above cases are 01-19. The raw links below correspond to the first chapter of the first case of the File Series.

title: The Big Bees
genre: Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Yukari Nekota
synopsis: What if bees were big and fluffy? Like, really big and fluffy.

title: Careless
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Doudou
synopsis: The hilarious lives of the Underworld's office slaves.

title: I Was Stuck on the Same Day for 100,000 Years
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Dongfang
synopsis: Lin Yue crossed to the Hongmeng Continent, but he was accused of being on the same day for one hundred thousand years. No matter how he struggles, he will return to yesterday after dawn. In one hundred thousand years, Lin Yue learned all the knowledge, understood the secrets of countless sect powerhouses, and gradually admitted that he could not escape the cycle of reincarnation. However, on the last day of one hundred thousand years, Lin Yue took away the Seven Demon Kings Fiancee, cut off the arm of the son of the Supreme Elder. After a catastrophe, he found that a new day had opened for him

title: My Daughter Is a Dragon!
genre: Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Sum
synopsis: Graduate student Kim Jihoon's life is turned upside-down when the long-lost daughter he didn't know he had turns up on his doorstep. After he takes in his daughter Chaerin at her mother's request, Jihoon's life takes a surprising turn for the better. Things start going his way at school, and even his eyesight improves. Although parenting a precocious 7-year-old is a handful, Jihoon loves his little girl, and life is better than ever. It's almost as if there's some magical force at work...

title: Daisuki No Charge
genre: Oneshot, Romance
author: Nichiho Higuchi
synopsis: A short, cute oneshot about a tennis club manager and her boyfriend, the tennis' ace Eita.

title: Erotical Wizard to 12-Nin No Hanayome
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Hikaru Taiyou
synopsis:
Junpei Ichinose, a student at a magic school in Tokyo, is a dropout who has never discovered his magic aptitude. Suddenly, the beautiful witch Meryl appears before him and tells him, "I need your power, the reincarnation of the Demon King". Junpei finds out that he has the power of the Demon King. He learns that he has the power of the Demon King, and his secret is revealed to Sonia, a beautiful girl who is a descendant of a brave warrior. Junpei, who has no intention of becoming a Demon King, persuades Sonia to teach him how to use his power properly. However, the Demon King's power is the strongest and worst "erotic magic"!

The harem school battle to master H-magic with beautiful girls is about to begin!

title: The Apocalypse of Devilman - Strange Days
genre: Action, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Gou Nagai
synopsis: Some more stuff to add to the Devilman mythos. This is Kinutani Yuu's second story about NAGAI Go's work.

title: Robopon
genre: Action, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Shota
author: Atsushi Shimoda
synopsis:
Based on the video game of the same name by Hudson Soft & Red Company, this manga follows the story of a boy who finds a robot and uses him to battle against other robots.

Note: Numbering is based on both Greatest and Specialist Editions (combines 1 & 2)

title: Hitori Camp Shitara Isekai Ni Teni Shita Hanashi
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Haruchika
synopsis: Kaede, an office worker, is on a solo camping trip in the mountains to heal from a broken heart, when she finds herself in another world. At first, she is intimidated by the strange demons she has never seen before, but she gradually grows stronger and tougher. Fenrir and fairies also become her friends. Kaede's camp life in another world, where she has a steel mentality, has just begun!

title: Karasu Wa Aruji Wo Erabanai
genre: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Natsumi Matsuzaki
synopsis:
Yamauchi - a fantastic world where the Yatagarasu, a race of three-legged crows with the ability to transform into humans, live. Yukiya, a young Yatagarasu, is appointed as the personal attendant of the eccentric Crown Prince Wakamiya. Soon, he is entangled in a web of conspiracies attempting to overthrow the heir to the Imperial throne. 

An adaptation of the second book of the award-winning <Yatagarasu> novel series by Chisato Abe. The first book has been licensed in English as [A Raven for All Seasons](https://mangadex.org/title/c22db5fc-726a-41ad-8402-5537e7de2277/karasu-ni-hitoe-wa-niawanai) by [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10162/episode/336576).

title: Portus
genre: Thriller, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Jun Abe
synopsis:
17-year-old high school student Asami Kawakami's friend, Chiharu, has stopped answering her phone and never comes to school anymore. She would rather spend her time playing Portus, an old videogame. There is an urban legend that there is a secret level where a boy appears and asks if you want to go to the other side. If you say yes, you die. When Chiharu cuts her own throat, Asami and the art club teacher, Keigo Sawa, set out to find out the truth behind the legend and Chiharu's suicide.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/portus)

title: Koi Wa Iikara Nemuritai!
genre: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Shiharu
synopsis: A story about a guy who just wants to sleep and an annoying kouhai who won't let him.

title: Bake Kitsune No Shuushin
genre: Oneshot, Monsters, School Life, Supernatural
author: Takumi  Sumida
synopsis: Mythical kitsune Yuugo Izumo is obsessed with scaring the unscarable Kamogawa using his transformation magic! But what lessons about deception and hiding one's true self will both of them learn when faced with their school's most manipulative bullies...?!

title: Shaman King
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Hiroyuki Takei
synopsis:
Yoh Asakura is a shamanone of the gifted few who, thanks to training or natural talent, can channel spirits that most people can't even see. With the help of his fiancée, Anna, Yoh is in training for the ultimate shaman sports event: the "Shaman Fight in Tokyo," the once-every-500-years tournament to see who can shape humanity's future and become the Shaman King. But unfortunately for Yoh, every shaman in the world is competing for the same prize


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics (tankoubon) and Elex Media (kanzenban)

title: Busaneko Ni Kaerareta Kiyowa Reijou Desu Ga, Saikyou No Gunjin Koushaku Ni Hirowarete Kizetsu Sunzen Desu
genre: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ootori
synopsis:
Cursed to be an ugly cat--but maybe you're happy!

"I'll have you turn into a cat, sister." Marie, the viscount's young daughter, lost her fiancé to her younger sister Emilia and has been cursed even more. Her reflection in the mirror - an ugly cat!

Running away from her sister for her life, Marie, who escaped from their house, collapsed from loneliness and hunger, unable to speak. Then, a kind hand reaches out to her, "In the middle of this rain, poor thing...Would you like to come with me?" 
The figure is the "ruthless, merciless, undefeated duke" who is rumored even in social circles.

An unfortunate girl gets her one and only happiness, and a happy cat life begins!

title: Kasane to Subaru
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Kintetsu Yamada
synopsis: Both of them are straightforward people. Once they meet, they quickly get to know each other better. A heartwarming romantic comedy that begins with a certain incident. Shibata Kasane, a graphics designer at a toy design and development company, is troubled. Her troubles started when she grabbed her colleague Enokida Subaru's ass by accident! Kasane was intrigued by how similar Enokida's ass and her favourite childhood character felt. At the same time, Kasane felt guilty because Enokida might have been uncomfortable. Enokida said "I don't mind" but had a pained and frightened expression. Kasane was overcome by the urge to apologise profusely! On the other hand, it looks like Enokida is hiding something.

title: Love for Sale
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Shiori Yuwa
synopsis: "Will this make you happy?" Namwoo wakes up one night to find bills sprawled all over his room - along with the hazy memory of a handsome stranger. Even in his wildest dreams, all Namwoo wants is to have enough money to survive each month. Si-eon, on the other hand, has everything he could ever want except happiness. Intrigued by Namwoo's humble wishes, Si-eon offers him the money he wants - the catch being, he has to date him.

title: Oddones
genre: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Slice of Life
author: Yuanqi Dan
synopsis: A wasteland infested with giant mutated insects, Dep the Protagonist explores the shell of the former peaceful world he once knew, now wanders alone, facing bandits, cults, military, and people with mental problems, it's not a safe world....

title: Boukansha No Koi
genre: Historical, Romance, Drama, Tragedy
author: Ryo Yoshida
synopsis:
"I want to be by my sister's side until the last moment..."

In the fall of her twenties, Rachel married her childhood friend Noah, who had been her longtime crush.
She knows that the person Noah really loves is Alicia, his older sister and Rachel's best friend...
Noah and Rachel live a married life full of deceit while Alicia has only a short time left to live.
Rachel feels as much guilt and heartache as she does happiness, but who is the real 'bystander' in this love?

The long-awaited first volume of the comic adaptation of the pinnacle of "a fake marriage of unrequited love" that wrenches the heart with hidden love, irreplaceable friendship, and the sadness of passing each other!

title: Live Dungeon!
genre: Action, Adventure, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ryou Kotori
synopsis: An old MMORPG called Live Dungeon. Before the service was terminated, Kyotani Tsutomu made full use of 5 notebook PCs to clear the game and was invited to a different world. And then, Tsutomu was speechless when he saw a live relay of a dungeon capture in the different world. They bulldozed through without any thought of strategy. The misfortune of getting the healer position. Tsutomu reinstated the White Mage that had always been his favorite in games and aimed to conquer the dungeon to find the key to his escape from the different world.

title: Umineko When They Cry Episode 7: Requiem of the Golden Witch
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Ryukishi07
synopsis: The time for logical debate and magical feints has come to an end; the revelation of the truth about Beatrice the Golden Witch is at hand. To facilitate this, game master Bernkastel has chosen Will Wright the Mage-Hunter to step onto her board and answer a single question: Who killed Beatrice? Joining him in the game is Lion Ushiromiya, Krauss's firstborn and heir, whose role is a mystery in its own right. Will's line of questioning draws together the stray strands from all the previous games, twisting them into a thread of truth, revisiting Kinzou's first encounter with the young Beatrice and working through the legends that have since sprung up around her... [Yen Press]

title: Hirano to Kagiura
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Shou Harusono
synopsis: Basketball players. Bad boys who arent really bad boys. Roommates. Senpai-kouhai BL romance. It all started when Kagiura moved into the school dorms with what seemed to be a bad-boy upperclassman. But after hes left in the tender care of his mother hen of a roommate, Hirano, its too much to ask for Kagiura not to fall in loveright?!

title: Do as You Please
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Kei Kakei
synopsis: Not found

title: Seishun Pop!
genre: Psychological, Romance, Incest, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music, Tragedy
author: Touta Kitakawa
synopsis: Every day Sakuta Gotou likes to zone out to his favorite band the Incest, because it makes him feel at ease. However, this band is very secretive and has yet to have a live performance. Now, when the chance comes to Gotou to see his idol Iive, the band's singer, on stage, he finds out that she is the new transfer student in the classroom next door and to make this even better she stops the concert and grabs him saying, "I've wanted to see you." What is he going to do now?

title: Virgin Knight: I Became the Frontier Lord in a World Ruled by Women
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kotatsu Yanase
synopsis:
After being reincarnated into another world where the chastity and moral values of men and women are reversed and women rule the land, Faust was raised by his mother as a rare male knight. 

He's quick to become a war hero with many achievements under his belt, but because he inherited his way of thinking from his previous world, there's a certain severe pain in his groin day in and day out when faced with the likes of a scantily clad Queen who may as well be in the nude or the sexual harassment of the well endowed Duchess he calls a friend, among others
___
**Character Designer:** [Melonnyinyi](https://mangadex.org/author/e26bb514-85e4-4383-bc9e-9178797466f2)

title: Who the Devil Is
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Survival, Mafia, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Izumi Kirihara
synopsis: Jiao Xifan, the leader of an underground organisation was betrayed, prompting him to fake his own death. Assuming the guise of a student, he started to investigate events from over a decade ago to unravel the truth. Jiao Xifan's quest for truth takes an unexpected turn as he fell into a trap unbeknownst to him when he befriended his classmate, Xue Zhi.

title: Koi Ni Koi Suru Koibito Kankei
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life
author: Mocchii
synopsis:
Asako Ichijou, the student council president at a prestigious girls' high school, has been racking her brain about the ladykiller Nagi Tenma. That's the sort of person Asako is, but Nagi discovers Asako has broken school rules by bringing a shoujo manga to school...

Asako pleads with Nagi to keep it a secret, and Nagi reveals her condition: "Become my lover."

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)

title: Sleepless Beauty
genre: Boys' Love, Office Workers, Fantasy
author: Dentou Hayane
synopsis:
'I wish I could share my sleepiness with you, Oz-san.'

Designer Kotou, who has trouble sleeping, secretly respects Amemiya, a junior employee in another department. He admires the way he can quickly turn down a drinking session he doesn't feel like attending, and the way he takes a nap in exactly 15 minutes during his lunch break. Kotou, who has a tendency to overthink things and is unable to get along with others in a safe manner, looks at him with envy.

On his way home one day, Amemiya invites him out for a drink, and with the help of alcohol, Kotou spills the beans about his insomnia problems. Afterwards, he decides to let the drunken Amemiya stay at his house. There, Amemiya proposes "sleeping in a sofa" as a solution to his insomnia - and what happens?

title: March Comes in Like a Lion
genre: Award Winning, Traditional Games, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Chica Umino
synopsis:
A youth named Kiriyama Rei, who lost his family as a child, endures loneliness to become a professional shogi player. Then, through a chance meeting, he develops a relationship with the three Kawamoto sisters (Akari, Hinata, Momo), who hail from a working-class district of the city, and little by little his frozen heart begins to thaw.  
 
--- 
- **Won the 4th Manga Taisho Award in 2011**  
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2011, which it shared with Space Brothers**
-  **Won the 18th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2014**

title: Shiota-Sensei to Amai-Chan
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kumiko Nakatoka
synopsis:
A teacher and student romance.  
  
Amai Yayoi, 16 years old.   
A high school girl who puts her heart into expressing her love for Shiota-sensei.  
  
Shiota Tsuguharu, 29 years old.  
A high school teacher who is steadily beginning to accept Amai-chan.

title: Kotarou Wa Hitorigurashi
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Mami Tsumura
synopsis: One day, a kid named Satou Kotarou moved in next door to Karino Shin, an unsuccessful manga artist. Kotarou says he has no parents and lives alone. Karino is annoyed by Kotarou, but as he learns Kotarou's reasons for living alone, they gradually grow closer and grow together.

title: Adventures of an Undead Who Became Paladin
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy
author: A Bu
synopsis: Read Humility! Integrity! Compassion! Valor! Justice! Sacrifice! Honor! Faith! Hes a lich, however, hes knightly! He is a lich, but he keeps his faith in the light! Fearless in the face of the enemy! Loyal and upright, he fights to the death! Why you may ask? Because protecting the weak is not against the law of the world! This is the story of a cat with a bad mouth and a lich who gave his body and soul to the service of the Light!

title: I Created a Harem by Accident!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Harem, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Mok-Ryeon Kim
synopsis: Not found

title: Nan Hao & Shang Feng
genre: Award Winning, Long Strip, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Bulangni
synopsis:
A comedy about two ordinary high school boys.

---

- [Original Manhua <AC.QQ>](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/ComicInfo/id/646279)

- [Original Book <Taobao>](https://item.taobao.com/item.htm?ft=t&id=643452057226)

title: Kyou Mo Hajime-Senpai Ga Suki Sugiru
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural
author: Shin Yumachi
synopsis: Kokomi enters into a new school but ends up tearing her clothes. The kind and popular Hajime lends her some clothes and she falls in love with him at first sight, after not being able to speak to him for a long time, she discovers a terrible truth about him but is undeterred into trying to win his heart.

title: Sensha Isu - Tank Chair
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Gore
author: Manabu Yashiro
synopsis:
Protecting his sister Shizuka from a bullet, the strongest assassin Nagi Taira falls into a coma. Against all odds, he regains his consciousness- but only when faced with killing intent! Thus begins a violent journey of recovery, battling the most dangerous foes.

---
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10517/episode/349974) (U.S. Only)

title: Lunatic Circus
genre: Historical
author: Usamaru Furuya
synopsis: "Lunatic Circus" is a story about the circus called "Lunatic Circus", which is said to be the best in post WWII Japan, which has achieved an incredibly rapid economic growth. The star of the circus, Ryunosuke, and all the other trapeze artists, are the protagonists of this manga. This is the story of their dreams, their fears, their struggles and their hopes.

title: Dekoboko Majo No Oyako Jijou
genre: Monsters, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Piroya
synopsis: One day, Alyssa, a witch living alone in the forest, finds a human baby. Although she is confused, she names the baby Viola and decides to raise it. 16 years later, Viola has grown far beyond Alyssa's imagination...but she's grown too much! A heartwarming comedy about a mother and daughter whose appearances are reversed is here!

title: The Vermilion Mask
genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: C Bo
synopsis:
The mask causes disaster. The mask prefers slaughter. The mask has a will. A traveling mask merchant Pell who can create a mysterious mask that grants abilities. In a city with a gloomy atmosphere, I meet a mysterious girl, Sona!? The boy begins to walk at the end of publicity and self-discipline! Masked battle fantasy!
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/the-vermilion-mask)

title: The Duke of Death and His Maid
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Inoue
synopsis:
In a large mansion lives a boy, an aristocrat who was cursed by the witch to "let everything he touches die." With him is his maid Alice, who besides serving him, likes to tease him. The boy who is interested in her doesn't mind the teasing, but not being able to touch her is painful!  
  
If they are unable to hold hands, how will their love ever bloom?

title: Kitayama-Kun to Minamiya-Kun
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
author: Sugar Satou
synopsis:
"I want to see Kitayama-san's erotic face!!"

A handsome guy who's too pure × a lewd boy who's often perverted.
A 100% cute and happy love comedy!

Convenience store employee Minamiya can fantasize about "a person's most erotic face" just by looking at them.
But, his work senior Kitayama's erotic face is the only one he can't see.
Why is it just him? He's so curious that he ends up staring at him.
One day, they start talking when they find out they have the same favorite band, and Minamiya goes over to Kitayama's house.
Maybe with this he'll be able to imagine Kitayama's erotic face!?
While thinking about his ulterior motives, he talks about his love for the band...

"I like Minamiya-kun too..."
"...Huh!?"
Minamiya was sure they were talking about the band,
But he freezes when Kitayama gives an unexpected confession!?

title: Seto No Hanayome
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Tahiko Kimura
synopsis: A young boy gets saved from drowning by a mermaid but according to mermaid law, if a human sees a mermaid's true form, both are to be executed. The only solution to the problem is for him to marry her and become part of the mermaid family.

title: A Princess Who Reads Fortune
genre: Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kimgae
synopsis:
Top actress Lee Sia has the ability to see ghosts.
After an accident, she wakes up in the body of 'Camilla Sorfelle'.

But here's the problem.

"Oh, Father, help me!"

This woman's fate always ends in death!

I need to extend my life, so might as well talk to the ghosts first.

Ugh, but why do I keep getting involved with people I want to avoid!?

title: Oshibana!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Tokio Shima
synopsis: A romantic comedy centered around "The School Prince" bringing the tense conflict of young boys and girls to the breaking point!

title: Souzoushu Nano De Motto Yasashikute Kudasai!
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Monsters, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy
author: Ichiri Seto
synopsis:
Tohru Jin is a middle-management employee who has lost his place in a game company. He died in an unfortunate accident, and when he woke, he found himself in the world of a game he had once designed. Now reincarnated as a little girl in "Rune Fantasia". He should be able to live a cheat-like life in this isekai right?

---

**Note:** The author announced on May 17, 2021 that the manga will be completed with the 7th chapter [[Twitter](https://twitter.com/boarinoshishi/status/1394146695856869380) ([archive.org](https://web.archive.org/web/20210517042441/https://twitter.com/boarinoshishi/status/1394146695856869380))].

title: Mobile Suit Moon Gundam
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Tragedy
author: Harutoshi Fukui
synopsis: U.C.0092. A young boy from the Light Tribe named Yutta lives on the forgotten colony Moon Moon. There, he sees with his own eyes the remains of a mobile suit that drifted to his colony! A new Gundam saga penned by Harutoshi Fukui bridges the gap between ZZ and Chars Counterattack in an explosive new manga!

title: The Reborn Ranker Chronicles
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: StudioPlumB
synopsis:
Legendary SSS-rank hunter Kang Tae-ha finally met his end. But just as he prepares to enter eternal sleep, he awakens once more in imperial China?!

Now, he must live as Liu Xinyun, the delinquent heir to a powerful company. All he wants to do is put his hunting days behind him, but in order to survive his new power-hungry relatives, Xinyun must hone his skills again, starting from level one.

Can his own unique blend of necromancy and martial arts take him from useless bum to ultimate boss?

title: Watashi Ni Xx Shinasai!
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Ema Tooyama
synopsis:
In class, she's a sort of zoned-out girl, and he's the year one class' most perfect, good-looking guy. But the two of them have a secret, and their extraordinary "love experience" will start now!  
  
Himuro Yukina, known as the "Absolute Zero Snow-woman" is a cold and observant girl. In addition, she is actually a popular cell phone novelist who goes by the name of Yupina. Sadly, with no other human contact than her cousin, Yukina is unable to express more romance in her novels. Kitami Shigure, your so-called "typical bishounen", who is really a womanizer, has fallen into Yukina's trap when she blackmails him, and they end up "love-acting" for the sake of their secrets.

title: My Evil Husband Is Obsessed with the Wrong Person
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Jeoktoma
synopsis: Getting reincarnated into the world of a novel is never easy, but possessing a doomed bride on her way down the aisle to marry a murderous emperor is just unfair! Now, the newly reincarnated Angelica has no choice but to learn to survive the whims of her new husband, Emperor Ranielo Well, at least until he falls for his fated love interest and she can slip away unnoticed. But as the days pass, Ranielos interest in her only grows. Can this tyrant be tamed, or will Angelica find that some destinies cant be unwritten?

title: Jimikoi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, School Life
author: Ema Tooyama
synopsis:
A compilation volume oneshots:  
  
1. Jimikoi (Plain Love)  
Wakana i.e "bakana" is your typical, flashy, yet not-so bright girl that loves plain boys! Kagano happens to be that boy, and when she confesses, she thought she may rejected, but he told her he'll think about it! Now all Wakana has to do is to not be a "bakana" when trying to win his heart  
  
2. Columbus no Yuuutsu (The Melancholy of Columbus)  
Shiono is a girl who has "double face," out is quite a refined, intelligent, beautiful and well-mannered young lady while inside is a common, intelligent little girl and instant ramen lover One day, Shiono discovers that the simple delegate and classmate with lens, Satou-kun, is also someone who is hiding something this makes her feel a connection with him. The point of being 'the continent," that she discovered Something will emerge between Satou-kun and Shiono?  
  
3. Mimimoto ni Furu Kimi no Koe  
4. Gojouzaka-san Chi no Kirei na Himitsu

title: Moscow 2160
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Romance, Mecha, Survival, Superhero, Martial Arts, Mafia, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Drama
author: Koutarou Sekine
synopsis:
A future where the cold war between the USA and Russia never ended and has been going on for two centuries. 
"Liquidator" Daniel Kuragin runs through Moscow alleyways for score-settling with a submachine gun in hand!  
The overwhelmingly popular web series from "Goblin Slayer" creator Kumo Kagyu has begun publication.

title: Seijo Ja Nakatta No De, Oukyuu De Nonbiri Gohan Wo Tsukuru Koto Ni Shimashita
genre: Monsters, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Rio Kamiyama
synopsis:
Rina was summoned to another world to be the Saint, but was surprised at how bad the food tasted. It tastes like this even at the royal palace? Ill just make it myself, so give me your kitchen! Relieved of her Saint duties, Rina wins the heart and stomachs of the nobles through her food!  
  
[alt. Raw](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/44992)

title: Hush
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, School Life
author: Ji-Un Yun
synopsis:
Although Gyu Hwa Lee might look like a guy, she has feelings like any other girl. In fact, she's currently in love with Korean pop idol Kang Un Ryu. As luck would have it, Kang Un ends up transferring to Gyu Hwa's high school. The only problem is he has to keep his identity a secret so he's cross-dressing as a girl!  
  
What happens when Gyu Hwa discovers Kang Un's secret? Will she ever be able to win over his heart? Or will she always be nothing more than just a friend?

title: Seijo Sensei No Mahou Wa Susunderu!
genre: Demons, Magic, Girls' Love, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Shimazu
synopsis: Despite being the most powerful saint, Tia was accused of being a heretic and banished from the royal capital. She became the teacher for three girls who had failed as candidate saints.

title: Beatrice
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Military, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Cierra
synopsis:
Having previously been a slave in her youth, Chloe was revealed to be an illegitimate child of the King of Elpasa, and is raised to the level of a Princess and renamed Beatrice, all in order to secure a political marriage to a toady man, as the king was unwilling to marry his legitimate daughters to him. After two years of hellish marriage, the Kingdom of Elpasa falls before the blade of the Empire's Archduke, its greatest hero. In order to survive her new enslavement Princess Beatrice re-assumes the guise of 'Chloe' as a slave of the Empire. But then, she catches the eye of that very same hero  
  
The Archduke wonders who is this squirrelly short-haired young woman, who is so surprisingly educated for a slave, and who is terrified of him, not knowing that he butchered the Elpasa Royal Family in front of her and enslaved her himself. What will become of them, since she proves to be one of his only sources of levity?  


---

title: Dream Eater Merry
genre: Action, Comedy, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Yoshitaka Ushiki
synopsis: Yumeji has the power to forecast a person's dream based on the multicolored auras that surround them when he looks through his fingers. His skills are unpolished, but when he sees a black aura, he knows for certain what that person will see that night, a nightmare. Yumeji has been having nightmares himself recently, where he is chased endlessly by an army of cats until he awakens. But when a strange girl named Merry literally falls into his life, his experience with dreams becomes bizarre and dangerous when he vows to help Merry return to the world of dreams from whence she came.

title: Gachi Koi Maou-Sama
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Haru Moriya
synopsis: A hero undertakes the task of defeating the Demon Lord for the sake of world peace. When he arrives at the Demon Lord's castle, he is greeted by the Demon Lord with a marriage certificate in her hand! The hero is bewildered by the Demon Lord's strong appeal to marry him, but...? A love comedy about a die-hard-fan Demon Lord and an overly prickly hero whose world is in danger of extinction!

title: Hanamonogatari
genre: Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life
author: NISIOISIN
synopsis:
The manga centers on Hanayo, an elderly woman whose husband of many years has only recently died. 

After finishing a Buddhist service for her husband, she finds herself walking out in town alone for the first time in a long time. She stumbles onto a cosmetics store, and meets a beautiful woman named Yoshiko Doujima, and falls in love at first sight. Hanayo had long given up on makeup after her husband nagged her about it, but putting some on with Yoshiko's help brightens her heart.

title: Cheat Skill Shihai Otsukatte Isekai Harem!
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy
author: kt60
synopsis:
One day, the protagonist suddenly transferred to another world.
"It looks like the world of the anime I was watching last night, but when I tried to imitate the hero of the anime, the status screen appeared in front of me! I was surprised by the high specs of my abilities, but I was shocked when I saw the name on the status screen! Surprisingly, I am a small fry character [fake hero] who is defeated by the main character in the early stages!"
Knowing that his role is "a fake hero to be defeated by a hero", the hero abandons the empty life in his original world and lives a short life as a"fake hero" in a harem until the real hero defeats him. Make up your mind!

title: Hanako to Guuwa No Tera
genre: Action, Romance, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Sakae Esuno
synopsis:
Folklore detective Asou Daisuke would rather deal with normal, everyday, things like cheating spouses, embezzling partners and the like. (That and his huge collection of ero-manga.) Because whenever he deals with the supernatural, he gets the hiccups.  
  
But no matter, an endless stream of desperate people come to him troubled by what he calls allegories. Those are stories, usually urban legends, that one believes to be true and if one believes strong enough can cause them to become true. His first case involves "The Man Under The Bed." Can he stop this creepy man with an axe before he chops up kawaii Hiranuma Kanae? Why does Asou count his hiccups, and just who is that strange girl in his bathroom?

title: Sakura No Ichiban
genre: Historical, Action, School Life, Horror, Mystery
author: Yuna Kagesaki
synopsis: A young girl named Hinomori Asami starts her studies at the Sakura Hill School for Girls in Tokyo, but the capital is a dangerous place, she got kidnapped on her first day in Tokyo. Her siscon older brother, Ikuro Hinomori began investigating this kidnapping case

title: Hadaka De Koi O Katarunaka
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Mame Hatono
synopsis: One missed shot and this love affair is over. That's why I listen to her sexual experiences while soaking in the bathtub with her today. It's too hard to match body and soul! A new kind of public bathhouse romantic comedy is now open for business.

title: Te Ni Ireta Saimin Appli De Yume No Harem Seikatsu O Okuritai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Myon
synopsis:
I've never had a girlfriend. The app installed on my phone was a hypnosis app that could control anyone. After testing it, the app's power was real. With this, a harem life isn't just a dream

"Why do all the girls I target have troubles!?"

A beautiful gal, a plain girl with hidden beauty, a cool ojou-sama junior-by the power of the hypnosis app, their secrets that they couldn't tell anyone are revealed! (I just wanted to do erotic things...!) The self-proclaimed loser, but fundamentally a good guy protagonist, ends up running around helping people!?

title: Mobile Suit Crossbone Gundam Seerauber
genre: Action, Mecha, Adventure, Military, Mystery
author: Yuuichi Hasegawa
synopsis: The 30th anniversary feature diving deep into what it means to be a "space pirate!" The Crossbone saga continues with a new heroine and mecha lineup!

title: Koi No Towarutsu
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
author: Mato Yakito
synopsis: Yuuichi, a poor college student, spends his days studying for a scholarship and working part-time. One day, the world-famous supermodel Reo Ichinose visits the café where he works. As the store goes crazy at the unexpected celebrity appearance, Reo tells the clueless Yuuichi: "I've come to pick you up," and proposes to him...!? Much to Yuuichi's confusion, he finds himself swept up in a fairytale-esque love story that started from a promise he'd long since forgotten.

title: Shinohayu - the Dawn of Age
genre: Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Ritz Kobayashi
synopsis: A prequel to the Saki series, focusing on Shino Shiratsuki, a young girl with an affinity for the 1-sou who is seeking out her missing mother. Future professional mahjong players like Hayari Mizuhara, Harue Akado and others are also featured.

title: Oblivious Girl and a Maiden Man
genre: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Rabi
synopsis:
"Actually, I... have a fear of men, so I'm not good with them."

Rintaro (30), the owner of a café, has developed feelings for his regular customer, Luna (25). However, Luna, unaware of Rintaro's feelings, starts to confide in him with bizarre concerns. In an effort to help her with her recovery, Rintaro suppresses his feelings and agrees to cooperate, but things get complicated as Luna starts to make movesholding hands, inviting him out for meals, and more.

With an oblivious Luna and a naïve Rintaro, this heartwarming love comedy unfolds!

title: Nakimushi Na Sadistic
genre: Romance, Boys' Love
author: Kiyo Ueda
synopsis: Okubo-kun, a serious lawyer, has fallen in love with his boss, lawyer Hanamura-sensei. He chases after him even as he goes independent. However, he's given a "test", an SM play, and on top of that, Hanamura-sensei declares to him that he's a masochist. He can't get his beloved Hanamura-sensei to accept him unless he tortures him.

title: Cavalier of the Abyss
genre: Action, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: JYU Deo
synopsis:
Sequel to *Immortal Regis*. Reading the entirety of the prequel is highly recommended, otherwise, this story from chapter 4 on will spoil it and/or be confusing.  
  
Chaos has gotten itself a new Regis, Nex, a seemingly heartless ruler who destory everything and everyone who stand in his way. A small boy named Xix, who's contracted with an Evil is out seeking his revenge on Regis Nex for killing his village and Sister. When he gets his chance to kill Regis Nex, he loses completely and gets taken to the Royal palace. But once there, he see that there is something else going on in the background of the Royal Family, a Secret they don't want to be uncovered  
  


---

title: Haibara-Kun No Tsuyokute Seishun New Game
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Kazuki Amamiya
synopsis:
Natsuki Haihara is a young man who failed to make his high school debut and is now in his fourth year of college following a terrible high school life. He was about to enter the workforce when he was unexpectedly whisked back in time seven years to just before he started high school!

Natsuki is given the opportunity to redo his regret-filled high school life, and he uses his prior experiences to successfully become a member of a group of six beautiful boys and girls at the top of the class caste!

Whats more, the beautiful girl he once had a crush on, Hikari, was also there?!

The unconscious high-spec young man starts his second adolescence all over again in real life, a strong, new game school romantic comedy!

title: Country Life with the Sexy Majesty
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Evie
synopsis:
The moment my engagement with my human trash fiancé was annulled, memories from my past life returned. I was formerly a hardworking agriculture researcher and a woman who went to farming college! After getting chased out of my family, I decided to stick to my strengths and live a worry-free and comfortable life while farming, but...

"That's my sword."
"No, it's my hoe?"
"It's my sword!"
"I told you, it's my hoe!"

Suddenly, a beautiful blond manwho looked perfectly fine on the outsideappeared to take the hoe I picked up from the ground away from me! This is the start of a farming romance where we'll meet our loved ones as well as pick mulberries (kill two birds with one stone)~

title: The Otome Heroine'S Fight for Survival
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Survival, Adventure, Crossdressing, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Haruno Hibiyori
synopsis:
Orphaned by a monster attack on her village, young Alicia spends three horrid years in an orphanage before finally running away. When she flees, however, Alicia has a violent encounter with an older woman hell-bent on killing her. During their tussle, she comes into contact with a strange crystal that bestows upon her a wealth of knowledge, transforming her from an innocent child into a cool and calculated planner. Now aware that she was meant to be the protagonist of an otome game and disgusted with her supposed fate, Alicia decides to take matters into her own hands and become strongby any means necessary. Using her newfound knowledge, and with some help from a stranger she meets in the woods, she learns to survive by herself in a world far too harsh and unforgiving for a girl her age. Ready or not, shes determined to carve her own path.
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-otome-heroine-s-fight-for-survival)

title: The Dawn to Come
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Gi Kang
synopsis: She was like a typhoon. One that carelessly disturbed the season he had been quietly living through. "Nothing good will come from associating with me." "Why? Because of the rumours about you? I don't care about them." Should I protect her, or break her? The night I spent agonising over those innumerable impulses repeated itself after 13 years. It was because of her, whose firsts I wanted to remember. "A man who runs away after only taking a kiss?" "The one... who ran away first was you." So you didn't like it? As she looked into my eyes and provoked me with that throat of hers, I would have rather bit and shred it to pieces. "You... You're good at driving people insane." She wasn't something he could avoid in the first place. That was who 'Yun Junyoung' was to him.

title: Gachirin Ni Kiri Saku
genre: Action, Psychological, Martial Arts, Sexual Violence, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Tomoo Maruyama
synopsis: A new transfer student has come into town, a girl with a mysterious air and black clothing who is called Inugami Sakuya. What few know is that by moonlight, she hunts and kills those possessed by "Inugami." A man can become possessed by being bitten, leading to a nighttime transformation into a beast driven to eat women. Sakuya gets no thanks for brutally ending the lives of these unfortunate men with her sword, and she is often too late to save the women they threaten. Sakuya also must deal with her own inner demons, which are all too real

title: Koroshi Korosare Sankaku Kankei Ni Watashi Ga Ima Kara Hairun Desu Ka?
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Vampires, Slice of Life
author: Fumie Suzuki
synopsis: Kohaku is a girl who spent her junior high school years as a loner and dreams of living a fulfilling life in high school. However, on her first day of school she falls down the stairs and ends up hospitalized for a month! This means that everyone besides her has already formed a group of friends at school... In order to avoid being a loner, she summons up the courage and calls out to the only odd-numbered group in her class, but it seems that they are high up in the school caste system, and are actually involved in a blood-splattered love triangle with a non-human...!

title: Kotodama Kanaete! Tokie-Sensei
genre: Romance, Comedy, Adaptation
author: Sigrio Hasegawa
synopsis:
In a normal, everyday run-of-the-mill school, a new teacher arrives but there's something peculiar about her... She's a teacher with a dark aura but with the power of words she can transform into whatever is asked of her. 

From dressing like a cat to wearing a bikini, she's at the mercy of her students. Enjoy this comedic story filled with very amusing moments between a teacher who thrives on obeying words and some very mischievous students.

title: Doumo, Zense De Satsuriku No Madougu Wo Tsukutteita Shishaku Reijou Desu.
genre: Reincarnation, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Unosero
synopsis: The viscount's daughter, Chloe, was the chief magical tools artisan for a country that perished a thousand years ago in her previous life.  On the country's orders, she had created many weapons of slaughter. She laments her previous life and decides to, "live a respectable life this time." One day, at her graduation party, her best friend's engagement is broken off because of a lie. Chloe tries to save her best friend by unraveling the truth.

title: Bad Girl
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Akira Araki
synopsis:
The daily life of a (self-proclaimed) high school delinquent, fangirling and kohyuuing over the head prefect!?

(to) kohyuu (v. infinitive form) When one is surprised and excited, their breathing begins to kohyuu. (see: hyperventilation)

Summary: High school first-year Yuu is an ardent admirer of Head Prefect Atori, and in order to get her attention, Yuu begins to act like a delinquent. But while her intention is to appeal with her "badness" and "coolness," her simple-minded facade is seen through by Atori, who teases and treats her like a small animal...!?

title: Mobile Suits Gundam: Red Giant 03Rd Ms Team
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Adventure
author: Ryouji Kansai
synopsis:
A red comet, a black three binary star, and a blue giant star -- we are the red three giant stars!
Universal Century 0079 - December, the so-called "One Year War" has reached its final stage. After finishing the battle for Jaburo, the Zeon army "Wandering Group" was retreating. Somehow, they made it to space where their friends were... Meanwhile, a unit of the Federation Forces, the Red Three Giants, appeared!

title: Ts Tensei Shite Masaka No Sub Heroine Ni.
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Tsukudani
synopsis:
A hikikomori boy who died while dreaming of a harem was reborn as one of the heroes who will save the world. The harem he aimed for would surely be there!

Next to the hikikomori was someone reincarnated as the female white mage Fio, centering on the hero Alto. Fio is still crazy about girls even after her reincarnation, but the turning point comes when the party is split up by a surprise attack by the demon king's army and she and Alto take refuge in an abandoned hut.

In order to save Fio, Alto drinks a powerful potion that gives him temporary power but causes him to go into heat as a side effect...

Their relationship takes an unexpected turn!

The gold standard of genderswap romantic comedy novels, featuring two people who were never meant to be in a relationship, has finally been translated into a full-color comic book!

title: Ossan Teihen Chiyu-Shi to Manasume No Henkyou Life
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Eisei Iida
synopsis: F-rank healer, Reda Dixon (30), is expelled from his party due to his age. Heartbroken, Reda decides on a change of pace by moving to the rural town of Almus. On his journey there, he encounters a blonde-haired girl named Mina, who is dressed in ragged clothes. With no parents in sight, the kind-hearted Reda decides to become her guardian. In Almus, Reda, who starts a new life with the girl, becomes known as "Teacher" by the townspeople, thanks to his unconsciously cheat-level ?Healing Magic?! Together, they solve various troubles and deepen their family bonds.

title: Shoukan Sareta Kenja Wa Isekai Wo Yuku ~Saikyou Nano Wa Fuyou Zaiko No Item Deshita~
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ko Kobayashi
synopsis:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---

title: The Archvillain'S Daughter in Law
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jjada
synopsis:
I've reincarnated as the young daughter-in-law of a villain who was taken in for his deceptive plans. The problem is that I'm terminally ill, so I'm going to die when I become an adult.

"Luckily, I know how to cure it, but..."

If I don't die at the right time, my father-in-lawno, the villain, Duke Ecardemight kill me just to achieve his goals!

But what kind of kid could actually adjust to this kind of household?

"I want to live happily with Father and Evan for a long time... cough! Cough!"

Me. I'm "that kid."

---
The final villain is being deceived by his young time-limited daughter in law who was possessed. If I die at the right time, I will marry his son. The problem is, I already know the cure! And I don't want to die, but if I don't get killed now, then I won't die quietly.

"Daddy, I love you so much. You are the most handsome man in the world. Cough, cough!"

"Evan, shall we read a fairy tale book together until we fall asleep?"

She will have to act a little better to let his guard down. Then, she would be able to do a great job.

I think I'll have to leave secretly after I get better. I have to make a lot of money and buy land under pseudonyms.

"Call all the council members on the continent. My daughter-in-law has to live."

Father? Shouldn't I be thrown away?

"If you die, I'll follow you unconditionally. I can't live in a world without you."

Husband? Youre acting strange, too You dont love anyone, do you?

Even- "Who is this, Kyle Ravonis? The man who seduced my daughter-in-law deserves to die."

"Even if you cheated on me with another man, I will never break up with you."

You must have misunderstood my other name!

"When did this start, huh? You said you wanted to live as a sweet couple, but you tried to run away by creating a new identity behind our back?"

I want to quietly disappear, not die! I didn't know my husband, who has been like a friend to me ever since we were young, would come to me with such sore eyes.

"You're still my wife on paper. Live as my wife, and die as my wife."

"Evan?"

"You've shown me both heaven and hell" his reddened eyes locked me up, "You'll never get away from me no matter where you go."

---

title: ?Oshi No Ko?
genre: Reincarnation, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Aka Akasaka
synopsis:
The story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.  
  
What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?

title: Tonari No Hyakkai Kenbunroku
genre: Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Yoshiko Watanuki
synopsis: Something happens to Katagiri Jinpachi late one night when he unwittingly wanders into the youkai market. The only one who knows what it was seems to be one Harada Oriza, a famed painter of youkai portraits. But he is not talking, and Jinpachi only grows more frustrated and confused as he tries to return to the market and find out what he lost... or gained there.

title: Boku No Danna-Sama
genre: Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy
author: Bohra Naono
synopsis: A love story between a young cat and a protective dog.

title: Kanojo Ga Kuzu Wo Aisuru Wake Wa.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Full Color
author: Rui Ikeda
synopsis:
Mii-chan loves Hiro-kun, who has no money, no job and he's a cheater!

After all, he dated her for more than one week, he remembered the meetup times for the dates, and he remembers her name properly! Hiro-kun is bewildered and can't bring himself to be a complete scumbag to Mii-chan, whose standards for the boyfriend she wants are just way too low! He's scum, but he's kind. He's nice, but he's trash.

This is a trashy romance comedy featuring Mii-chan who loves a guy like him so much!

(Source: Pixiv Comic)

title: Shikkaku Mon No Saikyou Kenja - Sekai Saikyou No Kenja Ga Sara Ni Tsuyoku Naru Tame Ni Tensei Shimashita
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Liver Jam
synopsis:
His strength limited by the magical crest with which he was born, Mathias, the world's most powerful sage, decides reincarnation is necessary to become the strongest of all.

Upon his rebirth as a young boy, Mathias is thrilled to discover he's been born with the optimal crest for magical combat on his first try! Unfortunately, the world he's been born into has abysmally poor standards when it comes to magic, and everyone thinks he's still marked for failure!

Now it's up to Mathias to prove everyone wrong... world's strongest sage-style!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [MANGA UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/457)

title: Sono Munou, Jitsu Wa Sekai Saikyou No Mahoutsukai ~Munou to Sagesumare, Kizokuka Kara Oidasareta Ga, Gift "Tenseisha" Ga Kakusei Shite Zense No Nouryoku Ga Yomigaetta~
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Hakuto Aono
synopsis:
Alma, the third son of an aristocratic family who could not receive the Gift that should have been given by God, is despised as incompetent from his parents' home and is expelled from the house. However, in reality, Alma was given a special Gift - He regained the abilities of the previous life! With the Gift [Reincarnation], he becomes the strongest wizard in the world! Alma, who devoted all of his first life to the quest for magic, seeks a "happy second life" with the magic of his previous life!
___
[Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3823gm/)  (JP)

title: Chikarawaza No Sister
genre: Demons, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Arihred Yamamoto
synopsis:
The nun who listens to people's confessions and reacts "strongly" to them.
_____________
