title: Seihantai Na Futari
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Gyaru
author: Wakamatsu
synopsis: Not found

title: Maou No Musume Wa Yasashi Sugiru!!
genre: Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Yuuya Sakamoto
synopsis: The strongest Demon King, Ahriman, rules every part of the world. However, he had to stop his world conquest all of a sudden. What is the unexpected reason behind this?

title: Mata Ashita to Iwasete
genre: Oneshot, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Matsu Kokonoe
synopsis: On the way back from an office drinking party, Maizumi encounters a young boy. In a desperate attempt to quickly escape his situation, he lied about the boy being a relative of his, which then led him to get involved with the boy.

title: The Money Kid
genre: Sports, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Nami Akimoto
synopsis: A little-known classic, brought to you by the mangaka of Dokaben and Abu-san and the creator of Apache Baseball Team, Zenikko is a gritty look at money and capitalism, and one kids attempts to game the system in his favour.

title: A Woman Who Is Too Honest Despite Her Kyoto Dialect
genre: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Takeya Takekake
synopsis: Not found

title: Baki-Dou
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Keisuke Itagaki
synopsis:
Baki is bored. After the conclusion of the epic battle between father and son, he continues to fight in the underground arena and train nonstop, but he always has to suppress his yawn caused by the overbearing boredom. No amount of stimulus or danger can bring excitement to him at this point.  
  
Now, with the inclusion of the Prime Minister of Japan in the loop, a massive cloning project is attempting to clone Miyamoto Musashi, one of the fathers of martial arts in Japan. Another fight of historical proportions awaits Baki!  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18746) (OAV)

title: Yomeiro Choice
genre: Time Travel, Loli, Romance, Comedy, Incest, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Sakazaki Doi
synopsis: Saku had a normal life, living with his cousin Kuran and being tormented daily by his childhood friend, Karin. That is, until the day a girl named Kiiro showed up out of nowhere claiming to be Karin's and Saku's daughter from the future. Convinced she will disappear from existence unless Saku and Karin get married, she makes life a lot more complicated for everyone. Things only get crazier when Hiiro, a girl claiming to be Kuran's and Saku's daughter from a different timeline in the future, appears with the goal of getting Saku together with his cousin Kuran. Saku is suddenly faced with a dilemma: whom does he choose as his wife, and which daughter does he save from disappearing into nothing?

title: Kyou, Koshiba Aoi Ni Aetara.
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life
author: Hazuki Takeoka
synopsis: The latest manga by the creator of Masamune-Kun's Revenge. The story of Kyo, Koshiba Aoi ni Aetera follows Sahoko, a girl who values what others think of her, and Aoi, a girl who is able to let out her true self without caring about what others think. To get closer to Aoi whose candid air appeared shining, the action that Sahoko takes to get closer is a kiss.

title: Bungo
genre: Sports, Drama, School Life
author: Yuuji Ninomiya
synopsis: In a town with no baseball team, young Bungo spends his days throwing the ball he received as a gift against a wall until Yukio Noda, Japanese representative youth baseball player, appears before him and an unexpected showdown ensues! After a chance meeting in middle school, these two enroll in Seio Senior where they struggle to make it to Koshien with everything they have.

title: Tama Hiyori
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life
author: Hiyohiyo
synopsis: As a boy, Taishi saved a tiny chick (as in an actual bird) that was being bullied by its brothers and sisters. And now its grown up into a hot girl who wants to cater to his every whim! Did we mention she lays eggs, too?

title: Onihime Vs
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural
author: Dal-Young Im
synopsis: Weak, bullied, and pessimistic about life, that's Setsuna Kashiwagi. On the verge of jumping off a bridge, a mysterious man appears behind him and offers the contract "10 million yen in exchange for your life in a year." Skeptical at first, he accepts. Waking up the next morning, thinking it was just a dream, he notices 2 beautiful women sitting beside him. They are Kanna and Rena, Oni princesses here to claim his heart in a year.

title: Noroi No Namae
genre: Romance, Drama, Horror, Supernatural
author: Memeco Arii
synopsis: Not found

title: Gokugoku Futsuu No Fuufu No Hanashi
genre: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Tokiwa
synopsis: Continuation of *A Story About a Man and a Woman and When They Sleep Together, Money Appears Out of Nowhere* posted by the author on pixiv.

title: Breath of Fire Iv: the Unfading Ones
genre: Action, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Hitoshi Ichimura
synopsis:
Nina, a wyndian princess, and her guardian Cray are searching everywhere for Nina's missing elder sister, Elina. While traveling to her last known whereabouts they suffer an accident. On her way to a nearby town, Nina meets Ryu, a seemingly amnesiac young man. This meeting triggers a series of events that will involve them with the godly race known as The Endless, immortal dragons with the power to shape the world itself.  
  
Closely follows the storyline of the original PlayStation game.

title: Dosanko Gal Wa Namaramenkoi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Kai Ikada
synopsis: Shiki Tsubasa has just moved from Tokyo to Hokkaido in the middle of winter. Not quite appreciating how far apart towns are in the country, he gets off the taxi at the next town over from his destination so he can see the sights around his home, but he is shocked when he learns the "next town" is a 3-hour walk away. However, he also meets a cute Dosanko (born and raised in Hokkaido) gyaru named Fuyuki Minami who is braving 8 degrees celcius below 0 weather in the standard gyaru outfit of short skirts and bare legs!

title: Dungeon Tou De Yadoya Wo Yarou! Souzou Mahou Wo Moratta Ore No Hosoude Hanjouki
genre: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Shinichi Yuuki
synopsis:
One day, Sanada Shirou, who works for a black company, is transported to another world. Using his "creation magic", an ability he gained when transported, he opens an inn and is supposed to lead a slow life, but this other world is a little strange?! It is a world where women are overwhelmingly dominant, where women do dangerous work and battle, and men are powerless and are protected! The daily life of entertaining (in many ways) the women of this other world begins...!

---
**Links:**
- [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354055503576578)  (JP)

title: Stockpiling Ten Thousand Tons of Pork During the Apocalypse
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Post-Apocalyptic, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Jing Bu Gu
synopsis: Mr. Chen, the one hundred portions of roasted duck that you ordered is here. Mr. Chen, the ten thousand pounds of pork that you ordered is here. Chen Luo, also known as the Void Sovereign, hid like a coward with his outstanding powers until all the survivors died before him. Having found no meaning in life, he decided to bury himself. It wasnt that he couldnt survive, he just didnt want to live anymore. After waking up, Chen Luo is shocked to find out that he has been reincarnated to one month before the apocalypse, and that the subspace he created in his past life with his powers was also retained.

title: Magician
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Yuriko Matsukawa
synopsis:
It all begins in the forest village of Adat, where the tomboy Iremi sees the infamous mage Edermask en route to her hometown. Wanting to find out who is stronger, she sets off to challenge him with her childhood friend Enzu, a novice swordsman who is always being dragged around wherever she goes.  
  
Iremi and Enzu then start a journey along with Edermask, each seeking something different from their journey: Enzu seeks revenge for the murder of his father, Edermask is looking for a lost magic, and Iremi is just there for the ride. Without knowing the dangers their journey might bring them, they set sail to fulfill their hearts desires and uncloak the mystery behind Edermask's immortality.

title: Setagaya Ichi Furui Youkan No Yanushi Ni Naru
genre: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Kazumi Yamashita
synopsis:
The manga artist who loves "house" as you know fell in serious love with a Western-style house in Setagaya-ku, Tokyo,
A Western-style house in Setagaya-ku, Tokyo, with a stylish light blue exterior.
However, this house is actually on the verge of demolition. ......?
In order to protect her beloved mansion, the manga artist must stand up for herself!

title: Li Zi and Nian Nian
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love
author: Konomi Mitsuno
synopsis: In a large city, a small social circle, how do people fall in love? Tang Li, a housing agent who joined the workforce in Hangzhou, unknowingly fell in love with Nian Nian, a part-time female shopkeeper at a late-night restaurant. The two helped each other out, became roommates, and gradually started falling in love.

title: Mama Wa Doukyuusei
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yuki Azuma
synopsis: Kisaragi Ryou lost his mother at a young age and with his father away from home most of the time, he is left living at home alone often. One morning, he discovers a naked woman in his house. Without being able to assess the situation, he heads off to school. Later that evening, his father comes home to introduce him to the girl he plans to remarry and this girl turns out to be his classmate.

title: Blue Orchestra
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music
author: Makoto Akui
synopsis:
Aono Hajime was a prodigy violinist until he grew jaded with playing the violin due to personal reasons. 
Now in his third year of middle school, he struggles to decide his academic path. 
One day in school, he meets Akine Ritsuko, a hotheaded novice violinist who wants to enroll in a high school with a distinguished orchestra club. 
When he finds himself getting closer to Ritsuko and being brought back to the world of violinists, time starts moving again for him.  
  
This is the beginning of a youthful drama where sounds and hearts alike resound in harmony.

---
- **Won the 68th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2023, which it shared alongside Call of the Night**

title: Amagami to Hakuchuumu
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love
author: Jiji Neji
synopsis: The introverted architect, Michishita, has a crush on his mysterious apartment neighbor, Kase. Kase always hides his face behind a mask, and rarely makes conversation with anyone, leaving Michishita with no intention of pursuing his unrequited love, content to just admire him from afar. One day, Michishita found himself in a near-fatal accident, only to be saved in the nick of time by Kase. However, Kase is seriously injured while shielding Michishita and is taken to the hospital in critical condition, unconscious. When Kase finally wakes up, to Michishita's surprise, he starts calling him "big brother" and begins acting adorably toward him?

title: My Husband, My Sister, and I
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Wooosa
synopsis:
On the night of her fourth wedding anniversary, moans were heard from her husbands bedroom. 

Tell me Im better than her, come on.

It was the voice of her twin sister.

title: Yandere Imouto Ni Aisaresugite Kozukuri Kankin Seikatsu
genre: Psychological, Romance, Incest, Sexual Violence, Harem, School Life, Adaptation
author: Tina Chris
synopsis:
Ayane is in love with Tomoya, Her Onii-chan. But, their childhood friend, Sayaka is trying to split them up. Ayane is not going to let that happen, No one can take Onii-chan away from her. Her plan? She wants Onii-chan only for herself, and she is willing to do everything to make that happen. She wants to have a family with Onii-chan, only the two of them. No one else matters in her little world, and she is going to take care of everyone who tries to interfere.

[Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/gomzaburo)

title: Raul and the Vampire
genre: Monsters, Action, Boys' Love, Vampires, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Ataru Sonoguchi
synopsis:
An orphan named Raul was taken in by the vampire Rose. Raul worked hard for Rose's sake, and as a result, he became incredibly muscular. This is the story of Raul, now buff and strong, and Rose, the eternally youthful vampire, enjoying their fun daily life together!

[Shogakukan](https://csbs.shogakukan.co.jp/book?book_group_id=18823)

title: Eg ? Rider
genre: Oneshot, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Xuann
synopsis:
A man who is unbothered with work, hobbies, and romance is invited on a motorcycle tour by a woman he work with, and this marks his first step into the extraordinary.
Though he is hesitant at first glance about the slightly spartan female rider, he enjoys riding his motorbike, seeing spectacular views, eating delicious food, and relaxing in a hot spring. Gradually, the man's feelings begin to change.
This book contains a two-part short story and one one-shot story from before the author became a serialized writer.

translated from amazon.jp

title: Daddy Boy
genre: Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Irok
synopsis:
Han Kang, a famous and recognizable male protagonist, goes through a lifelong event to attempt to debut as a celebrity while caring for a child that he's unaware of.  
  
- [Raw Kakao](https://page.kakao.com/home/%EB%8C%80%EB%94%94%EB%B3%B4%EC%9D%B4/51761556)

title: Captive Hearts of Oz
genre: Monsters, Romance, Reverse Harem, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Shuu
synopsis: Dorothy, along with her beloved dog Toto, finds herself whisked away by a cyclone to the mysterious land of Oz. Something about the strange place feels oddly familiar, but Dorothy just wants to go home. Following the advice of a kindly Witch, Dorothy must travel to the Emerald City and seek out the Wizard of Oz, who alone has the power to send her back to her world. Captive Hearts of Oz reimagines L. Frank Baums original Oz stories in a modern, shoujo style. Each volume in this ongoing series will be released in oversized editions, featuring impressive artwork and several full-color illustrations.

title: Grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation - Mo Dao Zu Shi
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Luo Di Cheng Qiu
synopsis:
As the grandmaster who founded the Demonic Sect, Wei WuXian roamed the world in his wanton ways, hated by millions for the chaos he created. In the end, he was back-stabbed by his dearest junior brother and killed by powerful clans that combined to overpower him. He incarnates into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and is later, unwillingly, taken away by a famous cultivator among the clansLan WangJi, his archenemy.  
  
This marks the start of a thrilling yet hilarious journey of attacking monsters, solving mysteries, and raising children. From the mutual flirtation along the way, Wei WuXian slowly realizes that Lan WangJi, a seemingly haughty and indifferent poker-face, holds more feelings for Wei WuXian than he is letting on.

title: Radia
genre: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Masao Yajima
synopsis: Not found

title: Hikaru to Hikaru
genre: Genderswap, Action, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, School Life
author: Getsu Takebayashi
synopsis:
"Hikaru to Hikaru" is a comedy about Hikaru Katsuragi, a boy who is a descendant of the Iga ninja, sneaking into a girls' school.

In the Katsuragi family, if you don't master the secret "Kunoichi no Jutsu," which turns your body into a female body, by the age of 18, you won't be recognized as an adult, and his mother was worried about Hikaru's immature technique.

In order for such a Hikaru to become a full-fledged woman, he is ordered to attend a prestigious school for young ladies, Kazami Girls' School, in the form of a woman.

title: Watashi No Messiah-Sama
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Suu Minazuki
synopsis:
Shinya doesn't get good grades. He's weak, a coward, not athletic he's a general good for nothing. One day; however, he meets Haruna, a girl who could change his life forever. Haruna tells Shinya that he is the Messiah, the lord chosen to save her world, and that she is his shield.  
Can it be true? Is Shinya's life of ineptitude balance for this one grand cause? Is he the Messiah? If he is, can he save himself let alone an entire world?  
  
Originally ran as "Watashi no Messiah-sama" (26 chapters) and "Watashi no Messiah-sama ~lacrima~" (35 chapters)

title: Meeting My Ex-Girlfriend
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Full Color
author: Yeongol
synopsis: What are the chances of running into an ex-lover at the recycling station? A newly written story of two women reunited as apartment neighbors.

title: Ore Ga Kokuhaku Sarete Kara, Ojou No Yousu Ga Okashii
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation
author: Ryuu Hidari
synopsis:
The servant of the Tendou family, Eito, serves the perfect young lady, Hoshine. 

One day, Eito informs Hoshine that someone from another class confessed their feelings for him. Hoshine, who has hidden her feelings for Eito since childhood, begins to feel uneasy: 

"Ive loved Eito for a much longer time!"

 As a result, Hoshine starts to approach Eito even more, making bolder advances than ever before! She gets close to him in crowded trains and begs him to sleep by her side While Eito tries to maintain his role as a formal servant, Hoshine increasingly pursues him with her advances. 

Its an adorable romantic comedy between a mistress and her servant, featuring a young lady who strives to win her servants love!

title: Heart of Thomas
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Moto Hagio
synopsis:
As winter draws to a close, German boarding school student Thomas Werner dies one morning. He leaves behind a single letter addressed to his fellow student Juli that reads "Here is my love. Here is the sound of my heart."  
  
With his faith shaken to the core by the words, the scholarly Juli sinks to the depths of despair. His cynical roommate Oscar finds himself watching over Juli's fragile mental state while keeping his own feelings for Juli under wraps. Then new student Eric enters the school - and he has an uncanny resemblance to the deceased Thomas  
  
Enter the world of a boy's boarding school in Germany where all will be revealed about the suffering and redemption that comes with love. Even today, this early work of Hagio Moto is still regarded as a brilliant masterpiece.  
  
This is volumes 11-12 of Hagio Moto Works

title: Cool Shock Guy B.T.
genre: Oneshot, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Adventure, Adaptation
author: NISIOISIN
synopsis: Nisio Isin and Posuka Demizu return to create another spin-off in the Cool Shock B.T. universe. An adult B.T., working as a magician in Las Vegas, challenges a gunslinging gambler in a high-stakes roulette game.

title: Life Is Money
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Teru Asaniji
synopsis: Ten contestants agrees to put their life on the line to have a chance of winning 100,000,000 yen. To win, they must survive 10 days inside the prison

title: Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Akira Himekawa
synopsis: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time manga is based off of the popular Nintendo 64 game of the same name. Young hero Link travels the world of Hyrule in search of the Spiritual Stones and encounters many friendly faces throughout his journey, including Zelda, the princess of Hyrule. The focus of Link's courageous quest is to thwart the evil king Ganondorf's plans to rule Hyrule. But when our hero is absent for seven years, Ganondorf has the opportunity to obtain the power of the gods, the Triforce.

title: Yuureitou
genre: Psychological, Romance, Crossdressing, Drama, Horror, Mystery
author: Tarou Nogizaka
synopsis:
In the 1950s, an old woman was brutally murdered on the face of a clock tower by her adopted daughter. Two years later, the clock tower is known as the 'ghost tower' and it is supposedly haunted. Through an unusual series of events, a young NEET man named Amano Taichi is attacked by someone or something in the same clock tower, and finds himself bound to the clock face to be killed in the same way as the old woman. Luckily for Amano, he doesn't meet the same fate. He's rescued by a mysterious person who claims his name is Tetsuo.  
  
Tetsuo is searching for a treasure that is connected with the ghost tower, and he wants Taichi to be his partner. Taichi, whose life has mostly consisted of poverty, loneliness, and pornography, is enticed by the idea of gaining extreme wealth. He's further convinced when a house fire leaves him without a home and depends on Tetsuo's charity. The adventure is going to be very dangerous, since the same 'enemies' who attacked Taichi before seem certain to try something again! Not to mention, Taichi really knows very little about his new partner, especially while regarding his true identity!

title: Soredemo Sekai Wa Utsukushii
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Drama, Fantasy
author: Dai Shiina
synopsis: Nike is the fourth princess of the Rain Duchy and one who holds the power to call forth the rain. Despite her own reluctance, for the sake of her country she travels to the Sun Kingdom to marry Sun King Livius. She soon discovers that the King, who conquered the world within only three years of ascending to the throne, is actually a child?! Furthermore, for trivial reasons, he demands that Nike call forth the rain?!

title: Rain
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Suisen Tomura
synopsis:
The small country Sunkwoll is in a tight spot because it's under attack of the great country Zarmine. But the general, Rain, who's reputed to be an exceptionally gifted swordsman, is against the war and won't enter the battle. But how is one supposed to wage a war like this anyway?  
  
*Note: Author passed away in Feb 2019, leaving the source material for the manga, novel incomplete.*

title: Kurozakuro
genre: Action, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Yoshinori Natsume
synopsis: Sakurai Mikito is a wimp who is constantly bullied and never fights back, as he doesn't want to hurt others.This all changes when a mysterious sphere enters him - Zakuro. He soon begins to feel different feeling desires to eat humans. Is he still human, or will he succumb to his desires and fully become a monster?

title: Silver Fang  the Shooting Star Gin 
genre: Award Winning, Action, Animals, Adventure, Gore
author: Yoshihiro Takahashi
synopsis:
This is the first and original story in the Ginga, the Silver Fang, series.  
It covers the birth of the silver-coloured brindle bear-dog, Gin, whose father gets killed early in the story by the bloodthirsty bear Akakabuto.  
Gin promises himself, his father and his human friends to swear revenge.  
He trains together with his young human master, Daisuke to kill the bear to vengeance all his victims.  
One day, while hunting bears in the mountains, Gin meets a pack of wild dogs with the very same goal.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1987**

title: Darren Shan
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Takahiro Arai
synopsis:
Darren Shan's an ordinary schoolboy, until he and his best friend Steve get tickets to the Cirque Du Freak, a bizarre freak show featuring such arcane performers. In the midst of the ghoulish excitement, true terror raises its head when Steve recognises that one of the performers  Mr Crepsley  is in fact a vampire! That's when the hands of fate changes the lives of them forever!  
  
Based on the english novel series Cirque Du Freak by author Darren Shan.

title: Cerberus
genre: Action, Comedy, Harem, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Takumi Fukui
synopsis: Kei often gets involved in fights, despite of him being weak and always end up losing. One day, while helping a friend to bring some textbooks to an old building of his school, he and his childhood friend, Tomoe, are attacked by a monster. In order to save his friend, Kei will choose to become a Grave Protector!

title: Mahouka Koukou No Rettousei - Yotsuba Keishou-Hen
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Tsuna Kitaumi
synopsis:
In December, Miyuki receives an invitation for the Yotsuba's new year's family gathering. However, unlike previous years, they specially added "Everyone must attend" on the invitation. Miyuki understands that "the time has come"  it is time to decide the next head for the Yotsuba Clan.  
 If she is elected, her brother will be free.  
 If she becomes the next head, she will be forced to marry someone else.  
Miyuki's heart is a mess.  
The truth of the Brother and Sister relationship is finally unveiled!? Yotsuba Keishou-hen begins!  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volume 16.

title: Kounai Renai Shitara Kubi
genre: Boys' Love, Delinquents
author: Atro
synopsis: Campus Romance ForbiddenBreak it, and you're fired." A new rule is introduced at the high school where 26-year-old Shuuya Imari works. Annoyed by his colleagues' complaints, Shuuya, who believes teachers should focus on their students rather than engage in romance, is taken aback when the new, handsome school nurse, Rio Shikai (22), aggressively pursues him with an unusually high level of affection...!? A Yandere school nurse × a stern glasses-wearing teacher in a thrilling BL chase!

title: Tenkuu Shinpan Arrive
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Survival, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Tsuina Miura
synopsis: Senya is just an ordinary boy, who wanted to become an astronaut as a kid. One day and suddenly, he's transported into another world after seeing on the rooftop of his school something like a "tower" going across the sky. There, he witnesses a ruined world, where skyscrapers are connected by suspension bridges. Senya, perplexed, manages to see a girl standing on the roof of another building, as well as a masked man holding a bloody weapon in his hands

title: Funbari No Uta
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural
author: Hiroyuki Takei
synopsis:
Funbari no Uta is a series of short stories written by Hiroyuki Takei relating to his manga series Shaman King. All except one, were reprinted in the original Shaman King manga volume print run.  
  
The chapter numbered Funbari no Uta stories are set seven years later (2007) after the Shaman Tournament, and revolves around Hana Asakura, the son of Yoh and Anna. Hana and Ryunosuke Umemiya are searching for the members of Team Ren and Lyserg for the grand opening of Funbari no Onsen, which is run by Tamao in the story.

title: Joan
genre: Historical, Demons, Psychological, Survival, Sexual Violence, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Yoshikazu Yasuhiko
synopsis: Guided by visions of "la Pucelle" (the name given to Joan by followers), Emil seeks to unite France under the divine rule of the King. In her quest, Emil goes to the same places Joan had traveled through, and gains her own followers in the process. However, Emil is opposed by the dauphin Louis, a brute enforcer who fears no divine power and wishes to make his own bid to rule the country.

title: Isekai Maou to Shoukan Shoujo No Dorei Majutsu
genre: Reincarnation, Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Naoto Fukuda
synopsis:
When it comes to the fantasy MMORPG Cross Reverie, none can match the power of the Demon King Diablo. Possessing the game's rarest artifacts and an unrivaled player level, he overpowers all foolish enough to confront him. But despite his fearsome reputation, Diablo's true identity is Takuma Sakamoto, a shut-in gamer devoid of any social skills.   
  
Defeating hopeless challengers day by day, Takuma cares about nothing else but his virtual lifethat is, until a summoning spell suddenly transports him to another world where he has Diablo's appearance!  
  
In this new world resembling his favorite game, Takuma is greeted by the two girls who summoned him: Rem Galeu, a petite Pantherian adventurer, and Shera L. Greenwood, a busty Elf summoner. They perform an Enslavement Ritual in an attempt to subjugate him, but the spell backfires and causes them to become his slaves instead.

With the situation now becoming more awkward than ever, Takuma decides to accompany the girls in finding a way to unbind their contract while learning to adapt to his new existence as the menacing Demon King.

title: Watashi No Shounen
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Hitomi Takano
synopsis:
Satoko Tawada is an office worker. She's almost 30 years old, but she still hasn't been able to find happiness in her life. Fate brings her with Mashuu Hayami, a beautiful 12-year-old boy whom she finds practicing soccer all by himself in the park. On a whim, she decides to help Mashuu with his practice, with her knowledge of soccer at her disposal. As they practice together on an everyday routine, the two eventually develop an emotional bond. When Satoko's ex-boyfriend deceives her, Mashuu gladly comforts her. And when Satoko learns of Mashuu's mostly absent parents, she starts to concern herself with his personal life. The two lonely souls find common ground and develop an emotional bond that transcends their age difference and circumstances. With this newfound bond, new feelings start to sprout within Satoko. Are these feelings that of maternity? Or is it something else?

**Awards:**
- Ranked #11 in the 2017 Manga Taisho Awards
- Won 3rd place in the Tsugi ni Kuru Manga Awards, Category Print Manga (2017)
- Won 2nd Place in the 2017 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! Awards for male readers
- Won 1st Place in the 2016 Oreman (???) My Best Manga Gran Prix manga rankings.

title: Idolish7 Re:Member
genre: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Arina Tanemura
synopsis: The novel, "Re:member," from the popular idol rhythm game makes it to comic format! The past of Idolish7's senpai group, Re:vale, is finally revealed! What hurdles have Banri, Yuki and Momo overcome before the formation of the group?

title: Osananajimi Wa, Nyaa to Naite Skirt No Naka.
genre: Girls' Love, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Raku Nanahashi
synopsis: Not found

title: More Than Brothers
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: S-MONKEY
synopsis:
The younger brother living next door was as cute as a small angel when he was a child, but after reuniting many years later, he drastically changed? In order to properly discipline this rebellious younger brotherBai Yun, the gentle elder brother, Lan Tian, will do his best to take up on that responsibility. What Lan Tian didnt know was that Bai Yun wanted to tell him: Youve been treating me as your younger brother, but Ive never thought of you as my older brother! Can a crush lasting many years finally blossom?

---
As a child, a boy who looked like a cute angel lived with him next door. But then he left and came back many years later. But when he returned, he changed a lot. In order to somehow control this rebel Lan Tang, you need to try very hard.

---
[Official Japanese Translation / ???](https://piccoma.com/web/product/117078)

title: Shaman King Zero
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, School Life, Supernatural
author: Hiroyuki Takei
synopsis:
Shaman King follows the adventures of Yoh Asakura as he attempts to hone his shaman skills to become the Shaman King in the Shaman tournament.  
  
However, this series is before the Shaman Tournament arc.

title: Assassins Pride
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Kei Amagi
synopsis: In the world where only the aristocrats have the power to fight the monster  mana. A youth named Kufa is dispatched as a tutor to find Mareida's talent, a nuisance girl born in a duke's family. If she is not talented, assassinate her. That, is the dark side of his task.

title: Merry on the Rocks
genre: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Drama
author: Moscareto
synopsis:
With Christmas around the corner, Noel (top) feels restless and uneasy. He enters a bar where he runs into the man of his dreams and, by happy chance, they spend the night together. However, by morning the man has already disappeared. 
All Noel knows about him is his name, June (bottom), but will they be able to meet again? 
Disappointed, Noel cant stop thinking about June, so much so that he makes mistakes in his presentation. Hes in the middle of rebuking himself when, in the hallways of his clients building, he sees a familiar face

title: Devilman Lady
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Girls' Love, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Gou Nagai
synopsis:
Fudou Jun is a highschool teacher and takes a trip with a group of students. While there, a group of martial artists staying nearby take a strange interest in the girls.  
These men are actually demons and after changing into their true form break into the cabin to rape the girls. One gets Jun and violates her.  
She feels her soul being torn apart and transforms into Devilman Lady. With newfound powers and strength she kills all the demons and protects the girls from any further harm.  
What are these demons and why did she turn into a hybrid of one? What does this mean for her and for the rest of humanity?

title: I Want to Eat You
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Drama, Full Color
author: Izumi Kirihara
synopsis: Having received an imperial decree to marry a barbarian, Eunwoo, overwhelmed with mixed emotions, went for a solitary walk. There, she stumbled upon a massive tiger with an injured paw. 'Eat me,' the tiger requested as a reward for her help. Baekhui, the tiger king, was dumbfounded by this unusual request but couldn't help but salivate at the sight of Eunwoo. 'Such a delicious-looking face,' he thought. From that day forward, Baekhui was consumed by thoughts of how to savor her. In his quest to make her his mate, he relentlessly pursues her with seductive charms... A thrilling tale of seduction and conquest, featuring Baekhui, the ever-flirtatious tiger, and Eunwoo, the pure yet resolute Joseon princess!

title: Honey Catch
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Wang Tao
synopsis: Not found

title: Satsukare
genre: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Tragedy
author: Miyoshi Toumori
synopsis: Y?ta Kiry? is an abusive man who raises his hands to women. One day when they're on a date, Y?ta shows violence toward his girlfriend as usual, but unexpectedly, life is turned around in an instant. His girlfriend dies and while fleeing the scene, he encounters a group of serial murderers. He finds himself repelled by their "values" but is nonetheless pulled into their world. The manga features an array of criminal types including men who commit domestic violence, a murderer-rapist, a cannibal, and a necrophiliac. Who do you want to be killed?

title: The Day the Real One Appeared
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Geu-Ru Eun
synopsis:
Mel Slopy, an orphan of common birth, had her hair turn white after a childhood fever. While unconscious from the illness, her parents abandoned her due to their crushing debts, leaving her to be taken in by Noma.  

One day, Duke Heaven, grief-stricken and mentally unwell after losing his youngest daughter, mistakes Mel for his deceased child, Bleria Charlotte Heaven, because of their similar hair color.  

To quell the growing rumors about his fathers instability, Damian Jeremiah Heaven, the dukes son, visits Mel. He demands that she pretend to be Bleria to protect the familys reputation.  

Living as Bleria, Mel is soon thrust into preparing for an engagement with Gopher Isaac Allnight, the heir of the powerful Allnight Ducal House. But what challenges await her in this life of deception?

title: The Hachioji Specialty: Tengu'S Love
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Yoshi Tsukizuki
synopsis:
The life of a single-minded tengu bride and a lonely young man living together on the premise of marriage!

Kotaro, a lonely young man who has returned to his hometown for some reason, is reunited with Hime, a tengu girl, at Mt. Hime says that they must get married! A one-sided (?) marriage is assumed. Living together with a tengu is full of surprises!
___
**Note:** The series is authored by Nanao Tomo, which is an alias of Tsukizuki Yoshi.

title: Sangokushi
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Mitsuteru Yokoyama
synopsis:
Manga adaptation of Romance of the Three Kingdoms, illustrated by the legendary Mitsuteru Yokoyama. Serialized from 1972~1986, it has since become the most famous manga adaptation of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.

---- 
**Won the 20th Japanese Cartoonist Association Excellence Award in 1991**

title: Hana-Uta Memoir
genre: Time Travel, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Kei Ichinose
synopsis: Ume Sasaki, a senior in high school, is helping out at her great-grandmother's ryokan during this summer vacation. She goes to the ryokan in hopes of getting some hints about her future...? This is the brightest and most dazzling "memory (memoir)" of the girls.

title: My Bias Appeared?!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Full Color
author: Nabit
synopsis:
Aejoon, a high school teacher who's a die hard fan of Siyeol, a member in the national idol group A1(Aone).  
"I went to work with a heavy heart like always and left behind my love for Siyeol, but for no reason, out of nowhere, My bias came to my school!  
However, My bias's actions are suspicious because it looks like he's trying to seduce me?

title: The Soulless Duchess
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jin-Seo Han
synopsis:
The naïve Yvona is ready to do anything for her amazing fiancé! Summon magical beasts and let him take the glory? Sure! Wreck her body for a powerful spell and die for him? Yes! Watch him secretly embrace her trusted cousin Tristan with passion and deride her openly? Oka wait. What? Just then, Yvona dies... and wakes up a year in the past with a burdened heart. Armed with her knowledge, Yvona's ready to fight for herself. And hmm, maybe form an alliance with the coldhearted Duke of Azentine...

---
I died miserably on the day I found out the truth. The truth that my fiancé had a hidden lover, and it was my very own male cousin.

On the second morning, after my 20th birthday, a miracle happened. From that point on, I decided not to believe in love anymore. I want to have a relationship with no strings attached and without any superficial feelings such as love.

"Duke Agentine, will you marry me?"

This proposal was nothing more than a marriage to keep up appearances and without love involved.

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=53939289)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-soulless-duchess/)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / ??](https://www.podoteng.com/)

**Original Novel:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4386129), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/3170012735)

**Official Novel Translation:** [Japanese / ???](https://piccoma.com/web/product/72805)

title: Visitor to Earth
genre: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Aliens, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Harushi Fukuyama
synopsis: In order to understand the true power of Earth, the alien Xiguang goes undercover as a student on Earth. He mistakenly believes that the science-fiction themed comics and movies on Earth are a display of Earthlings' ability to simulate interstellar wars, so he resolutely joins the school's anime club. Due to the cultural gap between aliens and Earthlings, a series of hilarious events unfold... Xiguang's seemingly humiliating but actually ridiculous undercover life is about to begin! So, Stay tuned.

title: The Lord of Coins
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dae-Ui Hong
synopsis: Aaron Steelegard's fortune was basically set as he discovered a book that allowed him to trade across dimensionsuntil his enemies take both his life and his riches away. But Aaron is brought back as his younger self, armed with his past knowledge and a chance at revenge! Now free to amass coins, he's gaining powerful abilities and moving up the ranks of the interdimensional trading markets. Will Aaron gain enough coins to survive this journey of vengeance and reclaim his honor?

title: Katarika
genre: Psychological, Ghosts, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Kien Cien
synopsis: The story of "Katarika: The Curse of Ghostly Tales" follows a group of girls trapped by a mysterious "curse" linked to Ghostly tales. It combines thrilling suspense and emotional depth, focusing on their friendships as they navigate this eerie phenomenon. The manga blends supernatural horror with the characters' personal struggles, unraveling a chilling tale of how stories can shape and destroy their world.

title: Act Like You Love Me!
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Xuann
synopsis:
Dealing with three jobs daily.  
  
A mountain of stress and a pigsty to call home are the only things waiting for twenty-five-year old Jiun at the end of her work.  
  
Until one day, a stuffed doll finds her way into her arms  and with this, she's able to spoil herself with the housekeeping of Nam Doyoon, South Korea's top actor?!

---
[Alternate raws (Naver Series)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?productNo=5740892)  

[Official Indonesian](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/do-as-i-say/list?title_no=2489)

title: Drug Devourer
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Han-Jip
synopsis:
One day, a gate suddenly opened in the heavens, bringing with it the invasion of monsters and the intervention of monks in the human world.

?Miracle Drug Coffee Administration?

?Medicinal Contents: Caffeine and Sugar?
? Provides energy
? Stimulates the central nervous system
? Maximizes senses and reflexes

The whole world appeared to slow down, and Hanyuls medications began to show their true effects.

title: Inazuma Eleven
genre: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Sports, Fantasy
author: Tenya Yabuno
synopsis:
Raimon Middle School 's soccer club captain, Endou Mamoru is in a pinch - his club is about to be destroyed! Literally! To avert the wrecking ball and disbanding of the club, his team must win against the toughest soccer team in the area - Teikoku. Will Endou and his team meet a crushing defeat or will a mysterious transfer student with a fiery kick save them from disaster?!  
  
Won the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for Best Children's Manga.

title: The Friends-Eater Classroom
genre: Sexual Violence, Gore, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Yusura Kankitsu
synopsis: At Sakurazaka High School, students in class 1-A are involved in an unreasonable game called "The Friends-Eater Game", in which one of the conditions of the game is to eat specific parts of the bodies of their friends to survive. Cannibal school begins.

title: Caterpillar
genre: Action, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Murata Shinya
synopsis:
Possessing both flexibility and tenacity, Imomushi (Japanese for Caterpillar) is an assassin that does not kill anyone but those who are assigned to her. She seems to have had something happen between her and her older sister in the past, however.  
  
A new spin-off story from the same author of Arachnid, this story looks at the inner workings of a top assassin within The Organization itself.  
  
Note: In early 2014, serialization resumed with a new artist. The series had been on hiatus after the sudden passing of the previous artist in 2013

[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%94%E3%83%A9%E3%83%BC_(%E6%BC%AB%E7%94%BB)&redirect=no)

title: Arachnid
genre: Action, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Horror, Tragedy
author: Murata Shinya
synopsis:
Alice is a senior high school student who lives with an uncle that spends his time tormenting her everyday. One day, Alice witnesses the death of her uncle by the hands of an assassin called "Kumo" (Arachnid in Japanese). She then falls unconscious, and upon waking up, she finds out that she's in Kumo's house Now, this Alice who no longer has any family is being raised by the assassin himself..!  
  


---

title: Sword Art Online - Mother'S Rosario
genre: Action, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Tsubasa Hazuki
synopsis: While Asuna, Leafa, Silica and Lisbeth were doing their homework in Kirito and Asuna's Log House on the 22nd Floor of New Aincrad, Lisbeth informed Asuna of a player known as Absolute Sword who was challenging players on the 24th Floor, while offering an 11-hit Original Sword Skill as a reward. Asuna was told that the mysterious player had actually converted from a different game and that over thirty players who had attempted to challenge the player, including Leafa and even Kirito, were defeated. Hearing that Kirito had said something to the player before being defeated and not sharing what he had said with the others and thinking that the mysterious player had come for a reason, Asuna decided to challenge the player as well. To her surprise, the player was actually a girl, named Yuuki.

title: Warning! Beware of the Dog
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Xiao Yu Yu
synopsis:
By some sort of fate, exorcist Xiao Yu is forced to "cohabitate" with the succubus named Obsidian, who killed her adoptive father. Yet she discovers that the succubus seems to have lost her memories! Unaccepting of this fact, Xiao Yu decides to spy on Obsidian's every move, yet the latter doesn't seem bothered by the least. Instead, she starts to thirst after Xiao Yu openly and often teases her body to satiate her own hunger...

Although they seem to have a love-hate relationship, they both know that something is stirring beneath the depths. Why her adoptive father was killed, why Obsidian's memory was sealed away, and...

title: What the Duke Picked up in the Forest
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Jae-Won Lee
synopsis:
Im going to do this for the last time, so let me go back with my memories.

Those who died for me 29 times... I wanted to protect you with my own hands at least once. I want to protect those poor and pitiful 'my people.'

Thus, Elysia's 30th and last regression began. Everything began to change as if fate had been twisted into place. A child who was born without a sign in a family that received Gods protection and lived a harsh life. I gradually realize that the beginning of the curse disguised as God's blessing all started with one person...

title: Life Liar From Hell
genre: Oneshot, Reincarnation, Time Travel, Romance, Drama
author: Morihiro Hayashi
synopsis: Not found

title: Bibliomania
genre: Monsters, Psychological, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Obaru
synopsis:
Alice had woken up in Room 431 of a mysterious manor.  
  
"You must not leave this room," warned the Serpent, but she paid it no heed and her body began to rot  
  
Will she be able to escape the cursed manor?  
  
*Was nominated for the [2019 Japan Media Arts Festival Awards - Manga Category](http://archive.j-mediaarts.jp/en/festival/2019/manga/).*

title: Saezuru Tori Wa Habatakanai
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Drama, Tragedy
author: Kou Yoneda
synopsis: Yashiro is the young leader of Shinseikai and the president of the Shinseikai Enterprise, but like so many powerful men, he leads a double life as a deviant and a masochist. Chikara Doumeki comes to work as a bodyguard for him and, although Yashiro had decided that he would never lay a hand on his own men, he finds there's something about Doumeki that he can't resist. Yashiro makes advances toward Doumeki, but Doumeki has mysterious reasons for denying. Yashiro, who abuses his power just to abuse himself, and Doumeki, who faithfully obeys his every command, begin the tumultuous affair of two men with songs in their hearts and no wings to fly.

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V
genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Naoto Miyoshi
synopsis:
Yu?Gi?Oh! Arc-V centers around Yuuya Sakaki, a mysterious Entertainment Duelist known as "The Phantom" along with his three other personalities: Yuuto, Yuugo, and Yuuri. He was chased after by Leo Corporation for hacking into their Solid Vision with mass system and used it for his own purpose.  
  
While on the run, he meets Yuzu Hiiragi, the daughter of the principal of Syu Zo Duel School that was on the verge of bankruptcy and tricked Yuuya into a contract to become a teacher at her school. However, before Yuuya could teach at the school, he first must find a card called Genesis Omega Dragon that said will determine the fate of the world that also connected to his scattered memories.  
  
The story is set in alternate version of Miami City where Leo Corporation, run by its president Reiji Akaba, dominates most of Solid Vision system throughout the city. The spread of the company's Solid Vision with mass not only gave birth to "Action Duels" but also help improving the city in saving lives and repair damage in case of disaster, becoming a vital part of people's life.

title: From Villainess to Healer: I Know the Cheat to Change My Fate
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Namura Katamura
synopsis:
In the world of Reas Love, a spinoff otome game, the villainess Charlotte Cocoriaras engagement to the prince of Farblume Kingdom is suddenly broken off. The reason? The Prince finds her job as Dark Mage ill-suited for his future queen. Hed rather be with a Healer, and there is no such thing as a job change. But Charlotte has a secret...memories of her past life playing Reas Life Online, the original MMORPG! Armed with her cheat knowledge, Charlotte immediately takes off to the Sacred Land of Erenzi where she uses information no one else in Reas Love knows to change her jobto a Healer! Except she has no intention of going back to the Prince. What she really wants is to see the world and live a life full of adventure!

(Source: J-Novel Club)

title: Neko No Te Datte Yaku Ni Tatsu
genre: Animals, Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color
author: NOBEL
synopsis:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)

title: Jupiteria
genre: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Mystery
author: Hirotsugu Kajiyama
synopsis:
The year is 2150, and humanity has entered the Space Age of Exploration. The largest planet in the solar system, Jupiter, in particular is a treasure trove of natural resources. Seeking those resources, humanity has built up numerous biospheres in its vicinity.

Those who are born in zero gravity in the Jupiter Zone are known as "Jupiterians". Rico Alberoni is one such person. He lives on Callisto, Jupiter's fourth moon. For him each day was a torment  bullied at school for his peculiar Jupiterian constitution and poked and prodded like a guinea pig at the lab.

Until one day he met a man who makes his living recovering wrecked spaceships, a "salvager" named Reiji...

This is a story about a boy who couldn't seize today cutting his own path into the unknowable tomorrow. This is an outer space frontier tale for a new generation!

title: Jumidoro
genre: Action, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Kouichi Taki
synopsis: In the Colosseum, there was a gladiator girl known as the **Unbeaten Sword**  Ramune. Bought as a slave, Ramune unexpectedly found freedom after a carriage accident. The girl, now free, sets off to see the world, learn, and experience the kindness of others as she lives on. However, Ramune doesn't know what "normal" is. She has never been taught not to slay people, or that killing is wrong...

title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural
author: Shin Yoshida
synopsis: The series is set in the near future. Something unexpected happens as Ryoga Kamishiro challenges Yuma Tsukumo to a Duel. When the mysterious entity Astral appears before them, a new legend begins.

title: Dressmaker
genre: Oneshot, Historical, Magic, Fantasy
author: Kaoru Mori
synopsis:
What better way to welcome in the new year than with a new dress?

---

Published in December 2024's Aokishi 23B.

title: Mr. Clice
genre: Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Survival, Mafia, Adventure, Military, Medical
author: Osamu Akimoto
synopsis:
Jin Clice is a super dashing spy, special agent for Japan's elite espionage program, whose body was mortally wounded by the KGB. 
Having already invested a lot of money in him, the agency would not allow him to die so easily though. Desperately trying to save his life, 
the government transferred his mind into the body of a recently deceased tennis player which happens to be a young beautiful woman! 
The dashing ladies man has, in essence, gone from being Bond to being the Bond girl!

title: Boku No Risou No Isekai Seikatsu ~Tensei Shitara Kemomimi Musume Darake No Sekai De Harem Ni~
genre: Loli, Romance, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota
author: Ichiri
synopsis:
A 40-year-old virgin man working for a black company has never been with a girl, let alone married one. Having nothing to do but love cute girls, one day he loses consciousness during an all-nighter of work??. When he wakes up...he finds himself reborn as "Norun," a male with cat ears, in another world full of animal-eared girls, where there are far more females than males!!!? His cute fiancée, Misha, and other attractive girls with animal-ears who are potential brides appear before him one after the other??!?

Thus begins "Norun's" dream-filled otherworldly life ? However, this world has a big secret......!? He can procreate with cute girls as much as he wants!!? The slow sex life in another world, which has become a big hit in the doujinshi scene and has been downloaded more than 300,000 times, is about to begin??!!!!!

title: Doryung'S Family
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: GAL-BI
synopsis: They argue when they meet, but miss each other when they don't. Family dynamics never seem to end. There is love, but also tears. Every family member has their own story. This is the journey of the youngest, Doryung, along with his family, who have a million stories to tell!

title: Tonari No Stella
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Ammitsu
synopsis: Chiaki and Subaru have been the closest since they were kids. Chiaki has always liked him but as Subaru walks further into the world of entertainment, Chiaki decides the time has come to move past her one-sided feelings and find new love. Does she have enough resolve to meet someone better, or will she find herself shaken by her long-time love? A close, yet distant love story between a normal girl and her actor childhood friend!

title: Doooom!
genre: Psychological, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Satoru Akahori
synopsis: Look and youll die. Post a message and youll be cursed. Horror begins to spread with the use of smartphones. Introducing a new series filled with mystery about the horrors of social media!

title: Shigatsu Tsuitachi No Ame
genre: Drama, School Life, Delinquents
author: Kei Yujuu
synopsis:
The story centers around Yui, a high school boy who often goes with the flow of those around him, which typically ends up with him going along with things he doesn't agree with.  In these situations, he is fed up with his inability to do anything but say no. 

On the other hand, there's his eccentric classmate Haru, who is completely unable to read between the lines. Then, a certain incident leads Yui to lash out at Haru, "Read the room! Do you know what it means to play along'? That's how you create good relationships with people," to which Haru responds, "How meaningless."

title: Go Forward with the Rebels
genre: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Hua Shen Xiansheng
synopsis: In a world where energy is exhausted and resources are scarce, most of the world's resources are occupied by a few people. Slowly, an upper-level supernatural world called "Mirage" is established.

title: Tasogare No Hito
genre: Drama, Mystery
author: Moyashi Fujisawa
synopsis: One summer day, a boy named Tatsuomi Shiba arrives in the town where Riko, an eighth grader, lives. His family, who are related to the chairman of a major corporation, are welcomed by the townspeople, but Tatsuomi keeps his distance from everyone around him. Riko, who cannot leave him alone, makes memories of their summer together, and on his birthday, she promises Tatsuomi a gift and a promise. However, their happy days come to an end with the end of summer. Who is the person I fell in love with for the first time?

title: One Day, Suddenly, Seoul Is
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Drama, Horror, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Chang-Geun Park
synopsis:
"Youre its prey the moment you touch it." 

One day, a terrible virus variant attacks Seoul! 

Yeon-woo is on a school trip to Seoul, and is excited thinking that he can finally get along with his one classmate, So-yeon, whom he has a crush on.

However, during this time, unidentified cells appeared in front of Yeon-woos class, who were sightseeing in Seoul. The mutant cells manifestation quickly turns Yeon-woo and his classmates school trip into hell as anyone who comes into contact with the cells will become a hideous monster that wants to consume anything with flesh...! 

Will Yeon-woo be able to leave Seoul safely?

title: Gakuen Sensuikan-Tai: Mermaid Girls
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Military, Gore, Aliens
author: Makoto Fukami
synopsis: In the manga's story, extra-terrestrial life known as Trench Walkers reveal themselves, emerging from the Antarctic, and walking on the sea floor. Their goal is to terraform the Earth to their liking, which involves raising the sea level by 70 meters, thus rendering Tokyo and many other population centers uninhabitable. They have also begun to change Earth's surface water into what they call Nectar, the "divine water." Those who are incompatible with Nectar have a high chance of death when imbibing it. However, there are girls who are found to be compatible with Nectar, and they are recruited to be marines in a fight against the Trench Walkers, boarding ships to do battle in a new deep sea front line. The story centers on Hiro Todoroki, who receives a message from an older sister, a marine supposedly missing in action. The message tells Hiro to find a formidable marine named Kiriri Tsunoba. Though lost and confused, Hiro heads to the Masakado Girls Academy Submarine Unit with the intent to join them.

title: Koe No Katachi
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Drama, School Life
author: Yoshitoki Ooima
synopsis:
The story revolves around Nishimiya Shouko, a grade school student who has impaired hearing. She transfers into a new school, where she is bullied by her classmates, especially Ishida Shouya. It gets to the point where she transfers to another school and as a result, Shouya is ostracized and bullied himself, with no friends to speak of and no plans for the future. Years later, he sets himself on a path to redemption.  

---

Note: Won the 19th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Award New Artist Prize in 2015 and the Ogaki City Cultural Alliance Award (Lifestyle Culture Division). Nominated for the category "Best U.S. Edition of International Material" in the 2016 Eisner Awards.

title: Shu Yo, Omukae No Jikan Desu
genre: Boys' Love, Fantasy
author: Ayumi Kano
synopsis:
Is my adorable little nephew the reincarnation of the demon king Lucifer?!"

Chris, a picture book author, takes in his nephew after the loss of his brother and sister-in-law during an accident. Noah is a strange and eccentric child with the ability to communicate with animals. One morning, overwhelmed with his new parental situation, Noah jumps into the road?! However, the person who saved Noah before it was too late was Harvey-sensei, the nursery school teacher, a demon with black wings and horns!! Revealing his true identity, the demon kneels down saying, I have come to take you back, Lucifer-sama., announcing that Noah is the reincarnation of the demon king?!

title: Whistle!
genre: Comedy, Sports, School Life
author: Daisuke Higuchi
synopsis: Everybody has a dream, and for Shou Kazamatsuri, that dream is simple: he wants to be the best soccer player he can possibly be. He's the spirited leader of the Josui Junior High team and everyone looks up to him. In turn, he tries to keep the team together at any cost!

title: Yugetatsuran
genre: Slice of Life
author: Yorube Touasa
synopsis: Top salesman by day, number one host by night. In the world of "eat or be eaten," "win or lose," Udai Sasaki had everything he wanted, including money and love - he was burnt out. Until one day he came across a "hot spring review". A strange master-disciple travelogue of hot spring baths that will warm your heart and body!

title: Miki No Houkago
genre: Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Chita Tsumura
synopsis:
A pure-hearted girl(?)'s first love story.  
One day after school, Itsuki sees a beautiful girl coming out of the men's toilet.  
Her true identity is that of Miki, a plain and quiet classmate, crossdressing.  
Since then, Itsuki has been taking care of Miki, but then, another crossdressing girl appears!

title: Haha O Suteru
genre: Oneshot, Psychological, School Life, Tragedy
author: Demo
synopsis: My mother, who raised me and my sister on her own, is diagnosed with terminal cancer. Now I, her son, take time off college to look after her, and when my mother passes away, I must make a decision.

title: Until I Become Me
genre: Genderswap, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Hatsuki Satou
synopsis:
A boy who used to be abusive to girls wakes up one day as one.

"I'll go back being a boy soon," he thought, however that was not the case. 
Follow Akira as he grows and learns little by little to accept the puzzling changings in her surroundings and her heart.

title: Super Cub
genre: School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kanitan
synopsis:
In early summer, 2nd year of high school, Koguma's mom suddenly abandons her, leaving only a note that says "Bye." She is alone, having no parents, no friends, no hobbies. She silently reflects, "I don't have anything." But a chance encounter results in her buying a Honda Super Cub with a disturbing history, and a new life suddenly blossoms open.  
  
Based on the [light novel series with the same name](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Super_Cub_(novel_series)).

title: The Queen'S Dogs
genre: Romance, Drama, Fantasy
author: Yoshikazu
synopsis: A Chinese fantasy story about a princess founding a nation ????.

title: Touhou Shinigami: Meteor Methuselah Gaiden
genre: Oneshot, Action, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Kaori Ozaki
synopsis:
From Inconnu:  
Zol, a bounty hunter who goes by the name of "Grim Reaper", spends his days chasing criminals under the orders of Fuse, his master and the city's respected major.  
One day, Zol takes up responsibility for burying a man who died in a hit-and-run on the streets. But much to his surprise, the supposedly dead man pops out of the coffin!! Is this the world's most wanted man, Methuselah?!  
This is the adventure-packed miniseries of the fateful encounter between the Methuselah named Rain and Zol the Grim Reaper, who is the grandfather of Immortal Rain's heroine Machika!!

title: Gakuen Babysitters
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Hari Tokeino
synopsis: After their parents are killed in a plane crash, Ryuuichi and his younger brother Kotarou are taken in by the chairman, who they never met before, of an elite academy. Ryuuichi becomes the school daycare's new babysitter.

title: The Symbiotic Relationship Between a Newbie and an Oldbie
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Video Games, Drama, School Life, Web Comic
author: Ocha
synopsis:
Kwon Jungwoo is a player of the Tamer Class in the MMORPG game 'The Hymn of Karel'. After failing to receive the class buffs hes been waiting eternally for, Kwon Jungwoo decides to abandon his last remaining hope for the game. And then, he coincidently meets 'ChaRongRong', a newbie player, while offloading his high value items at the auction market. Since he was going to quit the game away,  and with the intention of just helping out a newer player,  he light-heartedly initiated a harmless friendship that 

[Party] ChaRongRong: Bcuz of how far Ive come
[Party] ChaRongRong: Even if a sick melee asks me to party up
[Party] ChaRongRong: I wont abandon you, Hyung
[Party] Mocha: What an honor lolol
[Party] Mocha: but if a kickass melee asks to you party up, just do it
[Party] Mocha: itll be easier 

Jungwoo should definitely not let Cha Rong Rong's words go as if they were just coquetry but..

title: Given: 10Th Mix
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Natsuki Kizu
synopsis:
I've traveled 3650 dawns to see you again.

The sequel to Kizu Natsuki's mega hit alternative love series begins!

title: Soul Fire
genre: Action, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Julie
synopsis:
The Office of Nuo is the governments secret department that protects humans from the misfortunes and complications brought on by evil spirits. 
Yoon Taehee is a Naja who happens to be an agent in the Office of Nuo. Wanting to recruit a successor, he seeks out those with the ability to see and hear spirits. One day, while out on an undercover mission, Yoon Taehee ends up meeting a suspicious student at a high school in the outskirts of a small city in the countryside So, friend, how old are you? 

TL/N: Korean equivalent of someone who practices Nuo Folk Religion. Under Korean traditions, the religion revolved around exorcism and banishment of evil spirits.

title: He Hasn'T Faded
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Luxi
synopsis:
Luyi, an actor known for his acting prowess, and Gu Jiangyuan, a rising star, are well-known for their rivalry in the entertainment industry. After dying in an accident, Luyi is resurrected into a different body, only to find out that his old archenemy, Gu Jiangyuan, has had a crush on him for many years... 
While having his enemy become his lover is one thing, what's with the baffling ghost exorcism missions, as well as Gu Jiangyuan wanting and trying to get rid of the present-him just to bring back the original "Luyi"?!

title: Making a Wish to Santa
genre: Oneshot, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Slice of Life
author: Toyozou Okamura
synopsis: Not found

title: Tezmo Syndrome
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Ikken Satou
synopsis:
A story about Funa Minami, an eccentric girl who loves model railroading, and Mari, an ordinary girl, who together explore the world of modelling through nostalgic products from the early days of the hobby.
(Adapted description from Volume 1)

title: Grashros
genre: Historical, Action, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
author: Muneyuki Kaneshiro
synopsis:
A story set 30,000 years ago, starring the Cro-Magnon, by the duo behind Kami-sama no Iu Toori.  
  
The story follows Akuu, the Cursed Child, born during the night of a blood moon, said to bring calamity upon all and his attempt to fight destiny.

title: The Insipid Prince'S Furtive Grab for the Throne
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Yukino Amagai
synopsis:
The Adresia empire on the Vogel continent. There is a battle over the throne of such an empire that possesses powerful military and vast territory. With the successor undecided, the children of the emperor are vying to expand their power. However, there was one prince that everyone says will definitely not become the emperor. The seventh prince, Arnold Lakes Adler. The young man who was inferior to his younger twin brother in every way, the dull prince.

Incompetent and lethargic, Arnold wastes everyday just playing around. However, behind the scenes, he is one of the only five SS-Class adventurers called 'Silver'. Seeing the intensifying battle for the throne he decided "I don't want to die so lets have my little brother become the emperor..."

title: Imokusa Reijou Desu Ga Akuyaku Reisoku Wo Tasuketara Kiniiraremashita
genre: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Ageha Sakura
synopsis:
Agnes, who was ridiculed in the social circles for being an unfashionable noble, happened to help Nazelbert, the duke's son, who had been betrothed to the Princess. However, the Princess saw this and ordered Nazelbert to marry Agnes as punishment. Isn't it terrible to marry me as a punishment? Look, he seems to hate it too. Wait, he doesn't?

This is a story about an unfashionable noble and a duke's son, who grow closer to each other.

---
* [Orignal Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2047go/)

title: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick up Girls in a Dungeon? Ii
genre: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Taisei Yagami
synopsis: Adventurer Bell Cranell's life changed forever when he met the goddess Hestia, becoming the first member of her familia. Since then, hes gone on many adventures, growing much stronger in the process. But when he steps foot into Orarios pleasure quarter, where Ishtar Familia reigns supreme, he soon finds himself in way over his head... With enemies all around him, hell need the help of a beautiful, fox-eared courtesan if hes to have any hope of making it back home!

title: The Villainess Refuses to Flirt with the Male Lead
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Beiming Mo
synopsis:
Transmigrating as the villainess of a cliché imperial manhua isn't scary, what's scary is that the male leads are all children! Not only do I have to take care of children, but I'm also being courted by one of them and being called "wife"! Ms. Hong would like to say: "Fuck you, god!" ?(??´?)?

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://page.kakao.com/content/59080258)

title: Shounen No Hatsukoi Wa Bishoujo ? Deshita
genre: Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life, Web Comic
author: Kina Kobayashi
synopsis: Tougo Ushiwaka reunites with his childhood friend and first love Ren Ryuugasaki after about 10 years. However, Ushiwaka had been traumatized to discover that Ryuugasaki, who he had thought was a girl, is actually a guy with a fondness for cross-dressing.

title: A Divorced Evil Lady Bakes Cakes
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Cooking, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Pung-Sae Dan
synopsis: I had been working hard as the Duchess for nine years, supporting my quiet and indifferent husband, but all I was left with was contempt, indifference, and accusal of having a love affair. So when he finally asked for a divorce to marry his long-time lover... Theres a limit to what I can endure for this marriage. No matter how much you cry or plead to the Emperor, I cant stand it anymore. Can I sign here? So if you pretend to be poor like last time, this time what? I waved divorce papers on an indifferent day. Im done. Can I go now? Oh, since we both had lovers, of course, I wont be receiving alimony, but youll surely return my dowry, right? What are you gonna do with that little money?, asked my husband, who had not cared what he had done for the past nine years. I laughed confidently and answered: Im going to open a dessert cafe.

title: Danzai Sareta Dame Ouji, Hiroimashita
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Villainess
author: Gunjou Kazuki
synopsis:
Kuruhi, first prince of Gahama Kingdom, is the epitome of a spoiled brat with his arrogant attitude and behavior. After countless misdeeds, he is finally banished from the royal family and reduced to a commoner!

The wandering, mud-covered former prince finds himself at an inn run by Emma, a girl who has a severe obsession with royalty drama. Emma is bewildered by the sudden appearance of her "Oshi", and determined to get him back on his feet, she embarks on a grand project!

title: High School Runway
genre: Oneshot, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life, Web Comic
author: Mugisuke
synopsis: Although Haruka admires fashion, she is nicknamed Ghost Haruka-san because of her tall stature. She starts practicing makeup with Haru-chan, whom she met online, but it seems like Haru-chan has some kind of secret!!?

title: Girls Und Panzer - the Ribboned Warrior
genre: Action, Survival, Sports, Adventure, Military
author: Takeshi Nogami
synopsis: Tankathlon is a new form of tank sport gaining slowly gaining popularity among Senshado enthusiasts. While also involving tank battles, Tankathlon is distinguished by its lack of official oversight allowing any school with tanks to participate in a battle anywhere at any time, and a 10-ton weight restriction on tanks used, limiting battles to light tanks and tankettes.

title: Koi Hajime Wa Ochi Yuku Tsubaki No Shita De
genre: Historical, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Natsuo Ichikawa
synopsis: Haruichi Azuma lost his parents in an accident and was left on his own. He was treated coldly and betrayed by the relatives who took him in. One day, an old friend of his father's invites him to his house to take care of his daughter. However, what awaits him is Tsubaki, the second daughter of the Yaotome family, who is selfish and arrogant. He is fed up with this type of person, but like Haruichi, Tsubaki also has loneliness in her eyes.

title: Toaru Tenin to Kyaku No Hanashi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Sachiko
synopsis: Saki, a college student working at an izakaya, has a crush on Shiraishi, an office worker who is a regular customer. Be brave for your first love today! I gave him a love letter and Shiraishi also has no experience in love?!

title: Rosen Blood
genre: Romance, Reverse Harem, Fantasy, Vampires, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Kachiru Ishizue
synopsis: After the carriage she had embarked upon crashed, Stella is saved by a tall dark and handsome stranger and brought to the mysterious mansion surrounded by poisonous roses in which he lives with three other gorgeous men. However, with no money left, Stella is forced to work as a maid which will prove dangerous for her because she is yet to find out that all four men are actually vampires!

title: My Younger Brother'S Friend
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: NIMNI
synopsis:
Ga-eun is a junior in college who lives with her younger brother, a senior in high school. Ever since their parents' death, she has tried to stay strong and confident amidst juggling school and raising her brother. And after getting dumped by her boyfriend, dating is the last thing on her mind... until she gets involved with three of her brothers friends. Which one will she choose? The cheeky, handsome childhood friend Dowan? The calm, collected, and responsible class president Sangu? Or the quiet and intimidating but kind-hearted Jun?

---
