title: Yoshida Lemon Drops
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Tamiki Wakaki
synopsis:
A Kyoto University student who is afraid of students vs. the most famous female wrestler at Kyoto University!?

Kyoto University is a hotbed of supernatural abilities where geniuses and prodigies from all over the country gather.

After failing the entrance exam once, Yamakawa Kashio became a student at Kyoto University, but he lost his only unique ability to study better than others, and spent his days in fear and depression as a zero-person with no unique ability.

In front of Kashio appears Sawakita Yoko, a classmate who spent three years in the mandolin club with him in high school.

Yoko, who was a plain student like Kashio, enrolled at Kyoto University while still in high school, and made a name for herself as a female wrestler, becoming the most famous Kyoto University student ever!

Kashio is overwhelmed by Yoko, who has become a distant presence, but Yoko has been waiting for Kashio to come to Kyoto University for a long time??!?
The gong of a hot love that will heat up Kamogawa is about to ring out!!

title: Maiden Demon Zakuro
genre: Historical, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Military, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural
author: Lily Hoshino
synopsis:
It's the Meiji Era in a slightly alternate Japan, and the Gregorian calendar has just come into effect. The fox-eared girls living in the youkai part of town are about to be put to work together with a delegation of young human soldiers, to promote interracial understanding. So what will happen when Zakuro's strong personality collides with human sensibilities?  


---

title: Bungou Stray Dogs Official Anthology
genre: Action, Comedy, Anthology, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Akaza Samamiya
synopsis: A collection of Bungou Stary Dogs one-shots chapters by various manga artists.

title: The Legendary Moonlight Sculptor
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Cooking, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Do-Gyeong Lee
synopsis:
The man forsaken by the world, the man a slave to money and the man known as the legendary God of War in the highly popular MMORPG Continent of Magic. With the coming of age, he decides to say goodbye, but the feeble attempt to earn a little something for his time and effort ripples into an effect none could ever have imagined. Through a series of coincidences, his legendary avatar is sold for 3 billion 90 million won ($2.7 million), bringing great joy to him, only to plunge him into despair at losing almost all of it to vicious loan sharks. With revelation of money through gaming, he rises from the abyss with new found resolve and steps forward into the new age of games led by the first ever Virtual Reality MMORPG, Royal Road.  
  
This is the legend of Lee Hyun on his path to becoming Emperor with only his family loving heart, his boundless desire for money, his unexpected mind, his diligently forged body and the talent of hard work backing him. This is the legend of the lowest becoming the strongest. This is the legend of WEED.

title: The Day He Became an Octopus
genre: Oneshot, Award Winning, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Aliens, Supernatural
author: raku
synopsis: Not found

title: Baki Domoe
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, 4-Koma
author: Naoki Saitou
synopsis: Japanese parody gag manga series by manga artist Norio Sakurai about the adventures of the characters in the Baki series and life in their over-the-silly-top world they live in.

title: Giri Choko Girai No Futari
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Kurotama
synopsis:
"You realize that these aren't just obligatory chocolates, right?"

Obligatory chocolate is the kind that you give to people you don't even like, just because it's a Valentine's Day tradition. Aya, a beautiful office lady who is often misunderstood because of her lack of visible emotions, was complaining about it to her boss Takaki, as they walked to the train station together after work. However, Takaki told her, "That's too bad, because I was really looking forward to getting chocolates from Aya, even if it's just obligatory"

As they parted ways, Aya hands Takaki a box of chocolates. Takaki is confused, because he thought she didn't like giving out obligatory chocolates

"Senpai, are you really that dumb?"

Winner of the 3rd Toaru Nichijou Manga Award, it's a sweet romantic comedy that will satisfy your heart and your sweet tooth!

title: Lilies, Voice, Wear Wind
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mei Renjouji
synopsis:
A high school girl who has never known love meets an older woman with a secret...
A junior in high school, Matoi Noshita has never liked anyone and is fed up with being involved in her younger sister's and friends' boyfriend situations.
One day, she meets Yuriko, who has just moved from Tokyo. At a local driving school, she asks her to drive her home on her motorcycle.
Matoi is perplexed by her own curiosity about a woman whose name she does not know and where she lives.
"What on earth is this feeling I am having for the first time...?"

title: Fading Vows
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kuri
synopsis:
I now pronounce you... roommates?!
Wedding planner Muran has finally moved into her own apartment, but she gets so swept up in the excitement that she ends up spending all her money on decorations. Now, she finds herself in desperate need of a roommate. What will happen when her coworker suggests her younger brother, Sachung?

title: The Kawai Complex Guide to Manors and Hostel Behavior
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Ruri Miyahara
synopsis:
Kazunari Usa's dream to live away from his parents is fulfilled when they allow him to move into an old boarding house called Kawai Complex. With his landlady providing him meals and his parents covering his rent, Kazunari finally achieves the peaceful life he longs for, as he is ready to enter his first year at high school. Or so it seems  
  
Upon moving into the boarding house, Kazunari finds out that he has to share a room with resident masochist Shirosaki. He must also live under the same roof as Mayumi Nishikino, a drunkard with a hopeless love life, and Sayaka Watanabe, a seemingly innocent college student. Although he is surrounded by these unique characters, Kazunari still counts himself lucky to be living in the same building as Ritsu Kawai, a second-year student he has a crush on.  
  
As Kazunari settles into the boarding house, he soon realizes that the inhabitants of Kawai Complex are bound to add a twist to the life he has been hoping to live.
___
**Alt Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/the-kawai-complex-guide-to-manors-and-hostel-behavior)

title: Choir!
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life
author: Gensui Tenpou
synopsis: 4-koma about an otaku girl and her friends.

title: Nozomanu Fushi No Boukensha
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Haiji Nakasone
synopsis:
It's been ten years since Rentt Faina, a down-on-his luck Bronze-class adventurer, set his eyes on becoming Mithril-class. Unfortunately, Rentt finds himself helpless when confronted by a legendary Dragon in the Labyrinth of the Moon's Reflection...and is summarily eaten.

But Rentt has miraculously reawakened... as a skeleton?

title: Black Santa
genre: Oneshot, Thriller, Action, Crime, Gore
author: GOTTANI
synopsis: On Christmas day, in a certain town, someone's mother has been abducted by bad guys. A Santa Claus, dressed in black, comes to the rescue. A hard-boiled action-packed story where bullets take the place of holiday wishes!

title: The Villainous Sister Hides Her Wealth
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Tuxedo Penguin
synopsis:
I've become the villainess older sister who, out of jealousy for the heroine, committed evil deeds and faced ruin. But I only realized this was a novel world after I'd already done all those bad things.

'Is it worth groveling to these people?'

My father who only expects understanding and sympathy from me, my brother who only cares for my half-sister, and the male leads who are hostile towards meI'm sick of them all.

For complete independence, now is the time to... hide my money!

"Did you hear? The Empire's economic journal just updated their list of the '10 people who control the Empire's economy'!"
"And the number one is Lady Primrose!"
"Oh my, so how rich is she?"

One day, the business I'd been hiding due to my villainess image was revealed. But people's reactions were strange.

"Family ties are something you can't cut off, no matter how much you hate it."
"I don't know either. Why I came to you instead of Lilika."
"Is it so hard to give me just one chance?"

It was ridiculous that the love I had longed for only came after I had given up on it.
And their belief that I would willingly take their hands was arrogant to the end.

"Go away."

To the men who asked to be partners, I replied with a bright smile.

title: Monthly in the Garden with My Landlord
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life
author: Yodokawa
synopsis: Asako moves to a new house to get over her recent breakup. She finds a great little place a bit removed from the city with a lovely garden, but theres a catchthe house also comes with a live-in landlord!

title: Yamada and Kase-San.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Hiromi Takashima
synopsis:
Yamada and Kase are now college freshmen living separately in Tokyo, and trying to sustain their loving relationship in an environment that is more open than what they're used to.  
  
[Official Korean Translation](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/napal_cace)

title: Hazure Skill "Gacha" De Tsuihou Sareta Ore Wa, Wagamama Osananajimi Wo Zetsuen Shi Kakusei Suru
genre: Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Survival, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Ryuuta Kijima
synopsis: Crest was born as the fifth son of a duke. However, as the fifth son, he was in no position to talk. His childhood friend and also his fiancée, Ellis, treated him just like a slave. And on Crest's coming-of-age ceremony, he received a skill called "Gacha." Yet, he wasn't able to learn how to use it and was banished away from his home. Banished into the forest full of monsters, Crest began to understand the power "Gacha." And then, Crest made up his mind. He will definitely survive and get back on his feet.

title: Youki Ni Naritai Shigure-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: Kanata Oohama
synopsis:
Yoshida is a gloomy second year middle school student whose precious youth has been spent stuck in the corner of his class without being able to make any friends.

Shigure is the girl who sits next to him in class and she is as gloomy as he is. One day, she struck up a conversation with Yoshida and declared,

"I'm going to become a cheerful person!"

Thus begins Yoshida and Shigure's battle to become cheerful people in their effort to spend a brighter youth.

title: Ore No Genjitsu Wa Ren'Ai Game?? ~Ka to Omottara Inochigake No Game Datta~
genre: Thriller, Time Travel, Psychological, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Jie Peng
synopsis: One day, 25-year-old Hasegawa Ryou wakes up to see a holographic screen floating in front of him. The screen prompts him to save/load files and an item shop, as well as his stats. It seems like he's been sucked into some erotic love game, since his stats depend on seducing women and "capturing" them. After finding a target and going through game-like options, Ryou thinks he knows what he has to do to "capture" his target. Surely he needs to have sex with her, right? And yet when the woman turns out to be a murderer, Ryou finds out the shocking truth: he has to capture these women and unveil their secrets! And if he fails, he dies...

title: Himuro No Tenchi: Fate/School Life
genre: Comedy, Magic, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Eiichirou Mashin
synopsis:
A comedy 4-koma manga revolving around the normal life at school of the minor characters of Fate/stay night and Fate/hollow ataraxia, specifically the character Himuro Kane, classmate of Fate/stay night protagonist Emiya Shirou.  
  
It tells about the normal school life of the supporting characters Himuro Kane, Makidera Kaede and Saegusa Yukika. Other characters are the regular cast of the main games: Mitsuzuri Ayako, Tohsaka Rin, Ryuudou Issei, Matou Shinji, Emiya Shirou, Kuzuki Souichirou, Fujimura Taiga, Matou Sakura, Mitsuzuri Minori; "guest" characters from other series Ciel, Seven, Sajyou Ayaka (formerly the heroine of the never finished prototype novel of Fate/stay night) are also featured, and other classmates Gotou Gai, Fujimoto, Dezaki, Hirumata.  
  
The story is centered around classic school events such as a ball game tournament, field trips and inter high school competitions. As such, there is no reference at all to supernatural things like magecraft and Heroic Spirits.

title: Senshun Kansoku
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Kou Toriya
synopsis:
Wakamatsu Haruka (3rd year of middle school) finds the new student Hachiya Shuuto (1st year of middle school) sleeping on the train station and Haruka can't help wanting to take care of the small Shuuto.  
  
This is the story of a member of the baseball club and the leader of the school band.

title: H.P. Lovecraft'S the Call of Cthulhu
genre: Horror, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Gou Tanabe
synopsis: Manga adaption of H. P. Lovecraft's The Call of Cthulhu.

title: Abunai Onii-San
genre: Romance, Anthology, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Marta Matsuo
synopsis:
Anthology of stories written by 13 different artists.

title: Senpai No Neko
genre: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Doujinshi
author: Jin Takemiya
synopsis: Not found

title: Koi No Ghost
genre: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Hotonaka
synopsis:
A heartwarming ghost comedy BL by the author of *Ore ga Shuyaku na Wake ga Nai!* ?

One day, high school student Aragaki notices that a ghost is haunting him. Aragaki thought he was the only person who can see the ghost, until his crush and classmate, Asahikawa, points it out! What's more, Asahikawa says that the ghost told him that Aragaki likes him...? Could this eerie situation actually lead to Aragaki finding love through the help of this ghost?

title: Chiharu-Kun Wa Josou O Shitakunai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Slice of Life
author: John Okinamaru
synopsis:
Follow Chiharu, a boy who doesn't want to crossdress!
It's a romantic comedy featuring a bunch of youngsters!

title: Majime Succubus Hiiragi-San
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Chilt
synopsis: The strait-laced Kusakabe found out that his prim OL neighbor Hiiragi-san is actually a succubus! She didn't want to do anything criminal, so she got a normal job to earn money for a place to live and make a living first. Now she's ready to properly suck a man dry! Will Kusakabe be able to resist Hiiragi-san's supernatural charm?

title: Dragon and Chameleon
genre: Action, Drama, Supernatural
author: Ryou Ishiyama
synopsis:
Garyou Hanagami is a veteran mangaka. Best known for the behemoth of a series that is Dragon Land, Hanagami-sensei has years of experience under his belt and is always thinking up new manga ideas. 

Shinobu Miyama is not. An amateur working for Hanagami-sensei as an assistant, Miyama is nicknamed The Chameleon for his ability to copy the artstyles of those he works under. However, his true dream is to escape the faceless crowds and become someone. 

So what happens when a work accident causes them to swap bodies?

title: Madara Rumble
genre: Action, Gore, Vampires, Supernatural
author: Fuyuki Izumida
synopsis: In modern Japan, where "vampires" that mimic humans and prey on them run rampant, there are girls who secretly fight these creatures, armed with silver weapons! Among the vampire exterminators is a team known as the "Madara-sou," a unit notorious for being full of "troublemakers." Newly assigned to this group is Reo, a girl with a certain secret. There, she encounters Kaika Kiriya, a woman who's particularly "dangerous," even among the eccentric residents of Madara-sou.

title: Majo to Ryouken
genre: Action, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Rainy Kamitsuki
synopsis:
Amelia, a kingdom of war and magic led by Queen Amelia, monopolizes the extraordinary power of "magic" and repeatedly invades other countries in a time of war. Even in the prosperous "small country Campusfellow", known for its farms and blacksmiths, the flames of war are approaching. If things go on like this, Campus Fellows will perish.

For the sake of the country's survival , Lord "Vad Grace" decides to take a devious measure by recruiting into his ranks a group of vicious "Witches" who are known as "disasters", who have left behind numerous terrifying tales. Raised as an assassin, "Black Hound," who has been trained in all kinds of assassination techniques, the boy throws himself into the impossible tasks to protect his country and lord.

title: Bokutachi No Remake
genre: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Nachi Kio
synopsis:
Hashiba Kyouya is a 28 year old game developer. With his company going bankrupt, and him losing his job, he returns to his hometown. Looking at the success of creators of his age, he finds himself regretting his life decisions as he lay distressed on his bed. But when he opens his eyes, he finds that he has travelled 10 years back to the time before he entered college.  
  
Will he finally make things right? This is a story about a failed person who is given a second opportunity to follow his dreams.

[Official Site](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/10834108156679858281)

title: A World Without You
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Hamal
synopsis:
"I hate you enough to want to kill you, Sienna."

I was my sisters shadow all my life, and I was betrayed by her and died. But people have changed since the day I came back in time.

"You're the only child Nacht chose."

"His Highness recognizes you as family."

Something's wrong. These people seem to mistake me for my older sister.

"I beg you, believe in us for once, that we care for you."

I once wanted to be loved. Now I fear that this mindset will become my weakness. One betrayal was enough. Everything is over when you bet everything in love. I just want to get my life back so

---
After being taken in by the noble house of Nacht, Sienna grew up with her adopted sister, Lorena, who she believed to be the sweetest, kindest person in the world. But after Lorena attempts to kill her, Sienna realizes how much her "loving" sister actually hated her. She tries to end her life with a magic potion but ends up going back in time instead. Determined to survive, she tries to use her memories to her advantage. For some strange reason though... Lorena is now nowhere to be found.

title: Heureka
genre: Historical, Action, Romance, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Tragedy
author: Hitoshi Iwaaki
synopsis:
Heureka is a manga set in antiquity, during the Second Punic War between the small city state of Syracuse and the Roman Empire. The comic is based around the life and times of the famous mathematician Archimedes.  
  
Archimedes was not only a gifted mathematician but also an engineer of repute. During the conflict with the Romans, Archimedes was supposedly responsible for creating a number of war machines that devastated the Roman legions before they eventually got the upper hand. The exact nature and use of these devices is controversial, and exists more in the realm of legend than actual historical fact.

title: Kouiu No Ga Ii
genre: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Souryu
synopsis:
Do what we want, when we want, with the person we want. Such a relationship needs no label.

Murata and Tomoka, who are tired of their past relationships, become friends after sharing a game online and decide to go directly to a love hotel. After this evening, they meet regularly and have a good time together.

title: Renchi to Kudamono
genre: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Katsurou
synopsis: Not found

title: Summoned to Another World... Again?!
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Arashiyama
synopsis:
There was once a man who was summoned to another world, and saved it. Of course, he became too popular there, and turned into an isekai-normie.   
However, that man fell into a "trap", and was forcibly returned to his original world. Moreover, he had to start over as a baby! This is the story of the way-too-fantastic ex-hero who lived as a gloomy high-schooler as he gets summoned once again to that other world in a very unexpected development!

title: The Lazy Lord Masters the Sword
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: doip
synopsis:
After witnessing the shocking death of his mother, young Airen Farreira uses sleep to escape his painful reality, earning him the nickname, the lazy lord. Yet, in spite of others jeers and whispers, Airen has no intention of changing his ways.

But when he awakens one day from a dream about a mysterious swordsman, his lifes trajectory takes a complete turn...

---
- [Alternative English Translation (Tappytoon)](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-lazy-lord-masters-the-sword)

title: Hiiragi-San Chi No Kyuuketsu Jijou
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Vampires, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Miki Yoshikawa
synopsis: Every family has its own "secrets"... Shota Minamoto, a junior high school student, lives in an orphanage. One day, he is taken in by a family who lives in a gorgeous Japanese style mansion. Shota is welcomed with open arms, but the family has a secret that must not be revealed to the world.

title: Artificial Temperature 36.7°C
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Ni San Sui
synopsis: Su, born in prison, has always wanted to see the "crow" from what her mother told her. On the day when she was about to be secretly executed, Gill, the artificial intelligence, was thrown into prison for a test run. She compasses everything from the outside world in her database. Su developed special feelings for Gill, although she didn't care that the words Gill spoke were programmed or from her own consciousness. Unable to distinguish her own human feelings... in this small cell, the lonely Su got her first doll--she met a "person" who could bring her solace.

title: Mushoku Kyousei Shuuyoujo
genre: Action, Psychological, Horror, Mystery
author: Atsushi Kamakura
synopsis:
2022, Japan's non-workers regeneration method has been established.  
Person who does not have income more than six months, is subject to a treatment where they rewrite their brain at a regeneration treatment facility.  
Tatsuya Kamijou was working in a foreign-owned investment company. One day he loses his job, but six months later, Tatsuya is sent to a concentration camp rather than a playback facility. There he is subjected to worse treatment than brainwashing and training.   
Why was Tatsuya sent there?

title: Midnight Taxi
genre: Thriller, Action, Demons, Psychological, Long Strip, Sexual Violence, Horror
author: Yu-Wol
synopsis: Even angels give into temptation. Once Gods right-hand warrior, the archangel Agnes has succumbed to desire and formed a contract with Lucifer, the ruler of demons. Now a fallen angel, she poses as a simple taxi driver and patrols the bustling city of Seoul during the midnight hours. Cursed by the king of hell to seek souls for her life force, Agnes pursues depraved individuals who prey upon innocents for their own pleasure, and uses their carnal desires against them. But when her past comes back to haunt her, a tantalizing game of cat and mouse involving vengeful entities ensues.

title: Eiga Daisuki Pompo-San
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Shougo Sugitani
synopsis:
Pompo: The Cinéphile depicts the craft of movie-making and revolves around Joelle Davidovich "Pompo" Pomponette, a talented movie producer who looks like a girl.  
  
Operating out of the movie capital "Nyallywood," Pompo has been shooting one B-grade entertainment flick after another that anyone would enjoy. One day, Pompo's "movie buff" assistant Gene spots a new script written by Pompo and is moved by its exquisite story. In a fit of passion, he proclaims, "I want to see this as a finished work in theaters as soon as possible!"  
  
 However, Pompo tells him, "So you shoot this film." Thus, Gene takes on his first directing gig. Meanwhile, Natalie, an ordinary girl who just arrived in town with movie actress dreams, has been discovered by Pompo.  
  
- Nominated for the 11th Manga Taishou Awards in 2018.

title: Kiss the Bride
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Myeolchi
synopsis:
Shin Jae-Won attended the World Camp hosted by the Spanish King as a tennis player in his Junior Year.  
  
Jae-Won meets Javier, an unusually conspicuous participant in the World Camp.  
  
When are we going to practice?  
  
There are always people (especially women) around him.  
  
Then, Jae-Won, who happened to stumble upon Javier one night during practice, ended up spending the night alone. The more he faced his whimsical, pure side, the more his heart began to beat  
  
I hate this kind of things  
  
Jae-Wons first love ended as fast as a Siesta.  
  
A decade later, they meet again Spain.

title: Tobi to Ryuuko
genre: Adventure, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Marie Yasui
synopsis:
Otogiri Tobi, a youth living with a "talkative bag", Baku. In his monotonous life, an inhuman girl calling herself Ryuuko appears in front of him and...!?

An unusual roomshare begins under a single roof?!!

title: Sensei, Suki Desu.
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life
author: Kouji Miura
synopsis: A bachelor for the past 11 years, Higuchi Yuuki is a male teacher in an all-girls school. He keeps wondering how to bridge the gap between himself and his students when he's suddenly confessed to by Ichikawa, one of his students! Although Higuchi rejects her, Ichikawa does all she can to get her teacher to turn her way  even if it means making him grope her and holding his hand in class! When Higuchi can't understand why she'd like an unimpressive and inexperienced guy like him, she kisses him! Will Higuchi be able to handle the feelings of his beautiful student, especially when she is not the only one to have fallen for him?!? A dramatic school love story unfolds!

title: Sword Art Online - Re: Aincrad
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Drama, Adaptation
author: Kimi
synopsis: The manga will not only cover the original Aincrad arc, but also various Aincrad side stories, including those that were never animated, such as The First Day/The Day of Beginnings from volume 8 of the novels.

title: Short Bomb!
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Minetarou Mochizuki
synopsis: A humorous collection of 3 short stories by Minetaro Mochizuki, all taking place in the same town about the misadventures of a very poor girl.

title: Shadowman
genre: Oneshot, Thriller, Psychological, Survival, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Keiichi Koike
synopsis:
Short story published in Comic OZ vol.01, in 1985.  
  
The shadow of a man creeps upon Jessie. Is it real or merely a figment of her imagination ? Or perhaps, something else?

title: Mmb
genre: Oneshot, Sports, School Life
author: Ichika Ootsuki
synopsis:
Under the piercing rays of the Sun, these young girls soar vigorously across the beach. A short story about beach volleyball that'll take your breath away with its fierce yet beautiful offense & defense. Enjoy this pair's perfect teamwork and mutual-trust relationship, in addition to lots of swimsuits and toned bellies!

(Source: Aokishi)

title: Junkoku No Alpha
genre: Genderswap, Historical, Romance, Drama, Fantasy
author: Ako Shimaki
synopsis:
The French Revolution, which started with the king, sent many citizens to the guillotine, "exporting" the momentum of democratization to countries around the world - marking a turning point in history. But underneath the surface, there was another world that none were aware of... 18th century Francethis was a time where the world's royalty, nobility, and commoners were separated into a 3-tier system, ? (alpha), ? (beta), and ? (omega).

King Louis XVI was known as the "dim-witted ?." Queen Marie Antoinette, who married in from a neighboring country in a political marriage, was ridiculed as the "lustful ?." Then there was a certain girl who held a grudge against the royal family... Seeking, hating, deceiving... A swirling conspiracy emerged, catching everyone in a revolutionary storm!

(Source: Shogakukan, translated)

title: Ai Ga Omoi Jirai-Kei Vampire
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Rie
synopsis:
The main character, Shin, works hard to support his younger siblings. One day, on his way home from work, he meets a girl who claims to be a vampire, and she demands his blood...?This is the beginning of a slightly exciting brand new love story!

---

**Note:** This is the serialized version of [the doujin of the same name](https://mangadex.org/title/fb83ba7a-6887-4c72-8d61-1c8d8ff8904f).

title: Koitsura No Shoutai Ga Onna Dato Ore Dake Ga Shitteiru
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Harem, School Life, Adaptation
author: Kusano NEO
synopsis:
Makoto and Shinobu are my two childhood friends whom I haven't seen in years, but who had always been admired as being the manliest of men, even when they were kids. I, Ryunosuke, am going to be attending a high class school that was once an all girls school, but has slowly started to admit boys. Makoto and Shinobu were already attending there, so the three of us will now be sharing a room together in the school dormitory. I'm looking forward to the start of my rough but manly school life. However, when I get there, it turns out that they are both girls! GIRLS!! I now have to share a room with two people who I, for my entire life, had always thought were boys! They then tell me that it's a secret that they are really girls and that they've been pretending to be boys. Now I will have to help them keep up this rouse. What am I going to do??!!

Thus begins the story of Ryunosuke's manly school days which will now be filled with days of plumpness, sexiness, and the maximum amount of naughty slip-ups!!

title: Nobunaga-Sensei No Osanazuma
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural
author: Azure Konno
synopsis: The manga centers on the relationship between a middle school teacher who has a knack for gal games and a 14-year-old "perfect prospective wife" who is an expert on the Sengoku period.

title: Megane Wa Sonomama
genre: Oneshot, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Kozue Moribayashi
synopsis: Not found

title: Ballpark De Tsukamaete!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Tatsurou Suga
synopsis: An office drone finds relief from his job by attending the ballpark close to his daily commute. He asks a vendor girl for a beer, but for some reason, after the transaction she sticks around him

title: Tokimeki Tonight
genre: Psychological, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Koi Ikeno
synopsis:
Ranze Etou is an adorable immortal girl with a vampire father and a werewolf mother who would throw things at each other when they get into childish fights. Ranze, however, just wants to live like a normal girl and lead a normal life. Unfortunately, she is "blessed" with the power to turn into anything she bites. For example, if she accidentally bites a cake the wrong way, then she will turn into a cake. The only way to return to normal is to sneeze! Ranze is in love with Shun Makabe, who is a handsome human boy at school. However, a human girl (without much hair) named Youko also likes Shun, and she will do anything to reveal that Ranze is not a human!! Things get even more complicated when Ranze meets Aaron, who is the prince of the Spirit World. Aaron falls in love with Ranze and first sight, and he will do whatever it takes to win her away from Shun Tokimeki Tonight was one of the hottest mangas in Japan, and you sure don't want to miss this hilarious comedy!  
  
NOTE: This manga does NOT have defined chapters - each volume is about 150 pages of continuous artwork and story. The volumes were split into chapters by the groups for convenience.

title: Kutabire Salarymen No Ore, 7Nenburi Ni Saikai Shita Bishoujo Jk to Dosei Wo Hajimaru
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Natsuki Uemura
synopsis:
Amae Yuuya, an office worker in his third year of employment, is completely exhausted by the daily grind. Then, for the first time in seven years, Yuuya meets Aoi Shiratori, a girl eight years younger than him who used to live in his neighborhood. She had grown up to be a beautiful JK girl who was good at housework, and she said to him,

Yuuya-kun, would you like to live with me under the premise of marriage?

Aoi desperately wants to live with Yuuya, her first love. Yuuya, who is puzzled, agrees to live with Aoi as a guardian for the time being, but Aois aggressive approach makes him very nervous inside.

[Light Novel](https://firecross.jp/hjbunko/series/492)

title: Mizuno Shinobu No Risou No Renai
genre: Comedy, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Shina Suzaka
synopsis: Mizuno is a thirty-something office worker who is not good at real love and loves shojo manga. While he is tormented by regret after spending the night with Meguro, a subordinate he has a crush on, under the influence of alcohol, Meguro casually proposes to them that they go out together...!?

title: Anata No Danna Uwaki Shitemasu Yo
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Harem, 4-Koma, Monster Girls, Supernatural
author: Natsumegu Seijuu
synopsis: The manga focuses on a hero's wife, but monster girls seeking children of heroic lineage keep coming after him to steal him away. The hero's wife chooses to deal with the monster girls herself.

title: I Eat Soft Rice in Another World
genre: Action, Long Strip, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Sansan Gu
synopsis: Zhang Hao fainted upon witnessing the once-in-a-century blood moon. When he came to, he realised that the entire world had changed...... Gender roles and concepts had completely switched, from marrying off females to marrying off males, with the female side even having to pay bride dowry. Women working to put food on the table and men being househusbands had become commonplace, and the women without a car or a house are now not only looked down upon, but also hard-pressed to find themselves a man. A woman pursuing a man is not worth batting an eyelid, but the reverse can raise eyebrows...... "Even in this world where chicks all chase after me, I insist on being a real man!"

title: Kouhai-Chan Who Wants to Tease
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yasumi Holiday
synopsis: A Kouhai wants to tease her senpai, but she has a weak defense.

title: Uchi No Musuko Wa Tabun Gay
genre: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Okura
synopsis: A sweet, open-minded mother starts suspecting one of her sons might be gay.

title: Oku-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Masakazu Ooi
synopsis: The series follows Kyouko Okita, a buxom housewife who's just recently moved into a new neighbourhood with her husband. There she tries to adjust to her new neighbourhood, make new friends, and deal with the quirkiness of her everyday life.

title: Kon-Kon Ton-Ton
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Boys' Love
author: Chidori Satou
synopsis: A manga where nothing happens because neither characters can give into the other.

title: Boku Dake Ga Shitterun Daze
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Taamo
synopsis: Not found

title: Tensei Shita Akuyaku Reijou Wa Fukushuu Wo Nozomanai the Comic
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Adventure, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Haru Iwaaki
synopsis:
Im not interested in revenge! Rosemary was branded as a villainess and hanged for a crime she didnt commit. She reincarnates as the commoner, Marie, while still retaining the memories of her previous life and hopes to live peacefully this time. However, contrary to Maries wishes, she ends up returning to the royal palace. 

Sister, how do you want to punish the people who killed you? Her brother, whom she doted on in her previous life, had changed completely and intended to take revenge on behalf of his sister. Master, please tell me your desire. The knight who swore allegiance in the previous life swears his allegiance this time as well. 

Im not thinking of taking revenge on the person who killed me. However, the people around me will not allow that

title: Namete, Kajitte, Tokidoki Medete
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life
author: Shin Yumachi
synopsis:
I'm Haru. first year in high school. Please listen to my troubles. I accidentally gave my love letter to the number one problem child at school, Seishirou-kun   
  
Even though I told him to give it back, he won't. He says I'm already his girlfriendHe'll chase me down if he sees me at school, he takes my lunch, keeps his eye on me, and e-even kisses meAh and doing perverted stuff!!   
  
And he's also living at my place. I'm definitely not his girlfriend, so please let me go already!!!

title: "Shopskill" Sae Areba, Dungeon Ka Sita Sekaidemo Rakusyou Da: Hakugai Sareta Shounen No Saikyou Zamaa Life
genre: Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Tanoso
synopsis: High school student Boji Nichiro is isolated from the rest of the world due to fierce bullying. One day, however, the world is transformed by the "dungeonisation" phenomenon! In the midst of the chaos, Nichiro awakens the unique skill "Shop". It was an out-of-the-box skill that allowed him to buy everything from food and daily necessities to unrealistic items! The start of a painful and "wacky" modern fantasy from "Shosetsu-kaerou"!

title: Kanna to Decchi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Ammitsu
synopsis: Our heroine, Kanna, is the daughter of the famous builder in town. One day an orphaned boy with a hammer appears to train under Kanna's father?! The heart pounding love story of a handsome apprentice carpenter

title: Boku Datte, Kiss Shitai
genre: Romance, School Life
author: Yukari Hosobori
synopsis: Natsushiro Seiichi, a first year high school student who is living a smooth sailing high school life. However, his everyday life changes after he encounters a popular beauty, Miho, in the first school year!!

title: Though I May Be a Villainess, I'Ll Show You I Can Obtain Happiness!

author: Doremi Nekomata

Broken engagements, "serves you right"s, condemnation events, doting, royalty, reincarnated heroines, banishment endings it's fully loaded with all the charms of villainesses! The comic adaption of popular villainess stories that were published on *Shousetsuka ni Narou*! An anthology of oneshots with happy endings!!

title: Mobile Suit Gundam Wearwolf
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Military, Drama, Mystery
author: Kou Shigenobu
synopsis: U.C. 0087, amidst the three-way conflict between the Titans, the AEUG and Axis Zeon, the Titans ship Hecate, carrying a new prototype Gundam, finds itself adrift in space after an attack by the AEUG damaged the ship's propulsion system. While the Hecate was stranded in space, most of the ship's crew would succumb to the murder spree of a so-called "wearwolf".

title: Yesterday O Utatte Afterword
genre: Romance, Drama
author: Kei Toume
synopsis: A compilation collecting the new one-shot which depicts the later developments following the final chapter of the main story, a previously uncollected one-shot, latest interviews with Toume Kei and the director of the anime adaptation, Fujiwara Yoshiyuki, and more.

title: Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Star Blossom
genre: Action, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Shin Hotani
synopsis:
The popular cross-media content "Uma Musume Pretty Derby" features "Uma Musume" who have inherited the names and souls of numerous racehorses! A new legend begins with the indomitable horse girl "Sakura Laurel" as the main character.

---

- [Alternative Raw](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/4856001361118480104)

title: Moto Shogun No Undead Knight
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation
author: Nekoko
synopsis: Lambert, one of the great generals from Regios kingdom, was suspected of planning a rebellion against his lord at the end of unification war, and he died an unnatural death. Two hundred years later, when the era had changed and Regios kingdom had entered its peaceful era, he accidentally revived as a demon called Undead Knight Lambert, whose entire body was wrapped in a flashy Demon Metal[Organ], set out on a journey to punish the wrongdoers while enjoying the peaceful sight of Regios kingdom. But This peaceful era was basically an easy mode for Lambert, the greatest general of the chaotic era.

title: Majigawa! ~Mahou Shoujo No Kigurumi~
genre: Comedy, Magical Girls, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, Gyaru
author: sometime
synopsis: Sakura Menon transformed into a magical girl with the power of a disguise. Shiki was suddenly kidnapped by a mysterious monster, and to save her, she decided to fight using the magic girl power!

title: Gochuumon Wa Usagi Desu Ka?
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Koi
synopsis: One day, Cocoa arrived in a town for a work-stay program as organized by her school. There, she excitingly entered the café "Rabbit House," expecting to be able to cuddle rabbits, but instead she found the Kafuu residence, her new home where she will be staying. In this town she will meet her precious and important friends, a responsible, calm but cute girl named Chino, a tough and soldier-esque girl named Rize, a spacey and quintessentially Japanese girl named Chiya, and the ordinary but dignified Syaro.

title: Mizudako-Chan Kara Wa Nigerarenai!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Megame
synopsis:
Akigai Kanisuke is an ordinary high school boy. His daily life changes when Mizuda Yuuko (a.k.a. Mizudako-chan), a demi-human girl, transfers to his school.
A cute, mysterious, and slightly scary story begins!

title: I Will Divorce the Duke
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: BITJAL
synopsis: On the day of her unhappy engagement, Rayalexis Reanello is magically teleported from the misogynistic Ridam Empire to modern-day Korea. There, she enjoys 10 years of friendship and independence. But on her best friends birthday, Rayalexis is mysteriously transported back to her home world, where only a single day has passed. With a newfound yearning for freedom, she dumps her loser fiancé and resolves to pave her own way until the angel of high society, Duke Louivan, suddenly proposes a marriage contract! Will Rayalexis succeed in bringing modern sensibility to this old-fashioned empire while surviving a year with this man?

title: Two Way Trial - Youth
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Jing Ge
synopsis: A collection of stories between two boys when they were still students.

title: Encirclement Love
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Yuo Yodogawa
synopsis:
Ryou had a sleepover and saw his friends - Issei and Tadahiro - kissing while they thought he was asleep. He asks them about it and feels betrayed as a childhood friend when they pretend nothing happened.  
  
Determined to catch them red-handed, Ryou ends up inside a closet with Issei's little brother, Yuusei, who has an unexpected reaction to the situation.

title: Rebirth of King Zhou: Not Being the Ultimate Villain
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Yuqi Dongman
synopsis: Liu Nian enters a game called Glory Continent and discovers after his death that he is the reincarnation of King Zhou. Enchanting beast-eared girls, cold and beautiful mature women, sweet and adorable lolis a harem of beauties for him to choose from. In this life, he decides not to be the ultimate villain. He wants all the stunning beauties and to overturn the heavens in the new round of the Ultimate Venerate/God Battle, aiming to become the top deity!

title: Fate/Type Redline
genre: Thriller, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Psychological, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Magic, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Ryouji Hirano
synopsis: Remake of the Imperial Grail War from the Koha-Ace manga. The protagonist is Akagi Kanata, who gets transported 75 years to the past to participate in a Holy Grail War in the midst of World War 2.

title: Extra but the Duke'S Only Daughter
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ppusyu
synopsis: I squandered my salary to strengthen my game character, and became the lowest-ranking extra in the game. But [?Fate: On my 9th birthday, I will be horribly murdered by my father.] No, what is my fate?! It was unfair that I dimensionally shifted while playing a game, but now I will die by my fathers hand I cant just sit back and accept this crappy fate. Since it has come to this, I will overcome my fate myself!

title: The Knight and Her Emperor
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: He-Yum
synopsis:
Pollyanna is an unremarkable girl in a noble family. Her parents send her to military conscription hoping she'll die quickly in battle. Left only with her wits and her strength, Pollyanna fights to rise up in the ranks. One day, she meets an ardent king, one who finally acknowledges her worth. Moved by his dream for unity, Pollyanna vows to fight for him. But now the young king is slowly realizing this stalwart knight has also conquered his heart.

---
After six years of pointless war between her country, the Kingdom of Ehas, and their neighbor enemies, the Kingdom of Cukda, aged 20, the woman soldier and former petty officer Pauliana Kellenbell has been defeated and captured in a storming attack by the army of another enemy nation, the Kingdom of Acrea, an attack she had personally predicted but fell on deaf ears by her superiors. She has been desperately trying to survive in men's society, but it was all in vain, her noble birthright having been taken away by her family by being sent to war, and having all her efforts crushed down by the fact that she's a woman in the all-male army of Ehas.

Acrea's young king, Lucius, sees her struggle and potential, and makes an unexpected offer. He dreams of becoming the first emperor to conquer the South continent and its sea. Pauliana swears a life-long allegiance to Lucius for acknowledging her, becoming his knight and most trusted advisor, bestowing her with the name Pauliana Winter. However, in the end, Lucius is just an emperor on the battlefield that had awakened his love for Pauliana!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EC%A0%9C%EC%99%80-%EC%97%AC%EA%B8%B0%EC%82%AC/2332), [KakaoPage](http://page.kakao.com/home/52250831)
