* [Japanese / ???](https://piccoma.com/web/product/14567)

title: Scarlet Star
genre: Genderswap, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Magical Girls, Self-Published, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Michiyoshi Kuon
synopsis:
In New Pantheon City, monstrous "Voids" have plagued the people for over 500 years. 

However, they are not without their protectors - Immortal Magical guardians are also there to fight back against them.

Living in New Pantheon City is Mars Hino - a troubled outcast. Because of his reputation, vulgar personality, and lack of social finesse, he has found himself entering high school alone.

That is before he meets the hero of the Blunbell district, the magical girl Scarlet Star - who chooses him for a higher duty

title: Tokoshie × Bullet - Shin Minato Koubou-Sen
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Drama
author: Akeji Fujimura
synopsis: In this story, unidentified giant weapons will destroy the world's metropolises in 2029. The masterminds of this unprecedented destruction are known as "Tokoshie". They call themselves weapons when they go out on the streets of the cities with their overwhelming powers and disappear as soon as they are done with them. A decade has passed since then. A certain military company is developing a combat drone with the ability to fight the Tokoshie, and a certain millionaire figure goes underground to discover the secret of the Tokoshie's eternal life. Another specific girl goes on a journey to fight the Tokoshie, sworn in as her parents' enemies. In short, this is the chronicle of an endless struggle between humanity and its greatest enemy ever.

title: My Wife Is the Student Council President!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yumi Nakata
synopsis: The story begins with Izumi Hayato running to be student body president. But when a beautiful girl swings in promising the liberalization of love while flinging condoms into the audience, he ends up losing to her and becoming the vice president. At the student council meeting, the newly-elected president invites herself over to Izumi's house, where she promptly announces she is to become Izumi's wife thanks to an agreement -facilitated by alcohol- made between their parents when they were only three.

title: Miss Time
genre: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Gyeongseob
synopsis:
Gold Miss* Lee Gaon made a successful career as a personal trainer and is in a rival-like relationship against the famous romance novelist, Jiho, famous for his notorious badmouthing.  
  
Gaon went to her frenemy Sera's wedding ceremony and somehow ended up helping her escape. And her groom? It was Jiho, the man who slung towards her mouthfuls of criticisms and insults one after another.  
  
They realize they were from the same highschool class  
  
While Jiho was on his way to meet Gaon, the two were transported twelve years into the past  
  
"That soft boy was that badass delinquent in highschool?! And he liked me as well?!  
  
**Gold Miss in South Korea is an unmarried woman with high socioeconomic status and level of education.*  
  
Raw: [Naver](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?productNo=5014489), [Kakao](https://page.kakao.com/home/56142110), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/miss_time), [Yes24](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/93171916), [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/Miss_time), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/1515013478), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_misstime_wz), [BookCube](https://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=200131)  
Official English:  ["Miss Time" on the Comico App](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)

title: Hakkenden: Touhou Hakken Ibun
genre: Action, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Miyuki Abe
synopsis:
Five years ago, all but one of the inhabitants of Ootsuka village perished due to the plague but the lone survivor wished only to follow her two dear friends to the grave.   
  
To prevent the death of the people who were like family to him, one of the dying boys used his last remaining breath to agree to a proposal put to him by a mysterious fair-haired man. Miraculously restored to health, the trio have since sought refuge in a church near the adjoining village.   
  
Eventually, the Imperial Church begins to express its interest in possessing "Murasame", the demon blade rumored to contain life but what connection does this legendary sword have with the three survivors of that devastating epidemic?

title: Unhuman
genre: Historical, Action, Drama, Tragedy
author: Mou Chan
synopsis:
It's divided to three arcs:  
Arc 1: Unhuman (???)  
Arc 2: Me Lowly Woman (??)  
Arc 3: The Final Keystone (??)

title: Mahouka Koukou No Rettousei - Koritsu-Hen
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Tsuna Kitaumi
synopsis:
Late April 2097the use of strategic-class spells doesnt stop with the Brazilian military, as the Great Asian Alliance deploy Thunderclap Tower in the Gulf of Guinea. Magic fans the flames of war, which soon engulf the entire world. As public opinion inevitably turns against magicians as a whole, Edward Clark, a researcher of the USNA, proposes an expansive space development endeavor called the Dione Project to promote the peaceful use of magic. Taurus Silvers name appears on the list of chosen candidates, which leads to people uncovering the truththat this is in fact Tatsuya, throwing him and Miyuki into yet another trial.

Adaption of Light Novel 23.

title: Strikeout Pitch
genre: Psychological, Comedy, Sports
author: Kyu Sumiyoshi
synopsis:
The Souha Public High School Baseball Team is one step away from the pinnacle that is the Summer Koushien. They only need a star pitcher to have a chance. Could the Baseball Club Slasher, the powerful pitcher who appears every night and terrorizes other players, be their guy? There's only 1 problem: he can only pitch 3 full-power balls a day!

A baseball story unlike anything you've ever read before!!

title: Kimi Ga Bokura Wo Akuma to Yonda Koro
genre: Psychological, Drama, School Life, Mystery
author: Takashi Sano
synopsis: Yusuke Saito is a normal high school kid...well, normal enough, though there's six months missing out of his memory. But when he starts to get confronted by people who insist they're from his past, who allege that he did horrible things to them...suddenly Yusuke realizes that those missing six months may be crucial to remember. Otherwise, the skeletons in his closet may just make him a skeleton, too...

title: Arte
genre: Historical, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Kei Ookubo
synopsis:
Firenze, early 16th century. The birthplace of the Renaissance era, where art is thriving. 
In one small corner of this vast city, one sheltered girl's journey begins. 
She dreams of becoming an artist, an impossible career for a girl born into a noble family. 
In those days, art was an exclusively male profession, with woman facing strong discrimination. 
In spite of these challenges, Arte perseveres with hard work and a positive attitude!

title: Maou Reijou No Shikkousha
genre: Demons, Romance, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Mid Sansui
synopsis:
"From now on, you will become the butler of the Demon Kings Castle and live for me!"

Ryuto, a young boy who was summoned to another world, but was abandoned due to his incompetence. The one who took his hand was the Demon Kings only daughter, Lurunoa. 

That encounter turns everything upside down. 

Three demon princesses with great hidden powers and secrets. When the mysteries of the continent are revealed, the boy becomes the worlds trump card!

title: Girl Crush
genre: Romance, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music
author: Midori Tayama
synopsis:
Momose Tenka is a first year high school student who can sing, dance, and has a killer body. She's good at everything except love. She meets a K-pop obsessed girl named Satou Erian, and is dazzled by her earnest nature.  
  
This is the story of two young girls dreaming of becoming K-pop idols! A heart-throbbing story about pure love!  
  
*Serialized in [LINE Manga](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000965) (by Line Digital Frontier) and [Comic Nicola](https://ebook.shinchosha.co.jp/book/F914001/) (by Shinchosha),
follow latest news & updates at the [Official Twitter Account](https://twitter.com/girlcrush_comic)*

NB: The LINE link is not broken, but Region Locked.

title: Pizzicato No Nemuru Mori
genre: Romance, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Alto Yukimura
synopsis: Emilie has lived a sheltered life. Longing for a life like the protagonist in her beloved novel who shares the same name, Emilie leaves home on her own and travels to the villa inherited from her great-great-grandfather on Hazama Hill. There, she finds a sleeping backpacker named Shura and many mysterious creatures!

title: Hanarenaiyo
genre: Oneshot, Psychological, Ghosts, Girls' Love, Horror, Supernatural
author: Hitch Makijita
synopsis: A oneshot published in the February 2025 issue of Yuri Hime.

title: Moto Ansatsusha, Tensei Shite Kizoku No Reijou Ni Narimashita
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Satsuki Otonashi
synopsis:
The story is about Serena, a former assassin who was reincarnated as a duke's daughter after failing her mission. She initially thought that pretending to be a noble would be easy, but she struggled with the gap in perception between herself and her mother, who had a flighty personality, and her adoptive sister, who deceived those around her in an attempt to push Serena out of the picture.

Despite skillfully dodging the harassment she faced at the tea parties full of rivalry and navigating the complex social life of a school embroiled in love and hate, Serena's cold demeanor resulted in her being ostracized and isolated. One day, she discovers that her adoptive sister is engaged to the second prince, which leads her to run away from home. However, it is at this point that the first prince, Evan, appears in front of her...

Follow Serena, a former assassin who knows nothing of love, as she charges forward into the aristocratic society of another world in this comedic, occasionally romantic tale.

title: Salaryman Exorcist - Okumura Yukio No Aishuu
genre: Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Kazue Katou
synopsis: A spin-off of Ao no Exorcist, following Okumura Yukio as the main protoganist.

title: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Naoki Akamine
synopsis:
Everyone in the world uses smartphone apps. But inside them lurks unknown creatures called "Appli Monsters," or "Appmon." The Appmon are AI lifeforms with the ability to think and act, and exist in the boundary between the human world and digital space to allow people and the system to interface and function. But in the vast sea of the internet, the "last boss AI" Leviathan takes control of the Appmon with a virus and begins hacking every system, thus starting to control the human world from the world of the net.  
  
The protagonist, Haru Shinkai, is led to acquire the Appli Drive, and uses it to materialize Gacchimon, a search app monster. What is the secret hidden within the Appli Drive? What is the mysterious field that exists between net world where the Appmon exist, and the real world? What is the "App Combine" that can combine two Appmons? What is Leviathan's true goal?

title: Goshujinsama No Shikabane
genre: Action, Romance, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Koume Fujichika
synopsis: A maid-like spirit, Step Girl, who repeats distorted service and puts people at risk. There is only one way to annihilate them: "The master accepts his service." A boy who can not ignore the feelings of a person, Kimomi, is found as a "master" by a strange maid -Ursula.

title: I Became a Top Actor Just by Reading Books!
genre: Thriller, Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Kane
synopsis:
Due to his lack of talent, Seonghyeon gave up acting and became a writer. Seonghyeon is a genius author with a natural talent for screenplays, but he still misses acting. Then one day, he got into a truck accident on set.

If Im born again, I have to act, he promised and closed his eyes.

Seonghyeon returns 13 years back into the past to when he was 24 years old. And the method acting ability that goes into his scripts became the character itself! Okay, this life is about being reborn as a genius actor!

title: The Perfect Idol'S Guide to Falling in Love
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Lu Fang
synopsis: The girl group, MYSTERY, which has remained unpopular even after three years together, suddenly announces their separation on their third anniversary. The first team, known for its hot and sexy style, is led by the original captain, Windy. However, the new captain, Wangshu, with her sweet and lively image, has been appointed unexpectedly. Wangshu appears to be obedient and sensible, always clinging to Windy, but it seems she harbors special feelings for this "jiejie"...

title: Green Box
genre: Thriller, Horror, Mystery
author: Dada Wada
synopsis: Sena, a high school boy, wakes up in an empty green room. In front of him was a world map and a one-line explanation. "Think of what you want and press the button for the country you want to destroy. You will be released if you win.'' Sena, who is gradually cornered, finally presses the button. Will it be Sena or humanity that will survive in the end?

title: Oshi Ga Kounin Stalker Ni Narimashita
genre: Psychological, Romance, Comedy
author: Miinosuke Seo
synopsis: Rooting for the super popular idol Moco Nanami is the reason for living for 17-year-old idol otaku Sora Amano. Lately, he's been worried because his belongings have been going missing. In the middle of this, Sora pursued and caught a suspicious person that was running away with his smartphone - but the identity of this person - is his favorite idol Moco Nanami!?!!?

title: Daisuki Na Tsuma Datta
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Touryuumon Takeda
synopsis: Not found

title: Made in Abyss
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Loli, Monsters, Psychological, Animals, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Cooking, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Akihito Tsukushi
synopsis:
The enormous cave system, known as the Abyss, is the last unexplored place in the world. Nobody knows how deep down goes this titanic pit, inhabited by strange and wondrous creatures and full of mysterious ancient relics which purpose in unknown to modern man. Generations of bold adventurers have been drawn by the cryptic depths of the Abyss. In course of time those brave enough to explore the dangerous pit came to be known as "Delvers."  
  
In Orth, the town at the edge of the Abyss, there lives a little orphan named Riko, who dreams of becoming as great a delver as her mother was and solving the great mystery of the pit. One day, exploring the murky depths, she stumbles upon a little boy who turns out to be a robot

title: Okuremashite Seishun
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Hanamaru Kira
synopsis: Wakaba (20) is a college debutante who yearns for youth. When she goes out on Halloween dressed in her school uniform, she ends up going on a date with a high school boy named Tachibana!?But in fact, this boy is also a college student whose friend left him out of the date... In order to make Wakaba's dream come true, she is asked to continue going out with him on his Seifuku dates!

title: Akuma No Yuusha
genre: Action, Superhero, Self-Published, Isekai, Supernatural
author: Kariko Koyama
synopsis: Prince of hell is searching for the person who summoned and turned him into a superhero. Prince needs to find that host and return back to his realm.

title: Gachi Koi Nenchakujuu: Net Haishinsha No Kanojo Ni Naritakute
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Mystery, Gyaru
author: Seira
synopsis: Kaguya Hinaki is a female college student who is highly regarded by her classmates because of her good looks. She had a secret she couldn't tell anyone, the secret being that she is genuinely in love with Subaru, a member of a certain streamer group.... Hinaki, who really wants to go out with Subaru, receives a DM from a strange account one day, and Hinaki's life changes completely???

title: Spoil Me Plzzz, Hinamori-San!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life
author: tsuke
synopsis:
Suou Yaya is admired by the whole school. Perfect grades, beautiful, an exemplary girl overall worthy of the praise she receives. From afar, her childish underclassman Hinamori Ichigo yearns to be like her...

...That is, until she finds her beloved Suou-senpai is a LOT more childish than her, and wants to be spoiled rotten, lest she'll throw a tantrum.

title: Shoujo Juuki
genre: Sci-Fi, Loli, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Military, Gore, Tragedy
author: Dormicum
synopsis:
**DeepL Translation:**
The girl flies. To take her revenge.

The Earth has been consumed by a miasma caused by the appearance of a mysterious monster.
The only thing that could fight it was a bioweapon called the "Mercy".

??This is a sorrowful story of the beautiful girls.

title: Truck Knight Taekbae
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Full Color
author: Maja
synopsis:
After finally finishing a late-night shift and heading home, the only solace in my exhausting reality was the romance fantasy novel I had reread dozens of times.

Just like usual, I was walking while reading the novel when suddenly I was nearly hit by a truck!

---
A middle-aged truck driver who almost hit a female pedestrian ends up teleported to the world of a romance fantasy (Rofan) novel the pedestrian read and must now help the female main character escape while dealing with a troubled situation involving dukes and princes and return to the real world.

title: Half
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Sansan Qi
synopsis: The heartwarming story of two different girls brought together over a cat, as they learn about each other, spend time together, and heal one another.

title: Ptsd Radio
genre: Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Office Workers, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Masaaki Nakayama
synopsis: From the mangaka of Seeds of Anxiety comes another collection of short horror stories using introspection that will unhinge you Best for midnight viewing!

title: School Days
genre: Psychological, Romance, Harem, Drama, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Akino Mimura
synopsis:
The story revolves around a love triangle between the male protagonist, Makoto, and two girls in his year, Kotonoha and Sekai.  
  
Makoto develops an interest in Kotonoha, and although they both take the same train to school, she seems to be unaware of his existence. One of his classmates, Sekai, gets the two together despite holding strong feelings towards Makoto.

title: Sekirei
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama
author: Sakurako Gokurakuin
synopsis:
In Tokyo in the year 2020, Minato Sahashi has failed the college entrance exam twice, is awkward around women, and he's unemployed. He could never stand up to his mother or little sister growing up, a trend that continues to this day. In reality, Minato is extremely intelligent, yet his inability to cope under pressure results in his constant failure and he has been branded an idiot and loser by many as a result.  
  
One day, Minato meets a girl named Musubi, who literally falls from the sky. Minato soon learns that she is one of the "Sekirei" and he is her "Ashikabi", a human with special genes that allows them to "wing" (form a contract with) a Sekirei. This binds the Sekirei to him and allows them to use their full power in the elimination battle with other Sekirei. Made up of cute girls, buxom women, and bishounen, the Sekirei fight in a dangerous and sometimes deadly competition known as "The Game" or the "Sekirei Plan" organized by Hiroto Minaka, the chairman and founder of the mysterious and powerful MBI Corporation.  
  
Minato soon learns that being the partner of a beautiful girl is not all fun and games, especially when he discovers that an Ashikabi can have more than one Sekirei partner; and that's where the real trouble starts.

title: As Leticia Wishes
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: SOPHIA
synopsis: Stella, the beloved princess of Tyrien, was imprisoned all her life before being used in an eerie sacrifice. After her consciousness fades away, she wakes up to find herself hatching from an egg as a child! Despite her initial bewilderment, Stella quickly adapts to her new life as "Leticia" and becomes attached to Beth, a kind professor who may hold the key to finding out who and what she is. But does Leticia have what it takes to uncover the secrets behind both her lives?

title: The Pale Horse
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Hye-Yeon Chu
synopsis:
Set in the France 1835. The pretty Rose Dupre is bullied and called the witch's daughter. People say her mother is a witch who kills and eats humans. However, Marie and Peter don't believe all those rumors and decide to protect Rose But what if the rumors are true?  

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Kakao Webtoon](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B0%BD%EB%B0%B1%ED%95%9C-%EB%A7%90/783)
- Defunct Official English - [SpotToon](https://www.spottoon.com/workHome/39/THE%20PALE%20HORSE), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/palehorse)

**Note:**
- The author has split the storyline into parts and seasons. Volume 1.1 for example means Part 1, Season 1.

title: The Legend of Luoxiaohei
genre: Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Magic, Wuxia, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: MTJJ
synopsis: A cat spirit, while stealing the famed Heavenly Bright Pearl, was injured heavily by the spirit Diting and turned back into a cat. While wandering the streets, he was adopted by Luo Xiaobai, and became Luo Xiaohei. Their story begins now.

title: Uketsukejou Ni Kokuhaku Shitakute Guild Ni Kayoitsumetara Eiyuu Ni Natteta
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Yonezou
synopsis:
**I Became the Strongest Hero by Frequenting the Guild Just to See the Receptionist!**

Jade, who aims to become the strongest adventurer, arrives at the guild and falls in love at first sight with the receptionist! Determined to talk to her, he realizes the only way to do so is to complete as many quests as possible. Thus begins Jade's journey, driven by love, to become the ultimate hero through relentless questing and adventure.

title: Miyuki
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Manzou
synopsis:
Masato Wakamatsu, 16 years old, is working at the beach one summer. Having made a bad impression on his classmate/crush Miyuki Kashima, he makes a pass at another pretty girl. To Masato's shock, the girl turns out to be his younger stepsister Miyuki (15), who has been living abroad with their father for the past six years.  
As school progresses, Masato starts dating Miyuki Kashima. He and his sister Miyuki are living alone together, and he is troubled by his conflicting emotions: filial and romantic feelings toward a sister who may or may not know she is not related to him by blood.  
  
This manga was very popular in Japan.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen/Shojo in 1982, along with Adachi's very popular, Touch**

title: Kashimashi Meshi
genre: Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Mari Okazaki
synopsis: Three friends get together for an unfortunate occasion. Each of them is facing a difficult moment, between finished or complicated loves. But even if it is difficult and it seems to you that your heart is about to dry up, you can always find new light and hope if you reunite with people you love to eat rice together.

title: All-Rounder Meguru
genre: Action, Sports, Martial Arts, Mafia, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Hiroki Endo
synopsis: Hiroki Endou's latest series tells the story of two old friends, Meguru Takayanagi and Takashi Yamabuki, who after a long time meet each other again at an amateur Shooto mixed martial arts contest. While Meguru only practices MMA for fun, Takashi is pursuing a serious goal. Even though each of them has their own reason to fight, both are becoming stronger with each match Universally praised for its realism and accurate depiction of martial arts, All-Rounder Meguru is one of the first manga to provide a glimpse into the energetic and exciting world of modern MMA.

title: Bamboo Blade
genre: Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, School Life
author: Masahiro Totsuka
synopsis: Kojiro is an impoverished young teacher and the supervisor of his high schools kendo club. He doesnt have the leeway to spend time on his studentshe can barely feed himself as it is. So when an old friend makes him a bet with an entire years worth of deluxe sushi on the line, Kojiro finds a new purpose in life: to beat his friends kendo team! But before he can arrange a kendo meet for both schools kendo teams, he needs to actually put together a five-woman squadand the first girl he needs is Tamaki Kawazoe, kendo athlete extraordinaire and daughter of an elite kendo dojo master. The problem is, she isnt really interested in doing kendo for fun. What can Kojiro do to convince her to join the team?

title: Offered
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Sports, Mafia, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Kazuo Koike
synopsis:
Olympic track star. MIT whiz-kid. Adored by the beautiful co-ed's. Revered by classmates and teammates alike. Yu was sitting on top of the world.  
  
That is, until the evil seductress Payetta, leader of an outlaw gang of boozers and brawlers, kidnaps Yu at knifepoint and steals him away to her hideout. He learns he's actually the son of Gilgamesh, the legendary founder and ruler of the ancient yet highly advanced civilization of Agartha. The history lesson doesn't stop there, though. Payetta claims to be the granddaughter of Adolf Hitler and wants to share her maniacal dreams with Yu and the new dystopia she plans to create.

title: Splash!!
genre: Sports, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life
author: Ouji Kuzunoha
synopsis:
Swimming diving competitions are harsh competitions in which the impact from the water surface can be as much as 1 ton when diving from a height of 10 meters.

Mizuha Shiozaki, a transfer student in Class A of Shirasagi High School, is a girl who has won many classical ballet competitions and is called a ``genius.''
However, she was unable to keep up with the strict guidance of her mother, who was a world-famous prima donna, and quit ballet in her third year of junior high school due to her resentment towards her mother.She thought she would spend her high school life in a relaxed and fun way, but inside she had a complex that she had run away from ballet and her mother.

One day, an argument with Himeko Sawamura, a second-year student who is her childhood friend and unrequited love, causes her to jump off a 10-meter diving board, causing her to lose her temper.

Shirasagi High School is the only high school in Tokyo that has a "diving club,'' and Himeko was an athlete who was nicknamed "Ice Princess'' and was even selected as a candidate for Japan's Olympic team.

Mizuha climbed onto the diving board but balked at the height due to fear. However, this ignites Mizuha's competitive spirit and she becomes obsessed with diving competitions.

A masterpiece sports manga depicting the bright and single-minded appearance of a girl who stakes her youth on diving competitions!

title: Historié
genre: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama
author: Hitoshi Iwaaki
synopsis:
Historie takes place in ancient Greece and follows the life of Eumenes and his childhood, who would later in his life grow up to be the secretary and general to Alexander the Great.  
  
**IMPORTANT:**   
- Hitoshi Iwaaki frequently redoes the art for volume releases as well as add smaller chapters together.   
- There are no missing chapters on MangaDex, Chapter 108 "Warped" immediately follows Chapter 97 "Disposal of Olympias (2)", this is because chapters were added together in previous volumes, so the chapter count between volume and magazine are out of sync.  
  
---
- **Won the 16th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize's Grand Prize in 2012 for Manga**  
-  **Won the 14th Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize for Manga**

title: Hitohitogami Nichinichi
genre: Monsters, Demons, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Fuu Furuyama
synopsis:
This is a story from once upon a time - but not recently. 

In an abandoned village at the foot of Mount Mitsukado, there lived gods in human form. Monokai (specters) come to the village carrying goods to sell to the gods, and mysterious shadows lurk in the forest. 

This is a mysterious tale of everyday life that traces the lives and memories of the gods. Why do the gods take on human form and why do the specters appear one after another?

title: Starry Night
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Zhuang Ning
synopsis: Chi Xing, who was nicknamed, star of calamity, would run into all sorts of bad luck every day. But after he met the arrogant, antisocial, Ling Ye, who had deformed legs, he unexpectedly discovered that his suffering physique improved. Whenever he was with Ling Ye, he could turn danger into safety, and Ling Yes gaze always made Chi Xing feel like they had met before, a feeling of familiarness. They both dont know that their common past of suffering and agony would cause them to be tangled up together

title: Please Become My Sister-In-Law!
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Biro
synopsis:
So, what do you think about my brother? 

One day, out of nowhere, a charming princess appeared in the life of Claire, the mistreated protagonist of an unknown authors work.  

Princess Yuri, without any prior connection, unexpectedly proposed that Claire marry her brotherknown as the Empire's most eligible bachelor.  

Overwhelmed by the princess's stubbornness, which not even the emperor could sway, Claire found herself in a contract engagement with the second prince.  

I just want you to play along until Princess Yuri is satisfied. Ill make sure youre compensated accordingly.  

As Claire waited for the contract to end, Prince Raymond began to approach her.  

Why would someone who is only tied to her by a contract?  

I dont want to let you go. I feel like locking you away so you cant leave.  

For Claire, who fears both giving and receiving love, the wave of affection from her potential in-laws has only just begun.

title: Yuria-Sensei No Akai Ito
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Kiwa Irie
synopsis:
Fifty-year-old Yuria has a quiet life teaching embroidery classes in her home, where she lives with her writer husband and his mother. Then one day her world is turned upside down when husband has a subarachnoid hemorrhage and upon arriving at the hospital, Yuria is met by a tearful young man who announces that he is her husband's lover.

Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award in General Category in 2021.

title: Isekai Cheat Kaitakuki
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Fast
synopsis: I was living a life of a NEET, and I was supposed to have died suddenly because of my daily indolence - but when I woke up, I had become a baby. It seems that I was reincarnated in another world where magic exists. I was born the son of a lord in a remote village, and began to lead a second life with my beautiful mother Kara, my big-breasted maid and nanny Ruina, and my beautiful sister Amelia, who is not related to me by blood. As a teenager, I've grown up and enjoy my daily life in a different world using my top-level magical ability and modern knowledge?

title: Anzuru Koi Wa Yasashikute
genre: Romance
author: Kobashiko
synopsis: Its been one year since they started living together. These are the gentle and endearing days of worrywart Outan and Megurun. A two-part series??

title: Mr. Zombie
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Zombies, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Chao San Mu Si Lang
synopsis: 1000 years ago, the MC became a normal zombie in the apocalypse. In order to survive the constant hunting of humans, he continued to train himself until he became immensely powerful. After 1000 years passed, he is now ready to enter human society again.

title: If You Hate Me so
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Fargo
synopsis: Minjae's quiet life turns upside down when he walks in on Hyung-jo masturbating to a T.A. sleeping in the student lounge. Hyung-jo threatens Minjae to keep the incident a secret and to keep his distance from the T.A., whom he has an obsessive crush on. But Minjae can't stop having dreams about the scene he witnessed. Despite Hyung-jo's extreme threats, his body reacts to the T.A.... wait, no. To...Hyung-jo. From the creator of "Love is an Illusion!"

title: Isekai Cheat Magician
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Karin Suzuragi
synopsis: As regular high school students Taichi and Rin disappeared in a beam of light. When they came to, the two of them were already in a world of swords and magic. Finally getting away after experiencing an attack by monsters, following the suggestion of adventurers they headed on the path towards the guild. In the guild, the two of them found out that they possessed unbelievably powerful magic. Thus the regular high school students transformed into the strongest cheats...

title: The Dark History of the Reincarnated Villainess
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess
author: Akiharu Touka
synopsis:
Konoha Satou has a dark history, written throughout middle school-a fantasy adventure of love and magic about the Count's daughter Konoha Magnolia and the knights who love her! But when it looks like that dark history is going to be uncovered by her mother, Konoha panics and dies in a traffic accident! Opening her eyes, she finds that she's been reincarnated into the world of her own dark history as Iana Magnolia, the worst villainess of her own creation!  
  
Ghost-seeing School Boys oneshot included in volume 1 as chapter 3.1

title: World Trigger
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Daisuke Ashihara
synopsis:
A gate to another dimension has burst open, and from it emerge gigantic invincible creatures that threaten all of humanity. Earth's only defense is a mysterious group of warriors who have co-opted the alien technology in order to fight back!  
  
**Please Note:** Chapters 111-114 are only available as licensed versions.

title: Lonely Girl Ni Hanataba Wo
genre: Romance, Anthology, Girls' Love, Slice of Life
author: Kashikaze
synopsis:
A collection of one-shots written by Kashikaze, including some original content for Can't Defy the Lonely Girl.

Included chapters:
1. marking (https://mangadex.org/title/9cb600fb-c1a7-4116-913c-72002f634392/marking)
2. Kekkyoku Sonna Kimi ga Suki (https://mangadex.org/title/7984732d-5912-4a11-b42d-737ed5e6cb4c/kekkyoku-sonna-kimi-ga-suki)
3. Lonely Girl ni Sakaraenai more! (original)
4. Bukiyou na Aijou (original)
5. Shiranai Watashi mo Suki desu ka (https://mangadex.org/title/0a388cd0-6165-44a6-b352-3de5ea2bf5d5/shibuya-gal-yuri-anthology)
6. Watashi no Shiroi Bara (https://mangadex.org/title/38c8c836-3083-456e-8ca1-a3ba53ac352c/canele-soeur-yuri-anthology)
7. Renzu Goshi ni Oni wa Nai (https://mangadex.org/title/e8bdc7b1-3544-4fa6-b5a5-0903851f3722/renzu-goshi-ni-oni-wa-inai)
8. Hanaya no Ano Hito
9. Osake no Aji yori Amai Mono (https://mangadex.org/title/d8ee38bd-8054-4699-9090-2e58b7587bcc/alcohol-yuri-anthology-strong)
10. Osananajimi no Trophy (https://mangadex.org/title/30a46213-85cb-4e93-9f84-740677ddd7f5/jyoshikou-no-ouji-sama-ga-watashi-shika-ganchyuu-ni-nai-rashii-yuri-anthology-comic)
11. Futari de Hitotsu da kara (https://mangadex.org/title/2ba01ee0-5d82-4822-80ce-c7d1a579af01/private-life-is-theirs-alone-celebrity-x-yuri-anthology)
12. HItokoto Love Letter (https://mangadex.org/title/09ad07f8-4038-4ea1-af20-cdf8dff01244/tonari-no-seki-ga-sukina-hito-datta-gakusei-yuri-anthology)

title: Monster Soul
genre: Action, Comedy, Fantasy
author: Hiro Mashima
synopsis: The tale of Monster Soul takes place in Elfenland, which is inhabited by both humans and monsters. The main characters are a group of monsters called the Black Airs. The Black Airs is recorded as the strongest group of the monster forces in the great war between the humans and monsters.

title: Rockman-San
genre: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Comedy, Video Games, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Yuushi Kawata
synopsis: Much time has passed since his battle with Dr. Wily, and Rockman has grown up in a peaceful world. Working as a dentist at the dental clinic opened by Dr. Right, Rockman struggles in his daily life with the allies he once fought with!

title: Koko Wa Kamogawa Game Seisakusho
genre: Video Games, Slice of Life
author: Sukeracko
synopsis:
At his grandmother's vacant house, Yoh happened to find a picture he had drawn as a child.
The moment he saw the drawing, lightning struck his body and he was flooded with game ideas one after another.

Gather your friends and develop a game from scratch!
This is an awkward and endearing drama of adolescent boys and girls set in Kyoto.

title: I'M the Great Immortal
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Liuyue Xue Gongzuoshi
synopsis:
In his previous life, he was a peerless genius in the Immortal World but was killed by 3 celestial beings.  
  
He exploded to death and accidentally got reborn to his 20s back on Earth.  
  
Determined to return to the Immortal World, he became the strongest man on Earth who can control clouds and rains at his will, and whoever offends him will have no choice but to disappear completely!  
  


---

title: The Island of Giant Insects
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Animals, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Yasutaka Fujimi
synopsis:
**From tethysdust:**  
After an airplane crash during a school trip, Oribe Mutsumi and her classmates were stranded on a seemingly deserted island. Mutsumi found the other survivors, and used her wilderness knowledge to help them. She expects that they will be rescued in about three days, which doesn't seem so long to endure. However, she didn't account for the fact that the island is populated with gigantic killer insects. Her knowledge of butterflies, wasps, and more may be the only thing that will help any of her classmates survive to be rescued!

title: Momo: the Blood Taker
genre: Thriller, Loli, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Gore, Drama, Horror, Vampires, Police, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Akira Sugito
synopsis:
In Tokyo, suspicious cases are occurring where the victims have all of their blood drained from them.  
Mikogami Keiji, a detective who also wants revenge for his lover, killed 10 years ago, pursues the culprit, the Man with two faces.  
What is the identity of the silver-haired girl who observes him?  
  
A new serialization by the author of [Boku Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/10643/boku-girl)

---

**Assistant:** [Hoshikawa Danpa](https://mangadex.org/author/3814dd6f-c7b9-4ced-a9ee-a393eb4c06a7)

title: Fluffy Punk, Nakamura-Kun
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Nao Noshime
synopsis:
Seemingly delinquent high schooler Nakamura-kun is actually shy at heart with dexterous hands and as skilled as any domestic goddess. He falls for fellow student Hayashi-san, a beautiful ojousan and honors student at their school but  
  
A moe gap love comedy about Nakamura-kun's cute handmade goods and using overflowing feelings for sweets making and plush toy production!

title: Shrink ~Psychiatrist Yowai~
genre: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Medical, Slice of Life
author: Jin Nanami
synopsis: Panic disorder, depression, developmental disabilities, PTSD Japan is said to be a country of hidden mental illnesses, where many patients suffer from mental illnesses without being able to talk to anyone. The suicide rate is one of the worst among developed countries. How has Japan fallen into this kind of situation? Psychiatrist Konosuke Yowai confronts the problems facing Japan's psychiatric care and sheds light on the shadows in people's minds.

title: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Oriental Sacred Place.
genre: Comedy, Video Games, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: ZUN
synopsis:
The third part in the official long-running series about the daily shenanigans of Gensokyo's biggest pranksters, the Three Fairies of Light.  
  
2005: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Eastern and Little Nature Deity.  
2006: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.  
2009: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Oriental Sacred Place.  
2016: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Visionary Fairies in Shrine.  
  
**Português:**  
Continuação do Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.

title: Prince, Don'T Do This!
genre: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color
author: Dongman Tang
synopsis:
In order to fulfil her mission of bringing peace to her homeland, the Uyghur Princess Amelia travels to Chang'an and marries Emperor Dezong of Tang's ninth prince, Li Qian. While she had been considered very capable in her homeland, the complex and foreign customs of the Tang court are something else entirely; and although she had not expected love in a political marriage, the sheer disinterest and arrogance of her husband is very hard to handle, no matter how capable and handsome he may be. Securing peace between the Uyghur Khaganate and the Tang Empire is not going to be easy, especially with the rebellion taking place in Tang.  

 ---

[Official English Subtitled Donghua](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBakWosU0sfhqdN5TFbbITb7Bm93T3-PW)

title: Good Morning Ladies
genre: Oneshot, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Slice of Life
author: Shima Shinya
synopsis:
"Good Morning Humans!"
It has been exactly 20 years since the earth was 'almost' destroyed by the abnormal evolution of wild animals. 
This is a story of three women who live poignantly today.

*Collected in Gusty Gritty Girl, an anthology of one-shots by the mangaka*

title: The Blue World
genre: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama
author: Yukinobu Hoshino
synopsis: The Blue Hole is a gateway that takes you back in time to a prehistoric age. In anticipation of the astonishing discovery, the United Kingdom and the United States dispatched a joint team to the Jurassic world 145 million years ago and embarked on a full-scale investigation. Just then, a sudden phenomenon cuts off communications with the modern world. Few people with limited equipment are left behind. Survival in a terrifying world where everything is unknown and dinosaurs roam free has begun!

title: Mahouka Koukou No Rettousei - Douran No Joshou-Hen
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Mei Higuchi
synopsis:
March 2097Brazil deploys the strategic-class spell Synchroliner Fusion in South America, starting a wave of unrest that will reach as far as Japan, where the new school year is just beginning. Tatsuya and Miyuki have entered their third year at First High, but anti-magician sentiment has been steadily rising. As many young scions of the twenty-eight families gather to discuss what to do about the concerning political climate, a much more immediate threat sits just beyond the shores of Sado Island

Adaption of Light Novel 21-22.

title: Bloody Monday 2
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Drama
author: Shin Kibayashi
synopsis: Two years after the end of Bloody Monday, a new threat emerges intent on destroying Japan. But what will happen now that "Falcon" has since disappeared? Who will face the deadly "Shooter of the Magic Bullet?" Tune in to Bloody Monday Second Season and find out!

title: Inari No Ongaeshi
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Rita Otohashi
synopsis: Sorako is getting a bento made by a girl who is good at cooking, Inari. What led to her getting such a delicious-looking lunchbox made for her...?

title: Orient
genre: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Shinobu Ootaka
synopsis: The fantasy series takes place during Japan's Sengoku Period, where Japan is ruled by Demons. A 15-year-old boy named Musashi will stand up to the demons with the help of a certain special power.

title: Mahouka Koukou No Rettousei - Nyuugaku-Hen
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Tsuna Kitaumi
synopsis:
Shiba Tatsuya is an honors student without magic capability at First High School, a magic high School along with his sister who happens to be the top student among the freshmen. 
What will happen to him, and how will he live his school life where he is one of the many reserves in the school looked down upon by the chosen magical students?  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 1-2.

title: Aru Hi, Totsuzen Gal No Iinazuke Ga Dekita
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation
author: WING
synopsis: Miran Katsuki, a positive gal who reigns in the upper class of the school caste, often asks Shuji Nagasawa, an otaku. I was confused by her suggestive behavior, but she unexpectedly announced that she was his fiancée!?

title: Isekai Yururi Camp
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Keisuke
synopsis: Ueki Hashira worked himself to death and died falling down the stairs. As a child, he had fixed the shrine of the plant deity, so as thanks, the god granted his wish to "live a laid-back life in a natural, rural area like where he used to live". However... he was reincarnated in the middle of a vast natural wilderness surrounded by trees!

title: Fuuka
genre: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Music, Tragedy
author: Kouji Seo
synopsis: Yuu Haruna just moved into town and is addicted to twitter. When he goes out to buy dinner he bumps into a mysterious girl, Fuuka Akitsuki, who breaks his phone thinking he was trying to take a picture of her panties. How will his new life change now?

title: Musou No Kaitaishi
genre: Action, Romance, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Kanmuri
synopsis: Dungeons have suddenly appeared all over the world. People became "explorers" and dived into dungeons to obtain resources that could only be found there! Kurose Sakuto, too, was searching for the elixir that would heal everything in order to save his childhood friend who was suffering from an incurable disease. However, he receives a notice from his friends that he is no longer a member of the team. In the dungeon and in the real world, he faces off against demons and malicious humans.

title: Harapeko Succubus Wa Ikasetai Noni!
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Tabireko
synopsis:
Kururi-chan The Succubus is an unprecedented super elite!! She's been in a rut lately because her luscious body is too powerful and she can easily be promiscuous. Kururi then discovers Jien, a young virgin monk in training. 

Lucky?Happy?Strongest Kururi-chan is going to charge in with great pleasure!! The greedy and confident Succubus and the serious monk clash in this happy love comedy!?

title: One Room, Hiatari Futsuu, Tenshi-Tsuki
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Matoba
synopsis:
What will happen when you wake up, and find a cute girl lying next to you in bed? Furthermore, she is not an ordinary girl, but an Angel who comes from Heaven???

Shintarou Tokamitsu is a high school boy living alone. One day, he found a beautiful girl sitting on his balcony. Her name is Towa, but what is her true identity? A romantic comedy between two innocent souls.

**NOTE:** The Omake chapters at the end of each volume are usually "prequel", not directly happened after the last chapter of said volume. Please refer to the Table of Content or the chapter number itself for details.

title: The Dragon Cubs Arrive! Mommy Is a Dragon
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Ri Mu
synopsis: Five years ago, she left an egg and said, "This is the son I gave birth to you. When he grows up, that will be my return date." A few months later, the son broke out of the shell, with two shiny eggs on his head. Xiao Longjiao, she hadn't returned at te date. She disappeared for five years, and he went crazy for five years, until the little dragon cub brought back a woman... But the little dragon cub said, "Dad, she saved me, and I want to commit myself to her!" Infighting.

title: In the Gardens of Gehenna
genre: Thriller, Loli, Psychological, Romance, Incest, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy, Gyaru
author: Sakasana
synopsis:
Mary, a girl who moved from Tokyo to the countryside, meets the mysterious girl Colin in a "secret garden" up in the mountains. With nowhere to go, they share a "secret" in the garden that they can't tell anyone. They didn't realize the consequences of what they did.......

(Source: Yuri-Hime, translated)

title: Dragon Emperor Martial God
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yi Cheng
synopsis:
Ling Yun, a cultivator, fails to cross the tribulation, and his soul wears the body of Ling Yun, a scum who was assassinated in the modern city. Facing the mysterious forces that want to kill him, and the world that he knows nothing about, Ling Yun cultivates immortality and martial arts, draws talisman and formations, refines pills and weapons, and kills demons!
Ling Yun: "suffer a loss? It's not my style to suffer!"

title: Arch Villain
genre: Action, Long Strip, Harem, Drama, Full Color
author: Ta Ba Xiao Yao
synopsis: Yin Wudao, a very rich handsome man. Because of the thief Cao, he was tortured and killed by the Dragon Kings son-in-law. However, he accidentally triggered a god-tier Arch Villain System, and his life began again. Since you have chosen to become a Villain, you must become the greatest villain in history. Dragon King, Divine Physician, God of War, Shura, Ancient Martial Master, Immortal all the geniuses chosen by the heavens I will send them to hell!!! that way the generation of Villain Kings will come out soon

title: False Child
genre: Psychological, Animals, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Taku Kawamura
synopsis:
What if a child who died at a very young age appeared just as she was? What if it was the work of a supernatural tanuki? This isn't a reunion. She's not real, but still... her parents want to cling to it. The lie is kind, yet saddening.

A heart-wrenching human drama, from Kawamura Taku.

title: Majo Ni Kubiwa Wa Tsukerarenai
genre: Thriller, Action, Magic, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Yuri Yumemi
synopsis: As magic, once monopolized by the nobility, became accessible to the masses, crime rates surged. In response, the Empire established the Magical Crimes Investigation Bureau. Rogue, a detective, is reassigned to the notorious "Sixth Division" due to the schemes of his superior, Veradonna. This division works alongside witches, who once brought disaster to the Empire, to investigate magical incidents. These witches, powerful enough to bring calamity, are imprisoned and have their magic restricted by "collars." However, the witches, led by the "Puppet Demon" Miseria, pay no mind to these restraints and constantly throw Rogue into chaos. "What will you do, Rogue? Shall we consider taking extreme measures?"

title: Oniyome Wo Metotte Shimatta
genre: Historical, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Monster Girls, Supernatural
author: Bako Awa
synopsis:
Momotarou returned from his quest, having married the demon princess Ura instead of defeating the demons.  
  
The time for coexistence is here.

title: Soubi Seisakukei Cheat De Isekai Wo Jiyuu Ni Ikite Ikimasu
genre: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Shion Mizuki
synopsis:
Toji, a 29-year-old part-time worker who has been involved in the summoning ceremony of others has come to a different world. When he was driven out of the castle as a nuisance and gave up on everything, he saw the same status screen as an Online Game, what he used to play. What a convenient game system was available only for Toji in this world! Strengthen your weapons, summon cute monsters, etc A free adventure of Touji begins here, focusing on wisdom and living in a different world!   
  
The amazingly popular fantasy of Alphapolis Web ranking 1st place, long-awaited comicalization!

title: Namihara-San Wa Buchimaketai!
genre: Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Nirareba
synopsis:
The company she entered was a black IT company... It's such a pain... I want to quit... "Boss, will you please die soon? (Good morning!)"

With a sudden change (?), her honne (inner thoughts) and tatemae (public behavior) switched!? It's always been what she thinks, but, but... As a worker, she can't say it!?  
  
Her hidden "inevitable" honne, becomes a shield against harsh superiors! A pleasant and thrilling comedy!

title: Taaiinai Nouryoku
genre: Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Yuumikan
synopsis: Not found

title: Yu-Gi-Oh Ocg Stories
genre: Action, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Shin Yoshida
synopsis: In the distant past, the prosperous nation of Karma waged war against the nation of Spectra, resulting in the creation of an AI that wiped out all humans. Centuries later, Raye, the last surviving human, lives amongst an android society on the outskirts of Karma. On the night of her 13th birthday, her peaceful life is upended when Spectra attacks, destroying her home and forcing her friends to the front lines. Desperate to save everything she loves, Raye calls upon humanity's last bastion: "Sky Striker", the Karma-developed secret technology made to turn humans into the ultimate living weapons. Unexpected, right? In this newest adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh, the focus of the plot is not on the card game, but instead the many storylines featured in the cards. The first arc surrounds the Sky Striker series, with more to come in the future.

title: Tigridia
genre: Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Zuzu
synopsis: A love triangle where everything is distorted by love.

title: Kaina of the Great Snow Sea
genre: Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery
author: Itoe Takemoto
synopsis: A world blanketed in an endless and ever-growing ocean of snow. The people eke out a living, either huddled around the roots of enormous trees dotting the surface, or high in the canopy, which spreads over the planet's atmosphere. A chance meeting between Kaina, a youth from the canopy, and Liliha, a young woman from the surface, sets off a chain of events that will change the fate of the world.

title: Koi Wa Misoji Wo Sugite Kara
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Ryuta Amazume
synopsis:
Uehara Sakura, a 30 year old office lady, is on a date with her 22 year old kouhai from work, Yamada Yuu. While Yamada is completely heads over heels for Ueda, she absolutely hates him. Will those feelings hold true when they get to their last destination  the Love Hotel.  
  
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ArOgiso)

title: I Focus on Your Color
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life
author: Tarou Chiaki
synopsis: Photography is the art to grasp beauty with the one and only tool, a camera. Oji's dream is to become a photographer that photographs at the front lines of war, to take pictures of historical events taking place in front of his eyes. However, his childhood friend, Sumire, doesn't think that he is capable of becoming one. In his photography club, Oji shows his photos to the group, and his upperclassman, Ran, points out that Sumire is a good target to photograph. Oji manages to get permission to take photos of Sumire, and during his shoot, Sumire notices that Oji is acting differently than before. Later they find out that one of Oji's pictures won an award! Sumire congratulates him, but Oji sees beyond his award. He claims that he learned that he has much more potential than he thinks. Ran, overseeing this, plans to take Oji to the next level so he can capture true beauty through the lens of a camera!

title: Lilim Kiss
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Mizuki Kawashita
synopsis: Saiki Takaya, a guy who is easily misunderstood, one day finds a flask containing the succubus Lilim. She is very attractive but, she also has the tendency to drain the life force out of people. She surprises the life out of him (literally) when she kisses him unconscious. Lilim then flies off for more "food," but returns later, saying that Takaya's life-energy was the "tastiest." From then, Lilim is accepted by Takaya's parents as a live-in girlfriend of sorts, and Takaya's heart seems to start wavering towards this voluptuous devil.

title: Police in a Pod
genre: Award Winning, Comedy, Crime, Office Workers, Police
author: Miko Yasu
synopsis: "I'm quitting!" Kawai, a new female police officer, clutches her letter of resignation, and for some reason, the mega-beautiful Chief Fuji from the Detective Division is assigned to her police box. This is the birth of a duo that brings the men of the Okajima Prefectural Police to despair.

title: Disney Twisted Wonderland - the Comic - ~Episode of Octavinelle~
genre: Magic, School Life, Adaptation
author: Wakana Hazuki
synopsis: Not found

genre: Action, Comedy, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Yabako Sandrovich
synopsis: Join gyaru Sakura Hibiki and ojou Souryuuin Akemi as they lift weights and exercise with the help of macho-man Machio! Learn for yourself how good form, good diet and plenty of exercise will help with healthy living!! Let's muscle!!!

title: Pajama Na Kanojo
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Kousuke Hamada
synopsis:
Keisuke and Makura are childhood friends who grew up together almost like brother and sister. One day, due to a misunderstanding they had, Makura left the house angry until Keisuke's Mom is worried about Makura not coming home yet, thus Keisuke is told to go look for her.  
Reluctantly, Keisuke went out to find Makura, He ended up at a place they used to go often, the sunflower field. Luckily, Makura was there. Keisuke joined her sitting on the bench and they began to reminisce.  
When Keisuke decided that they should head back home, her mother phoned him and said that Makura collapsed and didn't wake up. She also told him to head to the hospital immediately. At that same moment, he looked at Makura, who was not standing but floating in the air

title: The Splendid Job of a Monster Maid
genre: Action, Demons, Zombies, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life
author: Yugata Tanabe
synopsis:
A demon world maid's cute and spooky fantasy action!  
  
Sumire, a nekomata, who lost her favorite master was wandering around, got lost, and arrived in a foreign country in the demon world?! With the android and undead maids, clean the demon's house brilliantly to take back "that something!"  
  
[Artist's twitter](https://twitter.com/yugata_tanabe)

title: Blue Lock: Episode Nagi
genre: Sports, Drama
author: Muneyuki Kaneshiro
synopsis: Nagi Seishiro is a second-year high school student. He is a boy whose habit is to say, "It's a pain in the ass," and he lives his life listlessly. Until his partner, Mikage Reo, discovers his talent in the "Blue Lock," a dormitory for training strikers that aims to win the World Cup for Japanese soccer.

title: Saki
genre: Comedy, Sports, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Hakaba
synopsis:
Saki's never been a big fan of mahjong. A lifetime of being forced to play with family at holidays (and losing her money as a consequence...) has left a foul taste for the game in her mouth. When she's convinced, though, to play a game with her classmates, she discovers that not only has fending off her family left her with an uncanny ability for the game but, more surprisingly, that it can even be fun!

Is this revelation enough to cleanse Saki's distaste for the game? Can her classmates convince her to join their club, or is there just too much baggage to make it worth her while?

title: Shinyaku Seisho
genre: Historical, Demons, Superhero, Adventure, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Akeru Asahi

genre: Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Jomamel
synopsis: There are delinquents in every school. Ashen is one of them. To make it worse, his father is a powerful politician, meaning he can get away with basically anything. To Sarith, who just wants to lead a peaceful school life, Ashen is someone that should be avoided at all costs. But what happens when theyre forced into situations together and Sarith sees a whole different side of Ashen - One which is cute and needs to be protected? Chubby Kind Seme x Cute Feisty Uke

title: Tenchou to Mujikakuna Tennin
genre: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Mii Aimai
synopsis: Mitsu Kumano, a JK who works part-time at a cafe, is a stylish and mature 16-year-old. However, she is "unaware" of everything she does, including her thoughtful remarks and bold behavior. Thanks to this, the manager of her part-time job, Yuya Higurashi, has his heart overloaded everyday!

title: Saint Seiya: Saintia Sho
genre: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy
author: Chimaki Kuori
synopsis:
Saintias.  
They are a special kind of female Saints who are given the task to serve Athena as her personal maids.  
Shoko meets Kido Saori, a girl claiming to be the reincarnation of the goddess Athena, who has protected the world from evil since mythological times. However, as the comet Repulse approaches Earth, Shoko must choose either to give in to her destiny as host of an evil goddess, or to rise against it, and protect the peace and justice on Earth as a Saintia.  
It's the eve of the Galaxian Wars.  
And now, the curtain rises on the fierce battle of the girls protecting Athena.

title: Dachi No Imouto
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Tokio Shima
synopsis: The long awaited new series from Shima Tokio, an irregular boy meets girl story. Please enjoy this extraordinarily sweet romantic comedy.

title: Chikyuu Wa Ningen Ni Koishiteru
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic
author: Hajime Uyama
synopsis: Not found

title: Ryuuji
genre: Sports, Slice of Life
author: Kunikazu Toda
synopsis: Entirely unknown nationwide is a high school student named Shino Ryuuji. At a national convention in his last year of junior high, he was allowed to go to a U-16 training camp as a Japanese representative candidate; that was to show a single part. In a friendly match against the U-17 Spain representative, Ryuuji was selected as one of the chosen to bathe in the severe baptism of the world! In the overwhelming reality, many soccer fans were fascinated by Japan's first-of-its-kind genuine story, the long-awaited serialization!

title: Fighting Ward
genre: Action, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Do-Hwan No
synopsis:
A high school student, Kang Sun-woo, single-handedly defeats a group of illegal loan sharks who came to his house. At the hospital, where he goes for treatment, he is invited by a mysterious man to participate in a suspicious fighting tournament with a huge cash prize.

The prize is crucial for the survival of his family. Sun-woo must survive the fight ward !

title: The Tyrant'S Comfort Doll
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yeon-Ju
synopsis:
Her brother, who was the one who caused a *coup d'état*, had sliced her throat. After she returned to the time before she died, she decided that she would somehow tame him and survive! But Did she tame him too well?

"Brother, why don't you get married?"

There was no reply from him instead, the glass that he held popped and cracked.

"Oh no, you're bleeding."

"Why should I get married?"

"Eh?"

"I already have you."

Why should I get married you say? You have to get a consort so I can leave this castle! Sezh laughed strangely.

"Sezh."

At that moment, she stumbled and Raytan pulled her body into his arms. His red eyes started to gleam suggestively while looking down at Sezh who was trapped in his arms.

"You know we are not real siblings."

---
Legend has it that a man with black hair and red eyes will bring ruin to Den Helder's royal family. Because he was born with these features, Rayton is shunned by the palace as "the cursed one." When the vengeful prince stages a bloody *coup d'état* years later, the powerless youngest princess, Setz, also died by his sword. Little does Setz know that she's about to wake up in her body five years in the past-- but now that she has, it's her chance to get on Rayton's good side and turn her fate around. Cracking the prince's cold exterior is a challenge, but once she does, there seems to be no going back! As Rayton grows more and more attached to her, Setz is pulled deeper into the midst of the dark conspiracies brewing around the palace. Has the princess truly escaped death, or is she in more danger than ever before?

---

title: When the System Opens After the Age of 100, All Grandchildren Kneel Upon the Mountains!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: LY
synopsis: Xiao Chen, a time-traveler nearing the age of one hundred, was peacefully preparing to spend the rest of his life. Suddenly, a system activated, rewarding him for his familys childbirth. Not only would he become stronger, but his lifespan would also reverse! Procreate, quickly procreate! he exclaimed. Everyone in the family, regardless of age or gender, give birth, give birth, give birth!

title: Magmell Shinkai Suizokukan
genre: Animals, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Kiyomi Sugishita
synopsis:
A tale about a modern deep-sea aquarium employee in Tokyo!  
  
What's living in the overwhelming darkness deep within the sea? Take a glimpse into this strange world about a boy working at a deep sea aquarium.

title: Rebirth of the Emperor in the Reverse World
genre: Action, Long Strip, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Qing Lu
synopsis: I was once the lord of the cultivators in the immortal realm. But I was reborn into a world where the women worked to earn a living, while the men sat around and looked pretty. Even worse, my body looked like a fat slob! I worked hard to get into shape, but I didn't do it for the benefit of you thirsty women!

title: Pocket Monsters - Liko'S Treasure
genre: Monsters, Action, Animals, Sports, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Hori  Oritoka
synopsis:
Liko is a girl with a mysterious pendant.
Liko is happy to receive her first Pokemon, Sprigatito, but Sprigatito doesn't listen to her at all...?

This is the official manga adaptation depicting Liko and Sprigatito's adventures.

title: Magical Girl Tsubame: I Will (Not) Save the World!

author: Mapollo 3-Gou
synopsis: The world is in danger! Who will rise to protect it? Introducing Tsubame, an ordinary high school student who dreams of becoming a magical girl. But if she has to choose between the world and her friends... A new adventure from Mapollo 3, the creator of PPPPPP! Buckle up for some passion, magical girls, and a dash of madness!

title: Ato Wa Gojiyuu Ni Douzo! ~Tutorial De Kami-Sama Ga Last Boss Wo Taoshi Chatta Node Watashi Wa Suki Houdai Ikiteiku~
genre: Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Girls' Love, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Spanner Onikage
synopsis:
My name's Karinaor at least, it is now! I used to be a nondescript, run-of-the-mill Japanese salaryman until I was whisked away to a divine realm where the Goddess of Time and Space told me I'd be living a new life in a new worldand as a girl, since apparently she prefers it that way. First she wants me to beat some final boss she has a grudge against, then she takes control of my body to show me how to use my new spatial magic powers in a tutorial fight... Wait, isn't that the final boss I'm supposed to beat?! Less than in a minute into the tutorial and he's dead?! And now she says the world's my oyster. Seriously?!
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/knock-yourself-out-the-goddess-beat-the-final-boss-in-the-tutorial-so-now-i-m-free-to-do-whatever)

title: Sora & Haena!
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color, Gyaru
author: Jackbull
synopsis: Sora Yoon can hardly look a person in the eye without becoming a nervous mess. So how she ended up befriending some girls by lying about having a boyfriend is beyond her! Fortunately, she ran into the boisterous and sociable  albeit dense  Haena Woo at just the right time. Together they make a deal: Haena will help Sora land a boyfriend IF she can help her make it into college! Will they stick true to their agreement or find they want something more?

title: Majutsu Wo Kiwamete Tabi Ni Deta Tensei Elf, Moteamashita Jumyou De Ikeru Densetsu to Naru
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: kanco
synopsis:
This the long tale of a reincarnated elf who become a living legend!

After his ordinary life came to an end in an accident, Minoru was reincarnated as an elf who have a average lifespan of 1000 years. Due to the regret of not being able to do anything in his previous life, he decided to leave his village and travel in this life to leave behind evidence that he once lived in this world. However, the head of the elf clan imposes a certain trial?!

title: D-Kyuu Boukensha No Ore, Naze Ka Yuusha Party Ni Kanyuu Sareta Ageku, Oujo Ni Tsukimatowareteru
genre: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Teto Tachitsu
synopsis: If you become a hero and defeat the Demon King, a life of idleness awaits you...! This is what the young man Jirei believed, and he worked hard day and night to achieve his goal. However, when he found out that the heroes who defeated the Demon King were the ones who were doing all the hard work, he ran away. But the girls that Jirei had been saving on his journeys before he knew it came pouring in one after another to win his heart and body...?

title: Baka No Kuni Shoku Kikou
genre: Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Makoto Kanbayashi

title: Fuzoroi No Renri

author: Mikanuji
synopsis:
Tanaka Iori is a worker for a company that sets unreasonable demands, on top of that she has a penchant for dating married men. What a recipe for disaster! One day she gets drunk with an acquaintance and wakes up the next morning by her side naked! What's Iori to do?

title: I Found a Family That Wasn'T in My Adoption Plan
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ir-Won
synopsis:
She was the most competent secretary of the Brauno family, the most prestigious in the empire,
but one day, she was betrayed and killed by a hitman!

Was it because of the resentment she faced for not being a noble?
Or because of her desire to become one?

She reincarnated as Aerin, the seven-year-old illegitimate granddaughter of the Brauno family!!

However, even as this child, shes destined to be adopted and killed by the same man who betrayed her in her previous life.

No way! Before I die by his hands, Ill get adopted by someone else!

Huh? All I wanted was to be adopted, but now

Wealth, honor, and even a new family that wasnt part of the adoption plan come as a package deal.
Aerin! Take me!
No, I already have too much.
Its fine if you just add me to your endless list of assets.
But how could I possibly take in a prince?

At this point, should I just take over not only the family but the entire empire too?

title: Sekai De Ichiban "Kawaii" Amamiya-San, Nibanme Wa Ore.
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Aminohada
synopsis: Hikari, a highly popular model hailed as the "Cutest Girl in the World"... The mysterious model turned out to be an ordinary high school student named Harema Kouki! Kouki is troubled by the fact that he feels he's too cute when cross-dressing and can't find other girls cute... But by a twist of fate, he realizes that his classmate, Amamiya-san, is much cuter than him!?

title: Promises of Love
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Doujinshi, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Yuuga Kuromiya
synopsis:
Omegaverse story

^^This comics is based on fiction and any similarity to real people, places, or events is purely coincidental^^

title: Blue Period
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Crossdressing, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life
author: Shiuko Kano
synopsis:
Yatora is the perfect high school student, with good grades and lots of friends. Its an effortless performance, and, ultimatelya dull one. But he wanders into the art room one day, and a lone painting captures his eye, awakening him to a kind of beauty he never knew. Compelled and consumed, he dives in headfirst  and hes about to learn how savage and unforgiving art can be!

---
- **Won the 13th Manga Taisho Award in 2020**  
- **Won the 44th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2020**

title: Wolf in the House
genre: Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Ji-Yeon Park
synopsis: After ending an on-again, off-again relationship of 10 years, Minsuk decides to foster a Siberian husky named Bexan to mark the start of his new single life. He cant wait to cuddle with his new furry roommate, take him on walks, and play fetch. But Bexan is no ordinary dogand when night falls, Minsuk is in for a surprise.

title: 'Cause Calypso Can
genre: Reincarnation, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Q00
synopsis:
Calypso has experienced repeated reincarnation, and this is her 4th reincarnation. 

In her previous lives, she always died before she reached the age of 22 and returned to where everything started. During her 3rd life, she discovered that when a dragon goes on a rampage, it distorts dimensions. 

Determined to use this knowledge, she plans to exploit the dragons power to return to her original world. Currently, Calypso finds herself in a childcare story, where she encounters a man who she believes to be her father but the latter doesnt recognize her. 

Seeking his help, Calypso involves her "father" and family in her quest, turning them into unwitting allies in her journey.

---
At age 3, Calypso Aquasiadel is the most outstanding genius her family's ever seen, and no wonder... She's actually a modern girl who's been reborn into the same novel thrice! This time around, Calypso's determined to harness the powers of the mysterious dragon duke and send herself back home. The only problem is, she'll first need to earn the respect of her hardened family to survive until then! Can Calypso win their approval and even their hearts? Or is this life doomed for another do-over?

title: Cherry Blossoms After Winter
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Drama, School Life, Web Comic
author: Bam-U
synopsis:
From living under the same roof to then being classmates?!

Ever since his parents passed away, Haebom has been living in Taesungs house. And now, being a 12th grader, he enters the same class as Taesung, which makes the whole situation way more awkward. Living together 24/7, Taesung and Haebom's relationship is bound to change.

---
