title: Becoming Immortal by Doing Nothing
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Full Color
author: Shuijiao De Bendan
synopsis: My Grandfather is a Supreme Cultivator, My Second Grandfather is a Top Alchemist, My Father is the Patriarch of an Immortal Clan, My Mother is the Daughter of a Sword Sovereign, My Second Uncle is the Supreme Elder of the Ancient Dao Academy, and My Third Uncle Rules the Western Desert! Luo Qianfan said to the system, As the strongest second-generation immortal in history, Im really not interested in cultivation.

title: My New Friend Wasn'T What I Expected
genre: Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Kaibashira
synopsis: First impressions are important, but they're not the whole story...

title: Ore No Dankon ? Sacrifice
genre: Psychological, Crossdressing, School Life
author: Soutsu Hasebe
synopsis:
In order to lose my family's debt (4 billion), I decided to go to a girls' school by dressing as a woman, as per the order of "a pervert who loves romantic comedy and has too much power". School life is full of confusion, but fortunately, in the midst of misfortune, all the members of the student council are "men" who go to girls' schools in the same circumstances. Can you win a peaceful school life despite the perverted old man who wants romantic comedy troubles?

(source: mangaupdates)

title: Kita No Toridenite
genre: Reincarnation, Animals, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Tsukasa Mikuni
synopsis:
Paw pads wrapped in white fur. Fluffiness around the neck. A bushy tail. A rounded figure that was the very definition of fur ball!

A certain Japanese girl had been reincarnated into such a fox cub, Milfiria. Milfiria was told to watch the house by her mother, as she left for the capital. However, unable to bear with the loneliness, she decided to follow her mother but lost her way until she reached a fort protected by strong knights.

title: Lunch Zake
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Sanko Takada
synopsis: I am Shoko Inumori. Divorced, in her twenties. Occupation: A caretaker. Her business hours are until 5:00 in the morning. Her only luxury is to have a "lunch drink" after work.

title: Akuyaku Kizoku to Shite Hitsuyou Na Sore
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Masakorin
synopsis:
A story of a man with evil charisma: A young man who's lived in modern Japan suddenly realized that he had been reborn in his favourite fantasy novel, *The Tale of the Rhinana Kingdom*. Yet he wasnt reborn as the protagonist, but as the famous villainous marquis in the story. With the fate of being overthrown looming above him, he takes all action to break free of his determined fate by using his future knowledge along with the strongest skill "Absolute Evil".

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66135)

title: My Dear Lass
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Philosophical, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Tracy Hu
synopsis:
"It seems like I'd like someone like you."

"You're really like a little pony." 

This is a slice-of-life of the romance and exploits of an adorkable and ditzy senior "little fox" and her dependable junior "little pony".

title: Mpd Psycho
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Crime, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Mystery
author: Eiji Ootsuka
synopsis: The main character is a detective, Kazuhiko Amamiya, suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder (a.k.a. Dissociative Identity Disorder). Starting out as a violent detective series with a twist (the twist being the variant personalities that take over Detective Amamiya at various intervals), the series evolves into an exceptionally complex and involved sci-fi conspiracy story.

title: The Great Mage of the Hero'S Party Reincarnates
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Potetorusu
synopsis:
At age 13, the genius wizard Rin embarked on a journey with Lista and the hero party to defeat the great evil known as the Abyss, which sought to plunge the world into chaos. But as the battle grew more intense, Rins body succumbed to the dark poison of the Abyss, putting his life in grave danger.

With the words Ill come back, Rins soul entered a forced dormancy, only to reawaken 300 years later as a noble boy. Starting his second life in a peaceful world, Rin discovers that on one side of the world, the destined forces of darkness are beginning to stir once more.

---
The battle with the arch-nemesis resumes after 300 years. The genius wizard, Lynn, embarks on a grand journey, at the age of 13. Together with the party of heroes, led by Esther, they aim to defeat the great evil Abyss that intends to throw the world into chaos. However, the battles becomes increasingly fierce and at the final moment, Lynn succumbs to the dark poison of the Abyss. Leaving behind the words Ill be back, Lynns soul falls dormant for 300 years, before being resurrected into the body of a boy of noble birth. Thus begins his second life in a peaceful world. But in the meantime, a dark force is brooding once again, threatening to plunge the world into turmoil once again.

title: The Ultimate of All Ages
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Di Shui
synopsis: First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.

title: To Your Moralless
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hot Fudge Comics
synopsis:
A story of abnormal and crazy love between sociopath Park Chi-gyeong and daring, indifferent woman Kang Tae-ri, based on Hirachells original work. At the police station, where Tae-ri goes to report her colleague, she is offered a large settlement by a man she meets for the first time. Unlike her immature peers, this man, Park Chi-gyeong, exudes a dangerous aura. Tae-ri, who rejects the settlement, becomes a bothersome existence to Chi-gyeong, who has lived his life controlling everything. From their first meeting, they become thorns in each others sides.

The obsession of Chi-gyeong, who tries to break Tae-ris resolve, and Tae-ri, who refuses to lose, only deepens with time

title: Harapeko Oyako to Motokare Yanushi
genre: Romance, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Riori
synopsis:
36-year-old Takaharu lives alone. After graduating from Art College, he has been living a quiet life while painting pictures. 

One day, his ex-girlfriend Kyou, whom he broke up with 17 years ago, comes to him with her daughter Minori and asks him to let them stay at his place. As in their college days, 

Kyou is attracted by the delicious food, and so the three of them begin to live together!

title: Kono Koi Wo Hoshi Ni Wa Negawanai
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama
author: Shinoa
synopsis:
Eri-chan is my childhood friend whom I've always spent time with since we were little. Somewhere along the way, my affection for her shifted from being just friends to romantic feelings, but I doubt I'll ever confess these feelings to her. Because I want to stay by her side forever.

And so begins a delicate and beautiful love story where each person's 'love' intertwines.

title: Ai Da Nante Iwanai Kara
genre: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Kure Higure
synopsis:
Unexpectedly, he crossed paths with his old high school friend, Yachiyo, during his grandmother's funeral. It had been two long years since they last saw each other, right after Yachiyo's wedding. Their friendship had become distant due to a past incident in high school. 

"At that moment, I failed to comprehend the significance of it all, and by the time I did, it was already too latea haunting memory. The emotions that I believed I had let go of resurfaced, engulfing me as we crossed paths once more..."

title: Shippai Kazoku
genre: Psychological, Crime, Drama
author: Mihoko Komiya
synopsis: A reclusive son, a daughter looking for sugar daddies, and a cheating husband. "This family is a failure." Noriko, a housewife who thinks so, has no dreams or hopes for the future, and her days just pass by. However, her fate changes dramatically when she impulsively kills her husband's boss. "The only way for the whole family to live happily is to hide the body." A strange bond is formed as the broken family cooperates in concealing the body.

title: The Aquarium Does Not Dance
genre: Monsters, Animals, Adventure, Gore, Horror, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Yui Toumin
synopsis:
Suze and her childhood friend, Lulu, visit the renowned Bianca Aquarium.
However, the latter ends up disappearing without a trace.
Determined to find Lulu, Suzu wanders through the fearful aquarium.

Suddenly, she is attacked by a mysterious woman who names herself "Retro"
The aquarium director's wife, "Chris", lends Suze her hand in escaping the facility.
The girl who's been continuously trapped within the aquarium, "Kitty".

The only hint to escaping...
is to become a creature of the aquarium.

Suze must unravel the mysteries behind these women???
and discover the identity of the traitor...

(From the official site)

title: Isekai Izakaya "Gen"
genre: Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation
author: Tsukasa Usui
synopsis:
There's this pub (Izakaya) called " Gen" that was supposed to be in a certain place in the Kanto region of Japan.  After opening the door one day, it was found to be connected to the city of Parisia, the Capital of the Eastern Kingdom Oiria.

Individual residents from a foreign world such as crestfallen monks, warriors, noble female chevaliers, daughters of noisy famous aristocrats, etc. All visited the peculiar izakaya which they've never seen before, and gradually they'll become fans of the dishes.

A foreign world gourmet fantasy has finally started!  
  
***From the same author of Isekai Izakaya "Nobu", which takes place in Kyoto.**

title: Ochame Na Okusan to No Nichijou Chabangoto
genre: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Giba-chan
synopsis:
**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/gibagibagiba/status/1633031267829817344) (Chapter 2),
[Nico Nico Douga Manga](https://sp.manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63088) (Different chapter numbering)
- Defunct Official Raw (Chapter 1) - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/105860251), [FANBOX](https://gibagibagiba.fanbox.cc/posts/5412957)

title: A Modern Man Who Transmigrated Into the Murim World
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Beop-Ryong Yeo
synopsis: I was a public official who worked part-time to survive. I was knocked out by a speeding car while making deliveries in the middle of the night. I have a strong memory of dying prematurely in a hit-and-run. Im Jo Hwi? At some point, I became the second son of the collapsing Jo Ga-cheol Clan. This family has neither the authority to drop a flying bird nor the power to carry out ones will. There is only an enormous amount of debt that can annihilate the entire family. Theres only one way out! Father, please pass the Jo Ga-cheol Clan on to me. The story of a successful modern man who has to utilize all the knowledge and experience of a public official begins now!!

title: Grand Duke of the North
genre: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Hauibam
synopsis: Grand Duke of the North with black hair and heterochromia eyes (so you dont have to choose over red or black eyes). Allegedly, he has 2 personality which switch on full moon rises, got a rabbit-like wife. Thats it. You know the rest.

title: Reincarnated Murim Lord
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Web Comic, Full Color
author: JP
synopsis: Regret is the bane of old men. When aging Alliance Lord Hajin Cheon of the Grand Martial Alliance reflects on his immense legacy, he finds that he recalls little of his deeds or even the lives of his closest advisors. Stricken by a mysterious ailment, Hajin suddenly passes away only to wake up in the body of Ridan Byeok, heir to the Byeok Clan of swordsmen. The only problem is, Ridan is a well-known wastrel, the polar opposite of the virtuous and stern Hajin. Righting the wrongs of his predecessor, Hajin begins to uncover the truth behind his death

title: Itsuka, Kazoku Ni Naru Made
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Slice of Life
author: Fujitobi
synopsis: The three lived together under a single roof. Takaomi is a single father, raising his only son. For some reason, he is persistently being hit on by his colleague, Nomura, who so happens to be able to do both work and housework. Taking overly good care of them, Nomura repeatedly visits Takaomis house uninvited and proposes that Takaomi should go out with him, telling him all about the advantages of doing so. Takaomi was perplexed since hes never even dated another man before. But as they spent more time together, going out for meals and visiting amusement parks, Takaomi came to realise that he enjoyed the time spent together as a three and that it felt precious to him A heart-warming BL between a flawless younger salaryman and a single father moved by affection.

title: WorldS Greatest Senior Disciple
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Bungmihon
synopsis:
A senior disciple from a countryside martial academy returns as the worlds best! Dragged into a brutal political war, senior disciple Hyeok Musang didnt return after the bloody war ended. No one knew whether he was still alive for 5 years.

Upon barely returning to his hometown, he found his Dragon Tiger Martial Academy being persecuted and destroyed by a third-rate gang.

He thought he could live peacefully with his fellow members after winning the war but seeing the miserable state of his master and fellow disciples, he was filled with anger and guilt.

With the return of the senior disciple, everyone thought things would get better but only for a moment. Things were still happening in his hometown of Yangzhou County. Was the war really over? The head disciple raises his sword against the dangers threatening his Dragon Tiger Martial Academy.

title: Enrolling in the Transcendent Academy
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Eojjeoda
synopsis:
After a hundred years of monsters, its become the norm to train at hunter academies if you want to become a professional monster hunter. And thats just what hard-working orphan Seojun Kim dreams of.

But after a freak accident dashes his hopes, ads for the mysterious Transcendent Academy pop up on his phone, offering him a chance to train virtually with historys most legendary warriors. As he levels up, hes soon caught up in the world of hunter academies, dungeon raids, and competitive tournaments.

But the more he learns, the more questions he has about the people surrounding him, his past, and the secrets of the Transcendent Academy.

title: Sekai Ni Hitori, Zenzokusei Mahou No Tsukaite
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Akihito Shuushoku
synopsis: After a traffic accident, Zenichi Kiyama, a humble office worker, was reincarnated as a baby in a different world called "perfect compatibility". However, the result of his attribute appraisal with crystal was "dark attribute". The worst result is that he is a demon child...! ?

title: The Archmage'S Daughter
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Seora Moon
synopsis:
Maybelle had lived a life of abuse under her parents. Upon discovery that these 'parents' aren't her true biological parents and that somewhere, her father exists, with a sad heart, Maybelle sets off in search of him.

---
Mabels been mocked her whole life for her nonexistent magical ability, but when she finally meets her true father, its the all-powerful archmage, Raquiel! Forced by an imperial pact to let her go long ago, he can now welcome her into his home, with his half-wolf butler, three nymph sisters, a fox halfling, and a kind disciple to watch over her. But dark secrets from his past threaten to catch up with them. Will his magic be enough to protect her? Could she even come into a power all her own?

title: Ziggurat
genre: Action, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: MISS BLACK
synopsis: A story of a female "phantom" thief and a hot-blooded high school senior sleuth unfold in this mystery chase-action manga.

title: Dear My Doll - Kimi to No Yakusoku
genre: Romance, Fantasy
author: Shiori Teshirogi
synopsis: Lim and Iota live in a robot country. Lim, who is in love. Iota, whom she loves. The kind robotic maids. Lim has always thought her sunshine-filled days would go on forever, but what is this promise Iota made with her in the past and the secret that he's keeping from her?

title: New Game!
genre: Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma, Slice of Life
author: Shoutarou Tokunou
synopsis: Having been inspired by the character designs of a particular video game when she was younger, Suzukaze Aoba, a high school graduate, begins working as a character designer for the game's developer, Eagle Jump. As she works on modelling and designing characters for games in development, she becomes acquainted with her fellow co-workers in the character design department, as well as those from across the company.

title: Gentleman of the Night
genre: Oneshot, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Web Comic
author: Suzuko Kotori
synopsis: Not found

title: Records of the Swordsman Scholar
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Geobalhan
synopsis:
Scholar Woon Hyun enters the palace after passing the Imperial Examination.
Though he soon comes to lament his poor and miserable life of having to deal with the Crown Princes hobbies,
Despite that, he doesnt give up and tries his best to learn martial arts.
But Woon Hyun suddenly picks up his brush to conquer the Murim?!

The hidden story of the scholar who passed the Imperial Examination at a young age begins. 

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EA%B2%80%EC%A0%84/2895)

title: Mofumofu to Isekai Bouken Meshi
genre: Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Ruisu Suhiyo
synopsis: Company employee Sano Jyu, who had a frail constitution, always had a sensation of heat inside his body. Then, he collapses due to the combination of a busy season and an outburst of fever. Then the goddess appears and tells him. You have made a mistake in the world in which you should be born. The cause of the fever is magical power, and he was born with magical power in a world without magical power. ...... Itsuki is reborn in another world with a healthy body and more magical power than any other person, just as he wished, thanks to the power of the goddess. And with the legendary magical beast born from the egg he was given as his partner, he begins his second life as an adventurer. ......

title: Umarekawatte Mo Mata, Watashi to Kekkon Shite Kuremasu Ka?
genre: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Miku Morinaga
synopsis:
Toranosuke fell in love with his servant Kaoru. For twenty years, they slowly developed their love for each other, thus a Showa couple of clumsy husband and muscle brained wife was born. They spend a lot of time together, and they begin to talk in a nostalgic manner in Toranosuke's hospital room.  
  
Gentle memories of a deeply in love husband and wife.

title: Beastars
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Paru Itagaki
synopsis:
In a world populated by anthropomorphic animals, herbivores and carnivores coexist with each other. For the adolescents of the Cherryton School, school life is filled with hope, romance, distrust, and uneasiness. The main character is Legosi the wolf, a member of the drama club. Despite his menacing appearance, he has a very gentle heart. Throughout most of his life, he has always been an object of fear and hatred by other animals, and he's been quite accustomed to that lifestyle. But soon, he finds himself becoming more involved with his fellow classmates who have their own share of insecurities and finds his life in school changing slowly.  

---  
- **Won the 2018 Manga Taisho Award**

title: Nano Hazard
genre: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, School Life, Tragedy
author: Shoushou Kurihara
synopsis: Enjou Shuuto's dream was always to become a detective and take down the scumbag who killed his father. As practice, he takes on the local bullies at every opportunity only to get his butt handed to him. But what happens when rogue nanobots descend on his neighborhood, "enhancing" their hosts with deadly results?

title: Girls' Last Tour
genre: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Psychological, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Tsukumizu
synopsis:
Civilization is dead, but Chito and Yuuri are still alive. 
So they hop aboard their Kettenkrad motorbike and aimlessly wander the ruins of the world they once knew. 
Day after hopeless day, they look for their next meal and fuel for their ride. 
But as long as they are together, even an existence as bleak as theirs has a ray or two of sunshine in it, 
whether they're sucking down their fill of soup or hunting for machine parts to tinker with. 
The experiences and feelings these two girls share in a world full of nothing give them something to live for  
  
---
- **Won the Seiun Award for Best Comic in 2019**

title: Register
genre: Romance, Slice of Life
author: Fujimaru
synopsis: How young is too young to fall in love? How old is too old to fall in love? Who decides the end of the flowery days of youth and the beginning of the same? In the eastern part of Tokyo, at a supermarket in a town zero meters above sea level. A chance encounter for two people over the cashier's counter. A youth-returning story where something might start!

title: Tonari No Wakao-San Wa Miesou De Mienai
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic
author: Inariyama
synopsis: High school student Mizuno has a person that he's not good with. It's his seatmate Wakao-san. Mizuno is the only one who perceives Wakao's face as a blank slate, making it impossible for him to read any of her facial expressions. Furthermore, when Wakao tells him that she's using his expressions as "reference," the mystery surrounding her deepens?!

title: Love Thy Neighbor
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Rin Yuzuki
synopsis: Pah Doyeon, a college student living in an old apartment building, gets used to the thugs coming to her neighbor's door every day. One day, when she sees the thugs trying to break into her neighbor's house, she unwittingly hides her next-door neighbor, Jinju, in her apartment... Looking at Jinju, who is much older than her, Doyeon gradually becomes engulfed in an unknown desire. How will their awkward cohabitation end?

title: Gantz
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Tragedy
author: Hiroya Oku
synopsis: Somewhere in Tokyo, there is a room. In that room is a black sphere. Periodically, people who should otherwise have died are transferred to the room. There, the sphere gives them special suits and weapons, and sends them out on a mission to kill aliens here on Earth. While these missions take place, the rest of the world is largely oblivious to them. These missions are lethalfew participants survive them. The sphere calls the shots, and it's not the slightest bit nice. Its name Gantz.

title: Kimi Ga Utau Kusuri Renka
genre: Demons, Romance, Adventure, Medical, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ion Morino
synopsis:
A healer who has the unique ability to cure disease and is said to be the world's last hope. While on an overseas expedition, Laila, a newcomer to the world, meets a beautiful demoness named Lail, who is kept in the royal castle. 

The two live out their predetermined destiny, and what develops between these two is...?

title: Jinmen
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Survival, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Takahiro Katou
synopsis: After a few years, the main character, Jinguu Masato, returns home. Due to his nature, he loves animals and he also likes to visit them. Because of this, he loved to visit the zoo since he was small and that's how he developed a close relationship with Hanayo. However, Masato gradually starts to notice some strange incidents happening in the zoo and after that, he's thrown into this unexpected world

title: Sen'Ya Yuri Ichiya
genre: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Arata Shiraishi
synopsis: Posting original yuri short stories.

title: Beyond the Sky
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Drama, Full Color
author: Xiao Bai
synopsis: Han Qingyu lived peacefully for nineteen years, and never thought that one day he would become one of the main characters in an epic. An accident occurred out of the blue. The boy was forced wield a knife and began to face everything he knew nothing about: the invasion of civilization, the Azure Alliance, the mobile energy suit, the unique witness corps; the blade of exile, the sharp streams... He is narrow-minded, he is "The Qing Major" painted on cars and high-rise buildings in the era of full-scale military conscription; he will make the first cut in the Zenith War.

title: The Red Snake
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Hideshi Hino
synopsis:
Beware the red snake! Told from the perspective of a young boy, The Red Snake is a story of the above boy, the house he inhabits, and the forest around his house that stretches on and on. The characters in the story are all mad: his grandfather, who sports a massive growth on his jaw; his grandmother, who believes she is a chicken; his father, who is vicious to the chickens he raises (except for his mother, to whom he provides eggs that so that she can claim she laid them herself); and his sister, whose affection for insects borders on the erotic. The story evolves into a classic nightmare.  
  
The Hino Horror series:  
Hino Horror Volume 1: The Red Snake (??? Akai Hebi)  
Hino Horror Volume 2: The Bug Boy (???? Dokumushi Kozou)  
Hino Horror Volume 3: Oninbo and the Bugs from Hell (??????! ??? Jigoku Mushi Woku! Oninbo)  
Hino Horror Volume 4: Oninbo and the Bugs from Hell 2  
Hino Horror Volume 5: The Living Corpse (???? Shiniku no Otoko)  
Hino Horror Volume 6: Black Cat (??????? Kuroneko no Me ga Yami ni)  
Hino Horror Volume 7: The Collection (M Collection)  
Hino Horror Volume 8: The Collection 2  
Hino Horror Volume 9: Ghost School (Ghost School (HINO Hideshi))  
Hino Horror Volume 10: Death's Reflection  
Hino Horror Volume 11: Gallery of Horrors (Kyoufu Gallery)  
Hino Horror Volume 12: Mystique Mandala of Hell (Kaiki! Jigoku Mandara)  
Hino Horror Volume 13: Zipangu Night  
Hino Horror Volume 14: Skin and Bone  
  
This manga is also volume 4 in the Magical Horror Series.

title: I Don'T Want to Be Just an ? Omega! ~I Was in My Sister'S Bl Manga When I Reincarnated in Another World~
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy
author: Emu Mogu
synopsis: Aspiring manga artist Taisei Kuji is an assistant to his sister, a popular BL mangaka. One day, Taisei was unluckily run over by a truck and found himself reincarnated into the omegaverse world drawn by his sister!

title: Kirara?Princess
genre: Romance, Adventure, Fantasy
author: Rika Tanaka
synopsis: Is a sh?jo fantasy, romance, and adventure manga series written by Rika Tanaka and illustrated by Nao Kodaka. The first 15 episodes were serialized by K?dansha in the monthly manga magazine Nakayoshi, while the last 8 episodes were serialized in the quarterly Nakayoshi Lovely. It was later collected in five bound volumes containing the Nakayoshi episodes and volumes containing the Nakayoshi Lovely episodes). It is about young girl named Kilala and a lost Prince named Rei who join together to find the "7th Princess" and save the kingdom of Paradiso. It has similarities to the Kingdom Hearts series.

title: Yuru Oyako
genre: Comedy, Incest, Girls' Love, Web Comic
author: Taiyaki Nakamura
synopsis:
Is it the age gap? Or is it because were both girls?  its not that. Its because youre  
The continuing adventures of Yuuki's attempts at winning over her stubborn mother Sayaka.

title: My Young Cat and My Old Dog
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Cho
synopsis: Nang-Nak, an old poodle with blurred eyesight, and an adorable kitten, Soondae, love their owners whom they are loyal to. Here are the episodes of the mature dog and the energetic young kitten that always wait for their owners to give them love and affection.

title: Akumade Amai Watashi No Kanojo
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, Cooking
author: Haru Yatosaki
synopsis:
Mai Amai --a girl who loves sweets-- got dumped by her girlfriend, and she's still grappling with the heartbreak. One day, the café she works at gets a new employee: The gorgeous Riri Kurosaki. Mai falls head over heels for her before realizing Riri is actually a succubus!

"I want to eat you and your parfaits right up! <3"

title: Sister and Giant: a Young Lady Is Reborn in Another World
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Demons, Mecha, Adventure, Girls' Love, Isekai, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Monster Girls
author: Be-con
synopsis:
Hinako, a girl who came from another world, made a vow of sisterhood with a giant called Elis, and together they became known as 'The Smallest Giants'. They both have goals that aligned in tracking down people who were significant to them. For Hinako, it is her 'Onee-sama' who was also transported to this world, and for Elis it's the kin she was separated from. However, when collecting their reward after fulfilling a request at the guild, Hinako caught the eye of a knight who serves the church... 

This is the story of a Young Lady and a Giant, two girls who were born to different races and different worlds, and the quest to find their "loved ones" which binds them together.

title: Elfen Lied
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Lynn Okamoto
synopsis:
Captured and isolated against their will, the Diclonius species are a threat waiting to break free. When a young Diclonius girl, Nyu, escapes from the research facility she was being held in, she manages to find solace in two allies until danger seeks her out, putting everyone at risk. However, her enemies soon realize they're in over their heads as an attempt to subdue Nyu results in unspeakable tragedy. [Dark Horse]

**Included one-shots:**
Volume 1: MOL
Volume 2: Digitopolis
Volume 3: Memoria
Volume 5: Elfen Lied (Pilot)

title: Omega Tribe
genre: Action, Psychological, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Supernatural
author: Yukio Tamai
synopsis: It's the dawn of a new millennium....while all the people of the world are living their lives, something is happening in Africa,  where the first humans were born. Now a new type of human is going to rise, and it''s going to change the world, either we like it or not. Evolve or get extinct, there no other choices in this manga which explores the meaning of life, evolution and what being human really means.

title: Subscribed to the Transcendental Channels
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Musimcheon Dragon
synopsis:
Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.

title: Ol Vtuber to Oshi Jk-Chan
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, School Life
author: Asa Shinogi
synopsis:
Kumagai Hinano, a regular office worker, relieves her stress with baths, alcohol, and Vtubing! She is a streamer of video games. Her favorite Vtuber is Emori Ato, a character with a seductive and sexy voice that just makes one melt!

As chance would have it, Hinano decided to collaborate with her fave. When she went to meet up with her, the person waiting for her was...?!

The story of a tired office worker Vtuber and a mysterious JK onee-san who collaborate with each other in a very exciting way.

title: Tenkuu No Shiro O Moratta No De Isekai De Tanoshiku Asobitai
genre: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Tou Matsuki
synopsis:
An angel made a mistake, resulting in Shiihara Daikis death. In order to hide the mistake, he was then sent to a different world. The angel will grant him one wish as a payment for keeping it a secret. Daiki asked for a Heavenly Castle floating in the sky without hesitation.  
Suddenly a floating castle appeared in the new world, which causes confusion amongst the people. They attempt to contact Daiki in various ways. A country tries to steal it by force, while another seeks to befriend him. What in the world would Daiki do?

title: The CountS Youngest Son Is a Gamer
genre: Long Strip, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Pinball
synopsis: Dohyeon is a top-ranking gamer in Connect, an immersive VR game that is overrun by corrupt guilds. After being murdered for discovering a mythical item, he wakes up as Lord Raul Ashton, an NPC in a closed beta version of Connect. Now the sole player in this realm, he decides to use his knowledge from his past life to prevent the downfall of House Ashton and unlock unprecedented powers. For Dohyeon, Connect is no longer just a gameits now his reality. Join him as he embarks on a thrilling quest to reshape his fate!

title: I Picked a Hammer to Save the World
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Studio M
synopsis:
If the name Tiny brings to mind a diminutive rogue befitting the name, think again: Tiny is a headstrong, muscle-bound warrior who would rather smash his way through obstacles with his trusty warhammer than use his brain. 

When Tiny and the legendary Ten Knights of Asran are defeated by the Demon Beastlord Gluttony, he is given a second chance at life as he is magically sent back to the past. 

Relying on his knowledge of the future, the young Tiny must right the wrongs of the past and prepare for the upcoming battle!

title: There Are No Bad Heroes in This World
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yuryeongdubu
synopsis:
Choi Hyun-seok, who was once the mightiest man, begins a new life as a hero in another world after his death. 

"A hero who monopolizes wealth, fame, and beautiful women!" 

Dreaming of a glorious future, he arrives in the other world, only to encounter a monstrous beast with a head one size larger than his own. 

The monster, a high-ranking officer of the Demon Kings army, asked: "Hero? Are you the so-called hero?" 

"Uh I guess Im the hero?"

And so, hell began.

title: The Gourmet Gamer
genre: Monsters, Action, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Cooking, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Elgar
synopsis:
When he lost his ability to taste and smell, Lee Rims life as a chef ended. Just as hes sinking deeper and deeper into depression, Rim discovers [Real], an incredibly immersive VR game that simulates all five senses. There, hes able to regain his senses of taste and smell. Not only that, but he can cook, too! Although he does need to hunt his own monster ingredients down Now, Rim is here to cook up delicious food, hunt some dangerous monsters, and maybe even build a whole new legacy along the way. Welcome to Lee Rims new life as Rice, the gourmet gamer!

---

- [Original Webtoon <OneStory>](https://onestory.co.kr/detail/H040842508)

- [Original Webtoon <Bomtoon>](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/eatNgo)

- [Original Webtoon <Comico>](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1198)

- [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_000048455)

- [Original Webtoon <Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/have_a_meal)

- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6193068)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/86172)

title: Saenai Riman to Yankee Joshi Kousei
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Nao Tamaki
synopsis: Yamada Hiroyuki is 26 years old, has a stable job, is an otaku, but is overwhelmed by the ideas and thoughts of his family, i.e. marriage and criticism over his childish hobbies. He decides to leave the house and go to live in an apartment, alone and happy, but the perfect image he had in mind when he moved in was destroyed when he learned that his neighbor is a yankee schoolgirl. However he soon discovers her real personalty is quite awkward and very tender. Will the story of these two advance for the better?

title: My Girlfriend'S Child
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mamoru Aoi
synopsis:
I think I might be pregnant.

Sachi, a high school girl, has a childhood sweetheart, Takara.
One day, feeling something wrong with her health, she buys a pregnancy test.
Using the test at a diner in a town far from home, she sees two lines that indicate a "positive" result
___
**Won the 47th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for Shoujo in 2023.**

title: Kumamiko
genre: Animals, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Takashi Ikeda
synopsis: In the deep regions of the Touhouku area, the comedic story of the miko of bears, 14-year-old Machi, and her childhood friend, the talking bear Natsu, takes place as Machi struggles to qualify for city-life with Natsu's assistance.

title: Tonari Wa Nani O Kuu Hito Zo - Horoyoi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Yuki Fujitsuka
synopsis: Suzuna Inaba who graduated from the university and is going to live together with Seto. A manga about tsumami (snacks for drinking) with a bit adult theme?

title: The Delivery Man From Martial World
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Studio Jilpung
synopsis: Stranded in a new world, Smiley Kang covertly lives the life of a delivery man. Until now, humanity has fended off demonic beasts and their portal gates. There are the Awakened, citizens imbued with supernatural abilities, and there are those more scheming, fighting to monopolize and claim demonic resources. But as the number of gates starts to rise, the world is at risk once again. Can humanity survive another onslaught of demonic beasts? The answer lies with the mysterious delivery man

title: Ishuzoku Tsuihou Concafe
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls
author: Masahito Sasaki
synopsis: Yoshio Yoshida, a company employee who enjoys going to concept cafes, hears a rumor from a familiar con café girl about a "con café with a strange atmosphere" that has opened in his neighborhood. Yoshida, intrigued, visits, and finds three unmotivated and peculiar con café girls in a store with a strange concept. They are actually real demons, dwarves and elfs.

title: Snake Immortal: the Tale of a Snake'S Cultivation to Immortality
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Sikong Banxia
synopsis:
In a village, an old snake inadvertently swallowed a cultivator's human-shaped pill, gaining intelligence and setting off on the path of cultivation. With only a brief decade to live, the snake does not fear the passing of time but makes the most of every moment.

This is the tale of an old snake's journey to immortality.

title: From the Dust
genre: Time Travel, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Takashi Sano
synopsis: Hajime leads an unremarkable life as an undertaker, but he likes his job and has no reason to complain. Nor can he complain of being always called "onii-san" by one of the top star actresses in the country, Kid? Kotone, a childhood friend. Their relationship has always had a touch of awkwardness due to the parents of both having died violent deaths, but nothing could have prepared Hajime - or Japan - to the deed Kotone decides to perpetrate seemingly out of the blue.

title: Black Lagoon: Eda Initial Stage
genre: Thriller, Action, Crime, Military, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Police
author: Hajime Yamamura
synopsis: The manga centers on Eda, the original manga's undercover CIA agent based in Roanapur's church, during her early days as a rookie in the CIA.

title: My Ruined Academy
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: BIN
synopsis:
Amon Drake arrives in the capital with dreams of success. On his first day as a teacher at the prestigious Amonis Academy, he is met with shocking news:

"Haven't you heard? This academy is on the brink of bankruptcy."

On top of that, the only people left at the academy are a gambling-addicted principal and drunken teachers. Amon thought,

"If the academy goes bankrupt, doesn't that mean my contract would become void too?"

They say escape favors the intelligent. If you dont want to waste your life away, bring the academy to ruin.

The story of a wise man's escape from the academy begins now!

title: Anan-San Wa Deatte 3-Byou De Gattai Shitai!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers
author: Yuu Matsubayashi
synopsis: Anan, an office worker who's only experience with men comes watching porn, tries to win over her boss and love interest, Dept. Chief Kitazono, but fails at every turn. In fact, Kitazono is also a virgin with zero romantic experience...

title: Daija Ni Totsuida Musume
genre: Historical, Animals, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, Supernatural
author: Kumo Fushiashi
synopsis: Miyo, a human girl dedicated as an offering to the snake, the lord of the mountain. Miyo was frightened in front of a large snake that had a big body and swallowed a fox, but her feelings gradually changed...

title: Mikazuki No Carte
genre: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Medical
author: Nana Nanasaka
synopsis: Touka Myoujouboshi is a girl who has been hospitalized her entire life due to a rare allergy to sunlight, and thus has not been able to experience love. To prevent Touka from ending it all, Doctor Yuki Tsukisu provides her with the ultimate prescription by acting as her girlfriend.

title: Namae No Nai Kaibutsu - Kumo to Shoujo to Ryoki Satsujin
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Survival, Gore, Drama, Horror, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Azusa Banjou
synopsis:
Midnight. Awakened by the echoing sound in my room, I was met with a frightening pair of "legs." Since then, as if wishing to merely make its presence known, it remained in my room without letting itself be seen. In the same way it was spreading its encircling net, little by little it encroached on my life until at last it appeared before me. Its true form was that of an exceedingly beautiful "nameless monster." Desperate resistance was futile as the monster dropped its hand towards me. I could not escape or resist. Hiding it from my skeptical lover and friends, thus opened the curtain to our strange life together. Quietly, the senses I had as a human were dying as my normal life continued to collapse. The moment I knew what was awaiting me, I was presented with an important decision.  
  
At the same time the monster first appeared before me, the public was disturbed by a string of bizarre murders. It was then that I began to wonder whether they and my beautiful yet eerie roommate were connected.

title: The Creatures That We Are
genre: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Aliens, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: raku
synopsis: Gao Yang, an orphan, crosses over to a "parallel world" at the age of six and starts living in a warm family of five. At the age of eighteen, Gao Yang accidentally discovers the true nature of the world: it's not a parallel world at all but a mysterious realm, and the family and friends around him are all terrifying "beasts"!

title: Christmas No Manga
genre: Oneshot, Comedy, Web Comic
author: Mujirushi Shimazaki
synopsis: A Twitter oneshot for Christmas 2021.

title: Oni
genre: Oneshot, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Gou Nagai
synopsis: Not found

title: Watashitachi No Shiawase Na Jikan
genre: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music, Tragedy
author: Sumomo Yumeka
synopsis:
I have something I don't want to lose. So much so that these terrible feelings have grown. A pianist who attempted suicide 3 times, Juri, is taken to help her aunt at a prison where murderers who killed indiscriminately are sentenced to death. There, she meets a man named Yuu who took the lives of 3 people. A mother's antagonisma brother's death Together they embrace the violent rebellion in their hearts caused by the large, deep scars they carry. However, before long, they both embrace an earnest hope in their hearts. "I want to live"  
  
An adaptation of a novel by South Korea's most popular female novelist, Gong Ji-Young.

title: Denkigai No Honya-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Asato Mizu
synopsis: Umio is a shy kid who just started his part time job at a manga store smack dab in the middle of the city. But his lifestyle isn't as glamorous as the neon lights that illuminate the city. Umio's closest friends are his co-workers who are all unique characters, to say the least, and although they're nice people, they have their quirks. They are a tight knit group of friends, have nicknames for each other and spend their weekends inside, sheltered from the extravagant scene happening on the outside.

title: "Hitokiri" Shoujo Koushaku Reijou No Goei Ni Naru
genre: Historical, Action, Samurai, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Togoro Sasa
synopsis: Shurine, a girl raised for the sole purpose of becoming a bodyguard, is framed by the state and branded a "hitokiri". Following a life on the run, she meets Lutecia, a duke's daughter, aboard a magical train. With Lutecia's life in danger, Shurine offers a solution: "If you need a bodyguard, why not hire me right now?"

title: Call Me Master
genre: Reincarnation, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Shiba Kedama
synopsis:
If you cannot remember, listen to your body.
If anyone discovers that slave master Ananse has lost her memory, she will be killed. So to save herself, she ropes in Solteo, a slave who hates her beyond compare. Her proposal? "Help me uphold my old image, and you'll be freed." His reply? "I'll make you regret ever requesting that, my master."

title: Dokuzu
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Adaptation
author: Taro Bonten
synopsis:
One day, college student Ryu comes across his classmate Tsuge, who is about to jump off a pedestrian bridge. He stalls her suicide, and the two begin to interact, but Tsuge's smartphone contains countless photos of Ryu...
A story of immature and distorted love.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Note: A comic adaptation of a popular Vocaloid song that has become a hot topic on SNS.

title: Don'T Mess with Missy!
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: ICiyuan Dongman
synopsis:
Reborn in pursuit of revenge, I am sure I can easily achieve my goal, as I happen to be as rich as Bill Gates, as beautiful as Audrey Hepburn, and as deadly as deadpool. However, none of these above works when it comes to dealing with a sweating and panting CEO, who is poisoned, who is in need of "immediate relief."  
  
I'd love to help, but don't pull an ice-cool face when you're kissing me, sir!

title: Deisui Kanojo
genre: Romance, Comedy, Adaptation
author: Ponkotsu Works
synopsis: On Christmas Eve, Seto Hozumi is forced by his older sister to take care of Izumi Nanse, a beautiful girl any man would love to be with. However, she stands out not only for her beauty, but also for being carefree, useless and someone who is very fond of alcohol. Now our protagonist will have to deal with unexpected visits from this beauty who does nothing but drink ??? ??? ???? ????????

title: Tomodachi O Tsukurou.
genre: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life
author: Keito Shouma
synopsis: Misuzu can't seem to make friends. Is it because of her personality? Or is it because of her friend, Shoutaro?

title: My Classmate, Maejima, Is Really Cute
genre: Oneshot, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Aoi Tachi
synopsis: Maejima is really cute.

title: Terrifying Demon Lord
genre: Oneshot, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic
author: Hironori Shimizu
synopsis: The Demon Lord shows his dedication to his job.

title: Saki-Biyori - Otona No Maki
genre: Comedy, Sports, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Saya Kiyoshi
synopsis: Not found

title: Raden No Roukaku
genre: Oneshot, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Myuuto Akatsuki
synopsis: Chika, a boy who cannot reveal his hobbies and interests to others, gradually becomes attracted to his friend's older sister, Hanako.

title: Sore Ga Meido No Kanna Desu
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Noise
synopsis:
After entering high school, Rikuto, the future head of the Ayamejou-Kouji family, begins living alone in a penthouse apartment at the top of a luxury tower. However, his new life takes an unexpected turn when Kanna, a maid with a knack for eccentric behavior and conversations, arrives.

With every action and word of Kannas being packed with weirdness, Rikuto cant stop reacting and retorting. Hes torn, does he want her to act normal, or stay just the way she is?

In this comedy about a new life with a maid, Kannas uniquely "offbeat" style becomes an irresistible charm that flips Rikuto's ordinary life on its head!

title: After Ten Years of Chopping Wood, Immortals Begged to Become My Disciples
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Jiang
synopsis: After ten years of chopping firewood (so tired ????), female immortals (one after another ?(???)?) knelt down and begged me to take them as my disciples! _(´?`? ?)_

title: Killed by an Angel
genre: Oneshot, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Eri Takenashi
synopsis: Not found

title: Cyborg 009
genre: Thriller, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Office Workers, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Police, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Shoutarou Ishinomori
synopsis:
The World at the Brink of Self-Annihilation  
  
(from ebookjapan):

Joe, a young boy, was kidnapped by mysterious men and turned into a cyborg through surgery at a secret base. He was called 009 (zero zero nine). At the base, there are fellow cyborgs with amazing abilities from 001 to 008. 

They were all created as prototypes for a revolutionary new product of the "Black Ghosts," merchants of death! From the war-mongering gang, the nine cyborgs and their developer, Dr. Gilmore, escape to X Island, but...? 

A milestone in the history of Japanese SF manga begins!

---
- **Won the 7th Kodansha Children's Manga Award in 1966, which it shared with Ishinomori's other work, Mutant Sabu**

title: Drugstore in Another World: the Slow Life of a Cheat Pharmacist
genre: Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Medical, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kennoji
synopsis: One day, a corporate slave, Reiji, suddenly got transported to another world. He made the best of his skills to make better potions which earned him lots of money and with that money, made a drugstore! An Elf who has trouble aiming with his bow? Give him some eye-drops! A Dragon who always let breathes out fire unintentionally?

title: Konbini Yakin No Akuma-Chan
genre: Demons, Comedy, 4-Koma, Supernatural
author: Najimi
synopsis:
"Working the night shift at a convenience store sure is a pain...!!"

The night shift at a convenience store is full of weirdos, both the employees and the customers!?

The arrogant but energetic demon "Aruru" will do her best in a convenience store in Minami, Osaka!

title: Inukai-San Wa Kakure Dekiai Joushi
genre: Romance, Drama
author: Joe Itosugi
synopsis:
Nagisa, a web editor, has a crush on Inukai, her boss. She is often compared to her sister, who is a famous model, and the quiet and kind Inukai is the only one who looks out for her.

One day, Nagisa receives a 'Magic Charm of Love' at a drinking party, and she accidentally presses its button on her way back home in a taxi with Inukai. To her surprise, she hears a song that says "You've been called to fall for the person in front of you" and the very next moment, Inukai kisses her.

Nagisa, who has been keeping a lid on her feelings, is unable to stop them from overflowing at the slightest opportunity. 

The handsome editor-in-chief, and the woman with a courageous crush - it's a sweet love story of two people who are in love with one another.

title: 7Th Garden
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Mitsu Izumi
synopsis:
As a gardener served in a rural manor, Avin wished nothing more than peaceful days along with his lord's daughter, Marie. One day, he accidentally woke up a demon sleeping in a nearby mountain. What she wished was to have him as a servant before felling the heaven and turn this world into her garden. Avin of course declined the offer. However, not long after that, the town Avin staying was suddenly raided by Knights Templar who supposed to protect the country. Avin was then presented with choices: Will he perish along with the garden and his dear ones, or become demon's servant and have this world perish instead

---

Releases of this series stopped with volume #8 chapter #32 on May 2017.

title: Gosick
genre: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Kazuki Sakuraba
synopsis: Set in a fictional European country in 1924, a Japanese exchange student meets a mysterious, brilliant girl who only leaves the library to sleep. Her brother, a detective, relies on her mind to solve difficult mysteries, several of which draw her away from the library. With a drop of sweet romance, you will immediately become addicted to Gosick!!!

title: Yoru No Namae O Yonde
genre: Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Tama Mitsuboshi
synopsis: Deep in the forest, a curious pair resides: a young girl Mira, whose affliction leads her to call forth darkness whenever she's in distress, and her physician Rei, determined to seek a cure. Each day, she works to remember the light and bring back the person she used to be. But a sudden visit from Rei's friend, who harbors an interest in Mira's illness, may be the end of their peaceful days

title: Takutore!
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kumaru Sanka
synopsis:
Taku, a high school student, is depressed after being classified as on the verge of obesity. At an event he attended to heal his heartbreak, his favorite cosplayer, Shiramine Lil, asked him to do something for her. At Lil's request, he starts training at home!?
___
[Alt Official Raw (G's Channel)](https://gs-ch.com/articles/contents/arvDmbrh7s5vuLyhzc7MEpYJ)

title: Kimi Ni Todoke: From Me to You
genre: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Karuho Shiina
synopsis:
Sawako Kuronuma is the perfect heroine for a horror movie. With her jet-black hair, sinister smile and silent demeanor, she's often mistaken for the haunting movie character Sadako. But behind her scary facade is a very misunderstood teenager. Too shy to fit in, all she wants to do is make some friends. But when a popular boy in class befriends her, she's sure to make more than just thatshe's about to make some enemies too!  
  
---
- **Won the 32nd Kodansha Manga Award for Shojo in 2008**

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Kimi ni Todoke: From Me To You** (2014)

title: Jinrui Kyuusai Game
genre: Action, Psychological, Adventure, Isekai, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Touka Tsunamune
synopsis: One day, Doppo, the high school protagonist, suddenly heard a voice from his phone saying "The game has begun" and that the "chosen challengers" have been taken to another world. If they complete their mission, they can return to their original world. However, this new world is filled with terrifying monsters... Can they survive and return to their original world?!

title: Another World Dump Truck
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Comma
synopsis: Yul, the manager of the interdimensional dump truck office, accidentally kills an innocent man named Kwon Yoo-jun. In order to make amends, Yul enters a romance fantasy novel where Yoo-jun is the villainess and tries to send her back to her original world. However, due to various complications, Yul becomes trapped in the novel. With the office staff scattered and no knowledge of the novel's plot, Yul desperately searches for a way out. But, Yoo-jun, who is now pretending to be a noble lady in the new world, causes Yul a headache.

title: Otaku Ni Otoku Na Gal Gurashi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Haruto Hino
synopsis: Yutaka Kongouji is the son of a wealthy family, but also an introvert and an otaku. He lives only to spend all his allowance supporting his favorite idol. But when his parents' business fails, he has to move into a run-down apartment on his own. There he ran into Rino Hyuga, a popular gal in his class...

title: Nightmare Busters
genre: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Adventure, Drama, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Yuriko Akase
synopsis:
The stage of "Nightmare Busters" is Tokyo in 2034. In the streets, a strange disease of unknown cause, which made me wake up while sleeping, was rampant. One day, Ichijo, a salaryman who spends his days working hard, has a mysterious dream. In a dream, Ichijo meets a coma patient  This is the latest work presented by Akase of "Southern and Comet Girl" as a full analog drawing and all-color work. 

---
