title: Clamp Gakuen Tanteidan
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Mystery
author: CLAMP
synopsis: CLAMP School Detectives focuses on the exploits of Akira, Nokoru, and Suoh - 3 pre-teen sleuths - and their quest to make the CLAMP world safe for the girls in their class

title: Man of Many Faces
genre: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy
author: CLAMP
synopsis:
Akira Ijyuin lives a double life. By day, he's a top student at the elite CLAMP School, but by night he's the infamous thief 20 Faces. A master of disguise and stealth, the masked thief steals the most unusual objects at the whim of a pair of devious crime-lordshis two mothers! One starlit night, his routine is changed forever when he meets the lovely young Utako while hiding from the police. This time, Akira finds something was stolen from himhis heart.

- [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Man_of_Many_Faces)

title: Saikyou No Kurokishi?, Sentou Maid? Ni Tenshoku Shimashita
genre: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Romance, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Isshin Momokado
synopsis:
Albright, who was famous as "the strongest Black Knight", was reincarnated as a girl, Maria, whose ribbon suited her well for same reason. Maria, 16 years old, is currently a maid in the Marquess of Urband family in attendance to the Daughter of the Marquees, Relena. After Relena became engaged to the 4th Prince, the area around Maria had gotten busier...
___
**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0141ec/) (Raw)

title: Hazure Zokusei "Hikari Mahou" Ga Kakusei Shite Laser Ga Demashita
genre: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Shepaco Usatani
synopsis:
The day of the "Attribute" assessment when you turn 10.
A boy raised in an orphanage, dreaming of becoming an adventurerLight was granted the rare attribute of Light, which appears once in every 1,000 people.

However, while it was rare, the Light attribute was called a "failure attribute."
...Because the light magic learned from the Light attribute had absolutely no offensive power!

??Eventually, Light, who had become the adventurer he had always dreamed of, was mocked as the "specialist in parasitism" and the "walking torch," but he continued to train his Light magic to the extreme.

Then, when he reached the near-max level of [Light] attribute at Level 9??.
After his training, with an immense amount of magical power, his childhood friend Saya appeared and requested to accompany him to an AAA difficulty dungeon...

Little did he know, this would turn into the worst expedition of his life...

title: Mobile Suit Crossbone Gundam X-11
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Yuuichi Hasegawa
synopsis: The story is set in U.C. 0170, during the events of Mobile Suit Crossbone Gundam: Dust. The story follows Curtis Rothko, and is once again set in the Jupiter Sphere.

title: Isekai Wo Denma Dake De Ikinuku!!
genre: Reincarnation, Demons, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls
author: Michi Saitou
synopsis:
Kenji is just an ordinary college student. One day he was ordered by his Senpai, and was asked to retrieve Senpai's personal belongings, which happened to be a bag of sex toys. On the way he met Mana-chan (a girl he liked), who after finding out what he was carrying a bunch of sex toys, and bounced out.  
  
Wanting to explain the misunderstanding, Kenji chased after her, but gets plowed by JAV Truck-Senpai after he stops to bend down and pick up the dildo he dropped. Being the standard Isekai trash we all love to hate, once he died he wakes up on another world in a strange forest with only the clothes on his back, the vibrator wand in his hand, and all virginities intact.   
  
Join Kenji on his journey as the Hero of this new world, one female orgasm at a time.

title: Curry Naru Shokutaku
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Kazuki Funatsu
synopsis: Makito Koenji is a curry chef with a mysterious past who helps Yui Sonezaki keep her father's curry restaurant, Ganesha, open through a lack of customers, a hostile takeover attempt by a huge company, and many other challenges. Get addicted to Curry.

title: A Naughty and Carnivorous Childhood Friend
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Fumita Yanagida
synopsis: This goes from a full Ara Ara to Yamete.

title: Yuujin Ni 500 Yen Kashitara Shakkin No Kata Ni Imouto Wo Yokoshitekita No Dakeredo, Ore Wa Ittai Dou Sureba Iin Darou
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Kogane Kaneko
synopsis:
"Until my brother returns the 500 yen, I will gladly become senpai's property as collateral!"

One summer day, Akari Miyamae, his friend's younger sister, came to the apartment of Motomu Shiragi, a university student. What is the secret behind this debt, and what is Akari's purpose...?

An overly-sweet cohabitation comedy that starts with one coin!

title: The Thirty-Ish Office Worker Haman-Sama
genre: Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life
author: Masakazu Iwasaki
synopsis: A comedy manga about Haman Karn as a modern corporate section chief at an apparel company named Neo Zeon dealing with her insecurities being a 30 year old office lady.

title: Minori & 100 Ladies
genre: Comedy, Girls' Love, Harem, 4-Koma, School Life
author: Kamiya Fujisawa
synopsis:
Sakura Minori is just a very average girl.  
Yet despite being the only commoner in her school, could it be that she's actually become popular among the young ladies she so admired!?  
A girls-only lovey-dovey comedy?

title: My Perfect Enemy Is Finally Broke
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Qi Qi
synopsis:
When he woke up, Ji Ran, the son of a rich second generation, found himself lying beside his arch-nemesis from his school days. Qin Man! 

Despite reluctantly agreeing to a sponsorship agreement with the green tea black belly enemy, Ji Ran finds his lonely and stubborn heart gradually melting by the occasional tenderness displayed by Qin Man. 

[Scheming and gentle green tea x Sharp tongue but soft-hearted and charming person]

Behing the facade of a sponsorship agreement lies a decade-long unrequited love.

title: Magical Trans!
genre: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yutaka Kashii
synopsis:
Minami-kun spots a poster recruiting new members for the Magical Girl Club. Thinking "Cosplay cuties woohoo!" he decides to join What the hell!? It's not cosplay, we actually become magical girls??  
  
A slice of life love-comedy revolving around magical girls and slippery slopes.

title: Lovely Allergen
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Nini Cai
synopsis: Yue Zhishi and Song Yu are not blood related brothers, Yue Zhishi, who was fostered by the Song family since childhood, loves to cling to his older brother, Song Yu, who is three years older than him. However, Song Yu always deliberately maintains a distance. Song Yu, the brother who pretends to be indifferent, and Yue Zhishi, the brother who is a clingy little puppy. But what others don't know is that he understands his own heart, he choose to exercise self-control and maintain a distance because Yue Zhishi is Song-Yus only allergen.

title: Dungeon Meshi
genre: Award Winning, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Cooking, Supernatural
author: Ryouko Kui
synopsis:
After his sister is devoured by a dragon and losing all their supplies in a failed dungeon raid, Laios and his party are determined to save his sister before she gets digested. Completely broke and having to resort to eating monsters as food, they meet a dwarf who will introduce them to the world of Dungeon Meshi - delicious cuisine made from ingredients such as the flesh of giant bats, walking mushrooms, or even screaming mandrakes.  
  
---
- **Ranked 1st in the 2016 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! for Male Readers (Shonen/Seinen)**

title: Ookami Shujin to Usagi Maid-Chan
genre: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy
author: Meko Ineno
synopsis: Not found

title: Watashi No Oshi Wa Akuyaku Reijou. Maid'S Kitchen
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: tsuke
synopsis: An *I'm in Love with the Villainess* official spin-off! A cooking comedy in which two maids, Rei and Rene, are busy making sweets for the villainess Claire!

title: Hibiki'S Magic
genre: Adventure, Fantasy
author: Jun Maeda
synopsis: Some of our most cherished manga characters are blessed with magical powersothers have an extraordinary combination superhuman strength and cunning intellect. But Hibiki? Her only real skill seems to be making a pot of delicious tea Or is it?!

title: I Awoke as a God After Auto Battling for a Million Years
genre: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Yingmu Wenhua
synopsis: An otherworldly invasion begins as countless monsters pour through rifts, engulfing human cities and plunging humanity into a doomsday crisis! From this point, humanity enters an era of universal job transfers, with nations vying to train powerful professionals and compete for top rankings in the otherworldly conquest! When the number one ruler of the Dragon Kingdom, who has slumbered for millions of years, awakens with millions of years' worth of idle resources, the bosses of the otherworld tremble. Top-tier professionals from countries around the globe kneel in awe...

title: The Peerless Soldier
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Harem
author: Jiman Wenhua
synopsis:
"The Peerless Soldiers" is a work based on the issue of a retiring soldiers to solve the problem of love and marriage. The communication soldier Jiang Cheng is forced to retired from the army under family pressure to marry someone. Jiang Feng decides to enter Tian Ai College as a physical education teacher and persue the four marriage targets designated by the family, along with some mishaps. The storyline is based on the retired soldiers Jiang Cheng and his quest to marry within 3 years, but as a Comando of the Elite Communication Officer Branch, things aren't as easy as normal daily life.  
What will this sudden talented Comando do in daily ordinary love in search of marriage?

title: Ousama Game
genre: Oneshot, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic
author: Nobuaki Kanazawa
synopsis: Not found

title: Oshi No Bishoujo Ni Kokuhaku Sareru Hanashi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life
author: Choco Suisei
synopsis: A yuri romcom manga where an otaku is confessed to by the pretty girl she declares as her oshi and they start dating.

title: Second Home
genre: Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: bieber
synopsis:
"My home cannot be like this."  
  
The story of a quiet male student and his next-door neighbor who is married.

title: Alkaloid No Hanayome
genre: Romance, Drama, Fantasy
author: Nijimi Oikawa
synopsis: Romelia, a lonely girl, and Kutli, a young high-ranking soldier, are solemnly married in the presence of God. What they share, however, is not "conjugal love," but the "unbearable fate" they have mutually borne.

title: Fall
genre: Long Strip, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: gonza
synopsis:
Seung Ji, who has been through a lot in an illegal organization rife is stabbed in the back by the boss... and joins a new smuggling organization as the youngest in order to hide.

Yeong Won, who grew up alone, meets her aunt by chance and who runs an illegal organization . She comes down from Seoul to Busan to manage a smuggling office full of thugs.

Seung Ji assists Yeong Won, who seems naive and awkward, and only looks for an opportunity to make a killing and run away. Seung Ji does not trust anyone and believes that in order to avoid being deceived, you have to deceive first. Yeong Won swears that she will never betray someone she loves. These two women, who have never been loved, gradually become defenseless against each other.

title: Admission Is a Waste of Time
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Toy Car
synopsis:
How about a university where you attend classes at the Tower of Babel? 

Ban Yoo-won possesses the extraordinary ability not only to interpret unknown languages but also to see and absorb "concepts" from the things he observes. 

Since childhood, Yoo-wons grandfather has told him: "Our family descends from the ancestor who led people to build the Tower of Babel with the power to make everyone communicate. With that same inherited power, you will be able to reclaim the lost Tower of Babel." 

At first, Yoo-won thought it was just a far-fetched story. But while waiting for his university acceptance results, he is suddenly summoned to an academy from an unknown dimension. There, he witnesses the legendary Tower of Babel, which he had only heard about in stories. 

Driven by a somewhat materialistic desire to reclaim his familys lost building and become its owner, along with a sincere wish to fulfill a long-standing family dream, Yoo-won enters the academy. 

Finally, he begins his climb up the Tower of Babel  a dungeon filled with dangers and monsters, where the power of constellations and, at its peak, the power of the gods, awaits him!

title: First Kiss
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic
author: Eiki Eiki
synopsis: Not found

title: Horror Gourmet
genre: Oneshot, Monsters, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Crime, Doujinshi, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Supernatural, Mystery
author: inui
synopsis:
A doujinshi anthology that simulates the feel of 90s shoujo horror magazines. Targeted at women and girls and thus is listed as a shoujo manga. 

Note: Sawhore Uploads scanlated some chapters in their site. Volume 1 is complete while 2 only has a few chapters.
Note 2: DO NOT make a mangaupdates page for this as it is listed as a magazine.

title: Renai Saido
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Boys' Love, School Life
author: Amido Sanshoku
synopsis:
Ayumu attends a high school festival at the school of his former classmate and first love, Tsubame, but Tsubame's friend, Ryuu, sees through his unfulfilled feelings for his first love, and he is harshly criticized by him. Hurt, Ayumu tries to find a new love, but the person he meets almost kidnaps him. Ayumu is saved by Ryuu, who is unexpectedly ......?

A spin-off series of "[Hatsukoi Note](https://mangadex.org/title/6a36c2cb-d2f5-4b2b-9f72-d901a6884b99/hatsukoi-nooto)"!

title: See You Tomorrow at the Food Court.
genre: Comedy, Philosophical, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Shinichirou Nariie
synopsis: Yamamoto and Wada are two childhood friends attending different high schools who convene every afternoon at the food court at their local mall to engage in blissfully mundane conversations.

title: Soushi Souai
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Tsukasa Yasuhara
synopsis:
In a world where opposites attract, a chance encounter sparks a connection between a serious black-haired girl and a charismatic blond delinquent, painting a cute tale of young love and friendships. As the series unfolds, their seemingly carefree lives take unexpected turns, delving into the shadows that haunt their lives. 

An artful blend of laughter and heartfelt moments, this manga tells about the complexities of youth, friendship, and your past catching up to you.

title: Romance Wa Banken to
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama
author: Ai Mitsuma
synopsis:
"His worst scandal...is me"
Lay, a former soldier, is the bodyguard of Alex, who is one of the most popular actors praised for his chic style. However, Lay soon finds out that his master, often called as the "perfect prince", is nothing more than a bratty troublemaker.
Lay must save and protect Alex's public image, but that mission includes one thing: to take care of Alex's sexual life as his 'stress reliever'...

The most clingy top-secret love between a younger, super arrogant celebrity and his cool, tanned-skin pretty bodyguard begins!

title: Aka Ihon to Kuro Ihon
genre: Ghosts, Anthology, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Michiru Noroi
synopsis:
The collection of ghost stories gathered by Masaya Hokazono, author of "Kichikujima," is the "Ihon" series.

The much-anticipated manga adaptations of special works, previously excluded from past comicizations due to their ominous nature, are brought to life by the extraordinary talents of horror masters Noroi Michiru and Taimu, handpicked by Masaya Hokazono.

A dream collaboration! Bold reinterpretations to look out for!

- My House -  Taimu
- Hell Fujoshi - Noroi Michiru
- The Flapping Horror - Noroi Michiru

title: Mermaid (?)
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Boys' Love, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kozumi Shinozawa
synopsis: Not found

title: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.
genre: Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: ZUN
synopsis:
The second part in the official long-running series about the daily mischief and wacky buffoonery of Gensokyo's Three Fairies of Light.  
  
After Eastern and Little Nature Deity ended abruptly because Nemu Matsukura had to leave the project due to health reasons, artist Hirasaka Makoto took over as permanent artist for the series.  
  
2005: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Eastern and Little Nature Deity.  
2006: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.  
2009: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Oriental Sacred Place.  
2016: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Visionary Fairies in Shrine.

title: Ghost Marriage
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural
author: Seira
synopsis: Not found

title: Mabataki Yori Hayaku!!
genre: Sports, Martial Arts
author: Kazuki Funatsu
synopsis: The story centers on Himari Kohanai, a 15-year-old student who hates being clumsy. She wants to make her page in high school, but it's a mess, though, and yet Himari will do anything to get close to the person she admires. Even if it's getting into a totally unknown world A story where little by little our main character will grow to reach her goal.

title: Tensei Renkin Shoujo No Slow Life
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Satochou
synopsis:
Melia, a village girl who is on her third life after two overworked lives. She is determined to live a slower life this time, but her enthusiasm is tempered by an alchemy that she did not know was already out of date, however, said alchemy led to her suddenly being taken away...!

The start of an otherworldly workaholic fantasy!

title: Sayonara Diamond
genre: Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Miyako Hiruzuka
synopsis: Three women around their thirties who spent their youth in the softball club at an all-girls school gather under one roof! And what they started is a detective agency!

title: My Clueless First Friend
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Taku Kawamura
synopsis: Akane Nishimura is a shy and gloomy elementary school girl with an unfounded dire reputation in her class due to her appearance. Taiyou Takada is a transfer student in her class who came from a small countryside school, and who is fascinated by the aspects of Nishimura that her classmates use to pick on her, finding her "darkness" cool beyond compare. Through the unbridled and fundamental joy Takada finds in being her friend, Nishimura starts realizing that being herself is not as bad as she thinks.

title: Bakushin Ojou-Sama Dou!
genre: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Shigatsu Shizuki
synopsis: Sakuraba Sakurako is at the entrance ceremony of Neo Mogitori Academy, a school for training young ladies. She tries to enter the school with a dog as her companion, but the teacher stops her and she ends up fighting the dog. Sakurako narrowly wins the battle and meets the boys and girls who will work hard together to become the ultimate ojou-sama.

title: Dead Mount Death Play
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Comedy, Crime, Zombies, Mafia, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Ryougo Narita
synopsis:
A Necromancer called The Corpse God is fighting against the Church, that is trying to subjugate him. Using his last ounce of power against the Calamity Crusher, he gets defeated, but his reincarnation magic activates.  
 Suddenly, he got transported in a world of modern society and in a body of kid Polka Shinoyama. What is gonna happen to him in this world? What will he do?

title: Ninja Tensei Shinobi Kill
genre: Action, Ninja, Comedy, Harem, School Life
author: Youichi Nishio
synopsis: Chigachi Fuuta an ordinary high school student who really admires ninjas is gifted with an extraordinary legacy, namely the soul of Hattori Hanzo, a legendary ninja. But because of that legacy, Chigachi Fuuta is targeted by various shinobi and ninja who still survive in the modern era. Can Chigachi Fuuta overcome these obstacles?

title: Gokiburi No Ie
genre: Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Anthology, Gore, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural
author: Kanako Inuki
synopsis:
3 Stories (part 1 and 3 of chapter 1 and chapter 3) here were adapted into a movie called Bourei no Sumu Ie ~Kanako Inuki Kyoufu WORLD~  (??????????????world?)

1. Kurayami no Onnatachi (*??????* Women of the Darkness) 
3 stories about women living normal lives in their apartments, but eventually everything starts going wrong.

2. Gokiburi no Ie (*??????* The House of Cockroaches)
A rich woman that has a terrible fear of cockroaches faces a bizarre cockroach infestation...

3. Kao no nai Onna (*?????* Faceless Woman)
A woman's neighbor starts trying to take her identity and life...

4. Jukai Kitan (*????* Strange Tale of the Sea of Trees)
A man enters the famous Aokigahara forest, known for its suicides, and he finds the corpse of a beautiful woman, and decides to take photos of it...

5. Rei to Asobu na Kodomotachi!! (*????? ????!!* Children, Don't Play with Ghosts!!
Kanako Inuki tells her own scary stories from childhood.

6. Akumu no Tobira (*????* Door of Nightmares)
A girl is stuck in twisted fairytale-esque nightmares...

title: Sekai No Hate Wa Shinai
genre: Romance, Drama
author: Mayaka Nakano
synopsis: Fuyuka is a female college student attending an art college in Tokyo, despite her parents' opposition. She feels guilty about leaving her younger brother, who has been supporting her in their strict family home, and running away from home by herself. One day, she is at her wit's end because she can't pay the rent, when her grown-up younger brother, Ameon, appears in front of her...! She is now living together with her brother, whose love is too heavy for her to bear!

title: Koroshiteyaro to Omotta Aitei Ga Dekiai Shitekite Komarimasu
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ryui Shimohashi
synopsis: Mira lived comfortably as a princess of the kingdom of Axia. But one day, Mira is attacked by a neighboring prince, Leon, and dies vowing revenge against him. The next time Mira wakes up, time has rolled back two months before the incident ......? A reincarnated love story full of miscalculations, starting with revenge!

title: Only I Know the World Is Ending and Getting Killed by Rampaging Beasts Only Makes Me Stronger
genre: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Tsubasa
synopsis: Akira Ichijo is your average, run-of-the-mill businessman. One day, on his way home from work, he is suddenly attacked by a Minotaur and killed on the spot. But in the blink of an eye... he wakes up back at the office! When monsters invade into the real world, a cruel reality sets in as the world as we know it plummets into destruction and death. But with the unique skill [Resurrection], Akira can come back to life every time he dies, all the while inheriting the same levels and skills from his last run at life! With unlimited chances to correct his past mistakes, it's up to Akira to utilize the skill he's given and survive this terrifying world with his childhood friend, Nao Nanase.

title: Mizu Mahou Gurai Shika Torie Ga Nai Kedo Gendai Chishiki Ga Areba Juubun Da Yo Ne?
genre: Reincarnation, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Benbe Tawamureya
synopsis:
Frim, a 5-year-old orphan living in the streets of the slums district, was a Japanese person in her past life.

Her everyday life was filled with violence and injustice, and she had no one she could count on for help. What she had is "Magic That Can Produce Water" and "Modern Knowledge", that was it. Even hoping for a roof to sleep under was a luxury under such circumstances.

But the world was lacking in ideas about improving working conditions, and by coming up with new ways to use Water Magic aside from producing drinking water, Frim gradually makes a name for herself!

(Source: Comic-Walker)

title: The Fake Alchemist
genre: Action, Psychological, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Jirou Sugiura
synopsis:
In another world,
there was a person
who made their living
doing alchemy.

Alchemy × Sorcery × Slave × Elf × Reincarnation × God × Cheat × Battle
A work packed with everything fantasy brought to life with overwhelming brushwork!

title: Manshu Ahen Squad
genre: Historical, Action, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Military, Drama, Delinquents, Mystery
author: Tsukasa Monma
synopsis: Circa 1937. A Japanese soldier in Manchuria starts meddling in the opium trade but finds he may have bitten more than he can chew...

title: Omniscient
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: UMI
synopsis:
Deemed intellectually disabled from birth, Huang Ji, a backwoods country kid, somehow achieves complete omniscience. He feels the universes malice, sensing humanitys dire predicament everywhere Humans were unknowingly being controlled by aliens, secretly trafficked by fellow human collaborators worshipping their extraterrestrial overlords, all while the apocalypse looms!

As the one, true all-knowing being, Huang Ji decides to take on the monumental task of saving humanity, vowing to carve a place for mankind within this Cosmic Alliance!

title: Try Begging
genre: Historical, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Crime, Sexual Violence, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Airin
synopsis:
This work contains controversial content such as violence and rape.

 Please be advised. Captain 'Leon Winston' of the National Intelligence Division of the Western Command of the Rippon Kingdom. Unlike his elegant and noble appearance, he was the object of both envy and damnation for both his allies and enemies, known as the "Vampire of Camden" who would torture the rebels cruelly.

"Every time I see you, I just want to thrust my gun in your tight space."

Strangely, the maid of the interrogation room "Sally Briston" became the object of his desires, as strong as the rage he has for the insurgent rebels. She was ordinary and nothing special... Perhaps it was simply the smell of blood on her that excited him.

The interrogation didn't take long.

He realized it as soon as he heard her name come out from the rebel spy's lips. He no longer needed to suppress his violent desires.

"I stopped myself from tormenting her because I thought she was a good girl, but now there's no need for that. Thank you, Sally. No... Grace."

If you want to live, then try begging.

You never know.

I might hear you out.

title: I Can'T Get Enough of You
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Team Bodoboe
synopsis: Outstanding talent. A look that won't be overlooked no matter where you are. A prosperous family. I lived by walking only on well-paved paths. Everything was so perfect to the point that it was boring. Then one day when I turned 30... Taejun Kim impulsively deviates from the path. To meet Han So-eun, the daughter of the driver who took his parents lives. 'With what kind of face did you come to this company?' The shameless face was disgusting. So he decided to stick around and torment her. Like a person who is impatient because he can't eat... I think the director likes..."

title: Park Ha Mansion
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Aguri Kurita
synopsis: Not found

title: The Zenith
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Siksabaeksu
synopsis:
"Without victory, survival is impossible."

In pursuit of becoming the supreme being among all living creatures, the mad martial artist, Ma Jinwol, once turned the martial world into a sea of blood. However, after a climactic battle with the Five Masters of the World, he was sealed away. Millennia have passed and now, he awakens, not on Earth, but on an alien planet. 

Here, at the GSP, a universal combat tournament is held once every 100 years, and he prepares to face the strongest warriors once more.

title: Ulzzang Generation
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Namjaui Iyagi
synopsis: The story of a generation filled with romance and chaos.

title: Climax Necromance
genre: Monsters, Action, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Satoshi Mizukami
synopsis: On a battlefield where human soldiers and skeleton army soldiers engage in fierce battles. Azraila, a necromancer who kicks away the enemies around her, and Wraith, a black knight who follows her like a shadow, are confronted by their longtime nemesis Paraiso, when Ichika, a shaggy-haired woman in a sailor suit, is summoned to there.

title: Houkago No Idol Ni Wa Himitsu Ga Aru
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kashiko Amane
synopsis:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Kanojo No Imouto to Kiss Wo Shita??
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Katou Kakito
synopsis: Hiromichi Satou has been single his whole life, but, he recently got a girlfriend named Saikawa Haruka, and they have been dating for a month. His father remarries, and he gets a new step-sister Saikawa Shigure, the identical twin of Haruka. Sato and Shigure agree to keep their step-sibling relationship a secret from everyone, and Haruka. How will the story unfold?

title: Karigal
genre: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru
author: Rui Kuromitsu
synopsis: Mozuno Nie is a small, timid boy with a weak personality, often targeted by delinquents, or stumbling into open manholesjust a typical "prey type" with a knack for attracting trouble. One day, an obvious extrovert, a dark-skinned gyaru named Kakao, enters his life. With her loose-fitting uniform, a chest that seems ready to burst, and surprisingly well-defined abs, she's the complete opposite of Mozuno. She takes an interest in him, calling him "Prey" and making him the target of her "hunt"... but what could she be after!?

title: Jojo'S Bizarre Adventure Part 3 - Stardust Crusaders
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural
author: Hirohiko Araki
synopsis:
Third story arc of the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure series.

In 1989, Joseph Joestar arrives in Japan to meet his troubled grandson Jotaro Kujo at the request of his daughter Holly. Jotaro has locked himself in a jail cell out of fear that an evil spirit is possessing him and that he may cause harm to others. However, Joseph reveals the truth to Jotaro: this "spirit" is really a "Stand," a physical manifestation of one's fighting spirit. What's more, Joseph and his companion Mohammed Avdol possess Stands of their own and have learned to control them with ease.  
  
Joseph's arrival comes with another piece of news: an old family enemy has returned from the grave, causing the Stands of the Joestar family to awaken. However, when a Stand manifests within Holly, her inability to cope with it leaves her gravely ill, stirring the men into action.  
  
Armed with the power of Stands, a globe-trotting adventure from Japan to Egyptwhere their adversary residesbegins. Meeting an array of nefarious Stand users along the way, as well as new allies, the team leads a crusade to save Holly and put an end to their enemy for good.

title: Jojo'S Bizarre Adventure Part 2 - Battle Tendency
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural
author: Hirohiko Araki
synopsis:
Second story arc of the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure series.    Takes place in the 1930s, and follows the misadventures of Joseph Joestar, the grandson of Jonathan Joestar, as he fights vampires and ancient super beings with some help from a cybernetically-enhanced Nazi and an Italian man he has a lot in common with.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/read/manga/jojo-s-bizarre-adventure-part-2-battle-tendency/all)

title: Koisuru Jibaku-Chan
genre: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Hikari Matsuda
synopsis: A girl who "self-destructs" in front of the boy she likes, don't you find it adorable? This unprecedented amour explosion comedy depicts the various situations of girls who get embarrassed when their feelings of "love" slip out!

title: Bakana Shinigami
genre: Oneshot, Comedy, Supernatural
author: Karu Shirosaki
synopsis:
At the brink of death, a girl seems to have found a loophole in this particularly dumb death god's generosity. Or did she?  
  
Gods do indeed move in mysterious ways.  
  
Oneshot posted on Jump Rookie, a manga website run by Jump that showcases and develops new young mangaka.  
They compete for month awards in various categories and can win money awards.

title: Oniisan No Hikkoshi No Katazuke Ga Susumanai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Slice of Life
author: Akuro Yoshibe
synopsis:
Takaho was pleasantly surprised when it was announced that her older cousin, Fujitsugu, would be moving in with them.   
He was her first crush and she was hoping to deepen her bond with him as a little sister.   
Little did she know that her seemingly handsome and perfect cousin was actually

title: Yugami-Kun Ni Wa Tomodachi Ga Inai
genre: Comedy, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Jun Sakura
synopsis: The story of the comedy manga revolves around Yugami Yuuji and Watanuki Chihiro, who sit next to each other in class. Unfortunately for the transfer student Chihiro, Yuuji is weird extremely weird. Even though he's the ace of the baseball club, he hasn't adapted to the club at all. He also stands apart from the rest of the class, but seems completely satisfied with being alone.

title: Sigrid
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: GLEE
synopsis:
She always lived by the rules. She thought her life had been honourable. She was loyal to the emperor, even at the cost of her life. But the only thing she got in return was the blade of the guillotine.

"Why? Why is it like this?" she kept asking before her death.

However, when she opened her eyes, she had returned to five years before she died.

"Was the way I lived wrong?" she kept thinking.

Sigrid decided to change her way of life. What to eat, what to wear, what to buy, everything. The way she changed led her to be the centre of everything. Although, everything eventually started to go back to the way it was. And so, Sigrid came face-to-face with her old rival and enemy, Veramud.

"It begins by making friends."

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/48526879)

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/content/60907554)

title: Neko Oji: Salaryman Reincarnated as a Kitten!
genre: Reincarnation, Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Kenji Yajima
synopsis:
An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [KADOComi](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_000231_S?episodeType=first)

**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/neko-oji-salaryman-reincarnated-as-a-kitten)

title: Zombieman
genre: Monsters, Zombies, Gore, Horror, Supernatural
author: Hideshi Hino
synopsis: A mysterious figure holds fifty-two black cards that represent humankind's fears. Knives, clocks, mirrors and even tests! And as his stories end Hino gives us even more terror with Zombie Man, Rotten Rain and Horror at the Wax Museum!

title: Watashitachi Wa Moto Joshi Desu
genre: Genderswap, Psychological, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life
author: Sakujirou
synopsis:
Rinko Mino, a first-year high school student, is a female manager of the volleyball club. She fell in love with her senior Yuki in the same club, worked hard at club activities, and she had a normal and enjoyable life. 

When she woke up one morning... She was a boy!? What will happen to the youth of Rinko, a girl who suddenly became the opposite sex!!?

title: I'Ll Raise You Well in This Life, Your Majesty!
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Survival, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Anne
synopsis:
When Ellisa opens her eyes and sees her young son, Leon, staring at her with eyes full of love and concern, she realizes that, by some miracle, shes been given a second chance. In her past life, she thought making Leon emperor was the only way to ensure his safety. But if she had known Leon had never wanted the crown, or that laying a crown soaked with the blood of his enemies and beloved ones at his feet would mean he would take his own life before her eyes, she wouldve found another way. In this life, Ellisa is determined to find a way that will ensure both Leons survival and happiness. This time, things will be different.

---

**Note:** This work was first published in the order Japanese, English, and the Korean version after. Authors of this work are a Korean-Japanese duo, but this work is based on a Korean Web Novel.

**Links:**
* [Official Chinese (Simp) Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc31390)

* [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/raise-you-well-in-this-life-de)
* [Official Japanese Translation](https://sp.comics.mecha.cc/books/147862)

title: The Troubles of an Honor Student
genre: Oneshot, Award Winning, Psychological, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy
author: Yama Wayama
synopsis: Inaba Akira, a second year student at Naruyama High School, is a candidate for the next student council president due to his good manners and excellent grades. He was highly trusted by his teachers, and was loved by his classmates for his bright and friendly personality. However, he also had a serious problem...

title: Okitsune Gal Katabami-San
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Gyaru
author: Kigu Danbou
synopsis: A very ordinary and serious high school student, Kamou-kun. Though his days are filled with diligent study, his concern lies in his childhood friend, Katabami-san, who interferes with his studies every day. And to make matters more complicated, Katabami-san's true identity is... a fox spirit!?---**Alternative Raw:** [Nico Nico Seiga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66393)

title: Sutema!
genre: Animals, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Slice of Life
author: Immei Kamurata
synopsis:
Homura continues to travel back in time to save Madoka, but this time she arrives at the timeline where she is adopted by Madoka!
Kyoko, who was picked up by Sayaka, and Mami, a member of a group that protects stray Puella Magi, join her, and the story of the abandoned Puella Magi begins!

title: Notpia
genre: Romance, Anthology, Boys' Love, Incest, Crime, Sexual Violence, Gore, School Life, Horror, Shota, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Not Osada
synopsis:
Collection of the mangaka's BL works from 1994 to 1996. 3 chapters scanlated.

1  Kept Youth
A boy, infatuated with his school's doctor, follows him home one day... and finds out that the doctor has been keeping a "pet" in his bed. Who is the boy being kept? But more importantly, why does he look so much like the protagonist?

2  D-Saka Detective Agency: D-Saka ch.1

3  Love Bazooka: D-Saka ch.2

4  Precocious Liaison

5  Boxed Youth

6  Dedicated Body
Dr. Shibusawa decides that his young son Keiri should get an early start in the medical field if he's going to inherit his clinic, so he introduces Keiri to the fascinating world of dissection, despite his wife's disapproval. Keiri gains a taste for dissection, Shibusawa suffers his strained marriage, and his wife discovers what's really up with her husband and his constantly snickering assistant in this odd little story.

7  Handsome Youth In Ice

8  Dark Honey, Youth
A boy discovers that a biology teacher with some strange habits has been watching him.


Includes guro and non-guro, regular bl.

title: The Exiled Duke Wanted to Take It Easy on the Frontier and Work the Fields.
genre: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: Yuuko Satou
synopsis: Reincarnated from Earth into a world of magic and tradition, Joshua, the son of a duke, is exiled to a barren frontier after the saintess declares he is not following the oracles prophecy. Hoping to live a quiet and uneventful life, his plans are upended when the people from his former dukedom abandon their lands to follow him, insisting he remains their true lord. Reluctantly, Joshua takes on the task of transforming the wasteland into a thriving home for his followers, vowing to complete the work in three years so he can finally enjoy the peaceful life he longs for.

title: So Shine!!
genre: Romance, Self-Published, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Katsuhiro Ootomo
synopsis: Not found

title: Jojo'S Bizarre Adventure Part 1 - Phantom Blood
genre: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural
author: Hirohiko Araki
synopsis:
First story arc of the Jojo's Bizarre Adventure series.  
  
Jonathan Joestar, a young wealthy son living in Victorian England, has his life destroyed by a recently orphaned Dio Brando, who was taken in by Jonathan's father. Dio, who plots to drive Jonathan to insanity and inherit the Joestar fortune, becomes an unstoppable vampire that Jonathan must fight.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/read/manga/jojo-s-bizarre-adventure-part-1-phantom-blood/all)

title: Karakai Jouzu No Takagi-San
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Souichirou Yamamoto
synopsis:
*If you blush, you lose!*  Living by this principle, the middle schooler Nishikata gets constantly made fun of by his seat neighbour Takagi-san. With his pride shattered to pieces, he vows to turn the tables and get back at her someday.   And so, he attempts to tease her day after day, only to find himself falling victim to Takagi-san's ridicule again sooner than later. Will he be able to make Takagi-san blush from embarrassment even once in the end? English Chapters have been renumbered to their tank numbers, where applicable.*

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

title: Seirei-Tachi No Rakuen to Risou No Isekai Seikatsu
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Tamutamu
synopsis: It's the Golden Week, and Morizono Yuuta can't wait to spend the next 11 days staying home and conquering all of his games and manga. After a trip to the supermarket to stock up on food however, he found himself stranded in a wasteland with no sight of human. Now he's just gonna have to find a way to live in this world aided only by some magic tools and numerous Spirits whom he came into contact with.

title: Seishun Protagonist
genre: Romance, Drama, School Life
author: Emi Goroumaru
synopsis:
"Every person is the protagonist of his or her own life. But how many of us can truly live. How many of us can truly be the hero of our own lives?" Youth Protagonist.

This is a love story about a high school boy who thinks he is incapable of love for one reason or another, and a girl classmate who falls in love with him.

title: Kawaii Joushi Wo Komarasetai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Roku Tachibana
synopsis: Ira Megumi is a 31-year-old woman who is currently at the top of her career. She's a beautiful woman who's brimming with pride and totally has no interest in love or marriage. Though the next morning, she wakes up and finds the new employee, Aoki Shun, sleeping next to her. Just what in the world happened?!

title: Ansatsu Skill De Isekai Saikyou: Renkinjutsu to Ansatsujutsu O Kiwameta Ore Wa, Sekai O Kage Kara Shihai Suru
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Isekai, Adaptation
author: COIN
synopsis:
Late has just accepted an assassination request from a mysterious client. To his surprise, it was actually the goddess Mises, a goddess from another world whose existence was on the brink of destruction after her defeat in war. Mises' quest is to assassinate Masra Dzur, another god in her world.

Can Late, the killer with a 99.9% success rate, fulfill this otherworldly assassination?

title: Tendou-Ke Monogatari
genre: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Drama
author: Ken Saitou
synopsis: A girl saves Houjou family's third daughter from drowning herself. The girl takes her place as Houjou Ran who shall become the Tendou family's bride but her deceit is seen through..?

title: Amateur E-Girl Streaming a Space War
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Gore, Aliens
author: Tsunezou Watanabe
synopsis:
On a day just like any other, a giant spaceship suddenly appeared and invaded Earth, obliterating entire cities in the blink of an eye. In the midst of the attacks, Kanna Fujimiya, amateur content creator, rose to fame overnight with her video coverage of the invasion. With her newfound popularity and charms, Kanna continues to cover the war from the front lines, but!?  
  
This amateur content creator reveals the truth behind the interstellar war in this science fiction thriller!

title: Isekai Yurutto Survival Seikatsu ~Gakkou No Minna to Isekai No Mujintou Ni Tenishitakedo Ore Dake Rakushou Desu~
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Youichi Nishio
synopsis:
Im Shinomiya Hokage, a 3rd-year high-school boy who dreams of a survival life. One day, everyone in my school transferred to a mysterious island in a parallel world. I woke up in an unknown cave and I started moving on my own. Then, I met up with some of my classmates. My knowledge and tools in survival shines through. I was a plain guy in school but Im the leader in this world.  
  


---

title: Chotto Ippai!
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Kayou
synopsis: 16 year old Miyahara Momiji starts working part-time at an Izakaya called Koharuya.

title: Ouritsu Majutsu Gakuin No Kichiku Koushi
genre: Action, Demons, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Maware Isokawa
synopsis:
Setsuna is a perverted instructor who is unable to invoke magic. As a part-time Instructor at the Royal Academy of Magic, he continually tells his students to self-study. The new students who entered the academy with high expectations are disappointed in Setsuna, and judging him to be incompetent, they challenge him to a Geas duel.

?Will you resign if I win??
?I? Surely you mean we All of you have been pretty annoying, so I want you all to take me on. But in return, you know what will happen if you lose, right??

Setsuna plays with the special students, who are the best in a hundred years, with perverse and astonishing magic that is unthinkable in common sense! But behind the demon-like behavior, could there be a true purpose?
___
**Character Designer:** [zunta](https://mangadex.org/author/844f9d85-2b7f-46fe-a69d-5c3e84cc2142/zunta)

title: Sekai De Yuuitsu No Tenshokushi: Job Hopper Na Ore Wa, Isekai De Subete No Job O Kiwameru Koto Ni Shita
genre: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Renkinou
synopsis:
Tsukasa, a company employee who repeatedly changes jobs in search of better conditions, challenges the final interview of a major corporation.  But as soon as he went past the door, he found himself in another world. His past career seems completely irrelevant, leading to a sense of discouragement. But, the "Job Changer" bestowed upon him grants him a unique ability!

With the power to freely switch between jobs like swordsman, mage, spear user, alchemist, appraiser, pharmacist, and more, he begins a leisurely life in this different world. Whether dealing with monsters or making use of abundant knowledge from herbs to items, he adapts effortlessly, engaging in everything from helping people to earning money. 

Unstoppable with his versatile skills, the powerful corporate slave leaps into a fantasy of career advancement!

title: Ie Ga Moete Jinsei Dou Demo Yoku Natta Kara, Nokotta Nakenashi No Kin De Dark Elf No Dorei O Katta.
genre: Monsters, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Adaptation
author: Koharu Michinoku
synopsis:
He lost his new home and all his property, but found a cute girl!  
   
Harold, a poor laborer who saved for years, finally obtained the house of his dreams, only to lose it to a fire the very same day. Feeling like nothing mattered anymore, Harold finds himself at an auction, where he ends up spending all of his savings on a slave, Atie  
  
Harold, with his secret technique, and Atie, with her skills as an adventurer, begin their freewheeling journey now!  
Drawn by hentai artist.
  
[Webnovel link](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0884fk/)

title: Melty Blood: Type Lumina Piece in Paradise
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Vampires, Web Comic
author: Metarogu
synopsis:
The curtain rises on Shiki's feverish Melty Blood battle!

Tohno Shiki and Arima Miyako challenge 'Melty Blood: Type Lumina', the fighting game based on 'Tsukihime -A piece of blue glass moon-'! In addition, Arcueid, Ciel and other characters also get involved... This is an introductory manga to help you enjoy playing 'Melty Blood: Type Lumina'!

title: Gas-Tou Norainu Tanteidan
genre: Historical, Crime, Drama, Mystery
author: Yuugo Aosaki
synopsis: The setting is London at the end of the 19th century. A young vagrant boy, Louie, meets Sherlock Holmes, a consulting detective who has just opened his own practice, after a murder case. Despite his hatred for Holmes, who does not pay attention to cases involving anything but the upper class, Louie decides to become Holmes' "dog" and work for him in order to gain the ability to protect the homeless children.

title: The Regressed Mercenary'S Machinations
genre: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Gold Haeng
synopsis:
Ghislain Perdium, the Mercenary King and one of the continent's top seven, started a great war in an attempt to avenge his fallen family.

His plans of revenge were going smoothly until he was slain by Idun, who he had never expected to make an appearance. Ghislain thought he died, but he woke up as a younger version of himself from before the fall of his household.

With this second chance, he decided to fix all the wrong pieces of the puzzle and avoid making the same mistakes he did in his past life!

title: Yurizukushi No Kyoushitsu De
genre: Girls' Love, School Life
author: Shiime
synopsis:
"Everyone is the main character in the story of their own life."

The stories of a 2nd year 1st class attended by 30 unique students, at a certain girls' high school with a decent standard.
Every day the class is so busy and lively that you won't get bored.

If you look closely at the classroom, you can see the thoughts of each of the 30 students.
A school omnibus that watches over unique and a "yuriful'' classroom!

In a Yuriful Classroom

title: Lout of Count'S Family
genre: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Byeollarae
synopsis:
Kim Roksu has one life motto: Lets not get beat up.

But after dozing off somewhere midway through the novel Birth of a Hero, he wakes up as Cale Henituse - one of the minor villains in the novel who gets the beating of a lifetime from soon-to-be hero Choi Han.

Only time will tell how much longer he has before that dreadful encounter. Can Kim Roksu change the course of this story so he can enjoy a long and lavish life free of the soon-to-be hero?

title: This Sweet Online Date Is a Disaster
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Video Games, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Bala Lin
synopsis: I was helping my sister win the heart of the game's top-ranked player, but it turned out to be a total disaster! I was even ridiculed by that gaming master!!! I guess no one can defy Murphy's Law! Just as the game was loading... Ding! Notice: Your husband is now online!

title: Kankei Kaizen Wo Akiramete Kyori Wo Oitara, Shiotaioudatta Konyakusha Ga Karande Kuru You Ni Narimashita
genre: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Eto Saitou
synopsis:
"I was forced to take Beatrice as my fiancée. I was reluctant from the beginning."

Beatrice, the hated duke's daughter, knew that her fiancé, Prince Ernest, was saying that. She decides to keep her distance from the prince.

"Come to think of it, until now I've been so obsessed with Ernest that I haven't interacted much with other people. What a shame."

For some reason, Ernest, who has been avoiding her until now, is now actively getting involved with her, but she simply wants to enjoy her academy life with her good-looking Margrave son and her good-natured friends. It's coming?!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1691gn/)

title: Monstrous Heart
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Shi Yi  Ball
synopsis:
Su Yuan, a poor student, in order to not place any additional burdens on his family, accidentally got himself enrolled into a college named, Ogus University. But soon he discovered that this institution was actually established for the protection of monsters (demons); and the physically weaker humans, in order to protect their lives, had to form partnershipscalled PALwith those monsters. Furthermore, as a result of his unique scent, many are drawn towards him in hopes of becoming his PAL; and at same time, he is also subjected to various attacks. That was, at least, until the day he rescued a fox covered in blood from head to toe, only to then discover  


---

title: Gorin No Megami-Sama ~Nadeshiko Ryou No Medal Gohan~
genre: Traditional Games, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking
author: Yuka Kinami
synopsis: The main character, Kominato Ryo, who is only engaged in cooking, was allowed to enter the prestigious Cho Gakuen Private School on the condition that he work as a cook in a student dormitory under the supervision of his father. However, the dormitory was the women's dormitory where future gold medal candidates lived. The nutritional requirements of top athletes are naturally high. Fill their stomachs and take on the challenging mission of building your body for the Olympic Games!

title: The Male Lead Is Trying to Change the Female Lead
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Kimgae
synopsis:
I ended up possessing the body of an extra named Luberia, who is barely mentioned in the story. And right in the tragic novel *Emperor Caesar*, full of wars and disasters, where the protagonist sacrifices everything for the love of the hero and everyone ends up dying! I planned to live discreetly and hide my strength... 

But the male lead, Caesar, keeps looking for me and even proposes marriage, saying he wants to keep me around. Luberia doesn't want to meet the same tragic end as the protagonist, so she tries to avoid Caesar at all costs... But due to Caesar's intimidating appearance and assertiveness, before she knows it, she ends up engaged to him. 

Will Luberia manage not to fall in love with Caesar and survive until the end?

title: My Wife Is the Demon Queen
genre: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Rong Rong
synopsis:
Listen up folks! Im living my life with the Demon Queen!  
  
A normal powerless male protagonist is entrusted to look after the fallen Demon Queen Isabella. Depleted of her powers, Isabella is forced to camouflage as a human and suppress her regal status. Evil masterminds plot to dethrone the powerful Demon Queen in a medieval fantasy land.

title: At the End of the Road
genre: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Haribo
synopsis:
After a car accident, Taemin finds himself in the body of Siwon, who was a victim of bullying at school. No longer a pushover, he starts standing up for himself but then meets Woojin, an old friend from the past. Somehow, Woojin immediately picks up Tamin's 'scent' from Siwon. What happened between these two in the past and how will it affect their future?

---
- [Original Book <Yes24>](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/72104857)

- [Original Book <Aladin>](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=189230382)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/_end)

title: The World Is Mine
genre: Action, Psychological, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Cuvie
synopsis: Meet Mon, a violent killer faithful only to his own eruptive desires, and his timid companion Toshi, a demolition-devil with a fanatical thirst for destruction. Their killing-spree across Japan is destined to intersect the path of the enormous "Higumadon," a mysterious beast on a Godzilla-like rampage from Hokkaido to Tokyo.

title: Katsu!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Mitsuru Adachi
synopsis: Satoyama Katsuki is a carefree 15 year-old high school kid, and a pretty lazy one at that. However, he secretly has a crush on a girl who happens to share his name: Mizutani Katsuki. Upon finding out that Mizutani's father used to be a pro-boxer, and she herself infatuated with the sport, he reluctantly joins a boxing gym in order to impress Mizutani. Satoyama is quick to find out he may have the blood of a genius boxer running through his veins

title: Ball and Chain
genre: Drama, Slice of Life
author: Q-ta Minami
synopsis:
I don't want a "Happiness" determined by someone else.
Distressed by her husband who treats her coldly (Aya)
Feeling "her" gender identity shaken, "she" is stalling the marriage (Keito)
These lives unknowingly intersects....
Be it "woman" or "wife". Be it "normal" or "common sense". This is a story for those who fight against what restricts them.

title: Area D
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Kyouichi Nanatsuki
synopsis: The "prison survival action" story is set after the sudden emergence of special powers in certain pockets of humanity. To deal with these so-called "Altered," a mysterious remote island prison named "Area D" was built.

title: Ane Ga Kensei De Imouto Ga Kenja De
genre: Comedy, Incest, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Anten Senki
synopsis: The Ralk Kingdom is a country of extreme meritocracy, but Razel, the son of the stupid king, has no talent for martial arts, and because he is always compared to his older sister who is a sword saint and his younger sister who is a sage, he gets banished from the kingdom. From then on, he tries to live as an adventurer in a different country, but his older and younger sisters, who love him dearly, come after him!?

title: Shimauma
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Fumio Obata
synopsis:
Tatsuo, Hide, Satoshi and Aya worked together to cheat people out of money. They tended to target marriage services, where they con money out of people looking for love. They were good at it, until they crossed the wrong guy. Then they saw the world below the surface of dupes to cheat, when the 'collection agency' came for them with extreme violence.  
  
The person who takes Satoshi and Hide, and then Aya and Tatsuo, is a wild-eyed maniac who seems to get off on the torture. There may be hope for Tatsuo, though, because the man recognizes him. The torturer is "Akasada" a bullied kid that Tatsuo knew from school. Now Tatsuo and Aya have been pulled, against their will, into Aka's world.
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/zebra)

title: No Guns Life
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Military, Gore, Drama, Mystery
author: Tasuku Karasuma
synopsis: After the war, there are many "Extends" in the city, people whose bodies were modified to make them into dangerous weapons. Inui Juuzou is one of them, and he has no memories of his life and body before his head was transformed into a gun. Strangely enough, his head-gun is designed so that only someone behind him can pull the trigger. Juuzou makes a living by taking on cases involving Extends in the city, and he is assisted by Mary, an intelligent young woman that he has taken under his protection.

title: 11-Banme No Neko Wa Nene
genre: Animals, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Harikamo
synopsis:
Nene is a tiny waitress in a country where cat people live. She looks like a kitten, but she has a big dream and a secret...?

Let's start a thrilling life as a cat, as nene learns "cat-ness" from her seniors!

title: Seeds of Anxiety*
genre: Monsters, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Gore, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Masaaki Nakayama
synopsis: Continuing in the same vein as previous installm*e*nts, a new collection of "everyday horror" vignettes, organized around them#$@*es.

title: Oshi Ga Yuurei Ni Narimashite
genre: Oneshot, Ghosts, School Life, Supernatural
author: Shakiko Umesaki
synopsis:
We are sad to inform you that our member "Yumemomo" has passed away.
Our idol of choice has died. In front of the wisdom of idol otaku who cannot accept the reality,
Yumemomo, who was supposed to be dead, appears as a ghost.

title: A Friend Who I Went to the Same Middle School with but Have Never Talked to
genre: Oneshot, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Maki Akihisa
synopsis:
Kimura Hajime and Hanasaki Aya went to the same middle school but have never talked to each other. They ended up going to the same high school but will their relationship remain the same?
___
Published in Shounen Sunday 2020 Issue 21.

title: Oyacocco
genre: Drama
author: Kazuyoshi Takeda
synopsis:
Oyacocco centers around the relationship between a single dad and his child.

(Source: Anime News Network)

title: Hinatsugimura
genre: Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Aki Shimizu
synopsis:
The fate of anyone who wanders into that mountain village is one of two: either they become a resident of the village, or they live on as part of the village itself. In any case, they can never return to the outside world.

A tale of passion and sensuality in a supernatural horror by Aki Shimizu, now finally compiled into a long-awaited book!

title: Isekai Ni Teni Shitara Yama No Naka Datta. Handou De Tsuyosa Yori Mo Kaitekisa O Erabimashita
genre: Monsters, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Sora Tsutaya
synopsis:
One summer day, Jin Konohana, is forced to carry luggage to a firework festival by his outrageous older sister, and before he knows, he finds himself in an unfamiliar mountain. In the mountains where no one is around, Jin begins a life of survival all by himself.
In order to survive... I want to throw away all the troublesome things and live peacefully and comfortably! 
A slow life in another world that begins in the mountains!

title: Ryota Killed His Brother
genre: Monsters, Psychological, Horror, Supernatural
author: Ayumi Natori
synopsis:
When their mother dies, junior high school student Ryota takes care of his toddler brother Chika and their home. 

Overwhelmed by all the work, he begins neglecting himself. Without any time to himself, Ryota comes to resent his little brother and soon the resentment turns into murderous thoughts. Little by little the pressures of childrearing make Ryota lose his mind. 

But is Ryota truly the issue? Or

title: Makina-San No Mama Naranai Hibi
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Kotoka
synopsis:
I am a babysitting android named MAK-17.
My plentiful interactions with babies have helped me develop something like a "heart".
No matter how many times I'm sold to a recycling shop, meeting new babies brings light into my life.
Now, I wonder what kind of baby I'll meet next?
N-...no matter how I look at him... he's an "adult", right...?

title: I'M Da Best
genre: Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Ojingeo
synopsis: The story of junior high school student new outlook on life. Its an inspiring tale of the many issues in our modern society. And the undue pressures of society to conform their standards instead of being yourself. For those who dealt with issues such as bullying, weight, and appearance. This series is a must read.

title: Re-Kan!
genre: Ghosts, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Supernatural
author: Hinako Seta
synopsis: High school girl Hibiki Amami has a sixth sense of perceiving and interacting with ghosts and supernatural beings as well as talking with cats and other animals. The story follows their everyday antics.

title: Paper Braver
genre: Comedy, Fantasy
author: Koume Fujichika
synopsis:
An RPG-style high school comedy set in present-day Japan, centering around Shiromado Hijiri, a very serious White Mage, and Michibikari Yuuto, a motivationless Hero.

Watch as they futilely struggle to raise the level of the hopeless Hero, day in and day out, in order to one day defeat the Demon Lord.

title: A Big Shot Actually
genre: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Qian Qian
synopsis: Li Nianfan transmigrated to an immortal cultivation world as a mortal. Knowing that he could never become a cultivator, he decided to live an ordinary life. But unbeknownst to him, his dog became a mighty Yaoguai king by watching him draw and write; the tree he planted in the backyard became the tree of the world by listening to tunes he played; a passerby he met, who gained enlightenment from the chitchat with him, became a Taoist sage and started a new era...

title: Neko No Hi
genre: Oneshot, Animals, Comedy, Girls' Love
author: Nmi
synopsis: Not found

title: Shingeki No Eroko-San ~Hen Na Oneesan Wa Danshikousei to Nakayoku Naritai~
genre: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Yoshiru Konogi
synopsis:
Shindou Eruko, a glasses, big breasted beauty, found a job as a handyman for the Amaguri Handyman service after her NEET life comes to an end as her savings ran out. She immediately falls for her co-worker Hoshi-kun on their first day working together, but there's a problem: Hoshi-kun is a high school boy, while Eruko is a 27 years old onee-san who has trouble telling reality and delusions apart. She ends up constantly scheming to get close to Hoshi-kun to turn many of her delusions into reality, but after several near-misses, it became apparent to Eruko that Hoshi-kun does, indeed, have feelings toward her.
  
This manga takes place after Vol.14 in  [Henjo - Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko](https://mangadex.org/title/15331/henjyo-the-strange-female-high-schooler-amaguri-senko)

title: Nanado Nado Nado
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Mecha, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life
author: Uso Uzaki
synopsis:
After being nicknamed "Yinkyahime/Princess Goth Chick" (??? or Yin character, opposite of Yang) because of her behavior in elementary school, Komachi Tamamura spent three years as a hikikomori. Since she continued to ditch even after in high school, her sister Chacha sent her Nanado Nado Nado, a friendship android to lead Komachi back to real life interactions in school!  
  
Komachi gained some friends when she started playing a game app, and eventually returned to school even though reluctant. She has a negative prejudice to many things in the world due to the knowledge she gained on the Internet in her young age. She's not good at studying or playing sports, but is great at tsukkomi.  
  
Nanado's official name is "Code 7D-O", but she is rarely called that. She is bright and optimistic, and doesn't think too much about things. She can perform general living activities such as talking and eating, just like humans, so that she does not seem to be an android. While she can emit a beam from the eyes and has 100 language modes, she does not have enough arithmetic functions for high school.   
  
*[Based on MTL ofJapanese Wikipedia page.](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%AA%E3%81%AA%E3%81%A9%E3%81%AA%E3%81%A9%E3%81%AA%E3%81%A9)*

title: Danshi Dato Omotteita Osananajimi Tono Shinkon Seikatsu Ga Umaku Ikisugiru Ken Ni Tsuite
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Mokufuu Moku
synopsis: Shuichi, a high school student, ended up marrying his childhood friend whom he thought was a boy. At their reunion after 10 years, his childhood friend Yuika had transformed into a beautiful girl, which initially made Shuichi quite nervous. However, as time passed, he gradually grew accustomed to the sense of closeness as best friendsand thus, their love story as an ideal couple with a charming touch of innocence begins!

title: Boku Wa Ayashii Kimi No Mono
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life
author: Asahito Akagi
synopsis: Shou-chan is a member of the public morals committee who wants everyone to have a healthy relationship, and is worried about his childhood friend Sayo. Because she carries the blood of a succubus, she often approaches her beloved her Shou-chan in any way to make him "lovey-dovey sex". As he persists in having a healthy relationship, which is full of lust and surrounded by questionable students, will Shou-chan manage to keep his sanity?

title: Kyouiku Mama Saeko: Kono Ko No Tame Nara
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama, School Life, Adaptation
author: Moriton
synopsis: Saeko is happy. Even if she is poor, even if she has no education, even if she is a single mother. As long as she has her only daughter, Yui. Beautiful Saeko dotes on her ugly daughter, who looks nothing like her, and today as well, she gathers happiness for her daughter by any means necessary.

title: Yande Kita Mahou Shoujo No Nichijou
genre: Psychological, Magical Girls, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural
author: Yui Musumi
synopsis: The story of a magical girl who is mentally ill.

title: Unexpected Luck
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Yugong Miya
synopsis:
"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to himall so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.

title: I Became the Childhood Friend of the Obsessive Second Male Lead
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Next Level Studio
synopsis:
Rieta, staying with a military ducal family, decided to help Noel, the second male lead, by coaching him on winning the female leads heart. After years of guidance, Rieta was confident Noel would succeed. However, in a surprising twist, Noel complimented Rieta instead, misapplying her advice. Flustered, Rieta realized her friend had taken her words to heart, but not in the way she intended.

---
Born with memories of the novel *How to Survive as an Ordinary Lady*, Princess Rietta Lise is next in line for the throne of the Kingdom of Lise. But after being sold to the empire by her father, a king who lives in luxury and pleasure, she enters the ducal Mayer estate. Upon realizing that Noel, the dukes second son, is the sub-male lead of the novel, shell try to repay the duchys favor by making him the real male protagonist!

title: Glass Wings
genre: Oneshot, Psychological, Self-Published, Medical
author: Misuzu Asaoka
synopsis:
A haunting exploration of regret, loss, and the fragility of the human mind, this short manga delves into the life of a man shattered by tragedy. As his fractured psyche wrestles with the weight of guilt and love, the story unfolds in a non-linear narrative, weaving together moments of despair and fleeting beauty. The mysterious glass butterfly becomes a poignant symbol of a past he can neither escape nor fully remember.

This psychological tale challenges the boundaries of perception, unraveling the protagonists duality as he confronts his own truths. In just four gripping pages, this manga delivers an emotional and thought-provoking experience that lingers in the readers mind long after the final panel.

title: Meet in the Middle
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Jo Hein
synopsis:
"I can make it fun for you."
30-year-old Son Yeoreum, who is living a boring life, has a mysterious younger guy appear in front of her one day!
It's just cute to see you go straight, regardless of the back and forth,
Something strong and something obsessive?

What the hell do you want from me?!
Heart pounding two-way scam romance comedy!

title: Scales of Justice
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Shiro Yamada
synopsis:
The 12 Zodiac Deities (Bangjeongsa), who have transformed into human form, use the divine scale known as 'Cheonpyeong' to measure the weight of the victim's pain, 'Honggo,' and the perpetrator's pain, 'Heukgo,' to administer punishments accordingly.

"The scale must be true and just, and the weight of the sin and the punishment must be equal."

A fantasy human drama about the 'sins and punishments' of humans, as carried out by the 12 Bangjeongsa who punish human sins by the command of the heavens!

title: Octet
genre: Oneshot
author: Gensui Shiitake
synopsis:
Welcome to "Octet," the one and only host club in Nara Prefecture... but this is no ordinary establishment!
Their clientele? None other than goddesses themselves!
Experience a modern-day host club fantasy like no other!

Source: MangaPlus

title: Ma Dou so Shi
genre: Historical, Ghosts, Comedy, Boys' Love, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy
author: Yuzurin
synopsis:
In the era of the Wen clan's tyranny and people's suffering, the masters of the great immortal cultivation clans: the Lan Clan of Gusu, Jiang Clan of Yunmeng, Jin Clan of Lanling, and Nie Clan of Qinghe, joined forces in the "Sunshot Campaign" to defeat the Wen Clan. The Yiling Patriarch, Wei Wuxian, made great contributions to the campaign, but his path of cultivation, labeled as demonic, was so powerful that he was slandered and scorned by the people. In the end, his lair in the Burial Mounds was destroyed by the very clans he fought with.

Thirteen years later, Wei Wuxian is summoned into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and family, and is found and taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans-- Lan wangji, who is known for his genius in conventional cultivation, and frequently fought with Wei Wuxian in his past life. Wei Wuxian tries to leave without revealing his true identity, but for reasons undecipherable to Wei Wuxian, Lan Wangji refuses to let him go.

As they pursue the elusive mysteries of the past, the relationship between Wei Wuxian and Lan Wangji changes and grows. The cheerful, unrestrained Wei Wuxian and the calm and disciplined Lan Wangji, the story of the two begins with their childhood encounter...

title: Get Schooled
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Yong-Taek Chae
synopsis:
Na Hwa-Jins teaching techniques are pretty violent for someone who works in the Ministry of Education.

That being said, when punishments don't seem to work on even the worst of school bullies, there is no better man for the job.

Sometimes you cant get a good education until those bullies are taught a lesson.


---

- Alternate Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5620215)
