title: Battery
genre: Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Atsuko Asano
synopsis:
Meet Harada Takuminot even in junior high and he's the best pitcher in the region, although he's frustrated and ready to give up, because he can't find a catcher who is good enough to keep up with how he pitches in this backwater town his family has just moved to. Then along comes a kid named Nagakura Gou  
  
(Source: MU)  
  
Links:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18153)

title: I Am the Descendant of the Divine Dragon!
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Po Ru
synopsis: In the highly competitive world of the Xuan Realm Continent, where warriors strive to refine their bodies, cultivate their martial abilities, harness the essence of the heavens and earth, and push beyond mortal limitations, our protagonist, Lu Hao, faces unjust persecution from his own clan since childhood. However, fate smiles upon him as he awakens the dormant bloodline of the Divine Dragon within him. With an unyielding resolve, Lu Hao embarks on an extraordinary journey, overcoming countless obstacles to ascend to the zenith of power. Along the way, he unravels the enigmatic secrets of his past life.

title: Kami Ni Homura Wo - Saishuu Teiri No Shoumei Houhou
genre: Drama
author: Yoshikage
synopsis: Fermat's Last Theorem, the most difficult problem in mathematics that had fascinated mathematicians around the world for 350 years, was solved by a young mathematician in 1951 in postwar Japan. His name was Andy Homura. His life and the history of mathematics were set in motion by the appearance of a great genius, a girl named Rama.

title: Kizetsu Yuusha to Ansatsu Hime
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy
author: Norishiro-chan
synopsis: Toto is a novice hero who has finally put together the team that he'd always wanted. And he's ready to set out on a new adventure. But Toto's new party members' actual target is... his life?!

title: When I Was Playing Eroge with Vr, I Was Reincarnated in a Different World, I Will Enslave All the Beautiful Demon Girls ~Crossout Saber~
genre: Reincarnation, Loli, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation
author: TAKTO
synopsis:
Take off everything and be enslaved [Tame]!! in a different world filled with fantasy!!  
  
I accidentally died while playing a VR compatible game, and now the goddess will reincarnate me into the world of that game with specialized enslavement skill ?TAME?  
Every single female opponent will be stripped with ?TAME? and given pleasure by my hands while going forward to an adventure! ! !

title: My Follower Became My Girlfriend
genre: Romance, Comedy
author: Momo Yamamoto
synopsis:
It is now Reiwa, a new era marked by the spread of the novel corona virus.
Two university freshmen had lost their chance of having romantic encounters because their classes were almost immediately moved online after starting university.
They are Takano Shouhei (SNS ID: Mega Donki), a virgin aiming for ten thousand likes on his SNS posts and Sasakura Nene (SNS ID: nene), a thickheaded convenience store part-timer and they have somehow become each others purpose for living.
This is the start of a miracle-like pure love comedy that started on social media.

title: Inagaki Misao Horror M Senshuu
genre: Thriller, Monsters, Ghosts, Anthology, Crime, Survival, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Misao Inagaki
synopsis: A collection of Misao Inagaki's early oneshots from the Horror M magazine, known for extremely high quality horror manga and for its splatter horror series.

title: The Name of My Feelings
genre: Oneshot, Long Strip, Romance, Incest, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Kang Unnie
synopsis: Not found

title: Defective Goddess' Genesis of Another World
genre: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Dal-Young Im
synopsis:
Artesia Gaia Nagasus,  
The goddess of creation went into a deep slumber in order to bring new life to the fallen planet,  
And to prepare for the inevitable arrival of the Brave, whom she would then provide with guidance.  
However, she woke up too early Not only was there no Brave waiting for her, she was met with an extremely cold glacial period without intelligent life?!  
  
She just wants to be worshipped and fall in love!  
This is a tale of creation, starring a defective goddess who can't help but mess with humanity, and her journey to set the world in motion - with a few troubles here, and a little hard work there.

title: I Will Escape From the Flower of Ordeals
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ant Studio
synopsis:
I was exhausted from reading the script all night and fell asleep, but it was about a kimchi fight, a secret birth, and an amnesia.

I suddenly possessed Cha Ye-ryun, the villainous girl from the drama 'Flower of Ordeals', which is full of all kinds of absurd situations.

"I will protect you, Cha Ye-ryun. If I cant go back to reality even after the drama ends, then I will be you."

Cha Ye-ryun only has one goal - avoiding her unfortunate ending where she has to spend the rest of her life in prison. 

 Will she be able to overcome the unfortunate ending and escape the Flower of Ordeals?

title: High-School Dxd: Aashia & Koneko Himitsu No Keiyaku!?
genre: Comedy, Harem, School Life
author: Hiroichi
synopsis: Spin-off of [High-School DxD](https://mangadex.org/manga/2191) that deals with the lives of two cute girls in the group, this takes place after Chapter 10 of the main manga series.

title: Chichi to Hige-Gorilla to Watashi
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Sadaji Koike
synopsis: After losing her mother to a tragic accident, 6-year old tomboy, Michiru, finds a suspicious person moving into her precious home: her dad's giant younger brother Kouji, the 'Beard Gorilla'. While awkward at first, it doesn't take long for the two to develop a familiar bond that looks more like that of a brother and a sister, than that of niece & uncle.

title: Kaijuu Shoujo Hana
genre: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Monster Girls, Web Comic
author: J. Turner
synopsis: Not found

title: Tozaki-San Wa Boku Ni Dake Tsumetai
genre: Romance, Comedy, School Life
author: saku
synopsis: Kenjiro, a first year high school student, has had a crush on Tozaki-san, who is in the same class with him since the beginning of school. Tozaki-san is kind to everyone, but for some reason, she only has a cold attitude towards Kenjiro.

title: Boku Ni Korosarero
genre: Thriller, Psychological, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Sachiko Uguisu
synopsis: Yuu Yakushimaru, a truant junior high school student, spends his days hating his bullying classmates and sarcastic life guidance teachers, and dreaming of one day killing them all. When he gains the "power to kill" and discovers that the people he hates are monsters that he can "kill" - the killing spree will never stop!?Non-stop horror suspense, the curtain rises!

title: Haikyo No Meshi
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: mujiha
synopsis:
In the distant future, battered by a long-forgotten history, humanity is reduced to feeding on commonbread, a kind of prefabricated bread. Far from seeing this as inevitable, young Haruka, an explorer of ruins, has long since discovered traces of other foods that once existed and that she forces herself to find in her research. To do this, she must delve even further into the deserted and abandoned lands, exposed to all dangers, from mutant monsters to merciless looters.

The scenario takes the reader on a journey of anticipation reminiscent of the film Soylent Green , where a subtle and effective drawing evokes Tsutomu Nihei and Moebius.

title: Rikujou Jieitai Tokumu Chouhou Kikan - Beppan No Inu
genre: Action, Crime, Adventure, Military, Gore
author: Shinnosuke Kuji
synopsis:
The fate of the nation is in the hands of those who have abandoned both law and name An unpredictable spy action begins! 

In the Special Operations Group, an elite unit of the Ground Self-Defense Force, there is a female member who is bored with her daily routine of training. 

One day, at the behest of her superior, she heads to a certain garrison and is recruited by a mysterious man to join a black-ops unit known as "Beppan". 

Given the name "Nana", she finds herself on the front lines of a national defense war filled with schemes and violence.

title: Inaho-Kun Wa Nise Kanojo No Hazu Na No Ni
genre: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Tokonoma
synopsis:
Mori Shintaro, a new first-year student, yearns for the sparkling high school life of having a girlfriend and experiencing youth, but is ridiculed by those around him. His classmate, Inaho Sawatari, entered the school as the top student and is a highly regarded beauty. The two are not supposed to cross paths, but after an incident where they are mistaken for a couple, Inaho makes an unexpected proposal:
"Shall we pretend that we're really dating?"

---
**Notes:**
- The pre-serialization series is [Houkago no Cinderella-kun](https://mangadex.org/title/147b8fd6-5232-45df-993f-35c908cf41a2/houkago-no-cinderella-kun).

title: Yuusha Shoukan Ni Makikomareta Kedo, Isekai Wa Heiwa Deshita
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Jirou Heian
synopsis:
The other world was at Peace.  
A kind world where the three races, the Spirit Worlds Magical Races, the Celestial Worlds Divine Races, the Human Worlds Human Races, they are kind neighbours to each other, with everyone living a peaceful and fulfilling life.  
  
But although I wished to peacefully spend a year before my return, for some reason, the heavyweights of this world keeps gathering around me, and

title: Class Ga Isekai Shoukan Sareta Naka Ore Dake Nokotta N Desu Ga
genre: Action, Romance, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation
author: Sazanterasu
synopsis:
A god of a different world had abruptly appeared in Kamiya Yato's classroom and forcibly summoned the entire class to his world except for him, because he was sleeping in a seat in the corner of the class, the round summoning magic circle didn't reach him, and he ended up staying here on Earth, but with brand-new skills.  
  
After he made it through a whole year full of police interviews and journalism reports, he finally became a high school student, but the quiet days he had hoped for were far from over; be it terrorists who decide to occupy his school or even monsters from different world, one by one new incidents take place in the town he lives in  
  
Will a boy without any motivation be able to save the world?

Note: No raw updates since October 2021; assume hiatus by author. Comic Boost still lists the series as an "irregular serialization" rather than axed, so there remains a slim possibility for future updates.  
  


---

title: Fushi No Kami: Rebuilding Civilization Starts with a Village
genre: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Mizuumi Amakawa
synopsis: Ash is a young boy with apparent past-life memories who lives in a remote, deserted village. As he remembers leading a bountiful life, he cant bear living in a world akin to the Dark Ages, where not even the internal combustion engine exists. Ash envisions the rebirth of a civilization where housing with proper sanitation is the norm and the world is connected via a means of transportation faster than horses. For that reason, he is eager to consult books containing knowledge from a highly-developed ancient culture that is rumored to have existed far in the past. Ash makes use of the churchs resources, learning how to read and obtaining the knowledge that he seeks. In addition, he enlists the help of the people around him, including Maika, the village chiefs daughter. Together, they aim to develop their own village. This is only the beginning of the story about a young boy who sets out to revolutionize the world in order to rebuild civilization and create his ideal life!

title: Post-Possession Damage Control
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy
author: KALTA
synopsis: Seven years ago, Kanna was thrown into the body of a Korean girl named Joohwa. She had everything in her new lifea loving family, a great boyfriend, a hard-won medical license, even her own clinic! But that all changes when she's suddenly swapped back one day. Just as she's been in Joohwa's body, Joohwa has been in hers... and she's left Kanna's life a mess! First things first, she's going to divorce her cold husband, Duke Silvian Valentino. After that? Revenge on everyone who's wronged her.

title: Savage Forest
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Ji-Seon Yun
synopsis: Enya and Tarhan are forever bonded once Enya helps Tarhan's family find peace after a tragic accident. However, their bond is challenged when Tarhan goes from a distrusted outsider to the strong and popular vice chief of Agilea. In a society where a healthy body is considered one's greatest asset, Enya is treated with scorn because of her limp. On top of that, her place as Tarhan's lover is threatened when the princess of an ally tribe offers a marriage alliance in times of impending war. Will Enya and Tarhan's love prevail despite the numerous obstacles in their rocky path?

title: Chihayafuru Plus Kimigatame
genre: Traditional Games, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Yuki Suetsugu
synopsis: Rintsu Nagara is a new first-year member of the Mizusawa High School karuta club. For some reason, Rintsuki is aiming to win the national championship, but after Chihaya and her friends graduate, the Mizusawa Karuta Club has only one A-class player, and she has a difficult time ahead of her.

title: Gekikou Kamen
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Takayuki Yamaguchi
synopsis: A man meets up with his university tokusatsu circle after the passing of their leader.

title: Anatolia Story
genre: Award Winning, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Drama, Supernatural
author: Chie Shinohara
synopsis:
Yuri, a modern day teenager who had just received her first kiss, is suddenly whisked away 
to ancient Anatolia, where an evil queen needs her for a blood sacrifice. 
Thankfully the timely intervention of Prince Kail saves Yuri from the queen's grasp. For now. 
Kail promises to send Yuri back to her home, but the queen's persistent schemes to kill them both, 
plus their growing interest in each other, keep those plans delayed.  

  **Winner of 2001 Shogakukan Manga Award for Sh?jo** 

Note: Final 28th volume contains a side story called Orontes Renka, set in the same historical period.  
 
The Hittite empire is about to become an Egyptian territory through marriage between the Hittite princess and the Egyptian king. 
A traveler from Egypt, Maripas, visits Anatolia at that time but gets robbed of all his belongings while playing good samaritan. 
He's thankfully offered shelter by an unusually well-educated Hittite woman named Yuri. 
But this seemingly innocent meeting soon turns into a thrilling romantic adventure  
cases of mistaken identity and runaway royals are about to complicate international relations!

title: Online - the Comic
genre: Psychological, Romance, Video Games, Drama, Horror, Supernatural
author: Tsukasa Kyouka
synopsis: Mai Yashiro (22) was an average office worker until the day a video game console arrived in her mailbox. The game she is forced to play, "Nightmare," is a dangerous game in which one risks both the lives of the ones they love and their own body!! If you refuse to play, those dear to you die. If you lose battles in the game, parts of your body (your arms or legs, your voice, etc.) cease functioning. The horror of this game spreads throughout society in a flash, and, to fight it, Mai's company creates a "Nightmare" Strategy Team. After being assigned to this team, Mai and her dependable comrades boldly rise up against this hellish game. Adapted from the super-popular novel which has received over 40,000,000 hits online!!

title: Karei Ni Rien Shitemisemasu Wa!
genre: Romance, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation
author: Ichijiku Shirono
synopsis:
Roza married Adrion, a man who once had a lover. On their wedding night, Adrion heartlessly said, "I've never seen such an ugly woman like you. What a turn-off." Hearing the words, Roza, who married the man solely out of obedience to her father, has no affection for him at all. Determined to break free from her father's control as soon as possible, Roza resolves to save money, divorce Adrion, and gain her own freedom. Meanwhile, Adrion gradually becomes attracted to Roza, who excels at house cleaning, cooking, childcare, farm work, sword technique and almost everything... With different thoughts on their minds, the fate of the young couple is quitely unfolding...

(Source: Alpha Manga)

The adaptation of "The 14th Annual Romance Novel Award" Winner from Alphapolis.

title: Kagaku Chop
genre: Sci-Fi, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Kazuho
synopsis:
The president of the Science Club, Sai Suzuzono, is a girl with a mad scientist-like temperament who spends her days satisfying her curiosity with weird experiments and inventions, not thinking much about the trouble it causes to the people around her.   
The only one who can keep Sai in check is the class representative, Ren Nagakura. However, despite her Class Rep character, Ren is a bit off (in other words, an idiot) and so the situation always takes an unexpected turn

title: How Far Are You Okay With?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Minguk23
synopsis: If its okay with you, Noona Do you want to do that thing I just saw with me? Eunpyeong finds it difficult to start dating because of painful memories. Nyuk, her underclassman from the same department, approaches her but Eunpyeong finds it hard to accept him. One day, Nyuk walks Eunpyeong home because she is drunk. At her house, he makes an unexpected discovery and a bold suggestion

title: Do You Want Me to Lend You a Lighter?
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Hojin
synopsis: In truth, I never wanted to become a teacher. In a moment when I was fulfilling my own responsibilities on the path I chose after giving up my dream, 'Do you want me to lend you a lighter?' A cheeky male student offered. It feels like my life as a teacher is at odds with this cheeky kid, who comes with genius talent, overflowing wealth, and fame as a bonus. A story of school life entwined with dreams, talent, and love.

title: Iron Don Quixote
genre: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Sports, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy
author: Tetsuo Hara
synopsis:
"My name is Gen Kurosu, and as long as I stand, the Victory Flag will never fly over the heads of the Red Army!  The machines roar and blood sprays! My name is Gen Kurosu!"

Motocross is a sport in which contestants race for fame on steel horses through rugged, rough terrain. 

The essence of motocross is the struggle against the harsh nature and oneself. This is the story of a lone warrior who, despite being called "Stupid Don Quixote," stands in the way of the "Red Army," the most powerful motocross team in Japan, which has achieved an undefeated record of 150 victories in a single year. 

This is the memorable first serial publication of manga master Tetsuo Hara!

title: Muvluv
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life
author: Samui Kitagawa
synopsis:
Takeru and Sumika have been neighbors and friends since they were little, but when a mysterious girl arrives, and is found in bed with Takeru, their daily lives will be thrown into chaos.

title: Doukyonin No Sano-Kun Wa Tada No Yuunou Na Tantou Henshuu Desu
genre: Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Nozomi Uda
synopsis:
Shinomiya Teiichiro is a prolific, workaholic novelist who is too consumed with writing to take care of himself. To prevent him from neglecting his well-being, his editor, Sano Satoru, moves in with him. But when the calm and collected Shinomiya finds himself flustered by Sano's constant presence and good looks, he begins to question their relationship. After all, Sano is just his editor, isn't he?!
(Source: MangaUP!)

title: My Mobster Girlfriend
genre: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Harem
author: Mo Xi
synopsis:
Zhang Nan, the young master of the declining Fu Long Clan just wants to be a normal person, but he is sent to an aristocratic training school by his grandfather. He is accidentally assigned to a female class by the teacher, and is tormented by his peers to the point where he wants to leave school.  
Will his experiences at Blake Academy and the girls he meets change him so he can face his identity as the heir to his clan?

title: Lychee?Light Club
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Usamaru Furuya
synopsis: A group of nine boys (called the Hikari Club) are intent on making the Ultimate AI. The attractive leader of the club, Zera, is a twisted man polluting the minds of the club members to make them do whatever he pleases. Tamiya, the original founder of the club, wants to reclaim the club. Niko, the second in command, is pissed off at Jaibo, the one obsessed with Zera. They kidnap a schoolgirl, but the AI Raichi falls in love with her and she with him, and things get messy.

title: The Villainess Became a Mother
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dodam
synopsis:
Reborn into a novel, Lulu Ekray knew that she was destined to become the villainess and that she would fall in love with the male protagonist, her obsession with him eventually leading to her execution. Nonetheless, she falls in love with Grand Duke Carlix Rochester anyway, but now, the obsessive one is him! 

After a night of passion, Lulu gets pregnant, but to avoid becoming the villainess, she decides to leave Carlix. But Lulu has no idea just what lengths Carlix will go to get her back!

title: Yuutousei Wa Shikararetai
genre: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic
author: Akane Ogata
synopsis: Not found

title: Noheroes!
genre: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Mizuho Nanase
synopsis: A fighter, a wizard and a misguiding spirit are on Nameless Isle-what happens next is the stuff of heroes - or not! It's up to them.

title: Wandering Island
genre: Adventure, Slice of Life, Mystery
author: Kenji Tsuruta
synopsis:
After her grandfather's death, Mikura chose to continue their island express courier service. 
With her seaplane and her adventurous cat, Endeavor, she lives life as she chooses. 
Soon Mikura becomes very interested in a mysterious island that seems to move around, according to a local legend. 
After some extensive effort to determine the island's whereabouts, 
she manages to get a brief glimpse of it from the sky. 
Now that she knows it's real, she's determined to find the island again, no matter what it takes.
  
[Kindle vers (English)](https://smile.amazon.com/gp/product/B07JKKWXTF?ref_=dbs_r_series&storeType=ebooks)

title: Takatora-Kun to Omegatachi
genre: Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life
author: Nemui Asada
synopsis:
In the Seirin high school, Takatora reigns supreme even amongst the most elite of alphas. One day, he notices a sudden elevation in body temperature and... Well, you can see where this is going... Or can you?

Asada Nemui's deconstruction of the omegaverse begins now!

This series is currently serialized in Canna magazine.

title: Iron Doll
genre: Oneshot, Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Military, Drama
author: LAS
synopsis: Not found

title: There Is No Mercy
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Dimang
synopsis: Sierra witnesses her husband's secret meeting with her best friend Belieta. She is stabbed by her husband and closes her eyes. As Sierra, who was tired of life, feels free from her impending death, she hears a mysterious voice... "You can't escape Belieta." In her second life that she unwillingly began, Sierra vows revenge. This time, she will take everything from Belieta.

title: Asadora!
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Historical, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Office Workers, Military, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Mystery, Music, Tragedy
author: Naoki Urasawa
synopsis: In 2020, a large creature rampages through Tokyo, destroying everything in its path. In 1959, Asa Asada, a spunky young girl from a huge family in Nagoya, is kidnapped for ransomand not a soul notices. When a typhoon hits Nagoya, Asa and her kidnapper must work together to survive. But theres more to her kidnapper and this storm than meets the eye.

title: Sister-Sama No Oose No Mama Ni
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: hone
synopsis: One day, the demon Clod comes to high school student Sister Kris Ibarakawa. He says that he has a contract with Kris's estranged father to make her happy. He is very serious even for a demon, and says, "I will definitely make you happy," and uses various kinds of magic... Will Kris be able to follow the path of a pure and righteous sister?

title: Nagi No Oitoma
genre: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life
author: Misato Konari
synopsis:
Ooshima Nagi is an 28 year old office lady always trying to read the mood and fit in. Berated by her boss, taken advantage of by her colleagues, and betrayed by her boyfriend, Nagi quits her job and severs contact with everyone in her social circle in order to restart her life from scratch. Will Nagi be able to change herself, or will she fall back into her old ways?  
  
**Note**: Nominated for the 11th Manga Taishou Awards (2018).  
Nominated for the 12th Manga Taishou Awards (2019).  
Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Awards (2020).

title: Chira & Chiller
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem
author: Komadogiwa
synopsis:
This is not enough!

Sweat running down her soft skin, her flushed cheeks, her breath becoming rougher and rougher Losing track of time in a private room, just the two of you, this evening you and her will have each other to your hearts' content

A slightly naughty sauna comedy, here we come!

title: Yumene Connect
genre: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Aliens, Supernatural
author: Kou Sawada
synopsis: On the day of the entrance ceremony, Yuuhi Takamiya caught a mysteriously high fever and was bedridden for a week. To camouflage the fact that he was a loner, he creates a bookworm persona that becomes firmly established both for himself and others. Hearing his despair over wanting friends, a clumsy alien called Nano arrives from space to push some dubious goods on him... With Nano's outrageous products, Yuuhi's school life spirals into even greater chaos!

title: Blade of Retribution
genre: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy
author: Meen
synopsis: On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.

title: Koe Naki Niehime to Kokuryuu No Kekkon
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Yukikusa Oomatsu
synopsis:
Ayame, born into a family of priestesses blessed by the Black Dragon God, possesses a unique ability to heal people through her voice. However, after the death of her parents, she is taken in by her uncle's family who mistreat her, leading to the loss of her voice. Her cousin Mari even takes over Ayames rightful position as priestess, and Ayame is eventually offered as a sacrifice to the Black Dragon.

"Why must I be killed like this?! Someone, please help me!"

Her desperate plea brought forth the Black Dragon from the sky. He descends and transforms into a handsome young man, gently takes Ayame's hand, and flies away with her.

Thus begins Ayames new life as the bride of Saku, the Black Dragon, living in his mansion situated between the celestial and human worlds. However, Ayames cousin Mari, envious of her new status as the beautiful bride of the Black Dragon schemes to steal him away...

A Japanese-style Cinderella story of a gentle-hearted girl who lost her voice and a proud yet compassionate Black Dragon.

title: The Emperor'S Dog
genre: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Do-Gyeom Nam
synopsis:
After an unexpected accident, I was reborn in another world. 

Could I be the emperor's daughter? Or perhaps a duke's daughter? With a heart full of anticipation, I opened my eyes, and what I saw before me was...

A white, soft puppy's front paw.

Given this situation, I need to find a way to survive. The only thing possible with this small, insignificant puppy body is... 

The path of a lapdog, cozying up to those in power!

title: Lost in Translation
genre: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: kimimaro
synopsis: The up-and-coming K-pop group Mayhem is steadily climbing the charts, but fame doesn't come for free. Bad Boy front man of the group Wyld knows this all too well. Forced to take on a controversial persona behind his fellow members' backs to help keep the momentum going, can Wyld keep sight of himself beneath all the lies and scandals? Or will he become his own false persona?

title: Fire Fire Fire
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Drama
author: Shouji Satou
synopsis:
Jiga Kirishima lives in a time where the only sky the people know is the color gray and most of the world is wasteland and ruins, with a few people in power depriving resources from the disorganized weak and poor majority. With his father's sword, Jiga makes friends and enemies and goes on adventures while searching for others who share his bloodline.  
  
Jiga's sword happens to be made of a rare material which a powerful organization known as Lost Eagle Nest claims to want in order to rebuild the world, but is that what they really want it for? They'll stop at nothing to take it from him, and Jiga and his friends now have a price on their heads.

title: Micchan No Hifu
author: Kuroseimu
synopsis: Not found

title: Crazy Food Truck
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural
author: Rokurou Ogaki
synopsis:
Gordon is an unsociable middle-aged man driving his food truck through a world buried in sand. 
One day, he meets a girl named Arisa sleeping stark naked in the middle of the desert. 
While Arisa wolfs down any and all food she can fit in her mouth, 
a mysterious armed group seems to be pursuing her, too.

title: I Don'T Want to Play Matchmaker!
genre: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Marie-ssi
synopsis:
Ive been reincarnated into a side character of a novel. On top of that, I am the character who is like a magpie bridge in the mentally-exhausting story, *The Guys Around Hestia*.

There is no romance in store for me, and it absolutely horrifies me to think that my family is destined to drown in debt!

I planned on becoming a civil servant, enjoying a life of wealth and honor that I was unable to attain in my previous life but why are the guys behaving out of character? Why are you blushing in front of me? Why do you keep giving me food?

Can you Imagine Shushu being shy when looking at someone?

Whoa Itd be amazing if that happens.

As Cory absent-mindedly said that to Hiley, Eve frowned and murmured under his breath, Should I run away with her

Swan remained silent while he hid his face with his sleeves. His face and ears turned red.

Whats up with you guys? Why are you guys doing other things instead of being obsessed with the female lead? Get yourself together!

This is the survival story of an academy student, Schulaina West, who wants to pursue a wealthy future in a reverse harem novel. 

TL/N: Magpie Bridge is the bridge made by a flock of magpies that connects the two star-crossed lovers Orihime and Hikoboshi in the legend behind the Tanabata festival.

title: Natsu No Arashi!
genre: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Supernatural
author: Jin Kobayashi
synopsis: In an old town coffee shop, a boy met an older high school girl. From there an unforgettable summer began.

title: Hanaukyo Maid Tai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life
author: Morishige
synopsis: After his mother died, a fifteen-year-old boy named Taro is invited by his grandfather to the Hanaukyo mansion. Soon after he arrives, his grandfather disappears, and Taro learns that not only will he inherit the unbelievably huge estate, he will also have access to the countless beautiful young maids working there.

title: Nyotaika Yankee Gakuen ? Ore No Hajimete, Nerawaretemasu.
genre: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, School Life, Delinquents
author: Yori Takao
synopsis: Delinquent student Torao is tired of losing to the school's top dog, Inuzuka Ryouhei. One day, before his latest challenge, Torao accidentally drinks something from a vending machine that turns him into a girl! Worse yet, Inuzuka has fallen completely head over heels for her! What will Torao, now Torako, do to change back and ward off Inuzuka's advances?

title: Boukensha Ni Naritai to Miyako Ni Deteitta Musume Ga S Rank Ni Natteta
genre: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation
author: Mojikakiya
synopsis:
Retired adventurer Belgrieve thought he was done with excitement... but his peaceful life is upended when he discovers a baby abandoned in the nearby woods.

As her adoptive father, he teaches his new daughter Angeline everything he knows about the adventuring lifea past he had thought long forgotten after he lost his leg in battle. Angeline idolizes her father and wants to follow in his footsteps, so she leaves home for the big city.

As the years pass, she ascends the ranks, eventually becoming renowned as an S-Rank adventurer: the Black-Haired Valkyrie. But it turns out that being the best comes with its own struggles, and she can barely catch her breath between battling fiends.

With everyone turning to her for rescue, can Ange get out ahead of each new disaster and finally reunite with her beloved dad?
___
**Character Designer:** [toi8](https://mangadex.org/author/eef8ef8e-a7f5-48a0-83cb-608a09790a37/toi8)

title: Winning Shot!
genre: Long Strip, Sports, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Gyeon Kang
synopsis: Ahn Shiyun is a pitcher who doesnt mind his team losing streak, as long as he can play baseball. After continuing his dream in middle school, his life begins to change when he meets Baek Tae-Oh, a catcher of the opposing team. This is the story of amazing people who can throw powerful winning shots at the top of high school baseball's elite!

title: Kami-Sama Ga Mitenai Kara
genre: Romance, Comedy, Post-Apocalyptic, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Kaoru Isumi
synopsis:
Sakuya, who was raised in a church, was supposed to be living a modest but warm life alongside Sister Lamia, or that's how it should have been! Though she tries to appear seductive, she's actually pure. Though she can be slightly dimwitted, she's adorable. Even though he tries to resist, Sakuya is continuously being led around her. The forbidden love comedy between a straitlaced boy and the nun who wants to get closer to him!
___
**Individual Chapter Retail Pages:**

- [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0DBBXDCGD)

title: Taming Master
genre: Monsters, Action, Animals, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Bing-Go Bing
synopsis: Jinsung may look like your average college student, but in the harsh VR world of Kaillan, hes Ian, a mighty level 93 archer! So when he suddenly resets his character, everyone thinks hes totally nuts! What they dont realize is that Jinsung has unlocked a powerful, new hidden class. Now, taming monsters is tough, and leveling up is a slog. But when his VR-loving teacher threatens to fail him, Jinsung has just two months to level up and achieve glory as the one and only Taming Master!

title: Two Moon
genre: Long Strip, Ninja, Adventure, Fantasy, Tragedy
author: Hun-Yeong Lee
synopsis: Prince Jin was eleven when he disappeared into the forest in the middle of the night. There, he met a mysterious being that took over his body and turned him into a hybrid with great strength. Five years later he returned and demanded land and wealth for his family. Thanks to his medallion, Jin proved that he was a prince, and therefore Queen Byuk Ha was forced to leave her post. Some people wanted to get rid of him by sending ninjas to kill him... But it won't be easy to destroy him!

title: Return of the King of Hell
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: Bareunkkot
synopsis: The underworld has collapsed. In the barren land where blood should flow, now clear water flows, and the cauldron that used to boil the souls has long since gone cold. The retired King of Underworld, in pursuit of his own happiness, seeks the path of reincarnation. However, due to the chaos in Underworld and the disappearance of his successor, he is unable to walk the path of reincarnation. To become a god in the human world and to track down the missing successor, The King of Underworld descends to the human world. But the human world is in chaos due to the escape of the deceased from Hell, orchestrated by his successors masterful plan. The King of Underworld joins forces with the Guardians of the Life who protect humans, using the power of the Hells ledger, in a struggle to capture his successor and restore the world to its original state. Will King of Underworld be able to safely walk the path of reincarnation?

title: Peerless
genre: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama
author: Hwangseong
synopsis:
A young man with a striking appearance steps in as the acting leader of the strongest Murim Alliance in history!!

[Age: Early twenties]
[Martial Arts: Unmeasurable]
[Background: A disciple of the mysterious sect, Ihwa Palace, ruled by five female masters]
[Notable Feats: A peerless genius who achieved the "Triple Exam Success," passing the Preliminary, Main, and Advanced Imperial Exam consecutively.]

As the new acting leader investigates the mysterious death of the previous Alliance leader, terrifying and monstrous figures from the Demonic Sect appear before him!

Will the new acting leader manage to overcome this overwhelming fate?

Unprecedented, unparalleled martial arts techniques of the Orthodox and Demonic factions emerge in full force! A groundbreaking and unparalleled martial arts epic begins now.

Unprecedented, unparalleled martial arts techniques of both the Orthodox and Demonic factions emerge in full force! A groundbreaking and unparalleled martial art epic begins now.

title: Hanakagari
genre: Romance, Anthology, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic
author: Umehisa
synopsis:
Student yuri. You can read them separately, but they are somewhat tied together.

(source: Pixiv, translated)

1. Senpai and Kouhai (?????)
2. That Girl at Cram School (?????)
3. A Hopeless Romantic Wants to Give Up on Love (??????????)
4. A Friend's Love (????)
5. Cheating and Atonement (?????)
6. The Day I Realized (?????????)
7. 500 Times Over (500?????)

title: Tora to Hachidori
genre: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Yodokawa
synopsis:
Sporting an exhausted expression and a T-shirt with a large tiger printed on it, Matsuri Kitous taste in fashion is like a school delinquent. Unexpectedly, she soon finds herself working at one of the centers of fashion in Shibuya, a clothing store named omne.
Supervised by MB, a fashion blogger who knows the ins-and-outs of the industry, this story all about life working in a clothing store begins!

title: Hitogui
genre: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Horror, Full Color
author: Yuu Kuraishi
synopsis: Shimada is a ruthless criminal responsible for indiscriminate mass murder, who later resorts to cannibalism. Nagumo, a police officer, is assigned to escort him, heightening the tension. But what unfolds inside the escort vehicle, packed with criminals, marks the beginning of an unimaginable terrora new kind of immersive survival horror.

title: Hadashi De Bara Wo Fume
genre: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Rinko Ueda
synopsis:
A rags-to-riches romance from the creator of Tsuki no Shippo!  
Poor Kitamura Sumiher irresponsible older brother Eisuke keeps bringing home orphans for her to take care of even though they can barely afford their own basic needs! Just when Sumi's financial problems become dire, wealthy Ashida Soichiro enters her life with a bizarre propositionhe'll provide her with the money she so desperately needs if she agrees to marry him. But can Sumi pull off fooling high society into thinking she's a proper lady? Moreover, is it worth it to give everything up for this sham of a marriage?

title: Bakuage Sentai Boonboomger Formation Lap - Jouhouya No Your Eyes Only
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Superhero, Adventure, Web Comic
author: sideranch
synopsis:
The manga depicts the past of Ishiro Meita, a freelance spy who graduated from a spy training school with top grades. When he's asked to investigate an unknown object that crashed from space, his life takes a drastic turn when he meets Taiya Hando. 

(from RangerWiki)

title: Musume No Tomodachi
genre: Psychological, Romance, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Drama, Slice of Life
author: Asami Hagiwara
synopsis: Kosuke has lived to play the ideal self as a father at home and as a manager at work. However, his life changes 180 degrees when he meets his daughters friend. In front of her, Kosuke was able to be his real self and his worn-out heart was healed. However, he knows that these are feelings that should never be held. The story of the Middle Aged Man Meets Girl, presented to the modern people who suppress themselves in society, begins.

title: Angel Heart
genre: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Tsukasa Houjou
synopsis:
A young Taiwanese assassin codenamed "Glass Heart" committed suicide by jumping off a building, and her heart was pierced by a metal fence. Miraculously, her life was saved by heart transplantation. During her recovery she began to experience strange dreams, which led her to Japan looking for the donor of her heart, who happens to be Kaori Makimura, former partner of City Hunter.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

title: Awana-Chan Wa Kyou Mo Shiawase
genre: Comedy, Philosophical, Web Comic, Slice of Life
author: Tabayou
synopsis: A convenience store part-timer who can't seem to do anything right: Awana-chan. Today, yet again, she messed up over and over, and she can't even count how many times she was told off... How will Awana-chan find happiness in a situation like this, without anyone else to rely on!? This is a manga about creating your own happiness!!

title: Mobile Suit Crossbone Gundam - Ghost
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Tragedy
author: Yuuichi Hasegawa
synopsis: Universal Century 0153. 17 years have passed since the "Steel Seven" defeated the remnants of the Jupiter Empire. As a new conflict brews between a Side 2 faction known as the Zanscare Empire and the League Militaire/Earth Federation. A high schooler on Side 3, Font Baud, is hunted by Zanscare special forces when he discovers their secret Newtype weapon. However, he encounters a little girl, who is accompanied by a blind man and is rescued by the strange return of a mobile suit that defeated the Jovians.

title: Teisou Gyakuten Sekai
genre: Comedy, Isekai, School Life, Adaptation
author: Amahara
synopsis:
In our current society, most porn consumers are males, we are the ones who think with our d**** many times, we worship the female body and our society, products, advertisements and many other things are centered around that. 

But what if it wasn't that way? What if, instead of men being the ones controlled by their sexual urges, women were the ones who bought porn magazines and had the most interest in sex? 

What if the moral standards between men and women were reversed?  

---
  
Note: This is a non-H adaptation of a doujinshi series with the same name.

title: Secret Lady
genre: Historical, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
author: BANANA
synopsis:
I, Yoon Seol-woo, a young woman with the ability to see ghosts, was reincarnated as Rosantine, the eldest daughter of a noble ducal house in a world were witchcraft is considered dangerous. I managed to fake not being able to see ghosts somehow but then...

"Leave my sister's body this instant!", I cried out to the evil spirit who's possessed my one and only beloved little sister.

Only the death penalty awaits me if my ability were to be discovered. Then, there's only one way...

"You're planning to kill Prince Chartus, right?"

I will save the Empire's second prince, Prince Chartus with this ability!

"I'll bet my life on Your Highness."

---

**Links:**
- [Official Japanese Translation (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77771)
- [Official Indonesian Translation (Kakao)](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Secret-Lady/3505)

title: Marriage of Convenience
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Ant Studio
synopsis:
Bianca de Arno was a ruthless countess in the Kingdom of Sevran, infamous for being a wicked and selfish wife. While her husband, Count Zachary de Arno, bravely risked his life out on the battlefield, she sat at home and spent his money. It wasnt until her final day that Bianca realized the error of her ways. Before she died, Bianca prayed for a second chance, swearing she would do better, and woke up in her 19-year-old body. With her second chance, Bianca starts to see everything in a new light... starting with her husband.

---
Bianca de Blanchefort. The wife of Zachary de Arno, thrown out of Arno family after his death due to her self-indulgent, frivolous, and immoral behavior. She had nowhere to go, the Blanchefort family having already fallen to ruin, and was more or less kicked to a convent out in the border. A woman who ultimately met her end on a cold stone floor. A villainess with no honor: that was Biancas life before she went back in time.

===
Is this truly reality? Did I really travel back to the past?

This was neither a dream nor a hallucination. This feeling of hunger, fatigue, the vivid sense of everything around her This was all real. If this was indeed reality If God truly gave her one more precious chance!

Im going to carry out a business. A marriage is a business in the end. Zacharys child will be the perfect source of financial support. Im sure my dowry will remain safe too. I wont have to lose the Blanchefort or Arno territories to that damned viscount either.

Then whether it be through seduction or persuasion, she needed to give birth to her husband, Zacharys child.

How much was my dowry exactly?

400 calves, 900 pigs, 100 units of silverware, 300 rolls of silk, 2 crates of jewels, and a portion of a territory Equivalent to a two-year budget for the Arno county.

Dont you think you should compensate for that?

---
