- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Freeshooter/548)

title: We Are the Beatles
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Music
author: Tetsuo Fujii
synopsis:
This is the tale of the members of a [Beatles](https://mangadex.org/title/877aa28e-5c75-469c-84b1-4730bd321f53) cover band in Tokyo who find themselves 
transported back in time to 1961 -before anyone had ever heard of the Beatles-   
and decide to take the mantle of the world's greatest rock band for themselves!  
But will they dare to pursue this dream until the end ?

title: Saikyou Yuusha Party Wa Ai Ga Shiritai
genre: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Crossdressing, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life
author: Hadajuban Yamada
synopsis:
The strong and popular hero won't let me (the unpopular mage) go for some reason!!!
The adventures of the strongest hero's party is full of strange love.

title: Telomere
genre: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Horror, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery
author: Tsurukawa Kakio
synopsis:
Two siblings are roaming a post-apocalyptic world destroyed by a zombie epidemic 10 years ago. For some reason these two kids aren't getting attacked by the zombies.


(Source: Manga Mogura RE)

title: Becoming a Legendary Ace Employee
genre: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Office Workers, Video Games, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: JRobin
synopsis: Kim Tae-seok, who worked on a construction site, receives a notice of passing the document screening for the major company El Sung. At the same time, a message pops up in front of him: 'You have entered the path to becoming a regular employee tutorial. Would you like to proceed?' Follow Kim Tae-seok's struggle to become the legendary all-around employee in this corporate adventure!

title: The Magic Genius of the Marquis House
genre: Action, Long Strip, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic
author: Namsarang
synopsis:
"To stay alive I have no choice but to become a genius. From today, Ill do my best, so please support me." 
Lee Hyun-woo finds himself possessing Kyle Seltarion, an extra character from a game where he used to reign as the worlds number one player.  
Considering the games storyline, he soon faces the imminent death of Kyle, who, on top of being on death's door, can't use magic or aura and has a terrible reputation. How did he end up in the body of such a character?  
However, after discovering a new talent, he learns to harness mana and begins to shift his attributes and reputation with knowledge of hidden routes gained through grinding in the game.  
His immediate goal is to save his own life, but that goal is closely linked to the impending global catastrophe...  
To overcome this situation, he needs to gather allies and boost his reputation! It's time to turn his past, which was a reckless mess, around and move into a new phase!

title: I Think You Are -
genre: Long Strip, Zombies, Girls' Love, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color
author: Ong-Bang
synopsis:
One year after the end of the zombie outbreak that swept through Korea, 'Doyoung', who lost her younger brother to a zombie, one day accidentally meets 'Jion', a student who closely resembles the zombie that bit her brother.
A friendship full of suspicion between two people that continues in a risky manner. Can this relationship last?

title: All Soccer Talents Are Mine
genre: Action, Long Strip, Sports, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color
author: amber
synopsis: Uho-yeong had dreamed of becoming a soccer player. However, he was not blessed with the talent and died without realizing his dream, struck by lightning. It was then that the demon Mammon appeared, offering the ability to covet everyone's talents...

title: Ayako
genre: Thriller, Historical, Psychological, Romance, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Etsuko Ikeda
synopsis:
The year is 1949. Crushed by the Allied Powers, occupied by General MacArthurs armies, Japan has been experiencing massive change. Agricultural reform is dissolving large estates and redistributing plots to tenant farmersterrible news, if youre landowners like the archconservative Tenge family. For patriarch Sakuemon, the chagrin of one of his sons coming home alive from a P.O.W. camp instead of having died for the Emperor is topped only by the revelation that another of his is consorting with the reds. What solace does he have but his youngest Ayako, apple of his eye, at once daughter and granddaughter?

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/ayako/)

---
**Volumes 197-199 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**

title: Bathroom No Tomodachi
genre: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Doujinshi
author: Yuu Utatane
synopsis: Not found

title: After Rebirth: Upgrading Through Consumption
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color
author: Tun Bao
synopsis: After failing the college entrance examination and being cheated on, Han Li, who achieved nothing after graduation, made a wish to heaven: "I wish... to go back in time..." Thus the Consumer System appeared and Han Li regressed to the age of eighteen! Not enough skills? Upgrade them with points! Looks too ordinary? Fix that mug with some points! The rich classmate who always looked for trouble taught him a lesson, and captured the hearts of the goddesses... With this regression, let's witness how Han Li counterattacks and rises to the heavens!

title: Death Penalty
genre: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Full Color
author: Namitsumi
synopsis:
In the present day, tower dungeons called Magic Towers have appeared throughout the world.

Takamichi Yoshito is a convenience store clerk. The manager yells at him every day, making his life miserable. Yoshito dreams of making a fortune, and soon after the Magic Towers appear. He becomes a Challenger of the towers, but he has no savings to invest in weapons or equipment, leaving him completely late to the game.

Aiming for a quick turnaround, Yoshito sells his real-life savings and the few items he has in the tower, and buys the [Infinite Revival] skill from a shady merchant. This skill allows him to revive himself within the dungeon. However, [Infinite Revival] had a hidden disadvantage.

When reviving, the user is randomly given a [Death Penalty], a permanent debuff so strong that once it is applied, the user is no longer able to work as an adventurer. Yoshito despairs over the cursed skill, but his situation changes drastically when he obtains the rare skill [Inversion] in a hidden room of the dungeon.

The skill [Inversion] reversed the heavy negative effects of [Death Penalty]'s permanent debuff caused by Infinite Revival and turned them all into positive stats!

title: At SummerS End
genre: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life
author: Takuya Nishio
synopsis: Natsukawa, a member of the beautification committee, often finds her gaze lingering on her schoolmate Aihara. One fateful day off, she spots Aihara walking alongside another girl... As summers heat stirs the air, a delicate tale of first love begins to take shape...

title: First Miss Reborn
genre: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color
author: Zhang Yue Wen Hua
synopsis: When she was hit by labor pain, what greeted her wasn't words of comfort but vile accusations of infidelity. Killed in defense of her unborn baby, she vowed to take revenge on them all and God granted her a second chance. However, it seems that she's not the only one brought back. Who's that silver-haired guy in mask? Why does he seem to know her every move, yet still willingly provide unconditional help regardless?

title: Nevermind Darling
genre: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Fever
synopsis: The day 'Daeun' went with his classmates to drink like crazy, he then went home to sleep. In his dreams, he recalls a memory of when him and Seohjin met lips. Why did the 'mistake' he made in high school suddenly reveal itself in a dream? Daeun, who thought his feelings had finally come to rest, Encounters Seohjin, whom he's uncomfortable with. Unlike his usual self, Daeun seeks out Seohjin to ask if he made some kind of mistake while drinking, but the answer he's met with is that they just kissed...?

title: I'Ll Answer, Your Mystery
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Mystery, Adaptation
author: Mei Higuchi
synopsis:
An assistant to the high school counseling teacher, Rinne Akegami is an introvert who only understands what is true. As if from a revelation from God, she can point out the culprit of any crime there. What complicated matters, however, is that not even she herself understands how she does this! 

This is where Touya Iroha comes in  he deduces "her deductions" in order to reveal the truth, once and for all!

title: Daikenja No Manadeshi ~Bougyo Mahou No Susume~
genre: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation
author: Ayasuke Nakanomura
synopsis:
Two childhood friends born in a remote village.

One of the boys, Alfi, was good at everything, and grew up as a handsome genius  with four attributes of magic, and entered the elite magic school as a scholarship student. On the other hand, the other boy, Reese, was a seemingly mediocre and naughty boy who could only use defensive magic for beginners, but in fact he was discovered by a rare Sage and had been educated as a gifted child since he was a child!

And Reese enrolls in the elite magic school with one extremely defensive magic, brilliantly destroying the common sense of childhood friends, teachers and students! An uncaring and selfish commoner pushes the aristocrats away and runs up the school caste at explosive speed!

title: Scp Tte Nan Desu Ka?
genre: Horror, Mystery
author: Nashi
synopsis:
A request was sent to two manga artists, M and H, from the editorial department of the Ichijinsha comic HOWL.

"I would like you to create artwork based on the name (storyboard) for 'SCP,' which is popular on the internet. Additionally, I would like you to draw a manga that serves as an introduction to 'SCP."

The two accepted the project, but there were many unknowns about the original name.
While tilting his head in confusion, M  who is learning about SCP from H, who is knowledgeable about horror  continues to draw the manga.
M will be in charge of the introduction part, and H will handle the artwork for the original name part.

The most popular horror author on the web, Pear, returns to her roots.
A thought-provoking horror story that will surely help you understand what SCP is once you read it.

title: Shrimp Manga
genre: Animals, Comedy, Web Comic, Full Color
author: Miyata Kyogorou
synopsis: Not found

title: Yomei Nikagetsu No Isekai Kenkouhou
genre: Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy
author: Munakata
synopsis:
Meet Kaichi Takemura, aged 82. Owner of the Takemura Dojo and master of the Churyu Akai-Jutsu martial arts, he is now wheelchair-ridden due to severe lung cancer. He is estimated to only have two months left to live. 

Realizing his time on this earth is ending, Takemura creates a bucket list of things he wants to do before then, which he shares with his nurse Tokiko Tanaka. However, one day his illness flares up, and Tanaka wheels him to the nearest doctor as fast as she can. 

When he comes to, he finds that the two of them arent in the emergency room of the hospital. In fact, it doesnt seem like theyre in Japan at all

title: Mukuchina Miyashita-San No Shikiyoku Channel
genre: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life
author: Mitsudoue
synopsis:
Kei Sakai, a high school boy, had a problem. One thing led to another, and he was deeply uninterested in everything and had no sexual desire.

Then one day, he learns of a mysterious, beautiful girl named Yami, who is the talk of the town on SNS, from a fellow part-timer. Yami is an unidentified internet idol who uploads naughty videos and pictures of herself in outrageous outfits, and has a huge following among men. No one knows her real face, but Sakai recognizes a woman who resembles Yami. That person was Saki Miyashita. Saki Miyashita is a high school girl who sits next to Yami in the same class, and although she is far more plain than Yami, she shares Yami's style and the position of her crying moles.

Sakai, who had lost interest and sexual desire, decides to explore Miyashita with an onlooker's guts in order to find out Yami's true identity. However, unaware of Miyashita's trap, they end up sharing a lewd secret that is too bad ......!?

title: Yuusha Ga Shinda! - Kami No Kuni-Hen
genre: Loli, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural
author: Subaruichi
synopsis:
A year and a half later. Finally, they followed the clues to reunite with the supposedly dead hero Zion to reform the strongest legendary party! Now it's time to go find the "Kingdom of the Gods"!

(Source: Ura Sunday, translated)

title: Yuizaki-San Wa Nageru!
genre: Romance, Comedy, Sports, School Life
author: Yuuma Kagami
synopsis:
A girl with a fascination for Shot Put, and a boy with a fascination for the girl.  
  
Oomiya-kun is often late for class so as a punishment, he is forced to join the Track and Field Club. However, that's where he discovers Nazuna Yuizaki, the girl he has a crush on, training seriously with Shot Put. Can he use this opportunity to get her to finally notice him?

title: Yorha - Pearl Harbor Descent Record - a Nier:Automata Story
genre: Sci-Fi, Action, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Drama, Adaptation
author: Megumu Soramichi
synopsis:
***A complete comicalization of the musical drama that shares the same worldview as NieR:Automata!***

In the distant future, the earth is invaded by aliens and their "machine life" weapons, and humanity flees to the moon. The humans develop android soldiers and organize a resistance army. A long battle ensued & the year is 11941. In order to break the stalemate in the war, a new type of female android decisive weapon, "YoRHa," was formed and descended to the front lines of the Earth. What is the future of the automatic infantry dolls that fight only to carry out their goal of.... retaking the earth for humanity? A complete comicalization of the musical drama that shares the same worldview as NieR:Automata, written and supervised by Yoko Taro! (MTL)

title: Yokubou Pandora
genre: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Supernatural
author: Akira Hizuki
synopsis:
A devilish dive into exploring the hottest girls on earthand in hell!

Very well Ill give you a whiff. I am the demon Roselia, and Ive come to grant your wish.

Takai Tsukasa is obsessed with the female body, but what he longs for more than anything is to find the perfect armpits. One day, an elegant, blonde demon appears before him, and she has exactly what he craves. A bold, uncensored fetish fantasy unfurls between Tsukasa, his neighbor Chika, the demon Roselia, and a cast of demon girls who are hungry for more than just souls and power!


Alternative: A guy with crazy armpit fetish gets a ring that gives him a demon that is there to pleasure him, and he starts off by going wild on the demon's armpit.  
  
**Note:** Extreme ecchi, not a hentai (do not tag as hentai). it started publication in issue 8 of Comic ExE (July 25th 2017), which is a hentai magazine, then it was transferred to Cmic MeDu

title: Deaddie Du Dead
genre: Psychological, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy
author: Sen Nakihara
synopsis: In the dismal world where humans live together with hybrids everything becomes more distorted day by day. Yvas is a teenager who happens to work as an assassin for an agency established by the government. However, after an incident between them and his friend, Yvas and his partner Alissa swear to destroy the agency and become free from it. Everything becomes even more complicated when Yvas dies and comes back to life with a strange power called ""awakening"". Due to circumstances Yvas becomes a target of multiple underground groups.
